title: System and method for providing customized online education services based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: 본 발명은 인공지능 기반의 맞춤형 온라인 교육서비스 제공 시스템 및 방법에 관한 것으로서, 마스터 노드와 복수의 슬레이브 노드를 포함하여 스타네트워크를 형성하고, 필기동작에 상응하는 제1 필기정보를 생성하는 제1 스마트펜 그룹, 및 근거리 무선통신 모듈을 통해 상기 제1 스마트펜 그룹과 연결되고, 상기 근거리 무선통신 모듈을 이용하여 상기 생성된 제1 필기정보를 수집하며, 클라우드 플랫폼의 지원을 통해 상기 수집된 제1 필기정보를 기반으로 인공지능 기반의 교육서비스를 제공하는 피어 단말기를 포함할 수 있다.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PROCESSING JOB VACANCY DATA
abstract_text: The invention relates to search systems and can be used for designing and developing user interfaces in recommendation systems for staff recruitment which allow for the organization of learning opportunities. The claimed system for processing, analyzing and structuring data using machine learning algorithms in order to simplify interaction between players in the education market and those in the job market comprises: construction modules including a user interaction platform and a neural network platform; a web library for a neural network; and an operating system. The user interaction platform comprises a database, a proxy server, and a web server for the user interaction platform, and the neural network platform comprises a neural network hosted on a separate web server, a database, and a proxy server. The invention allows for the automated processing of a list of job vacancies, while matching the skills required with those of users.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PROVIDING CUSTOMIZED ONLINE EDUCATION SERVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a system and a method for providing a customized online education service based on artificial intelligence, and the system may comprise: a first smart pen group which forms a star network including a master node and a plurality of slave nodes, and generates first handwriting information corresponding to a handwriting motion; and a peer terminal which is connected to the first smart pen group through a short-range wireless communication module, collects the generated first handwriting information by using the short-range wireless communication module, and provides, through support of a cloud platform, an artificial intelligence-based education service on the basis of the collected first handwriting information.

title: Method for operating multi-purpose AI education technology literacy inter-disciplinary learning interactive platform and interactive platform thereof wherein the interactive platform includes a server and a robot module
abstract_text: The present invention provides a method for operating a multi-purpose AI education technology literacy inter-disciplinary learning interactive platform and an interactive platform thereof. The interactive platform includes a server and a robot module, the server includes a database and a transceiver module, and the database stores information of a plurality of scenarios. The robot module is electrically connected to the server. The robot module includes a plurality of robots, each robot includes a control component, a moving component, a communication component, a sensing component and a power supply component. Each robot moves along a moving route on a carrier, the carrier includes a simulated scenario guidance module to color a coloring area corresponding to the simulated scenario based on the simulated scenario displayed by the simulated scenario guidance module. Therefore, the present invention can train students' technological literacy and inspire them with the AI education.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR MEASURING AND REPORTING CSI FOR BEAM MANAGEMENT IN WIRELESS COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a 5G or 6G communication system for supporting higher data transmission rates. The present disclosure can be applied to intelligent services (for example, smart homes, smart buildings, smart cities, smart cars or connected cars, healthcare, digital education, retail businesses, security- and safety-related services, and the like) on the basis of 5G communication technology and IoT-related technology. The present disclosure relates to a method and an apparatus for performing CSI measurement and reporting for beam management based on artificial intelligence (AI) in a wireless communication system.

title: Education field question answering method, education question answering all-in-one machine and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides an education field question answering method, an education question answering all-in-one machine and a storage medium. And then, based on the education question and answer model, identifying the intention of the current question by adopting the current interaction history, determining a reply strategy of the intention based on the category of the intention, and replying the current question based on the intention and the reply strategy thereof. Wherein the reply strategy comprises a plug-in calling reply strategy, a person-set card query reply strategy or a generative reply strategy. According to the method, by identifying the intention of the current question, the question proposed by the user can be accurately analyzed, and accurate reply to the current question is facilitated. Moreover, according to the method, the reply strategy of the intention is determined by using the category of the intention, and then the current question is replied, so that different reply strategies can be provided for questions with different intentions in a targeted manner, the accuracy of answers is ensured, and the experience feeling of the user is improved.

title: Answering test paper classification method, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING XINNUO RUANTONG INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an answer test paper classification method, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the cross technical field of artificial intelligence and intelligent education. The method comprises the following steps: selecting a part of answer papers as sample answer papers; obtaining a score distribution range of the sample answering test papers, selecting a plurality of score intervals, and taking the sample answering test papers falling into the same score interval as a same sample answering test paper training set; performing term extraction and fixed matching phrase splitting on all sample answer test papers in the same sample answer test paper training set, and establishing an answer test paper feature library; judging a vector position relationship between the terms and the fixed collocation phrases to obtain a feature word vector relationship, and establishing an answer test paper scoring model; and adapting the to-be-processed answer test paper according to the answer test paper scoring model, and classifying the to-be-processed answer test paper according to the suggested score and the model fitting degree. Therefore, the test paper is automatically classified, human subjective components are reduced, and the fairness and justice of the paper marking result are ensured.

title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR RETAIL EDUCATION OPERATIONS USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: 인공지능을 이용한 리테일 교육 운영 장치에 관한 것이며, 인공지능을 이용한 리테일 교육 운영 장치는 고객사에 소속된 직원들의 정보를 저장하고 관리하는 직원 관리부; 상기 직원들의 단말을 대상으로, 콘텐츠 DB에 기 등록된 복수의 교육 콘텐츠 중 적어도 일부의 교육 콘텐츠를 증강 현실(Augmented Reality), 가상현실(virtual reality) 및 혼합현실(Mixed Reality) 중 적어도 하나를 통해 제공하고, 제공된 교육 콘텐츠에 대한 직원들의 학습 진행을 관리하는 학습 관리부; 상기 직원들의 단말을 대상으로, 상기 고객사에서 운영되는 매장의 상태 점검을 위한 체크리스트를 제공하고, 제공된 체크리스트에 대한 응답지를 매장 DB에 저장하고 관리하는 매장 관리부; 및 각 부의 작동과 상기 직원들의 단말 각각의 작동을 제어하는 제어부를 포함하고, 상기 매장 관리부는, 상기 매장 DB에 저장된 복수의 응답지를 인공지능(Aartificial Intelligence) 모델을 이용해 분석함으로써 상기 고객사에 의해 운영되는 복수의 매장에 대하여 매장별 상태 등급을 도출하고, 도출된 상기 매장별 상태 등급의 정보를 상기 직원들의 단말 중 적어도 일부의 단말로 제공할 수 있다.

title: ONLINE EDUCATION SYSTEM USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: 본 발명의 실시예에 따른 온라인 교육 시스템은 입력부, 분석부 및 콘텐츠 제공부를 포함할 수 있다. 입력부는 학생들 각각의 문제풀이 답안을 입력할 수 있다. 분석부는 문제풀이 답안을 분석하여 학생들 각각의 분석결과를 제공할 수 있다. 콘텐츠 제공부는 분석결과에 따라 학생들 각각에 대한 맞춤형 교육 콘텐츠를 제공할 수 있다. 본 발명에 따른 온라인 교육 시스템은 학생들의 문제풀이 답안을 딥러닝 기반의 인공지능 분석을 통하여 학생들 각각의 분석결과를 제공하고, 분석결과에 따라 학생들 각각에 대한 맞춤형 교육 콘텐츠를 제공함으로써 교육효과를 높일 수 있다.

title: ANALYTICAL PLATFORM FOR IMPROVING THE EDUCATION QUALITY
abstract_text: A computer implemented analytical platform for improving the quality of education, the computer implemented analytical platform comprises a data aggregation module configured to collect and aggregate data from one or more data source. The computer implemented analytical platform includes a statistical analysis module for removing the interrelation among one or more variables. The results are passed to a dimensionality reduction module to select one or more variables from a given set of variables. After a selection is made on the number of dimensions/variables to be included for analysis, the data is passed to a feature engineering module, which calculates the importance of each feature/variable and the weight associated with each variable/dimension. A geospatial analytics module determines the gaps in coverage of schools. Subsequently, the data is passed to an analytical engine implementing machine learning algorithms, which are trained using a training and test dataset, the test dataset comprising one or more variables selected by the feature engineering module to optimize the set goals. The machine learning model is tested on the test dataset. An artificial intelligence module is used for prediction of factors for set objectives and a recommendation module is used for prediction of the outcomes based on the set goals.

title: Test question recommendation neural network model integrating question semantics and difficulty
abstract_text: The invention discloses a test question recommendation neural network model integrating question semantics and difficulty, and relates to the crossing field of artificial intelligence and wisdom education. Firstly, a neural network model composed of a BERT pre-training language model and a multi-head self-attention and bidirectional long-short-term memory network is provided, question semantics and difficulty of a target test question and question bank test questions are comprehensively processed, and a test question code integrating the question semantics and difficulty is obtained. And secondly, through the average pooling vector of the test question codes, obtaining the similarity between the target test questions and the test questions in the question bank, which comprehensively consider the semantics and difficulty of the questions, and further obtaining a test question recommendation list through test question similarity sorting. Finally, a set of method for improving general semantic similarity corpora into neural network model training corpora is provided, a regression loss function based on mean square errors is provided, and the problem of test question recommendation is solved in a more effective mode.

title: Online Java learning and score correcting platform based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention, which relates to the technical field of education and learning, discloses an artificial intelligence-based online Jacoustics learning and score correction platform comprising a composition submission module, a composition correction module, a character optimization module, a professional scoring module, a one-key writing module, a model essay providing module, a report generation module and a student growth center module. The composition correction module comprises a grammar error detection module and a punctuation mark detection module, the online Jacoustics learning and score correction platform based on artificial intelligence is provided with the composition correction module, the character optimization module and the professional scoring module, and a natural language processing model and a machine learning algorithm are adopted, so that the online Jacoustics learning and score correction platform based on artificial intelligence can be realized. The grammar error detection module can accurately identify and modify grammar errors, spelling errors, sentence structure problems and the like in the composition, the composition correction accuracy is greatly improved, the platform can correct the composition uploaded by the user in real time, improvement suggestions are provided in time, and a large amount of waiting time is saved for the user.

title: Education knowledge graph construction method and system based on man-machine hybrid enhancement
abstract_text: The invention relates to an educational knowledge graph construction method and system based on man-machine hybrid enhancement, and belongs to the technical field of knowledge graphs. According to the method, a multi-level educational knowledge graph ontology model based on output is designed; a deep learning algorithm is designed, the deep learning algorithm comprises an educational entity recognition model fusing a domain dictionary, a two-way long-short-term memory network and a conditional random field, and an educational entity relation extraction model deeply fusing a full-word mask Chinese pre-training model, a two-way gating network and an attention mechanism, and efficient automatic extraction of named entities and relations is achieved. According to the system, an entity recognition and relation extraction model is integrated through a computer, and education entity recognition, relation extraction and atlas construction are automatically completed; the educational experts further adjust and optimize educational entities, relationships and maps by using domain knowledge and experience; through a repeated man-machine interaction process, man-machine mixed enhanced intelligence is realized, and a high-performance educational knowledge graph is constructed.

title: Artificial intelligent personalized endoscopic examination reservation and preoperative propaganda and education method and system
applicants: RENMIN HOSPITAL WUHAN UNIV HUBEI GENERAL HOSPITAL
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence personalized endoscopic examination reservation and preoperative propaganda and education method and system. The method comprises the following steps that endoscopic examination reservation information, past history information, current medical history information and past gastrointestinal endoscopy results of a patient are obtained; carrying out characterization processing on the obtained information, obtaining standardized information and carrying out information storage; according to the obtained standardized information, carrying out information feature extraction, and obtaining classified tagged management information of the patient seeing the doctor; and selecting corresponding personalized gastrointestinal endoscope preoperative precautions according to the tag content of the obtained tagged management information of the patient seeing the doctor, and sending personalized preoperative propaganda and education and examination reminding to the patient. According to the method, automatic information extraction can be carried out on the endoscopic examination reservation information, the present medical history, the past history and the past gastrointestinal disease information of the patient, automatic classification management information of the patient is obtained, precise propaganda and education of gastrointestinal endoscopy are achieved, and health diagnosis and treatment and rehabilitation services of the gastrointestinal disease patient are efficiently assisted.

title: Public finance multi-dimensional analysis method based on artificial intelligence and satellite data
applicants: NANTONG RESEARCH INSTITUTE FOR ADVANCED COMMUNICATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of financial decision-making methods, and particularly relates to a general financial multi-dimensional analysis method based on artificial intelligence and satellite data. According to the method, the weight problem of indexes is considered when a measurement index system of the general finance is selected, a principal component analysis method is adopted, on the basis, the low-income degree of farmers in multiple provinces is measured from the three aspects of economy, education and society, and a static panel measurement model of farmer low-income, general finance and rural finance institutions is constructed. According to a metering model, the effect of the development of different types of rural financial institutions on low income reduction is investigated, and necessary conditions for realizing general finance are provided. The establishment of the common finance and the system thereof widens the service range of the traditional financial system, and generates a great positive influence on vulnerable groups and small and micro enterprises.

title: Intelligent classroom student health and safety monitoring edge computing platform
abstract_text: The invention discloses a smart classroom student health and safety monitoring edge computing platform, and relates to the technical field of education informatization. The body temperature of a human body is mainly obtained through a passive human body infrared sensor, student images in a class scene are obtained through a camera, then the change of facial expressions of students and the change of human body postures of the students are calculated from the obtained images through an AI deep learning algorithm, and finally, the obtained information is sent to the student safety monitoring algorithm through a student safety monitoring algorithm. And inputting student human body temperature, facial expression change, human body limb movement change and the like into the model for calculation so as to speculate the psychological change of the student. Education institutions and monitoring personnel are helped to carry out safety monitoring on the health of students through a computer technology, so that the health safety monitoring of the students is digitalized and intelligent, the labor cost is reduced, and real-time dynamic tracking of data monitoring of people with abnormal body temperature is realized.

title: Learning device for artificial intelligence education of children
abstract_text: The invention discloses a learning device for children artificial intelligence education, which comprises an intelligent box body, one side of the intelligent box body is provided with a connecting groove, one end of the connecting groove is hinged with a hinge block, one side of the hinge block is provided with a flat plate, one side of the flat plate is provided with a display screen, and the other side of the intelligent box body is provided with a supporting rod. The device comprises an intelligent box body, the intelligent box body is provided with a supporting rod, one end of the supporting rod is slidably provided with a supporting cylinder, one end of the supporting cylinder is connected with a U-shaped bottom plate, the two sides of the supporting cylinder are provided with a driving structure and an operation structure respectively, one end of the intelligent box body is provided with a mounting groove, and the interior of the mounting groove is slidably provided with an operation panel. An operation panel is connected through a mounting groove, watching operation is facilitated, direct writing is also facilitated, meanwhile, a driving structure, an operation structure, an intelligent box body and multiple modules are combined, intelligent control and interactive learning can be achieved, meanwhile, sitting postures can be corrected, and the learning effect can be improved.

title: AI education training system based on intelligent robot
applicants: GUANGDONG CHAOYUAN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI education training system based on an intelligent robot. The AI education training system comprises a multi-interface module, a processing module, a system framework, a storage module, a robot module, matched articles and a monitoring module. By arranging the processing module, the robot module, the matched articles and the monitoring module, the robot module can execute specified actions according to a program by using the matched articles and various sensors on the robot module in the AI education practical training process, and the matched articles are used for auxiliary observation of the completeness degree; and collection of sensor data and robot module data is realized through the monitoring module, and students can perform adjustment operation on the AI robot module or a sensor according to the data collected by the monitoring module, so that an optimal program execution state is achieved, and AI education practical training use of the intelligent robot is facilitated. The AI education training platform has the advantages of modular design, multi-interface access and convenience in AI education training.

title: Drug delivery method and device for patients in inpatient area and medium
abstract_text: The invention provides a medicine distribution method and device for patients in an inpatient area and a medium, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. According to the method, a corresponding specified medicine distribution cabinet is determined based on to-be-distributed medicine information, so that a patient medicine taking identifier corresponding to the specified medicine distribution cabinet is generated; and sending the patient medicine taking identifier to a mobile terminal of the patient corresponding to the to-be-distributed medicine information. When a medicine putting completion instruction is received and a corresponding medicine taking waiting area is reached through a medicine distribution path corresponding to the to-be-distributed medicine information, medicine taking prompt information for a patient corresponding to the to-be-distributed medicine information is generated, and according to a patient medicine taking identifier obtained based on user operation within a preset waiting duration, the medicine taking prompt information of the patient corresponding to the to-be-distributed medicine information is obtained. And generating a corresponding distribution cabinet opening instruction. Under the condition that a medicine taking completion instruction corresponding to the distribution cabinet opening instruction is received, medicine use propaganda and education multimedia information corresponding to the to-be-distributed medicine information is sent to a bedside display device.

title: Balancing structure of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The invention discloses a balance structure of an artificial intelligence education robot, and relates to the technical field of education robot accessories. The device comprises a base disc and a connecting disc which are coaxially arranged from bottom to top, an adjusting rod is further arranged above the base disc in the radial direction, an adjusting groove is formed in the top face of the adjusting rod, a screw rod is arranged in the adjusting groove in the long side edge direction, and the two ends of the screw rod are rotationally connected to the adjusting rod through rolling bearings; a movable block is spirally matched on the screw rod, and the movable block is in clearance fit in the adjusting groove; a first rotating shaft is fixedly connected to one side of the bottom face of the adjusting rod, the lower end of the first rotating shaft is embedded in the output end of the first motor, and a through hole allowing the first rotating shaft to penetrate in a sliding mode is formed in the center of the base disc. When the device is used, actions of a child can be avoided in time, the use safety is improved, and meanwhile the device is good in stability and long in service life during overall movement.

title: Intelligent school bus system and device based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention provides an intelligent school bus system and device based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the field of school bus safety, and the system comprises a safe route planning module which obtains a planned route through configuration; the driver behavior supervision module is configured to perform real-time detection on the safety of the school bus in the driving process; a student safety management module configured to perform student safety management through face recognition, target detection and voice broadcast, including performing safety education and personnel roll call by using face recognition and voice broadcast, and identifying dangerous behaviors of students by using target detection; and the intelligent stop arm module is configured to detect vehicles entering the school bus safety area in real time when the stop arm extends out, detect abnormally moving vehicles, record license plates and report the license plates to a management department. According to the invention, convenience can be provided for school bus driving work of school bus workers and student safety management. Manpower consumption in the aspect of school bus safety is reduced, and meanwhile safety of students in the going-to-school and going-to-school processes is effectively guaranteed.

title: Deep learning-based textbook German education text classification method and system
abstract_text: The invention provides a textbook German education text classification method and system based on deep learning, and relates to the field of natural language processing. The textbook German education text classification method based on deep learning comprises the steps of obtaining a to-be-processed textbook text; preprocessing the textbook text to be processed; performing data enhancement processing on the preprocessed textbook text to obtain a balanced data set; inputting the textbook text after data enhancement processing into a preset BERT model layer to generate word vectors; performing text feature extraction operation on the textbook text after the word vectors are generated through a preset convolutional neural network; and classifying and outputting each text in the textbook text after the text features are extracted through a preset full connection layer. The problems that many existing textbook text data have sparsity, context information and sequence information are difficult to consider when a traditional text classification algorithm is used for deep learning, a data set is unbalanced, and the number of texts with different indexes is greatly different are solved.

title: DYNAMIC EDUCATION PLANNING METHODS AND SYSTEMS
abstract_text: A method includes receiving fellow skill graphs and electronic calendar objects; processing the fellow skill graphs and the electronic calendar objects using a trained machine learning model to predict sessions; and displaying the sessions. A computing system includes a processor; and a memory having stored thereon executable instructions that, when executed by a processor, cause the computing system to: receive fellow skill graphs and electronic calendar objects; process the fellow skill graphs and the electronic calendar objects using a trained machine learning model to predict sessions; and display the sessions. A non-transitory computer-readable medium includes executable instructions that, when executed, cause a computer to: receive fellow skill graphs and electronic calendar objects; process the fellow skill graphs and the electronic calendar objects using a trained machine learning model to predict sessions; and display the sessions.

title: Campus education big data cloud platform based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a campus education big data cloud platform based on artificial intelligence, which belongs to the technical field of campus education and comprises a multi-dimensional information centralized collection module, an information automatic processing module, an initial data import module and a real-time data import module. According to the invention, the platform is provided with the AI table establishing module, the education information of students can be all integrated into the table by taking a family as a unit, and the platform is also internally provided with the hyperlink importing module, so that the education information and the like can be inquired directly through keywords subsequently, thereby greatly facilitating the propagation of the education information and improving the education efficiency. Meanwhile, information chaos can be effectively avoided through the mode, an AI model importing module is further arranged in the module, an AI model can be imported, information in a table can be intelligently classified and put in order, manual debugging is not needed, the definition of educational information one by one is improved, the information in the table can be synchronously updated in real time, and the efficiency is improved. And parents, students and teachers can know mutual information in real time.

title: Human-computer interaction type education video accurate pushing method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a man-machine interaction type education video accurate pushing method and system based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of audio and video processing. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a to-be-detected voice signal; identifying the emotional state of the user; if the emotion is the positive emotion, performing voice recognition on the to-be-detected voice signal; according to a voice recognition result, extracting and pushing a corresponding education video to the user; collecting a user face video in a preset watching time range, extracting a face image in the user face video according to a preset time period, and performing concentration detection on the extracted face image; the interest degree of the user is judged, and if the interest degree is high, the user continues to watch the education video; otherwise, extracting and pushing a new education video to the user. According to the method, multiple intelligent models are combined, accurate and efficient voice emotion recognition, voice signal content recognition and image concentration degree detection are carried out, and then accurate education video pushing is achieved.

title: Intelligent preschool education management platform based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of management platforms, in particular to an intelligent preschool education management platform based on deep learning, and the platform comprises a user layer which is used for different users to use the functions of the intelligent preschool education management platform; the business layer is used for realizing intelligent and safe pick-up attendance checking based on a face recognition model; the network layer is used for realizing transmission communication among the user layer, the service layer and the infrastructure layer; and the infrastructure layer comprises access control equipment, a server and an intelligent terminal. By completing child entering and leaving identification and parent pick-up identification, the pick-up attendance of the kindergarten can be more intelligent and safer.

title: MACHINE LEARNING SERVICE BASED ON SKILLS GRAPH
abstract_text: Provided are systems and methods for recommending and prioritizing jobs to pursue, as well as skills, credentials, education, and the like to obtain, targeted to both individuals and consultants, coaches, etc. who may help those individuals. The prioritizing and the recommending may be performed based on a skills graph that includes nodes representing entities, and edges annotated with shared skills information between the entities. Thus, the skills graph can be used to find entities that are similar to each other in terms of skills.

title: Intelligent terminal for analyzing psychological emotion fluctuation based on facial expression recognition
applicants: XINJIANG AOWEISI INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent terminal for analyzing psychological emotion fluctuation based on facial expression recognition, and relates to the technical field of facial expression analysis, and the intelligent terminal comprises a pre-post detection system, a mental disease screening system, a suspect psychological health detection system and a video lie detection system. Screening personnel with high suspicion degree and abnormal reaction, and finding abnormal personnel; according to the intelligent terminal for identifying facial expressions and analyzing psychological emotional fluctuations, through simple and easy-to-use non-contact analysis and detection of products and only 3-60 seconds of video acquisition, rapid detection and result obtaining can be realized, intelligent learning is realized, algorithm training in machine learning is adopted, so that a test value is more and more accurate, analysis is mostly realized, and the accuracy is high. The multi-dimensional psychological and physiological indexes such as fatigue, attention, psychological state and other psychological detection results are obtained, the application range is wide, and the method can be applied to different scenes such as psychological and physiological health screening, security, lie detection, marketing, education and interview.

title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE HIGHER EDUCATION SUPERVISION DEVICE
abstract_text: The present invention discloses an artificial intelligence higher education supervision device, and relates to the technical field of monitoring devices. The artificial intelligence higher education supervision device includes a vertical plate. When a motor is started, the motor drives a rotary shaft to rotate, the rotary shaft drives a first belt pulley to rotate, the first belt pulley drives a belt to rotate, the belt drives a second belt pulley to rotate, and the second belt pulley drives a circular ring to rotate. Buckles arranged on the circular ring can be locked in clamp grooves, so that a slide rod can be driven to rotate and can make a reciprocating motion when the circular ring rotates. The slide rod drives a connecting plate to rotate, the connecting plate drives a conical block to make a circular motion, the conical block drives a ball to make a circular motion, the ball can drive a circular block to make a circular motion while making the circular motion, and the circular block drives a circular ring column to make a circular motion. Due to the arrangement of a first circular column for position locking, the circular ring column can rotate and make a lifting motion, which expands the scanning range of a camera and reduces the occurrence of dead angles.

title: Data processing method and device, equipment and medium
applicants: BAIDU ONLINE NETWORK TECHNOLOGY BEIJING CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a data processing method and device, equipment and a medium, belongs to the technical field of computers, and particularly relates to the technical field of wisdom education, artificial intelligence and big data. According to the implementation scheme, multiple pieces of first text data are obtained; performing coding processing on each piece of first text data to determine a plurality of signature values of each piece of first text data; for each piece of first text data, copying the first text data into a plurality of copies respectively corresponding to the plurality of signature values so as to obtain a plurality of pieces of second text data; based on the multiple pieces of second text data and the signature value corresponding to each piece of second text data, multiple data sets are obtained; aiming at each data set containing the first search request texts, determining a first identification result of each first search request text in the data set; and determining a second recognition result of each first search request text to determine whether a test question meeting the search intention corresponding to the first search request text needs to be produced or not.

title: Online education resource group recommendation method based on graph convolutional neural network
abstract_text: The invention relates to an online educational resource group recommendation method based on a graph convolutional neural network, and belongs to the related fields of neural network deep learning and educational resource recommendation. According to the scheme, the method comprises the following steps that 1, a learner member group recommendation model is constructed and used for achieving reasonable division of learner groups; 2, constructing a graph-based convolutional neural network model for reflecting a social relation between member groups; and step 3, adopting a group preference mixed fusion strategy to realize personalized recommendation. According to the method, the accuracy and satisfaction degree of learner group recommendation can be remarkably improved.

title: Maintenance service assistance device and method
abstract_text: The present invention addresses the problem of generating a work plan in which a long-term viewpoint and a viewpoint corresponding to a business index relating to a customer enterprise are reflected in a maintenance service. As these viewpoints, it includes, for example, assurance of future experienced field operators by assigning costs to the education. In addition, medium and long term cost reduction is realized by reducing the re-access frequency and the standard work time caused by the work error. In the present invention, a maintenance work plan is generated by an AI (1) on the basis of work history information (2) and field information (3), and presented to each related person. At this time, the AI (1) evaluates and screens the generated maintenance work plan using enterprise target information (enterprise KPI information (4)) of the maintenance enterprise.

title: Artificial Intelligence Education System using Robot
abstract_text: 본 발명은 주변 환경을 감지하는 적어도 하나의 센서를 구비하여 획득되는 감지 신호를 무선으로 전송하며, 감지 신호에 대응하는 무선으로 전송된 제어 신호에 따른 동작을 수행하는 학습 로봇, 학습 로봇이 배치되는 기지정된 크기 및 패턴을 갖는 2차원 평판으로 구현되어 학습 로봇의 활동 영역을 제한하는 플레이 그라운드, 학습 로봇의 변화하는 주변 환경을 조성할 수 있도록 각각 서로 다른 미리 지정된 객체를 나타내고, 플레이 그라운드 상의 임의의 위치에 배치되는 적어도 하나의 환경 객체 도구 및 학습 로봇과 기지정된 방식으로 무선 통신을 수행하여 감지 신호를 인가받고, 학습자의 학습 설정에 따른 방식으로 학습되는 인공 신경망을 이용하여 감지 신호에 대응하여 학습 로봇이 플레이 그라운드 상에서 적어도 하나의 환경 객체 도구와 상호 작용하도록 제어 신호를 생성하고 무선으로 전송하는 인공 지능 제어 장치를 포함하여, 저비용으로 학습자의 흥미를 고취시키면서 인공 지능 교육을 수행할 수 있는 인공 지능 교육 시스템을 제공한다.

title: Method for constructing pre-training subject corpus of digital human teacher multi-mode large language model
abstract_text: The invention discloses a construction method of a digital human teacher multi-modal large language model pre-training subject corpus. The method comprises the following steps: 1) collecting subject-related multi-modal data from various subject-related literatures, textbooks, course data, academic periodicals, websites and other sources; 2) preprocessing the collected original corpus data; 3) performing feature extraction and representation learning on the multi-modal data based on a deep learning model; 4) performing domain self-adaption and fine adjustment on the pre-training model; 5) according to a corpus division result, organizing corpus data into a structured corpus form for subsequent corpus retrieval and application; according to the method, the education digital human subject corpus is constructed by adopting an automatic method, so that the construction efficiency is improved, the labor cost is reduced, the research and application requirements in the field can be better met, and meanwhile, important technical support is provided for development and application of the education digital human subject.

title: Artificial intelligence education device
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence education device, which comprises a shell, an intelligent education machine body, a lifting mechanism, a screen protection mechanism and a heat dissipation mechanism, the lifting mechanism comprises lifting sleeves, a connecting sleeve, a connecting rod, a gear, a rack, a lifting motor and a lifting column, the connecting sleeve is fixedly connected between the lifting sleeves, the connecting rod is rotatably connected in the connecting sleeve, and the gear is fixedly connected in the connecting sleeve. The two ends of the connecting rod are fixedly connected with gears, the gears are rotationally connected to the interior of a lifting sleeve, the outer side of the lifting sleeve is fixedly connected with a lifting motor, the rotating end of the lifting motor is fixedly connected with one end of the gear, the gears are connected with a rack in a matched mode, and the rack is fixedly connected to one side of a lifting column; and the lifting column is slidably connected in the lifting sleeve, so that the problem that the learning position of a learner is limited due to the fact that the existing artificial intelligence education device is mostly used at a fixed height in use and cannot be conveniently and comfortably used by the learner in different scenes is effectively solved.

title: Intelligent campus student care management service system
applicants: GUANGZHOU NANSHA LINGDONG VOCATIONAL TECHNICAL SCHOOL GUANGZHOU NANSHA OCCUPATION TRAINING SCHOOL
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of smart schools, in particular to a smart campus student care management service system, which comprises a care system, an acquisition terminal and a user terminal, and is characterized in that the care system is in communication connection with the acquisition terminal and the user terminal through a network, and the care system comprises a scoring system, an attendance system and a prediction system; the German education system is established based on the Internet, artificial intelligence and data analysis; the designed German education system is combined with intelligent hardware equipment, the advantages of real-time performance and universality of an informatization system can be played, data sharing is achieved, the workload of a class owner is reduced, the work pressure of the class owner is relieved, the attention degree of students on German education examination and daily attendance situations is improved, and the work efficiency of the students is improved. The system is beneficial to coordination of work of all departments of a school, improves work efficiency and smoothness, realizes unified management of data of existing intelligent equipment of the school, is beneficial to big data management of the school, and realizes assessment and attendance checking of students anytime and anywhere.

title: Artificial intelligence equipment based on AI education
applicants: NANJING BANGSHUN PRECISION MACHINERY TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence device based on AI education, relates to the intelligent equipment technical field, and comprises a cross shell, the middle part of the cross shell is fixedly provided with a fixed frame, a plurality of side walls of the fixed frame are all rotatably sleeved with internal thread pipes, the internal thread pipes are all internally provided with thread rods in a thread sleeve manner, and the thread rods are connected with the fixed frame. A display screen is fixedly arranged at the top end of the threaded rod on the upper side, sound boxes are fixedly arranged at one ends of the outer sides of the threaded rods on the two sides, a walking vehicle is fixedly arranged at the lower end of the threaded rod on the lower side, and a first transmission mechanism for driving the multiple inner threaded pipes to rotate is arranged in the fixing frame. A cleaning plate is arranged in the upper end of the cross-shaped shell, and a second transmission mechanism for driving the cleaning plate to move in a reciprocating mode is arranged in the cross-shaped shell. According to the device, the device can be stored and protected, and the device can be conveniently moved in a time-saving and labor-saving mode.

title: Video processing method and device and computer readable storage medium
abstract_text: The invention provides a video processing method and device and a computer readable storage medium, which are applied to various video interaction scenes such as cloud technology, artificial intelligence, smart traffic and smart education. The video processing method comprises the steps that in response to connection with M access devices, a video carousel control is displayed, the video carousel control is used for triggering video picture carousel of the M access devices, and M is a positive integer; in response to a video carousel operation for the video carousel control, N video pictures corresponding to the N access devices currently carousel are displayed in the current carousel page, the video carousel operation is used for requesting the N access devices currently carousel to upload video data, and the video data is used for displaying the video pictures; the N access devices are determined from the M access devices based on the unit carousel number, and N is a positive integer smaller than or equal to the unit carousel number. According to the invention, the stability of video processing can be improved.

title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SYSTEM TO PROVIDE SYNERGISTIC EDUCATION LINKED TO DRAWING SKILL EVALUATION AND ART EDUCATION AND WRITING EDUCATION
abstract_text: An artificial intelligence to provide a synergistic education linked to drawing skill evaluation and an art education and a writing education according to an exemplary embodiment of the present disclosure may include a communication unit, a user interface for providing an interactional environment to a user who is a learner, and receiving, through the communication unit, picture data which is created by a second user who is an educator to provide to the user, an art competency evaluation unit which is trained to present a picture subject about the picture data to the user as a question and evaluate an art competency of the user with an art competency score which is calculated by analyzing whether picture data created by the user is picture data in accordance with the picture subject, a picture similarity evaluation unit which is trained to present the picture data of the second user to the user for guiding the user, extract features of the picture data created by the user and picture data of the second user, and evaluate a picture similarity between the picture data created by the user and the picture data of the second user, and a keyword and feature extraction unit which is trained to analyze a document created by the user to include a text and picture data to perform a synergistic education linked to an art education and a writing education, extract a core keyword in the text and an object of picture data corresponding to the core keyword, and exchange the feedback of the core keyword and the object with the user.

title: COMPUTER GRAPHIC GAME PROGRAMMING SYSTEM FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EDUCATION
abstract_text: 사용자가 작성한 코딩블럭을 입력받는 입력모듈; 및 상기 코딩블럭을 미리 설정된 프로그래밍 언어로 변환하여 실행코드를 생성하고, 상기 실행코드에 포함된 환경정보 및 객체정보에 기초하여 게임 시뮬레이션 환경을 구축하고, 상기 게임 시뮬레이션 과정에서 생성되는 결과 데이터에 기초하여 학습 데이터를 생성하며, 미리 설정된 알고리즘에 기초하여 상기 학습 데이터를 학습하여 상기 시뮬레이션 환경을 업데이트하는 서버 시스템을 포함하는 인공지능 교육 목적의 컴퓨터 그래픽 게임 프로그래밍 시스템을 제공한다.

title: Implementation module and equipment system for physical education
abstract_text: The invention provides an implementation module and equipment system for physical education, and the dream of'collision between intelligence and education 'is realized by utilizing the Internet and artificial intelligence technology. The system is applied to the physical education process, the module system is implemented in the equipment system, and the content of the implementation module system comprises a course content implantation module, a motion selection module, a motion capture feedback module and a motion evaluation storage module; the equipment system is a VR equipment system and comprises a network transmission device, a 3D LCD/TP display touch device, an audio device, a computer host, a VR capture sensing device and a VR motion platform system. Through the implementation of the invention, the shackle that the original physical training can only be carried out by a professional teacher in a specific field is broken through, parents can enable teenagers and children to carry out physical training at home at high frequency and high efficiency, the children can obtain sufficient training guarantee to the greatest extent, and the purpose of building the body is achieved.

title: Network content risk control management system based on artificial intelligence mining
applicants: BEIJING EASTCOM NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a network content risk control management system based on artificial intelligence mining, and the system comprises a new business content detection module which is used for automatically obtaining new business content through a tool, and carrying out the checking and classification of the new business content based on artificial intelligence mining, and the new business content at least comprises an APP, an official account, a microblog, and WeChat; the website content supervision module is used for detecting multiple dimensions such as website content, hidden links, external links, tampering, vulnerabilities and availability in a preset website library; the enterprise content security governance module is used for automatically acquiring contents of texts, videos, pictures, audios and complex documents based on content acquisition technologies of active dial testing, bypass detection and file sharing, and performing content auditing based on artificial intelligence mining; and the UGC content auditing module is used for auditing the user original content, and the user original content at least comprises video live broadcast, love and marriage dating, community forums, e-commerce websites and online education. According to the invention, timely and accurate processing of network content risk control is realized.

title: Five-path line patrol sensor module for artificial intelligence education
applicants: FUZHOU HUIRAN CHUANGXIANG TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a five-path line patrol sensor module for artificial intelligence education, which comprises a five-path line patrol module substrate, an infrared sensor is fixedly arranged on the outer wall of the front side of the five-path line patrol module substrate, and a line concentration pin metal seat is arranged at the bottom of the front side of the five-path line patrol module substrate. Pins are fixedly mounted on the lower surface of the line concentration pin metal seat; the guide seat is fixedly mounted on the lower surface of the five-path line patrol module substrate, the guide seat is arranged outside the pins, and dismounting mechanisms are mounted on the outer walls of the two sides of the guide seat; compared with the prior art, the guide seat and the wire holder are arranged on the five-path line patrol module substrate, so that the pins can be conveniently connected with Dupont lines, the installation operation is convenient, the fixing effect is good, the trouble of welding connection of the pins is avoided, meanwhile, the situation that the welding position is broken due to external vibration can be effectively prevented, and the service life of the five-path line patrol module is prolonged. And the operation stability of the five-path line patrol sensor module is greatly improved.

title: Historical ancient city digital protection and business travel application system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention provides a historical ancient city digital protection and business travel application system based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of digitization, and the system comprises a digital scene construction module which is used for carrying out digital scene planning design based on a historical and cultural ancient city building model; the digital human construction module is used for carrying out image design of a digital virtual human based on the digital scene; the digital article construction module is used for carrying out digital article modeling based on the digital scene; the man-machine interaction platform comprises a voice conversion character module, a character interaction character module, a character generation voice module, a character driving mouth shape module and a driving expression and limb action module. According to the invention, a digital virtual reality scene, a digital virtual person and a digital virtual object are in online and offline correspondence and are effectively combined with an artificial intelligence language model, so that a real-time interactive digital block platform for online tourism, online shops, online education and online social contact of ancient cities is realized; and the travel business economy of online drainage, offline sales, diversion in a peak season and drainage in a slack season is realized.

title: Government affair hall business handling optimization method and system based on big data analysis
applicants: WUHAN XINGJI INTERACTIVE INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of business handling, in particular to a government affair hall business handling optimization method based on big data analysis, which improves handling efficiency, provides personalized services and realizes data-driven decision making. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring the type of a business needing to be handled and business handling application side information; based on a big data platform, feature data extraction is performed on the business handling application side information, and applicant age information features, applicant educational background information features and applicant business handling historical information features are obtained; performing classified statistics on the business handling historical information characteristics of the applicant to obtain a local business handling historical frequency, a non-local business handling historical frequency, a related business handling historical frequency and a business handling historical total frequency; constructing a business handling time length prediction model based on a machine learning platform; the applicant age information feature, the applicant education information feature, the historical frequency of local business handling and the historical frequency of non-local business handling are integrated.

title: Control method and device for cancer patient psychological health assessment system
applicants: SUN YAT SEN UNIV CANCER CENTER SUN YAT SEN UNIV AFFILIATED CANCER HOSPITAL SUN YAT SEN UNIV CANCER I
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of psychological health, and discloses a control method and device for a psychological health assessment system of a cancer patient. According to the method, mental health conditions of a user can be evaluated and classified by utilizing an AI identification model according to basic information of the user, when the user belongs to a definite diagnosis user, a self-service treatment video and a propaganda and education video are pushed to the user, and if the user belongs to a healthy user, a self-service prevention video and a propaganda and education video are pushed to the user; the psychological health of the user is monitored regularly by using the test scale, and if the score of the test scale of the user exceeds a threshold value, an early warning mechanism is triggered, so that the medical care terminal performs targeted remote evaluation on the user and pushes a corresponding treatment scheme. The psychological health condition of the user can be classified more conveniently, the psychological health of the user is monitored regularly, feedback is made timely, the effect of monitoring the psychological health state of the user is achieved, remote evaluation is achieved, and corresponding remote intervention is conducted according to the evaluation result.

title: Method, system and equipment for evaluating intelligence development degree of infant
applicants: UNIV BEIJING FRIENDSHIP HOSPITAL CAPITAL MEDICAL
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of intelligent medical treatment, in particular to a method, a system and equipment for evaluating the intelligence development degree of an infant. Comprising the steps of obtaining an infant behavior video sequence; and outputting the infant behavior video sequence to a double-branch neural network for feature extraction to obtain behavior features, and outputting the behavior features to a classifier to obtain an infant intelligence development degree result. According to the method, the behaviors of the infants at different age groups are analyzed and evaluated by using an artificial intelligence method, and early intervention and personalized education in the growth stage of the infants are facilitated.

title: Method, Apparatus and System for a Unified Database for Academic and Organizational Processes and their Evaluations using Data Analytics
abstract_text: A dedicated database system for a school, college or university is proposed which is capable of providing whole analytical insights to all aspects of academic business and organization. This enables users to obtain and analyze business data from a plurality of sources, manipulate and store and then after reformatting, to apply machine learning and other algorithms to obtain analytical information for past and present state and future predictions. The database system is also capable of listing and itemizing key parameters and data which shall have major improvements in the metrics of interest for the education institutions. The database system is capable of cloud installation, enabling online updates of versions and improvements in performance, in a transparent way to the user.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR AUTOSCALING CONTAINERS IN A CLOUD-NATIVE CORE NETWORK
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. A method performed by an artificial intelligence (AI) module for autoscaling containers of a cloud-native core network with containerised network functions is provided. The method comprising requesting, from at least one metrics server, at least one metric required to make an autoscaling decision with respect to at least one set of containers; receiving the at least one metric from the at least one metrics server; processing the received at least one metric, using a trained machine learning (ML) model, to make an autoscaling decision with respect to the set of containers; and implementing the autoscaling decision with respect to the set of containers.

title: Balancing assembly of artificial intelligence education robot
applicants: HARBIN HUANGUO EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a balance assembly of an artificial intelligence education robot, and relates to the technical field of robot accessories, the balance assembly comprises a robot body, the bottom end of the robot body is connected with a connecting block, the connecting block is provided with a fixing mechanism, and the bottom end of the connecting block is fixedly connected with a reset mechanism. One side of the reset mechanism is fixedly connected with a moving mechanism; the reset mechanism comprises a balance plate, a positioning shaft, a Z-shaped plate, a connecting plate, a second spring, a limiting shaft, a U-shaped plate and a center shaft, the bottom end of the connecting block is fixedly connected with the balance plate, one side of the balance plate is fixedly connected with the positioning shaft, and the outer wall of the positioning shaft is rotationally sleeved with the Z-shaped plate. According to the artificial intelligence education robot, by arranging the reset mechanism, when the artificial intelligence education robot stops in the moving process, the robot body does not topple over due to forward moving inertia, the base is driven to rapidly reset from the state of toppling over in the moving direction, and the whole artificial intelligence education robot is more stable and balanced.

title: Deep learning sample labeling method and system based on online education big data
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of sample labeling, and discloses a deep learning sample labeling method and system based on online education big data. The deep learning sample labeling system based on the online education big data comprises a data sample acquisition module, a classification processing module, a central control module, a labeling model construction module, a model training module, a model testing module, a sample labeling module, a sample labeling auditing module, a data storage module and an updating display module. According to the deep learning sample labeling system based on the online education big data provided by the invention, the online education big data samples are labeled, a data entry independent of individuals is provided for the deep learning model, the recognition accuracy of the online education data is improved, the subjectivity of the individuals is avoided, and the user experience is improved. According to the method and the system, the boring property of single repeated labor is released, great convenience is brought to all labeled users, the user experience can be improved, and the use operation of the user is more convenient.

title: System and method for predicting high-quality development of regional economy by higher education
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of prediction of high-quality development of regional economy in higher education, and particularly relates to a prediction system and method of high-quality development of regional economy in higher education. A data collection module collects higher education related data and regional economic development related data, and uploads the data to a deep learning regional economic development prediction platform in real time; processing and analyzing the uploaded data according to the deep learning regional economic development prediction platform, and sending a data result to an information notification module and an industry-university-research adjustment module; the information notification module sends the information to each related mechanism in real time; the industry-university-research adjustment module performs direction adjustment according to the data result; the regional economic development database stores and updates all data of each link department; not only can refined prediction and analysis be carried out on higher education demands and supply, but also a scientific basis is provided for multiple institutions to make related policies.

title: Method, device and equipment for solving vocational education machine autonomous learning based on LLaMA model
applicants: FUZHOU LIANTIAN EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method, a device and equipment for solving vocational education machine autonomous learning based on an LLaMA model. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring text data in different formats; constructing an LLAMA model based on the text data, and identifying knowledge points and examination points in the text data; constructing a knowledge graph based on the identified knowledge points and examination points; continuously and automatically generating examination questions based on the constructed knowledge graph; training the LLAMA model based on the continuously and automatically generated examination questions; and accurately extracting key knowledge points and test key points in the text data according to the trained LLAMA model. According to the invention, key knowledge points and examination key points can be automatically understood and identified by reading and analyzing textbooks, and even examination questions can be generated. The autonomous learning ability is lacked in the prior art, so that the AI system becomes more intelligent, and the AI system can better adapt to the constantly changing education environment.

title: 1:1 Non-face-to-face 1:1 education matching solution using deep learning technology
abstract_text: 생활환경의 변화와 동시대적 사회 문제로 인하여, 외부 생활시간 보다는 내부생활시간이 늘어나고 있는 상황이다. 하지만 대부분의 사람들은 인터넷을 통해 많은 정보와 내용을 공유 하고 있다. 인터넷에서의 수업 방식은 대부분이 일방적인 수업방식과 정해놓은 스케줄을 이용해서 수업받는 방식이다. 이에 수업을 받는 학생의 입장에서는 자신이 원하는 수업을 받고 싶고, 특정 수업은 자신이 원하는 강사을 선택하기를 원한다. 또한 대한민국 인구의 대부분은 고등교육을 받아 학원 강사으로써의 능력을 보유하고 있음에도 불구하고, 자신의 재능을 펼치지 못하고 있다. 이에 네트웍 공간안에서 적절한 선별과정만 거치면 24시간 언제든지 자신의 능력을 이용하여 수익을 낼수 있고. 원하는 시간에 수업과 강의를 듣고 할수 잇는 매칭 시스템이 필요하다. 이에 기존의 수업방식 및 선별과정이 아닌. 1:1 화상 매칭 교육 솔루션을 개발하였다. 이 기술은 기존의 여상 수업 뿐만 아니라, 양질의 수업을 위한 적절한 선별과정과 강의자가 원하는 시간대를 학생과 매칭하여 서로 편리한 시간을 선택하고 수업 받는 방식으로 기존의 교과과정 뿐만 아니라 문화, 체육, 교양등의 수업까지 확산 하려고 한다.

title: Emotion recognition method, feedback method, terminal equipment and readable storage medium based on human face
abstract_text: The present invention provides an emotion recognition method, feedback method, terminal equipment and readable storage medium based on human face, including the following steps: train a face database to form at least a data set; train the data set according to facial expression database through a deep learning model to form an identification model; capture a face image and transform it into an image array after grayscale processing; and, input the image array into the identification model to output a result of emotion recognition. By the steps, the present invention trains the face database through the deep learning model to form an identification model according to facial expression database. Its accuracy rate of human facial expression recognition will achieve 98%, which is beneficial to machines to learn and recognize human emotions based on facial expression and thus recognize the meanings human express more accurately to perform corresponding feedback accurately. This is conducive to the development of communication technology between human and machines; thus can be applied to technical fields such as daily communication, education, and medical care.

title: Occupational safety and health education system through artificial intelligence video control and method thereof
abstract_text: 본 발명은 산업안전보건 교육 시스템 및 방법에 관한 것으로, 더욱 상세하게는 산업현장의 임의 위치에 설치되어 미리 설정된 감시영역을 촬영하는 CCTV 등의 영상획득장치로부터 획득되는 영상을 산업안전 요소별로 위험 상황을 감지하는 위험 상황 감지 인공지능모델에 적용하여 해당 감시영역의 산업안전 요소에 대응하는 위험 상황을 감지하고, 위험 상황이 감지된 감시영역에 대응하는 작업자를 교육대상자로 선정하여 상기 교육 대상자의 모바일 단말기로 상기 감지된 위험상황에 대응하는 산업안전보건 교육 콘텐츠를 제공하여 교육시키는 인공지능 영상 관제를 통한 산업안전보건 교육 시스템 및 방법에 관한 것이다.

title: AI artificial intelligence child accompanying education robot
applicants: FUZHOU YUANHE POWER INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI artificial intelligence child accompanying education robot, and particularly relates to the technical field of AI robots, the AI artificial intelligence child accompanying education robot comprises a machine body, a display is mounted on the surface of the machine body, a rotary table is mounted on the surface of the machine body, and a loudspeaker is arranged on the surface of the machine body; a protection structure is arranged on the surface of the machine body and used for temporarily protecting the displayer, a cleaning structure is arranged on the surface of the protection structure and used for rapidly cleaning the displayer, a replacing structure is arranged on the surface of the protection structure and used for rapidly replacing parts, and the protection structure comprises a fixing plate. And the fixed plate is fixedly connected with the machine body. By arranging the protection structure, the display on the surface of the machine body can be temporarily protected in all directions, and the situation that when the machine body is idle and placed on a table, the machine body falls off from the table due to accidental touch and collision with the table is avoided as much as possible, and therefore display glass on the surface of the machine body is broken is avoided.

title: Question bank system for preventing repeated and wrong questions of knowledge points and management method
abstract_text: The invention discloses a question bank system and management method for preventing repeated and wrong questions of knowledge points, and the system comprises a UI module which is used for providing user operation word and sentence input, receiving an index result, and storing question bank data; the semantic recognition module is used for receiving words and sentences input by a user and performing vector calculation on the words and sentences so as to convert the words and sentences into structured word vectors; the index construction module is used for receiving a vector calculation result and constructing similarity calculation and a quick index according to the vector calculation result; the database persistence module is used for vectorizing question words and sentences input by the user through the semantic recognition module, quickly screening out a question most close to the question in a database by virtue of the index construction module, and feeding back a screening result to the user in a short time so as to help the user to judge whether the knowledge point error question is repeated or not; artificial intelligence is applied to the education industry, consumption of education resources is saved, and the system is convenient for teachers to use.

title: Revenue distribution scheme acquisition method and device, equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses an income distribution scheme acquisition method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and can be applied to the field of artificial intelligence or finance. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring personal information related to income and expenditure of a user; determining risk level values of the user for different expenditure types based on the personal information; and analyzing the risk level values of the user for different expenditure types and income data included in the personal information to obtain expenditure distribution information respectively corresponding to different expenditure types as an income distribution scheme. Therefore, the risk level values of the user for different expenditure types, such as consumption expenditure, education expenditure, medical expenditure and saving expenditure, are analyzed, and then the income distribution scheme of the user is intelligently determined by further combining the income data of the user. Therefore, the user can realize reasonable income distribution according to the income distribution scheme subsequently, and the improvement of the income storage rate of the user is facilitated.

title: Campus canteen optical disk behavior monitoring device and management system
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of campus management, and particularly discloses a campus canteen optical disk behavior monitoring device and management system.The campus canteen optical disk behavior monitoring device comprises a bottom plate, a data processing controller is arranged on the inner wall of the bottom plate, and one end of the data processing controller is electrically connected with a wireless signal transmitter through a wire; according to the invention, based on an artificial intelligence YOLOv4-tiny model, automatic photographing is carried out, the type of a meal plate image is identified, and the following operations are carried out: (1) a finished meal plate is carried out, (2) partial waste is carried out, (3) too much waste is carried out, and (4) unidentified meal plate image identification is carried out. Four types of pictures are recognized, real-time voice broadcast is performed after recognition, image information of partial waste, excessive waste and unidentified image information are automatically recorded, automatic photographing, rice plate image detection and student face image detection can be realized, student names can be automatically registered, and targeted management education can be adopted for frequently-wasted students.

title: METAVERSE SYSTEM FOR PROVIDING EVOLVABLE AVATAR ON BASIS OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MODEL, AND METHOD FOR GENERATING NFT FOR EVOLVABLE AVATAR
abstract_text: A method, performed in a metaverse system, for providing an evolvable avatar according to various embodiments of the present disclosure may comprise the steps of: creating a basic avatar used in a metaverse virtual space; collecting at least one of a user's input text, a user's voice, and a user's video image; generating user feature information using at least one of the collected text data, voice data, and video image; generating an evolved avatar by transforming the basic avatar using the user feature information; generating digital art on the basis of the evolved avatar; and issuing an NFT token for the digital art. Other various embodiments are possible. The present invention is a technology with support from the 2022 Metaverse Content Global Project Support Project (D0131-22-1002) of the National IT Industry Promotion Agency "Task Name: Strengthening Overseas Expansion Capacity Based on the Education Metaverse Platform".

title: Intelligent party building processing method and device based on digital twinborn and artificial intelligence
applicants: QINHUAI INNOVATION RESEARCH INSTITUTE NANJING UNIV OF AERONAUTICS AND ASTRONAUTICS
JIANGSU LONGXING HANGYU INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: An intelligent party building processing method and device based on digital twinborn and artificial intelligence belongs to the field of intelligent management, and comprises the following steps: obtaining basic information of a to-be-punctured person, dividing a management area, and establishing an electronic file of the to-be-punctured person; obtaining preset education planning information of a person to be punctured, carrying out education scene planning, obtaining an education scene planning result, carrying out modeling data analysis based on the planning result, inputting the modeling data into a digital twin platform, and obtaining a party building digital model; establishing a connection relationship between the digital wearable device and the to-be-punctured person, and starting the digital model to carry out party building education simulation; and establishing a connection between the to-be-punctured person and the interaction terminal, writing a party building thought report by using the interaction terminal, and storing the party building thought report to an electronic file of the to-be-punctured person. The technical problem that in the prior art, in party building management, the management precision degree and the intelligence degree are low is solved, and the technical effect of realizing party building management intelligence and precision is achieved.

title: Expression recognition method based on AI education system
abstract_text: The invention discloses an expression recognition method based on an AI education system in the technical field of face recognition. The method comprises the steps that S1, an image acquisition module acquires face image signals of a listening user under different expressions; s2, the server performs sensing processing on the digital signal; s3, recombining the two-dimensional image signal by the server to obtain a recombined image block with a high-resolution characteristic; s4, a face recognition model is constructed based on the recombined image module, and the analysis and judgment module verifies the identity of the listening user; and S5, carrying out listening monitoring on the listening user passing the verification, and judging the concentration degree by the server based on the expression change of the listening user. According to the scheme, wavelet filtering processing and compressed sensing processing are performed on the data, the influence of noise on the resolution of the image data is reduced, the image data after sensing processing is recombined, the facial recognition model constructed by the recombined image blocks is used for recognizing and judging the expressions of the listening users, and the recognition accuracy is improved.

title: Heterogeneous graph neural network course recommendation method and system based on attention mechanism
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence semantic recommendation, and relates to a heterogeneous graph neural network course recommendation method and system based on an attention mechanism, and the method comprises the following steps: generating a heterogeneous relation network graph according to the relation between entity users on an online education platform; according to the heterogeneous relation network diagram, meta paths corresponding to the user and the network video are set for the user and the network video; the meta path comprises a plurality of nodes, and weights of the nodes are calculated through a double-layer attention mechanism; performing feature fusion according to the weights of the nodes to generate a user vector and a course video vector; and splicing the user vector and the course video vector, inputting the spliced vector into a multi-layer perceptron, calculating a recommendation score of the user-course video, and performing course recommendation according to the recommendation score. The method has good performance on the MOOCCube data set, not only can provide high-quality personalized course video recommendation service for users, but also can contribute valuable reference suggestions to the development of the course video recommendation field.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR PREDICTIVE BEAM MANAGEMENT
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system supporting higher data rates than a 4th-Generation (4G) system with an Internet of Things (IoT) technology. The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services.
