A method of operating a user equipment (UE) includes receiving configuration information for a transmission configuration indication (TCI) state; receiving information indicating a plurality of TCI states and a plurality of corresponding TCI state application times; and determining, for one or more of the plurality of TCI states, at least one of a downlink (DL) quasi-co-location (QCL) characteristic for downlink (DL) communication and an uplink (UL) spatial filter for uplink (UL) communication.

title: Student ability assessment method and system, medium, equipment and terminal
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of intelligent education, and discloses a student ability assessment method and system, a medium, equipment and a terminal. Performing hierarchical clustering on each feature dimension, and obtaining a learning condition capability evaluation score of each course of the student through secondary hierarchical clustering; performing deep neural network training by using the clustering scores, and constructing a student ability evaluation model based on an online education platform; and analyzing the user activeness by using the student ability evaluation model, determining a user activeness score, and generating a course ability radar map of the student. According to the method, the ability assessment score of the student is obtained through secondary hierarchical clustering, the regression model is trained through the deep learning algorithm, and compared with a radar map made by software such as Excel, the method is more intelligent, more fusion features are achieved, and feature information is not prone to being lost. The RFM model has a very good effect in the e-commerce field, is introduced into score scoring in the education field, and has innovativeness.

title: Education resource recommendation method and system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: GUOXIN LANQIAO EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an educational resource recommendation method and system based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: determining resource characteristics of educational resources; reading a resource demand of a target user and a corresponding demand feature, and screening the resource features of the educational resources according to the demand feature to select a target resource feature of the to-be-recommended educational resources; analyzing the historical learning information of the target user to determine interest features of the target user, determining the matching degree between the interest features and each target resource feature, and determining a recommendation value corresponding to each to-be-recommended education resource based on the matching degree; and sorting the recommendation value corresponding to each educational resource to be recommended, outputting a target educational resource corresponding to the optimal recommendation value, monitoring the learning degree of the target educational resource by the target user in real time, and updating and recommending learning items in the target educational resource according to the learning degree. And the reliability, timeliness and convenience of educational resource recommendation are improved.

title: Artificial Intelligence Essential Education Recommendation Algorithm Software
abstract_text: 본 발명은 인공지능 학습 플랫폼을 이용한 비즈니스 방법 및 시스템에 관한 것이다. 본 발명의 일예와 관련된 인공지능 학습 플랫폼을 이용한 비즈니스 시스템은, 학생 및 학부모 중 적어도 일부가 사용하는 복수의 단말; 상기 학생의 학습과 관련된 콘텐츠를 제공하는 콘텐츠 제공 서버; 상기 학생의 학습과 관련된 온라인 커머스 (뒷면에 계속)

title: METHOD DEVICE AND SYSTEM FOR PROVIDING ONLINE EDUCATION CONTENT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: 일실시예에 따르면, 장치에 의해 수행되는, 인공지능을 기반으로 온라인 교육 콘텐츠를 제공하는 방법에 있어서, 제1 사용자가 제1 강의자에 의해 진행되는 화상 강의인 제1 콘텐츠를 시청하고 있는 경우, 제1 시점에 상기 제1 사용자 단말에 설치된 카메라를 통해 촬영된 상기 제1 사용자의 얼굴 이미지인 제1 이미지를 획득하는 단계; 미리 학습된 제1 뉴럴 네트워크에 상기 제1 이미지를 적용하여, 제1 눈동자 객체를 추출하는 단계; 상기 제1 눈동자 객체를 이용하여, 상기 제1 사용자가 상기 제1 시점에 상기 제1 사용자 단말의 디스플레이를 주시하고 있는지 여부를 판단하는 단계; 상기 제1 사용자가 상기 제1 시점에 상기 디스플레이를 주시하고 있지 않는 것으로 판단한 경우, 상기 디스플레이에 대한 주시를 경고하는 알람 신호를 생성하는 단계; 상기 제1 시점으로부터 미리 설정된 기간이 지난 후의 시점인 제2 시점에 상기 제1 사용자 단말에 설치된 카메라를 통해 촬영된 상기 제1 사용자의 얼굴 이미지인 제2 이미지를 획득하는 단계; 상기 제1 뉴럴 네트워크에 상기 제2 이미지를 적용하여, 제2 눈동자 객체를 추출하는 단계; 상기 제2 눈동자 객체를 이용하여, 상기 제1 사용자가 상기 제2 시점에 상기 제1 사용자 단말의 디스플레이를 주시하고 있는지 여부를 판단하는 단계; 및 상기 제1 사용자가 상기 제1 시점에 상기 디스플레이를 주시하고 있지 않는 것으로 판단한 상태에서, 상기 제1 사용자가 상기 제2 시점에도 상기 디스플레이를 주시하고 있지 않는 것으로 판단한 경우, 상기 제1 시점부터 상기 제2 시점까지의 제1 학습 구간 동안 상기 제1 콘텐츠를 시청하지 않은 것으로, 상기 제1 사용자의 학습 상태를 분석하는 단계를 포함하는, 인공지능 기반 온라인 교육 콘텐츠 제공 방법이 제공된다.

title: Live broadcast education terminal dynamic distribution system
applicants: ANHUI XINZE ENTERPRISE MAN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a dynamic distribution system for live broadcast education terminals, and the system comprises a plurality of live broadcast education terminals which face a live broadcast scene of the same live broadcast education room, and each live broadcast education terminal corresponds to a different live broadcast ID; the information prediction mechanism is used for predicting the number of students participating in live broadcast corresponding to a set affiliation area of a next time area after the current moment; and the parallel processing mechanism is used for adjusting the number of live broadcast IDs allocated to the set attribution area by the live broadcast education room for the next time area after the current moment based on the number of students participating in live broadcast corresponding to the set attribution area in the next time area after the current moment. The live broadcast education terminal dynamic distribution system is intelligent in design and wide in application. The artificial intelligence model customized for each attribution region can be adopted to predict the number of live broadcast students in the future attribution region, and then dynamic allocation of the limited number of live broadcast hardware is executed, so that the utilization rate of the live broadcast hardware is improved.

title: Diabetes prevention active intervention scheme self-adjusting method and system based on mobile health
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of healthy life management, in particular to a diabetes prevention active intervention scheme self-adjusting method and system based on mobile health. According to the scheme, online information collection is carried out on diet and exercise related psychological variables, behavior variables and weight related variables through a mobile health management platform; on the basis of information acquisition, a corresponding intervention target needs to be determined; according to variable groups including age, education, marriage conditions, occupations and minimum child age, a classification group quantitative index is formed, and according to a comprehensive index formed by a corresponding body weight index and a waistline, an optimal coefficient for the classification group quantitative index is determined; and under the condition that the classification group quantification index is in a preset parameter range, determining an optimal intervention strategy based on an artificial intelligence algorithm in combination with an intervention target, and executing a corresponding intervention scheme. The core purpose of the scheme is to recommend and execute the optimal active health intervention scheme for the abdomen type obese mothers.

title: Gamification course generation method and device, equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of gamification education, and provides a gamification course generation method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a tutorial script and a preset tutorial template corresponding to the tutorial script; based on a preset template matching logic, according to a preset tutorial template corresponding to the tutorial script, obtaining a game template matched with the preset tutorial template; and based on a preset tutorial template corresponding to the tutorial script, according to the tutorial script, performing arrangement processing on the game template to obtain a gamification course corresponding to the tutorial script. Through the setting of the preset course template, a course script and a game template can be acquired and arranged through artificial intelligence, a gamification course can be obtained, the gamification course can be used for improving the learning experience of knowledge in the fields of artificial intelligence, digital medical treatment, financial science and technology and the like, and the development efficiency of the gamification course is improved. The intelligent degree of development of the gamification course is improved, and the development difficulty of the gamification course is reduced.

title: KOL management recommendation system
applicants: SHANGHAI LYUSHU NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a KOL management recommendation system which is functionally divided into six parts including data acquisition, data management, big data storage, an artificial intelligence model, KOL recommendation and effect prediction. The technology relates to data crawler, data packet interception and analysis, dynamic domain name, data warehouse, machine learning and data visualization. Business theory basis and practice data include dozens of industries such as beauty makeup, fast food consumption, catering, mom and baby, fashion, health, digital science and technology, education and games and corresponding subdivision fields, and are integrated application of tens of thousands of cooperation data, hundreds of thousands of KOL data, millions of consumer data and hundreds of millions of user behavior data. According to the method, the accuracy of the model and the convenience of operation are further optimized, the time cost for selecting the effective KOL is greatly reduced, the entry threshold of KOL cooperative marketing is effectively reduced, the input-output ratio of merchants is increased while the KOL marketing achievement is improved, and the requirements of the majority of merchants for pursuing high accuracy, high efficiency and high cost performance of KOL marketing are met.

title: Artificial intelligence-based metaverse and blockchain mixed education system
abstract_text: 본 발명은 인공지능 기반의 메타버스와 블록체인 혼합 교육시스템에 있어서, 교육자와 학습자로부터 수신된 질의정보와 응답정보와 이에 대한 각각의 평가수치를 표시하는 사용자단말기를 포함한다.

title: METHOD APPARATUS AND SYSTEM FOR AUTOMATICALLY EVALUATING FOREIGN LANGUAGE SPEAKING ABILITY BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MODEL AND PROVIDING USER-CUSTOMIZED FOREIGN LANGUAGE EDUCATION CONTENT CURATION SERVICE
abstract_text: 본 발명의 일실시예는 인공지능 모델을 기반으로 외국어 말하기 평가 시 피시험자들이 제출한 답안을 자동으로 채점하고, 채점된 점수를 기반으로 피시험자가 부족한 영역들을 집중적으로 학습할 수 있도록 외국어 교육 콘텐츠를 큐레이션하여 제공할 수 있는, 인공지능 모델 기반 외국어 말하기 능력에 대한 자동 평가 및 사용자 맞춤형 외국어 교육 콘텐츠 큐레이션 서비스 제공 방법, 장치 및 시스템에 관한 것이다.

title: Live broadcast education management system based on big data service
abstract_text: The invention relates to a live broadcast education management system based on big data service, and the system comprises a big data server which is in network connection with each live broadcast education terminal corresponding to each live broadcast education live broadcast room; the quantity analysis mechanism is used for pre-judging and setting the average number of taught students of the live broadcast education live broadcast room in future time segments based on multiple pieces of education configuration information of the set live broadcast education live broadcast room and the number of historical taught students of the set live broadcast education live broadcast room; and the resource allocation mechanism is used for allocating education resources matched with the pre-judged average number of the taught students to the set live education room in the future in a segmented manner. According to the invention, a customized AI model can be established for each live-broadcasting education live-broadcasting room managed by the big data server in the same education institution so as to complete the prediction of the average number of live-broadcasting students in the future time segment, thereby improving the utilization rate of various education resources while meeting the operation demands of a plurality of live-broadcasting education live-broadcasting rooms.

title: Education supervision system and method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: HANGZHOU VOCATIONAL COLLEGE OF SCIENCE AND TECH
abstract_text: The invention discloses an education supervision system based on artificial intelligence and a method thereof. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, sampling a classroom performance video to obtain a plurality of classroom performance key frames, then, enabling the plurality of classroom performance key frames to pass through a convolutional neural network model serving as a feature extractor to obtain a sequence of classroom performance feature vectors, and then, extracting the sequence of the classroom performance feature vectors; enabling the sequence of the classroom performance feature vectors to pass through a multi-scale perception model comprising a first sequence encoder and a second sequence encoder so as to obtain classroom performance time sequence feature vectors; and enabling the classroom performance time sequence feature vector to pass through a classifier to obtain a classification result used for representing whether the classroom performance of the monitored object is normal or not. Therefore, the performance of students can be better evaluated, and the performance of the supervision system is improved.

title: AI interactive education system based on holographic-like projection display
applicants: HANGZHOU MITAYIN DIGITAL TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI interactive education system based on holographic-like projection display, and relates to the technical field of online education. The system comprises an acquisition unit, a recognition unit, an analysis unit, a prompt unit, a storage unit and a projection unit, the storage unit and the projection unit are connected with the acquisition unit, the recognition unit, the analysis unit and the prompt unit, and the acquisition unit, the recognition unit, the analysis unit and the prompt unit are sequentially connected. According to the system, exercise data arranged by a teacher and exercise completion conditions of students are collected and packaged through the collection unit, a data packet is obtained, data storage is facilitated, the recognition module decompresses the data packet and recognizes the decompressed data packet, recognition information is obtained, data restoration is facilitated, the analysis module intelligently analyzes the recognition information through customs clearance AI, and an analysis file is constructed. And the problem that the teacher cannot acquire the learning progress of the student from the existing online education system is solved.

title: Intelligent medicine taking robot and intelligent medicine taking management system thereof
applicants: THE AFFILIATED BRAIN HOSPITAL OF GUANGZHOU MEDICAL UNIV
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent medicine taking robot and an intelligent medicine taking management system, the intelligent medicine taking robot comprises a robot main body, a walking mechanism is arranged at the bottom end of the robot main body, and a control circuit board is arranged in the robot main body; a lifting mechanism is arranged in the robot main body, a rotating mechanism is arranged on the lifting mechanism, and a medicine box is arranged on the rotating mechanism; a touch display screen is arranged at the top end of the medicine box, an identification unit is arranged on the touch display screen, at least one medicine storage groove is formed in each of two adjacent side walls of the medicine box, and the medicine storage grooves located in the adjacent side walls are staggered. The control circuit board is electrically connected with the walking mechanism, the lifting mechanism, the rotating mechanism and the touch display screen. The functions of medicine distribution, medicine taking propaganda and education, medicine confirmation and the like can be achieved based on artificial intelligence, the medicine distribution accuracy is improved, and the purposes of exercising the autonomous medicine taking consciousness and ability of a patient are achieved.

title: HANDS-ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EDUCATION SERVICE
abstract_text: Indications of sample machine learning models which create synthetic content items are provided via programmatic interfaces. A representation of a synthetic content item produced by one of the sample models in response to input obtained from a client of a provider network is presented. In response to a request from the client, a machine learning model is trained to produce additional synthetic content items.

title: Student score prediction method based on data enhancement
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student score prediction method based on data enhancement, and relates to the technical field of education data mining, and the method comprises the following steps: obtaining a student data set, and processing the data set to obtain a standardized data set; performing oversampling processing on the data set, so that the student data proportion of different score intervals in the training set and the test set is balanced; using the local features of the balanced data set extracted by the one-dimensional convolutional neural network, then learning the global features of the data set, and performing weighting processing; classifying the data by using a traditional machine learning model to obtain a score prediction result; and using the accuracy rate, the precision rate, the recall rate and the F1 value as evaluation indexes, and comparing results before and after classification by using the favorite model. Through data expansion and feature extraction, the classification effect of the model on student score prediction is improved, and the problem that the prediction precision of the model on minority class samples is low is solved.

title: Strategic Innovation and Strategic Management Software
abstract_text: The present invention comprises a novel innovation and strategic management software application consisting of an automated method and system for receiving business information and data from a user describing the business products, services and strategy and finances to translate to generated systems, processes and enhanced outcomes. Utilizing artificial intelligence and machine learning for language processing, automated systems render business innovation and strategy models, position business, products and services and performs the management of these. Management of services and processes are communicated through the software application. Communication of project status, tasks and performance are indicated alongside other communications such as audio, visual/video text, and data intelligence which are transferable between internal and external users or team members in the application. Curated education, customized analytics, and insights promote a robust system for information retrieval for users of the application that together provide enhanced competitive competencies.

title: Artificial intelligence-based metaverse and blockchain mixed education system
abstract_text: 본 발명은 블록체인 네트워크 기반 마이크로 서비스 아키텍처를 이용한 공정관리 시스템에 있어서, 블록체인 네트워크 내에서 복수의 디바이스 간 데이터를 처리하는 서버를 포함하며, 상기 서버는 상기 복수의 디바이스 중 제1디바이스로부터 기 설정된 기준에 맞는 제1데이터를 수신하면, 블록체인 네트워크 내 디앱(DApp)의 복수의 기능을 갖는 복수의 노드 중 상기 제1디바이스에서 수신된 제1데이터와 대응하는 제1노드를 식별하고, 이에 대응하는 기 설정된 개수의 마이크로 서비스 아키텍처를 식별 및 상기 제1노드에 할당하며, 상기 제1노드는 상기 제1데이터에 대응하는 상기 제1디바이스의 설정값을 제1설정값으로 수정하는 제1트랜잭션을 요청하고, 상기 제1디바이스로부터 상기 제1설정값의 수정완료 메시지 수신에 대응하여 새로운 블록을 생성하여 복수의 노드 중 제2노드에 이를 공유 및 기존 블록체인을 갱신하는 것을 특징으로 하며, 상기 제1디바이스는 생산공정에 대한 제어동작을 수행하며, 상기 복수의 디바이스 중 제2디바이스는 분류공정에 대한 제어동작을 수행하며, 상기 복수의 디바이스 중 제3디바이스는 출하공정에 대한 제어동작을 수행하는 것을 특징으로 한다.

title: A INTEGRATED SOFTWARE EDUCATION SYSTEM SUGGESTING EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS THROUGH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND EDUCATION METHOD
abstract_text: 본 발명의 일 실시예에 따른 통합 소프트웨어 교육 시스템은, 외부 기관으로부터 인터넷 상에 게재되는 소프트웨어 관련 교육 협력 업체를 모집하는 공고인 공고 정보를 수집하는 공고 수집 모듈; 상기 공고 정보로부터 교육 주제, 교육 목적, 교육 대상 및 교육 방법 중 적어도 하나의 정보인 상세 정보를 추출하는 공고 분석 모듈; 제공 가능한 소프트웨어의 교육과 관련된 정보인 교육 정보들을 관리하는 교육 정보 관리 모듈; 미리 정해진 매칭 평가 방법으로 상기 상세 정보와 상기 교육 정보가 얼마나 대응되는지 여부를 평가하는 평가 모듈; 상기 매칭 모듈에서 평가된 정보를 기초로 미리 정해진 제1 조건이 만족되는 상기 교육 정보가 존재하는지 여부를 판단하는 매칭 모듈; 및 상기 미리 정해진 제1 조건이 만족되는 상기 교육 정보를 포함하여 외부 기관에 소프트웨어의 교육을 제안하는 제안 모듈;을 포함할 수 있다.

title: METHOD DEVICE AND SYSTEM FOR PROVIDING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED LANGUAGE EDUCATION CONTENTS INCORPORATING MUSIC
abstract_text: 일실시예에 따른 장치는 미리 정의된 주제 카테고리들 중 임의로 어느 하나의 주제를 추출하고, 음악 콘텐츠가 주제에 대한 언어 교육 음악 콘텐츠로 선정될 수 있는지 여부를 판단하여, 음악 콘텐츠를 언어 교육 음악 콘텐츠로 결정하고, 주제에 대응하는 소주제를 생성하고, 생성된 소주제를 기초로, 소주제 사이의 일치도를 생성하여 일치도를 기초로, 일치도가 높은 소주제를 그룹으로 생성 및 그룹과 언어 교육 음악 콘텐츠를 매칭하고, 그룹에 포함된 소주제를 이용하여 그룹의 대표 소주제를 선정하고, 대표 소주제의 난이도를 확인하여 대표 소주제의 난이도를 그룹의 난이도로 결정하고, 사용자의 접속 요청에 응답하여 미리 정의된 레벨들 중 사용자의 레벨을 획득하고, 사용자의 레벨에 대응하는 난이도인 제1 난이도를 추출하고, 제1 난이도와 그룹의 난이도를 비교하여 제1 난이도와 대응하는 난이도를 갖는 제1 그룹을 추출하고, 제1 그룹과 매칭된 언어 교육 음악 콘텐츠 중 적어도 하나를 선택 및 사용자 단말로 전송한다. 또한, 일실시예에 따른 장치는 사선택된 언어 교육 음악 콘텐츠에 사용자의 성취도 점수, 사용자의 집중도 점수 및 사용자의 만족도 점수를 생성하여 사용자의 성취도 점수, 사용자의 집중도 점수, 사용자의 만족도 점수를 합한 값으로 선택된 언어 교육 음악 콘텐츠에 대응하는 사용자의 총합 점수를 생성하여 사용자의 총합 점수에 따라 선택된 언어 교육 음악 콘텐츠에 가산점을 부여한다.

title: Standing long jump detection system and method based on AI learning
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of AI education, and discloses an AI learning-based standing long jump detection system, which comprises a visible light image processing module for screening key images from visible light images of primary standing long jump of students to obtain a visible light image sequence; the image extraction module is used for extracting infrared images with the same time nodes as the visible light images of the visible light image sequence to generate an infrared image sequence; the limb feature generation module is used for inputting the preprocessed part image into a limb feature generator to generate limb features; the action recognition module is used for generating a time sequence from the limb features and inputting the time sequence into a GMM-HMM model; according to the invention, each action of the standing long jump movement of the student can be judged, the student is guided to carry out targeted correction on the wrong action of the standing long jump, and the method can also be used as a reference for a teacher to guide the student and can assist the student in improving the score of the standing long jump.

title: Intelligent question and answer information processing method adopting neural network algorithm and software product
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention relates to the technical field of artificial neural networks, chat robots and digitization, and provides an intelligent question and answer information processing method adopting a neural network algorithm and a software product, which can mine a question interest text corresponding to a question text based on artificial intelligence and a big data technology. The AI robot question optimization interaction text reflecting the real question intention of the questioner is obtained through aggregation, so that the compliance detection of the online AI robot dialogue text can be accurately and stably realized through the AI question compliance proofreading text, and the dialogue interaction intelligence of the chatting robot is improved. In addition, the embodiment of the invention can relate to the fields of digital twinning services, online education services, supply chain financial services, social entertainment services and the like, and the expandability is high.

title: Image processing method and device, equipment, storage medium and product
abstract_text: The invention discloses an image processing method and device, equipment, a storage medium and a product, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of detecting whether a to-be-processed image comprises a first object or not after each frame of the to-be-processed image is acquired; when it is detected that the first to-be-processed image comprises the first object, displaying a display image corresponding to the first object and operation prompt information corresponding to the display image; and under the condition that the placement state of the first object meets a preset condition, determining the display image as a target image corresponding to the first object. The embodiment of the invention can be applied to scenes such as cloud technology, artificial intelligence and wisdom education, and the irrelevant display content is reduced by displaying the partial image corresponding to the first object in the to-be-processed image; the user is prompted to adjust the placement state of the first object through the display operation prompt information, and the display image is taken as the target image under the condition that the placement state meets the condition, so that the operation steps are simplified, and the overall efficiency of image processing is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence education robot, and relates to the technical field of education robots, and the robot comprises a controller which controls all parts to work in a coordinated manner and has a data exchange function, which means that data exchange between a CPU and the controller and between the controller and equipment is realized. According to the invention, alarm, elimination and rescue organization function analysis and processing discover conditions and event information, the system can be divided into a light condition, a heavy condition and a serious condition according to the severity of the position, the light condition, the heavy condition and the serious condition are respectively processed, and once alarm information exists, the state alarm of equipment is immediately displayed on an operator work station; therefore, whether the user is in a normal listening and learning state or not can be observed by dynamically capturing the figure of the user, it is guaranteed that whether the user is in the learning state or not can be observed from the side face, meanwhile, the surrounding state and the user can be intelligently and safely monitored, and rapid alarming and prediction of the injury degree of the user can be achieved.

title: AI-BASED INACTIVITY TIMER DETERMINATION METHOD AND DEVICE IN WIRELESS COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication technique for converging IoT technology with a 5G communication system for supporting a higher data transmission rate beyond a 4G system, and a system therefor. The present disclosure may be applied to an intelligent service (for example, a smart home, a smart building, a smart city, a smart car or connected car, health care, digital education, retail business, a security and safety-related service, etc.) on the basis of 5G communication technology and IoT-related technology. A method carried out by a network data analytics function (NWDAF) device, and a device for carrying out same may be provided according to various embodiments of the present disclosure, the method comprising the steps of: acquiring, for a protocol data unit (PDU) session, traffic pattern-related information, traffic type-related information and current time-related information; determining an inactivity timer value for the PDU session on the basis of the traffic pattern-related information, traffic type-related information and current time-related information; and transmitting the inactivity timer value to a session management function (SMF) device.

title: Abnormal data mining method based on cloud data and artificial intelligence and software product
applicants: SHENYANG RUNYANG NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention relates to the technical field of cloud data, artificial intelligence and big data mining, and provides an abnormal data mining method based on cloud data and artificial intelligence and a software product. The load pressure of the AI big data mining server can be effectively reduced, on one hand, the accuracy and credibility of abnormal data mining can be ensured, and on the other hand, the timeliness of abnormal data mining can be improved, and normal operation of other task processes can be ensured; the abnormal data mining technology can be applied to application scenes such as meta universe service, electronic commerce, digital office, distance education and smart medical treatment.

title: IT ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED EDUCATION APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR IT PROFESSIONAL EDUCATION
abstract_text: IT 전문 교육을 위한 인공지능 기반 교육 장치에 관한 것이며, IT 전문 교육을 위한 인공지능 기반 교육 장치는, 콘텐츠 DB에 등록된 복수의 콘텐츠 중 학습자에 의해 선택된 선택 콘텐츠를 제공하는 제공부; 상기 선택 콘텐츠에 대한 학습자의 학습 진행을 관리하고, 상기 학습 진행에 따른 학습 결과의 이력을 기반으로 학습자의 학습 상태를 분석하는 학습 관리부; 및 상기 분석된 학습 상태를 고려하여 상기 복수의 콘텐츠 중 적어도 하나의 콘텐츠를 추천 콘텐츠로서 학습자 단말의 화면에 표시하는 제어부를 포함하고, 상기 복수의 콘텐츠는, IT 전문 교육을 위한 코팅 교육 콘텐츠를 포함하고, 상기 학습 진행은, 상기 선택 콘텐츠와 관련하여 코딩 강의 시청, 코딩실습 수행 및 코딩 관련 퀴즈풀이 수행을 포함하고, 상기 학습 관리부는, 복수의 학습자가 상기 복수의 콘텐츠 중 적어도 하나의 콘텐츠에 대한 학습을 수행함으로써 발생된 학습경험 관련 복수의 데이터에 xAPI(Experience Application Programing Interface)를 적용시켜 데이터저장소인 LRS(Learning Record System)에 저장하고, 상기 LRS에 저장된 복수의 데이터에 인공지능 모델을 적용하여 복수의 학습자의 학습 행동 패턴을 도출하고, 상기 학습자의 학습 상태의 분석을 통해 도출된 상기 학습자의 학습 행동 패턴과 상기 복수의 학습자의 학습 행동 패턴을 고려하여 상기 학습자의 학습 주기를 조절할 수 있다.

title: EDUCATION SYSTEM AND METHOD USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TUTOR
abstract_text: 본 발명에 따른 인공지능 튜터를 활용한 교육 방법은 단말기를 통해 학습 콘텐츠를 시청하는 학습자로부터 데이터를 취득하는 단계 및 상기 데이터와 상기 학습자에 대한 정보를 기반으로 인공지능 튜터 콘텐츠를 생성하는 단계 및 상기 학습 콘텐츠 중 교수자 주도 방식의 학습에서 상기 인공지능 튜터 콘텐츠가 상기 단말기에 출력되도록 하는 단계를 포함하고, 상기 인공지능 튜터 콘텐츠는 실사로 마련되어, 상기 학습자와 커뮤니케이션을 수행하거나 상기 학습자에게 학습과 관련된 알림을 수행한다.

title: EDUCATION SUPPORT SYSTEM AND METHOD USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE VIRTUAL PEER GROUP IN METAVERSE ENVIRONMENT
abstract_text: 본 발명은 학습자가 소지하는 학습자 단말기와 연동하는 메타버스 서버를 포함하는 교육 지원 시스템에 관한 것으로, 상기 메타버스 서버는, 상기 학습자 단말기로 메타버스 학습 콘텐츠를 제공하는 메타버스 서버이고, 학습자 기초정보에 기초해 인공지능 기반으로 복수의 아바타를 생성하여 가상의 또래집단을 생성하는 또래집단 생성부; 상기 학습자 단말기로부터 수신되는 학습자의 반응정보를 통해 상기 학습자의 심리상태를 판단하여 심리상태정보를 생성하는 심리상태파악부; 및 상기 심리상태정보에 기초해 상기 메타버스 학습 콘텐츠에 대응되는 메타버스 상호작용 콘텐츠를 제공하는 메타버스 상호작용 콘텐츠 제공부를 포함하고, 상기 반응정보는, 상기 학습자의 음성정보, 움직임정보 및 시점정보 중 적어도 하나를 포함한다.

title: Education information supervision method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses an educational information supervision method based on artificial intelligence, and belongs to the technical field of electric digital data processing, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the denoising processing of a voice signal, reducing the influence of a noise signal, carrying out the reconstruction processing, splitting the denoised signal, obtaining component signals, and carrying out the reconstruction processing of the component signals; the data distribution similarity of the component signals and the de-noised signals is calculated, the component signals with the large similarity are used for replacing the de-noised signals, the influence of noise is further reduced, meanwhile, the component signals capable of replacing the de-noised signals are selected, the effects of data simplification and noise elimination are achieved, then analysis signals are input into a speech recognition model, and the speech recognition accuracy is improved. To-be-supervised characters are obtained, and sensitive semantics are recognized from the to-be-supervised characters; according to the invention, the problem of poor supervision caused by low recognition precision when a neural network is used for voice semantic recognition is solved.

title: Style digital human generation method, device and equipment and readable storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a style digital human generation method, device and equipment and a readable storage medium, image stylization is introduced into the education industry of financial knowledge popularization, and the method comprises the steps of obtaining an input text, and inputting the text into a text editor to obtain a real figure image; inputting the real figure image into a generator to generate a human body surface graph; performing UV expansion on the human body surface graph to obtain a UV map of a visible area; and inputting the UV chartlet of the visual area into a trained neural network to obtain a stylized digital human. According to the style digital human generation method, the human body surface graph is stripped from the UV expansion, the figure and the background can be effectively stripped, and different setting styles are fully generated through virtualized setting of the figure, adjustment according to the corresponding style and setting according to different parameters of the background; and obtaining the stylized digital human according to the trained neural network.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR GENERATING PERIODIC BEHAVIOR REPORT, STORAGE MEDIUM, AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE
abstract_text: The present application discloses a method, apparatus and system for generating a periodic behavior report, a storage medium, and an electronic device. The method comprises: obtaining behavior data and health indicator parameters of a user in a predetermined period; at least partially using a machine learning model to generate a periodic behavior report of the predetermined period for the user according to the behavior data and the health indicator parameters, the periodic behavior report at least comprising an evaluation result of the predetermined period, and a behavior suggestion and/or an indicator target for a next period; updating a behavior tag of the user on the basis of the periodic behavior report, and obtaining patient education content matching the behavior tag; and sending the periodic behavior report and the patient education content to the user. Thus, an intervention effect on a user behavior is effectively improved, and the user experience is improved.

title: NOISE AND ECHO REMOVAL SYSTEM FOR MULTI-PARTY VIDEO CONFERENCING OR VIDEO EDUCATION, AND METHOD THEREOF
abstract_text: Disclosed are a noise and echo removal system for multi-party video conferencing or video education. The noise and echo removal system comprises: a sound reception module for pre-processing analog sounds, received via a microphone, into digital sounds that a plurality of deep-learning models can learn and infer; a deep-learning module that learns the preprocessed digital sounds from the sound reception module through the plurality of deep-learning models, and infers user speech by means of a real-time service model obtained by making a specific deep learning model among the plurality of deep-learning models more lightweight; and a sound output module for outputting, to an external speaker or a virtual audio device, only the digital sounds inferred as being user speech on the basis of the real-time service model.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR REMOVING NOISE AND ECHO FOR MULTI-PARTY VIDEO CONFERENCE OR VIDEO EDUCATION
abstract_text: Disclosed is a system and method for removing noise and echo for multi-party video conference or video education, wherein the system for removing noises and echoes includes a sound reception module preprocessing analog sounds received through a microphone into digital sounds that a deep learning model can learn and infer, the deep learning module learns the digital sounds preprocessed by the sound reception module through a plurality of deep learning models, and inferring a user voice using a real-time service model obtained by light-weighting a specific deep learning model of the plurality of deep learning mode, and a sound output module outputting only a digital sound inferred as the user voice by the real-time service model to an external speaker or a virtual audio device.

title: METHOD FOR PATTERN AND VIDEO GENERATION AND TRAINING FOR LANGUAGE EDUCATION USING MACHINE LEARNING AND SYSTEM THEREOF
abstract_text: 본 발명은 언어 패턴을 학습 및 훈련하기 위한 방법 및 그 시스템에 관한 것이다. 본 발명의 패턴에 기초한 언어 훈련 방법은 사용자의 언어 훈련을 위한 언어 훈련 컨텐츠를 생성하는 단계를 포함하고, 상기 언어 훈련 컨텐츠를 생성하는 단계는, 하나 이상의 동영상으로부터, 적어도 2 개 이상의 단어 또는 형태소를 포함하는 패턴이 포함된 문장에 상응하는 원본 동영상 클립을 추출하는 단계; 상기 패턴의 텍스트, 상기 패턴이 포함된 문장의 텍스트와 오디오 및 상기 문장을 다른 언어로 번역한 문장의 텍스트와 오디오 중 적어도 하나를 상기 원본 동영상 클립에 연관시킨 훈련용 동영상 클립을 생성하는 단계; 및 상기 훈련용 동영상 클립을 적어도 하나 포함하는 상기 언어 훈련 컨텐츠를 만드는 단계를 포함한다.

title: METHOD FOR HUMAN RECOGNITION BASED ON DEEP-LEARNING AND METHOD FOR MAGNAING UNTACT EDUCATION
abstract_text: 본 발명은 모바일 환경을 위한 딥러닝 모듈의 구동 방법으로, 외부 전자장치로부터 이미지 데이터를 수신하는 단계, 수신한 이미지 데이터에서 1차적으로 얼굴 데이터를 검출하는 단계, 얼굴 데이터가 검출되지 않는 경우 2차적으로 사람 데이터를 검출하는 단계 및 검출된 얼굴 데이터 또는 사람 데이터를 바탕으로 비대면 화상 정보를 관리하는 단계를 포함한다.

title: METHOD DEVICE AND PROGRAM FOR EDUCATION COMPRISING DEEP-LEARNING MODULE ENABLING GENERATING INDICATORS OF EMOTION AND CONCENTRATION OF KOREAN CHILDEREN THROUGH TRANSFER LEARNING
abstract_text: 본 발명은 컴퓨팅 장치에 의해 수행되는 감성 및 집중상태의 변화에 기반한 화상 교육 방법에 있어서, 외부 전자장치로부터 이미지 데이터를 수신하는 단계, 수신한 이미지 데이터를 Mat 데이터로 변환하는 단계, 상기 Mat 데이터를 한국인 입력 데이터 기반으로 학습된 딥러닝 모듈에 입력하여 감성 및 집중상태 값으로 변환하는 단계, 상기 감성 및 집중상태 값을 제어 로직에 삽입하는 단계를 포함한다.

title: METHOD DEVICE AND PROGRAM FOR EDUCATION COMPRISING DEEP-LEARNING MODULE ENABLING GENERATING INDICATORS OF EMOTION
abstract_text: 본 발명은 컴퓨팅 장치에 의해 수행되는 감성 및 집중상태의 변화에 기반한 화상 교육 방법에 있어서, 외부 전자장치로부터 이미지 데이터를 수신하는 단계, 수신한 이미지 데이터를 Mat 데이터로 변환하는 단계, 상기 Mat 데이터를 한국인 입력 데이터 기반으로 학습된 딥러닝 모듈에 입력하여 감성 및 집중상태 값으로 변환하는 단계, 상기 감성 및 집중상태 값을 제어 로직에 삽입하는 단계를 포함한다.

title: APPARATUS FOR AI BASED CHILDREN EDUCATION SOLUTION
abstract_text: 인공지능 어린이 교육 솔루션 장치는 카메라를 통해 대상객체를 촬영하여 획득된 대상객체 이미지를 입력받는 대상객체 이미지 입력부, 인공지능 인식을 통해 상기 대상객체 이미지를 대상객체 스티커로 변환하고 상기 대상객체의 식별코드를 획득하는 대상객체 인식부, 상기 대상객체 스티커를 사용자 스티커 방에 수집하고 사용자의 제어에 따라 상기 사용자 스티커 방을 장식하는 대상객체 스티커 처리부 및 상기 대상객체의 식별코드를 기초로 교육 컨텐츠를 검색하고 사용자에게 상기 교육 컨텐츠의 재생을 제공하는 교육 컨텐츠 처리부를 포함한다.

title: Video voice conversation method and system based on AI intelligence
applicants: GUANGZHOU HUANJING ELECTRONIC TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention is suitable for the technical field of data processing, and particularly relates to an AI intelligence-based video voice conversation method, which comprises the following steps of: acquiring login information of a supervised person; when it is judged that the supervised person has conversation according to the login information, a conversation problem is displayed; and saving a conversation record formed by the supervised person according to the answer of the conversation question. The invention also provides a video voice conversation system based on AI intelligence. According to the AI intelligence-based video voice conversation method provided by the embodiment of the invention, the daily workload of management and education can be greatly reduced, the working efficiency is improved, information such as conversation time, conversation problems, conversation templates and the like can be flexibly configured according to customer requirements, and conversation records can be quickly stored in real time and in various modes.

title: METHOD FOR NON-FACE-TO-FACE EDUCATION MANAGEMENT USING DEEP LEARNING-BASED PERSON RECOGNITION
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an education method comprising the steps of: receiving image data from an external electronic device; primarily detecting face data from the received image data; secondarily detecting person data when no face data is detected; and managing non-face-to-face image information on the basis of the detected face data or person data.

title: COMPLEX MACHINERY TRAINING, EDUCATION AND ADVERTISING SYSTEM IN MIXED REALITIES USING METAVERSE PLATFORM
abstract_text: To provide a complex machinery training, education and advertising system in Mixed Realities using a metaverse.SOLUTION: A complex machinery training, education and advertising system in Mixed Realities using a metaverse is configured to: provide a Digital Twin for implementing a simulation with respect to a specific visual factor for a maintenance training, education and public relation using a smart glass in a metaverse Mixed Reality to implement a 3D simulation; provide artificial intelligence knowledge based on learning information including a 2D manual, a work instruction of the 2D manual and a SCM; implement neural network work and linguistic inference for processing a speech request for implementing the 3D simulation based on the artificial intelligence knowledge and Digital Twin; and transmit a vision and speech feedback to a user to thereby notify processing and completion of the requested work.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 5

title: Education robot based on artificial intelligence
applicants: JIANGXI TAIKONG ROBOT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of educational robots, in particular to an educational robot based on artificial intelligence, and aims to solve the problems that dust falls into the robot to damage components when a filter element of the educational robot is replaced in the prior art, and the defects that an existing robot is low in stability and does not have an intelligent reminding function. Comprising a head shell, a machine body shell and a circular base shell, loudspeakers are symmetrically installed on the two sides of the head shell, a display screen is installed in the middle of the head shell, air inlet housings are symmetrically installed at the bottoms of the two sides of the machine body shell, a mounting groove is formed in the rear portion of one side of the machine body shell, and a cover plate is rotationally connected into the mounting groove; sliding rails are symmetrically fixed to the inner wall of the machine body shell. Compared with the prior art, the problem that dust falls into the robot when the filter element is replaced can be avoided, meanwhile, the stability of the education robot is further improved, and the intelligent reminding function is additionally arranged to protect the eye using safety of children.

title: Transaction method and system of cloud education mall platform
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a transaction method and system of a cloud education mall platform. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring education transaction information generated by user operation, and performing primary classification calculation on the education transaction information to generate primary classification transaction information; performing historical data fitting according to the primary classified transaction information to generate historical recommended transaction information; performing secondary deep classification calculation on the primary classification transaction information to generate secondary classification transaction information; performing deep user behavior modeling according to the secondary classification transaction information so as to construct a deep user transaction behavior model; and according to the deep user transaction behavior model, generating user transaction deep analysis information, and performing visualization operation on the historical recommendation transaction information and the user transaction deep analysis information to construct an education platform transaction strategy. According to the method, the preference, the time adaptation degree and the historical information of the user are deeply analyzed, so that the user experience is improved.

title: AI Education platform that provides customized education contents based on AI
abstract_text: 본 발명은 고교 학점제 시행에 따라 학생들에게 배움의 선택권을 확장시켜 자신의 적성과 소질을 발견하고 스스로의 진로를 개척하도록 지원하는데 필요한 다양한 과목 개설과 양질의 맞춤형 교육 콘텐츠를 제공하는 AI기반 맞춤형 교육 콘텐츠를 제공하는 방법 및 시스템에 관한 것으로, 학생들의 진로 선택에 도움을 주기 위해 정규 교과목 이외에 변화하는 시대에 맞추어 학생들이 가지는 궁금증과 다양한 분야를 현시대의 명사와 석학들이 바라본 시선으로 전달함으로써 학생들의 견문을 넓히고, 대학의 연구/실습 활동에 직접 참여하며 경험의 기회를 갖기를 원하는 지원자에게 맨토 또는 지도 교수를 연결하여 심층 연구/실습 활동을 수행하며 경험해 볼 수 있는 기회를 제공한다. 학생들의 요구에 부합하는 맞춤형 교육 콘텐츠를 제공하기 위하여 교육 플랫폼은 학교에게 다양한 커리큘럼으로 과목을 개설할 수 있도록 AI를 기반으로 학생들의 관심사항을 반영한 학습 주제 리스트를 지원하고, 개설된 과목의 커리큘럼과 교과 시간표에 맞추어 양질의 교육 콘텐츠를 제공한다. 개설하려는 과목에 있어 학생들의 요청에 따라 학생들이 직접 교육 콘텐츠 제작에 참여할 수 있고, 학교는 수업을 진행하는 방식 또는 교육 제공자를 선택 할 수 있다.

title: INTELLIGENT BOT FOR IMPROVING CYBERSECURITY OPERATIONS AND EDUCATION
abstract_text: A security rule associated with an application is identified. This may be done continuously and verified using machine learning models to ensure that the environment characterized by the data has not changed. For example, a security rule may be which ports are open/closed on a firewall. In response to identifying the security rule associated with the application, a security test based on the security rule is generated. For example, the security test may be to test all the ports on the firewall to see which ports are open/closed. The security test against the application is executed to determine if the security rule has been implemented properly by the application.

title: Online education device with artificial intelligence function
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an on-line education device with an artificial intelligence function, which comprises a box body, a case is fixedly mounted at the front end of the bottom in the box body, a computer is fixedly mounted on the inner side of the case, a storage battery is further arranged in the case, a lifting mechanism is fixedly mounted at the rear end in the box body, and the lifting mechanism is fixedly mounted on the inner side of the case. A top plate is fixedly mounted at the top of the lifting mechanism, a display screen is hinged to the rear end of the top of the top plate, a storage mechanism is arranged at the front end of the top plate, a box door is hinged to the top of the box body, and trundle assemblies are arranged at the four corners of the right side of the box body. By the adoption of the structure, compared with the prior art, the lifting folding function is achieved, the height can be adjusted according to the height of a user during use, meanwhile, the lifting folding box can be freely stretched out and drawn back to be folded in the box body, carrying and using are convenient, adaptability and practicability are high, application prospects are wide, and the lifting folding box is suitable for popularization and application. The popularization and use are worthy.

title: Machine learning-based juvenile protection education guiding method and system
applicants: ZHENGZHOU YUNZHI XINAN SECURITY TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence technology application, in particular to a juvenile protection education guiding method and system based on machine learning, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining juvenile protection business sample data; constructing a juvenile protection classification integration model, and training the juvenile protection classification integration model by using juvenile protection service sample data; and inputting the collected to-be-detected juvenile business data into the trained juvenile protection classification integration model, and obtaining the type of the to-be-detected juvenile business data by using the juvenile protection classification integration model, so as to carry out offline protection education guidance on the target juvenile according to the business data type matching related collaborative responsibility institutions. According to the invention, a supervision organization can conveniently carry out protection education guidance work on different types of juveniles in a classified and graded manner, the supervision organization can conveniently carry out cooperative work with cooperative responsibility organizations such as law enforcement, education, civil affairs, hospitals and communities for the different types of juveniles, and closed-loop supervision can be carried out on juvenile protection education guidance.

title: Intelligent electronic class board
applicants: SHENZHEN HANJIN EDUCATION TECH GROUP CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model is suitable for the technical field of electronic equipment. The utility model discloses an intelligent electronic class board which comprises a class board body, and the class board body is formed by assembling a shell, a screen, a camera, an MIC array, a radar sensor, an infrared body temperature sensor, a loudspeaker, a fingerprint switch, a power-on button, an emergency call button, a USB interface, a TYPE-C interface, a card reader, an SIM card slot and a PCB. The beneficial effects of the utility model are that the design can realize touch operation, video voice communication, body temperature measurement, face recognition, fingerprint recognition, card swiping recognition, emergency response button, AI voice chat and AI voice control; the electronic class board is provided with functions of an education center, an application center, a service center, a media center, an entertainment center, a safety center, an emergency center, a control center, a payment center, attendance card punching and the like, and display of various real-time information and the like, so that the electronic class board is more complete in function.

title: TRAINING, EDUCATION AND/OR ADVERTISING SYSTEM FOR COMPLEX MACHINERY IN MIXED REALITY USING METAVERSE PLATFORM
abstract_text: Proposed is a training, education and/or advertising system for complex machinery in mixed reality (MR) using metaverse. The system includes a simulation execution unit configured to perform three-dimensional (3D) simulations by providing a digital twin for performing simulations on a specific visual component for the maintenance training, education and/or advertising through smart glasses, a training unit configured to provide artificial intelligence (AI) knowledge based on training information comprising two-dimensional (2D) manuals, task instructions of the 2D manuals, and a simulation cost model (SCM), and a neuro-symbolic speech executor (NSSE) configured to perform a neural network task and symbolic reasoning for processing a speech request in order to perform the 3D simulations based on the provided AI knowledge and the digital twin and to notify a user of the processing and completion of the requested task by transmitting visual and speech feedback to the user.

title: Balancing assembly of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of robots, in particular to a balance assembly of an artificial intelligence education robot, which is characterized in that a counterweight column is fixedly arranged on the inner top wall of a supporting seat, and a plurality of first springs are fixedly distributed on the outer ring wall of the counterweight column at equal round corners; balancing rods are hinged to the positions, below the first springs, of the outer ring wall of the balance weight column, the branch baffles are fixedly arranged in the middles of the upper portions of the multiple balancing rods respectively, the outer ends of the first springs are fixedly connected with one side walls of the branch baffles, and second springs are fixedly arranged on the side walls, opposite to the first springs, of the branch baffles. The shaft rod is movably sleeved with a movable rod, the outer end of the second spring is fixedly connected with one side wall of the movable rod, the limiting ball sleeves are fixedly arranged at the lower ends of the multiple movable rods correspondingly, rolling balls are movably arranged in the limiting ball sleeves, and the connecting column is fixedly arranged on the upper portion of the supporting base. And the situation that the gravity center drastically shifts and rolls over due to the fact that the inclination amplitude is too large can be avoided.

title: Middle and primary school artificial intelligence quality education creative course visualization method and device
applicants: BEIJING BAYI SPACE INFORMATION ENG CO LTD
HENAN WENKE RONGCHUANG INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a middle and primary school artificial intelligence quality education creative course visualization method and device, and relates to the technical field of novel education equipment. Comprising creative course material design, a lightweight 3D engine, a visual programming system, a creative course visual display system, creative course design and visual display, the creative course material design is composed of 2D material design and 3D material design, and the lightweight 3D engine is composed of overall design and operation processes. The middle and primary school artificial intelligence quality-oriented education creative course is inherited by the Chinese traditional culture, takes the Chinese classical garden as a theme, deeply excavates the association between the artificial intelligence quality-oriented education and the Chinese classical garden, and enables the traditional culture to be inserted with AI wings to fly into the classroom of the middle and primary school students. A practical and reliable solution is provided for landing execution of artificial intelligence quality-oriented education, traditional culture is assisted to develop towards the digital and intelligent direction, and new era pulse is given to the traditional culture.

title: APPARATUS AND METHOD OF SYSTEM INFORMATION TRANSMISSION AND RECEPTION ON A CARRIER SUPPORTING MULTIPLE BANDWIDTH PARTS
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. The method for transmitting system information by a base station in a wireless communication system, the method comprising identifying whether an active downlink (DL) bandwidth part (BWP) of a user equipment (UE) is configured with common search space, and transmitting, to the UE, an updated system information in a dedicated signaling when the active DL BWP of the UE is not configured with the common search space

title: Chinese composition automatic evaluation method based on composition requirements and composition materials
applicants: BLACK BOX TECH GUANGZHOU CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of education information, and discloses a Chinese composition automatic evaluation method based on composition requirements and composition materials, which comprises the following steps: step 1, a teacher arranges compositions and provides composition materials and composition requirements, and students complete composition writing according to a writing instruction and transmit the writing instruction into a composition correction model; 2, after a teacher writing instruction and an article written by a student are received, splitting the teacher writing instruction by using a reading understanding technology based on deep learning, and sending the teacher writing instruction into a reading understanding model for correction; 3, corresponding scores are given through composition error correction and composition meaning algorithms and advanced sentence pattern application, and the technology can help students to correct errors, check article centers and the like; for teachers, the technology can help the teachers to display the degree of deviation questions of the composition, carry out article-level correction analysis on each article, and can also display some special information in a correction set in a centralized manner.

title: AI education training system based on intelligent robot
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI education training system based on an intelligent robot, relates to the technical field of intelligent robots, and aims to solve the problem that collected pictures and sensors cannot be better fused in the prior art. According to the AI education practical training system based on the intelligent robot, the comprehensive behavior score is compared with the score threshold value, whether the behaviors of the students are standard or not is judged, when the behaviors of the students are not standard, an early warning report is generated, the student numbers corresponding to the students are obtained, the early warning report is transmitted to the terminal where the teacher is located based on the Internet of Things, and the Python language is simple and easy to learn; according to the method, a building block is used as a building block, the building block is usually used as a script and other functions to be used together with large program software, and a Python language is used as extension of Scratch, so that the software can perform programming operation by dragging the building block, and the robot can be safer when advancing according to judgment of a laser radar sensor on a front obstacle.

title: FARMER SUPPORT PLATFORM SYSTEM USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: The present invention provides a farmer support platform system capable of providing various information and related news that are necessary to farmers and supporting farm management, education, distribution, investment, incubation, and the like. The farmer support platform system according to an embodiment of the present invention can overcome difficulties, related to farm management and product sales/distribution, experienced by farmers managing actual farms, and can provide customized information and support required by prospective farmers such as retirees or the middle-aged preparing to return to farming.

title: DETECTION METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR DANGEROUS DRIVING BEHAVIOR
applicants: BEIJING NATIONAL NEW ENERGY VEHICLE TECH INNOVATION CENTER CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: The present invention relates to the technical field of feature identification, and particularly relates to a detection method and system for dangerous driving behavior. The method comprises: acquiring a monitoring image sequence; for the monitoring image sequence, obtaining a parameter matrix of a moving target by means of a moving target detection algorithm based on deep learning and a target rapid tracking algorithm based on target matching and distribution; and determining whether the parameter matrix of the target is greater than a target threshold value, and if so, deeming the behavior as dangerous driving behavior, otherwise, deeming the behavior as normal driving behavior. By means of the present invention, the movement relationship between target objects can be automatically identified and processed, such that whether dangerous driving behavior occurs in road traffic can be intelligently determined; and dangerous driving behavior that is highly likely to cause an accident is identified, which is conducive to developing education or various constraint behaviors for a vehicle owner according to the information, such that the driving habits of a driver can be corrected, and the occurrence probability of dangerous driving behavior is reduced as much as possible, thereby greatly reducing the occurrence of road traffic accidents, and thus achieving the aim of safe travel.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR WASTE ITEM DETECTION AND RECOGNITION
abstract_text: Embodiments described herein relate to hardware and software for waste item detection and recognition, along with an education or feedback system. Embodiments described herein use artificial intelligence, which embodies machine learning and computer vision, to detect waste items and generate feedback to nudge the user to dispose the waste items into appropriate receptacles while generating smart operational insights of a designated premise.

title: MACHINE LEARNING SYSTEM FOR ANALYZING THE QUALITY AND EFFICACY OF ESSAYS FOR HIGHER EDUCATION ADMISSIONS
abstract_text: Systems and methods for the multifaceted analysis of a written work, such as an educational program admission essay, using machine learning, deep learning and natural language processing. Language, relevance, structure, and flows are evaluated for an overall impactful essay. Essay content is checked to evaluate whether the author has covered an essay's essential aspects. The essay is also analyzed for an effective structure for presenting details as per the essay type. The disclosure includes data preparation for the task, process of data tagging, feature engineering from the essay text, method for transfer learning and fine-tuning language model to adapt to the context of an essay. Finally, a process for building machine learning and deep learning models and technique for ensembling to use both models in combination is disclosed. The system may provide user-adapted feedback based on a persona created from the user profile.

title: AI System and method for providing customized sex education content information based on AI big data
abstract_text: 본 발명의 일 실시예에 따른 AI 빅데이터 기반 맞춤형 성교육 콘텐츠정보 제공 시스템은 복수의 유저디바이스가 네트워크를 통하여 연결되며, 인공지능 기반 맞춤형 성교육 콘텐츠를 제공하기 위해 다양한 형태의 성교육 콘텐츠를 데이터베이스에 저장하고, 상기 유저디바이스에 실행되는 성교육 콘텐츠 제공 앱을 통하여 제공받은 회원정보를 인공지능 추천 알고리즘의 입력변수로 설정하여 학습을 수행하고 학습 수행 결과로서 해당 회원에게 적합한 최적화된 맞춤형 성교육 콘텐츠를 제공하는 콘텐츠서버를 포함할 수 있다.

title: Middle and primary school artificial intelligence quality education knowledge graph entity association algorithm
applicants: BEIJING BAYI SPACE INFORMATION ENG CO LTD
HENAN WENKE RONGCHUANG INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a middle and primary school artificial intelligence quality education knowledge graph entity association algorithm, which comprises the following steps: S1, acquiring a behavior log of middle and primary school students, performing fuzzy clustering analysis on the middle and primary school students and quality behavior performance according to data in the behavior log of the middle and primary school students, and generating multiple groups of middle and primary school student groups and quality behavior performance categories, the evaluation score of each primary and secondary school student group on each quality behavior performance is obtained; s2, a recommendation matrix M is constructed, the recommendation matrix M takes the primary and secondary school student groups as a row mark and the quality behavior performance as a column mark, a matrix element M ij represents an evaluation score of the ith primary and secondary school student group to the jth quality behavior performance category, i = 1, 2... u, j = 1, 2... p, and u is the number of the primary and secondary school student groups. The middle and primary school artificial intelligence quality education knowledge graph entity association algorithm can formulate corresponding learning schemes for middle and primary school students, and ensures comprehensive development and growth of the middle and primary school students.

title: KEY ACTION DETECTION SYSTEM OF PHYSICAL EDUCATION VIDEO BASED ON DEEP LEARNING
Intelligent comment method and system for fusion education based on knowledge graph
applicants: ZHONGKE LETING INTELLIGENT TECH JINAN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an intelligent comment method and system for fusion education based on a knowledge graph, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining evaluation scales of special education of all special students and evaluation abstract data meta-information of the evaluation scales; performing fine-grained splitting on the acquired data element information of the evaluation scale and the evaluation abstract of the special education to form an evaluation scale, a comment type, an evaluation abstract, a current development situation and a superior and disadvantaged analysis knowledge entity; establishing a knowledge point hierarchical relationship and an association relationship among the knowledge points according to the formed knowledge entity, and constructing a comment knowledge graph according to the established knowledge point hierarchical relationship and the association relationship; and the user intelligently analyzes and automatically generates and stores the current situation description and merits and weaknesses of the students through the selected comment knowledge entities and comment knowledge maps of the to-be-analyzed students. According to the method, the problems of data isomerism, islanding and difficulty in use of various evaluation scales in the field of special education are effectively solved.

title: Education Apparatus for Artificial Intelligence Having Object Tracking Function
abstract_text: 객체 추적 기능을 가지는 인공 지능 교육용 교구가 개시된다. 개시된 교구는 몸체부; 상기 몸체부의 전방에 결합되고 두 개의 독립적인 아암을 포함하며 물체를 파지하는 그리퍼; 상기 몸체부의 양측에 결합되는 바퀴; 및 상기 바퀴 및 상기 그리퍼의 동작을 제어하는 제어부를 포함하되, 상기 그리퍼의 제1 아암 및 제2 아암은 독립적으로 회전 가능한 구조를 가지고, 상기 제1 아암의 종단에는 제1 거리 센서가 결합되며, 상기 제2 아암의 종단에는 제2 거리 센서가 결합되고, 상기 제어부는 상기 제1 거리 센서, 상기 제2 거리 센서의 감지 결과에 기초하여 추적 객체를 추적하도록 상기 제1 아암, 상기 제2 아암 및 상기 바퀴의 동작을 제어한다. 개시된 교구는 다양한 방향으로 이동하는 객체를 효율적으로 추적하여 인공 지능의 기능에 보다 친숙해질 수 있고, 다양한 각도에서 정보를 감지하여 기능을 확장시킬 수 있는 장점이 있다.

title: Self-adaptive education system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SUZHOU HUXUN INFORMATION TECH DEVELOPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a self-adaptive education system based on artificial intelligence, relates to the technical field of network education, solves the technical problems of too little consideration of students and incapability of replacement between the students and teachers, analyzes and processes acquired picture data to obtain learning habit parameters of the corresponding students, and improves the learning habit of the students. Obtaining scores of the corresponding students, averaging score values to obtain a to-be-processed mean value, combining the learning habit parameters and the to-be-processed mean value to obtain sorting values belonging to different students, partitioning different student marks according to different sorting values, and then obtaining the scores of the students according to the student marks of different partitions. The students are matched with different grades of teachers, and by adopting the mode, the students are matched with different teachers, so that the score sorting mode is changed, the learning habits of the corresponding students are considered, the sorting effect is improved, and meanwhile, the education level of the whole education platform is improved.

title: College student score prediction method based on physiological information feature fusion
abstract_text: The invention discloses a college student score prediction method based on physiological information feature fusion, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence education data mining, and the prediction method comprises the steps: obtaining body temperature information, heart rate information, blood pressure information, step counting information, sleep information and position information through a student bracelet, and transmitting the data to a server through an API interface; judging whether the position information is in a learning area or not; in addition, basic information is collected in a questionnaire mode; for the position data, an Apriori algorithm is used for carrying out correlation degree analysis; through data visualization, the relationship between each feature and the score is checked, effective basic information and dynamic information are selected, a maximum-minimum normalization method is used for preprocessing, different classification algorithms are selected to construct a classification model, and the classification model is used for classification. And finally, realizing college student score prediction based on physiological information feature fusion through a deep knowledge tracking model.

title: Offline classroom student classroom behavior intelligent identification and cognitive state association method
abstract_text: The invention designs an offline classroom student classroom behavior intelligent identification and cognitive state association method, which automatically analyzes student classroom behaviors in a classroom recorded video through an improved target extraction algorithm and a target re-identification algorithm, and accurately evaluates the student cognitive state through designing proper classroom pre-test and post-test. And finally, modeling a student classroom behavior and cognitive state personalized association model through a time sequence, so that the processing efficiency of classroom video data can be remarkably improved, personalized association and analysis among cross-modal data are realized, and the method has a wide application prospect in the field of artificial intelligence education application.

title: System of coding education service based on metaverse with AI
abstract_text: 본 발명은 기존의 메타버스 서비스 서버가 제공하는 다양한 교과 콘텐츠를 인공지능코딩교육서비스 플랫폼 서버를 통하고 해당 아바타로 접속한 사용자는 다축 센서를 이용하여 아바타를 자유롭게 이동하도록 제어하면서 선호하는 교과 콘텐츠를 수강하여 학습하며 아바타가 학습한 교과 콘텐츠와 해당 콘텐츠에서의 학습 진도와 성적 등이 포함되는 빅데이터를 수집하고 수집된 빅데이터는 인공지능으로 분석하여 선호도 높은 교과 콘텐츠를 더욱 개발 발전시키고 다른 교과 콘텐츠는 문제점이 무엇인지를 분석할 수 있도록 하므로 언택트 시대에 교육의 참여도를 높이면서 교과 콘텐츠의 품질을 높이는 메타버스 기반 인공지능 코딩교육서비스 시스템에 관한 것으로 코딩교육 앱을 다운로드 받아 설치 운용하며 해당 제어신호 입력에 의하여 원격경로로 접속된 다수의 교과 콘텐츠 중에서 선호하는 교과 콘텐츠를 선택하고 고유 아바타를 이용하여 비대면으로 참석과 학습하는 하나 이상 다수의 비대면교육단말부, 비대면교육단말부와 코딩교육패킷통신망을 경유하여 접속하며 최신버전의 코딩교육 앱을 다운로드로 제공하고 인공지능으로 수집된 다수의 교과 콘텐츠에 접속하는 원격경로 정보를 요청에 의하여 제공하며 비대면교육단말부의 해당 고유 아바타가 참석한 교과 콘텐츠의 학습에 의한 진도와 성적이 포함되는 빅데이터를 수집하고 인공지능으로 분석된 학습 참석의 선호도가 높은 교과 콘텐츠를 분류하는 인공지능코딩교육서비스 서버, 인공지능 코딩 교육서비스 서버와 코딩교육패킷통신망(200)을 경유하여 접속하며 검색에 의하여 준비되고 학습할 수 있는 교과 콘텐츠에 접속하여 해당 원격경로 정보와 해당 교과 콘텐츠를 제공하는 하나 이상 다수의 메타버스서비스 서버를 포함하는 특징에 의하여 고유 아바타로 메타버스서비스 서버가 제공하는 교과 콘텐츠에 참여한 참여도와 학습의 진도와 성적 등을 빅데이터로 수집하고 인공지능으로 분석하여 비대면 교과 콘텐츠의 학습 결과를 관리하며 선호도 높은 교과 콘텐츠를 발굴하여 해당 콘텐츠의 품질을 더욱 높이고 선호도가 낮은 콘텐츠는 문제를 분석하여 개선시키는 효과가 있다.

title: Courseware generation method and device, courseware display method and device, equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a courseware generation method and device, a courseware display method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of education and artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of obtaining text content of a target domain file; key content of the text content is extracted, wherein the key content refers to content with the importance degree meeting a target condition in the text content; based on the key content, generating courseware data corresponding to the target question type; based on the courseware data, courseware corresponding to the target domain file is generated, and the courseware corresponding to the target domain file is used for displaying a question generated by adopting the target question type for the key content. According to the embodiment of the invention, automatic question setting and courseware generation by the computer equipment are realized, manual creation and typesetting are not needed for the structure of the courseware or the content of the courseware, and the courseware generation efficiency is improved.

title: AI automatic virtual scene construction experience system and method based on meta universe
applicants: HUNAN VISION MIRACLE INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of virtual reality, discloses an AI automatic virtual scene construction experience system and method based on meta universe, and is used for solving the technical problem that students cannot be better helped to understand poem connotation in the education process at the present stage. The system automatically identifies target poem content through a natural language processing module to obtain first keyword information and poem story relation information, and a poem artistic conception type judgment module judges keywords of artistic conception types according to the first keyword information and the poem story relation information to obtain second keyword information; the poem artistic conception element collection module searches elements according to the second keyword information and filters the elements according to the poem story relation information to obtain first element information, and the poem artistic conception scene story construction module constructs a poem story script according to the first element information and establishes a poem artistic conception virtual scene. Immersive three-dimensional poem artistic conception virtual scene experience is provided for students, and the students are helped to better understand poem connotation.

title: Multifunctional intelligent education robot
applicants: HUNAN DUOYUAN INTELLIGENT EDUCATION CONSULTING CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a multifunctional intelligent education robot, which comprises a robot model body, and a display, a power switch, an indicating lamp and a loudspeaker which are arranged on the robot model body, and is characterized in that a voice interaction module and an artificial intelligence integrated system module are arranged in the robot model body; an infrared detection head is arranged at the forehead of the robot model body, the infrared detection head is connected with an infrared temperature detection module in the robot model body, and the infrared temperature detection module is connected with the artificial intelligence integrated system module; the artificial intelligence integrated system module can display the temperature detected by the infrared detection head on the display, two feet of the robot model body are provided with walking mechanisms, a driving module for controlling the two feet to walk is arranged in the robot model body, and the driving module is connected with the artificial intelligence integrated system module. The head of the robot model body is provided with a video camera and a projection head.

title: Remote data control method and system based on big data
abstract_text: According to the remote data control method and system based on big data provided by the invention, the target artificial intelligence thread is used for carrying out education data optimization on the target online education data to obtain the optimization result, and the online education data is controlled through the optimization result, so that compared with manual optimization, the method and the system have the advantages that the efficiency is improved; according to the technical scheme provided by the invention, the accuracy of educational data optimization is higher. In addition, target artificial intelligence threads with differences are screened for education information label types with differences to carry out education data optimization, and the accuracy of education data optimization is further improved.

title: ROUTE EDUCATION DEVICE, ROUTE EDUCATION METHOD, AND PROGRAM STORAGE MEDIUM
abstract_text: In order to provide a technology relating to education for improving a skill to derive a vehicle's travel route to a destination, a provision unit of this route education device gives a question including information relating to a departure point and a destination and design to think about a vehicle's travel route from a departure point to a destination. A reception unit receives an answer travel route that is an answer to the question. A retrieval unit uses a route retrieval model and the given question to retrieve a recommended route from the departure point to the destination included in the question. The route retrieval model is a model that is generated by an expert selected on the basis of the amount of experience performing machine learning on actual travel routes traveled by the vehicle and outputs the recommended route to the destination. An evaluation unit compares the recommended route and the answer travel route, and evaluates the answer using a comparison result. An output unit outputs, as an evaluation result, information indicating evaluation for the answer.

title: Intelligent all-in-one machine structure for running test training
applicants: BEIJING TANJIU INNOVATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The technical scheme of the utility model discloses an intelligent all-in-one machine structure for running test training, which comprises an external frame assembly and a monitoring module arranged in the external frame assembly, the external frame assembly comprises a base and an external frame shell which is perpendicular to the base and extends upwards, one side of the external frame shell is provided with a camera and a loudspeaker, and the other side of the external frame shell is provided with a loudspeaker. A camera is arranged on one side of the external frame shell, a touch display screen and a power supply module are arranged on the other side of the external frame shell, the distance between the camera and the ground is 1.4 m to 1.6 m, the monitoring module comprises an AI recognition module, a data storage module and a network module which are connected with a data processing module, and the data processing module is further connected with the camera, a loudspeaker and the touch display screen. According to the technical scheme, the problems that in the prior art, physical education equipment does not have automation and is low in intelligent degree are solved.

title: Building hoisting machinery driver behavior dynamic management and control system combined with intelligent terminal
applicants: NANJING SHIKONG ZHILIAN NETWORK RES INSTITUTE CO LTD
NANJING FENGHUO GONGFENG ZHILIAN TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: A building hoisting machinery driver behavior dynamic management and control system combined with an intelligent terminal comprises a voice alarm module, a wearing state monitoring module, a Beidou/GPS positioning module, an NB-IOT communication module, the intelligent terminal, an AI camera, an intelligent terminal application server, a safety education module and a personnel behavior full life cycle application server. The intelligent terminal is carried by related personnel of dangerous and large engineering operation on an engineering site, and the AI camera is installed in a cab of a building hoisting machine; the voice alarm module is integrated in the intelligent terminal, the Beidou/GPS positioning module is integrated in the intelligent terminal, and an NB-IOT communication module is arranged in the intelligent terminal and used for communicating with the intelligent terminal application server. Related information of the wearing state monitoring module and the positioning module is sent to the intelligent terminal application server; and the AI camera is used for storing the face of a person wearing the intelligent terminal and carrying out face recognition.

title: Intelligent education robot
