abstract_text: According to the technical scheme, the intelligent education robot comprises a base and a rotating box, a rotating shaft is installed on the top in the base through a bearing, the rotating box is installed on the portion, located on the upper surface of the base, of the top of the rotating shaft, an artificial intelligence education display device is installed on the top of the rotating box, and an outer cover is installed on the portion, close to the top, of the outer surface of the base. A protection plate is installed in the middle of the interior of the outer cover through a rotating shaft, and a spring is installed at the gap position of the protection plate and the base through a spring groove. The intelligent education robot solves the problems that most existing artificial intelligence education robots are used in the indoor environment, the indoor environment is relatively small, the number of obstacles is relatively large, the artificial intelligence education robots are extremely prone to colliding with the ground obstacles, and the artificial intelligence education robots are extremely prone to being damaged. And the impact force borne by the artificial intelligence education robot is reduced, so that the service life of the artificial intelligence education robot is prolonged.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot
applicants: XIAN CHANGBANG ELECTRONIC TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence education robot, and relates to the technical field of education robots, the artificial intelligence education robot comprises a shell, a display screen, a support, a recognition camera, an AR camera, a power key and a sound receiver, a loudspeaker is arranged in the upper part of the rear end of the shell, and an interface panel is embedded in the middle of the rear end surface of the shell; a bottom plate is mounted at the bottom of the support, suction cups are arranged in the mounting grooves, a supporting plate is arranged in the storage groove, and an adjusting assembly is arranged in the middle of the storage cavity; an exhaust mechanism used for automatic suction of the suction cup is arranged in the lower portion of the containing cavity. Through the arrangement of the display screen, the camera and the bottom plate, the stability of the equipment during use is improved conveniently, and the intelligence and convenience of the equipment during use can be improved through the arrangement of the recognition camera and the AR camera; and through the arrangement of the dry powder storage tank, dry powder spraying operation can be conducted on the interior of the storage cavity and the interior of the shell, so that the flame retardant fire situation is achieved, and the safety performance of the equipment during use is improved.

title: Mathematical application question knowledge construction and answering method, system and device and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a mathematical application question knowledge construction and answering method, system and device and a storage medium, which are in one-to-one correspondence schemes, and in the scheme provided by the invention, a'question-knowledge-expression 'learning-reasoning normal form is established, various types of knowledge and machine learning tasks can be fused, and the learning efficiency is improved. The process of learning common knowledge from a complex scene by human is simulated, and a certain basis is provided for exploring strong artificial intelligence; meanwhile, in the scheme provided by the invention, the accuracy of problem solving and the interpretability of knowledge learning results are improved, the constructed mathematical knowledge can be used as prior information of numerous machine learning tasks to improve task performance, an education platform can be further assisted to construct a knowledge graph, and a better personalized education service is provided based on the knowledge graph.

title: SERVER AND METHOD FOR PROVIDING CUSTOMIZED ONLINE EDUCATION SERVICE BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: 온라인 교육 서비스 제공 서버에 의해 수행되는 인공지능 기반 맞춤형 온라인 교육 서비스를 제공하는 방법은 사용자 단말로부터 강의 정보를 수신하는 단계, 상기 강의 정보에 기초하여 강의를 상기 사용자 단말로 제공하는 단계, 상기 사용자 단말로부터 사용자의 집중도 판단 정보를 수신하는 단계, 상기 집중도 판단 정보를 인공지능 기반 집중도 판단 모델에 입력하여 상기 사용자의 집중도를 측정하는 단계, 상기 사용자 단말로 상기 집중도에 기초한 알림 메시지를 전송하는 단계 및 상기 사용자 단말로 상기 강의를 수강하는 사용자들의 강의 진척도를 제공하는 단계를 포함한다.

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR CUSTOMIZED EDUCATION AND EMPLOYMENT SUPPORT FOR STUDENT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNOLOGY
abstract_text: 본 발명은 인공지능 기술 기반 학생 맞춤형 교육 및 취업지원 방법 및 시스템에 관한 것이다. 보다 자세하게는, 본 발명은 학교생활에 필요한 정보 및 취업에 필요한 정보를 학생에 맞춤형으로 제공할 수 있는 인공지능 기술 기반 학생 맞춤형 교육 및 취업지원 방법 및 시스템에 관한 것이다. 본 발명에 따른 인공지능 기술 기반 학생 맞춤형 교육 및 취업지원 방법은 학교에 재학 중인 학생에 대응되는 학생 단말기(Student Terminal)에서 서버(Server)로 상기 학생의 인적사항에 대한 정보를 포함하는 기준정보(Reference Information)를 입력하는 단계, 상기 서버에서 상기 기준정보를 분석하여 상기 기준정보에 매칭(Matching)되는 추천정보를 추출하는 단계 및 상기 서버에서 상기 학생 단말기로 추출한 상기 추천정보를 전송하는 단계를 포함하고, 상기 추천정보는 교과에 대한 추천정보를 포함하는 교과 추천정보 및 비교과 대한 추천정보를 포함하는 비교과 추천정보를 포함할 수 있다.

title: Comprehensive knowledge tracking method for enhancing difficulty of test questions
abstract_text: The invention discloses a test question difficulty-enhanced comprehensive knowledge tracking method, which comprises the following steps of: forming a data set by historical answer record data of a student and corresponding test question data, initializing and defining the psychological ability of the student in the answer process, performing evaluation after data processing to obtain the answer ability of the student and the difficulty of test questions and knowledge points, and finally, training a knowledge tracking model by using a deep learning method to obtain the knowledge state of each student and the optimized psychological ability data, and predicting the performance of the students in future test questions according to the knowledge state of the students and the psychological ability data. According to the method, the difficulty condition of the test questions is comprehensively considered, the factors such as the question answering ability and the psychological ability of the students are close to the learning process under the real education background so as to obtain the reasonable knowledge state, and finally the question answering performance of the students is accurately predicted according to the knowledge state of the students.

title: Interactive drawing system and method based on deep learning and storage medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses an interactive drawing system and method based on deep learning and a storage medium, the interactive drawing system based on deep learning comprises a drawing area and a display area, and the drawing area is used for obtaining an initial line drawing drawn by a user and displaying the initial line drawing on the display area. The display area is used for displaying a complemented line drawing generated according to the initial line drawing and/or complete analysis information; the method for generating the complemented line drawing comprises the steps that a built automatic line complementing model is utilized, an initial line drawing and corresponding complete analysis information serve as input, the output complemented line drawing is obtained, and the automatic line complementing model is obtained after a generator and a discriminator are trained. The generator includes an encoder and a decoder. The method has education and tutoring effects while line completion is carried out on the hand-drawn sketch.

title: A SYSTEM MAKING CHARACTER ANALYSIS FROM FACE
applicants: INC YAZILIM COEZUEMLERI TICARET LTD SIRKETI [TR]
abstract_text: This invention is about a system that can make character analysis from face and can be used in many areas such as education, health, security, entertainment and particularly human resources and its' characteristic is having; a smart device (1) which the user uploads photograph to the system and view analysis results, algorithms (5) integrated into the cloud system (6) with high processing power where the face photographs are transferred to by the server (2) which includes parts such as the artificial intelligence module (3) and the data base (4), an artificial intelligence module (3) containing models that are trained up using machine learning on numerous models generated from human faces and a data base (4) containing the information on which characteristic feature corresponds to the result obtained after making golden ratio calculation.

title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SYSTEM FOR PROVIDING SYNERGISTIC EDUCATION IN WHICH DRAWING SKILL EVALUATION, ART EDUCATION, AND WRITING EDUCATION ARE LINKED
abstract_text: An artificial intelligence system for providing synergistic education in which drawing skill evaluation, art education, and writing education are linked, according to one embodiment of the present invention, may comprise: a communication unit; a user interface for providing an interactive environment to a user who is a learner, and providing, to the user, drawing data generated by a second user who is an educator that is received through the communication unit; an artistic competence evaluation unit that is trained to evaluate artistic competence of the user with an artistic competence score calculated by presenting, to the user, a drawing subject for drawing data as a question, and analyzing whether the drawing data generated by the user is drawing data suitable for the drawing subject; a drawing similarity evaluation unit that is trained to evaluate drawing similarity between the drawing data generated by the user and the drawing data of the second user by presenting, to the user, the drawing data of the second user for guiding the user, and then extracting the features of the drawing data generated by the user and the drawing data of the second user; and a keyword and feature point extraction unit that is trained to exchange feedback on a core keyword and an object with the user by analyzing a document, including text and drawing data and written by the user, for synergistic education in which art education and writing education are linked, and extracting the core keyword in the text and the object of the drawing data corresponding to the core keyword.

title: Artificial intelligence equipment based on AI education
applicants: SHENZHEN VR LANDMARK EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model provides artificial intelligence equipment based on AI education, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence education. A mounting frame; the artificial intelligence equipment body is fixedly connected to the inner wall of one side of the mounting frame; the dismounting and mounting mechanism comprises a fixed shell which is fixedly connected to one side end of the mounting frame; the sliding block is fixedly connected to one side end of the fixed shell; the mounting frame is arranged at one side end of the fixed shell; the sliding groove is formed in one side end of the mounting frame, and the sliding block is slidably connected into the sliding groove; the two rotating rings are fixedly connected to one side end of the sliding block and one side end of the mounting frame respectively; according to the device, the artificial intelligence device body is convenient to disassemble and assemble, carrying or using is more convenient, the swing frame is arranged on one side of the mounting frame, the supporting angle of the device can be adjusted according to the using condition, and the device can be conveniently used by different people.

title: Modeling and statistical method of driving style identification model based on real vehicle data of Internet of Vehicles and SVM (Support Vector Machine)
abstract_text: The invention discloses a driving style identification model modeling and statistical method based on Internet of Vehicles real vehicle data and SVM, and the method mainly comprises the steps: carrying out the data analysis through a large amount of actual vehicle driving data of an enterprise, and obtaining the state information of a driver during the driving of a vehicle from a large amount of user driving data; the behavior rule shown by the driver in the vehicle driving process is explored, so that a driver driving behavior comprehensive evaluation system is developed by combining the technologies of data mining, machine learning, deep learning and the like subsequently; safety education recommendation items can be specifically formulated for the driver with the recognized bad style and the non-driving behavior, corresponding risk management measures such as a UBI vehicle insurance scheme are matched, meanwhile, personalized control system development is carried out on vehicle functions according to different driving style requirements, so that the requirements of different drivers are met, and the driving safety of the driver is improved. And the vehicle driving experience feeling is optimized.

title: STUDENT PERFORMANCE EVALUATION METHOD AND SYSTEM BASED ON AI IDENTIFICATION DATA
applicants: DB CHONGQING INTELLIGENT TECH RESEARCH INSTITUTE CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: The present disclosure provides a student performance evaluation method and system based on artificial intelligence (AI) identification data, and relates to the field of intelligent education. A lightweight network model suitable for student performance evaluation takes the AI identification data as an input and evaluation results as an output. A training data generation algorithm is provided, and multidimensional AI identification data and labels are uniformly processed into training data suitable for the network model through the above algorithm, which can solve the problems that dimensions between any AI identification data and various labels are not uniform, and original data cannot meet training of a multidimensional and cross-time prediction model. A simulated data generation algorithm and a simulated label generation algorithm are provided, and simulated training data is generated using these algorithms in conjunction with the training data generation algorithm.

title: Operation rehabilitation automatic intervention adjustment method and system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: BEIJING FUQUAN HEALTH TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an operation rehabilitation automatic intervention adjustment method and system based on artificial intelligence, and belongs to the technical field of data processing, and the method comprises the steps: S1, collecting disease-related basic information, health conditions, exercise habits and dietary habits of a patient in a perioperative period, and carrying out the collection of the disease-related basic information, health conditions, exercise habits and dietary habits; an initial rehabilitation intervention scheme used for being pushed to the patient every day is obtained through matching; s2, according to feedback data based on questionnaire survey and rehabilitation information acquired by a data acquisition module, determining the fitness of the patient in the perioperative period in the process of executing the rehabilitation intervention scheme on that day; and S3, adjusting the rehabilitation intervention scheme pushed on the current day based on the adaptation degree, and generating a rehabilitation intervention scheme pushed on the next day, so that the adaptation degree is within a threshold interval. According to the invention, automatic intervention of the health process of the patient in the perioperative period can be carried out, the intervention intensity can be continuously adjusted, and the health education management effect of the patient in the perioperative period is improved.

title: Combined online education platform
applicants: SHENZHEN SANMA ELECTRICAL APPLIANCES CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a combined online education platform, which comprises an online education platform, and is characterized in that the online education platform comprises a table lamp with a camera and an intelligent panel matched with the table lamp with the camera for use; the table lamp with the camera comprises a main control chip, a memory, a WiFi module, a camera module and an eye protection LED lamp, the memory, the WiFi module, the camera module and the eye protection LED lamp are all connected with the main control chip, and the table lamp with the camera is connected with the intelligent tablet through the WiFi module; the intelligent tablet computer is internally provided with a self-defined education app, the self-defined education app is matched with camera shooting of the camera module to carry out interactive operation, the intelligent tablet computer is further internally provided with software with an artificial intelligence education evaluation function, and the software realizes online education platform application of teachers and students; the intelligent tablet computer and the desk lamp technology with the camera are combined, so that the online education efficiency of teachers and students is improved; in addition, the health of eyes can be better protected.

title: Personnel relation analysis method and device, equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING HAIZHUOFEI NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, and discloses a personnel relationship analysis method, which comprises the following steps: acquiring information of a preset category of a to-be-analyzed personnel, and cleaning the information to obtain target information; extracting work experience information and education experience information in the target information; querying first crowd data and second crowd data associated with the to-be-analyzed personnel from a preset database according to the work experience information and the education experience information, and performing semantic analysis on the first crowd data and the second crowd data to obtain colleague relationship data and student relationship data of the to-be-analyzed personnel; and according to the colleague relationship data and the student relationship data, constructing a personnel relationship graph of the to-be-analyzed personnel. The invention further provides a personnel relation analysis device, electronic equipment and a storage medium. According to the invention, the accuracy and efficiency of personnel relation analysis can be improved.

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR GENERATING ROOT MORPHOLOGICAL DATA-BASED ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE MODEL
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a method for generating a root morphological data-based artificial intelligence model. The method for generating a root morphology data-based artificial intelligence model may comprise the steps of: acquiring a root shape image that changes by decision making of a previously trained learning model, and learning the correlation between the decision making of the learning model and root morphology in consideration of the root shape image; generating growth and cultivation information by linking cultivation image tag information related to a cultivation process of a plant and provided from a user terminal with an image of the plant, and learning a current state of the plant and a cultivation target state of the plant in consideration of the growth and cultivation information; generating an educational algorithm for learning a root image change relationship in consideration of the learned correlation and the growth and cultivation information; and constructing a cultivation learning model being with reference to the generated education algorithm while using a plant image of an aboveground part and a root shape image, obtained from an image input device, as an input, and a control signal for controlling a plant cultivation system as an output.

title: Abstract generation method and device of learning video, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a learning video abstract generation method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to image processing, and can be applied to an online education scene. According to the specific implementation scheme, a first image set is obtained based on a learning video; extracting learning content features of each image in the first image set, and performing clustering based on the learning content features of each image to obtain a plurality of target image class clusters; selecting a corresponding representative image from each target image class cluster in the plurality of target image class clusters; and obtaining summary information of the learning video based on the representative image corresponding to each target image class cluster. According to the embodiment of the invention, the learning video can be quickly known, and the time and energy cost for selecting the learning video is reduced.

title: CHEMISTRY EDUCATION DEVICE USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND AUGMENTED REALITY AND METHOD OF PROVIDING CHEMISTRY EDUCATION SERVICE USING THE SAME
abstract_text: A chemistry education device using artificial intelligence and augmented reality and a providing method of a chemistry education service using the same are provided. The chemistry education service includes an AI tutoring service and an AR implementation service. In particular, the AI tutoring service recognizes chemical symbols, numbers and other symbols that make up chemical reaction formulas, extracts the context of the chemical reaction formulas by using a positional relationship between them, extracts an error by comparing the chemical reaction formulas with a reference reaction formula, and visualizes a correct answer by augmented reality to provide the same.

title: FOREIGN LANGUAGE EDUCATION SERVICE METHOD USING CHATBOT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND THE SYSTEM THEREOF
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a foreign language education service method utilizing an AI-based chatbot which evaluates a foreign language conversation sentence input by a user in real time using a conversation service through an AI tutor, and a system thereof. The method may include: a conversation service providing step of providing a foreign language conversation service between a user who wants to be provided with a foreign language education service and an AI tutor selected as an input by the user; and an evaluation providing step of providing a real-time evaluation of the use of the foreign language of the user through a conversation between the user and the AI tutor.

title: METHOD DEVICE AND SYSTEM FOR PROVIDING AND MANAGING STUDY ABROAD EDUCATION CURRICULUM CUSTOMIZED FOR STUDENT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: A method for providing and managing a study abroad education curriculum customized to students, based on artificial intelligence (AI), which is performed by a device according to one embodiment of the present invention comprises the steps of: generating a matching result by matching a first category and learning data for a first student when the category of study abroad education desired by the first student is selected as the first category and the study data for the first student is registered; applying the matching results to an artificial neural network to select a learning subject expected to be necessary for the first student for the study abroad education of the first category as a first subject, based on the output of the artificial neural network; transmitting a notification message notifying that study for the first subject is necessary to the first student's terminal; setting a learning progress for the first subject, based on the learning data for the first student when receiving a request for starting learning the first subject from the first student's terminal; and obtaining first learning content, which is learning content for learning a first unit when the learning progress for the first subject is set to a first unit to provide the first student's terminal with the first learning content.

title: CHEMISTRY EDUCATION DEVICE USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND AUGMENTED REALITY AND METHOD OF PROVIDING CHEMISTRY EDUCATION SERVICE USING THE SAME
abstract_text: A chemistry education device using artificial intelligence and augmented reality and a method of providing a chemistry education service using the same are provided. This chemistry education service includes an AI tutoring service and an AR implementation service. In particular, the AI tutoring service recognizes a chemical symbol, a number, and other symbols that constitute a chemical equation, extracts a context of the chemical equation using a positional relationship between the chemical symbol, the number, and the other symbols, and extracts an error by comparing the chemical equation with a reference reaction formula, and visualizes a corrected answer in augmented reality and provides the corrected answer.

title: Display control method of multi-shafting three-dimensional dynamic similar motion phenomenon display device
applicants: HEFEI GENERAL MACHINERY RES INST CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of science and education display, in particular to a display control method of a multi-shafting three-dimensional dynamic similar motion phenomenon display device, which comprises the following steps: S1, building a three-dimensional dynamic similar motion phenomenon display device; s2, representing a similar motion phenomenon effect of the display device through a control function G; s3, establishing an objective function library, selecting an optimal function from the objective function library, and obtaining an optimal solution of each coefficient in the control function G by adopting a least square method; s4, determining a rotation angular velocity range of the control function G; and S5, an input parameter database is established in combination with the control function G, and a machine learning control algorithm is constructed, so that associated parameters influencing the control function G are self-adjusted. According to the invention, the optimal display effect can be presented for different crowds in different environments.

title: MAINTENANCE TASK ASSISTANCE DEVICE AND METHOD
abstract_text: In a maintenance task, the present invention addresses the problem of making it possible to create a work plan reflecting a long-term viewpoint and a viewpoint according to a management index concerning a client company. These viewpoints, for example, include securing a veteran site worker in the future by allocating cost to education. Also included are achieving medium to long-term cost reduction by reducing standard work hours and the frequency of revisits due to work error. In the present invention, by using an AI 1, a maintenance work plan is created on the basis of work history information 2 and site information 3, and is presented to persons concerned. In doing so, by using company target information (company KPI information 4) at a maintenance contractor, the AI 1 assesses and narrows the created maintenance work plan.

title: API Extended service providing system and method for providing artificial intelligence prediction results for extended education contents through API access interface server
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an extended service providing system for providing artificial intelligence (AI) prediction results for extended education content through an application programming interface (API) access interface server, which enables a user to use AI prediction results regardless of the type of educational content. According to the present invention, the extended service providing system comprises: an access interface server communicating with an extended service server providing extended educational content to a user terminal; and a learning content AI server communicating with the access interface server. When an API transmitted from the terminal is received through the extended service server, the access interface server determines whether the user has an access authority to use the learning content AI server. When the user is determined to have the access authority, the learning content AI server transmits an AI prediction result for the extended educational content to the extended service server through the access interface server in response to the API transmitted from the terminal.

title: AI COMPLEX SUBSCRIPTION SERVICE SYSTEM PROVIDING CRAFT BEER PICK-UP PURCHASE BREWERY TOUR AND BREWING TRAINING USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: Disclosed is a complex subscription service system that provides a craft beer pick-up purchase, a brewery tour, and brewing education using AI. According to one aspect of the present invention, the alcohol-related complex service providing system comprises: a sales unit that receives a pick-up purchase request for an alcohol product from a user terminal and provides a pick-up purchase service for the alcohol product using a store terminal; and a payment unit that receives pick-up purchase history information for the alcohol product from the sales unit, receives payment from the user terminal, and settles and provides the cost of the alcohol product to the store terminal. The sales unit performs the steps of: receiving a pick-up purchase request for an alcohol product from a user terminal; confirming a pick-up purchase reservation for the alcohol product by providing pick-up purchase reservation information for the alcohol product to a store terminal; informing the user terminal of the confirmation of the pick-up purchase reservation for the alcohol product; providing a purchase code for the pick-up purchase of the alcohol product to the user terminal; and terminating a pick-up purchase service of the alcohol product by receiving data sent by the store terminal to recognize the purchase code. Accordingly, it is possible to provide a pick-up purchase service for an alcohol product that allows a user to pick up and purchase the alcohol product the user wants at a store where and at the time when the user wants to pick up and purchase the alcohol product.

title: Hands-on artificial intelligence education service
abstract_text: Indications of sample machine learning models which create synthetic content items are provided via programmatic interfaces. A representation of a synthetic content item produced by one of the sample models in response to input obtained from a client of a provider network is presented. In response to a request from the client, a machine learning model is trained to produce additional synthetic content items.

title: Multi-modal learning behavior analysis method and system and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a multi-modal learning behavior analysis method and system and a storage medium, is applied to the technical field of artificial intelligence, can realize high-performance and high-interpretability multi-modal learning behavior analysis, and provides reliable analysis and interpretation for an education decision process. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring multi-modal behavior data of a to-be-analyzed object in a learning process, and preprocessing the multi-modal behavior data to obtain multi-modal sequence data; performing collaborative embedding representation according to the multi-modal sequence data to obtain initial feature representation; constructing a learning behavior data association graph according to the initial feature representation; decoupling the learning behavior data association graph through a graph decoupling neural network to obtain a multi-modal decoupling graph; constructing an attribute routing mechanism according to the relationship among the nodes of the multi-modal decoupling graph; updating the node embedding representation and the graph structure through an attribute routing mechanism to obtain a target feature representation and a target graph structure; and performing learning behavior analysis according to the target feature representation, and visualizing the target graph structure to obtain a visualized learning behavior analysis result.

title: Artificial intelligence online education terminal
applicants: INNER MONGOLIA YUNMEI TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the field of online education terminals, particularly relates to an artificial intelligence online education terminal, and aims to solve the problems that the gravity center of the whole product is raised due to the fact that an existing machine body needs to rise during use, and the product is not stable enough during use; in order to solve the problems of inconvenience in angle adjustment of a machine body and low use flexibility in the prior art, the utility model provides the following scheme that the device comprises a storage box and the machine body, and connecting mechanisms for connecting the machine body are arranged between the inner walls of the two sides of the storage box and the two sides of the machine body; the supporting mechanism is arranged between the inner wall of the bottom of the storage box and one side of the machine body, the supporting mechanism comprises a storage groove and a plurality of clamping bases, and the storage groove is formed in one side of the machine body. And meanwhile, the angle of the machine body can be adjusted, the use flexibility of the product is improved, the machine body is protected through the cover plate, and the use safety and convenience of the product are improved.

title: METHOD FOR CONVERTING TEXT OF CHARACTER TO SIMPLE VOICE AND APPRATUS AND SYSTEM USING THE SAME
abstract_text: According to the present invention, provided is a method of converting lines of a plurality of characters into simple voices in a learning platform which comprises the steps of: setting the lines of each of the plurality of characters through a service server; displaying the lines of a target character appearing on a screen of a user terminal of the plurality of characters in text according to a preset rule through the service server; and generating a converted voice corresponding to the lines of the target character and outputting the converted voice through the user terminal, wherein the converted voice is generated in a different way for each of the plurality of characters and the converted voice does not match the lines of the target character. The present invention relates to technology developed through Seoul metropolitan government Seoul business agency 2021 G-valley ICT convergence technology commercialization support project (CG210025) "G-learning (game-based learning)-based self-directed learning platform for adolescent artificial intelligence education" According to the present invention, provided are a voice conversion method and device capable of optimizing the pronunciation and length of a simple voice based on the user's learning level and the length of a sentence.

title: EDUCATION ASSISTANCE SOFTWARE
abstract_text: [Problem] To provide education assistance software capable of encouraging a self-directed motivation to learn in students and putting into practice conversational and deep learning between students. [Solution] This education assistance software causes a management server 11 used in an education-related environment to function as a device that provides: a question reception means for receiving a question posted from a student; a question holding means for holding the question received by the question reception means so as to be readable by a plurality of students other than the student who posted the question; an answer reception means for receiving only the first answer posted from one of the plurality of students in response to the question held by the question holding means; and an answer holding means for holding the answer received by the answer reception means such that only the student who posted the question can read the answer.

title: Method and apparatus for dynamic beam indication mechanism
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a higher data rate 5th-Generation (5G) communication system supporting beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with an Internet of Things (IoT) technology. The present disclosure can be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the Internet of Things related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, Internet of Vehicles, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services, etc. The present disclosure provides a method for operating a user equipment (UE), the method comprising: receiving configuration information, the configuration information comprising a set of transmit configuration indicator (TCI) states; receiving a Media Access Control-Control Element (MAC-CE) indicating to activate M TCI states from a set of TCI states, wherein M is a positive integer; identifying a media indicating a TCI state update, where the media is MAC-CE or downlink control information (DCI), and the TCI state update is from the M activated states; determining a beam based on the TCI state update; and applying the beam to reception of both downlink (DL) control and data channels.

title: Smart runway
applicants: JINGSE ZHIHUI BEIJING INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the utility model discloses a smart runway. The intelligent runway comprises an interaction screen and at least two identification rods, the interaction screen is arranged at the entrance of the runway, the identification rods are arranged at the starting position and the ending position of the runway, and each identification rod is in communication connection with the interaction screen. According to the intelligent runway, a new-generation artificial intelligence science and technology, a big data management platform and the like are integrated into an outdoor landscape fitness field or outdoor experience facility, physical education infrastructure is deeply combined, an intelligent and visual intelligent park is effectively constructed, and the whole people are guided to do scientific and efficient exercise by scientifically and interactively monitoring the exercise conditions of the whole people, so that the intelligent and visual intelligent park is created. And the requirements of future development of national fitness and construction of smart cities are comprehensively met.

title: Comprehensive quality intelligent evaluation interaction machine based on artificial intelligence
applicants: ZHENGZHOU CHIYING ELECTRONIC TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a comprehensive quality intelligent evaluation interactive machine based on artificial intelligence, which relates to the technical field of education equipment and comprises a mounting seat, a fixing plate is mounted on the front side of the mounting seat, a damping rotating shaft is mounted in the fixing plate, and a machine body is arranged on the opposite side of the damping rotating shaft. And a connecting rod is connected between the machine body and the damping rotating shaft, a liquid crystal screen is mounted in the machine body, and an electric push rod is mounted between the machine body and the mounting base. According to the utility model, the comprehensive quality evaluation platform and the machine body are matched into a whole, a teacher evaluates the comprehensive quality conditions of students in an image-text recording manner through the comprehensive quality evaluation platform, and parents can also evaluate the performance of children at home in various aspects through the comprehensive quality evaluation platform. And image-text recording type evaluation is carried out in corresponding dimensions, so that the evaluation forms are diversified, the workload of teachers is reduced, and the quality conditions of students in all aspects can be truly and objectively reflected.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR RECOMMENDING LEARNING AMOUNT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND WEIGHTED SCORE FOR STATISTICAL LEARNING AMOUNT
abstract_text: Disclosed are a method and apparatus for recommending a learning volume based on artificial intelligence and a weighted score for a statistical learning volume. The learning volume recommendation apparatus using statistical analysis and deep learning-based artificial intelligence at the same time comprises: a learning data collection unit collecting a plurality of pieces of learning data from student terminals corresponding to a plurality of users; an academic achievement capability prediction unit predicting an academic achievement capability type corresponding to the user of each of the student terminals by using the plurality of pieces of learning data; a learning volume table generation unit pre-processing the learning data according to the predicted academic achievement capability type to generate a learning volume table obtained as a result of statistical calculation processing on the learning data; and a recommended learning volume determination unit determining a recommended learning volume corresponding to a target user by referring to the learning volume table, and providing the determined recommended learning volume to a student terminal of the target user, wherein the learning volume table includes an evaluation pass rate and an evaluation score average calculated with the learning data corresponding to a next education procedure of a current education procedure, with respect to each of a plurality of learning volumes which users corresponding to the predicted academic achievement capability type have actually performed in the next education procedure. Therefore, the present invention is capable of guiding a student to the most efficient learning volume and maximizing a learning effect.

title: A SYSTEM FOR RECOMMENDING CURRICULUM OF CODING EDUCATIONS BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: In order to solve problems, a virtual teacher coding education curriculum recommendation system according to an embodiment of the present invention comprises: a communication unit for providing a coding question to a plurality of learner terminals and receiving a plurality of code data which are answers to the coding question from the plurality of learner terminals; a code evaluation module including a curriculum creation module recommending coding questions to be learned to each learner according to predicted scores in the plurality of learner terminals, and calculating evaluation scores for the plurality of code data; and a storage unit including learner data including the plurality of code data and information on each of the plurality of learner terminals. The curriculum creation module may recommend a coding question to be learned based on question type data for a specific coding question having a predicted score equal to or less than a reference score.

title: Concentration identification method based on artificial intelligence education platform
applicants: CHENGDU JIEJIEGAO EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a concentration degree identification method based on an artificial intelligence education platform. The method comprises the following steps: capturing input video frames of a plurality of lecture attending users; detecting a face area of the listening user; calculating a pixel average image of the group of face image windows to establish a face appearance model of the listener; generating paths of lecture attending users in the plurality of input video frames; estimating the detected face direction to calculate the concentration degree; detecting the number of human faces with front postures, and detecting class attending users who have gazed at a predefined time length in the direction of the display content; calculating the time of watching the display content by the lecture attending users to calculate the concentration degree of each lecture attending user; associating the limb behavior with one of a plurality of emotion type tags; and training a classifier by using features extracted from the video frame data, and detecting emotional feedback of the listener by using the classifier. According to the concentration degree identification method based on the artificial intelligence education platform, the method can better adapt to an application scene of a low-resolution image, visual identification and emotion identification are combined, and the artificial intelligence education platform is helped to obtain the concentration degree distribution state of the listening users in real time.

title: Method and apparatus for dynamic downlink multi-beam operation in wireless communication system
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with an Internet of Things (IoT) technology. The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and security services. A method for operating a user equipment (UE) includes receiving configuration information on a transmission configuration indicator (TCI) state indication via downlink control information (DCI), the configuration information including a set of TCI states and information for configuring a downlink (DL) DCI (DL-DCI) from one of the DL-DCI and DL-TCI-DCI, where the DL-DCI schedules a DL physical DL shared channel (PDSCH) assignment, and the DL-TCI-DCI includes a set of TCI states and information for configuring the DCI from one of the DL-DCI and the DL-TCI state. The DL-TCI-DCI is a dedicated DCI (Downlink Control Information) used for TCI state indication; receiving the configured DCI based on the configuration information; decoding the configured DCI to obtain a TCI state update; determining a receive beam based on the TCI state update; and applying the reception beam to reception of DL control or DL data.

title: 5G cloud network integrated course broadcast control system
applicants: HEFEI TIANYUAN DIKE INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a 5G cloud network integrated course broadcast control system, and relates to the technical field of intelligent education. The system comprises an education cloud network and various terminal connections. The education cloud network comprises a content center and a data center; the architecture of the education cloud network comprises an SAAS layer, a PAAS layer and an IAAS layer; the SAAS layer comprises a portal unit and an application unit; the PAAS layer comprises a support platform and a support center; the IAAS layer is an infrastructure layer and comprises cloud computing resources, a 5G module, a cloud storage and backup module and an education network and equipment module. According to the invention, through 5G high-speed mobile Internet and telecommunication cloud network resources, artificial intelligence and big data cloud computing technologies are combined, a multi-screen intercommunication cloud network integrated online synchronous cloud classroom education learning machine is built, and multi-terminal ultra-low delay rapid distribution and localized rapid loading and playing control of a learning machine system are realized.

title: NOISE AND ECHO CANCELLATION SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR MULTIPOINT VIDEO CONFERENCE OR EDUCATION
abstract_text: Disclosed is a noise and echo cancellation system for multilateral video conferences or video education which can remove noise and echoes in real time from an external input signal in accordance with an optimized model. The noise and echo cancellation system comprises: a sound receiving module preprocessing an analog sound received through a microphone into a digital sound which a deep learning model can learn and infer; a deep learning module learning the digital sound preprocessed from the sound receiving module through a plurality of deep learning models, and inferring a user voice by a real-time service model resulting from reducing the weight of a specific deep learning model among the plurality of deep learning models; and a sound output module outputting only the digital sound inferred as the user voice from the real-time service model to an external speaker or a virtual audio device.

title: AI- based Device and Method for Stroke Order Recognition of Korean Handwriting of Student
abstract_text: One purpose of the present invention is to recognize letters in Korean handwriting of young learners based on artificial intelligence, recognize the stroke order of the Korean handwriting, and identify whether the Korean handwriting was made in a correct stroke order, thereby providing education about the stroke order in writing education for the young learners. To this end, according to an embodiment of the present invention, an AI-based device for recognizing the stroke order of Korean handwriting of learners comprises: a handwriting recognition module for recognizing letters in Korean handwriting data of a learner client received from a learning client; a phoneme decomposition module for generating phoneme information by decomposing the phonemes of the Korean handwriting data in which the letters are recognized, and determining whether each phoneme of the Korean handwriting data is input in a predetermined order based on the phoneme information, wherein the phoneme information includes data on the input order of each phoneme of the Korean handwriting data; and a stroke order identification module including an artificial neural network module that receives the phoneme information and outputs recognition information on a stroke order in which each stroke of the phoneme is input by the learner client, wherein the stroke order identification module transmits feedback to the learner client based on the stroke order recognition information.

title: PRE-TRAINING MODELING SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PREDICTING EDUCATIONAL FACTORS
abstract_text: A pre-training modeling system for predicting educational factors by using a pre-trained artificial intelligence model, according to an embodiment of the present invention, comprises: a pre-training performance unit for receiving interaction factors according to an operation of an offline user from a user terminal, classifying artificial intelligence factors of education content into the interaction factors and educational factors, and performing pre-training through evaluation factors, which are the intersection of the interaction factors and the educational factors so as to be information that can be automatically collected whenever a user solves an individual problem; a fine-tuning performance unit for performing, on the pre-trained artificial intelligence model, an additional training operation according to an educational factor to be predicted; and an educational factor prediction unit for predicting, on the basis of the fine-tuned artificial intelligence model, from among the educational factors, at least one from among examination score, rank, qualification, which are pieces of information that should be separately input by the user since the amount of information automatically collected every time the user solves an individual problem is small or the information cannot be automatically collected, and review information indicating, when the user solves the same problem again, whether the problem is correctly solved.

title: Active health management system and method based on medical health big data intelligent algorithm
applicants: CHENGDU TIANXIA YISEN DIGITAL TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of health management, and discloses an active health management system and method based on a medical health big data intelligent algorithm, and the method comprises the steps: an application system carries out the management of personal information, disease type data and indexes, and the screening of health risks; the management system is used for managing basic data and sharing and exchanging the data; the operation and maintenance service system performs operation and maintenance management; the application system, the management system and the operation and maintenance service system are connected in sequence. According to the invention, a network communication technology, a big data cloud computing platform and an artificial intelligence algorithm are fully utilized to construct a set of platform which is suitable for medical institutions at all levels and even can be simply operated by individuals by means of informatization management. Through a hospital-community-family/individual H3C2H1 active health co-management service mode of doctors in the world, integrated services of early detection, screening and early warning of frequently-occurring diseases and chronic diseases, health risk screening, health management, health education, disease prevention and the like are promoted.

title: Psychological counseling system for counseling psychology of students based on big data analysis artificial intelligence
applicants: JIANGSU XIAOYI INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of student psychological counseling, in particular to a psychological counseling system for counseling psychology of students based on big data analysis artificial intelligence, which comprises an artificial intelligence platform, the artificial intelligence platform is bidirectionally connected with a big data module, and the artificial intelligence platform is bidirectionally connected with a family education platform. The artificial intelligence platform is unidirectionally connected with an artificial intelligence voice module and a face recognition module; according to the invention, the campus information module and the family information module are arranged, the campus information module records multiple items of data of students in the school, the family information module records family data of the students, and the big data module collects, stores, analyzes and processes the multiple items of data of the students. And summarizing and displaying the results for the students to check, so that the purposes of studying, judging and analyzing the front and back effects of the current state of the students from multiple perspectives, effectively improving the comprehensiveness of the system and reducing the limitation of studying and judging are achieved.

title: Method and apparatus for multiplexing channel state information
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with an Internet of Things (IoT) technology. The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. Methods and apparatus for multiplexing channel state information (CSI). A user equipment (UE) includes a transceiver configured to receive configuration information for CSI reporting. The UE also includes a processor configured to decode the configuration information and calculate the CSI from the configuration information. The transceiver is further configured to transmit the calculated CSI on an uplink (UL) channel. The CSI comprises N segments and is transmitted in one time slot, wherein Ngt; 1. A first one of the N segments includes a rank indicator (RI) and at least one other CSI parameter. A base station (BS) includes a processor configured to generate configuration information for CSI reporting. The BS further comprises a transceiver configured to transmit configuration information to the UE via a downlink (DL) channel; and receiving a CSI report calculated according to the configuration information from the UE on an uplink, UL, channel.

title: Artificial intelligence big data bilateral management and control system
applicants: NANJING LINGCHUANG INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence big data bilateral management and control system, and relates to the field of education and learning systems, and the system comprises a terminal control center, and a parent end control subsystem, a teacher end control subsystem and a student end use subsystem which are connected with the terminal control center. The terminal control center comprises a central control module; the parent end control subsystem comprises a first instruction issuing module and a first modification module; and the teacher end control subsystem comprises a second instruction issuing module and a second modification module. Wherein the teacher end control subsystem and the parent end control subsystem simultaneously control the student end use subsystem, and the priority of the teacher end control subsystem is higher than that of the parent end control subsystem. According to the invention, double management and control of the parent end and the teacher end on the student end can be realized, and the flexibility of learning equipment is improved.

title: Cloud-based Adaptive Learning System for Early Childhood Education
abstract_text: A method for assessing the educational needs of a subject, particularly a child in an educational setting. A system for assessing the learning rate and educational level of at least one subject, particularly students in an educational setting such as a school. An educational environment is created that transforms the learning experience and ensures that learners stay connected to the real world by honing social and communication skills. The technology can be a supplement in and out of the classroom. Advanced machine learning can be used to understand the learning rate of a subject which can determine the delivery speed of educational content. If a subject has not attained the desired learning outcome at each level, the system can keep that subject in a reinforcing learning loop until the subject attains the desired learning outcome. Virtual reality can be used to create an engaging environment.

title: EDUCATION AND INFORMATION PROVIDING SYSTEM FOR FREIGHT TRANSPORTATION WORKERS
abstract_text: Disclosed is an application system, which includes a user terminal on which an application providing information for license of freight transportation workers is installed and executed. The present invention includes a management server which provides information to a user terminal through the application. The management server includes: a member information management unit for receiving and storing member subscription information from a user terminal; a freight transport license education management unit providing problem information enabling the user terminal to learn a freight transport license test; a freight transport-related information management unit providing freight transport-related information to the user terminal; and a job search information management unit which provides member-customized job search information using a deep learning-based analysis engine. Therefore, it is possible to learn freight transportation professional licenses regardless of time and space.

title: Illegal behavior processing method and device
abstract_text: The invention relates to an illegal behavior processing method and device, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: responding to an account login operation, and displaying function forbidding information used for prompting that a preset function of a current login target account is forbidden; receiving a first target instruction, and displaying violation information representing the violation behavior; receiving a second target instruction, and obtaining a target violation education mode matched with the credit value of the target account; if the target violation education mode indicates learning education, displaying a legal person learning education interface containing violation education content matched with the violation behavior; receiving a third target instruction, and displaying a commitment interface containing commitment information matched with the illegal behavior; and in response to the submission operation of the commitment information, sending a commitment submission notification to the server to relieve the disabling of the preset function. According to the invention, the probability that the user violates the rule again can be reduced, and the warning effect on the violation behavior is improved.

title: Coding Education System through Artificial Intelligence and Robot
abstract_text: Disclosed are a central server with a learner-customized coding cloud education platform of providing coding education content according to a level of a learner using various information of the learner, and an education platform including the same. A learner-customized coding education system of the present invention comprises: a process of gathering acquisition information including user input information with a voice, video, text, and story, device information, space information, and structured and unstructured data; a process of identifying and recognizing a situation of a coding learner and analyzing the situation based on the input information and the acquisition information; a process of providing a coding education program to the coding learner and storing a coding education process of the coding learner to analyze and determine the situation of the coding learner; a process of connecting the situation flow of the coding learner; a process of providing a hybrid coding education program to the coding learner based on data inferred based on the situation flow of the coding learner; and a process of storing information on the situation flow connection of the coding learner and information on the education process using the hybrid coding education program and answering a question of the coding learner based on the stored information or providing the information to the coding learner. Accordingly, the present invention has an advantage of providing coding education customized for coding learners.

title: Coding Education System through Artificial Intelligence and Robot
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a coding education system through artificial intelligence and robots. A coding robot comprises: an embedded system with an OS capable of coding education on the robot platform and operating the robot at the same time; hardware for a robot drive unit regarding the drive of the robot, a lift unit, an arm unit, a hand unit, a camera unit, and a sensor unit; a method of integrating and providing a block-type graphic programming method and a method using a programming language for coding education; modules that can add robot-related hardware and software as needed from the basic module; software modules for artificial intelligence functions such as robot vision and recognition; a cloud server for speeding up and mass-producing intelligent functions of the internal robot system; smartphones, tablets, computers for software development and remote monitoring; and a coding robot service server to support and manage software resources of coding robots.

title: AI Method for self play study using AI education application
abstract_text: An embodiment of the present invention comprises: a character image generation process of allowing an AI terminal to photograph a character medium to generate a character image; a character image transmission process of allowing the AI terminal to transmit the generated character image to a sound source server for learning; a learning sound source transmission process of allowing the sound source server for learning to identify a character by reading a received character image to transmit a sound source for learning matching the identified character to the AI terminal; and a learning sound source output process of allowing the AI terminal to output the received sound source for learning through a speaker.

title: Complex Machinery Training and Education and Advertising System in Mixed Reality Using Metaverse Platform
abstract_text: A complex machinery training, education and advertisement system in mixed reality using metaverse is disclosed. The complex machinery training, education and advertisement system in mixed reality using metaverse proposed in the present invention comprises: a simulation execution unit that executes a 3D simulation by providing a digital twin for executing a simulation on specific visual elements for maintenance training, education, and advertisement through smart glasses in a metaverse mixed reality for maintenance training, education and advertisement of machineries including an aircraft; a learning unit that provides artificial intelligence knowledge based on learning information including a 2D manual, a work instruction of the 2D manual, and a simulation cost model (SCM); and a neuro-linguistic speech execution unit that executes a neural network work and linguistic reasoning for processing a voice request to execute the 3D simulation based on the provided artificial intelligence knowledge and the digital twin, and sends visual and audio feedbacks to a user to notify processing and completion of a requested task. The present invention provides a metaverse for aircraft maintenance training and education that provides legacy manuals, 3D models, 3D simulators and aircraft maintenance knowledge.

title: INTELLIGENT TRAINING AND EDUCATION BOT
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to Communicational and Conversational Artificial Intelligence, Machine Perception, Perceptual-User-lnterface, and a professional training method. A chatbot may comprise at least one skills module. The chatbot engages with trainee(s) on communicational training on a subject matter provided by the skills module. A trainer may create, remove, or update a skills module with interaction skills and training materials through an onboarding module. A trainee can upload recorded interactions to a skills module for evaluation or for role playing an interaction without a trainer or partner. An administrator may monitor a trainee's performance, and correlate with the organization's metrics. Based on the evaluation, the trainer or chatbot may provide the trainee with feedback and recommended improvement plans. The chatbot may be implemented in an Internet-of-Things or any device. The subject matters may extend to cover different industries/markets. The trainer may be a professional or individual.

title: Method, system and terminal for generating intelligent Q matrix fused with semantic information of questions
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence and education interaction, and discloses an intelligent Q matrix generation method and system fusing question semantic information, and a terminal, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining mathematical knowledge points in a data set through employing BiLSTM + Transform, and correcting the labeling type of each word through employing CRF, thereby outputting the mathematical knowledge points; performing relation extraction on the knowledge points by applying a BiGRU + Attention mechanism, and outputting a relation between each knowledge point pair; and designing a redundant knowledge point deletion algorithm by using the relationship between the knowledge points, deleting the redundant knowledge points through the deletion algorithm, and generating a Q matrix by using the deleted knowledge point set. According to the method, a Transform + BiLSTM + CRF method is adopted, so that a relatively high knowledge point extraction rate can be achieved; and a BiGRU + Attention method is adopted, so that the relationship between the knowledge point pairs can be accurately output.

title: INTELLIGENT TRAINING AND EDUCATION BOT
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to Communicational and Conversational Artificial Intelligence, Machine Perception, Perceptual-User-Interface, and a professional training method. A chatbot may comprise at least one skills module. The chatbot engages with trainee(s) on communicational training on a subject matter provided by the skills module. A trainer may create, remove, or update a skills module with interaction skills and training materials through an onboarding module. A trainee can upload recorded interactions to a skills module for evaluation or for role playing an interaction without a trainer or partner. An administrator may monitor a trainee's performance, and correlate with the organization's metrics. Based on the evaluation, the trainer or chatbot may provide the trainee with feedback and recommended improvement plans. The chatbot may be implemented in an Internet-of-Things or any device. The subject matters may extend to cover different industries/markets. The trainer may be a professional or individual.

title: Medical seeking convenient system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: THE FIRST AFFILIATED HOSPITAL OF SUN YAT SEN UNIV
abstract_text: The invention discloses a medical-seeking convenient system based on artificial intelligence. A hospital client realizes association and shared utilization of health information of multiple registered hospital residents; the doctor client provides online inquiry, remote consultation and question answering services; the patient client provides appointment and guide services of registration, offline treatment and examination, and provides a series of services before hospitalization, during hospitalization and after hospitalization; and the cloud server side provides medical service support and data storage service. The system is based on an artificial intelligence technology, a patient can obtain simple and convenient medical treatment related guidance in the processes of outpatient treatment, hospitalization treatment and home rehabilitation, and the whole-course medical treatment and rehabilitation of the patient are integrally managed; patients can timely obtain professional guidance of medical staff when diseases occur in the treatment, hospitalization and home rehabilitation processes, targeted health education content can be obtained in the hospitalization period and the home rehabilitation process at the same time, the treatment compliance of the patients can be improved, and the treatment experience is improved.

title: AI artificial intelligence child accompanying education robot
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of AI artificial intelligence robots, and discloses an AI artificial intelligence children accompanying education robot which comprises a shell, a guide rail is fixedly assembled on the inner wall of the shell, a sliding rod is connected to the inner wall of the guide rail in a sliding mode, a through groove is formed in the outer edge of the sliding rod, clamping teeth are fixedly assembled on the inner wall of the through groove, and the clamping teeth are fixedly assembled on the inner wall of the through groove. A gear is meshed with the outer edge of the clamping tooth, a rotating rod is fixedly assembled on the outer edge of the gear, a rotating shaft is fixedly assembled on the outer edge of the rotating rod, and an arm is fixedly assembled on the outer edge of the rotating shaft. According to the AI artificial intelligence child accompanying education robot, the operation mode of the AI artificial intelligence child accompanying education robot is simplified, by arranging the infrared sensor, when the child uses the robot too close, a prompt can be sent to the child through the miniature sound box, and therefore the child is guided to control the use distance between the AI artificial intelligence child accompanying education robot and the child.

title: TESTING AND EDUCATION MICROREACTOR
abstract_text: A configurable microreactor for testing and education is described. The microreactor includes a reactor core comprising a plurality of fuel rods, a plurality of guide tubes, and a plurality of rotating control drums configured to control operation of the microreactor. Further, the microreactor includes a testing cavity disposed in an area within the reactor configured to store an item therein for experimentation; a plurality of beam ports; a moveable particle filter ring; a moveable spectrum shifter; and at least one sensor. A computing device is directed to receive measurements from the at least one sensor and perform a physics-based analysis of the microreactor using one or more machine learning (ML) routines.

title: Programming block management system for artificial intelligence education graphical programming software
abstract_text: According to the programming block management system for the artificial intelligence education graphical programming software, the problems of long time consumption, low efficiency and high error rate during generation and modification of the programming block are solved, a programming block developer can develop the programming block only by mastering a python language without mastering JavaScript, and the threshold of programming block development is reduced; management of programming block branches is simplified, namely generation, modification, deletion, import and export of the programming block branches are simplified; and a publishing function of programming block branches is provided, and the branches are shared to the cloud, so that other people can download and deploy the branches into own software, and sharing of the branches is facilitated. The whole process of programming block generation, management and release is greatly simplified, and the development efficiency of developers is improved.

title: ELECTRONIC TERMINAL APPARATUS THAT AUTOMATICALLY GENERATES A QUERY SENTENCE THROUGH LANGUAGE ANALYSIS OF THE PLAIN TEXT SENTENCE INCLUDED IN THE ELECTRONIC DOCUMENT AND OPERATING METHOD THEREOF
abstract_text: Disclosed are an electronic terminal device automatically generating query sentences through language analysis of declarative sentences included in electronic documents and an operating method thereof. The present invention discloses the electronic terminal device capable of automatically generating query sentences through language analysis of the corresponding sentence when an automatic question generation command for a specific sentence in a form of a declarative sentence in Korean included in an electronic document is applied by a user, and an operating method thereof. The present invention is intended to support users to utilize the present invention for text-based artificial intelligence learning or quizzes for education.

title: Special chip for information science and technology education open source hardware
abstract_text: The invention discloses a special chip for information science and technology education open source hardware, which comprises an RISC-V-based symmetric multi-core CPU, an artificial intelligence acceleration unit, a multimedia unit, a communication unit and a peripheral interface unit, and the artificial intelligence acceleration unit, the multimedia unit, the communication unit and the peripheral interface unit are all connected with the symmetric multi-core CPU. According to the special chip for the open-source hardware of the information science and technology education adopting the structure, the symmetric multi-core CPU is designed based on an RISC-V open-source instruction system, ARM authorization is not needed, limitation is avoided, an artificial intelligence algorithm acceleration function is achieved, an artificial intelligence education experiment separated from a cloud end is provided, various interfaces are arranged, and complex experiments can be supported and operated.

title: Multi-modal image voice interpretation method and system based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a multi-modal image voice interpretation method and system based on deep learning. The method comprises the following steps: constructing an image description neural network and training to obtain an image description neural network model; building a voice conversion neural network and training to obtain a voice conversion neural network model; and obtaining an image to be subjected to voice interpretation, translating the image into a character sequence through the image description neural network model, and outputting a voice audio corresponding to the character sequence through the voice conversion neural network model. The method is used for realizing the understanding of the content of the non-text picture and interpreting the objects in the picture and the relationship and behavior among the plurality of objects in a voice mode. The system is helpful for visually impaired people to know the surrounding environment in real time, and is helpful for the daily life of such people. Meanwhile, the scheme can be applied to infant education, plays an auxiliary role in the process that children learn things around, can also be applied to entertainment venues, is wide in application range and has very high actual use value.

title: System and Method for an Autonomous Multipurpose Application for Scheduling, Check-In, and Education
abstract_text: A method and system for an autonomous multipurpose application for scheduling, check-in, and education is described herein. The autonomous multipurpose application may provide an improved experience for users that schedule appointments with people having specialties, and that check-in to the scheduled appointments. A cognitive intelligence platform may use artificial intelligence techniques to enable operations of the autonomous multipurpose application. Further, computing resources may be reduced using the described techniques.

title: Intelligent education audio and video integrated Ai camera convenient to install
applicants: SHANDONG SHIJI XINGHUI SCIENCE AND TECH DEVELOPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an intelligent education audio and video integrated Ai camera convenient to install, which relates to the technical field of cameras and comprises a base, a rotating rod is rotatably arranged at the bottom of the base, an installation seat is fixedly arranged on the rotating rod, a sliding rail is arranged in the middle of the installation seat, and a sliding seat is slidably arranged in the sliding rail.
