A camera body is fixedly arranged on one side of the sliding seat, and an adjusting mechanism is arranged between the mounting seat and the base; the adjusting mechanism comprises a supporting frame fixedly arranged on the base, a pulley is rotationally arranged in the middle of the supporting frame, a storage frame is rotationally arranged at the position, below the pulley, of the base, the storage frame is sleeved with a connecting rope, and the connecting rope penetrates through the pulley and is fixedly connected with the mounting base; according to the invention, the camera body can be conveniently mounted and dismounted, and the angle and height of the camera body can be adjusted.

title: A device system and its operation method that evaluates the user's ability through an artificial intelligence model learned through transfer factor applied to various test domain
abstract_text: According to an embodiment of the present invention, a user ability evaluation apparatus for predicting a test score through a transfer factor indicating a relative ability difference of users in a plurality of test domains comprises: a transfer factor extraction unit which receives problem answer information of a reference domain and test score information from a user terminal and extracts at least one transfer factor from the problem answer information or the test score information; a basic model learning unit which learns a basic model predicting a test score of a user from feature information, which can be commonly used for comparing abilities of a plurality of users in the reference domain and a target domain to evaluate the ability of the user, and the transfer factor; and a model transfer performing unit which transfers the basic model to an ability evaluation model for predicting a test score of the target domain. Accordingly, the present invention can effectively evaluate the ability of a user even in an education domain lacking learning data.

title: Video education content providing method and apparatus based on artificial intelligence natural language processing using characters
abstract_text: Disclosed are a method and apparatus for providing video education content based on artificial intelligence natural language processing using a character. The apparatus for providing video education content according to an embodiment of the present invention comprises: a participant checking unit for checking at least one video education service access of a participant from an external server; a participant information collection unit for obtaining video and audio data for each of the at least one participant and collecting participant speech information; a speech conversion processing unit for generating speech analysis information by converting the participant speech information into speech text; and a character formation processing unit for generating a character based on the speech analysis information and providing video education content using the character to a participant terminal through the external server. Accordingly, the present invention has the effect of increasing the understanding of video education content.

title: ART LEARNING EVALUATION METHOD AND APPARATUS
abstract_text: An art learning evaluation method provided by the present invention comprises: a step of allowing a data obtaining unit to obtain text data generated during the art learner's online learning process as raw data; a step of allowing a data pre-processing module to perform pre-processing so as to analyze the raw data and select words to be evaluated; a step of allowing an analysis module to perform analysis in a machine learning manner based on a predefined corpus for evaluating art education achievement based on the selected words to be evaluated; and a step of allowing an output unit to output the analysis result. The present invention has the effect of multi-dimensionally analyzing and quantitatively evaluating text data generated as a result of interaction between a learner and a professor or between learners for learning through online learning by using machine learning.

title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI)-BASED SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR MANAGING EDUCATION OF STUDENTS IN REAL-TIME
abstract_text: A system and method for managing education of students in real-time is disclosed. The method includes receiving learning data associated with online mode and offline mode of classroom from one or more data capturing devices and media streams and detecting a set of activities. The method further includes classifying the determined set of activities and determining a set of contextual parameters corresponding to the detected set of activities. Further, the method includes identifying one or more learning gaps in one or more students based on the learning data, the set of activities and the set of contextual parameters by using an education management-based AI model in real-time and outputting the set of activities, the set of contextual parameters and the one or more learning gaps on user interface screen of one or more electronic devices.

title: People raising effect evaluation method, device and equipment and readable storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method, a device and equipment for evaluating a human growth effect and a computer readable storage medium, belongs to the field of information processing, and is used for evaluating the human growth effect of a school. Considering that a machine learning algorithm can analyze a large amount of education data and calculate a target index based on the data, the method comprises the following steps: firstly, obtaining a training data set and a test data set according to the education data of a specified type; a plurality of different alternative prediction models based on a specified type of machine learning algorithm are obtained through training of the training data set, preset performance evaluation indexes of all the alternative prediction models are obtained through calculation of the test data set, and the prediction model with the optimal performance is determined to be used for evaluation of the childbearing effect. According to the method, the evaluation of the childbearing effect can be automatically carried out, and the prediction model with the best effect in the plurality of alternative prediction models is utilized in the prediction process, so that the reliability of the prediction result is ensured.

title: METHOD, SYSTEM, AND PLATFORM FOR DELIVERY OF EDUCATIONAL INFORMATION AND PELVIC HEALTH MANAGEMENT
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to effective, efficient, and economical methods and systems for improving patient engagement, education, and treatment management. In particular, the present disclosure relates to a unique configuration of technology wherein analysis by artificial intelligence may determine improvement to treatment plans and may adjust such treatment plans to improve patient care or reduce cost.

title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI)-BASED SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR MANAGING EDUCATION OF STUDENTS IN REAL-TIME
abstract_text: A system and method for managing education of students in real-time is disclosed. The method includes receiving learning data associated with online mode and offline mode of classroom from one or more data capturing devices and media streams and detecting a set of activities. The method further includes classifying the determined set of activities and determining a set of contextual parameters corresponding to the detected set of activities. Further, the method includes identifying one or more learning gaps in one or more students based on the learning data, the set of activities and the set of contextual parameters by using an education management-based AI model in real-time and outputting the set of activities, the set of contextual parameters and the one or more learning gaps on user interface screen of one or more electronic devices.

title: Laser shooting education service platform using artificial intelligence based on big data
abstract_text: Due to the prolonged Corona 19, a non-face-to-face consumption trend is accelerating. The spread of mobile media such as smartphones and tablet PCs has expanded, and the e-commerce market has grown further as a mobile communication environment has been revised. Therefore, the present invention plans to expand education services through the sale of laser shooting sports equipment nationwide and laser shooting to nurture leaders through online. An object of the present invention is to create a new sports culture community with a focus on sports safety education to enjoy sports safely.

title: Method and apparatus for random access procedure
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system supporting a higher data rate than a 4th-Generation (4G) system with an Internet of Things (IoT) technology. The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on 5G communication technology and IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. A method and apparatus for a random access procedure in a wireless communication system. A method for operating a user equipment (UE) includes receiving a system information block (SIB) in a downlink (DL) bandwidth portion (BWP). The DL BWP is linked to a first uplink (UL) BWP. The SIB includes an indication for one or more UL BWPs. The method also includes transmitting a physical random access channel (PRACH) in a second UL BWP from the one or more UL BWPs. The second UL BWP is different from the first UL BWP.

title: VIDEO EDUCATION CONTENT PROVIDING METHOD AND APPARATUS BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE NATURAL LANGUAGE PROCESSING USING CHARACTERS
abstract_text: Disclosed are video education content providing method and apparatus based on artificial intelligence natural language processing using characters. The video education content providing apparatus according to an exemplary embodiment of the present invention may include a participant identification unit which identifies a video education service connection of at least one participant from an external server; a participant information collection unit which acquires video and voice data for each of the at least one participant to collect participant speech information; a speech conversion processing unit that converts the participant speech information into speech text to generate speech analysis information; and a character formation processing unit which creates characters based on the speech analysis information and provides a video education content using the characters to a participant terminal via the external server.

title: Online education mobile terminal for artificial intelligence
applicants: HENAN INST OF ECONOMICS AND TRADE
abstract_text: An artificial intelligence online education mobile terminal disclosed by the present invention comprises a moving seat, the lower end of the moving seat is fixedly connected with four universal wheels distributed in a rectangular shape, the left and right sides of the upper end of the moving seat are fixedly connected with stop blocks, and the upper end of the moving seat is transversely provided with a moving groove between the two stop blocks. A first threaded rod is jointly and rotationally connected between the inner walls of the left side and the right side of the moving groove, a moving block is slidably connected into the moving groove, the first threaded rod penetrates through the moving block and is in threaded connection with the moving block, a first motor for driving the first threaded rod to rotate is fixedly installed on the right side of the moving seat, and a first vertical plate is arranged at the upper end of the moving block; and first magnetic blocks are fixedly embedded in the opposite sides of the first vertical plate and the moving block. The folding device has the advantages that when the folding device is transferred and not used, the folding device can be quickly and simply folded to reduce the occupied space and the height, so that the folding device is greatly convenient to move and store.

title: Intelligent classroom student quality-oriented education service management system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: WUHAN ZHUZHULEYUAN EDUCATION CONSULTING CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a smart classroom student quality-oriented education service management system based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises a student piano playing audio analysis module, a student piano playing video analysis module and a student advantage display terminal. According to the invention, the accuracy of the piano playing track audio corresponding to each student is comprehensively analyzed from three aspects of the tone accuracy, the beat co-beat rate and the track integrity rate of the piano playing track audio corresponding to each student, so that the accuracy of the analysis result is greatly improved; meanwhile, on one hand, errors caused by missed listening, wrong listening and mistaken listening of tones, pitches or rhythms in piano tracks in a manual evaluation mode are avoided, on the other hand, the defect that the evaluation result is not accurate enough due to personal subjectivity in a piano education course at present is overcome, and the accuracy of piano playing evaluation of students is further ensured.

title: Garbage sorting game device for performing the garbage sorting game method
abstract_text: A separate garbage collection game device for performing a separate garbage collection game is provided. The separate garbage collection game is a game played by a first team composed of a first user and a second user and a second team composed of a third user and a fourth user and is a game in which a team that first separates and collects two garbage models among first to fourth garbage models wins. The separate garbage collection game device for performing the separate garbage collection game according to an embodiment prepares various configurations for separate garbage collection and can easily and efficiently provide programming education on artificial intelligence (AI)-based machine learning and coding while playing the game. In addition, the separate garbage collection game device for performing the separate garbage collection game according to an embodiment of the present invention prepares the separate garbage collection game in a form of a contest between the first team and the second team and induces active participation of students in a class as the game progresses to support the students to entertainingly understand principles of AI-based machine learning and coding.

title: Smart home experience game device for performing smart home experience game
abstract_text: Provided is a smart home password search game device for playing a smart home password search game, which is a smart home password search game device for performing a smart home password search game that includes a first mission to decipher a first password through a presented first clue and second clue, and an acquired hint, and a second mission to acquire a second password through a voice recognition model. The smart home password search game device comprises: a first game device for performing the first mission; and a second game device for performing the second mission. The smart home password search game device for performing the smart home password search game according to an embodiment of the present invention can easily and efficiently provide programming education on artificial intelligence (AI)-based machine learning and coding through the game with various missions related to a smart home.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot
applicants: NANCHANG LINGXING INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model provides an artificial intelligence education robot which comprises a base, a machine body and a bottom sheath. The base is installed at the bottom of the machine body and fixedly connected with the machine body. The bottom sheath is installed at the bottom of the base in a sleeved mode, the anti-skid pad is located at the bottom of the bottom sheath, and the anti-skid pad and the bottom sheath are of an integrated structure. The front sheath is installed at the front end of the machine body in a sleeved mode, and the rear sheath is installed at the rear end of the machine body in a sleeved mode. The limiting columns are arranged on the outer wall of the front sheath and the outer wall of the rear sheath, and the limiting columns, the front sheath and the rear sheath are of an integrated structure. The side protection block is mounted on the outer wall of the machine body; by improving the artificial intelligence education robot, the artificial intelligence education robot has the advantages of being reasonable in structural design, convenient to mount, dismount and operate, high in fixing firmness, good in protection effect and high in practicability, preventing the base and the robot body from being collided after the robot falls off, and therefore the problems and defects in an existing device are effectively solved.

title: Student education subject comprehensive development analysis and evaluation system based on deep learning
applicants: WUHAN HANYANG AIMENG TUOYU SERVICES CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student education subject comprehensive development analysis and evaluation system based on deep learning. The student education subject comprehensive development analysis and evaluation system based on deep learning comprises a student subject score acquisition module, a student subject score analysis module, a student class behavior acquisition module, a student class behavior analysis module, a student subject comprehensive analysis module and a display cloud platform. The comprehensive development evaluation coefficient of each student is obtained through comprehensive calculation so as to analyze and evaluate the comprehensive development of the students, so that the problem that the comprehensive development of the students is evaluated only from the single dimension of examination scores at present is effectively solved, and the limitation and one-sidedness of a current general evaluation mode are broken through; the comprehensive evaluation of the students is realized, the class state and the class attending quality of each student in each subject are effectively reflected, and a powerful guarantee is provided for the learning effect and the learning quality of the students.

title: Artificial intelligence education interaction device and use method thereof
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence education interaction device and a use method thereof, and the device comprises a table plate, the table plate is rotatably connected with a rotating plate through a first rotating shaft, the table plate is rotatably connected with an overturning plate through a second rotating shaft, and the overturning plate is connected with a display screen; the first rotating shaft is fixedly sleeved with a driving rotating wheel, the table plate is rotationally connected with a driven rotating wheel, and a conveying belt is hung on the driving rotating wheel and the driven rotating wheel; the driven rotating wheel is coaxially connected with a tooth-missing bevel gear, the second rotating shaft is fixedly sleeved with a bevel gear, and the tooth-missing bevel gear is meshed with the bevel gear; the table plate is further fixedly connected with a baffle matched with the rotating plate. The device is convenient to operate and use, the height of the table plate can be conveniently adjusted, meanwhile, the device is compact in structure and convenient to carry and use, and the artificial intelligence education interaction participation can be improved.

title: Intelligent mathematical application question solving method and system based on knowledge learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent mathematical application question solving method and system based on knowledge learning, and organically couples a mathematical knowledge learning process and an application question solving process, so as to improve the problem solving capability while improving the quality of knowledge obtained by learning. According to the related scheme, a cognitive framework and a knowledge learning process are designed, an intelligent system closer to a universal artificial intelligence target is constructed, the system can serve as a universal framework, various machine learning tasks are fused, and a certain basis is provided for achieving strong artificial intelligence; moreover, a mathematical application question solving method introducing knowledge learning is established, and the accuracy and interpretability of application question solving are improved. Meanwhile, the learned mathematical knowledge has a certain practical application value, can serve as prior information of numerous machine learning tasks to improve task performance, can further assist an education platform in building a knowledge graph, and provides better personalized education service based on the knowledge graph.

title: Student classroom performance evaluation method based on multi-mode audio and video technology
abstract_text: The invention provides a student classroom performance evaluation method based on a multi-mode audio and video technology, and relates to the technical field of classroom education. The method comprises the following steps: counting the speaking frequency of a student through a voiceprint recognition technology, evaluating the speaking activeness of the student, extracting key frames in a video through a video key frame extraction technology, and respectively selecting a student face image capable of reflecting the concentration degree as a positive sample or a negative sample; training the positive and negative training samples by using a machine learning model to obtain a concentration detection model; and detecting the key frame image by using the detection model to obtain the classroom small action frequency of the students, and classifying the performances of the students according to records in the classroom evaluation data table. According to the invention, each student can carry out targeted education according to the learning state reflected in monitoring, and the learning efficiency is improved.

title: AI-based education management method, apparatus and device, and readable storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI-based education management method, apparatus and device, and a storable medium. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a test result and a correct result of a test question in a test question paper; calculating a matching degree of knowledge point features in the test result and the correct result, and obtaining a test numerical value corresponding to the matching degree; obtaining weights and test values of test knowledge points in the test questions, generating a learning condition analysis report based on the weights and the test values, and feeding back knowledge weak points of the students through the learning condition analysis report; knowledge point features are extracted from test results and correct results answered by students, high-accuracy test values are determined according to the matching degree between the knowledge point features, so that the knowledge point mastering degree is concrete, and a learning condition analysis report is generated based on the weight and the test values of the same test knowledge point. And knowledge weak points of the students are quickly fed back through a learning condition analysis report.

title: Campus education big data cloud platform based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a campus education big data cloud platform based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a cloud server platform, a resource acquisition module, a resource arrangement and uploading module, a security auditing module and a client terminal, and is characterized in that the resource arrangement and uploading module, the security auditing module and the client terminal are connected with the cloud server platform. According to the campus education big data cloud platform based on artificial intelligence, various education resource libraries and resources of a network platform are collected and integrated, a python programming algorithm is utilized, the structure principle is simple, the application range is wide, all resource libraries can be effectively traversed, and the purposes of updating the resources in time and ensuring the education quality are achieved; by setting the intelligent classification unit, the collected resources are classified by using an artificial intelligence method, the convolutional neural network has good robustness and strong generalization ability, the established model is high in stability, the resources can be classified efficiently and quickly, and the purposes of facilitating consulting by teachers and students and improving the working efficiency are achieved.

title: Interactive online education integrated platform system
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an interactive online education integrated platform system, which comprises: a database storing class learning data, grade data, and video learning data used in a remote education management system, an artificial intelligence (A) chatbot system, and a remote video learning system; and an integrated server providing a remote education function using the class learning data, the grade data and the video learning data, a remote video learning function, and an AI chatbot function supporting a consultation on a class and an assignment based on big data including the class learning data, the grade data and the video learning data to a teacher terminal, a student terminal and a parent terminal. According to the present invention, an education satisfaction level of both an instructor and a student is improved by providing an interactive online education integrated platform, a real-time interactive class is introduced by breaking away from an one-sided knowledge transfer form, and a synergy is maximized on the aspect of a learning effect by establishing a linkage strategy with an offline class, thereby producing an effect of improving an online education environment.

title: PLATFORM FOR EDUCATING AND MANAGING COGNITIVE REHABILITATION REHABILITATION IN MILD COGNITIVE IMPAIRMENT PATIENT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELIGENCE
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an AI-based cognitive rehabilitation education and management platform for patients with mild cognitive impairment, which comprises: a cognitive function test unit (110) determining a dementia transient stage by examining the cognitive function of patients with mild cognitive impairment in detail; a cognitive learning providing unit (120) creating and storing customized cognitive learning contents and cognitive learning programs for each learning stage and detailed cognitive area corresponding to the dementia transient stage of patients with mild cognitive impairment, streaming the same through a communication network and providing the same to a user terminal (160) of a patient with mild cognitive impairment; an analysis unit (130) determining the progress of rehabilitation treatment for mild cognitive impairment by periodically analyzing the result information of the provision of cognitive learning contents and learning of the cognitive learning program by AI; an optimization matching unit (140) selecting lower and upper levels for the cognitive learning contents and cognitive learning programs of the cognitive learning providing unit (120) according to the determination of the progress of rehabilitation treatment by the analysis unit (130), and adjusting a provision schedule; and a report preparation unit (150) generating a report on the result information of the analysis unit (130) and the rehabilitation treatment progress information and providing the same to the user terminal (160). The AI-based cognitive rehabilitation education and management platform for patients with mild cognitive impairment uses AI to prevent dementia by performing systematic rehabilitation management optimized for patients with mild cognitive impairment in the pre-dementia stage.

title: Oral health AI identification method and device, storage medium and processor
applicants: ZHUHAI AICREATE MEDICAL TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an oral health AI identification method and device, a storage medium and a processor. The method comprises the steps that an oral cavity picture collected by oral cavity picture collection equipment is received, and the oral cavity picture collection equipment at least comprises a handle, a camera, an image processing model and a communication module; inputting the oral cavity picture into a preset Mobi leNetV3 convolutional neural network model to carry out main rod feature extraction, and obtaining output results of a plurality of different hierarchical features; serially connecting the output results of the plurality of different hierarchical features with a preset Unet deconvolution neural network model step by step to obtain a target model prediction result; performing post-processing on the target model prediction result to obtain a target image; performing instance segmentation processing on the target image to obtain a focus identification result of the oral cavity picture; and displaying the focus identification result. The technical problems that in the prior art, in the oral health prevention process, doctor-patient communication efficiency is low, the oral digital propaganda and education effect is poor, and the oral health self-examination difficulty is high are solved.

title: Online education course resource intelligent analysis recommendation system based on deep learning
applicants: WUHAN QUANYING EDUCATION CONSULTING CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online education course resource intelligent analysis and recommendation system based on deep learning, and the system achieves the intelligent analysis and recommendation of online sports education courses through the arrangement of a target user registration information collection module, a target user registration information analysis module, a sports course information base and a personalized recommendation module. The height, weight, gender, age and figure of the target user are comprehensively analyzed, and then the optimal exercise item course is provided for the target user, so that on one hand, the target user does not depend on the subjective psychology of the target user when selecting the exercise course, the selection of the exercise course fits the actual situation of the target user, and the user experience is improved. Therefore, the exercise effect is improved, damage to the body caused by unreasonable exercise is greatly reduced, on the other hand, individualized differences of the users are concerned, more reasonable and balanced exercise courses can be recommended to the users, and the course experience feeling of the target users is greatly improved.

title: SYSTEM FOR SIMULATING OCEAN DATA BASED ON MIXED REALITY OR AUGMENTED OR VIRTUAL REALITY
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a marine data simulation system for simulating marine information based on mixed reality or augmented/virtual reality according to a prediction model stored through machine learning based on a 5G communication environment and a simulation method using the same. In the present invention, a user selects content to implement education, experiential learning, marine tourist attraction exploration and marine healing using marine data. Depending on the content selectable by the user, it is possible to predict an action which can be performed by a terminal displaying the content.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot
applicants: HENAN UNIV OF FINANCE AND ECONOMICS
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of intelligent education, in particular to an artificial intelligence education robot which comprises a robot body, a robot head is arranged at the top end of the robot body, a display screen is arranged on the front face of the robot head, and a movable dustproof assembly used for conducting dustproof protection on the display screen is installed on the robot head. The artificial intelligence education robot has the advantages that when the artificial intelligence education robot is used, the movable dustproof assembly composed of the arc-shaped dustproof plate, the driving gear and the closed end cover is installed on the head of the robot, the driving gear drives the arc-shaped dustproof plate to rotate clockwise on the head of the robot, the display screen is not shielded by the arc-shaped dustproof plate any more, and the dustproof effect is good. The display screen can be normally used, after the display screen is used, the driving gear drives the arc-shaped dustproof plate to rotate anticlockwise on the robot head, the arc-shaped dustproof plate shields the display screen, dustproof protection can be conveniently conducted on the display screen, the arc-shaped dustproof plate is attached to the robot head all the time, and the structure is always compact.

title: Anti-collision structure of artificial intelligence education robot
applicants: ZHENGZHOU XINHE INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The anti-collision structure of the artificial intelligence education robot comprises a robot body, an anti-collision plate is arranged at the top of the robot body, limiting blocks are arranged on the periphery of the robot body, first through grooves are formed in the front faces of the limiting blocks, anti-collision blocks are arranged in the first through grooves, and the anti-collision plates are arranged in the first through grooves. And a mounting groove is formed in the back face of the limiting block, a motor is fixedly mounted in the mounting groove, two containing grooves are formed in the periphery of the interior of the robot body, and second sliding grooves are formed in the positions, located on the two sides of the containing grooves, of the interior of the robot body. The robot body is arranged to educate and tutorize students, the anti-collision plate is arranged to protect the top of the robot body, the first through groove is arranged to accommodate the anti-collision block, the anti-collision block is arranged to protect the periphery of the robot body, and the accommodating groove is arranged to accommodate the positioning rod.

title: Artificial intelligence education supervision equipment
applicants: JIANGSU VOCATIONAL COLLEGE OF ELECTRONICS & INFORMATION
abstract_text: The invention discloses artificial intelligence education supervision equipment which comprises a base, a first mounting block is slidably arranged on the base, a second mounting block is slidably arranged on the first mounting block, a cleaning mechanism is arranged on the first mounting block, and the cleaning mechanism comprises two pull rods hinged to the second mounting block. Two sliding blocks are arranged on the first mounting block in a sliding mode, each sliding block is hinged to the corresponding pull rod, and vertical rods are fixedly connected to the sliding blocks. Through mutual cooperation of a pull rod and a sliding block, dust on the surface of the camera can be quickly cleaned without manual cleaning, so that the working efficiency of the camera is improved, and through mutual cooperation of a first gear and a second gear, when the camera is damaged due to long-time use, dust on the surface of the camera can be removed, and the camera can be conveniently cleaned. And the device can be quickly replaced, so that the education supervision work can be smoothly carried out.

title: Digital intelligent MINI farm
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of digital intelligent agriculture and agricultural education, and particularly discloses a digital intelligent MINI farm which comprises a box body, a planting frame arranged in the box body, an LED lighting light supplementing system, a temperature and humidity control system, an automatic water and fertilizer circulating system, a video remote monitoring system and a moving mechanism arranged at the bottom of the box body. The planting frame comprises a base, stand columns arranged on the left side and the right side of the base and planting layers arranged between the two stand columns, and the LED illumination light supplementing system comprises an illumination induction sensor and a plurality of multi-channel LED lamps which are arranged above any planting layer. The vertical water culture system is innovatively established, the effects of shortening the plant growth cycle, increasing the plant nutrient content and adjusting the plant taste are achieved by optimizing factors such as illumination, environment and water supply, meanwhile, the optimal environment setting of each layer can be found through an algorithm, and the optimal environment setting can be obtained through machine learning of a large amount of data. And the system automatically completes the configuration process, so that an intelligent MINI farm is constructed.

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR CHANNEL QUALITY STATUS PREDICTION IN WIRELESS NETWORK USING MACHINE LEARNING
abstract_text: The disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a fifth-generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a fourth-generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as a smart home, a smart building, a smart city, a smart car, a connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. A method for predicting channel quality status (CQS) in a wireless network by a base station (BS) is provided. The method includes receiving channel quality indicator (CQI) reports, pre-coding matrix index (PMI) reports, and rank index (RI) reports of first frequency band of a plurality of frequency bands in the wireless network, storing the CQI reports, the PMI reports, and the RI reports of the first frequency band, and predicting the CQI, the PMI and the RI of a second frequency band of the plurality of frequency bands associated with the UE based on the CQI reports, the PMI reports, and the RI reports of the first frequency band.

title: Anti-collision assembly of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The invention discloses an anti-collision assembly of an artificial intelligence education robot, and relates to the technical field of education robots, the anti-collision assembly comprises a connecting wall, a motor is fixedly connected to the surface of the connecting wall, a connecting block is fixedly connected to a rotating shaft of the output end of the motor, and a soft glass wall is fixedly connected to the surface of the connecting block. A conducting medium is arranged in the soft glass wall, a display screen is fixedly connected to the surface of the soft glass wall, a resistance detector is fixedly connected to the inner side face of the connecting block, and a rotating shaft of the output end of the resistance detector is communicated with the interior of the resistance detector. According to the anti-collision assembly of the artificial intelligence education robot, through cooperative use of the anti-collision mechanism, the protection assembly, the injury prevention mechanism, the regulation and control assembly and other mechanisms, the problems that how to prevent internal assemblies from being loosened and damaged due to collision of the robot and how to prevent children from being injured easily due to a broken display screen after the children collide with the screen are solved.

title: Subjective question automatic review deep learning method combining test question classification and score learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a subjective question automatic review deep learning method combining test question classification and scoring learning, and relates to the crossing field of artificial intelligence and intelligent education. Aiming at the characteristic that different types of subjective questions have different review modes, the subjective question automatic review neural network model can grasp test paper review methods of different types of test questions by combining test question classification and scoring learning, and the problem of subjective question automatic review is solved by a more effective method. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, performing test question classification on a to-be-reviewed subjective question through a product neural network to obtain a test question type of the to-be-reviewed subjective question; then, the test question type embedding of the subjective question to be reviewed is connected with the character embedding of the student answer input sequence and the character embedding of the standard answer input sequence, student answer input and standard answer input perceived by the test question type are obtained, and high-precision scoring is carried out through a hybrid model composed of convolution and a bidirectional long-short-term memory network.

title: Artificial intelligence education system applying big data
applicants: JIANGSU DINGAO EDUCATION TECH GROUP CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence education system applying big data, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence education. The system comprises a user registration module, a VR safety glasses device, a cloud server, a learning scene creation module, a VR lesson preparation module, an emotion monitoring module, a behavior feedback module and a block chain recording module. The output end of the user registration module is connected with the input end of the cloud server; the output end of the cloud server is connected with the input end of the VR safety glasses device; the output end of the VR safety glasses device is connected with the input end of the learning scene creating module; the output end of the learning scene creation module is connected with the input end of the VR lesson preparation module; the output end of the VR lesson preparation module is connected with the input end of the emotion monitoring module; and the output end of the behavior feedback module is connected with the input end of the block chain recording module.

title: ONLINE EDUCATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: An online educational system includes a load balancing reverse proxy server adapted to receive requests from a plurality of student clients and institution clients; a platform coupled to the server, the platform comprising supporting services including tuition and fee payment management, identity and role management, student application status management services; an analytical data warehouse and databases coupled to the platform; a data warehouse coupled to the analytical data warehouse; and a machine learning network coupled to the data warehouse to generate educational recommendations to help students learn.

title: Artificial intelligence education terminal
applicants: HUIWAN EDUCATION TECH DALIAN CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence education terminal which comprises a bottom plate, a terminal body is arranged on the top surface of the bottom plate, a shell is fixedly connected to the bottom surface of the bottom plate, mounting plates are fixedly connected to the positions, close to the bottom surface, of the left side wall and the right side wall of the terminal body, the mounting plates are arranged in an L shape, and a clamping mechanism is arranged in an inner cavity of the shell. Universal wheels are fixedly connected to the positions, close to the four corners, of the bottom face of the bottom plate, a dust cover is fixedly connected to the top face of the bottom plate, air cooling radiators are installed on the left inner wall and the right inner wall of the dust cover correspondingly, a plurality of heat dissipation holes are formed in the left side wall and the right side wall of the dust cover correspondingly, and a cover plate is movably connected to the top face of the dust cover. Through mutual cooperation of the bottom plate, the terminal body, the shell, the clamping mechanism and the like, the terminal body can be clamped and fixed, the problems of shaking, collision and the like caused by external force are prevented, meanwhile, convenient moving operation can be carried out through universal wheels, and the use convenience of the terminal is improved.

title: AI Online offline combined multidimensional education AI school system
abstract_text: The online-offline combined AI school system for multidimensional education: includes one playback host and one AI analysis host in a whole system for preparing and distributing hardware training; accurately identifies information such as face, expression, behavior, and posture of a specific individual in a video from all directions by multiple cameras by 4D full-angle skeletal detection technology for full-angle intelligent identification; supports video stream analysis by using a corresponding audio, through a two-dimensional identification and analysis method of an independent voice-assisted video, for integrating the audio and video of a two-dimensional educational content; collects and analyzes class and study data of each student to analyze a learning situation of each student and timely evaluates learning effect through big data statistics and monitoring; and builds various intelligent evaluation models in cooperation with famous schools to build an educational evaluation model. The system allows intelligent analysis, intelligent classification, intelligent processing, rational design, and effective improvement of learning effect.

title: Computer artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a computer artificial intelligence education robot which comprises a bottom box, a box door is hinged to one side of the front end of the bottom box, a supporting plate is fixedly connected to the upper end of the bottom box, a protection box is fixedly connected to the top end of the supporting plate, and a driving motor is fixedly connected to the top end of the protection box. A transmission assembly is arranged in one side of the protection box, and a protection seat is arranged in one side of the protection box. By the adoption of the structure, the spring is installed on one side of the protection plate, the protection plate can be attached to the robot display screen more tightly, the protection effect is improved, when the protection plate moves on the robot display screen, dust attached to the surface of the robot display screen in the using process can be brushed away through the cleaning brush, and the service life of the robot display screen is prolonged. And meanwhile, the moisture absorption pad is used for protecting the robot display screen and can absorb humid gas, protection on the robot display screen is further enhanced, and therefore education work can be better carried out.

title: Intelligent education target video big data retrieval method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent education target video big data retrieval method and system based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of data processing. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a reference video; screening to obtain a reference voice high-frequency vocabulary, a reference title high-frequency vocabulary and a reference key frame image; obtaining a to-be-detected video, and screening to obtain voice high-frequency vocabularies Judging whether the voice high-frequency vocabulary coincides with the reference voice high-frequency vocabulary or not, and if yes, identifying the home page and the last page of each segment of video to be detected; and judging whether the title vocabulary and the reference title high-frequency vocabulary coincide or not, if yes, performing key frame extraction, and calculating and judging whether the corresponding to-be-detected video is a target video or not according to the similarity between any one to-be-detected key frame image and any one reference key frame image. According to the method, data processing of multiple dimensions is carried out in combination with multiple artificial intelligence algorithms, and then efficient and accurate target video retrieval is carried out.

title: Artificial intelligence robotics instrument playing technology and music education system using the same
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence robotics instrument playing technology to provide customized music tutoring services to learners and tutors and a music education system using the same. According to the present invention, the artificial intelligence robotics instrument playing technology comprises the steps of, by a server: matching a learner device for performing augmented reality music tutoring with a tutor device on the basis of learner information transmitted from one or more learner devices and tutor information transmitted from one or more tutor devices; integrating learner environment information transmitted from the matched learner device and the matched tutor environment information transmitted from the tutor device; and generating real-time class data for a tutor on the basis of real-time learner data transmitted from the learner device. The real-time class data for a tutor includes voice data input in real time through the tutor device, operation data of the tutor, and state data of an instrument being played by the tutor.

title: Artificial intelligence robotics instrument playing technology and music education system using the same
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence robotics instrument playing technology and a music education system using the same that include a step of using real-time class data for a tutor generated by a tutor device and rendering an extended reality image of a learner device interacting with the tutor device on a display of the tutor device. The real-time class data includes voice data input in real time through the tutor device, motion data of a tutor, and state data of an instrument being played by the tutor.

title: Visual education robot cat based on AI intelligence
applicants: WUHAN TANGTANG INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of robotic cats, and particularly discloses an AI intelligence-based visual education robotic cat, which comprises a robotic cat main body and a robotic cat head, the robotic cat head is arranged at the top of the robotic cat main body, the robotic cat head is provided with an eye component and a voice unit, and the voice unit is connected with the eye component and the voice unit. The eye component comprises a shell and an eyeball unit; the eye assembly is installed on the head of the robot cat, the shell in the eye assembly is used for limiting the eyeball unit, meanwhile, the lamp holder and the infrared distance measuring sensor are installed on the eyeball unit, and the lamp holder is used for lighting a child during learning. The distance between the child and the robot cat main body is monitored in cooperation with the infrared distance measuring sensor, and when it is found that the distance between the child and the robot cat main body is too close, the voice unit is started to conduct voice reminding on the child.

title: Garbage classification propaganda and education and throwing supervision system based on visual AI technology
applicants: GUANGZHOU DINGSHUO ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a garbage classification propaganda and education and throwing supervision system based on a visual AI technology, which comprises a supervision system body, the supervision system body comprises an acquisition camera, the top of the acquisition camera is fixedly provided with a fixing plate, and the bottom of the fixing plate is fixedly connected with a blocking and protecting self-cleaning mechanism; the blocking and protecting self-cleaning mechanism comprises a round pipe fixed to the bottom of the fixing plate in a threaded mode, the collecting camera is located on the left side in the round pipe, the round pipe is rotationally sleeved with a transparent round box with an opening in the top, and a water tank is fixedly installed on the inner wall of the right side of the round pipe. The inner side and the outer side of the transparent round box can be automatically wiped and cleaned at regular time, manual regular cleaning is not needed, time and labor are saved, manpower resources are saved, the transparent round box is cleaned on the right side of the acquisition camera, the phenomenon that the acquisition camera is shielded during cleaning can be avoided, the acquisition camera and the transparent round box do not interfere with each other, and cleaning efficiency is improved. And use requirements are met.

title: DEVICE AND METHOD FOR ASSOCIATING A USER TO AN OPTIMAL JOB OFFER
abstract_text: The invention relates to a device (1) for providing to a user information on at least one job offer based on the analysis of the user's information associated to its career, qualifications and education, said device (1) comprising: at least one input configured to receive: at least one structured text comprising the user's information associated to his career, qualifications and education; a list of job offers comprising, for each job offer, at least one qualification and at least one skill required for the associated job offer; a list of available qualifications associated to the job offers of the list of job offers; at least one processor configured to: estimate at least one skill of the user using a previously trained first machine learning algorithm configured to receive as input the at least one structured text and provide as output at least one skill; for each available qualification from the list of available qualifications that is not already acquired by the user, evaluate an effort score representing an effort for the user to obtain said available qualification and, using the estimated at least one skill of the user, evaluate at least one missing skill of the user necessary to obtain said available qualification; compute a matching score between the user and each of the job offer in the list of job offers using a binary classification machine learning model; apply at least one predefined rule based on the matching score and/or said effort score, so as to obtain at least one proposition of job offer chosen from the list of job offers.

title: Simulation system for voyage and method thereof
applicants: UNIV TONGMYONG IND ACAD COOP FOUND [KR]
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a system and a method for providing voyage simulation. The system for providing voyage simulation includes a voyage education content management server which generates and stores voyage education content; a simulation streaming server which provides, in a streaming method, voyage simulation content of a difficulty corresponding to the maneuverability of a user to a user device through a network; and an artificial intelligence evaluation server which evaluates the suitability of mission performance using the manipulation state of the user device as an input function, and then automatically matches voyage simulation content of a difficulty corresponding to the maneuverability of the user. According to the present invention, the skill of a trainee can be gradually increased.

title: Smart health management game device for performing smart health management game
abstract_text: A smart health management game device for playing a smart health management game is disclosed. The smart health management device, according to an embodiment of the present invention, is a smart health management device for playing a smart health management game, which provides programming education on artificial intelligence (AI)-based machine learning and coding easily and efficiently through a smart robot that moves in response to a user's health motion to encourage students to actively participate in classes and helps the students understand the principles of AI-based machine learning and coding in a fun way. In addition, the smart health management game device for playing a smart health management game, according to an embodiment of the present invention, allows users to pose various exercise postures while playing the game, improving the user's health.

title: Robot logistics game device for performing robot logistics game method
abstract_text: A robot logistics game device for playing a robot logistics game is disclosed. The robot logistics game device, according to an embodiment of the present invention, comprises: a game board on which a robot logistics game in which first to fourth users participate is performed; and first to fourth game devices corresponding to each of the first to fourth users. The game board comprises: a center area; and a border area surrounding the center area, wherein the border area is divided into a first area, a second area, a third area, and a fourth area. The first area displays a first color, the second area displays a second color, the third area displays a third color, and the fourth area displays a fourth color. The first color, the second color, the third color, and the fourth color are different colors, and the central area comprises a circulation path. The first to fourth users play a game of moving a block having a color indicated by each area, and a result obtained by recognizing a QR code displayed by a plurality of blocks together and a moving distance of the first to fourth game devices are input as game results. The robot logistics game device can easily and efficiently provide programming education for artificial intelligence (AI)-based machine learning and coding, thereby inducing students' active participation in classes. Accordingly, students can be supported to understand the principles of AI-based machine learning and coding in a fun way, and learning efficiency can be further improved.

title: An artificial intelligence system that improves the user's expressive ability by supplementing the lack of expression in the user's document through feedback from the user
abstract_text: The present invention is to provide an artificial intelligence system which evaluates picture similarity between picture data of a user that the user directly draws by looking at picture data of an educator and picture data of the educator through learning of an artificial intelligence model and then can analyze precise expression abilities of the user based on the picture similarity. And, the present invention is to provide the artificial intelligence system which allows the artificial intelligence model to compensate for a portion in which expressions are insufficient from a document that a user writes through feedback with the user so as to increase expression abilities of the user through synergistic education in which art education and writing education.

title: A system for evaluating drawing skills to provide customized art education curriculum based on an artificial intelligence model
abstract_text: The present invention provides a method automated within a short time without time and place restrictions through learning of an artificial intelligence model to provide a user with a customized art education curriculum at the expression ability level. The purpose is to provide an artificial intelligence system which allows a user to evaluate the picture skills of the user through picture data generated by the user.

title: Campus myopia screening and monitoring system for children and adolescents and dynamic prevention and control system building method
abstract_text: The invention discloses a children and adolescent campus myopia screening and monitoring system and a dynamic prevention and control system building method. According to the method, firstly, vision health medical knowledge science popularization propaganda columns are fixedly pasted to the middle positions of the two sides, close to a door, of the inner wall of a system; an AI intelligent data interaction management platform is arranged on the left side of the system inner wall; propaganda words are pasted on the two sides of the AI intelligent data interaction management platform, and a visual protection engineering national oriented preaching column is built on the right side of the wall of the inner wall of the system. A preaching platform is fixedly built on the right side edge of the AI intelligent data interaction management platform; a desk, a visual light eye protection lamp and a special visual protection chair are fixedly mounted on the right side of the preaching platform; a desk and a visual light eye protection lamp are arranged; according to the myopia screening monitoring system and the dynamic prevention and control system, comprehensive prevention and control, scientific prevention and control, accurate prevention and control and effective prevention and control are achieved, a life and learning mode, an education management mechanism and a good social environment beneficial to vision health of teenagers are formed, and the vision health level of the teenagers is practically improved.

title: Intelligent education automatic paper marking method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to an intelligent education automatic paper marking method and system based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: respectively obtaining student answers of subjective questions and a plurality of sentences of corresponding standard answers; extracting an initial global semantic feature of each sentence by using an LSTM network; distributing an initialization weight for each word of the sentence based on the sentence component to obtain a semantic feature of each sentence; training a full-connection neural network by using the initial global semantic features and the semantic features; intercepting the sentences according to the weight of each word vector in the long sentences obtained by the full-connection neural network, and inputting the intercepted sentences into the LSTM network to obtain global semantic features; and obtaining a scoring result of the subjective questions according to the similarity of global semantic features between sentences in the student answers and the standard answers. According to the method, the long sentence is intercepted according to the weight of each word in the sentence based on the sentence components, so that the loss of semantic features of the intercepted long sentence is minimum, and the error of a subjective question scoring result is reduced.

title: Vertical farm recovery game device for performing vertical farm recovery game method
abstract_text: Provided is a vertical farm recovery game device for performing a vertical farm recovery game. The vertical farm recovery game comprises: a first mission which supplies light of a specific wavelength region to a vertical farm; a second mission which supplies water to the vertical farm; and a third mission which circulates air of the vertical farm. The vertical farm recovery game device according to an embodiment comprises: the vertical farm; a first game device which performs the first mission; a second game device which performs the second mission; a third game device which performs the third mission; and a computing device which outputs an explanation video for the first mission to the third mission, outputs a user environment for inputting a result of the first mission and a user environment for inputting a result of the third mission, and controls the vertical farm. The present invention easily and efficiently provides programming education for artificial intelligence (AI) based machine learning and coding through the game for performing various missions to recover the vertical farm. By inducing active class participation of students through various mission games, the students can understand principles of AI based machine learning and the coding in a fun way.

title: LEARNING KIT FOR CODING AND AI EDUCATION
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a learning kit for coding and artificial intelligence education. More specifically, the learning kit for education includes: any one driving device selected from the group including drones, self-driving model cars, robots, and classifiers; and an educational board including a microcontroller (MCU) which controls the driving device by a code written in a user terminal writing a code for controlling an operation of the driving device using artificial intelligence by using a programming language for coding and artificial intelligence education. According to the learning kit for coding and artificial intelligence education proposed in the present invention, by including the driving device and the educational board, a learner directly assembles the driving device according to a project and writes code using a programming language, and experiences the actual control of the driving device through the educational board according to the written code. Accordingly, the learner can learn the principles of product development and feel a sense of accomplishment by directly applying coding and artificial intelligence.

title: MOCROBIT EXPANSION BOARD FOR CODING AND AI EDUCATION
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a micro:bit expansion board for coding and artificial intelligence education. More specifically, the present invention relates to a micro:bit expansion board for expanding the functions of micro:bit. The micro:bit expansion board includes: a substrate; a connector unit to which micro:bit is connected; a PWM connection unit for extending the use range of a PWM signal of the micro:bit by embedding a PWM control driver in the substrate; a 3-pin connection unit directly connected to a wire connection unit of the micro:bit and composed of a plurality of pins so that external hardware can be connected without soldering; a plurality of motor connection units capable of connecting a motor by including a motor driver; and a power connection unit for supplying power. According to the micro:bit expansion board for coding and artificial intelligence education proposed in the present invention, the micro:bit is connected to the substrate through the connection unit, and various sensors and actuators can be easily connected and used by using the PWM connection unit, the 3-pin connection unit, and the motor connection units. Accordingly, it is possible to develop complex educational projects, such as using a plurality of motors.

title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SYSTEM AND METHOD OF THEREOF FOR ONLINE WRITING EDUCATION
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence system for online writing education and a method thereof, which improve the writing ability of a user. The artificial intelligence system for online writing education and the method thereof collect an education course, a search history, and an SNS post writing record of a user and posts of other users written or liked by the user on the web through artificial intelligence, recommend a writing type based on collected data to increase the interest of the user in writing, recommend and generate a table of contents in accordance with the writing type and keywords when the user writes, and recommend sentences in order of relevance by combining the keywords. The user compares the sentences and improves sentence-writing skills. The completed writing is scored and evaluated with other grouped users. Feedback and points can be exchanged through guidance and reviews from other higher-level users.

title: AR System for providing real-time costume replacement contents with AR beam project
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a real-time clothes change content providing system. The real-time clothes change content providing system includes: a user terminal in which a dedicated application including a character clothes drawing function to draw user character clothes is installed; a generation server, when receiving user picture data drawn by a user through the character clothes drawing function of the dedicated application from the user terminal, generating an artificial intelligence-based three-dimensional clothes model about the received user picture data, and providing the generated three-dimensional clothes model to an AR beam projector; and the AR beam projector projecting an augmented reality (AR) screen on a projection area of content formed as an actual object, while projecting the AR screen employing the three-dimensional clothes model received from the generation server. In accordance with the present invention, since a two-dimensional original picture inputted directly from a user is generated into a three-dimensional model to be applied to AR content in real time, the user can have more interest, and an AR content-related education function can be enhanced.

title: Carrying device of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a carrying device of an artificial intelligence education robot. A rotary table seat is installed at the upper end of a base, and limiting blocks are installed on the periphery of the rotary table seat; a rotary table is fixed to the upper end of the rotary table base through a bearing, a cavity is formed in the rotary table base, a rotating motor is installed in the cavity, and an output shaft of the rotating motor is connected with the rotary table. A driving arm is fixed at the upper end of the rotary table through a rotating shaft connected with an output shaft of a driving motor through a coupler; the upper end of the driving arm is connected with the main arm through a hinge, the right end of the main arm is connected with the mechanical claw connecting base through a hinge, and the supporting plate is installed at the lower end of the mechanical claw connecting base. A hydraulic cylinder is fixed on the supporting plate; a leveling plate is mounted at the lower end of the hydraulic cylinder; the leveling plate is connected with a side claw through a hinge, a rubber sleeve is arranged on the side claw, and the side claw is connected with the vertical supporting plate through a hinge. The object placing levelness can be corrected, the object is prevented from inclining, and the object carrying stability is improved.

title: Innovative education evaluation method, system and device and storage medium thereof
applicants: KUNSHAN JIUZI MINGTANG ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an innovative education evaluation method, and the method comprises the steps: collecting student information data which comprises student identity information, student basic scores and activity information; performing classification conversion on the student information data through deep learning to obtain student quality and ability information; and performing data analysis on the quality capability information to form a visual data board for viewing. The innovative education evaluation method provided by the invention can replace a traditional education evaluation method which takes scores as the principal thing, and grasp the quality and ability conditions of students in different dimensions through a visual quality and ability report card.

title: Method and apparatus for multiplexing channel state information
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th_ Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. Methods and apparatuses for multiplexing channel state information (CSI). A user equipment (UE) includes a transceiver configured to receive configuration information for CSI reporting. The UE further includes a processor configured to decode the configuration information and calculate a CSI according to the configuration information. The transceiver is further configured to transmit the calculated CSI on an uplink (UL) channel. The CSI includes N segments and is transmitted in one slot, where N>1. A first of the N segments includes a rank indicator (RI) and at least one other CSI parameter. A base station (BS) includes a processor configured to generate configuration information for CSI reporting. The BS further includes a transceiver configured to transmit, to a UE, the configuration information via a downlink (DL) channel; and receive, from the UE, a CSI report calculated in accordance with the configuration information on an uplink UL channel 18834483_1 (GHMatters) P111072.AU.1

title: Personalized recommendation system based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of video recommendation system design, particularly relates to a personalized recommendation system based on deep learning, and aims to solve the problem that it is difficult for a user to select favorite contents from massive videos in the background technology, and the personalized recommendation system comprises a user interest module, a recommendation object module and a recommendation algorithm module, the module 1 (the user interest module) mainly has the following three modes: (1) personal information filled during registration of a user mainly comprises the name of the user, the occupational area of the user, the birth month, the personal income, the highest education background and the like; according to the system, the leading network video transmission technology is adopted, videos are played clearly and smoothly, the website comprises mass video content, the video content can be continuously updated, and a personalized video recommendation system is designed for the video website for solving the problem that a user is difficult to select favorite content from the mass videos, so that the user experience is improved. The required video is recommended to the user, and the satisfaction degree of the user to the website is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence Internet education data processing system
abstract_text: The invention provides an artificial intelligence Internet education data processing system, and the system comprises a first obtaining unit which is used for collecting and obtaining the learning ability information of a plurality of students, and obtaining a plurality of learning ability information sets; the first processing unit is used for setting a plurality of different learning resources; the second obtaining unit is used for collecting and obtaining the learning state information of the first student and adjusting the learning ability information set; the second processing unit is used for recommending and learning learning resources according to the adjusted learning ability information set; the third processing unit is used for setting and obtaining first assessment standard information; the third obtaining unit is used for examining the first student by adopting the first examination standard information to obtain first learning examination information; and the fourth processing unit is used for performing chain type storage on the first learning assessment information and the learning progress information of the first student according to the learning effect in the first learning assessment information.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR PREDICTIVE BEAM MANAGEMENT
abstract_text: The disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. A method of operating a user equipment (UE) includes receiving configuration information for transmission configuration indication (TCI) states; receiving information indicating a number of TCI states and a number of corresponding TCI state application times; and determining, for one or more TCI states in the number of TCI states, at least one of downlink (DL) quasi-co-location (QCL) properties for DL communication and an uplink (UL) spatial domain filter for UL communication.

title: AI digital human sentiment analysis method based on multiple modes
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI digital human sentiment analysis method based on multiple modes, which comprises the following steps: S1, facial expression recognition and sentiment judgment are carried out, and a result a is output and input into a multi-mode sentiment analysis module; s2, voice emotion recognition and judgment are carried out, and a result e is output to a multi-mode emotion analysis module; s3, text emotion recognition and judgment are carried out, and a result f is output to a multi-mode emotion analysis module; and S4, in a multi-mode sentiment analysis module, performing sentiment random combination judgment on the results a, e and f, taking an average probability value of a random sentiment combination condition as a final sentiment judgment result g, and outputting the final sentiment judgment result g to the AI digital human. According to the method, the emotional state of the user is judged through multiple modes, the emotional state of the user can be grasped most comprehensively and accurately, the meaning expressed by the user can be grasped accurately, and the method is not only suitable for a chat robot in a financial scene, but also can be used as a chat robot in other vertical fields such as medical treatment, education and service fields.

title: METHOD DEVICE AND SYSTEM FOR PROVIDING FOREIGN LANGUAGE EDUCATION CONTENTS SERVICE BASED ON VOICE RECOGNITION USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
