abstract_text: 일실시예에 따른 장치는 외국어 교육 콘텐츠 서비스에 등록된 제1 사용자의 접속 요청에 응답하여, 미리 정의된 레벨들 중 제1 사용자의 레벨을 획득하고, 미리 정의된 난이도들 중 획득된 레벨에 대응하는 제1 난이도를 획득하고, 제1 난이도에 대응하는 제1 교육 콘텐츠를 제1 사용자의 제1 사용자 단말로 제공하고, 제1 교육 콘텐츠를 재생하는 제1 사용자 단말로부터 제1 사용자의 제1 음성을 수신하고, 제1 음성에 대응하는 제1 문장의 제1 텍스트를 생성하고, 제1 텍스트로부터 적어도 하나의 단어 및 형태소를 추출하고, 단어들 및 형태소들 사이의 매칭도들을 기록한 데이터베이스를 이용하여 추출된 단어 및 형태소 사이의 매칭도를 생성하고, 제1 문장 내 단어에 부여되어 미리 정의된 가중치를 생성된 매칭도에 적용하여 제1 문장의 오류율을 생성하고, 기 생성된 오류율이 미리 설정한 제1 기준 오류율 보다 작은지 여부를 판단하고, 생성된 오류율이 제1 기준 오류율 보다 작은 경우, 제1 문장이 정확하다고 판단하고, 생성된 오류율이 제1 기준 오류율 보다 큰 경우, 제1 문장이 부정확한 것으로 판단하고, 제1 문장이 부정확 경우, 제1 사용자 단말로 제1 문장에 대응하는 단어 및 문장의 음성 콘텐츠를 제공하고, 제1 사용자 단말로부터 제2 음성을 수신할 수 있다.

title: CODING ROBOT FOR EDUCATION ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: 본 발명은 인공지능교육에 필요한 다양한 기기가 결합될 수 있는 로봇에 관한 것으로서, 이를 위하여 중앙제어유닛을 구비하는 로봇 본체와, 상기 로봇 본체의 전면부에 형성된 삽입홈과, 상기 로봇 본체의 전면부의 형상에 대응되는 형상을 가지며, 상기 삽입홈에 대응되는 본체의 내측면에 형성되는 결합수단 및 인공지능 교육에 필요한 제 1 기기가 장착되는 기기 장착홈을 구비하는 기기장착용 부재를 포함하며, 상기 기기 장착홈에 상기 제 1 기기가 장착됨에 따라 상기 제 1 기기가 상기 중앙제어유닛에 연결되고, 상기 기기장착용 부재의 결합수단이 상기 삽입홈에 끼움 결합되는 인공지능 교육용 코딩 로봇을 제공할 수 있다.

title: AI-BASED PATIENT EDUCATION VIDEO PROVIDING METHOD AND SYSTEM
abstract_text: 본 발명은 인공지능 기반의 환자 교육 동영상 제공 방법 및 시스템에 관한 것으로서, 보다 구체적으로는 환자 교육 동영상 제공 방법으로서, (1) 복수의 환자 교육 동영상을 진단과 학습 진도에 따라 분류하여 데이터베이스 모듈에 저장하는 단계; (2) 외래 접수가 되면 접수한 환자의 환자 정보를 수신하는 단계; (3) 상기 수신한 환자 정보에 포함된 진단 정보 및 진도 정보를 이용해, 인공지능 알고리즘을 통해 상기 데이터베이스 모듈에 저장된 환자 교육 동영상 중에서 해당 환자에게 제공할 환자 교육 동영상을 선정하는 단계; (4) 상기 단계 (3)에서 선정한 환자 교육 동영상을 시청할 수 있는 링크를 해당 환자의 환자 디바이스에 제공하는 단계; (5) 상기 제공된 링크를 이용한 동영상 시청이 완료되면, 상기 환자 디바이스로부터 피드백을 수신하는 단계; 및 (6) 상기 수신한 피드백을 이용해 상기 환자 정보에 포함된 진도 정보를 업데이트하여 저장하는 단계를 포함하며, 상기 단계 (3)에서는, 환자별로 저장된 상기 진도 정보에 맞추어 상기 학습 진도에 따라 상기 환자 교육 동영상을 선정하는 것을 그 구성상의 특징으로 한다. 또한, 본 발명은 인공지능 기반의 환자 교육 동영상 제공 방법 및 시스템에 관한 것으로서, 보다 구체적으로는 환자 교육 동영상 제공 시스템으로서, 복수의 환자 교육 동영상을 질환과 학습 진도에 따라 분류하여 저장하는 데이터베이스 모듈; 외래 접수가 되면 접수한 환자의 환자 정보를 수신하는 정보 수신 모듈; 상기 수신한 환자 정보에 포함된 진단 정보 및 진도 정보를 이용해, 인공지능 알고리즘을 통해 상기 데이터베이스 모듈에 저장된 환자 교육 동영상 중에서 해당 환자에게 제공할 환자 교육 동영상을 선정하는 동영상 선정 모듈; 상기 동영상 선정 모듈이 선정한 환자 교육 동영상을 시청할 수 있는 링크를 해당 환자의 환자 디바이스에 제공하는 링크 제공 모듈; 상기 제공된 링크를 이용한 동영상 시청이 완료되면, 상기 환자 디바이스로부터 피드백을 수신하는 피드백 수신 모듈; 및 상기 수신한 피드백을 이용해 상기 환자 정보에 포함된 진도 정보를 업데이트하여 저장하는 정보 업데이트 모듈을 포함하며, 상기 동영상 수신 모듈은, 환자별로 저장된 상기 진도 정보에 맞추어 상기 학습 진도에 따라 상기 환자 교육 동영상을 선정하는 것을 그 구성상의 특징으로 한다. 본 발명에서 제안하고 있는 인공지능 기반의 환자 교육 동영상 제공 방법 및 시스템에 따르면, 환자 외래 방문 시 진료대기 시간을 활용해 개별 환자의 진단 결과와 진도에 따라 각 환자에게 필요한 환자 교육 동영상을 제공하여, 지루한 대기 시간에 실질적인 환자 교육이 이루어질 수 있도록 하고, 각종 설명을 해야 하는 의료진의 부담을 줄여줄 수 있으며, 환자의 질환과 치료과정에 대한 환자의 이해도를 높이고, 환자의 치료에도 실질적인 도움을 줄 수 있다. 또한, 본 발명에서 제안하고 있는 인공지능 기반의 환자 교육 동영상 제공 방법 및 시스템에 따르면, 인공지능 알고리즘을 이용해 각 환자에게 제공할 환자 교육 동영상을 선정하되, 동영상 시청을 완료한 환자로부터 피드백을 받아 인공지능 알고리즘을 업데이트함으로써, 환자에게 실질적인 도움이 되는 환자 교육 동영상을 선정하여 동영상에 대한 환자의 만족도를 높일 수 있다.

title: Artificial intelligence courseware making method and device based on hyper-parameter evaluation graph algorithm
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence courseware making method and device based on a hyper-parameter evaluation graph algorithm, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence. According to the invention, with the help of a modularized and modularized low-code development platform, a data component, a model component and a visual component are added into a practical training project according to a dragging instruction of a user on a functional component on the low-code development platform in a practical training project creation link; the method comprises the following steps: establishing a practical training project, establishing a topological connection relationship among functional components of the practical training project according to a link establishment instruction input by a user, and finally performing code completion and generating an executable file, thereby creating an artificial intelligence practical training project with a visualization function online, and further associating and integrating with manuscript courseware created by the user to generate artificial intelligence courseware. Interactive curriculum making and development can be achieved, artificial intelligence practical training requirements in the education industry can be met without coding or using a small number of codes, teachers can use visual tools to develop courseware of themselves, and code writing work is omitted.

title: Decommissioned soldier occupational planning method and system based on big data
applicants: JUNJIAFU BEIJING SCIENCE AND TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of occupational planning, and particularly provides a decommissioned soldier occupational planning method and system based on big data, and the method comprises the steps: finding suitable soldier post data according to an occupational classification lexicon, and constructing an own knowledge graph; the method comprises the following steps: capturing recruitment website data by using a Scrapy distributed crawler; and cleaning the recruitment website data according to the knowledge graph so that the posts belong to the specific industry and are displayed. According to the scheme, through artificial intelligence and a big data technology, ten millions of post data suitable for the decommissioned soldiers in employment markets across the country are acquired and analyzed, so that the decommissioned soldiers clearly know post demands, correctly evaluate their ability and make educational education, skill training or employment and entrepreneurship choices. By comprehensively adopting computer science and technology, statistical management of enterprise resources is facilitated, so that competitive employment opportunities are provided for decommissioned soldiers every year, development of social political economy is greatly promoted, human errors can be reduced due to intelligence, and the system is accurate and convenient.

title: Card punching method based on AI image recognition technology
applicants: JIANGXI JUNLAN CULTURAL DEVELOPMENT LTD COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of card punching, in particular to a card punching method based on an AI image recognition technology. The invention provides a card punching method based on an AI image recognition technology. The card punching method based on the AI image recognition technology comprises the following steps: S001) a merchant logs in a merchant end application program; s002) the merchant enters a new task page; s003) a merchant edits a task title, a task brief introduction and basic text information through a merchant end application program, and publicity information of the task is displayed on a user end application program; and S004) the merchant collects task position information and task images through the merchant end application program. Social activities such as culture, education, sports, competition and tourism are combined with school education to form an extracurricular practice task, imperceptible supervision and promotion are realized through the card punching method of the AI image recognition technology, and education forms such as culture experience and social communication are endowed to extracurricular practice, so that the card punching method obtains deeper and longer experience feeling, and interestingness is improved.

title: Education service providing method and apparatus using artificial intelligence-based satellite image
applicants: COLLABORATIVE INNOVATION TECH FOR JOINT STOCK AGENCY
abstract_text: The invention provides a service providing device using satellite images. The service provision device using satellite images comprises: a satellite image information acquisition unit for acquiring satellite images; an object extraction unit that analyzes the satellite image, extracts an object from the satellite image, and generates an object image corresponding to the object; a storage unit for storing a satellite image and a target image; and a service processing unit which, on the basis of at least one of the satellite image and the object image, provides a service extracted on the basis of the object and encoded data relating to the service extracted on the basis of the object. A method for identifying and classifying different types of objects and buildings located on the surface of the earth is provided through image data related to the surface of the earth.

title: Illegal behavior AI identification system
applicants: SICHUAN TIANWING NETWORK SERVICE CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an illegal behavior AI identification system comprising a plurality of monitoring environments, a plurality of monitoring devices are arranged in the monitoring environments, the monitoring devices are connected with a server, the server is connected with a behavior identification device through a data transmission device, the monitoring devices at least comprise a high-definition camera and an NVR, and the data transmission device is connected with the behavior identification device. The server at least comprises a big data server, a GPU server and a video frame extraction server, the data transmission device adopts a campus video network or an education private network, and the behavior recognition device comprises a target detection device, a target tracking device and a posture recognition device. The system is simple to operate, easy to learn and use, convenient for a user to manage and maintain, and capable of improving the illegal behavior identification precision; the structure is simple, the cost is low, and market popularization is facilitated.

title: Online classroom student concentration evaluation method and system based on multi-feature fusion
abstract_text: The invention provides an online classroom student concentration evaluation method and system based on multi-feature fusion, and belongs to the field of education informatization and artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: extracting seven features, which influence concentration evaluation, of eye closing times, eye closing duration, yawn times, head turning times, head turning duration, head lowering times and head lowering duration from an online class video clip of a target object, and manually carrying out concentration grade labeling to make a data set; training a deep learning model through the data set until the effect is optimal, and storing the trained model; in practical application, the system is deployed at a teacher end or a server end, and when a teacher takes a class online, 7 parameter values in video clips of a target object in the class online are obtained and input into a trained model, so that the concentration level of the target object can be predicted. And a threshold value is set to remind the teacher of the state of the student, and reference is provided for online class of the teacher.

title: AI AI MULTI-FOCUSING FOR ONLINE EDUCATION PARTICIPATION CONFIRMATION OF LEARNER AND METHOD PERFORMING THEREOF
abstract_text: 본 발명의 일 실시예에 따른 학습자의 온라인 교육 참여 확인을 위한 AI 멀티포커싱 시스템은 오프라인 수업 공간의 천정에 오프라인 수업 공간의 전면 벽상을 향해 형성되어 오프라인 화이트 보드 상의 강의 내용 및 오프라인 화이트 보드 앞에서 강의를 진행하는 교수자의 모습을 촬영하여 학습 동영상을 생성하는 영상 촬영 장치, 상기 수업자 단말로부터 수업자 인증 절차를 통해 수업자 인증 정보를 수신하면 상기 수업자 정보 데이터베이스를 기초로 상기 수업자 인증 정보에 대한 제1 인증을 실행한 후 상기 제1 인증이 성공되면 상기 수업자 단말로부터 수업자 동영상을 수신하고, 상기 수업자 동영상을 이용하여 상기 수업자의 얼굴이 미리 저장된 얼굴과 동일한지 제2 인증을 실행하고, 상기 제2 인증 결과에 따라 상기 영상 촬영 장치에 의해 촬영된 학습 동영상을 상기 수업자 단말에 제공되도록 하는 원격 강의 서버 및 상기 수업자 인증 절차를 통해 수업자 인증 정보를 입력하여 상기 원격 강의 서버에 제공하고, 상기 수업자 인증 정보를 기초로 수행된 제1 인증에 성공되면 수업자 동영상을 디코딩하여 상기 원격 강의 서버에 제공하고, 상기 수업자 동영상을 기초로 수행된 제2 인증에 성공되면 상기 영상 촬영 장치로부터 수신된 학습 동영상을 표시하는 수업자 단말을 포함한다.

title: SPEECH SYNTHESIS METHOD AND APPARATUS, DEVICE, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: The present application relates to the field of artificial intelligence. Disclosed are a speech synthesis method and apparatus, a computer device, and a computer-readable storage medium. The method comprises: obtaining text to be synthesized; converting said text into graph embedding vector information by means of a speech synthesis model; encoding the graph embedding vector information according to a graph encoder to generate corresponding first intermediate vector information; generating corresponding Mel Spectrogram information according to the first intermediate vector information; and outputting speech synthesis information corresponding to the Mel Spectrogram information. Specific semantic information of text information is analyzed by means of a graph-assisted encoder to implement mapping to different speech rhythms, such that the process of rhythm adjustment becomes a full-automatic process, and the accuracy of speech synthesis is improved. In addition, the present application also relates to the blockchain technology, and the present application is applicable to the fields of smart government affairs, smart education, smart healthcare and the like, thereby further promoting construction of smart cities.

title: Infant early education image recognition system based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of deep learning, in particular to an infant early education image recognition system based on deep learning, a user only needs to photograph and upload through a client to complete image recognition, a collected image is transmitted into an image description network through a server, image features are rapidly extracted through a convolutional neural network, and the image features are extracted through a deep learning algorithm. Important details in the image are extracted through an attention mechanism, irrelevant information is rejected, text description is generated through a recurrent neural network and fed back to a client side, voice broadcasting is achieved through the TTS voice synthesis technology, information transmitted to children is more diversified, richer and more specific, a traditional learning mode is broken through, and the learning efficiency is improved. In addition, the user can collect and preset pictures by himself/herself according to his/her needs, which is more flexible and convenient.

title: Trolley for artificial intelligence education of primary and secondary school students
applicants: WEIZHOU SCIENCE AND TECH EDUCATION CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a dolly for artificial intelligence education of primary and secondary school students, which comprises a dolly body, the top of the dolly body is fixedly provided with an instruction device, one end of the bottom of the inner side of the dolly body is fixedly provided with two parallel battery jars, batteries are arranged in the battery jars, one end of each battery is provided with a driving assembly, and the other end of each battery is provided with a driving motor. A loudspeaker is arranged at one end of the battery groove, a control circuit board is fixedly installed on the inner side of the upper shell, and a main control chip, a voice IC chip, a starting control module, a clearing control module, a pause control module, a Bluetooth module and a clock controller are sequentially arranged on the control circuit board. According to the utility model, instructions can be directly output to the trolley body through the instructor and the gesture sensor, so that the operation difficulty is reduced, the use is more flexible and convenient, programming is realized without depending on a computer, a screen and specific program compiling software, and the purpose of exercising logical thinking and mathematical thinking abilities of children is achieved.

title: DATA-ADAPTIVE INSIGHT AND ACTION PLATFORM FOR HIGHER EDUCATION
abstract_text: An automation analytics system and method for building analytical models for an education application uses data-availability segments of students, which are clustered into segment clusters, to create the analytical models for the segment clusters using a machine learning process. The analytical models can be used to identify at least at least actionable insights.

title: Anti-external damage intelligent early warning method for reducing line tripping
applicants: LICHANG POWER SUPPLY COMPANY OF HENAN POWER COMPANY OF STATE GRID
abstract_text: The invention discloses an external damage prevention intelligent early warning method for reducing line tripping, which adopts an automobile data recorder, mobile phone software and a computer background system to form an early warning system, the automobile data recorder performs video acquisition and GPS (Global Positioning System) real-time accurate positioning on a construction vehicle, and data is fed back to the computer background system; the system carries out vehicle behavior recognition, a danger alarm is given out for a judged suspicious vehicle through an automobile data recorder, background monitoring personnel carries out telephone safety reminding, patrol personnel carry out management and control on site, dangerous construction of the vehicle is stopped in time through multiple measures, and mobile phone software is used for building a construction vehicle demand information free issuing platform. According to mastering construction vehicle information, electric power safety education is carried out regularly, the safety awareness of constructors is improved, construction vehicle driving behavior analysis is carried out on big data of an early warning system in the later period by adopting an AI algorithm, and the early warning accuracy is continuously improved; the method has the advantages that early warning is accurate and timely, the early warning effect is good, and construction safety is effectively guaranteed.

title: 1:1 A learning system that provides final learning with similar and advanced questions provided by artificial intelligence after 1:1 imaging classes with a tutor who wants to take a picture and register.
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a personalized learning system based on artificial intelligence (AI) technology. According to the present invention, when a problem that a user does not know occurs while the user solves a math problem on a knowledge sharing platform connected to the Internet, the user captures an image of the problem and registers the problem with a smart device while specifies a desired tutor, so that a platform server system sends an alarm to tutors and gives a right to respond to a tutor who applied for an answer first among the tutors who received the alarm. When the tutor requests giving an answer, the tutor is connected to the user who asked the problem 1 : 1 through a video education solution and shares and solves the math problem through interactive conversation and writing. At the end of the class, similar problems with the same unit and difficulty as those of the asked problem are provide by an AI system, so that the user performs review while solving the problems. After the review, the user can improve skills through advanced problems with the same unit but with a higher level of difficulty.

title: An artificial intelligence system to provide synergistic education linked to drawing skill evaluation and art education and writing education
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence (AI) system for providing synergistic education linked to drawing skill evaluation, art education, and writing education to improve a user's expression ability. According to the present invention, the AI system comprises: a communication unit; a user interface providing an interactive environment to a user, who is a learner, and providing picture data generated by a second user, who is an educator, received through the communication unit to the user; an art competency evaluation unit presenting a picture subject for the picture data to the user as a problem and evaluating the user's art competency with an art competency score calculated after analyzing whether the picture data generated by the user fits the picture subject; a picture similarity evaluation unit presenting the picture data of the second user for guiding the user to the user and extracting features from the picture data generated by the user and the picture data of the second user to evaluate picture similarity between the picture data generated by the user and the picture data generated by the second user; and a keyword and feature point extraction unit analyzing a document generated by the user to include text and picture data for synergy education linked with art education and writing education so as to extract a core keyword of the text and an object of picture data corresponding to the core keyword and performing feedback with the user about the core keyword and object.

title: AI education learning desk for campus
abstract_text: The invention discloses a school AI education learning desk, and relates to the field of school appliances, the school AI education learning desk comprises a book chamber, desk legs are fixed on two sides of the book chamber, a protection box is fixed on the upper part of the interior of the book chamber, a first bevel gear is rotatably connected to the interior of the protection box, a second bevel gear is engaged with the upper part of the first bevel gear, and the upper part of the second bevel gear is engaged with the lower part of the first bevel gear. A rotating shaft is fixed to one side of the first bevel gear, a third bevel gear is connected to one side of the second bevel gear in a meshed mode, and a locking mechanism is arranged between the rotating shaft and the book bucket. The AI education learning desk for the campus is provided with a first bevel gear, a second bevel gear, a third bevel gear and a lifting column, by rotating the first bevel gear, the first bevel gear sequentially drives the second bevel gear and the third bevel gear to rotate, the first bevel gear and the third bevel gear rotate in opposite rotating directions, and under the connecting action of a connecting rod, the lifting column can lift the AI education learning desk. And the two lifting columns can synchronously move in the vertical direction, so that the height of the panel is adjusted.

title: Automatic subjective question reviewing method based on BERT neural network and multi-task learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a subjective question automatic reviewing method based on a BERT neural network and multi-task learning, and relates to the crossing field of artificial intelligence and intelligent education. Firstly, a BERT neural network subjected to large-scale corpus pre-training is used for coding, the problem that corpus is too small in a subjective question automatic review task is effectively solved, and a multi-task neural network model with student answer pronoun elimination and subjective question automatic review is jointly trained. And secondly, using the trained multi-task neural network model to extract substitute word components from the question stem to replace pronouns in the student answers, thereby ensuring the semantic integrity of the student answers. And then, forming sentence pairs by the student answers after elimination and standard answers, and sending the sentence pairs to a BERT neural network for classification to obtain scoring levels of the student answers. By eliminating pronouns in answers of students, the problem of automatically reviewing subjective questions is solved by a more effective method.

title: Big data risk control method and server for remote education service
applicants: JINAN DIHUOGAI COMPUTER SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention provides a big data risk control method for remote education services and a server, and the method comprises the steps: firstly mining an initial service operation and maintenance risk description through a machine learning model, and then carrying out the risk control of the remote education services according to the mined initial service operation and maintenance risk description; the staged operation and maintenance risk items, the staged risk description content and the integrated risk description content can be determined in parallel, the staged operation and maintenance risk items, the staged risk description content and the integrated risk description content are prevented from being mined independently, the mining timeliness can be guaranteed, and the mining efficiency is improved. The initial service operation and maintenance risk description is the risk description content which needs to be referenced for mining the above three types of key data, so that the above three types of key data are determined through the initial service operation and maintenance risk description obtained through integral mining; frequent mining of the initial service operation and maintenance risk description caused by mining of the initial service operation and maintenance risk description when one type of key data is determined is not needed, and resource overhead of risk control analysis is reduced to a certain extent.

title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ART TUTORING SYSTEM AND CONTROL METHOD THEREOF
abstract_text: Disclosed are an artificial intelligence art tutoring system and a control method thereof. The present invention allows a user to input a random photograph or a drawing target image, allows the drawing target image to be looked at to allow practicing of picture drawing of a drawing and the like, and allows an artificial intelligence to automatically generate a model answer and evaluation information for a practice drawing result, thereby enabling a customized picture education for each individual.

title: AI NON FACE-TO-FACE AI EDUCATION SYSTEM TO TEACH CHILDREN
abstract_text: Disclosed are an AI education system for a non-contact class for a toddler, and a control method thereof. According to the present invention, the AI education system for a non-contact class for a toddler, comprises: an education history management unit for collecting content information reproduced in a learner terminal for a predetermined period, and generating content education history data of a learner; a content recommendation unit for recommending customized education data to correspond to an education history of the learner; a 3D modeling unit for modeling at least one 2D content for each category stored in a DB into 3D content; and a content providing unit for providing non-contact virtual reality content for the learner terminal through the modeled 3D content. Therefore, experiential learning with abundant themes and purposes can be provided.

title: INTEGRATED HEALTHCARE PLATFORM
abstract_text: A digital health platform is configured to provide users with access to health and wellness education and data and to facilitate user interaction with health and wellness practitioners and/or virtual coaching. The platform may include an artificially intelligent virtual AI coach configured to provide suitable statements and/or recommendations to users in response to user input (e.g., user responses to questions or prompts). In some examples, the platform includes analytics configured to derive insights based on user data and/or any other suitable data. In some examples, the platform provides information and services related to mental, physical, spiritual, social, environmental, and economic dimensions of wellness.

title: Method for generating havruta education model based on artificial intelligence
applicants: BOOK AND NAME INFORMATION TECH SHANGHAI LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method for generating a havruta education model based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: S001, designing an online video interaction education scheme for a havruta education method in combination with the psychology of children; and S002, utilizing artificial intelligence to analyze a child and video interaction process, collecting child temperament test questionnaires for parents, and identifying child temperament and behavior characteristics and the like in combination with a professional report of analyzing child video interaction behaviors by child psychologists. According to the method, the temperament and behavior characteristics of children are identified by using artificial intelligence, and personalized education scheme recommendation for the children is realized in combination with children psychology and havruta education.

title: Labor education intelligent evaluation system for middle and primary schools
abstract_text: According to six sub-fields of'scheme design ', 'information collection', 'tool use ', 'reflection exchange' and'labor achievement ', four dimension indexes of labor concepts, labor capacity, labor habits and labor spirit are adopted, and data of laborers, labor educators, labor environments and the like in the field of labor education are automatically collected manually and mechanically. Irregular data automatically collected by a machine is intelligently converted through a machine learning method. And the absent data is automatically supplemented, and finally a multi-target evaluation model is established, so that intelligent evaluation is performed on labor education. According to the method, multiple functions of school labor attainment evaluation, family labor attainment evaluation, community (base) labor attainment evaluation and the like can be realized; and management can be carried out according to the new lesson standard.

title: Short video batch editing system and method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: XINXIANG LONGKANGHAI WUHAN NETWORK TECH LIMITED RESPONSIBILITY COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of short video editing, and discloses a short video batch editing system and method based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: determining a theme before short video editing, editing a copywriting according to the theme, carrying out the short video shooting according to the copywriting, and importing the shot video into a short video editing system for operation. And finally, adding subtitles in the edited short video. The short video editing system is realized by means of a computer, Pr software is installed in the computer, the Pr software is operated to edit imported short videos, an audio library is edited in advance, the audio library comprises joyful audios, lingering audios, philosophy audios, chicken soup audios and education audios, in addition, common audio options are added into the audio library, and the short videos are edited in the audio library. And selecting a corresponding audio library according to the theme. The method has the advantages that different types of audio libraries are established in advance, proper audios are quickly selected from the corresponding audio libraries according to short video themes, and the editing burden is reduced.

title: WISDOM EDUCATION AIOT STUDENT GROWTH ABILITY MODEL BIG DATA PLATFORM AND APPARATUS
applicants: SHENZHEN BBAI INFORMATION TECH CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: A wisdom education AIOT student growth ability model big data platform and apparatus. The wisdom education AIOT student growth ability model big data platform comprises an electronic archive module (1), a family-school interaction module (2), a student portrait module (3), a quality-oriented education module (4), a growth way module (5) and a management function module (6), wherein the quality-oriented education module (4) is used for establishing a quality-oriented education resource library by means of gathering student quality-oriented education project data, quality-oriented education archives and evaluation results, the quality-oriented education resource library covering education modes of three dimensions, i.e. morality, intelligence and physical strength, so as to form a robust and scientific evaluation standard; and the growth way module (5) is used for forming a database by means of recording learning habits of students, and providing objective suggestions for the growth of the students by means of data accumulation and data analysis. Therefore, the advantages, that is, objectification and customization, of artificial intelligence applied to quality-oriented education and growth education are realized.

title: ONLINE TRAINING EVALUATION METHOD AND APPARATUS, COMPUTER DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: The present application relates to artificial intelligence, is applied to the field of wisdom education, and provides an online training evaluation method and apparatus, a computer device and a storage medium. The method comprises: obtaining all eyeball movement images of each audience user in an online training period; inputting the eyeball movement images of each audience user into a preset scoring model, to score the eyeball movement images by means of the scoring model, and outputting score values having one-to-one correspondence to the eyeball movement images; calculating a mean value of all score values, and marking the mean value as an attention mean value of the audience user; obtaining on-screen comment data appearing in the online training period; generating, according to the on-screen comment data, a participation score value corresponding to the audience user; generating, according to the attention mean value and the participation score value, a training effect score corresponding to the online training; and generating, according to the training effect score, the training evaluation reference result corresponding to the online training. According to the present application, the training evaluation result of online training can be accurately generated.

title: METHOD FOR BUILDING AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED RESEARCH TOPICS DATABASE
abstract_text: The present invention is technology developed through the 3rd Seoul Innovation Challenge (IC190048) of the Seoul Business Agency (IC190048) "Development of personalized college entrance consulting technology based on artificial intelligence". A method for generating an artificial intelligence-based academic inquiry subject database is provided. A database generating method according to an embodiment of the present invention comprises the steps of: collecting and pre-processing literature content; extracting a subject and a description of the subject from the literature content; extracting a category of literature content and a document difficulty based on a literature graph; extracting a literature keyword of the literature content based on a knowledge graph; inferring related units, related departments, application cases, subject keywords, and subject difficulty by inputting the extracted subjects and descriptions into an artificial intelligence model; and storing the input information and the inferred information together in the subject database. The present invention can provide a synergistic effect of career education and subject education.

title: Intelligent disaster relief scene structure for robot AI education
abstract_text: The utility model relates to an intelligent disaster relief scene structure for robot AI education, which comprises a simulation room, a start detection module, an end point detection module and a voice broadcast module, the simulation room is internally provided with a start area and an end point area, the start area is internally provided with a to-be-fetched piece grabbed by an intelligent robot, the end point area is provided with a placing point for placing the to-be-fetched piece, and the voice broadcast module is provided with a voice broadcast module. The start detection module is arranged in a start area and used for detecting a to-be-taken piece in the start area, the end point detection module is arranged in an end point area and used for detecting a placement point in the end point area, and the voice broadcast module is linked with the start detection module and the end point detection module. The utility model provides an intelligent disaster relief scene structure for displaying robot AI education.

title: Personality-based personalized recommendation method for family education cultivation knowledge
applicants: BOOK AND NAME INFORMATION TECH SHANGHAI LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses a personality-based personalized recommendation method for family education cultivation knowledge, which comprises the following steps of: S001, quickly and accurately identifying the temperament and personality of children and parents based on a personality psychologist analysis behavior scheme and an artificial intelligence technology by using a label, a head portrait or a user video provided by user registration, and continuously optimizing and the like. According to the method, artificial intelligence and psychology are combined, temperament and personality of children and parents are mainly combined, and personalized recommendation is realized by utilizing user behavior data and basic information.

title: BLOCK CODING EDUCATION SERVICE METHOD USING INTERACTION WITH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND SYSTEM THEREFORE
abstract_text: Disclosed are a block coding education service method using an interaction with artificial intelligence (AI) to provide a mentor message to a user in the form of a chat and a system thereof. According to one embodiment of the present invention, the block coding education service method comprises the following steps by AI: monitoring a user's learning situation for block coding education in real-time; receiving an interaction from the user to the AI; and providing a mentor message corresponding to the interaction to the user on the basis of the received interaction and a learning situation of the user. The step of receiving the interaction and the step of providing the mentor message can receive the interaction and provide the mentor message in a form of a chat between the AI and the user, respectively.

title: STORY-BASED CODING EDUCATION CONTENTS AUTHORING SYSTEM AND METHOD
abstract_text: Disclosed are a story-based coding education content authoring system and a method thereof. According to one embodiment of the present invention, the story-based coding education content authoring method comprises: a step of receiving text for generating coding education content; a step of extracting a character and story included in the text from the text by using a pre-trained artificial intelligence; and a step of generating the coding education content for performing a pre-set coding education mission based on the extracted character and story.

title: Balancing assembly of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a balance assembly of an artificial intelligence education robot, and particularly relates to the technical field of the balance assembly of the artificial intelligence education robot, the balance assembly comprises a clamping table, two sides of the clamping table are movably connected with a group of fixing mechanisms, four corners of the clamping table are fixedly connected with a group of supporting mechanisms, and each fixing mechanism comprises a first screw rod. The first lead screws are connected to the two sides of the clamping table in an engaged mode. The supporting balance mechanism is arranged, the supporting rod is rotationally connected to the surface of the fixing rod, the supporting plate is fixedly connected to the end, away from the fixing rod, of the supporting rod and used for limiting the supporting rod, the limiting plate makes contact with the supporting rod, the supporting rod is kept perpendicular and used for supporting and guaranteeing balance of the robot, and the first lead screws are connected to the two sides of the clamping table in a meshed mode. The first lead screw penetrates through the clamping table and extends into the clamping table, the end, away from the first twisting wheel, of the first lead screw is fixedly connected with a first friction plate, the twisting wheel is twisted, the whole mechanism can be separated from the robot, and the whole balance assembly is disassembled.

title: Identity recognition method based on AI education system
applicants: CHENGDAN SECTION BY SECTION HIGH EDUCATION SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention provides an identity recognition method based on an AI education system. The method comprises the following steps: capturing input video frames of a plurality of lecture attending users; detecting a face area of the listening user; calculating a pixel average image of the group of face image windows to establish a face appearance model of the listener; generating paths of lecture attending users in the plurality of input video frames; estimating the detected face direction to calculate the concentration degree; detecting the number of human faces with front postures, and detecting class attending users who have gazed at a predefined time length in the direction of the display content; calculating the time of watching the display content by the lecture attending users to calculate the concentration degree of each lecture attending user; associating the limb behavior with one of a plurality of emotion type tags; and training a classifier by using features extracted from the video frame data, and detecting emotional feedback of the listener by using the classifier. According to the identity recognition method based on the AI education system, the method can better adapt to application scenes of low-resolution images, visual recognition and emotion recognition are combined, and the AI education system is helped to obtain the concentration degree distribution state of listening users in real time.

title: Education optimization development system based on artificial intelligence and big data
applicants: GUANGZHOU ORNAMENTAL CULTURAL EDUCATION SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of education informatization, and discloses an education optimization development system based on artificial intelligence and big data, and the system comprises a user login registration module, an information verification module, an evaluation module, a data collection module, a total evaluation module and a server. And the total evaluation module carries out comprehensive evaluation on the teacher according to the received information and uploads a result to the server. According to the education optimization development method, device and system based on artificial intelligence and big data, through the arrangement of the self-test module, the self-test module can detect the knowledge level of the teacher, the system can evaluate the teacher conveniently, and the teacher can use the self-test module to carry out leak checking and vacancy filling and improve himself/herself in a targeted manner, so that a win-win situation is realized; the system evaluates the vocational ability of the teacher from multiple angles, and improves the accuracy of teacher ability evaluation.

title: Method of ontact education based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The present invention provides an artificial intelligence-based contactless education method. The artificial intelligence-based contactless education method according to the present invention as described above, after an online platform for a multilateral online connection of clients such as an education content provider and a recipient is established, has a technical characteristic that enables in providing a three-dimensional and dynamic education process connected offline and online by providing a structure, wherein the contactless education is proceeded while the offline-non-face-to-face education center operation step and the offline-MR-hologram experience space operation step are performed.

title: - Ontact education platform system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The present invention provides an online/offline complex artificial intelligence (AI)-based on-tact education platform system. According to the present invention, a studio space capable of producing immersive 3D/4D educational content such as mixed reality (MR) content, VR/AR content, and hologram content, a non-face-to-face education center space enabling multi-person interaction based on a plurality of non-face-to-face monitors, and an MR-hologram experience space where the immersive 3D/4D educational content are displayed in real or expanded size are built in an offline space. An online platform is built to connect educational content providers and recipients online while linking with the studio space/non-face-to-face education center space/MR-hologram experience space. AI techniques are introduced into a content management process of the educational content providers and a management process for the recipients. Accordingly, non-face-to-face and non-contact online education can be provided in a more three-dimensional and dynamic form than offline education, thereby being effectively applied to higher education systems such as university education and increasing learning effect as complex two-way communication and lectures with high concentration are provided.

title: AN ADVANCED HEALTH MONITORING AND EDUCATING SYSTEM
abstract_text: Provided is an advanced health monitoring and education system selectively accessible by at least one administrator and a plurality of users via a plurality of electronic and biometric devices. The system includes an authentication and identification module to authenticate data requests that are prioritized by a server load balancer module, scaled by an auto scaling module and flexibly clustered by a web server cluster module. The system includes a scanner interface handling module that receives data from biometric devices, processes through a data operation and visualization engine followed by bidirectional communication through an Artificial Intelligence and machine learning module. The system includes a monitoring service module that maintains log details of errors. The system includes a database that stores data, cloud file storage that stores data reports that can be fetched by at least one reporting server.

title: VR safety education device based on artificial intelligence
applicants: GUANGZHOU ULTRA SHARP EDUCATIONAL INFORMATION CONSULTATION STOCK LTD COMPANY
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a VR safety education device based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a VR glasses body and a Velcro head band, the side wall of the Velcro head band is fixedly connected with a plurality of fixing rings arranged in an array, a fixing pipe is fixedly inserted in the fixing rings, the side wall of the fixing pipe is fixedly sleeved with an air bag, and the air bag is fixedly connected with the Velcro head band. An inflation mechanism used for inflating the air bag is arranged on the side wall of the fixing ring, and an exhaust mechanism used for exhausting air from the air bag is arranged on the side wall of the fixing pipe. According to the VR safety education device based on artificial intelligence, when a student violently shakes or topples towards one side, an air bag can be automatically inflated and expanded, so that the head of the student is protected, the head of the student is prevented from being hurt due to collision with a foreign object or toppling, the VR safety education device is safer and more reliable, and after protection is completed, the safety of the student is improved. The air bag can be automatically recovered to the original state, and the use effect is prevented from being affected by overlarge size.

title: Knowledge graph type AI education terminal
applicants: INTELLIGENT TECH LIMITED COMPANY OF NANJING MAJOR CREATOR
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a knowledge graph type AI education terminal, which comprises a base and an auxiliary plate, the top of the auxiliary plate is provided with a chute, the two sides of the bottom of the inner cavity of the chute are fixedly connected with springs, the upper ends of the springs are fixedly connected with an upper fixing frame, and one end of the upper fixing frame far away from the springs extends to the outside of the chute. A first fixing plate is fixedly connected to the left side of the auxiliary plate, a rotating column is fixedly connected to the left side of the first fixing plate, and a stabilizing frame is movably connected to the surface of the rotating column. By arranging the base, the effects of supporting and fixing the device are achieved, the situation that the device topples over due to the gravity of the device in the using process is avoided, and then the stability of the device is improved; the clamping device is used for clamping and fixing terminal equipment placed on the surface of the auxiliary plate in cooperation with the auxiliary plate and the lower fixing frame, and students can place and take the equipment conveniently.

title: All-age learning table based on AI all-data management
applicants: DOMIGA SCIENCE AND TECH CHENGDU LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses a full-age learning table based on AI full data management, which comprises a table body and an intelligent interaction terminal carried on the table body, the intelligent interaction terminal is composed of a hardware communication tool and an intelligent learning system, and the intelligent learning system is installed in the hardware communication tool by taking a central processing unit as a carrier. And interacting with a user through a video module and a voice module in the hardware communication tool, and storing, analyzing and processing interaction information. The system integrates learning management, time management, safety management, AI intelligent learning interaction and other functions, intelligent hardware and digital education resources are combined, a solution of digital education is provided, scenes of education subjects, learners and teachers are oriented, and diversified requirements of users for innovation of education product functions can be met.

title: Intelligent electronic student identity card for answer evaluation
applicants: SHENZHEN MEIGUO GIFT INTELLECTUAL MFG LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an intelligent electronic student identity card for answer evaluation, and relates to the technical field of intelligent electronic student identity cards. The intelligent electronic student identity card comprises an intelligent electronic student identity card body, a telephone card and a processor are arranged in the intelligent electronic student identity card body, and the processor is connected with a communication unit, a positioning unit, an AI unit, a health detection unit, a network unit and an NFC payment module. According to the utility model, the communication unit is used for communication between students and parents; and the positioning unit is used for facilitating parents to detect the positions of the students, so that potential safety hazards caused by misalignment of the positions of the students and the situation that the students are not in the school are avoided, thereby facilitating timely communication of teachers and jointly supervising education.

title: Medical propaganda and education platform establishment method based on Internet technology
abstract_text: The invention discloses a medical propaganda and education platform establishment method based on the Internet technology, and the method comprises the steps: A001, obtaining the basic information of a medical user side, the basic information of the medical user side comprises the service content information, and obtaining the user type of the medical user side; a002, obtaining a doctor classification database and obtaining medical propaganda and education platform auditing conditions; a003, platform doctor user auditing data are obtained, and the platform doctor user auditing data serve as doctor end classification features; a004, obtaining a service information adaptation degree; a005, obtaining a service information image summary, judging whether the service information image summary reaches a medical propaganda and education platform auditing condition or not, and obtaining preliminary auditing data; a006, establishing a user review decision tree, and obtaining a medical user side review result; and A007: obtaining preliminary construction data, wherein the preliminary construction data is used for establishing a first online consultation area. According to the technical scheme, through the Internet and artificial intelligence technology, the timeliness is higher, and the privacy requirement of the patient user is met.

title: Named entity recognition method and device, named entity training method and device, electronic equipment and medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCIENCE TECHNOLOGY CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a named entity recognition method, a named entity recognition model training method and device, electronic equipment, a storage medium and a program product, and relates to the technical field of data processing, in particular to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as knowledge maps and deep learning. The invention specifically relates to the technical fields of medical treatment, military, finance, energy, electric power, chemical engineering, scientific research, water conservancy, transportation, entertainment, education and the like. According to the specific implementation scheme, features in a to-be-recognized text are extracted, and a feature vector sequence is obtained; performing global named entity recognition on the feature vector sequence to obtain a global recognition result; performing local named entity recognition on the feature vector sequence to obtain a local recognition result; and determining a named entity tag sequence of the to-be-recognized text based on the global recognition result and the local recognition result.

title: Named entity recognition method and device, named entity training method and device, electronic equipment and medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCIENCE TECHNOLOGY CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a named entity recognition method, a named entity recognition model training method and device, electronic equipment, a storage medium and a program product, and relates to the technical field of data processing, in particular to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as knowledge maps and deep learning. The invention specifically relates to the technical fields of medical treatment, military, finance, energy, electric power, chemical engineering, scientific research, water conservancy, transportation, entertainment, education and the like. According to the specific implementation scheme, a training sample is determined, wherein the training sample comprises a sample text and a to-be-confirmed sample labeling result sequence; processing the sample text by utilizing the initial named entity recognition model to obtain a sample label confidence coefficient set sequence; based on the sample label confidence coefficient set sequence and the to-be-confirmed sample labeling result sequence, determining a target sample labeling result sequence of the sample text; and adjusting parameters of the initial named entity recognition model by using the sample label confidence coefficient set sequence and the target sample labeling result sequence to obtain the named entity recognition model.

title: VR safety education device based on artificial intelligence
applicants: WUHAN YOUDUO INTELLECTUAL TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a VR safety education device based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of VR safety education devices.The VR safety education device comprises a U-shaped pillow, a U-shaped and elastic sleeve ring is fixedly installed in the U-shaped pillow, adjusting mechanisms are rotatably installed on the two sides of the sleeve ring, and a concentric-square-shaped placing box is rotatably installed on the side, away from the sleeve ring, of each adjusting mechanism through a rotating shaft; a group of glasses bodies are arranged in the placement box through a mounting mechanism, and the bottom of the placement box abuts against the bottoms of the glasses bodies. According to the U-shaped pillow, the neck of a user is sleeved with the U-shaped pillow, the VR glasses are fixed, the problems that in the prior art, a binding belt of the VR glasses is bound loosely and is prone to falling off, and the head of the user feels uncomfortable due to the fact that the binding belt of the VR glasses is bound tightly are solved, the U-shaped pillow is filled with the sponge, the softness of the U-shaped pillow making contact with the skin is increased, and then the experience feeling of the user is improved.

title: IMAGE EDUCATION SYSTEM USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNOLOGY, AND METHOD FOR SUPPORTING LEARNING
abstract_text: To provide an image education system using an artificial intelligence technology that can increase a learning efficiency.SOLUTION: An image education system 10 using an artificial intelligence technology includes: an image recognition unit 120 for acquiring and recognizing a facial image including the facial expression of a learner who joins an online learning; a concentration level analysis unit 130 for analyzing the facial image recognized by the image recognition unit and analyzing the concentration level of the learner on a lesson; and a compensation supply unit 140 for supplying the learner with a compensation when the concentration level is at least a predetermined level according to the concentration level of the learner on the lesson analyzed by the concentration level analysis unit.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Pronunciation self-checking system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: ZHEJIANG COMMERCIAL PROFESSIONAL TECH COLLEGE HANGZHOU COMMERCIAL TECHNICIAN SCHOOL
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of intelligent education, in particular to a pronunciation self-checking system based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a main body, a partition plate is arranged on one side of the main body, a sliding rail is connected to one side of the partition plate, a sliding block is slidably connected to the outside of the sliding rail, and a glass cover is arranged at the top of the sliding block. The device comprises a main body, a partition plate is arranged in the main body, a glass cover is arranged at the top of the main body, a phonetic symbol is placed in the glass cover, a threaded rod penetrating through the main body and the partition plate is arranged on one side of the main body and one side of the partition plate, and an extrusion plate is connected to one end of the threaded rod. The volume is released from the loudspeaking opening, then the phonetic symbol is contrasted, the phonetic symbol can be watched while sounding is facilitated, the learning efficiency is improved, before the process, the sliding block needs to be moved to slide on the sliding rail, the phonetic symbol in the glass cover slides along with the sliding block, and students at different positions can watch the phonetic symbol conveniently.

title: AI Coding education system using wireless communication
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an AI coding education system using wireless communication, comprising: a demonstration drive unit including a moving main body and a drive unit installed on the moving main body to move the moving body in a demonstration space; an input module in which AI coding data for controlling movement of the demonstration drive unit corresponding to educational content already provided to a trainee is input from the trainee; and a control module which is installed on the demonstration drive unit, is connected to the input module using a wireless communication network to receive the coding data, and controls the drive unit so that the demonstration drive unit moves corresponding to the coding data. The AI coding education system using wireless communication according to the present invention, is capable of being connected to the input module using the wireless communication network and receiving the coding data so that an operation for wired connection is not required. Accordingly, the time and labor required for installation and demonstration can be reduced.

title: Roommaid smart matching service providing system method and application
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a smart room maid matching service providing system, method, and application. More specifically, while providing questions to understand basic information of a lodging company, preference information and requests of a room maid, and the like to store response information to the questions from the lodging company, data such as basic information, training completion status, work skill level, and experience training is stored through application questions of a room maid terminal and matching is performed by reflecting evaluation score data through a room maid's educational evaluation, and thus room maids with a high matching rate can be hired. In addition, in the case of changes in demand and supply for room maids due to epidemic outbreaks, special circumstances such as holidays, holidays, or weather fluctuations, training limit and standard matching rate of room maids can be automatically adjusted through artificial intelligence. The system comprises an operation server including a communication unit, an application providing unit, a question management unit, a database, a matching algorithm application unit, an education limit algorithm application unit, and an education management unit.

title: CODING METHOD AND APPARATUS USING INTERACTIVE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: A coding method using interactive artificial intelligence according to an embodiment of the present invention comprises the steps of: receiving, from a user, a keyword voice which is a voice for performing coding; extracting user intention and at least one keyword related to coding by analyzing the keyword voice; determining a corresponding template corresponding to the user intention and the at least one keyword from a template dictionary including a plurality of templates which are basic units of coding, and mapping the at least one keyword to the corresponding template; receiving at least one unmapped keyword unmapped to the corresponding template through a conversation with the user, and mapping the at least one unmapped keyword to the corresponding template; and generating a code block corresponding to the corresponding template. The present invention can maximize the effect of coding education in various schools and cram schools.

title: AI AI EDUCATION AND INSPECTION AUTOMATION SYSTEM AND CONTROL METHOD FOR THE SAME
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence (AI) learning and inspection automation system, and a control method thereof. Specifically, the present invention relates to the artificial intelligence (AI) learning and inspection automation system that can implement high-quality data labeling through efficient operation and inspection, and the control method thereof. The control method comprises a step of receiving, by a supply server, a labeling work from a client terminal.

title: Smart home for artificial intelligence education
applicants: WEIZHOU SCIENCE AND TECH EDUCATION CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a smart home for artificial intelligence education, which belongs to the technical field of smart home and comprises a placement box, a circulating disinfection component is fixedly mounted at the top of the inner side of the placement box, and an automatic positioning component is fixedly mounted at the bottom of the inner side of the placement box. The circulating disinfection assembly comprises an ultraviolet disinfection lamp, a filter screen, a display screen, a fan, a conical pipe, a ventilation pipe and a flow guide cover, the ultraviolet disinfection lamp is fixedly installed in the middle of the inner side of the containing box in an embedded mode, and the filter screen is fixedly installed at the position, corresponding to the lower portion of the ultraviolet disinfection lamp, of the middle of the inner side of the containing box. According to the towel sterilization device, sterilization and disinfection treatment can be conducted on gas, the towel sterilization difficulty of workers is reduced, the phenomenon of cross breeding of bacteria is avoided, meanwhile, impurities generated in gas flowing can be filtered, and the phenomenon that the gas cannot flow circularly due to the impurities is avoided.

title: Crawler-type robot for artificial intelligence education
applicants: WEIZHOU SCIENCE AND TECH EDUCATION CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a tracked robot for artificial intelligence education, which comprises a robot main body, the bottom end of the robot main body is provided with a movable track, one end of the robot main body is fixedly provided with a display screen, and the top end of the robot main body is rotatably provided with a rotating head. A placement groove is formed in one end of the robot body, and a placement plate is placed on the inner side of the placement groove. The crawler-type robot is scientific and reasonable in structure, through the arrangement of the convenient maintenance mechanism, maintenance of the crawler-type robot during use is facilitated, the internal sealing performance of the crawler-type robot after maintenance is also improved, and the maintenance efficiency is improved. According to the crawler-type robot, the use convenience of the crawler-type robot is improved, through the arranged anti-collision protection mechanism, a shielding arc plate can be used for pushing sundries on the ground when the crawler-type robot moves, the crawler-type robot is prevented from being blocked by the sundries on the ground when used, and the protectiveness of the crawler-type robot when the crawler-type robot moves is improved.

title: AI education projection equipment for smart education campus
abstract_text: The utility model discloses AI education projection equipment for wisdom education campus, which comprises a groove seat, the bottom end of the groove seat is fixedly connected with a connecting plate, and the bottom end of the connecting plate is provided with an electric hydraulic rod. An angle adjusting assembly is installed at the bottom end of the electric hydraulic rod and comprises a bearing seat, a rotating block, a shell, a sliding rod, a handle, a moving plate, a sliding block, a sliding rail and a vertical plate, a rectangular block is inserted into the groove seat, a through hole is formed in the groove seat, a screw rod is fixedly connected to the back face of the rectangular block, and a screw rod is fixedly connected to the back face of the screw rod. The surface of the rectangular block is fixedly connected with a supporting rod, and the top end of the supporting rod is fixedly connected with a top plate. The projection angle adjusting device is simple in structure, novel in design and convenient to install, and the projection angle can be well adjusted.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot structure
applicants: TIANJIN CLOUD SAIL OPTIMAL CULTURE CULTURE TRANS LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The utility model provides an artificial intelligence education robot structure, which comprises an access cover, a head shell, an indicator light, a loudspeaker, a dustproof shell, a controller, a body shell, a touch screen, a rear cover, a rotatable dustproof plate structure, a detection rotating seat structure and an adjustable moving seat structure, and is characterized in that the access cover is in bolted connection with the upper part of the head shell; the two indicating lamps are connected to the left side and the right side of the upper middle side of the front portion of the head shell through bolts correspondingly. The two loudspeakers are connected to the left side and the right side of the head shell through bolts respectively. The two dustproof shells cover the two loudspeakers respectively and are connected with the left side and the right side of the head shell through bolts respectively. Due to the arrangement of the L-shaped fixing rod, the linkage pipe, the adjusting bolt, the connecting rod and the dustproof plate, the touch screen can be protected; and a motor, a bearing, an annular rotating seat and a detection probe are arranged to facilitate rotation of the head shell.

title: Classroom-oriented education robot motor driving system
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a classroom-oriented education robot motor driving system which comprises a power management circuit, a single chip microcomputer circuit, a motor driving circuit, an upper computer communication circuit, a Bluetooth communication circuit, a sensor communication circuit, an expansion steering engine interface circuit, an expansion steering engine, a motor and an attitude sensor. The power management circuit is connected with the single-chip microcomputer circuit, the motor drive circuit, the upper computer communication circuit, the Bluetooth communication circuit, the sensor communication circuit and the expansion steering engine interface circuit. The single-chip microcomputer circuit is connected with the motor drive circuit, the upper computer communication circuit, the Bluetooth communication circuit, the sensor communication circuit and the expansion steering engine interface circuit. The motor driving circuit is connected with the motor; the expansion steering engine interface circuit is connected with the expansion steering engine; the motor is connected with the attitude sensor; and the sensor communication circuit is connected with the attitude sensor. According to the utility model, the quality of the robot is essentially improved, and higher-quality artificial intelligence educational resources can be provided for students.

title: METHODS, SYSTEMS, APPARATUSES, AND DEVICES FOR FACILITATING PROVISIONING AN IMPLICIT CURRICULUM OF EDUCATION TO STUDENTS
abstract_text: A method and system for facilitating provisioning an implicit curriculum of education to students is provided. Further, the method may include a step of analyzing, the two or more of information using at least one machine learning model. Further, the method may include a step of determining, one or more controversial issues of a society associated with the geographical area based on the analyzing of the two or more of information. Further, the method may include a step of generating, two or more of research topics for two or more of research projects based on the determining. Further, the method may include a step of storing, using a storage device, the two or more of research projects.

title: AI SYSTEM FOR AUTOMATIC TRACKING AND MATCHING OF MUSICAL INSTRUMENT PERFORMANCE FOR EDUCATION BASED ON AI
abstract_text: According to one embodiment, disclosed is a system (200) for automatic tracking and matching of a musical instrument performance motion based on an AI for instrumental music education comprising: a digital sheet music generation part (202); a plurality of first sensors (211) capable of detecting a motion of a performer; a plurality of second sensors (209) capable of detecting a movement of a musical instrument by a movement of the performer; a template image generation part (204) that generates a template image comprising a motion performed by a character according to a digital sheet music generated by the digital sheet music generation part (202); and a character image generation part (206) that generates a character image by modifying the template image to match the movement of the performer. Therefore, the present invention is capable of safely creating a video character.

title: User Equipment with Artificial Inteligence for Forign Language Education and Method for Forign Language Education
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a user device provided with an artificial intelligence function for foreign language education and providing a voice reaction to a grammatical or pronunciation error in a user's voice and a method for providing foreign language education through online access from the user device. The user device of the present invention determines the presence or absence of an error recognized in the process of recognizing the user's voice as a text and determines whether the error is a pronunciation error or a grammatical error. In a case where the error is a pronunciation error, the user device provides, through a speaker, a first voice reaction including an expression capable of replacing the error part. In a case where the error is a grammatical error, the user device provides, through the speaker, a second voice reaction including a pre-prepared grammatical explanation corresponding to the error part.

title: Artificial intelligence training tool to control hardware content using artificial intelligence cameras
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a learning tool for implementing an artificial intelligence content system at a low price and performing education by enabling an artificial intelligence camera module to acquire and recognize image information and to directly apply control commands to open-source hardware, which is a variety of content, based on the recognized image information and enable operation control. The present invention comprises: a separate electronic device that generates a recognition algorithm by performing deep learning based on image data and control information of hardware content, which is a control object; an artificial intelligence camera that receives and stores the recognition algorithm generated by communicating with the electronic device through short-distance communication, recognizes a captured and input image by the recognition algorithm, and outputs the recognized result as a control command; and hardware content operating according to the control command output from the artificial intelligence camera.

title: Artificial intelligence risk monitoring and early warning system
applicants: BEIJING HUA ENTERPRISE POWER INFORMATION TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence risk monitoring and early warning system which comprises a main control module. The main control module is coupled with a safety production data center module, a basic information management module, a file management module, a safety education training management module, an equipment facility management module, a risk grading management and control module, a hidden danger checking and treatment module, an agile emergency module, an unsafe behavior monitoring module and an operation permission management module; the system comprises a major hazard source management module, an intelligent inspection module, a contractor management module, a personnel and vehicle access management module, an on-duty management module, a performance assessment module and a system management module. According to the invention, the platform with the master control module as the center is arranged, and a machine can be used for replacing a person to analyze people, objects and things in a video, so that the purposes of watching monitoring by the machine and watching a report by the person are realized, data are comprehensively managed, an active security system is constructed, and the purposes of early warning in advance, alarming during the things and tracking after the things are realized.

title: Intelligent synchronization method and system for online education live broadcast playback of artificial intelligence
applicants: WUHAN ORCHID USHU INFORMATION TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent synchronization method and system for online education live broadcast playback of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining first teacher user information according to a first online education course; obtaining a first live broadcast playback course through establishing a generated first mapping relationship between the first student user and the first teacher user; obtaining a first mobile device and a second mobile device; synchronizing the first mobile device and the second mobile device according to a first synchronization module to obtain a first synchronization course; obtaining a first course state of the first synchronous course; judging whether the first course state is in a preset course state rule or not; and if the course state rule is not in the preset course state rule, updating the first synchronous course according to a first updating module. The technical problems that in the prior art, the requirement for live broadcast playback based on a user is high, an existing live broadcast playback synchronization method is not intelligent enough, and the synchronous playing effect is affected are solved.

title: AI education learning equipment for Chinese education class
abstract_text: The AI education learning equipment structurally comprises a machine body, a display screen, a control button, a pen cavity, a clearing mechanism and a writing pen, the display screen is arranged on the front face of the machine body, the control button is installed below the display screen, the pen cavity penetrates through the position between the upper surface and the interior of the machine body from the middle to the right side, and the clearing mechanism is arranged at the bottom in the pen cavity in a sleeved mode. The bottom end of the writing pen is movably matched with the removing mechanism, the removing mechanism comprises a fixing block, an inner cavity, a supporting plate, a pushing strip and a removing ring, the bottom face of the fixing block abuts against the inner bottom of the pen cavity, the removing mechanism is arranged at the inner bottom of the pen cavity, the removing ring of the removing mechanism is movably matched with the outer wall of the bottom end of the writing pen, and chalk dust is removed through a scraper; chalk dust attached to the outer wall of the bottom end of the writing pen can be reduced, the contact induction degree of the writing pen and the display screen can be improved, the phenomenon of interruption in the writing process is reduced, and content can be normally input into a learning machine to obtain related knowledge content.

title: User learning monitoring method and device, computer equipment and storage medium
applicants: CHINESE SAFETY PROPERTY INSURANCE STOCK LTD COMPANY
