abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, is applied to the field of intelligent education, and relates to a user learning monitoring method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: receiving a portrait data stream, positioning the positions of portrait eyeballs and a portrait nose from the portrait data stream in real time, and obtaining eyeball coordinates and nose coordinates; calculating the distance from the eyeballs of the portrait to the user side based on the eyeball coordinates to obtain a target distance, and calculating the distance from the nose of the portrait to the user side based on the nose coordinates to obtain a standard distance; calculating an eyeball deviation degree according to the target distance and the standard distance to obtain a target deviation degree; and scoring the learning condition of the user based on the portrait data stream and the target offset degree to obtain a target score. The portrait data stream can be stored in a block chain. According to the invention, the learning condition of the user is effectively monitored.

title: Oral English learning system based on artificial intelligence, computer equipment and terminal
applicants: HUNAN ENVIRONMENTAL BIOLOGICAL OCCUPATIONAL TECH COLLEGE
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of intelligent education, and discloses a spoken English learning system based on artificial intelligence, computer equipment and a terminal. The spoken English learning system based on artificial intelligence comprises a virtual learning scene construction module, a spoken English learning module, an original voice signal acquisition module, a signal preprocessing module, a wireless communication module, a central control module, a signal analysis module, a spoken English learning evaluation module, a data storage module and an update display module. According to the invention, the oral English dialogue learning is carried out by constructing the oral English virtual learning scene, so that the objectivity and accuracy of oral English level evaluation of students under the virtual reality scene can be greatly improved; the oral English learning speech signal set is analyzed to determine the oral English grade, so that a personalized oral English training mode can be effectively provided for oral English dialogue skills of different students, and the oral English learning efficiency of the students can be improved.

title: An AI-Based System for Diagnosis and Treatment of Mental Illness
abstract_text: An Al-Based System for Diagnosis and Treatment of Mental Illness When it comes fulfilling the capacities of an individual in terms of psychological support and intervention the lag is evident. The huge stigma attached to the psychological issues/mental illnesses makes it all the more difficult for the population all over the world to go and approach the psychologists/psychiatrists. In addition to stigma, population is unaware of psychological signs/symptoms and emergency interventions related to psychiatric disorders. Henceforth, need of an artificial intelligence system which interacts with people about their psychological symptoms was seen. This is an inbuilt system based on Al which allows the user to express their needs and wants in a single platform. The application performs the functions from diagnosing to treating the user. Surely there are many unnoticed cases of mental illnesses which haven't been reported. The stigma attached to the mental illnesses makes it all the more difficult for the people to approach psychiatrists/therapists. This application will help the people to approach for treatment without facing any social stigma. Which in turn will help to develop a much transparent database for the same. The data base can be accessed by the Governmental Organisations to develop statistical data on the prevalence and occurrence of all psychological illnesses. Patients who are already under treatment can use the app for further interventions. Unlike other apps available in the market this app is completely Al based. How they feel, for how long are the symptoms running and further helps them track down their ongoing mental health conditions. The system will update/improve system based on latest researches and updates. The patient will be diagnosed according to their symptoms. The responses will be recorded and user will be suggested for further interventions. The recording of the response will further help in improving the quality of diagnoses. The sensors and camera of the laptop/ smart phones will be utilised to sense the emotions and vitals of the patient. The application will be connected to the smart watch also to configure the vitals of the users. Automated suggestions based on the present recorded condition of the user will pop up. For example, a pop up for breathing exercises, medicines. Time scheduled for therapies. Ongoing patients can enter their details and can continue with the treatment online. This in turn will help both the new and old patients to utilise the application. An approach to multiple health applications have been a part of the daily lives of the people. We have applications to talk to physicians, take appointment, applications taking care of our physical health have always been an emphasis.Apps taking care of our menstrual health, physical activities, diet planning, less is the area explored for mental illnesses/issues. An empty space was observed in the approach towards mental health. During the pandemic the lag was realisedon a greater wave length. When people were all locked inside their homes without an interaction with the outer world. When the population could not help themselves but be in the situation. It took months for the situations to normalise. Some might have had a good environment at home, some may not. Some might already be suffering from mental illnesses. Some might have been addicted to alcohol/drugs. Looking into the history of pandemics, we see that there was a rise of mental illnesses then and now with COVID-19. There have been reported rise in the cases of mental illnesses. People already suffering from the illnesses had no space to approach and contact psychiatrists. People who never had any symptom also gained anxiety and panic disorder as a result of the lockdown. Further the patients will get suggestions for virtual therapy and treatment sessions which they can go through from the same interface. Therapies earlier have been a separate part of the applications which either have been specified to anxiety and depression or just an app with therapies and consultations available. This invention will allow the user to go through the complete procedure at one go. The therapies again based on Al will be provided virtually. The application will register the timings and dosage of the drugs and therapies. The application will then buzz the user for their drug and therapy.Data will be gathered from the patient for the ongoing treatment and therapies or any other possible intervention that the patient is already going through or applied for the present psychological condition. The Al will take the feedback and suggest improvements on the ongoing interventions. The complete information will then be converted into a database which in turn will be utilised into the statistical information. This information can be processed into valuable data's that the organisations and governments can utilise for further interventional purposes. The prevalence of mental health issues in the community at all levels can be recognised easily. Since mental illnesses are associated with taboos in the society that people who earlier might be not in the count of the statistical data will now be part of the complete analysis of the data. The application will be helpful in taking out the real statistical data of the population. Usually, we only consider what is into account, and cannot go into the real data. People can easily be tracked and intervened for their condition. Early intervention can easily be possible for the suffering populations or the people who are unaware of the things. This application will in turn create awareness by giving health education tips and ideas for new and latest treatments for people. An A-Based System for Diagnosis and Treatment of Mental Illness Diagram: / VirtualTherapies Pharmacology Treatment Diagnosis Camera Fingerprint Sensor Database Complete Mental Health Usercan use an application in application smartphones, tabletsand PC Alarm Figure. Architectural Diagram of the Proposed Invention

title: Robot for artificial intelligence education
applicants: WEIZHOU SCIENCE AND TECH EDUCATION CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a robot for artificial intelligence education, which belongs to the technical field of robots and comprises a shell, a buffer type cleaning component is fixedly mounted at the edge of the bottom end of the shell, and a positioning sealing component is fixedly mounted at the bottom of one side of the shell. The buffering type cleaning assembly comprises rotating motors, a crawler belt, a spring telescopic rod, a fixing plate, a connecting rod, a fixing bolt and a cleaning brush, the rotating motors are symmetrically and fixedly installed in the middle of the bottom end of the shell, and output shafts of the rotating motors are fixedly connected with the crawler belt. According to the crawler belt cleaning device, a worker can conveniently fix the position of the cleaning brush, the cleaning brush mounting difficulty of the worker is reduced, the worker can conveniently sweep impurities attached to the surface of the crawler belt, the crawler belt cleaning difficulty of the worker is reduced, meanwhile, the cleaning brush can be buffered when the crawler belt rapidly moves, and the cleaning efficiency is improved. Therefore, the service life of the cleaning brush is prolonged.

title: AI vision module for programming education
applicants: PEACH PLUM SCIENCE EDUCATION SHENZHEN LTD COMPANY
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an AI visual module for programming education, and relates to the technical field of programming. The display device comprises a mounting rack and a bottom plate, the bottom plate is embedded in the mounting rack, a display screen is fixedly embedded in the other side of the mounting rack, a chip is arranged between the mounting rack and the bottom plate, the chip is electrically connected with the display screen, a WiFi module is arranged in the mounting rack, and the WiFi module is in signal connection with the chip. According to the utility model, local visual algorithm and voice recognition of various scenes can be realized, Internet of Things application can be realized as an Internet of Things node, graphical and python code programming can be supported, and intelligent control applications such as artificial intelligence robots, maker intelligent works and the like can be realized.

title: Online artificial intelligence education equipment management device
applicants: DREAM BUILDING SCIENCE AND EDUCATION JIANGSU INFORMATION SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an on-line artificial intelligence education equipment management device, which comprises a device main body, a second positioning assembly and an adjusting assembly, the left end and the right end of the top surface of the device main body are provided with the first positioning assembly, and the second positioning assembly is arranged in the center of the left end in the device main body. A heat dissipation assembly is arranged in the center of the left side of the device body. According to the online artificial intelligence education equipment management device, the first positioning assembly is arranged at the top end of the box body, and a first positioning plate and the display screen can be clamped, so that the stability of the display screen during placement can be improved, and the situation that the display screen topples over during use is prevented; and meanwhile, first limiting holes are uniformly distributed in the left end of the lifting column, so that the position of the lifting column in a limiting cylinder can be conveniently adjusted and positioned by using a first adjusting bolt, and therefore, displays with different heights can be positioned, and the application range of the device main body is widened.

title: Artificial intelligence (AI) auxiliary scoring system for experiment operation of Chinese school exam
abstract_text: The invention discloses a Chinese school examination experiment operation artificial intelligence AI auxiliary scoring system, which comprises an examinee terminal, the output end of the examinee terminal is electrically connected with an examination room port, the output end of the examination room port is electrically connected with an education machine room, and the output end of the education machine room is electrically connected with an AI scoring module. According to the artificial intelligence AI auxiliary scoring system for the experimental operation of the middle school examination, a sample library of non-standardized experimental instruments and equipment is established, so that a large amount of later funds can be prevented from being used on experimental instruments which are purchased uniformly, the model optimization module can optimize the scale, response time and calculation overhead of a model by using a model optimization tool, and the evaluation efficiency is improved. The method has the advantages of reducing the usage amount of model parameters, quantifying the model precision and improving the topological structure of the model, and is suitable for deploying the model to terminal equipment, or running the model when hardware is limited, providing a visual tool to display a data flow diagram, drawing an analysis diagram, displaying additional data and the like.

title: MOOC recommendation method based on graph convolutional neural network
abstract_text: The invention discloses an MOOC recommendation method based on a graph convolutional neural network for solving the problem of application of a recommendation system in MOOC course recommendation, and belongs to the field of deep learning recommendation systems. According to the method, firstly, data enhancement is carried out on a bipartite graph where a user interacts with a project on an MOOC platform to obtain two sub-views, a graph convolutional neural network is used on the sub-views and the original bipartite graph to extract representation of nodes, then a self-supervised learning auxiliary task is constructed, a supervised learning task and a self-supervised learning task of a recommendation system are combined, and a recommendation system is constructed. A multi-task learning normal form is formed, and finally recommendation is carried out on the target user. According to the method, the problem of data sparsity in the field of online education can be relieved, the recommendation accuracy of the model for long-tail projects and the robustness of the model for noise data are improved, personalized recommendation learning services are provided for learners, and personalized education is realized.

title: Semi-supervised learning image classification method and system, storage medium and computer equipment
abstract_text: The invention provides a semi-supervised learning image classification method, which comprises the following steps of: creating a classification task, and triggering a training request of the classification task based on a plurality of sample data added to the classification task; in response to the training request, calling a large model to train the plurality of sample data so as to learn and obtain a target small model; wherein the large model is a pre-trained fixed model; and performing feature extraction on a to-be-detected image through the large model, and inputting a first output result of the large model to the target small model to obtain a second output result of the target small model after classification reasoning. The invention further provides a semi-supervised learning image classification system, a storage medium and computer equipment. Therefore, the classification model can be obtained through training and learning of a small amount of sample data, the threshold of artificial intelligence tasks is lowered, and actual operation experience service can be provided for artificial intelligence popularization education.

title: Test paper identification method and system based on deep learning
applicants: SHENZHEN HUANYOU WISDOM EDUCATION STOCK LTD COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention provides a test paper identification method and system based on deep learning, and relates to the technical field of machine learning, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a test paper image; according to the test paper image, a multi-task parallel mode is adopted for detection and recognition; wherein the detection and recognition task comprises detection of line segments and solid points, detection of circles and curves and character detection and recognition; output results of detection and recognition at least comprise solid lines, dotted lines, arrows, solid points, curves, circles and text contents; and integrating output results of detection and recognition, and drawing the integrated results by adopting SVG to obtain a vector image. Through a task parallel mode, various elements in the test paper picture can be rapidly detected and recognized, the processing efficiency is high, the recognition result is accurate, and powerful data support can be provided for electronic informatization of the education industry.

title: Method for identifying music score of piano based on deep learning
applicants: ANHUI MULTI EFFECT INFORMATION TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses a piano music score identification method based on deep learning, and relates to the technical field of education. The recognition device comprises an equipment support, fixed seat assemblies, an equipment main body assembly and a display assembly, the fixed seat assemblies are installed on the two sides of the bottom of the equipment support, a movable seat is fixedly installed at the bottom of the equipment main body assembly, and locking pieces are fixedly installed on the two sides of the bottom of the movable seat. The locking piece is matched with the equipment support, and a processor in magnetic attraction connection is arranged in the equipment body assembly. According to the piano music score playing device, playing images are displayed on the piano keys in a screen projection mode through the display assembly composed of the laser projectors, when the piano music is practiced, the knocking sequence and knocking positions of fingers in the music score during playing are sequentially displayed on the piano keys of the piano, memory is formed after a practicer observes and practices for many times, and the understanding of the piano music score playing is deepened.

title: METHOD, SYSTEM, AND PLATFORM FOR DELIVERY OF EDUCATIONAL INFORMATION AND PELVIC HEALTH MANAGEMENT
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to effective, efficient, and economical methods and systems for improving patient engagement, education, and treatment management. In particular, the present disclosure relates to a unique configuration of technology wherein analysis by artificial intelligence may determine improvement to treatment plans and may adjust such treatment plans to improve patient care or reduce cost.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR AUTOSCALING CONTAINERS IN A CLOUD-NATIVE CORE NETWORK
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. A method performed by an artificial intelligence (AI) module for autoscaling containers of a cloud-native core network with containerised network functions is provided. The method comprising requesting, from at least one metrics server, at least one metric required to make an autoscaling decision with respect to at least one set of containers; receiving the at least one metric from the at least one metrics server; processing the received at least one metric, using a trained machine learning (ML) model, to make an autoscaling decision with respect to the set of containers; and implementing the autoscaling decision with respect to the set of containers.

title: Apparatus and method for system information transmission and reception of carrier supporting multi-bandwidth portion
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system having an Internet of Things (IoT) technology. The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and confidentiality services. A method for transmitting system information by a base station in a wireless communication system includes identifying whether an effective downlink (DL) bandwidth portion (BWP) of a user equipment (UE) is configured with a common search space, and transmitting the updated system information to the UE in dedicated signaling when the effective DL BWP of the UE is not configured with the common search space.

title: Intelligent learning state tracking method and system based on multi-task framework and application
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of personalized learning, and discloses an intelligent learning state tracking method, system and application based on a multi-task framework, and the method comprises the steps: collecting external learning behavior features, learning resource features and potential capability features of a learner, and carrying out the preprocessing operation, and obtaining learning features containing prior information; then constructing a plurality of stacked convolutional neural networks to carry out deep representation learning on the learning features, controlling the forgetting condition of learners, and constructing deep learning features; performing deep and shallow feature fusion, introducing a bidirectional recurrent neural network, and creating an intelligent learning state tracking model based on long time sequence dependence; and finally, quantifying and predicting the learning state of the learner, and constructing a loss function to perform multi-task training. The prediction performance of the knowledge tracking model in the aspect of predicting the learning state of the learner can be improved, the prediction field and the education application field of the knowledge tracking model are expanded, and the development of personalized education and intelligent education is promoted.

title: Novel teenager STEAM education system and method
applicants: WUHAN XIAOLYUREN POWER TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a novel teenager STEAM education system and method. The STEAM education system comprises an offline intelligent space module, a cloud server module and an online meta-universe system module, and the offline intelligent space module is used for automatically evaluating works made by teenagers and generating related work data, and then uploading the related work data to the cloud server module for storage; the cloud server module is used for storing related work data, and the related work data can be used by the meta universe system module; the online meta-universe system module comprises an AI learning task strategy center and a virtual simulation system; according to the invention, the online meta-universe system module and the offline intelligent space module are combined, so that online and offline benign interaction is realized, initiative learning, interesting learning and efficient learning of children can be stimulated, a standardized evaluation mechanism of learning results is realized by using an AI auxiliary means, and STEAM science and technology education can be popularized on a large scale.

title: Edutech learning management platform service system and method using artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a system and method for providing an Edu-tech learning management platform service using artificial intelligence, connected with at least one student terminal (300), a teacher terminal (200) and a mentor terminal (400) through a network (500). The Edu-tech learning management platform service system includes: a database part (120) storing student information, question bank information, consulting information, experiential learning information, studying-abroad information, book information, and art/physical education information; and a server (110) authenticating the student terminal (300) when accessed by the student terminal, and, when having a menu selected by the student terminal (300), providing at least one among the question bank information, the consulting information, the experiential learning information, the studying-abroad information, the book information, and the art/physical education information in accordance with the selected menu. In accordance with an embodiment of the present invention, as education and evaluation methods are implemented through Edu-tech using artificial intelligence, constraints of time and space can be overcome, the quality of education and evaluation content can be improved and fair education and evaluation can be implemented.

title: SYSTEM FOR MANAGING AND EVALUATING PHYSICAL EDUCATION BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED USER MOTION RECOGNITION
abstract_text: One embodiment of the present invention relates to a method for managing and evaluating physical education (PE) by using user motion recognition performed by a server, which comprises: a step (a) of building a database by using data for motion performance by a motion demonstrator so that joint points of the motion demonstrator can be identified; a step (b) of receiving from a manager terminal a motion performance program where motion performance data are numbered at random; a step (c) of providing a user terminal with a PE video according to the motion performance program and receiving data for motion performed by the user from the user terminal; a step (d) of extracting a joint point of the user and a depth value of the joint point from the data for motion received from the user terminal; and a step (e) of comparing the joint point of the user with the joint point of the motion demonstrator to generate information on analyzed and evaluated feedback motion. Accordingly, performance evaluation can be automated and voluntary participation can be enhanced.

title: AI METHOD OF PROVIDING PERSONALIZED EDUCATION CONTENTS BASED ON AI AND SERVER PERFORMING THE SAME
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a method for providing customized education content to a user based on artificial intelligence (AI), which provides new content suitable for a user, and a server executing the same. According to an embodiment of the present invention, a system for providing customized education content to a user based on AI comprises: a content management device providing a content type selection procedure, receiving selection for one of content for each field and customized content through the content type selection procedure, extracting and providing the customized content to which tag information corresponding to user information received from a manager terminal is assigned among the customized content when the customized content is selected through the content type selection procedure, and updating the tag information allocated to the content by using the user information and a content use result when the content use result for the content is received; the manager terminal receiving the user information about a user and providing the received user information to the content management device when use of content is requested by the user, and generating and providing a process or result of using the content provided by the content management device; and an AI learning device analyzing a process or result of using the content received from the manager terminal to generate the content use result, providing the content use result to a content management device, comparing the content use result and a pre-generated content use result, and providing a content re-request message to the content management device according to a comparison result.

title: AI Recommendation education music video mixing streaming service
abstract_text: The present invention provides an AI recommendation education music video mixing streaming service. Specifically, this is a service for setting a playback section by cutting an educational song into verses and bars, mixing the playback section corresponding to the learning purpose and education level of a user by using an AI algorithm, and providing it in the form of a medley song.

title: Online education man-machine interaction system and method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to an online education man-machine interaction system and method based on artificial intelligence. The interaction system comprises a main interface; an interactive interface; an identification module; a progress identification module; a decision module; a corresponding correction strategy is given according to the progress recognition result, and the correction strategy comprises the steps that when progress recognition is interrupted, the course is paused, and prompt information is outputted; when the progress identification is lagging, the course is paused, a lagging interaction strategy corresponding to the subject term of the current page is given on an interaction interface, and the lagging interaction strategy comprises online questioning and understanding of basic knowledge; when the progress identification is normal, the course continues; when the progress is identified as ahead of time, the course continues, an advanced interaction strategy corresponding to the subject term of the current page is given on an interaction interface, and the advanced interaction strategy comprises online answering and understanding of extension knowledge. According to the invention, the learning efficiency of online education can be improved, and the use interest of the user on the online education system is stimulated.

title: IMPROVEMENTS IN AND RELATING TO TELECOMMUNICATION NETWORKS
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services.Disclosed is a method of configuring a base station, gNB, in a telecommunication network, the base station comprising a central unit, CU, and a distributed unit, DU, wherein the CU is arranged to perform virtualised network functions, VNFs, wherein the CU comprises an artificial intelligence, AI, engine operable to learn from computational metrics and to adjust the configuration of various VNFs, and wherein an F1 interface is used to exchange computational metrics between the CU and the DU.

title: TRAINING SYSTEM
abstract_text: To support education of a profession to which conversation skill is required.SOLUTION: Communication AI is implemented in a training system 1. The training system 1 includes a processor. The processor is configured to execute to obtain utterance of a participant, analyze content of the acquired utterance of the participant, create next utterance content directed to the participant based on content of the analyzed utterance, and synthesize sound representing the utterance content. The training system 1 supports the education of a profession to which conversational skill is required.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Artificial intelligence sound equipment based on AI education
applicants: SHENZHEN CHUANGQUN AUDIO TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the field of intelligent sound equipment processing, and particularly relates to an artificial intelligence sound equipment based on AI education, which comprises a base, the upper surface of the base is fixedly connected with a protection box, the inner bottom wall of the protection box and the inner top wall of the protection box are fixedly connected with two spring cylinders, the inner wall of each group of spring cylinders is fixedly connected with a buffer spring, and the buffer springs are fixedly connected with the upper surface of the base. The ends, close to each other, of the two sets of buffer springs are fixedly connected with two buffer blocks, and the side faces, close to each other, of the two sets of buffer blocks are fixedly connected with lifting plates. According to the intelligent sound equipment, the impact force generated when the intelligent sound equipment accidentally falls to the bottom surface can be buffered, the purpose of protecting the intelligent sound equipment is achieved, the problem that the intelligent sound equipment is not provided with a protection structure and is prone to being damaged is solved, the side face of the intelligent sound equipment can be buffered by arranging a sponge plate, and the effect of buffering the impact force of the side face is achieved.

title: Damping device of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a damping device of an artificial intelligence education robot, which comprises a fixed support bottom plate, a connecting bolt hole, a damping support sleeve, a damping telescopic spring, a damping connecting disc, a damping connecting column, a support base, a bottom connecting plate, a movable support vertical frame, a clamping plate sliding groove, a clamping plate sliding block, a movable clamping plate, a transmission screw rod and a rotating handle, the connecting bolt holes are formed in the fixed supporting bottom plate, and the damping supporting sleeves are arranged on the fixed supporting bottom plate. The utility model belongs to the technical field of robots, particularly relates to a damping device of an artificial intelligence education robot, and effectively solves the problems that a robot damping device in the current market is inconvenient to fix the robot and is not good enough in damping effect. According to the damping device for the artificial intelligence education robot, the purposes that the robot damping device can conveniently fix the robot and the damping effect is better are achieved, and the damping device for the artificial intelligence education robot is very practical.

title: Hardware simulator for graphical programming software for artificial intelligence education in middle and primary schools
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides a hardware simulator for graphical programming software for artificial intelligence education of middle and primary schools, which adopts simulation combining an integral mode and a local mode, is superior to an existing robot simulator which only performs integral simulation, and is also different from existing simulation of the same type. Simulation combining the integral mode and the local mode can provide visual overall display for primary and secondary school students, and meanwhile, the working effect of local hardware is displayed, so that the students can more comprehensively know the influence on the robot when each piece of hardware of the robot works. The working state and data information displayed by simulation only meet the requirements of artificial intelligence education classes, namely, hardware facility interface information and data obtained by work are displayed, and information exchange between unnecessary fine data on the hardware working principle level and actual hardware is not displayed. Therefore, the problem that the simulation mode of the current hardware simulator is not suitable for artificial intelligence education classes can be solved.

title: Artificial intelligence education device
abstract_text: The utility model provides an artificial intelligence education device. The artificial intelligence education device comprises an education device body and a protection device, the education device body comprises a shell and a display screen fixedly connected with the shell; wherein the interior of the shell is fixedly connected with a circuit board, and the side wall of the shell is fixedly connected with a key; the protection device comprises a fixing plate, a plurality of sliding grooves formed in the fixing plate and a protection plate connected with the sliding grooves in a sliding mode. Wherein a cavity is formed in the fixing plate, an opening is formed in the side wall of the fixing plate, and the opening is communicated with the cavity. The beneficial effects of the utility model are that through the arrangement of the education device body, the purpose of artificial intelligence education can be achieved; and through the arranged protection device, the display screen of the education device body can be prevented from being damaged or scratched when the education device is idle.

title: AI desk for smart education campus
abstract_text: The invention relates to an AI desk for smart education campus; the AI desk comprises a desk body, a drawer used for containing books after class is arranged in the desk body, an opening and closing device used for closing the drawer is arranged on the side wall of the desk body, and an adjusting assembly enabling the desk body to be more stable is fixedly connected to the lower side of the desk body. The upper end of the adjusting assembly is rotationally connected with a height-adjustable adjusting stool, and a linkage assembly is arranged between the adjusting stool and the opening and closing device. According to the AI desk for the smart education campus, after a person leaves the adjusting stool and no person sits on the adjusting stool, the opening and closing device is started at the moment and the drawer is closed to prevent articles in the drawer from being lost; meanwhile, the adjusting stool is driven by the linkage assembly to move to the position close to the lower side of the desk body, so that the desk and the chair of the desk without people at each position are placed neatly and more beautifully.

title: SYSTEM FOR NORMALIZING REGIONAL CORTICAL THICKNESS
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a system for normalizing a regional cortical thickness to determine disease information or progression of neurodegenerative disease patients. According to an embodiment of the present invention, the system comprises: a subject information receiving unit (10) receiving biological information, education information, brain MR image, and photographing information of the brain MR image of a subject; a learning model unit (20) machine-learned to output cortical thickness values for each local region by using, as an input, the biological information, educational information, and photographing information of a brain MR image of a large number of normal people who have taken brain MR images; a cortical thickness prediction unit (30) using a machine learning result of the learning model unit (20), and the subject's biological information, education information, and photographing information to calculate the cortical thickness value for each predicted local region of the subject; a cortical thickness calculation unit (40) calculating the cortical thickness value for each local region in the brain MR image of the subject; and a standardized score conversion unit (50) calculating the cortical thickness value for each predicted local region calculated by the cortical thickness prediction unit (30), and the cortical thickness value for each local region of the subject calculated by the cortical thickness calculation unit (40) to calculate a standardized score.

title: API Extended service providing system and method for providing artificial intelligence prediction results for extended education contents through API access interface server
abstract_text: According to an embodiment of the present invention, an extended service providing system that provides artificial intelligence prediction results for extended educational content through an API access interface server comprises: an access interface server that communicates with an extension service server that provides the extended educational content to a user's terminal; and a learning content artificial intelligence server communicating with the access interface server. When the API transmitted from the terminal is received through the extension service server, the access interface server determines whether the user has access to use the learning content artificial intelligence server. When the learning content artificial intelligence server determines that the user has the access right, in response to the API transmitted from the terminal, the artificial intelligence prediction result for the expanded educational content is expanded through the access interface server sent to the service server. AI prediction results can be utilized regardless of the type of educational content.

title: Online test fraud prevention system and method thereof
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an online test cheating prevention system using deep learning-based image processing, and a method thereof. The online test cheating prevention system of the present invention comprises: an examinee terminal; an online test server for receiving image information generated by a camera of the examinee terminal through a network; and an image processing server group for receiving the image information from the online test server through the network to perform user authentication, and initiating an online test only for an examinee who is user-authenticated and is not detected with an object used for cheating. Accordingly, the authenticity of an examinee can be secured and cheating can be detected even during a test so as to provide the fairness, such that a field to which an online education and an online evaluation can applied can be expanded.

title: Autonomous vehicle for field learning with artificial intelligence applied
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an autonomous driving vehicle for field learning employing artificial intelligence. The autonomous driving vehicle includes: a user interface device; a communication device communicating with at least one server; at least one server checking a passenger; and at least one controller entering a field learning mode in accordance with user input, receiving first data about the checked passenger from the at least one server, performing autonomous driving toward a field learning destination after setting the field learning based on the first data, receiving second data related with education about the field learning destination through the communication device, reproducing educational content about the field learning destination through the user interface device based on the second data, receiving third data about a field learning walking path to the field learning destination through the communication device, and providing field learning walking route information generated based on the third data to a mobile terminal of the checked passenger through the communication device. Therefore, the present invention is capable of enabling efficient field learning without separately having an expert.

title: Anti-collision assembly of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of robots, and discloses an anti-collision assembly of an artificial intelligence education robot, which comprises a fixed plate, the outer side of the fixed plate is connected with an extrusion spring, the other end of the extrusion spring is movably connected with a multi-angle anti-collision frame body, and the outer side of the multi-angle anti-collision frame body is fixedly provided with a limiting column; when the device is used, the influence of collision on the artificial intelligence education robot can be relieved, the multi-angle collision can be protected through the multi-angle collision prevention frame body, the protection range is widened, the multi-angle collision prevention frame body can be guided through the limiting columns, the stability of the overall structure in the moving process of the multi-angle collision prevention frame body is ensured, and the safety of the robot is improved. The problems of easy deformation and influence on the anti-collision effect are avoided; according to the device, the limiting mechanism is arranged, the multi-angle anti-collision frame body and the limiting column can be conveniently replaced, the replacement process is simple and convenient, operation is convenient, and the purposes that the multi-angle anti-collision frame body is easy to replace and easy and convenient to install and maintain are achieved.

title: Damping device of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The utility model provides a damping device of an artificial intelligence education robot, which comprises a robot main body, the bottom of the robot main body is fixedly connected with a damping seat, and the damping seat is provided with a buffer chamber. The robot is reasonable in structure and convenient to operate, vibration force generated by the action wheels is longitudinally and transversely eliminated, the robot body can be well buffered and damped, bumping and vibration are effectively prevented from influencing precision elements in the robot body, the robot body can be prevented from being damaged due to collision through the anti-collision assembly, and the service life of the robot is prolonged. And the service life is prolonged.

title: College entrance examination voluntary auxiliary decision-making system and method based on big data and artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of education, and discloses a college entrance examination voluntary auxiliary decision-making system and method based on big data and artificial intelligence, and the system comprises college student data crawling, professional data crawling, table structure determination, basic data crawling, a college ranking list, a professional ranking list, and a diploma mill library. The back-end design and the front-end design comprise a user center, a university information service, a professional information service, a basic data service, an evaluation service, a recommendation service, score and order analysis, a volunteer table service, a policy and agreement, payment/membership and sharing and message pushing. The college data crawling comprises college basic information, college student employment information, college student professional information, college admission scores of each year and college professional admission scores over the years. According to the invention, multi-aspect information can be provided, so that the college entrance examination application decision-making efficiency and effect are improved.

title: Carrying device of artificial intelligence education robot
applicants: GUANGDONG LEBEITA EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model provides a carrying device for an artificial intelligence education robot, and relates to the technical field of education robots, the carrying device comprises a transport vehicle, a placing plate is fixedly installed on the outer surface of the transport vehicle, a groove is formed in the outer surface of the transport vehicle, a servo motor is fixedly installed on the outer surface of the transport vehicle, and a threaded rod is fixedly installed at the output end of the servo motor; the threaded rods penetrate through the outer surface of the transport vehicle and extend into the grooves, limiting rods are fixedly installed on the inner walls of the grooves, and the outer surfaces of the threaded rods are sleeved with clamping plates. According to the robot carrying device, the transport vehicle, the placing plate, the groove, the servo motor, a threaded rod, a limiting rod, a clamping plate and a clamping block are arranged, the function of fixing a robot is achieved, the robot is prevented from falling off from the side face of the carrying device when the robot is carried by fixing the robot, the carrying speed of the robot is increased, and the carrying efficiency is improved. The time and energy of workers are saved, and the working efficiency of the workers is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence online education terminal with protection structure
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence online education terminal with a protection structure, and relates to the technical field of education instruments. The device comprises an information collection assembly, a terminal assembly, a power supply module, a support, ventilation shells, a rear shell, an exhaust assembly and a heat collection assembly, the ventilation shells are symmetrically distributed on the rear portion of the rear shell, the support is detachably connected to the rear shell, the power supply module is fixed to the middle of the support through bolts, and the heat collection assembly is clamped in the rear shell. The exhaust assembly is clamped to the front portion of the heat collection assembly, the connector is formed in the top of the controller, the abutting rod is fixed to the back of the circular ring, and the fan blades are rotationally connected into the circular ring. According to the utility model, the exhaust assembly, the ventilation shell and the heat collection assembly are connected to the rear shell, and the information acquisition assembly is rotatably connected to the upper part of the rear shell, so that the problems that the existing artificial intelligence online education terminal does not have a better heat dissipation protection effect and is not suitable for being used during education training are solved.

title: Deep knowledge tracking method and system and storable medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a deep knowledge tracking method and system fusing answer records and question semantics and a storable medium, and relates to the field of deep learning. The method comprises the steps of obtaining text features; splicing the text features, the knowledge concept features and the answer conditions of the students to obtain knowledge concept vectors; and inputting the knowledge concept vectors into a prediction model to obtain the knowledge mastering condition of students. Compared with a current knowledge tracking model, the method can better track the knowledge mastering state of students through the experiment on a real online education data set, and has better prediction performance.

title: Dangerous driving behavior detection method and system
applicants: BEIJING NATIONAL NEW ENERGY VEHICLE TECH INNOVATION CENTER CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of feature recognition, in particular to a dangerous driving behavior detection method and system, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a monitoring image sequence; and enabling the monitoring image sequence to obtain a parameter matrix of a moving target based on a deep learning moving target detection algorithm and a target fast tracking algorithm based on target matching and distribution; and judging whether the parameter matrix of the target is greater than a target threshold, if so, regarding as a dangerous driving behavior, otherwise, regarding as a normal driving behavior. According to the invention, whether a dangerous driving behavior occurs in the road traffic can be intelligently judged by automatically identifying and processing the motion relationship among the target objects; and dangerous driving behaviors which are likely to cause accidents are recognized, and vehicle owner education or various constraint behaviors can be conveniently developed according to the information, so that the driving habits of a driver can be corrected, the probability of dangerous driving behaviors is reduced as much as possible, road traffic accidents are reduced as much as possible, and the purpose of safe travel is achieved.

title: Online education system
applicants: SHANGHAI XIAOAO CULTURE COMMUNICATION CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an online education system, and relates to the technical field of online education. The system comprises an account management module, a learning management module, a learning state supervision module and a learning recommendation module. The learning management module is used for student course learning title, chapter and section management and post-class exercise content and chapter and section examination content management. The learning state supervision module is used for acquiring after-class exercise content and chapter examination content of the student, performing deep learning based on the after-class exercise content and the chapter examination content, and judging weak knowledge points of the student; and the learning recommendation module generates personalized learning recommendation according to the weak knowledge points of the students. According to the invention, through the neural network model of the learning state supervision module, deep learning is carried out on student after-class exercise contents and chapter examination contents of students, student weak knowledge points of the students can be rapidly known, learning scheme recommendation is carried out based on the weak knowledge points, and the problem that offline education cannot accurately evaluate the learning states of the students is solved.

title: QUESTION AND ANSWER LIBRARY CONSTRUCTION METHOD AND APPARATUS, AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: The present application relates to the technical field of data processing, and provides a question and answer library construction method and apparatus, and an electronic device and a storage medium. The method comprises: acquiring customer service conversation statements; according to a pre-set keyword, performing statement extraction on the customer service conversation statements to obtain a question statement; performing vector conversion on the question statement to obtain a statement vector; according to a pre-set particle vector and the statement vector, performing incremental clustering on the question statement to determine a category corresponding to the question statement; and according to the question statement and the category corresponding to the question statement, constructing a customer service question and answer library. According to the present application, the speed of constructing a question and answer library can be improved. In addition, the present application relates to the technical field of data processing and artificial intelligence. The present application also relates to blockchain technology, and the content of a question and answer library can be stored in a blockchain node. In addition, the present application can also be used in the field of smart government affairs, smart medical treatment or smart education, thus promoting the construction of smart cities.

title: Artificial intelligence robot for early education
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of early education robots, in particular to an artificial intelligence robot for early education, which comprises a machine body and a base at the bottom of the machine body, walking wheels are arranged at the bottom of the base, safe edges are arranged on the outer side of the base, connecting columns are connected between the inner sides of the safe edges and the base, and a plurality of groups of anti-collision mechanisms are arranged along the periphery of the safe edges at equal intervals. Each set of anti-collision mechanism comprises an anti-collision edge, a connecting block is integrally formed on the side, close to the protective edge, of the anti-collision edge, two sets of connecting rods are arranged between the connecting block and the protective edge, the two ends of each connecting rod are rotationally connected with the connecting block and the protective edge through pin shafts correspondingly, and a sliding groove for the pin shafts at one ends of the connecting rods to slide is formed in the protective edge. According to the utility model, the plurality of groups of anti-collision mechanisms are additionally arranged on the protective edge, so that when the robot moves, the anti-collision mechanisms can play a role in buffering when the robot collides with an obstacle, and the machine body can be prevented from being subjected to overlarge impact force, thereby prolonging the service life of the machine body.

title: Anti-collision assembly of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an anti-collision assembly of an artificial intelligence education robot, and particularly relates to the technical field of anti-collision assemblies, the anti-collision assembly comprises an outer frame protection frame, a plurality of protection grooves are formed in the inner wall of the outer frame protection frame, and protection mechanisms are arranged in the protection grooves; the protection mechanism comprises a hinge block, two movable rods are arranged on each of the two sides of the hinge block, a concave block is arranged at one end of each movable rod, the concave blocks are movably connected with the movable rods, and a movable ring is arranged on one side of each concave block. According to the robot protection device, when the robot is collided, strong impact force is converted into elastic potential energy and then slowly released, the buffering effect can be achieved, the inner frame protection frame in the robot protection device can achieve the secondary anti-collision effect, damage after collision of the robot is avoided, vibration damage of each part of the robot is also avoided, the maintenance cost is greatly reduced, protection is more comprehensive, and the service life of the robot is prolonged. The protection effect is greatly improved, and the practicability is better.

title: Child education robot
applicants: HUBEI JINSE YANGGUANG CHUANGKE EDUCATION CO
abstract_text: The children education robot comprises a robot body, and a monitoring module, a sound acquisition module, a player module, a WIFI communication module and an MCU module which are arranged in the robot body, the monitoring module, the sound acquisition module, the player module and the WIFI communication module are all in communication connection with the MCU module; the monitoring module is arranged at the head of the robot body and used for monitoring image information of the front face of the robot and transmitting the image information to the MCU module. The sound collection modules are arranged on the two sides of the head of the robot body and used for collecting audio information of a target object and transmitting the audio information to the MCU module for recognition. The robot is safe and reliable and moves and stops through the universal wheels with the brakes, and risks possibly caused by artificial intelligence are avoided. The sound acquisition module is matched with the MCU module and the WIFI communication module to carry out man-machine interaction, and finally the response of children to knowledge questions is completed through the player module.

title: Voice artificial intelligence education robot chipset
abstract_text: The utility model provides a chipset of a voice artificial intelligence education robot. The voice artificial intelligence education robot chipset comprises a chipset body. The plurality of tracks are uniformly and fixedly mounted at the top of the chipset body; the plurality of cooling fins are respectively mounted on the plurality of rails in a sliding manner; the base is arranged at the bottom of the chipset body; the two electric guide rails are fixedly mounted at the top of the base and located on the two sides of the multiple rails correspondingly; and the two connecting strips are fixedly mounted on the output blocks of the two electric guide rails correspondingly. The chipset of the voice artificial intelligence education robot has the advantages that the size of the heat dissipation face can be adjusted according to heat dissipation requirements, and therefore the heat dissipation efficiency is adjusted.

title: Voice artificial intelligence education robot circuit board
abstract_text: The utility model provides a voice artificial intelligence education robot circuit board. The voice artificial intelligence education robot circuit board comprises a circuit board body, and the top of the circuit board body is fixedly provided with a wiring plug. The bottom plate is fixedly mounted at the bottom of the circuit board body; the sealing shell is arranged outside the circuit board body, and the bottom of the sealing shell is in bolted connection with the top of the bottom plate; the mounting opening is formed in the top of the sealing shell; the wire end is connected to the wiring plug in an inserted mode, and the wire end penetrates through the installation opening; the sealing rubber ring is fixedly arranged on the flat cable of the cable head in a sleeving mode, and the bottom of the sealing rubber ring is connected with the top of the sealing shell through a bolt. The voice artificial intelligence education robot circuit board provided by the utility model has the advantages that the circuit board can be protected, the risk of short circuit is reduced, and heat can be dissipated smoothly.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR BEAM MANAGEMENT AND TRAINING
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. A method of a UE comprises receiving configuration information including information on a set of TCI states and information on reception of a beam indication; receiving the beam indication based on the configuration information; and determining whether the beam indication is used for (A) or (B), wherein: (A) corresponds to triggering a beam measurement and a beam report, and (B) corresponds to indicating at least one TCI state for DL reception or UL transmission.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PROVIDING EXTENDED SERVICE FOR PROVIDING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE PREDICTION RESULT ABOUT EXTENDED EDUCATION CONTENT BY MEANS OF API ACCESS INTERFACE SERVER
abstract_text: A system for providing an extended service for providing an artificial intelligence prediction result about extended education content by means of an API access interface server according to an embodiment of the present invention comprises: an access interface server which communicates with an extended service server that provides the extended education content to a user terminal; and a learning content artificial intelligence server which communicates with the access interface server. When an API transmitted from the terminal is received by means of the extended service server, the access interface server determines whether the user has access permission to use the learning content artificial intelligence server, and, when the user is determined to have the access permission, the learning content artificial intelligence server transmits an artificial intelligence prediction result about the extended education content to the extended service server by means of the access interface server in response to the API transmitted from the terminal.

title: Early education robot based on artificial intelligence
applicants: NANJING AIMOER ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE INST CO LTD
abstract_text: The early education robot comprises a robot body, a fixed base is arranged at the bottom of the robot body, a containing groove is formed in the top of the fixed base, the containing groove is matched with the robot body, an annular sliding rail is arranged in the containing groove, and the annular sliding rail is matched with the robot body. The bottom of the annular sliding rail is fixedly connected with the fixed base, an annular sliding groove is formed in the bottom of the robot body, the annular sliding groove is matched with the annular sliding rail, a mounting groove is formed in the bottom of the robot body, a gear ring is arranged in the mounting groove, and the outer side of the gear ring is fixedly connected with the robot body. The gears drive the gear rings meshed with the gears to rotate, then the robot body is driven to rotate in the containing groove, attention of babies is attracted through rotation of the robot body, interactivity between the robot body and the babies is enhanced, interestingness of the babies is improved, and then the learning effect is improved.

title: AI robot capable of performing programming education
applicants: TAOLI SCIENCE AND EDUCATION SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an AI robot capable of performing programming education. A control main body is fixedly mounted at the central position of the upper end part of a bottom plate; the control main body is used for receiving and sending an instruction; and the protection mechanism is embedded into the bottom plate, and the protection mechanism is used for shielding the front end face of the robot. The arranged protection mechanism can prevent the end position of the robot from being in direct contact with an external object, then the situation that the robot is abraded is avoided, meanwhile, the protection mechanism has the buffering effect, even though the robot collides, the damage situation of the robot can be greatly reduced, and meanwhile secondary collision can be avoided.

title: Display equipment for artificial intelligence online education
abstract_text: The utility model discloses display equipment for artificial intelligence online education, and relates to the field of display equipment, the display equipment comprises a base, the inner cavity of the base is rotatably connected with a threaded rod, the two sides of the threaded rod are both in threaded connection with threaded sleeves, the upper side wall of each threaded sleeve is fixedly connected with a movable rod, and the upper end of each movable rod is rotatably connected with a display body. A winding mechanism is arranged in the cavity on the left side, a lifting mechanism is arranged in the cavity on the right side, sliding grooves are formed in the upper portion and the lower portion of an inner cavity of the displayer body, and inner cavities of the sliding grooves on the two sides are slidably connected with cleaning cotton. Through the arrangement of the first rotary valve, the rolling cloth, the rolling shaft and the cleaning cotton, the surface of the display body can be wiped when the rolling cloth is opened, so that the cleaning effect of the device is improved; when the rolled cloth is closed, dust can be prevented from invading, scraping and collision of external dangerous objects can be prevented, and therefore the protection effect on the device is improved.

title: Children education video playing device based on AI artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model provides a children education video playing device based on AI artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The children education video playing device based on AI artificial intelligence comprises a supporting side plate and a table body, the upper surface of the table body is fixedly connected with a lateral mounting plate, the inner side surface of the lateral mounting plate is fixedly connected with a fixing ring, the interior of the fixing ring is rotatably connected with a rotating shaft, and the rotating shaft is fixedly connected with a display screen. The upper end of the display screen is fixedly connected with an image recognition module. According to the children education video playing device based on AI artificial intelligence, through mutual cooperation of a first electric telescopic rod, a connecting base, a second connecting block, a supporting rod, a first connecting block, a display screen, a rotating shaft and a fixing ring, the angle of the screen can be adjusted and changed in real time when children watch different video types, so that the children can watch education videos conveniently; and drowsiness or neck ache of the child during video watching can be avoided.

title: Damping device of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The damping device of the artificial intelligence education robot comprises a base, a telescopic rod is fixedly arranged at the inner bottom of the base, a damping plate is fixedly arranged at the top of the telescopic rod, a damping spring is arranged on the outer side wall of the telescopic rod in a sleeved mode, and the top of the damping spring abuts against the bottom of the damping plate. According to the equipment placing device, equipment is placed on the placing plate, under the action of gravity, the placing plate is pressed downwards, so that the threaded block moves downwards, when the threaded block moves downwards, the threaded rod rotates, the threaded rod rotates to drive the rotating shaft at the top of the threaded rod to rotate, and the equipment is placed on the placing plate. When the equipment is transported, the driving gear rotates, meanwhile, the driven gear meshed with the driving gear rotates, the driven gear rotates, then the rotating rod can rotate, the rotating rod can drive the clamping plate to abut against and clamp the equipment, the equipment is prevented from shaking during transportation, and the stability of the equipment is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence sound equipment based on AI education
abstract_text: The AI education-based artificial intelligence sound equipment comprises an artificial intelligence sound equipment body, the left end and the right end of the artificial intelligence sound equipment body are both provided with connecting grooves, and the upper end and the lower end of the interior of each connecting groove are both movably connected with telescopic sliding rods; sound loudspeakers are movably connected to the opposite sides, corresponding to each connecting groove, of the two telescopic sliding rods, a protective cover is movably connected to the outer sides of the two telescopic sliding rods, a handle is fixedly connected to the middle of the outer side of the protective cover, and a supporting column is fixedly connected to the bottom end of the artificial intelligence sound body; the top end of the artificial intelligence sound equipment body is longitudinally and movably connected with a lifting platform, the middle position of the upper surface of the lifting platform is movably connected with a rotating shaft, the top end of the rotating shaft is movably connected with an artificial intelligence display screen, and the middle position of the top end of the artificial intelligence display screen is fixedly connected with a switch button. According to the utility model, the equipment can be protected when not used, and the safety of the equipment is ensured.

title: Accompanying method and system based on unmanned aerial device, and storage medium
applicants: SHENZHEN THIRD PEOPLES HOSPITAL SHENZHEN LIVER DISEASE RES INSTITUTE
abstract_text: The invention discloses an accompanying method and system based on an unmanned flight device and a storage medium, and the method comprises: an accompanying terminal sending an accompanying request to a server, and the server obtaining corresponding patient information according to a patient identifier; the server selecting the unmanned flight device meeting the condition according to the patient information; issuing an accompanying instruction to the unmanned flight device; after receiving the accompanying instruction, the unmanned flight device flying to a designated area, finding the patient according to the patient image information, and then flying along with the patient according to the patient image information; the unmanned flight device accompanying the patient according to the accompanying mode; and if the patient is abnormal in the accompanying process, sending a patient abnormal event to the server. According to the embodiment of the invention, the unmanned flight device and artificial intelligence replace nursing personnel to accompany a patient at any time; timely response for calling for help, remote propaganda and education, rehabilitation training, accompanying infusion and the like are achieved, so that the problems of insufficient accompanying manpower, infection risk reduction and the like are solved.

title: Smart education big data dynamic analysis decision system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a smart education big data dynamic analysis decision system, which relates to the technical field of data analysis and comprises a data management module, an AI modeling management module, a security gateway module and a data application module. The data management module completes data source configuration, data sampling, data analysis and data statistics; the AI modeling management module completes general model configuration, data division and general model training to obtain an instance model, and verifies the availability of the instance model; the security gateway module is used for providing application registration and issuing identity tokens for third-party applications needing to call open services, and performing signature verification operation in the service calling process to realize data interaction between the AI modeling management module and the data application module; and the data application module supports a data open service and a data display service, the data open service provides a data interface for a third-party application, and the data display service performs data display. On the premise of fully mining the data value, the scientificity of the prediction result output by the model can be improved.

title: Artificial intelligence education interaction device
applicants: SHANGHAI ZIXIAN INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence education interaction device which comprises an interaction table, a storage cabinet is arranged on the front face of the interaction table, a drawer is movably connected to the top, away from the storage cabinet, of the front face of the interaction table, an AI host is fixedly arranged in the drawer, a display screen is movably arranged on the top of the interaction table, and a camera shooting body is movably connected to the inner side of the display screen. An infrared sensor is fixedly connected to the front face of the camera body, a sliding rail is arranged on the inner side of the top of the interaction table, a loudspeaker is fixedly connected to one side of the interaction table, a base is fixedly connected to the bottom of the interaction table, universal wheels are movably connected to the bottom of the base, storage frames are fixedly connected to the two sides of the base, and a storage opening is formed in one end of each storage frame. The device is more humanized through an infrared sensor, a loudspeaker and an EMS micro electric appliance, corresponding response is made according to the condition of a user, the flexibility of the interaction device is improved through a sliding rail, a storage frame and a telescopic rod, and a worker can move the interaction device overall conveniently.

title: AI GAS GENERATING EXPERIMENT APPARATUS FOR AI CONVERGENCE EDUCATION
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a gas generating experiment apparatus for artificial intelligence (AI) convergence education capable of allowing users to easily confirm a generating process of gas and an amount of generated gas visually while being interested in an experiment procedure and results using AI. The gas generating experiment apparatus for AI convergence education comprises: a water tank (10) to store water; a pair of electrode bars (20) installed inside the water tank (10); a battery (30) connected with the electrode bars from the outside of the water tank (10); a collection tank (40) installed at the water tank (10) to surround the electrode bars (20); a gas measuring unit (50) connected with the collection tank (40); motion detection sensors (60) installed at both sides of the water tank (10); an AI controller (70) connected with the motion detection sensors (60); a monitor (80) connected with the AI controller (70); and a speaker (90) connected with the AI controller (70).

title: INTERACTION METHOD AND APPARATUS, AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
abstract_text: An interaction method and apparatus, and an electronic device and a storage medium, which are applicable to a human-machine interaction scenario in the field of artificial intelligence (AI). The interaction method comprises: collecting an image set of a user (S501); acquiring a user behavior parameter sequence according to the image set of the user (S502); according to the user behavior parameter sequence, obtaining an interaction willingness value of the user by means of an interaction willingness value model (S503); and when it is determined, according to the interaction willingness value of the user, that the user meets a condition for active interaction, outputting the current interaction content according to historical interaction information of the user (S504).
