By means of the method and apparatus, the electronic device and the storage medium, interaction content can be output according to historical interactive information of a user, rather than outputting the same content to all users, and different pieces of active interaction content can be output to different users, thereby improving the user experience, and improving the stickiness of a user. The electronic device can be a robot, and can realize the interaction of adults, children, etc. in aspects such as entertainment and education, so as to achieve an anthropomorphic companion.

title: Anti-collision assembly of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of robots, and discloses an anti-collision assembly of an artificial intelligence education robot, which comprises a robot body, a rubber shell is arranged on the outer side of the robot body, and an inflatable airbag is arranged between the rubber shell and the robot body. An interaction screen is installed at the end, away from the robot body, of the connecting hose. According to the anti-collision assembly of the artificial intelligence education robot, impact force borne by the robot is relieved through the inflatable air bag, the robot body is protected through the rubber shell, the protection effect of the interaction screen is improved through the protection shell, and therefore the robot is effectively prevented from being collided and damaged in use, and meanwhile the attractiveness of the robot is improved; the interaction between personnel and the robot is facilitated, the practicability of the robot is improved, the skid resistance of the surface of the robot is improved through the protection grooves, the touch feeling during interaction is improved, the impact force borne by the interaction screen is relieved through the damping springs, damage is avoided, and the safety of the robot is improved.

title: Balancing assembly of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a balancing assembly of an artificial intelligence education robot, and particularly relates to the technical field of robots, the balancing assembly comprises a robot body, the robot body comprises a trunk, the top end of the trunk is connected with a head, the bottom end of the trunk is connected with two bionic feet, the front surface of the head is provided with a mask, and the front surface of the head is provided with a balancing device. The bottom end of the bionic foot is connected with a base plate, and a center column is arranged in the center of the top end of the base plate. The four balance pressing blocks are arranged and placed in the balance bin in a limited mode, the base plate is aligned to the position below the bionic foot, the base plate is rotated by shifting the groove, one end of the sliding block enters the annular blocking groove through the sliding groove, rapid connection of the base plate and the bionic foot is achieved, and the robot body can be balanced; the phenomenon that the robot body topples due to uneven stress is avoided, and the elastic protective sleeve is arranged, so that the surface of the bionic foot can be protected.

title: Periodic behavior report generation method and device, storage medium and electronic equipment
applicants: BEIJING CAUSA HEALTH TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a periodic behavior report generation method, device and system, a storage medium and electronic equipment. The method comprises the following steps: collecting behavior data and health index parameters of a user in a predetermined period, the behavior data comprising at least one of an exercise behavior, a diet behavior and a medication behavior; at least partially utilizing a machine learning model to generate a periodic behavior report of the predetermined period for the user according to the behavior data and the health index parameters, the periodic behavior report at least comprising an evaluation result of the predetermined period and behavior suggestions and/or index targets of the next period; updating a behavior tag of the user based on the periodic behavior report, and collecting patient education content matched with the behavior tag; and sending the periodic behavior report and the patient education content to the user. According to the invention, the user behavior intervention effect is greatly improved, and the user experience is improved.

title: Video processing method, recording and broadcasting box and computer readable storage medium
applicants: SHENZHEN SKYWORTH RGB ELECTRONICS CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a video processing method, a recording and broadcasting box and a computer readable storage medium. The video processing method comprises the following steps: obtaining a to-be-audited video source in real time, and intercepting a video segment in the to-be-audited video source to obtain a local video; performing video transcoding and audio-video separation on the local video to obtain a to-be-processed video and a to-be-processed audio; auditing the to-be-processed video and the to-be-processed audio according to a preset auditing standard through artificial intelligence; further processing the to-be-processed audio after auditing is passed so as to obtain an audio processing result; and when the audio processing result is matched with the local video, synthesizing the audio processing result and the local video to obtain a target video, transcoding the target video according to received playing requirements, and distributing the transcoded target video to a cloud server. According to the invention, the safety of video content of an education system is ensured, the burden of the cloud server is reduced, and the operation cost is effectively reduced.

title: Artificial intelligence junior school student adaptive network education system
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence junior school student adaptive network education system comprising an intelligent robot housing, an intelligent network education system is arranged in the intelligent robot housing, a front wheel assembly is arranged under the intelligent robot housing, one side of the front wheel assembly is provided with a rear wheel assembly, and the other side of the front wheel assembly is provided with an intelligent network education system. The rear wheel assembly comprises an installation shell, a steering motor is arranged in the installation shell, a rotating worm is arranged on one side of the steering motor and connected with the steering motor, a steering shaft is arranged on one side of the rotating worm and matched with the rotating worm, a directional shaft is arranged below the steering shaft, and the directional shaft is connected with the steering motor. According to the technology, the robot is combined with artificial intelligence, the robot can move at will, learning communication with a user can be achieved, learning of junior school students is facilitated, and the learning interest of the junior school students can be greatly improved.

title: Artificial intelligence and robot cloud computing integrated education system
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence and robot cloud computing integrated education system, which comprises a bottom plate, U-shaped plates are arranged on the front side and the rear side of the bottom plate, rotating shafts are arranged at the positions, close to the bottoms, of the two U-shaped plates in a penetrating manner, and rollers are arranged at the ends, close to the bottom plate, of the outer side edges of the four rotating shafts in a sleeving manner. A servo motor is fixedly connected to the position, close to the left side, of the top of the bottom plate, a universal joint is fixedly connected to the left end of a power output shaft of the servo motor, the end, away from the servo motor, of the universal joint is fixedly connected with the front end of a rotating shaft located on the left side and close to the rear side, and a box is fixedly connected to the center of the top of the bottom plate. Through mutual cooperation of mechanisms such as a bottom plate, a U-shaped plate, a rotating shaft, rollers, a servo motor, a universal joint, a box body, a vertical plate, a rotating rod, a first bevel gear and a follow-up rod, thermal artificial intelligence can walk on a non-paving road surface, and the adaptability to the road surface is high.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR CREATING VIRTUAL REALITY KIDNAPPER CHARACTER BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: Embodiments may provide a technology capable of increasing immersion and learning effect of a target child for a kidnapping prevention education simulation by re-learning a generated kidnapper character. Disclosed is a method and device for generating a virtual reality kidnapper character based on artificial intelligence that can increase immersion and learning effect of a target child for a kidnapping prevention education simulation. According to one embodiment, the method comprises: a step of receiving a generation condition for the kidnapper character; a step of generating the kidnapper character based on a montage image generated using an artificial intelligence-based montage model according to the generation condition and dressing data extracted from costume database according to the generation condition; and a step of storing the montage image in the AI-based montage model.

title: AI Emotional Intelligence Education AI Speaker System
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an emotional intelligence education AI speaker system. According to the present invention, a child's emotion can be quickly grasped and shared with his or her parent, and thus the parent can more quickly respond to the child's emotion and the child's emotional intelligence can be improved. The present invention includes: a voice sensing unit (10) sensing an external sound; a motion sensing unit (20) sensing a surrounding body movement with a camera; a DB storage unit (30) for sound and image data storage; a voice output unit (40) for selective external output of the sound data stored in the DB storage unit (30); an image output unit (50) for selective display of the image data stored in the DB storage unit (30); and a control unit (60) controlling the operation of each of the above configurations.

title: Image learning system and learning method there of
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an image learning system, which comprises: a plurality of image learning devices for providing a user with learning image content; and an education management server for transmitting educational image content to the image learning devices. The image learning devices include: a recognition unit for recognizing a user; a communication unit for transmitting a recognized user identity to the education management server, and receiving user information matching the user identity and the educational image content; a machine learning unit for periodically testing educational content learned by the user on the basis of the user information, and analyzing the learning image content suitable for the user from the educational image content through an accumulated test result; and a display for displaying the user information and the learning image content. Therefore, user learning can be more efficiently improved.

title: EXTENDED SERVICE-PROVIDING SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PROVIDING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE PREDICTION RESULTS FOR EXTENDED EDUCATION CONTENTS THROUGH API ACCESS INTERFACE SERVER
abstract_text: Disclosed is an extended service-providing system which provide an artificial intelligence prediction result associated with extended educational contents via an API access interface server, and the system may include an access interface server to communicate with an extended service server that provides the extended educational contents to a terminal of a user, and a learning content artificial intelligence server to communicate with the access interface server, and the access interface server determines whether the user has an access authority to use the learning content artificial intelligence server if an API transmitted from the terminal is received via the extended service server, and if the user is identified as having the access authority, the learning content artificial intelligence server transmits an artificial intelligence prediction result associated with the extended educational contents to the extended service server via the access interface server, in response to the API transmitted from the terminal.

title: EDUCATION SUPPORT SOFTWARE
abstract_text: To provide education support software capable of promoting the motivation of students to learn actively and allowing the students to perform dialogic, deep learning with one another.SOLUTION: Education support software causes a management server 11 for use in an environment related to education to function as a device for providing: question receiving means for receiving a question posted by a student; question holding means for holding the question received by the question receiving means in such a manner that a plurality of students different from the student posting the question can read; answer receiving means for receiving a first answer posted from any one of the plurality of students for the question held by the question holding means; and answer holding means for holding the answer received by the answer receiving means in such a manner that only the student posted the question can read.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: SW Block for education of software coding and artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an educational block for SW coding and artificial intelligence, and more specifically relates to an electric and electronic module and a block module, wherein the electric and electronic module is combined with the block module to freely form kits.

title: Damping device for artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: According to the damping device for the artificial intelligence education robot, the damping effect is good, meanwhile, the long-time damping effect can be kept, and the education robot can be better protected. The robot comprises a robot body and a vehicle body, a guide support is fixedly installed at the upper end of the vehicle body, a main damping mechanism connected with the robot body and the vehicle body penetrates through the guide support, the main damping mechanism comprises a first movable rod fixedly installed at the lower end of the robot body, and the lower end of the first movable rod extends into the guide support and is movably connected with the guide support; a fixedly-connected first containing groove is formed in the top, corresponding to the extending direction of the first movable rod, of the vehicle body, and a damping air bag abutting against the lower end of the first movable rod is arranged in the first containing groove.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot
applicants: ZHEJIANG RUIZHI ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model provides an artificial intelligence education robot, which relates to the field of robots, and comprises a base, the top of the base is fixedly connected with a main body, one side of the main body is provided with a display screen, a head is arranged above the main body, the head is fixedly connected with a voice player, and the voice player is connected with the display screen. A nodding mechanism used for driving the head to move up and down is arranged in the body and comprises a sliding rod, a sliding sleeve, a first permanent magnet, an electromagnet, a spring and a transverse rod. According to the artificial intelligence education robot, when a child learns correct answering through a display screen, a PLC controls an electromagnet to be started for five seconds, and the top magnetic pole of the electromagnet is different from the bottom magnetic pole of a first permanent magnet, so that the first permanent magnet drives a cross rod to move downwards under the action of heteropole attraction, and the cross rod drives the head to move downwards through a sliding rod; when the electromagnet is closed, under the action of the spring, the transverse rod moves upwards, the transverse rod drives the head to ascend through the sliding rod, and therefore one-time nodding is completed.

title: System and method for digitally screening and diagnosing sleep health of children
abstract_text: The invention relates to a system and method for digitally screening and diagnosing the sleep health of children. The system comprises a patient end, a medical care end, a graph discrimination service center end and a graph discrimination cloud service client. Based on the increasingly developing big environment of Internet + medical health, and by using the Internet of Things and artificial intelligence technology, \ a software and hardware combined digital screening and diagnosis and auxiliary treatment system for children sleep is researched and developed, and scientific, intelligent and convenient requirements of patient sleep monitoring appointment, home sleep monitoring, remote sleep evaluation, remote central diagram judgment, online report interpretation, online inquiry, daytime operation appointment, sleep health management service, health propaganda and education and the like are realized.

title: AI education science and technology system and operation method
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI education science and technology system and an operation method. The AI education science and technology system mainly comprises at least one robot device, a circuit device, an instruction database, a communication module, at least one moving assembly, at least one color sensor, a carrier, at least one moving part, at least one coloring area and at least one situation guiding module. By means of the structure, a child conducts coloring corresponding to the situation of the situation guiding module on the coloring area, then the robot device is placed on the carrier, the robot device can move along the moving part, when the robot device passes through the colored coloring area, actions corresponding to the colors can be executed, and the overall moving process of the robot device corresponds to the situation guiding module, and the child can program the instruction database by using an electronic device through the communication module so as to change the action of the robot device. Therefore, the method is rich in enough educational extensibility, and meanwhile, the interest of children in programming can be aroused.

title: Face anti-cheating method and device, computer equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN LIFE INSURANCE CO CHINA LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a face anti-cheating method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a plurality of infrared images and a plurality of color images of a to-be-recognized figure in the same time interval; extracting infrared image features of the to-be-recognized figure from the infrared image; extracting color image features of the to-be-recognized figure from the color image; calculating a plurality of inter-frame optical flow features of the plurality of color images; fusing the infrared image features, the color image features and the inter-frame optical flow features to obtain fused features; and inputting the fusion feature into a preset classifier for processing, and outputting a classification result that the face of the to-be-recognized figure is a living face or a cheating face. According to the invention, whether the face of the to-be-recognized figure is a living face or a cheating face can be comprehensively judged, the recognition accuracy is high, and the consumed time is short. In addition, the scheme can be applied to the fields of smart cities, smart education and the like, and the construction of the smart cities or the smart education is promoted.

title: Student evaluation method and system based on AI identification data
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student evaluation method and system based on AI identification data, and relates to the field of intelligent education. A lightweight network model suitable for student evaluation, the model taking AI identification data as an input and taking an evaluation result as an output; a training data generation algorithm is provided, multi-dimensional AI identification data and labels are uniformly processed into training data suitable for a network model through the algorithm, and the problems that the dimensions between any AI identification data and various labels are not uniform, and native data cannot meet multi-dimensional and cross-time prediction model training can be solved; a simulation data generation algorithm and a simulation label generation algorithm are provided, the algorithms are used and matched with a training data generation algorithm, and the training data generation algorithm generates simulation training data. The network model is pre-trained by using the generated simulation training data, thereby solving the problem of insufficient label quantity in application scenarios such as student evaluation.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot
applicants: GUANGZHOU XIANGMULIN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides an artificial intelligence education robot and relates to the technical field of robots. The artificial intelligence education robot comprises a robot body, a containing shell and a rotating mechanism. A display screen is arranged on the outer surface of the robot body; a containing groove is formed in the upper end of the containing shell, and the robot body is arranged in the containing groove in a matched mode. and a rotating rod is rotationally connected with the robot body, a first motor is fixedly installed in the robot body, a driving shaft of a first motor is in transmission connection with the rotating rod, and the two ends of the rotating rod are connected with the containing shell. By using the artificial intelligence education robot disclosed by the invention, the robot body rotates to control an orientation of the display screen, so that the display screen can rotate into the accommodating shell, and the screen is prevented from being damaged by extrusion and hard objects; and the display screen can rotate by a certain angle, so that the display screen can be conveniently placed flat for use, the placement stability is enhanced, and the applicability is high.

title: APPARATUS AND METHOD OF SYSTEM INFORMATION TRANSMISSION AND RECEPTION ON A CARRIER SUPPORTING MULTIPLE BANDWIDTH PARTS
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. The method for transmitting system information by a base station in a wireless communication system, the method comprising identifying whether an active downlink (DL) bandwidth part (BWP) of a user equipment (UE) is configured with common search space, and transmitting, to the UE, an updated system information in a dedicated signaling when the active DL BWP of the UE is not configured with the common search space

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR AUTONOMOUS CREATION OF PERSONALIZED, SELF-UPDATING CURRICULA
abstract_text: The disclosure provides for a method, system and storage medium for automatically generating a curriculum. The method comprises receiving user input related to a subject matter for learning; searching a database for titles of educational material related to the subject matter; generating areas of education in response to the titles of the education material; searching the database for modules that include education material related to the subject matter in response to the generated areas of education; populating a map with the areas of education; and associating, in the map, modules with the areas of education.

title: AI education projection device for smart campus
applicants: ZHONGKE XINTONG CHENGDU CONSTRUCTION ENG CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of projection equipment, particularly relates to an AI education projection device for a smart campus, and provides the following scheme aiming at the problem that the definition of a projection lens is easily interfered by dust due to the fact that the projection lens is placed outside for a long time because most of the conventional projection devices have the function of freely folding and unfolding the projection lens. The projection device comprises a projection shell, a worm and a worm gear are rotatably mounted in the projection shell and meshed with each other, two gears are rotatably mounted in the projection shell and meshed with each other, the worm gear is fixedly mounted on the front side of one of the two gears, and racks are meshed with the outer sides of the two gears. According to the utility model, the structural design is reasonable, the worm and the worm gear are arranged, the motor is started to enable the two racks to move horizontally to the right, the projection lens is accommodated in the projection shell, the function of freely accommodating and releasing the projection lens is realized, and the reliability is high.

title: Artificial intelligence wrong question association method and system
applicants: SICHUAN PANGUNIU EDUCATION CONSULTING CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an artificial intelligence wrong question association method and system, and relates to the technical field of education. The artificial intelligence wrong question association method comprises the following steps: obtaining personal wrong question information collected by terminal equipment; preprocessing the personal wrong question information to obtain a wrong question label; associating the wrong question label with a pre-constructed wrong question set, and acquiring a category identifier corresponding to the personal wrong question information knowledge point from the error question set; and according to the Ebbinghaus forgetting curve, enabling the background system regularly and randomly to select at least one test question from the wrong question set associated with the affiliated wrong question label for testing according to the forgetting period. The invention can follow up test questions similar to wrong questions of students to give out triangulation, then a new test paper is automatically generated, and then the students specially do question types which the students do, so that the score of the students can be improved. In addition, the invention further provides the artificial intelligence wrong question association system which comprises an acquisition module, a preprocessing module, an association module and a repeated test module.

title: TABLE RESTORATION METHOD AND APPARATUS, DEVICE, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
applicants: ONE CONNECT SMART TECH CO LTD SHENZHEN [CN]
abstract_text: The present application relates to image processing in the field of artificial intelligence. Disclosed in embodiments are a table restoration method and apparatus, applied to an electronic device. The method comprises: obtaining an image to be restored, preprocessing the image to be restored to obtain a target image; performing morphological operations on multiple pixel points contained in the target image to obtain a structural framework corresponding to a table to be restored; next, performing contour recognition on the structural framework to obtain multiple intersection regions corresponding to each of multiple horizontal lines and each of multiple vertical lines; determining, on the basis of the multiple intersection regions, cell layout information corresponding to the table to be restored; and finally, recognizing target text information contained in the target image, and generating a target table on the basis of the cell layout information and the target text information, thereby facilitating improvement of table recognition stability. In addition, the present application also relates to blockchain technology, and can be applied in the field of smart education, thereby promoting the construction of smart cities.

title: Mixed Reality AI MR Language learning system devices and How to provide language learning MR content
abstract_text: The present disclosure can provide a language education service which: implements a simulated real world including mock objects and mock environments using mixed reality technology for communication education necessary for a brain and cognitive development process of children with severe and multiple disabilities; and quantifies the accuracy of a user's pronunciation by using AI voice recognition technology, thereby allowing a student to undergo a learning process according to his or her current level. In addition, the present disclosure is provided with a sling-harness which prevents occurrence of accidents which may occur while a user uses MR content and supports the body of a user so that children with severe and multiple disabilities who have mobility difficulties can use the present invention. The sling-harness is connected to a rail system that can move forward, backward, leftward, and rightward to enable free movement within a movement range of the rail when a user uses the MR content.

title: Health care system using healthcare toy robot
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a health care system using a healthcare toy robot. According to the present invention, the health care system, by using IoT and big data, can collect and use quantitative big data for health and development status of children, promptly take action through a notification function in case of emergency, find and respond to a problem early that can occur later through analysis through AI and the like, and enable customized health management individually optimized through playing and education such as setting an education direction specialized according to development status of a brain structure.

title: AI METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR DETERMINING AI-BASED INACTIVITY TIMER IN A WIRELESS COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a communication technique converging a fifth-generation (5G) communication system for supporting a higher data rate after a fourth-generation (4G) system with Internet of things (IoT) technology and a system thereof. The present disclosure can be applied to intelligent services (e.g., smart homes, smart buildings, smart cities, smart or connected cars, healthcare, digital education, retail business, security and safety-related services, etc.) based on 5G communication technology and IoT-related technology. According to various embodiments of the present invention, a method performed by a device of a network data analytics function (NWDAF) comprises the following steps: acquiring information about a traffic pattern for a protocol data unit (PDU) session, information about a traffic type, and information about a current time; determining a deactivation timer value for the PDU session on the basis of the information on the traffic pattern, the information on the traffic type, and the information on the current time; and transmitting the deactivation timer value to a device of a session management function (SMF).

title: Anti-collision assembly of artificial intelligence education robot
applicants: HAIKOU XINGJIAN EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an anti-collision assembly of an artificial intelligence education robot, and relates to the technical field of anti-collision equipment of the artificial intelligence education robot, in particular to the anti-collision assembly of the artificial intelligence education robot, which comprises a first leg mounting plate and a second leg mounting plate, connecting holes are formed in the left side and the right side of the first leg mounting plate and the left side and the right side of the second leg mounting plate correspondingly. According to the anti-collision assembly of the artificial intelligence education robot, when a person moves the robot and the robot touches an obstacle in front, an anti-collision block pushes an anti-collision connecting pipe to extrude a first anti-collision spring, and meanwhile one side of the anti-collision block extrudes a second anti-collision spring to enable the second anti-collision spring to contract; and then, when the robot is placed on the wet ground or the ground with water, a person can start the servo motor to isolate the robot from the ground, and then the robot is prevented from being affected by the wet ground or the ground with water.

title: Recognition method and system for hand raising in classroom based on machine vision
applicants: BEIJING HAIHANG ZHONGRUAN TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a recognition method and system for hand raising in a classroom based on machine vision, belonging to the technical field of education information. The method comprises the following steps: collecting a to-be-detected image; according to the to-be-detected image, carrying out personnel identification by using a deep learning target detection model, and intercepting a region of interest of each person, wherein interferences of indoor seats, machinery equipment and the like can be effectively removed, high robustness is realized, and a calculation amount is reduced; based on a human body instance segmentation model, segmenting each region of interest to obtain a contour map of each part of the human body, wherein the contour map comprises an upper limb contour and a head contour, and the human body instance segmentation model is a model established by training a convolutional neural network by adopting a sample image in advance; and according to the upper limb contour and the head contour, determining whether a hand raising action exists or not. According to the method, multiple targets can be calculated at the same time, multi-target recognition is achieved, key part positions are obtained through an efficient region segmentation method, and hand raising recognition efficiency is improved.

title: Heterogeneous data-oriented new engineering education knowledge graph construction method
abstract_text: The invention discloses a heterogeneous data-oriented new engineering education knowledge graph construction method. The method comprises the following steps of: 1) inputting complex heterogeneous data and preliminarily constructing a graph; 2) performing target detection in the image data of course usual homework and practice scoring according to an EfficentDet image target detection model, and obtaining position coordinates of student numbers, names and scores or scores in the image; 3) constructing an FOTS model, and performing character recognition; and 4) storing the key information into the data table to realize the construction of the knowledge graph. According to the method, target detection and image recognition algorithms can be utilized to realize information reading of heterogeneous data of new engineering subdivision majors, such as artificial intelligence majors and intelligent manufacturing majors, so that accurate information of students is obtained, and the purpose of constructing the new engineering education knowledge graph is achieved.

title: Intelligent home cloud mirror integrating multiple functions
applicants: QINGDAO YUNSHANG YUYI IOT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an intelligent household cloud mirror integrating multiple functions, the exterior of the intelligent household cloud mirror is composed of a frame, a mirror, a mirror surface display screen and microphones, the mirror is located on the inner side of the frame, the mirror surface display screen is located in the middle of the mirror, the microphones are located on the left side and the right side of the mirror surface display screen, and the microphones are located on the frame; the interior of the device is composed of a control box, and the control box is composed of a control circuit board, an RFID reading module, a first single-chip microcomputer, a data storage module, a voice recognition module, a second single-chip microcomputer, a third single-chip microcomputer, a Bluetooth module, a fourth single-chip microcomputer, a WIFI module and a fifth single-chip microcomputer. According to the intelligent home cloud mirror integrating multiple functions, the functions of 3D virtual fitting, Ai intelligent fitness, dressing matching recommendation, health management, intelligent home control, parent-child education, motion sensing games, intelligent wardrobe and intelligent household electrical appliance joint control are added on the basis of a traditional mirror, and the intelligent home cloud mirror is easy to operate, convenient and fast to use and full in science and technology sense; and the life of people is greatly enriched.

title: A NOVEL WEB PAGE PREDICTION METHOD USING OPTIMAL ASSOCIATION RULE MINING AND HYBRID HEURISTIC TRAINED NEURAL NETWORK
abstract_text: Today, web mining, which is a branch of data mining acts a fundamental role in diverse applications like health care data extraction, education system and search engines for evaluating their performance rank over other systems. Web Page prediction (WPP) is a classification issue in which the prediction of web pages is accomplished that a user may visit according to the knowledge of the formerly visited pages. WPP problem can be extended and implemented to reduce the access time while surfing the websites. The need to anticipate the needs of the website users to improve accessibility and user engagement is more than apparent now a day. Association rule mining is one of the most significant fields in data mining and knowledge discovery in databases. This concept plans to implement a new web page prediction model using an improved machine learning algorithm. The proposed web page prediction involves three phases (a) Rule Mining, (b) Optimal Rule Selection, and (c) Prediction. Initially, the collected web data is subjected to rule mining process. It is performed using the renowned association rule mining called Apriori algorithm, which is adopted for mining the frequent item set and association rule learning over relational databases. The length of the rule extracted from the Apriori algorithm is long, and it is needed to be reduced for performing the prediction with unique informative rules. Hence, the optimal rule selection is adopted, which uses the hybrid optimization algorithm with the integration of Deer Hunting Optimization Algorithm (DHOA) and Chicken Swarm Optimization (CSO) called Deer Hunting Rooster-based CSO (DR-CSO). Further, the optimally selected rules are subjected to the Machine learning algorithm named Neural Network (NN) for predicting the browsing behavior of the user. Along with the optimal rule extraction, the proposed DR-CSO is used for performing the training in NN. The experimental and comparative results will prove the efficiency of the developed model over existing algorithms. title: Damping equipment of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The invention discloses damping equipment for an artificial intelligence education robot. The damping equipment comprises a base, a movable plate, a damping mechanism, a buffering mechanism, a mounting mechanism and a positioning mechanism; the damping mechanism comprises a connecting column and second telescopic rods, the bottom of the connecting column is connected with trundles, two sliding rods are arranged in an inner cavity of the connecting column, a third spring is fixedly connected to the bottom of the inner cavity of the connecting column, a pressing plate is fixedly connected to the top of the third spring, the surfaces of the sliding rods are sleeved with the two ends of the pressing plate, and a pressing rod is fixedly connected to the center of the top of the pressing plate; and the top end of the pressing rod penetrates through the connecting column to be fixedly connected with the base, and the second telescopic rods are arranged on the two sides of the connecting column. The damping equipment is easy to operate, the damping effect can be achieved through the connecting column, a fourth spring, the pressing plate, the pressing rod, a connecting block, the second telescopic rods, the sliding rods and the third spring, and the buffering effect can be improved through the telescopic rods, a first spring, a second spring, a sliding block, a lifting rod and a mounting box.

title: Carrying device of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a carrying device of an artificial intelligence education robot, which relates to a carrying device and comprises a robot body, a rotating mechanism and a carrying device, and a control mechanism using a PLC (programmable logic controller) control system is mounted at the top of the robot body. Crawler-type wheels are mounted at the bottom of the robot body; the carrying device is mounted on one side of the top of the robot body; a bottom bearing of the carrying device is connected with a rotating gear connected with the rotating mechanism, a square groove is formed in the lower portion of the robot body, a first bearing plate is placed in the groove, one end of the bearing plate extends out of the groove, two wheels are arranged on the lower portion of the bearing plate, and a rack is arranged at the other end of the bearing plate and connected with the rotating mechanism. The two sides of the control mechanism are each provided with a support, and an arc-shaped second bearing plate is arranged between the supports. According to the technical scheme, different carrying modes can be adopted according to objects with different weights, the intelligent effect is achieved, and the carrying device is protected against damage.

title: Artificial intelligence education device
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence education device, which relates to the technical field of intelligent education and comprises an education device body, an artificial intelligence interaction screen is arranged on the front side of the education device body, and a data acquisition key positioned below the artificial intelligence interaction screen is fixedly mounted on the front side of the education device body. A protection mechanism is arranged on the outer wall of the education device body, and a heat dissipation mechanism is arranged on the back face of the protection mechanism. According to the utility model, by controlling the operation of the heat dissipation fan set, air can be sucked from the back of the education device body, the air cooling function is realized, the heat dissipation rate is accelerated through the design of the grating plate and the alloy heat dissipation fins, the problem of poor heat dissipation effect of the existing education device is solved, the problem that the service life of the education device body is influenced by high temperature is avoided, and the service life of the education device body is prolonged. Through cooperation of a latex frame, a sponge block and an air bag, the education device body is coated and protected, and the problem that the education device body falls from a low position and is damaged is avoided.

title: Intelligent learning guiding method and system based on personalized recommendation algorithm
applicants: GUANGZHOU CREATEVIEW OPTOELECTRONICS TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent learning guidance, in particular to an intelligent learning guiding method and system based on a personalized recommendation algorithm. The method comprises the steps of researching and developing an intelligent learning guiding system based on a personalized recommendation algorithm, acquiring a large amount of student information and constructing student portraits, authenticating identity information of students by a platform, selecting an optimal recommendation algorithm by the system, customizing a personalized learning guiding scheme, implementing the scheme and providing comprehensive learning service, performing formative assessment by adopting a diversified mode, providing an expert question answering function by a system; and improving the working efficiency through machine learning by the system. The method designed by the invention is based on a plurality of personalized recommendation algorithms, in an open application environment, a planned, targeted, supervised and progressive individual education learning guide scheme is customized for each student through an adaptive learning support, and rapid and comprehensive development of the students is promoted; the system can better guide the students to improve the learning ability, and helps the students to obtain knowledge and skills and solve problems.

title: Portable artificial intelligence online education device
applicants: SHENZHEN QICHENG EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a portable artificial intelligence on-line education device which comprises an installation box, an installation plate is arranged in the installation box, a computer host is fixedly installed at the bottom end in the installation box, an installation groove is formed in the top of the installation plate, and a keyboard is arranged in the installation groove. And meanwhile, the portability of the online education device can be ensured.

title: Damping device of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The damping device of the artificial intelligence education robot comprises a robot body, a damping assembly, a robot head and an adjusting assembly, the damping assembly is fixed to the inner wall of the bottom end of the robot body, and the robot head is installed outside the top end of the robot body; an adjusting assembly is fixed to the inner wall between the robot head and the robot body. The damping assembly comprises a damping groove, a lifting disc, a lug block, a rotating shaft, a shear fork, a connecting plate and a spring. The damping groove is formed in the inner wall of the bottom end of the robot body. The damping device is adopted, damping operation can be conducted on the bottom of the robot during collision, internal parts of the robot are prevented from being damaged, the safety effect is improved, and long-term use of the robot is facilitated; and an adjusting device is further adopted, movement adjustment can be conducted on the head of the robot, the head can be moved during education, the interestingness of education is improved, and the education effect on children is improved.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR MACHINE LEARNING TO ANALYZE STUDENT PROFILES
applicants: CLINCHR CO D B A HALLO [US]
abstract_text: In some embodiments, a method can include calculating, based on a set of values associated with an education of a user, an institution rank associated with the user. The method can include generating an engagement distribution of a set of users based on (1) a recency of each communication from a set of communications associated with the set of users and (2) a significance of each communication from the set of communications. The method can include determining an engagement metric of the user based on a position of the user within the engagement distribution and using a logistic function. The method can include providing, as an input to a machine learning model, the institution rank, the engagement metric, a profile completion metric and a profile of each entity from a set of potential entities, to obtain a user score related to each entity from the set of potential entities.

title: AI-BASED INACTIVITY TIMER DETERMINATION METHOD AND DEVICE IN WIRELESS COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication technique for converging IoT technology with a 5G communication system for supporting a higher data transmission rate beyond a 4G system, and a system therefor. The present disclosure may be applied to an intelligent service (for example, a smart home, a smart building, a smart city, a smart car or connected car, health care, digital education, retail business, a security and safety-related service, etc.) on the basis of 5G communication technology and IoT-related technology. A method carried out by a network data analytics function (NWDAF) device, and a device for carrying out same may be provided according to various embodiments of the present disclosure, the method comprising the steps of: acquiring, for a protocol data unit (PDU) session, traffic pattern-related information, traffic type-related information and current time-related information; determining an inactivity timer value for the PDU session on the basis of the traffic pattern-related information, traffic type-related information and current time-related information; and transmitting the inactivity timer value to a session management function (SMF) device.

title: AI education projection equipment for smart campus

abstract_text: The utility model discloses an intelligent campus AI education projection device, which comprises a projector, a mounting block and a connecting plate, the front end of the projector is connected with the connecting plate in a clamping manner, the front end of the connecting plate and the outer side of the projector are connected with moving blocks, the right ends of the moving blocks are provided with cross rods, the front ends of the cross rods are connected with fixed rods in an engaged manner, and the fixed rods are connected with the mounting block. A protective plate is fixedly connected to the outer side of the moving block, a spring is arranged on the inner side of the protective plate, a connecting block is fixedly connected to the right end of the projector, a linkage wheel is connected to the right side of the upper end of the connecting block, a round rod is connected to the right side of the linkage wheel in an engaged mode, and a moving plate is arranged on the outer side of the round rod; the upper end of the moving plate is connected with a mounting block, a vertical rod is arranged in the mounting block, and the upper end of the mounting block is connected with a mounting rod. According to the AI education projection equipment for the smart campus, the projector can be protected conveniently, the projection angle can be adjusted conveniently, and the projector can be maintained conveniently.

title: AI education learning desk for smart education campus
applicants: GUANGDONG NWY EDUCATION GROUP CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention is applicable to the technical field of education and learning appliances, and provides an AI education and learning desk for an intelligent education campus, comprising: a desk board, wherein the height of which is adjusted through a height adjusting mechanism; a scanning mechanism arranged on the desk board, wherein the scanning mechanism comprises a scanner, a camera and a processor, the scanner is installed on a supporting beam, and the supporting beam is rotationally arranged on a vertical base; the camera is used for acquiring an image in a visual field; and the signal input end of the processor is electrically connected with the scanner and the camera; and a database module is arranged in the processor, wherein standard sitting posture sample images and a question bank are stored in the database module. According to the embodiment of the invention, the height of the desk plate can be adaptively adjusted according to the body shape and proper sitting posture of a student, so as to adapt to the sitting posture needs of the student in different periods, the problem solving thought can be provided for the student in time, the student is reminded of the sitting posture, and the use effect is good.

title: Display panel convenient to adjust for artificial intelligence course education of teenagers
applicants: GUANGDONG ZHIDAO INTELLIGENT INFORMATION CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a display panel convenient to adjust for adolescent artificial intelligence course education, which comprises a panel mounting frame, a folding display screen and a light angle sensor, the folding display screen is arranged in the panel mounting frame, sliding columns are arranged on two sides of the outside of the folding display screen, and the light angle sensor is arranged on the sliding columns. A push-pull rod is arranged on one side of the top of each sliding column, a screen folding controller is arranged on the portion, between the push-pull rods, of the panel mounting frame, and the light angle sensor is arranged on the edge of the top of the folding display screen. The display screen of the display panel is designed into the folding display screen, and the light angle sensor and the screen folding controller are additionally arranged, so that the display panel can automatically adjust the folding angle of the folding display screen according to different angles of outdoor light irradiation, and students on the two sides in a classroom can clearly watch the display screen.

title: Online interactive lecture realtime education service providing system using AI and big-data
abstract_text: An online interactive lecture real-time education service providing system using AI and big data according to the present invention includes user terminal means for recognizing user information, and an AI server for providing pre-stored lecture-related content to the user terminal means, receiving the user information from the user terminal means, and providing feedback corresponding to the user information.

title: HMD .Smart tables for MR learning content and how to provide them
abstract_text: The present disclosure implements a simulated real world comprising virtual objects (simulated objects and simulated environments) using a mixed reality technology for language, numeracy, foreign language, geography, and cultural education of children, collects, analyzes, and digitizes the voice data of a user using an AI voice recognition technology, and can provide educational services which allow students to study according to current levels of the students. In addition, the present disclosure provides information on a plurality of markers sequentially or simultaneously without a plurality of paper card type markers by electronically presenting markers containing information on a virtual object through a display device provided on a table in order for a user to use the MR content so that virtual object is implemented, thereby providing an educational service through immersive content.

title: Anti-collision assembly of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an anti-collision assembly of an artificial intelligence education robot, which is characterized in that a driving wheel is arranged at the bottom of a moving bottom plate of the education robot, a crawler belt is sleeved on the driving wheel, the crawler belt is a rubber crawler belt, the crawler belt comprises an outer layer, an inner layer and a damping grid layer, and a plurality of small ground gripping suckers are arranged on the outer surface of the crawler belt; a plurality of damping and anti-collision blocks are arranged on the side face of the education robot moving bottom plate, the damping and anti-collision blocks penetrate through the through holes to stretch into the cavity, damping springs are arranged at the ends, close to the cavity, of the damping and anti-collision blocks, and the corners of the education robot moving bottom plate are arc-shaped. Compared with the prior art, the rubber crawler belt has the advantages that the crawler belt is a rubber crawler belt, the damping grid layer is arranged on the crawler belt, when the robot vertically falls off, the damping grid layer bounces after being compressed, the damping effect is achieved, the robot is prevented from being crashed, and the small ground grabbing suction cups are arranged on the outer surface of the crawler belt, so that the ground grabbing force of the crawler belt is increased; and a damping anti-collision block is arranged on the side face of the educational robot moving bottom plate, and buffering can be conducted to prevent the educational robot from being damaged when the educational robot is collided.

title: Labor education supervision equipment based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses labor education supervision equipment based on artificial intelligence. The labor education supervision equipment comprises a mounting plate, hexagonal clamping plates, a lifting structure, a connecting rod and a rotating ring; the hexagonal clamping plates are mounted at the top end and the bottom end of one side of the mounting plate; the lifting structure is mounted in the middle of the inner side of the mounting plate; one side of the lifting structure is movably connected with the connecting rod; and the rotating ring is connected to one end of the bottom of the connecting rod. According to the labor education supervision equipment, fixing bolts are fixedly connected to the four corners of one sides of the hexagonal clamping plates; clamping grooves are formed in the middles of the inner sides of the hexagonal clamping plates; the through hexagonal holes are formed in the middles of the inner sides of the clamping grooves; in the using process of the device, the hexagonal clamping plates are assembled to the sides of the mounting plate through the fixing bolts; and the mounting plate can be detachably mounted on the wall surface through the through hexagonal holes in one sides of the hexagonal clamping plates, so that convenience is brought to dismounting and mounting of the device; and the dismounting and mounting efficiency of the device is improved.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR PROVIDING EDUCATION SERVICE USING SATELLITE IMAGERY BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: Provided is a service providing apparatus using satellite imagery. The service providing apparatus includes a satellite image information acquirer configured to acquire a satellite image; an object extractor configured to analyze the satellite image, extract an object from the satellite image, and generate an object image corresponding to the object; a storage configured to store the satellite image and the object image; and a service processing unit configured to provide an object extraction-based service and coding data associated with the object extraction-based service, based on at least one of the satellite image and the object image, and thereby provides a method of identifying and classifying various types of objects and buildings present on the ground surface based on image data on the ground surface.
