abstract_text: In some embodiments, a method can include calculating, based on a set of values associated with an education of a user, an institution rank associated with the user. The method can include generating an engagement distribution of a set of users based on (1) a recency of each communication from a set of communications associated with the set of users and (2) a significance of each communication from the set of communications. The method can include determining an engagement metric of the user based on a position of the user within the engagement distribution and using a logistic function. The method can include providing, as an input to a machine learning model, the institution rank, the engagement metric, a profile completion metric and a profile of each entity from a set of potential entities, to obtain a user score related to each entity from the set of potential entities.

title: Damping device of artificial intelligence education robot
applicants: HAIKOU XINGJIAN EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a damping device of an artificial intelligence education robot, which comprises an outer frame placed on the ground and a placing box used for placing the education robot, and a moving structure capable of enabling the outer frame to move is arranged on the lower surface of the outer frame. According to the damping device of the artificial intelligence education robot, through the arrangement of the moving structure, the first damping mechanism, the second damping mechanism, a first compression spring and a base plate, a user can place the education robot in a placement box, and the moving structure can reduce vibration generated by the outer frame while ensuring that the outer frame moves; a first damping mechanism and a second damping mechanism can further reduce vibration generated by bumping of the placing box, and a first compression spring and a base plate can achieve a damping effect on the periphery of the placing box, so that the shaking amplitude of the placing box is reduced, a very good damping effect is achieved on the moving education robot, the robot is prevented from being damaged, and the service life of the education robot is prolonged. And normal use of the robot is ensured.

title: Internet education big data sample sequence labeling method based on deep learning
applicants: JIANGSU XIFENG EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an internet education big data sample sequence labeling method based on deep learning, and belongs to the field of language processing, and the labeling method comprises the following specific steps: (1) capturing an unlabeled data sample, and carrying out data de-duplication; (2) constructing a learning neural network, and performing test optimization on the learning neural network; (3) importing the data samples into the neural network, and meanwhile, performing sequence labeling on the data samples; (4) performing annotation data exception troubleshooting, and updating annotation rules; (5) importing the annotation data into a cloud database, and classifying and storing the annotation data; and (6) the user retrieving and viewing the annotated data and performing user evaluation feedback. According to the method, data error correction can be carried out on the annotation data, the annotation rule is updated in real time, the accuracy of sequence annotation is improved, the annotation efficiency is improved, data updating can be carried out through user feedback information, the maintenance difficulty of workers is reduced, and the working efficiency of the workers is improved.

title: Children education interaction device based on 5G artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model provides a children education interaction device based on 5G artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of children education appliances. The children education interaction device based on 5G artificial intelligence comprises a mounting bottom plate, a host is arranged at the upper end of the mounting bottom plate, a control rocker is arranged at the rear end of the host, a leg air conditioner is arranged at the bottom end of the host, a connecting base is arranged at the right end of the mounting bottom plate, a guide plate is arranged at the upper end of the connecting base, and one end of the guide plate is fixedly connected with a limiting plate. According to the child education interaction device based on 5G artificial intelligence, through mutual cooperation of a first toothed plate, a second toothed plate, a gear, a gear shaft, a U-shaped block, an electric push rod and a cross rod, the position of a child seat can be quickly adjusted and changed according to the height and weight conditions of a child; a child sitting on the child seat can keep a good distance from a host screen, legs of the child are more comfortable and relaxed, the child can be more focused during learning, and the watching effect and the interaction degree are better.

title: Intelligent fan for artificial intelligence education
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an intelligent fan for artificial intelligence education, which comprises a shell, through grooves are arranged on both the front and the back of the shell, the back of the inner wall of the shell is fixedly connected with a rotating shaft, a speed reducer and a distance detector respectively, and the speed reducer is sleeved on the surface of the rotating shaft. According to the intelligent fan for artificial intelligence education, by arranging the speed reducer, the distance detector, the infrared sensor and the shell, when the intelligent fan is used, the infrared sensor in the shell can sense the fingers of a child, the distance detector can detect the distance between the fingers of the child and the shell, and if the fingers of the child touch the shell, the intelligent fan is started; according to the intelligent fan, the speed reducer is started through the infrared sensor and the distance detector, the speed reducer enables the rotating shaft to stop rotating, namely, the fan blades stop rotating, the rotating shaft stops rotating through the infrared sensor, the distance detector and the speed reducer, the safety of the intelligent fan is improved, and the effects of high safety and good adaptability are achieved.

title: Intelligent parking lot for artificial intelligence education
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an intelligent parking lot for artificial intelligence education, which comprises a column body, a cavity is arranged in the column body, the top of the inner wall of the cavity is fixedly connected with a motor, and the top of an output shaft of the motor penetrates through the column body and is fixedly sleeved with a driving bevel gear. And the top of the column body is fixedly connected with a gearbox, the driving bevel gear is meshed with a driven bevel gear, and the inner wall of the driven bevel gear is fixedly connected with a screw rod. By arranging the baffle, the spring, the screw and the positioning rod, during use, the motor drives the screw to rotate to enable the baffle to move along the surface of the screw, the positioning rod positions the baffle, the baffle is prevented from inclining randomly during movement, the baffle is used for replacing a lifting rod, a channel is blocked when no vehicle enters and exits, and the safety of the channel is improved. The lifting rod is effectively prevented from being broken due to weather, and the effect of preventing the lifting rod from being broken is achieved.

title: Obstacle avoidance following robot for artificial intelligence education
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence education robots, and discloses an obstacle avoidance following robot for artificial intelligence education, which comprises an equipment trunk, the bottom of the equipment trunk is provided with a bottom groove, the side surface of the bottom groove is provided with four shaft grooves, and the interiors of the four shaft grooves are movably connected with rotating bearings. The obstacle avoidance following robot for artificial intelligence education is provided with a rotating bearing, a shaft groove, an extending square block, a clamping groove, a wall groove, a rolling wheel and a clamping square block, the extending square block is fixedly connected into the wall groove formed in the rotating bearing, and the clamping square block on the side face of the extending square block is fixedly connected into the clamping groove; and the connecting effect is enhanced through the clamping square blocks and the clamping grooves, the problem that the robot is lost due to the fact that rolling wheels of the artificial intelligence education obstacle-avoiding following robot are prone to falling off due to jolting is effectively solved, and the stability in the rolling process is improved.

title: AI education technology system and method thereof comprising a robotic device, a circuit device, an instruction database, a signal transmission module, a movable element, a color transducer, a carrier, a movement section, a coloring zone, and a scenario guide module
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an AI education technology system and a method thereof, of which a main structure comprises at least a robotic device, a circuit device, an instruction database, a signal transmission module, at least one movable element, at least one color transducer, a carrier, at least one movement section, at least one coloring zone, and at least one scenario guide module. Based on the above structure, a child carries out coloring that corresponds to a scenario of the scenario guide module on the coloring zone, followed by placing the robotic device on the carrier, so that the robotic device moves along the movement section and executes an operation corresponding to the color when passing through the colored coloring zone. The entire movement process of the robotic device mutually corresponds to the scenario guide module. And, the child may use an electronic device to conduct programming on the instruction database by means of the signal transmission module, in order to change the movement of the robotic device. As such, the present invention is rich in sufficient educational expansion and may also inspire and interest the child for programming.

title: METHOD FOR ALLOCATING CONTROL CHANNEL AND COMMUNICATION DEVICE THEREOF
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a communication method for fusing a 5G communication system for supporting a data transmission rate higher than a data transmission rate of a 4G system with IoT technology, and a system thereof. The present invention can be applied to intelligent services (e.g., smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car or connected car, healthcare, digital education, retail business, security and safety-related services, etc.) on the basis of 5G communication technology and IoT-related technology. The present invention relates to a method for operating a communication device for transmitting a downlink control channel and a communication device thereof. The method for operating a communication device comprises the steps of: determining a charging class of a first terminal on the basis of charging information on the first terminal; determining aggregation level setting information in a downlink control channel for the first terminal; allocating the downlink control channel to the first terminal on the basis of the aggregation level setting information; and transmitting information related to the downlink control channel to the first terminal. Therefore, the quality of DL control can be differentiated.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR DYNAMIC BEAM INDICATION MECHANISM
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. A method for operating a user equipment (UE) comprises receiving configuration information including a set of transmission configuration indicator (TCI) states; receiving a medium access control - control element (MAC-CE) indicating activation of M TCI states from the set of TCI states, where M is a positive integer; identifying a medium for indicating a TCI state update, wherein the medium is the MAC-CE or a downlink control information (DCI), and the TCI state update is from the M activated states; determining a beam based on the TCI state update; and applying the beam for a reception of both downlink (DL) control and data channels is provided.

title: 3 SYSTEM FOR PROVIDING EDUCATIONAL INFORMATION OF SURGICAL TECHNIQUES AND SKILLS AND SURGICAL GUIDE SYSTEM BASED ON MACHINE LEARNING USING 3 DIMENSIONAL IMAGE
abstract_text: A surgical technique education system according to one embodiment of the present invention comprises: a data collection unit for collecting actual surgical technique data for a patient of an operating surgeon; an image providing server for generating a 3D surgical image for surgical technique education on the basis of the actual surgical technique data; and a user device for displaying the 3D surgical image. The image providing server comprises: a patient image generation unit for generating a patient image on the basis of patient information of the patient; a surgical stage classification unit for classifying the actual surgical technique data into actual surgical technique data for each surgical stage performed by the operating surgeon; and a 3D image generation unit for generating a 3D surgical image by using the patient image and feature information detected from the actual surgical technique data. According to the present invention, spatial limitations can be overcome.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR SUPPORTING MULTIPLE MESSAGE A SIZES AND UPLINK COVERAGE FOR TWO STEP RANDOM ACCESS PROCEDURE
abstract_text: A communication method and system for converging a fifth generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a fourth generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of things (IoT) are provided. The communication method and system may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. A method by a terminal configured with at least one serving cell for performing a random access (RA) procedure is provided. The method includes measuring downlink reference signal received power (DL RSRP) of a serving cell on which the RA procedure is initiated, determining whether the DL RSRP of the serving cell is greater than a threshold, and performing a two-step RA procedure based on the DL RSRP of the serving cell being greater than the threshold.

title: Tourism education system
applicants: CHONGQING CHANGHUI CULTURE COMMUNICATION CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a tourism education system. The tourism education system comprises a course research and development person client which is used for receiving a creation instruction of a course research and development person, selecting one or more text travel materials in a preset material library, creating a study course and sending the study course to an administrator client; an administrator client is used for auditing the received study courses and sending the study courses passing the auditing to the operation platform; an operation platform is used for issuing the received study course and storing the received execution result; and a student client is used for receiving a selection instruction of a student, selecting and executing a study course to obtain an execution result, and sending the execution result to the operation platform. According to the system, artificial intelligence and tourism education are combined, and educational conversion of text travel achievements is realized.

title: AI Gonu game device based on AI learning and gonu game method using the same
abstract_text: Provided is an artificial intelligence (AI) learning-based dice game device to provide programming education easily and efficiently, and a dice game method using the same. According to the present invention, the method comprises: a first step of providing a dice game board and a game method image to a first user group and a second user group, wherein the first user group and the second user group include at least one user and a plurality of dice game-bots include a first dice game-bot corresponding to the first user group and a second dice game-bot corresponding to the second user group; a second step of providing a learning model building program to the first user group and the second user group to build a first command model and a second command model, respectively, wherein the first command model is trained to determine at least one of a direction change and a movement of the first dice game-bot on the basis of a voice command of the first user group and a second command model is trained to determine at least one of a direction change and a movement of the second dice game-bot on the basis of a voice command of the second user group; and a third step of performing a dice game between the first user group and the second user group through the learned first command model and the learned second command model, wherein steps of allowing the first user group to select one of the plurality of first dice game-bots and change the location of the selected first dice game-bots through the learned first command model and allowing the second user group to select one of the plurality of second dice game-bots and change the location of the selected second dice game-bots through the learned second command model are repeated until a game completion condition is fulfilled.

title: Balancing assembly of artificial intelligence education robot
applicants: TIANJIN GUANGYA TIMES TECH DEVELOPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of intelligent robots, in particular to a balance assembly of an artificial intelligence education robot, which comprises a base positioned at the bottom of a robot body, and the base comprises a stabilizing part fixedly arranged on the bottom surface of the robot body and a walking part rotationally connected to the bottom surface of the stabilizing part; a driving wheel used for controlling the robot body to move penetrates through the center of the bottom of the walking part, a balance part is fixedly arranged on the inner side of the walking part, a plurality of openings are formed in the bottom face of the walking part in a radial penetrating mode, and balance claws matched with the openings in number are evenly distributed on the side edge of the balance part. The balancing part, the rotating part and other structures are arranged on the inner side of the walking part, when the robot inclines towards one side, the rotating part can be used for adjusting the balance of the robot, and therefore the robot is prevented from falling down.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot with obstacle removing function
applicants: TIANJIN GUANGYA TIMES TECH DEVELOPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of intelligent robots, in particular to an artificial intelligence education robot with an obstacle clearing function, which comprises a driving mechanism, a containing table positioned on the top surface of the driving mechanism, and traveling mechanisms positioned on two sides of the driving mechanism, a driving box is fixedly arranged on the top surface of the mounting part, two sweeping parts used for removing obstacles are symmetrically arranged on the two sides of the bottom surface of the mounting part and located below the driving box, the sweeping parts are rotationally connected to the bottom surface of the mounting part, and a driving motor used for controlling the two sweeping parts to rotate relatively is arranged on the top surface of the driving box. The sweeping part used for removing obstacles is arranged in front of the driving mechanism, so that the robot is prevented from falling down when encountering the obstacles during advancing, and normal operation of the robot is ensured.

title: / COMPUTER PROGRAM METHOD AND COMPUTER SYSTEM FOR READING EDUCATION BASED ON QUANTITATIVE AND QUALITATIVE EVALUATION
abstract_text: A computer program for evaluating the complexity of a text for reading education according to the present invention is a computer program stored in a storage medium to execute the steps of: (A) the following steps (1) to (3) to calculate a quantitative index of the complexity of the text, wherein in step (1), a predetermined number of words are extracted from an introductory part, a middle part, and an end part of the text in order to evaluate the complexity of the text composed of a plurality of words and sentences, in step (2), the plurality of words included in the text are classified into predetermined word grades (Grade A, Grade B, and Grade C in descending order of difficulty) and compared with words stored in a database so as to calculate the number (X1) of different numbers that do not belong to the Grade A, and in step (3), the number (Y) of sentences of the text is calculated; B) calculating a plurality of qualitative evaluation values existing in a range of -3 to +3 and calculating an average thereof in order to calculate a qualitative index of the complexity of the text; and C) determining the complexity of the text as the sum of the quantitative index and the qualitative index. According to the present invention, by means of the computer program, it is possible to provide an algorithm for an AI-based reading learning program.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR DYNAMIC DOWNLINK MULTI-BEAM OPERATIONS IN A WIRELESS COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. A method for operating a user equipment (UE) comprises receiving configuration information about a transmission configuration indicator (TCI) state indication via a downlink control information (DCI), the configuration information including a set of TCI states and information for configuring the DCI from one of a downlink (DL) DCI (DL-DCI) and a DL-TCI-DCI, wherein the DL-DCI schedules a DL physical DL shared channel (PDSCH) assignment and the DL-TCI-DCI is a dedicated DCI for TCI state indication; receiving, based on the configuration information, the configured DCI; decoding the configured DCI to obtain a TCI state update; determining a receive beam based on the TCI state update; and applying the receive beam for a reception of a DL control or a DL data.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR CREATING VIRTUAL REALITY KIDNAPPER CHARACTER BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: Embodiments can provide a technology capable of increasing immersion and learning effect of a targeted child for an education simulation of anti-abduction. Disclosed are a method and a device for generating a virtual reality kidnapper character based on artificial intelligence. According to an embodiment, the method comprises: a step of receiving a generation condition for a kidnapper character; a step of generating the kidnapper character based on a montage image generated using an artificial intelligence-based montage model according to the generation condition and dressing data extracted from dressing database according to the generation condition; and a step of storing the montage image in the artificial intelligence-based montage model.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The utility model provides an artificial intelligence education robot which comprises an outer shell, the outer side of each lead screw is sleeved with a second gear, the outer sides of the two lead screws are jointly in threaded connection with an installation plate, an installation shell penetrating through a through hole is fixedly installed on the upper surface of the installation plate, and a processing module and a voice module are fixedly installed in the installation shell. A display screen is fixedly mounted on the upper surface of the mounting shell, a transmission antenna is fixedly mounted at the top of the display screen, motors are fixedly mounted on the two sides of the outer shell, and output shafts of the motors are sleeved with first gears meshed with the second gears. A motor is started to drive a lead screw connected through a first gear and a second gear to rotate, a mounting plate on the outer side drives a mounting shell, a display screen and a transmission antenna to move into an outer shell, and therefore the size is reduced, and the problems that an existing artificial intelligence education robot is fixed in height, large in occupied space when not used and inconvenient to use are solved. The storage is not easy, and the transportation is inconvenient.

title: Anti-collision assembly of artificial intelligence education robot
applicants: XINHUA COLLEGE OF SUN YAT SEN UNIV
abstract_text: The utility model provides an anti-collision assembly of artificial intelligence education robot, its characterized in that: including mounting ring, second mounting piece, first buffer mechanism, wherein the inner circle of mounting ring is fixedly connected with the second mounting piece, mounting ring passes through the second mounting piece is mounted on the robot, the first buffer mechanism passes through the second mounting piece, and the second buffer mechanism passes through the second mounting piece. And the first buffer mechanism is fixed on the outer ring of the mounting ring. According to the anti-collision assembly of the artificial intelligence education robot, through the buffering mechanism arranged on the outer ring of the mounting ring, all-around protection is achieved, and the problem that after the robot is clicked, precise electronic components in the robot are prone to loosening, and consequently normal operation cannot be achieved is solved.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence education robot which comprises a robot body and a robot head, the robot head is fixedly connected and installed at the upper end of the robot body, a robot mask is fixedly connected and installed on the front surface of the robot head, and robot arms are fixedly connected and installed on one side of the robot body. A camera is fixedly connected and installed on the front surface of the robot body, a groove is formed in the position, below the camera, of the front surface of the robot body, a touch screen is fixedly connected and installed on the inner surface of the groove, and a rotating table is movably connected and installed on the lower surface of the robot body. And an access door is movably connected and mounted on the rear surface of the robot main body. According to the artificial intelligence education robot, the robot mask can be conveniently detached when needed, a touch screen of the robot can be protected when the robot is not used, and the robot can be conveniently overhauled when the robot breaks down.

title: Intelligent treadmill based on HarmonyOS
abstract_text: The invention provides an intelligent treadmill based on HarmonyOS. The intelligent treadmill is characterized in that the HarmonyOS is arranged in a main control panel; an intelligent wear comprising an intelligent watch and a gait sensor is worn on the body of a user and is in Bluetooth connection with the main control panel; the main control board is connected with and controls an intelligent loudspeaker box; the main control board is connected with a cloud server through the Internet; a mobile phone and a management front-end computer are connected with the cloud server through the Internet; the main control panel comprises an AI algorithm software module, a running state monitoring software module and a running result analysis software module; the AI algorithm software module comprises a receiving storage module, an operation module and an output module; and an intelligent running program calculation formula is built in the operation module. Scientific guidance is carried out before running, during running and after running, so that the purpose of scientific exercise guidance of intelligent private education is achieved, and the technical problem of scientific running is solved.

title: AI speaking technology for language education
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence (AI) learning method to provide a real-time conversation effect with a native speaker at low cost. According to the present invention, an AI learning method comprises the following steps: enabling a learner to receive a foreign language lecture performed through a first Internet site; when the lecture is finished, enabling the learner to move to a second site in which a chat room is linked with the first site and AI is waiting; enabling the learner who moves to the second site to have a conversation with the AI in the chat room of the second site in real-time according to an interactive communication method on the basis of the lecture on the first site; calculating the number of conversation errors by the learner talking with the AI in the chat room of the second site; and when the number of conversation errors exceeds a reference value on the basis of a calculation result, enabling the learner to move to the first site and retakes the lecture, or resets a conversation with the AI at the second site and perform conversation again.

title: AI AI-based interactive feedback bot for clinical training education
abstract_text: Disclosed is an AI-based interactive feedback bot for clinical training education. The AI-based interactive feedback bot for clinical training education includes: a U-portfolio system including an AI-based interactive chatbot and a feedback bot, opening a training session, managing training records of trainees, providing medical records of patients, providing a preliminary medical examination chart, a clinical expression, a clinical skill, self-examination information, a training evaluation form, and test management information, providing question-and-answer and instructor feedback information of an instructor terminal and a trainee terminal through the AI-based interactive chatbot and the feedback bot, storing and managing the training records of the trainees and evaluation information of an instructor, and providing a U-portfolio service for clinical training education; and a user terminal registering a training place in the U-portfolio system, transmitting and receiving clinical training-related information and content, and receiving the question-and-answer and instructor feedback information of the instructor terminal and the trainee terminal and the evaluation information through the AI-based interactive chatbot and the feedback bot. Therefore, the present invention is capable of providing a training education and evaluation solution in which feedback information of instructors can be promptly received.

title: Voice sensor technology for language education
abstract_text: An artificial intelligence education method comprises: a step in which a learner takes a foreign language lecture conducted through a first site on the Internet; a step in which the learner, when the lecture that the learner takes is finished, moves to a second site which is in connection with the first site and in which a chat room with artificial intelligence waiting therein is built; a step in which the learner who has moved to the second site talks, in real-time, with the artificial intelligent in the chat room of the second site based on the contents lectured on the first site; a step of calculating the number of conversation errors made when the learner talks with the artificial intelligence in the chat room of the second site; and a step in which the learner moves to the first site and retakes the lecture or conversations with the artificial intelligence on the second site is reset and the learn takes again with the artificial intelligence on the second site when the number of conversation errors exceeds the reference value according to the calculation results. Accordingly, the artificial intelligence education method enables a learner to overcome the fear of having a conversation with a native speaker.

title: 3 3 Step System for Language Education
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence (AI) learning method to enable a learner to autonomously connect words and speak a language. According to the present invention, an AI learning method comprises the following steps: enabling a learner to take a foreign language lecture performed through a first Internet site; when the lecture is finished, moving the learner to a second site in which a chat room is built while being linked with the first site and AI is waiting; enabling the learner moving to the second site to have a conversation in real-time according to a mutual communication method with the AI in the chat room of the second site on the basis of the lecture on the first site; calculating the number of conversation errors by the learner talking with the AI in the chat room of the second site; and when the number of conversation errors exceeds a reference value on the basis of a calculation result, moving the learner to the first site and enabling the learner to retake the lecture or resetting the conversation with the AI at the second site to enable the learner to perform conversation again.

title: Emotion care integrated play platform base AI
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an infant-centered and play-centered education model service system, which provides childcare teachers, who monitor activity states of infants and produce and provide customized educational content for each infant, with guide information and a service for producing the customized educational content for the infants through the guide information. The platform comprises: an education model guide server which provides an education model frame, provides a service to upload the education model content created through the education model frame, and analyzes and provides the uploaded education model content; and a childcare teacher terminal equipped with an educational content production support application which supports the production of the educational model content for each infant through the education model frame provided through the education model guide server and uploads the produced educational model content for each infant. Accordingly, there is an effect of reducing the work of childcare teachers in the production of play contents which must be individually produced for infants.

title: Machine Learning Model for Predicting Severity Prognosis in Patients infected with COVID-19
abstract_text: Our invention is a machine education sample in envisaging strictness projection within COVID 19-infected diseased persons. The new coronavirus, dubbed is a fiber ribonucleic acid beta coronavirus that was first discovered in city, is now spreading across 6.00 continents, producing significant damage towards diseased persons having no particular methods to provide predictive results. The goal assesses achievable consequences upon chest CT regarding diseased persons having symbols, indications about metastatic medicine variables COVID-19 disturbance, correlate concerning illness. In this regard, it's also expected to construct a specific machine learning algorithmic programmed for this aim, based on pulmonic segmentation, that might identify possible prognostic factors based on further accurate data. Several hypotheses advocate machine education sample model seems effective for clinical, imaging, and medical knowledge, and capable of predicting hard prognosis of COVID-19-sufferers. Each center collects a convenience sample (at least twenty cases for each outcome) based on the inclusion and exclusion criteria. From March to May 2020, we'll judge patients who arrive at the hospital with clinical indications and symptoms of acute metastatic syndrome. title: Artificial intelligence Taekwondo Poomsae reading and education system
abstract_text: According to the present invention, an artificial intelligence system for taekwondo poomsae reading and education comprises: a camera unit photographing a movement of a user, and providing photographed exercise image data; a motion recognition unit recognizing exercise motions from exercise image data photographed and provided by the camera unit by using a deep learning-based artificial intelligence image analysis algorithm; a storage unit storing preset standard motions, and storing a specific motion pre-learned by using a deep learning-based artificial intelligence image analysis algorithm; and a score conversion unit comparing an exercise motion recognized after recognizing the specific motion among the exercise motions and a standard motion to convert the degree representing the difference into a score. The present invention recognizes exercise motions from exercise image data photographed and provided by the camera unit by using a deep learning-based artificial intelligence image analysis algorithm to eliminate the need for attaching a separate specific marker for recognizing exercise motions and can quickly recognize exercise motion in real time by sensing the direction and speed of a user movement.

title: Course allocation system and method matched with intelligent adaptive learning system
applicants: SHANGHAI SQUIRREL CLASSROOM ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence education, and discloses a course distribution system and method matched with an intelligent adaptation learning system. The method comprises the following steps: when a student account creation request is received, creating a corresponding unique code A in a student pool; when a teacher account creation request is received, creating a corresponding unique code B in the teacher pool; after a class creating request is received, creating a virtual class C; after a course allocation request is received, performing course code D allocation on the created virtual class C; after a teacher binding request is received, binding the unique code B of the teacher to the course code D allocated by the course allocation unit; binding the unique code A of the corresponding student with the distributed virtual class C; and after the unique code A, the unique code B, the virtual class C and the course code D are bound, generating a course allocation result. Students, teachers, classes and courses can be effectively associated, and course allocation is facilitated.

title: Scientific experiment simulation method based on generative adversarial network, system and equipment
applicants: SHANGHAI SQUIRREL CLASSROOM ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention is oriented to STEM education, and discloses a scientific experiment simulation method based on a generative adversarial network, a system and equipment. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring an original image of an experimental observation object through a picture library module; obtaining a target operation instruction input by a user through an operation item module; generating a scientific experiment theoretical result corresponding to the target operation instruction through a knowledge base module; inputting the original image and the scientific experiment theoretical result into a target network model through an image generation module to obtain a simulation image of the experimental observation object; and displaying the simulation image and the original image through an experiment simulation module. Through the technical scheme of the invention, the scientific experiment is not limited by time, places and experiment instruments, and each student can participate in the scientific experiment and experience the fun of learning from the scientific experiment. In addition, the user can adjust the experiment scheme according to the simulation image generated by the artificial intelligence GAN model and fed back in real time, so that the effect of experiment education is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The utility model provides an artificial intelligence education robot which comprises a base, the top of an inner cavity of the base is fixedly connected with a first motor, a rotating shaft of the first motor is fixedly connected with a first bevel gear, and the bottom of the first bevel gear is meshed with a second bevel gear. And a first rotating shaft is fixedly connected to the interior of the second bevel gear, and the two sides of the first rotating shaft extend to the exterior of the base to be fixedly connected with rolling wheels. According to the artificial intelligence education robot, the effect of supporting the box body is achieved through the base, the effect of driving the first rotating shaft and the rolling wheels to rotate is achieved through the first motor, the first bevel gear and the second bevel gear, and the effect of driving the base to move is achieved through the first rotating shaft and the rolling wheels; the effect of adjusting the height of the supporting plate is achieved through the electric telescopic rod and the fixing plate, the intelligent education robot is convenient to move, the height and angle of a screen can be adjusted, and people can watch conveniently.

title: ICT Learing device for integrated ICT education
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a learning device for integrated information and communication technology (ITC) education, which is configured to integrally perform coding learning, artificial intelligence learning, voice recognition control learning, green energy learning, and Internet of Things learning with one device and enable selective use of commercial power and solar power. According to the present invention, the learning device comprises: a power supply unit selectively applying commercial power or solar power; a control unit electrically connected to the power supply unit and driven by the commercial power or solar power, receiving signals of various preset variable values by type, and transmitting signals of the received variable value; a driving unit electrically connected to the control unit and driven according to the signal of the variable value transmitted from the control unit; and a main body unit allowing the power supply unit, the driving unit, and the control unit to be separately disposed therein.

title: Auxiliary learning device and method
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of intelligent education, and particularly relates to an auxiliary learning device and method.The auxiliary learning device mainly comprises an image collecting module, a clock module, a learning processing module, a storage module and a display module.The facial expression of a user is determined through a deep learning algorithm, and then the concentration level of the user is determined; the learning difficulty level of the user can be adjusted according to the concentration level condition of the user in different time periods, the learning plan and test questions suitable for a single individual can be specifically generated by analyzing data generated by a specific user, the learning plan can be scientifically provided for the user, and learning interest and enthusiasm of the user are continuously stimulated.

title: Novel artificial intelligence education interaction device
applicants: ZHEJIANG ZHIYUN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a novel artificial intelligence education interaction device which comprises a tablet personal computer, a frame body is installed outside the tablet personal computer, cylindrical shafts are symmetrically and integrally formed in the middle of the outer wall of the frame body, metal grooves are symmetrically formed in the edges of the surface of the frame body, and sliding blocks are movably arranged on the inner sides of the metal grooves. A metal groove is formed in the surface of the acrylic plate, a threaded rod is inserted into the inner side of the sliding block, the threaded rod is rotationally connected with the sliding block in a threaded mode, guide rods are arranged on the two sides of the threaded rod, the guide rods penetrate through the sliding block, and a protection plate is arranged on one side of the metal groove. The protective cover is arranged on the panel computer, so that glasses of a user can be protected, a screen of the panel computer is shielded through the acrylic plate, the screen of the panel computer can be well prevented from being scratched, and the acrylic plate has good rigidity and strength, so that the screen of the panel computer is prevented from being damaged due to collision.

title: Artificial intelligence education interaction device
applicants: CHONGQING HUANJIEZHI INNOVATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of education interaction equipment, in particular to an artificial intelligence education interaction device which comprises a display, a supporting plate arranged below the display, table legs fixed on the left side and the right side below the supporting plate, an adjusting plate hinged to the front end of the supporting plate, a supporting rod hinged to the middle of the front end of each table leg, and a long groove formed in the top end of the supporting rod. The top end of the telescopic rod is hinged to the bottom of the adjusting plate, a screw groove is formed in the bottom end of the telescopic rod, a screw rod extending out of the notch of the screw groove is in threaded connection with the interior of the screw groove, the rear end of the long groove is rotationally connected with a driving bevel gear located on the rear side of the screw rod, and the lower portion of the driving bevel gear is meshed with a driven bevel gear; a right supporting column fixed above the supporting plate is arranged on the right side of the displayer. A side groove is formed in the middle of the left side of the right supporting column. The utility model has the beneficial effects that the height and the angle can be adjusted according to the use requirements, the adjustment is convenient, and the use safety is high.

title: Education question automatic correction method and device and electronic equipment
applicants: ZUOYEBANG EDUCATION TECH BEIJING CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of online education, and provides an education question automatic correction method and device and electronic equipment, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the information of a to-be-corrected question, wherein the information comprises a question type, a question stem, parameters and a to-be-corrected answer; processing the information of the to-be-corrected question to obtain a calculation formula of the question; and carrying out calculating according to a calculation formula and parameters to obtain a standard answer, and judging whether the to-be-corrected answer is accurate. According to the method and device, the keywords in the question text are automatically identified and extracted, the keywords are converted into the feature vectors to be input into the trained machine learning model, the model outputs the calculation formula of the question, and the standard answer can be calculated in combination with the parameters in the question, so that whether the answer to be corrected is correct or not is corrected. By applying the method, an application system can automatically correct calculation questions online, compared with the prior art, the correction process is simple, the correction efficiency is high, the accuracy rate is stable, and manpower, material resources and educational resources are saved.

title: Method and apparatus for providing education service using satellite imagery based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: Provided is a service providing apparatus using satellite imagery. The service providing apparatus includes a satellite image information acquirer configured to acquire a satellite image; an object extractor configured to analyze the satellite image, extract an object from the satellite image, and generate an object image corresponding to the object; a storage configured to store the satellite image and the object image; and a service processing unit configured to provide an object extraction-based service and coding data associated with the object extraction-based service, based on at least one of the satellite image and the object image, and thereby provides a method of identifying and classifying various types of objects and buildings present on the ground surface based on image data on the ground surface.

title: METHOD, SYSTEM, AND PLATFORM FOR DELIVERY OF EDUCATIONAL INFORMATION AND PELVIC HEALTH MANAGEMENT
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to effective, efficient, and economical methods and systems for improving patient engagement, education, and treatment management. In particular, the present disclosure relates to a unique configuration of technology wherein analysis by artificial intelligence may determine improvement to treatment plans and may adjust such treatment plans to improve patient care or reduce cost.

title: Artificial intelligence robot based on AI education
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence robots, in particular to an artificial intelligence robot based on AI education. The artificial intelligence robot comprises a robot main body, fixing holes are formed in the outer surface, close to the corner positions of the periphery, of the rear end of the robot main body, fixing blocks are arranged inside the fixing holes, the fixing blocks are of T-shaped structures and are connected and match with the interiors of the fixing holes in a clamped mode, first springs are fixedly connected to the positions, close to the middle positions, of the outer surfaces of the front ends of the fixing blocks, the ends, away from the fixing blocks, of the first springs are fixedly connected to the interiors of the fixing holes, and buffer plates are fixedly connected to the outer surfaces of the rear ends of the fixing blocks. According to the artificial intelligence robot, a certain buffer and vibration reduction effect is achieved when the robot main body falls off, so that the buffer plates are in rigid contact with the ground, the damage probability of the robot main body can be reduced, the maintenance cost is reduced, meanwhile, an anti-blue-ray screen can be effectively fixed, the eyes of an infant can be effectively protected, and harm of the display screen to the eyes of the infant is reduced.

title: Damping device of artificial intelligence education robot
applicants: GUANGZHOU COLLEGE OF TECH AND BUSINESS
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a damping device of an artificial intelligence education robot, and particularly relates to the field of robots, the damping device comprises a robot supporting leg, a mounting groove is fixedly arranged in the robot supporting leg, a driving box is arranged in the mounting groove, and the two sides of the driving box are fixedly connected with limiting columns; first damping springs are fixedly arranged on the peripheries of the limiting columns, limiting holes are fixedly formed in the two side walls of the interior of the mounting groove, a pressing plate is fixedly connected to the bottom end of the driving box, a damping air bag is fixedly connected to the bottom end of the pressing plate, a fixing plate is fixedly connected to the bottom end of the damping air bag, and a fixing rail is fixedly connected to the top end of the driving box. And a sliding groove is fixedly formed in the fixed rail. The damping device is novel in design, a good damping effect can be achieved on the robot, the robot is not prone to bumping and shaking when moving, the stability performance of the robot is improved, internal parts are not prone to being damaged, and the damping device is practical.

title: Multimedia intelligent sound equipment for AI education
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of sound equipment, in particular to multimedia intelligent sound equipment for AI education, which comprises a sound equipment main body, a microphone arranged at the front end of the sound equipment main body, a loudspeaker arranged below the microphone at the front end of the sound equipment main body, a threaded rod arranged in a strip-shaped groove, and a threaded rod arranged in the strip-shaped groove. The end portion of the threaded rod is fixedly connected with the output end of the motor, the threaded rod is sleeved with a first moving block, a dustproof cover is arranged in front of the sound box body, the sliding block is fixedly connected with the side wall of the dustproof cover, a screen support is arranged in the placing opening, a cover plate is arranged on the screen support, a rotating shaft is arranged in the screen support, and the rotating shaft is fixedly connected with the sliding block. According to the utility model, the defects in the prior art are overcome, the dustproof cover is arranged at the front end of the sound box, and the threaded rod is arranged on the side wall, so that the dustproof cover and the screen can ascend and descend under the rotation of the threaded rod, the dustproof effect of the loudspeaker and the microphone can be prevented when the sound box is not used, and the screen cannot be broken due to external impact.

title: Education device based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an educational device based on artificial intelligence. The educational device comprises a main body structure, and an educational structure and an attendance checking structure which are arranged in the main body structure, the main body structure comprises a first box body and a second box body, and the first box body is movably connected with the second box body through a shaft body. The fingerprint identifier is matched with an intelligent fingerprint identification program installed in the notebook computer, so that a teacher can be assisted to realize attendance checking, the labor intensity of the teacher is reduced, and the attendance checking time is saved; and secondly, the first box body and the second box body are buckled, the lock and the lock catch are locked, and the first box body and the second box body form a closed box body, so that the whole box body can be lifted and moved through the lifting handle when the box body is carried and moved, and the box body is small in size, easy to carry and more convenient to use.

title: Mutimedia education system using Artificial Intelligence and Method for supporting learning
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an online learning support system for identifying the degree of concentration of a learner on a lecture through face recognition on the learner and inducing rewarding and concentration in accordance with the identified degree of concentration, and a support method thereof. The online learning support system includes: an image recognition part acquiring and recognizing a face image including a facial expression of a learner participating in online learning; a concentration analysis part concentrating the degree of concentration of the learner on a lecture by analyzing a face image recognized by the image recognition part; and a reward providing part providing a reward to the learner when the degree of concentration of the learner on the lecture is no less than a predetermined reference value, in accordance with the degree of concentration of the learner on the lecture analyzed by the concentration analysis part. Through the online learning support system, there can be an effect of improving interest and participation in online education by identifying and analyzing the degree of participation of the learner performing online learning and his or her reaction.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR RANDOM ACCESS PROCEDURE
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. Methods and apparatuses for random access procedures in a wireless communication system. A method for operating a user equipment (UE) includes receiving a system information block (SIB) in a downlink bandwidth (DL) part (BWP). The DL BWP is linked to a first uplink (UL) BWP. The SIB includes an indication for one or more UL BWPs. The method further includes transmitting a physical random access channel (PRACH) in a second UL BWP from the one or more UL BWPs. The second UL BWP is different than the first UL BWP.

title: Assessment system and method for education based on artificial intelligence
applicants: UNIV INDUSTRY FOUNDATION YONSEI UNIV WONJU CAMPUS [KR]
abstract_text: Provided is an artificial intelligence-based education evaluation system, which can quantitatively analyze and evaluate the evaluations of a trainee, either subjective or oral, based on artificial intelligence, and score the evaluations. The education evaluation system can reconstruct evaluation data in the subjective or oral form, which is difficult to calculate in real time among various types of lecture evaluation data provided by the trainee, into sentence data in the text form, and quantitatively analyze and evaluate the same to calculate the evaluation score.

title: System and method for providing services for artificial intelligence-based fashion design education and support for the start-up of fashion items
abstract_text: A method of providing AI-based fashion design education and startup support service according to an embodiment of the present invention comprises the steps of: subscribing a the curriculum service corresponding to the age or learning difficulty after executing a fashion design education service platform in a member terminal; performing online submission of images and production intentions for fashion design products and production processes in which fashion design knowledge learned in a step-by-step learning process of the registered curriculum at the member terminal is reflected; analyzing the images of the fashion design products and the production processes by using an AI analysis algorithm in a platform management server, detecting an image area that reflects the knowledge or skills or characteristics related to the academic content introduced in the corresponding curriculum, and evaluating and grading the understanding of the curriculum through a combination of detected image regions; and providing the member terminal with a curriculum in which the difficulty of the class is adjusted according to the level of understanding. Systematic training can be provided.

title: Multimedia intelligent sound equipment for AI education
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a multimedia intelligent sound for AI education, which comprises a sound, full-frequency loudspeakers and a rear seat, a touch display screen is mounted in the middle of the front side surface of the sound, an LED (light-emitting diode) luminous lamp is arranged above the touch display screen, and a group of full-frequency loudspeakers is mounted on each of the left and right parts of the front side surface of the sound. The center of each group of full-frequency loudspeakers is provided with an air hole, the lower part of the rear side surface of the sound equipment is provided with a rear seat, the upper part of the rear seat is provided with a rear housing, and the left side surface and the right side surface of the rear housing are provided with USB interfaces, charging interfaces and network cable interfaces. The multimedia intelligent sound equipment for AI education is reasonable in structure, the touch display screen and the full-frequency loudspeakers are installed on the front side face of the sound equipment of the equipment body, touch operation and use can be conducted on the touch display screen, the multimedia intelligent sound equipment is intelligent and more flexible and convenient to use, the full-frequency loudspeakers are arranged on the left side and the right side of the touch display screen, and the sound equipment is more convenient to use. Therefore, the sound is released more stereoscopically, and the auditory experience is richer.

title: Balance assembly of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The invention provides a balance assembly of an artificial intelligence education robot, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The balance assembly based on the artificial intelligence education robot comprises a balance table and a balance block, an adjusting groove is formed in the lower end of the balance table in a penetrating mode, a buffer cylinder is fixedly connected to the upper end of the interior of the adjusting groove, and a buffer plate is slidably connected to the position, relative to the lower end of a wave-shaped elastic plate, in the buffer cylinder. The lower end of the buffer plate is fixedly connected with a buffer column, the lower end of the buffer column is fixedly connected with an adjusting plate, the lower end of the adjusting plate is fixedly connected with a supporting block, and universal wheels are arranged on the periphery of the lower end of the supporting block and opposite to the lower end of the pressure sensor. A balance groove is formed in the upper end, opposite to the adjusting groove, of the interior of the balance table, and the balance block is arranged in the middle of the lower end of the interior of the balance groove. By means of the device, the stability of the robot during walking can be effectively improved, and cushioning protection can be effectively achieved.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot
applicants: SHAANXI YIKE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence education robot, and relates to the technical field of education robots, the artificial intelligence education robot comprises a machine body and a base, and the base is located at the bottom of the machine body; balancing rods are fixed to the middles of the left and right sides of the machine body, supporting rods are vertically fixed to the outer ends of the bottoms of the balancing rods, suction cups are welded to the tail ends of the supporting rods, sliding blocks are fixed to the bottoms of the left and right sides of the supporting rods, and inner rods are movably embedded into the supporting rods. A groove is formed in the middle of the upper surface of the base, a rubber pad and springs are arranged on the periphery of the inner wall of the groove, the springs are evenly distributed on the inner wall of the groove, one end of each spring is fixedly connected with the inner wall of the groove, and the other end of each spring is fixed to the outer wall of the rubber pad. A bottom groove penetrating through the inner bottom of the rubber pad is formed in the inner bottom of the groove; the base has the advantages that a user can conveniently and freely assemble and disassemble the base according to the moving and carrying requirements, and the assembling and disassembling process is simple, convenient and easy to operate.

title: Anti-collision assembly of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The invention discloses an anti-collision assembly of an artificial intelligence education robot. The anti-collision assembly comprises a rectangular mounting frame, anti-collision blocks with arc-shaped outer sides are arranged outside the peripheral surface of the mounting frame, two moving grooves are formed in the side, close to the mounting frame, of each anti-collision block, and a moving block is glidingly connected into each moving groove; two moving rods are fixedly connected to the outer wall of the periphery of the mounting frame, the end, away from the mounting frame, of each moving rod is inserted into the corresponding moving groove and is fixedly connected with the corresponding moving block, a first spring is fixedly connected between each anti-collision block and the mounting frame, an inserting groove is formed in the upper end of each anti-collision block, a telescopic groove is formed in the inner wall of the side, close to the mounting frame, of each inserting groove, a moving plate is glidingly connected into each telescopic groove, and a limiting clamping block is fixedly connected to the end, close to the corresponding inserting groove, of each moving plate. The anti-collision assembly has the advantages that active and passive anti-collision protection effects are achieved, and the safety of the artificial intelligence education robot is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence education system based on big data and data processing method
applicants: LTD COMPANY OF ELECTRON OF HEBEI TIMES
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of big data processing, in particular to an artificial intelligence education system based on big data and a data processing method, which objectively reflect the overall quality behavior of students through a comprehensive score sheet obtained by combining a score score sheet and a quality score sheet, reduce the personal impression of only relying on teachers, prefect scientific statistics, and improve the objectivity and accuracy of evaluation. The method includes: recording scores, names and personal photos of the students, and generating score texts for sending; receiving the score text, establishing a student score package, and adding and storing the score text to the student score package; reading the student score package, and generating classified student score packages; shooting and recording classroom behaviors of students, and generating a video file for transmission; and receiving the video file, establishing a student video package, and adding the received video file into the student video packet and storing the student video package.

title: DEEP LEARNING MODEL FOR GENERATING PHASE HOLOGRAM AT HIGH SPEED AND LEARNING METHOD THEREOF
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a deep learning model specializing in generating a phase hologram using a hyperbolic tangent function and a Parseval identical equation. In order to develop a deep learning model receiving a random image and generating a phase hologram corresponding to the same, a learning method using the hyperbolic tangent function and the Parseval identical equation is developed. According to the present invention, in order to generate a phase hologram with deep learning, a learning method to which an optical property of the phase hologram is reflected is developed. In order to remove the periodicity of the phase hologram generated with the deep learning model, the hyperbolic tangent function is normalized within a range of (-1,1) to be formed into a one-to-one function. Also, since the accuracy of the phase hologram is not easy to evaluate due to its meaningless form, the phase hologram is restored into a preferred image and normalized, and then, an error with an original image is calculated. Here, in order to prevent a confusion caused by the normalization, the restored image is normalized with a Parseval coefficient set on every image. As the phase hologram is generated with deep learning, time required for the generation of the phase hologram can be considerably reduced. Therefore, a three-dimensional image can be reproduced in real time in a three-dimensional image platform such as AR/VR or the like. Therethrough, a new chapter of various content markets based on three-dimensional images such as culture, education, art and the like can be started.

title: METHOD DEVICE AND SYSTEM FOR PROVIDING HUMAN RESOURCE MANAGEMENT SOLUTION BASE ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: An embodiment of the present invention provides a method for providing a human resource management solution based on artificial intelligence, which includes the steps of: calculating attendance, absence, and lateness for a first employee based on the attendance, absence, and lateness of one of the employees registered in the talent management solution; calculating the work performance sincerity for the first employee based on the work performance details of the first employee; calculating the degree of integrity of taking the training for the first employee based on the training history of the first employee; calculating the competency value for the first employee by summing the absenteeism and tardiness level, the work performance level, and the education level; analyzing the talent level of the first employee by comparing the average competency value of the first employee in the first group, when the first employee is included in the first group grouped based on industry, job, and position; sending a notification message of achievement of merit performance to the first employee terminal where the first employee's account is logged in, when it is confirmed that the talent level of the first employee is higher than the preset first reference level; and sending a capability management alert notification message to the first employee terminal above, when it is confirmed that the talent level of the first employee is lower than the preset second reference level.

title: A METHOD SYSTEM AND APPARATUS FOR PROVIDING EDUCATION CURRICULUM
abstract_text: According to an embodiment, the present invention relates to a method for providing a learning curriculum by analyzing academic achievement, performed by a control system, which includes the steps of: obtaining an identifier for specifying the identity of a first student as a learning target and a learning progress index for specifying the learning progress of the first student; obtaining an image obtained by photographing a problem sheet on which problem solving and scoring are completed during the learning of a first unit, by using an imaging unit of an electronic device; generating an input vector by encoding the image, and applying the same to an input layer of a pre-trained convolutional neural network; obtaining a first output value from an output layer of the convolutional neural network; inputting the first output value and an auxiliary output value stored in a database within the control system into a pre-trained neural network; obtaining a second output value from an output layer of the neural network; analyzing the type and difficulty level of a first problem according to the degree of similarity; determining the type and difficulty level of a second problem included in a second unit to be learned after the first unit; and providing a learning curriculum according to the type and difficulty level of the second problem. According to an embodiment, based on artificial intelligence, it is possible to determine the difficulty level of a curriculum in a subsequent learning field in consideration of an academic level of each student on each learning content.

title: IDIOM BLANK-FILLING QUESTION ANSWER SELECTION METHOD AND APPARATUS, AND COMPUTER DEVICE
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: The present application relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides an idiom blank-filling question answer selection method and apparatus, a computer device, and a storage medium. The method comprises: obtaining a question text of an idiom blank-filling question, wherein the question text comprises a blank-filling text and n candidate idioms, and the blank-filling text comprises m blanks to be filled with the candidate idioms (S1); obtaining explanation texts of all the candidate idioms (S2); inputting the blank-filling text and the explanation texts into a pre-trained idiom selection blank-filling model, and obtaining a confidence degree for filling each candidate idiom into each blank (S3); selecting m idioms from the n candidate idioms to form multiple answer sets (S4); calculating the sum of the confidence degrees for filling the candidate idioms in each answer set into the blanks (S5); obtaining the answer set having the highest confidence degree sum, and outputting as an answer for the idiom blank-filling question (S6). The present solution uses artificial intelligence, and obtains idiom blank-filling answers with high efficiency and high accuracy. The present solution may also be applied to the field of smart education, so as to promote the construction of smart cities.

title: Construction site personnel safety management system
applicants: CHINA RAILWAY CONSTRUCTION ENG GROUP GUANGDONG CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a construction site personnel safety management system. The system comprises a personnel dynamic monitoring unit, a personnel real-name system unit, an AI intelligent identification unit, a three-level safety education unit, a VR safety education unit, a VR quality template unit, a BIM model unit, a construction participant data analysis unit, an attendance management unit, a central processor and a cloud platform. The scheme provided by the invention is suitable for strictly managing elements such as working posts, plan arrangement, authority of entering and exiting a construction site, personnel distribution, safe material flow and the like of the operating personnel, realizes real-time and accurate positioning of the operating personnel and equipment, and establishes a complete and real-time management information system, the purposes of implementing responsibility, improving the technical level of safety production and ensuring safety production are achieved, particularly, when a disaster occurs, the specific location and position of a person in distress can be accurately and rapidly recognized, and the rescue efficiency and the rescue effect are improved.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR UPLINK TRANSMISSIONS IN FRAME-BASED EQUIPMENT NR UNLICENSED
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. A method performed by a terminal operating in a shared spectrum channel is provided. The method comprises: receiving, from a base station, downlink (DL) transmission in a channel occupancy time (COT); identifying a time gap between the DL transmission and a uplink (UL) transmission; identifying whether to perform a channel sensing before the UL transmission based on the time gap; and transmitting, to the base station, the UL transmission within the COT.

title: Artificial intelligence abnormity identification method applied to intelligent education
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence abnormity identification method applied to intelligent education. The method comprises the following steps: receiving first invigilation information sent by an examination management terminal and second invigilation information sent by intelligent invigilation equipment; segmenting the monitoring video according to a preset step length to generate an invigilation image sequence; and processing the invigilation image sequence according to the examination seat distribution information and the examinee seat mapping information to obtain an examinee invigilation sequence packet, and processing the examinee invigilation sequence packet to obtain an anomaly identification feature vector; and inputting the anomaly recognition feature vector into an artificial intelligence anomaly recognition model to recognize whether the corresponding examinee has a cheating behavior or not. When the artificial intelligence anomaly recognition model recognizes that the corresponding examinee has a cheating behavior, cheating warning information is sent to the examination management terminal; and when the artificial intelligence exception recognition model recognizes that the corresponding examinee does not have the cheating behavior, performing updating training on the artificial intelligence exception recognition model according to the exception recognition feature vector.

title: Anti-collision assembly of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The anti-collision assembly of the artificial intelligence education robot comprises an anti-collision piece and a fixing piece used for being connected with the robot, the anti-collision piece comprises an outer frame and a rubber air bag fixed to the outer wall of the outer frame, an inflation nozzle is installed on the rubber air bag, the outer frame is arranged outside the fixing piece in a sleeved mode, and the inflation nozzle is connected with the outer frame. The fixing piece comprises a fixing frame and at least two sets of clamping devices arranged in the fixing frame, and at least two spring telescopic rods are connected between the outer frame and the fixing frame.
