According to the anti-collision assembly of the artificial intelligence education robot, the circular-ring-shaped anti-collision piece is arranged, the anti-collision piece is arranged outside the robot, the robot can be separated from the external environment by a certain distance, and therefore collision caused by the fact that the robot is too close to other external components is avoided, the anti-collision position angle is more comprehensive through the circular-ring-shaped structure, and the anti-collision effect is better. And meanwhile, the anti-collision piece can be installed at the proper position outside the robot through the fixing piece, and anti-collision protection is effectively and flexibly conducted on the robot.

title: E-sports education platform based on cloud computing
applicants: BLUE OCEAN LINGHANG E SPORTS SHANDONG CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of cloud computing, in particular to an e-sports education platform based on cloud computing, which comprises a distributed cloud computing server group and a user side, wherein the distributed cloud computing server comprises a plurality of cloud computing servers which are connected in parallel; the user side is configured to be used for collecting operation data and sending the operation data to the distributed cloud computing server group. The AI role behavior optimization chain is generated by acquiring the AI role behavior data and the user role behavior data of the user side and cooperating with the distributed cloud computing server group to predict the user role behavior, so that the rationality of the AI role behavior of the user side is improved, the user role is resisted, and the purpose of training the user behavior is achieved. In this way, automatic training of the e-sports trainee is achieved, even if the trainee can control the user role to fail the AI role, the AI role will confront the user role controlled by the trainee according to the adjusted behavior, and therefore the operation ability of the trainee is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence education device
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of education devices, and discloses an artificial intelligence education device which comprises an intelligent education machine body, a first supporting seat and a second supporting seat are symmetrically arranged below the intelligent education machine body, and a holding rod is fixedly arranged between the first supporting seat and the second supporting seat. A first supporting rod and a second supporting rod are vertically and fixedly arranged on the upper surface of the first supporting base and the upper surface of the second supporting base respectively, and the intelligent education machine body is located between the first supporting rod and the second supporting rod. The two sides of the intelligent education machine body are rotationally connected with the first supporting rod and the second supporting rod through a first rotating shaft and a second rotating shaft respectively, and a limiting mechanism is arranged between the first rotating shaft and the first supporting rod. The intelligent education machine is convenient for people to carry and use, is convenient for adjusting the angle of the intelligent education machine body, and improves the learning efficiency of people.

title: KOREAN DICTATION EDUCATION SYSTEM USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: According to one embodiment of the present invention, since cursive information of a presented word can be naturally machine-learned based on cursive data on the presented word, it is easy to collect, store, manage, and analyze learning data, and thereby increase the accuracy of handwriting recognition. To this end, in particular, according to an embodiment of the present invention, there is provided a Hangul dictation education system using artificial intelligence, comprising: a word learning unit configured to learn cursive information of a presented word based on cursive data on the presented word; a question output unit configured to output a word to be dictated; a cursive writing input unit into which dictation answer information is input in response to the output word to be dictated; a word recognition unit configured to recognize a word corresponding to the input dictation answer information based on the learned cursive information; and a dictation determining unit configured to match the recognized word and the output word to be dictated word to each other to determine whether an answer is correct or not.

title: Method, device and equipment for processing questions, medium and program product
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: According to the example embodiment of the invention, the invention provides a method and device for processing questions, equipment, a medium and a program product. The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of intelligent search, intelligent education and deep learning. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the steps: recognizing an image comprising at least one question, so that the text content and the text position of a text in the image are determined; determining a question type of the at least one question based on the text content; determining a question stem position and an answering position of at least one question based on the image; if it is determined that the text position is matched with the question stem position, determining a question stem text at the question stem position from the text content; and displaying an answer to the at least one question at the answering position, wherein the answer is generated based on the stem text and the question type. According to the embodiment of the invention, the answer area and the answer can be accurately determined.

title: AI helping children to grow up based on AIArtificial Intelligence deep learning
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a robot having an objective to grow a child through conversation with an AI robot by including an AI robot module for conversation (110), natural language processing technology, and deep learning technology. The AI robot is configured to provide a user input module configured to receive a natural language input from a user and a conversational AI robot service based on the natural language input. The AI robot communicates with the child to improve conversational ability of the child, and the robot and the child can teach what they learned to each other and grow together. Accordingly, the present invention allows the child to satisfy intimacy, emotional development, and fun. Moreover, the present invention acts as a guardian to protect the child from danger, and the AI robot helps growth of the child accordingly, when education and growth of the child is slow.

title: Hand raising recognition method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a hand raising recognition method and device, relates to the field of image processing, in particular to the field of artificial intelligence such as computer vision and deep learning, and can be used for gesture recognition and intelligent education scenes. The method comprises the steps of extracting upper body key points of a human body from a collected human body image, extracting a first feature image based on the upper body key points, inputting the first feature image into a human body action recognition model, and outputting a first score which is recognized as a hand raising action executed by the human body; determining hand key points from the upper body key points; based on the hand key point, extracting a second image feature of the hand, inputting the second image feature into a hand classification model, and outputting a second score which is identified as that the palm is in an open state; and recognizing the hand raising state according to the first score and the second score. According to the invention, double recognition of the human body posture and the human hand state is fused, so that the recognition of the hand raising action of the human body is realized in the relatively fuzzy long-range image with a relatively small human body, and the accuracy of human body hand raising recognition is effectively improved.

title: Education question and answer implementation method and device based on deep learning and server
abstract_text: The invention discloses an educational question and answer implementation method and device based on deep learning and a server. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a to-be-processed question statement; respectively inputting the statements into a pre-established classification model, a query model and a condition model, and outputting a table identifier; outputting at least one associated column and an aggregation processing mode for the associated column; outputting at least one condition column, a processing mode of each condition column and a function relationship of different condition columns; generating a query statement according to the table identifier, the association column, the aggregation processing mode of the association column, the condition column, the processing mode of the condition column and the function relationship of different condition columns; and obtaining answer information corresponding to the query statement from a table corresponding to the table identifier according to the query statement, and taking the answer information as an answer of the to-be-processed question statement. The embodiment of the invention can flexibly deal with the situation that the answer of the question needs to query a single table or multiple tables, widens the application range, omits the process of data conversion, and saves manpower and time cost.

title: Garbage classification propaganda and education and throwing intelligent supervision system based on visual AI technology
applicants: SUZHOU VORTEX INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of garbage classification supervision, and discloses a garbage classification propaganda and education and throwing intelligent supervision system based on the visual AI technology. The system comprises a general control unit, an image collection assembly, a sound box, a power supply unit and a network unit. The supervision method corresponding to the system comprises the following steps that A, the image collection assembly acquires a garbage throwing resident face image and a garbage throwing image; B, resident face information is recognized through an MTCNN face detection and ArcFace face recognition algorithm; C, the previous throwing violation behaviors of the throwing residents are searched for, and targeted garbage classification propaganda and education contents are played; D, all garbage bags appearing in the image acquired in the step A are recognized by using a garbage bag type identification algorithm based on an extreme learning machine; E, each garbage bag is matched with the corresponding throwing resident through a person-bag space distance calculation method; and F, whether the garbage thrown into garbage cans is compliant or not is recognized based on the visual AI, the throwing record of each resident is generated, and the throwing behavior of the resident at this time is recorded.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR EXTRACTING STRUCTURED DATA FROM IMAGE, AND DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: A method and an apparatus for extracting structured data from an image, and a device and a storage medium, relating to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises inputting an image for structured data extraction into a position detection model to obtain coordinates of each region for recognition in the image, slicing the regions for recognition and then performing transformation processing, inputting the regions for recognition from before transformation and after transformation into a recognition model to obtain initial recognition results, filtering target recognition results for each region for recognition from the initial recognition results, selecting classification results on the basis of the similarity between characters of each target recognition result and characters of each classification in a lexicon, and generating a structured data file on the basis of each classification result and the target recognition results. Structured data can thus be accurately extracted from image recognition results. In addition, the invention further relates to image recognition technology and blockchain technology within artificial intelligence, and can be applied in such fields as smart government and smart education, thereby promoting the construction of smart cities.

title: Artificial intelligence online education terminal
applicants: HONGGOUGOU EDUCATION INFORMATION CONSULTING CHENGDU CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence online education terminal, which relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and comprises a machine body and a projection head, the projection head is embedded in the lower part of the machine body, the lower surface of the machine body is provided with a groove III penetrating through the front and back surfaces of the machine body, and the upper end of the projection head is embedded in the groove III. Standing feet are fixedly connected to the left side and the right side of the lower surface of the machine body, a display screen is embedded in the front face of the machine body, two first grooves which are in bilateral symmetry are formed in the upper end of the rear face of the machine body, the first grooves are obliquely formed, and second grooves are formed in the left side and the right side of the lower end of the rear face of the machine body; rotating blocks, sleeves, moving blocks and supporting plates are embedded into the first groove and the second groove; the projection device has the advantages of being convenient to carry and convenient to adjust the height of the projection head.

title: Professional learning path system and method based on hierarchical task network planning model learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a professional learning path system based on hierarchical task network planning model learning. The professional learning path system comprises a hierarchical task network (HTN) model of a professional knowledge structure, a knowledge structure HTN model learning module (HTNML) and a learning path generation module (SHOP2). The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence planning and online education, and particularly provides the professional learning path system and method based on the hierarchical task network planning model learning. According to the method, a learning path is abstractly understood as the hierarchical task network planning model; and on the basis of the incomplete professional knowledge structure HTN model constructed by experts and starting from observation of incomplete online education state data (namely user data), a professional learning level task network planning model is constructed, and a proper learning path to be recommended to a user is calculated according to the learning target and demand of the user of an online education system.

title: System for controlling of mobile container pool for survival swimming education based on Artificial Intelligence having a sensor unit capable of measuring the air temperature
abstract_text: According to an embodiment of the present invention, a swimming pool control system comprises: a swimming pool formed in a movable container; and a control device controlling a swimming pool condition related to water stored in an inner space of the swimming pool, wherein the swimming pool condition comprises water quality, water temperature, and a water level of the swimming pool.

title: System for controlling of mobile container pool for survival swimming education based on Artificial Intelligence having a control unit capable of controlling the condition of divided swimming pool areas
abstract_text: A swimming pool control system according to an embodiment of the present invention comprises a swimming pool formed of a mobile container and a control device for controlling a swimming pool condition related to water stored in the inner space of the swimming pool, wherein the swimming pool condition may include water quality, water temperature, and water level of pool water.

title: Two-way real-time AI coding education learning support system
applicants: UNIV NAT HANBAT IND ACAD COOP FOUND [KR]
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a bidirectional real-time artificial intelligence coding education supporting system and, more specifically, to a bidirectional real-time artificial intelligence coding education supporting system, wherein the learning content of coding education is classified into twelve stages corresponding to the learning stages of school education for mentoring corresponding to the level of a student in coding education, the learning content is classified into seven areas of mathematics, science, information, language, society, arts, and physical education for each of the learning stages, and coding stages are classified in detail depending on the aptitude of the student, thereby enabling mentoring depending on the aptitude and level of the student. For the purpose, the present invention comprises: a user terminal for carrying out coding education; and a coding education supporting server connected to the user terminal to be able to communicate data, providing user-customized learning content to the user terminal for each of the learning stages, each of the learning areas, and each of the coding stages, and providing customized mentoring information by analyzing the learning level and performance level of the user based on artificial intelligence. The coding education supporting server includes: a communication part for carrying out data communication with the user terminal; an education material part for providing stage-specific learning materials for each of the learning stages, each of the learning areas, and each of the coding stages; a student management part for analyzing and managing virtual study room groups, and the personal information, learning level analysis and log records of a user; and an intelligent control part for analyzing the approach level and performance level of a student using artificial intelligence and controlling the bidirectional real-time communication of customized mentoring information.

title: Artificial intelligence education learning starting machine supporting device
applicants: HUAXIN BEIJING NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence education learning starting machine supporting device which comprises a supporting frame and an AR observer matched with the supporting frame, the supporting frame is provided with a base and a supporting body located on one side of the base, the other side of the base is provided with a plurality of clamping positions, and the side, facing the clamping positions, of the upper portion of the supporting body is connected with a supporting protrusion. And a lens is arranged in the AR observer. The beneficial effects of the utility model are that through the arrangement of the support frame and the AR observer matched with the support frame, the problems that the support frame and the AR observer are mutually independent and cannot be effectively matched, the support has a single purpose, the position of the artificial intelligence education learning starting machine is repeatedly adjusted and the like are solved, so that the artificial intelligence education learning starting machine can be rapidly positioned and effectively matched in different scenes; and by arranging a plurality of clamping positions, the multi-screen display screen can be suitable for multiple scenes such as internet-surfing classes, reading picture books, recording videos and the like.

title: Disinfecting and cleaning device for artificial intelligence early education robot
abstract_text: The utility model relates to a disinfecting and cleaning device, in particular to a disinfecting and cleaning device for an artificial intelligence early education robot. The device comprises a mounting shell, a cleaning device and a disinfectant storage device, the mounting shell comprises a motor protection bin, the interior of the motor protection bin is of a cavity structure, a limiting groove is formed in the bottom of the motor protection bin, a limiting column is mounted in the limiting groove and rotationally connected with the motor protection bin, and a motor is mounted in the motor protection bin; a threaded hole matched with the bolt in size is formed in the bottom end of the motor protection bin, the motor is in threaded connection with the motor protection bin through the bolt, and an output shaft is connected to the bottom end of the motor. And when the device is used for cleaning the artificial intelligence early education robot, gaps in the surface of the artificial intelligence early education robot can be brushed and disinfected, so that bacteria bred in the gaps are eliminated, and the situation that children get ill due to bacteria breeding is avoided.

title: Balancing assembly of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The balance assembly of the artificial intelligence education robot comprises a main body and a dustproof plate, a sound discharging opening is formed in the lower portion of the front end of the main body, an illuminating lamp is arranged above the sound discharging opening, a rolling wheel is installed on the side, away from the central axis of the main body, of the main body, a containing groove is formed in the upper portion of the front end of the main body, and the dustproof plate is arranged in the containing groove. And a traceless nanometer adhesive is arranged in the placing groove. According to the balance assembly of the artificial intelligence education robot, the storage tank is arranged for fixing the education robot, so that the education robot can be more stable in the use process, when the education robot needs to be placed, firstly, a magnetic stone is adsorbed to the bottom end of the robot, then the bottom end of the robot is placed in a clamping groove, and the storage tank is arranged in the clamping groove; when the robot is in use, the magnetic stone at the bottom end of the robot can be adsorbed with the metal sheet, so that the robot can be placed in the main body more stably, the balance of the robot is better, and meanwhile, a dustproof plate can prevent dust of the robot when the robot is idle.

title: Wall-mounted artificial intelligence online education terminal
applicants: SHANGHAI LANGUI EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a wall-mounted artificial intelligence on-line education terminal, which comprises a wall body and a terminal body, the outer wall of the wall body is fixedly connected with a fixing plate, one side of the bottom of the fixing plate is fixedly connected with a hanging plate, the hanging plate is provided with a hanging groove, one side of the terminal body is fixedly connected with a supporting plate, and the supporting plate is fixedly connected with the wall body. A connecting block is fixedly connected to one side of the bottom of the supporting plate, a mounting plate is rotationally connected to the connecting block, a clamping block is fixedly connected to the bottom of the end, away from the connecting block, of the mounting plate, the bottom end of the clamping block is slidably inserted into the hanging groove, and an arc-shaped plate is fixedly connected to one side of the top end of the supporting plate; according to the utility model, the structure is novel, the operation is convenient, meanwhile, the angle of the device can be conveniently adjusted when the device is used, and the device is suitable for large-scale popularization.

title: PRESENTATION FILE GENERATION METHOD, APPARATUS, AND DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: A presentation file generation method and apparatus, a device, and a storage medium. The method comprises: obtaining at least two keywords in a file to be processed, as well as feature attribute information of the file (S101); dividing the file according to the at least two keywords, so as to obtain at least two text fragments (S102); identifying in a presentation file template library a target presentation file template that matches the feature attribute information of said file; (S103); and importing the at least two text fragments into the target presentation file template so as to obtain a target presentation file (S104). In the method, a target presentation file may be generated according to the text information inputted by the user, increasing presentation file generation efficiency. The present method relates to image recognition technology in artificial intelligence. The method is suitable for fields such as smart government services and smart education, and is thus conducive to promoting the construction of smart cities.

title: Model detection method based on deep learning student online learning efficiency prediction
abstract_text: The invention discloses a model detection method based on deep learning student online learning efficiency prediction. The method comprises the steps of obtaining original data and features, determining a student learning state, determining an action state track sequence, constructing a Markov decision process model, generating a PRISM code, determining action state transition and processing a migration action result. In the construction of the Markov decision process model, the transition probability Pi, j is used to construct the Markov decision process model, so that the construction steps are simplified, the complex calculation process is reduced, and the operation speed is improved; the Markov decision process model detection is used for student online learning efficiency prediction, so that the change of the learning efficiency of students can be accurately predicted. The method has the advantages of being simple, high in operation speed and the like, and can be used for predicting the online learning efficiency of students in network education.

title: Exercise label prediction system based on label tree and artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses an exercise label prediction system based on a label tree and artificial intelligence, and the system comprises an input module, a proofreading module, a labeling module, a prediction module, a database, an analysis module, a display module, a training module, and a classification model. The invention relates to a series of work of exercise label prediction under Internet education. The system not only comprises the input module, the proofreading module, the display module, the analysis module and the like which are owned by most exercise systems, but also can solve the problem of label prediction related to exercises, and is relatively complete in coverage. According to the multi-label text classification used by the platform, common sentences or words in the pre-training language model can be captured, and more importantly, vocabularies, syntax and semantic information can be captured. In the training module and the prediction module, training prediction in a full label form and training prediction in a label tree form are divided, and the prediction requirements of labels under various conditions can be met.

title: AI intelligent image recognition method, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: GUANGZHOU LANGO ELECTRONIC SCIENCE & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an AI intelligent image recognition method. The AI intelligent image recognition method comprises the steps of face image collection, face detection, image preprocessing, image feature extraction, image recognition and image display. The invention relates to electronic equipment and a storage medium, which are used for executing an AI intelligent image recognition method. According to the method, the problem that a trained face recognition model is difficult to use on a conference education all-in-one machine with limited computing resources due to the fact that a neural network which is complex in structure and large in parameter quantity is usually adopted in order to obtain high face recognition precision is solved, the Adaboost learning algorithm is adopted, the detection speed of a classifier is effectively increased, and the face recognition accuracy is improved. The image features on the simulated diagram are marked one by one, and then the marked image features are extracted, so that accurate extraction of feature data is facilitated, and quick and high-precision image recognition of the conference education all-in-one machine is realized.

title: Mother-son type multidirectional contact integrated intelligent bedside
applicants: GUANGDONG BO JUN MEDICAL INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a mother-son type multidirectional contact integrated intelligent bedside, and belongs to the technical field of medical auxiliary instruments. With the patient as the center, the advanced internet technology, the internet of things technology and the artificial intelligence technology are efficiently fused, and a medical care and patient three-party sharing platform is provided; the platform has the functions of admission knowledge, medical record propaganda and education, hospital introduction and fee payment, and also has the functions of in-hospital ordering, in-hospital navigation, nursing worker reservation, ward entertainment and the like, so that a patient participates in medical decision-making, perfect medical services are provided, communication with the patient is fully established, and necessary information is shared in time; therefore, a patient can know the own illness state, related treatment, cost and other information at any time, 24-hour one-to-one nursing is achieved, the patient can conveniently borrow a child far bed terminal, locking of a mother bed side body can be achieved, the use safety is improved, meanwhile, the positioning and navigation functions are conveniently provided, part of hospital services are conveniently enjoyed, and great convenience is provided for the patient.

title: Artificial intelligence system for online invigilation
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence system for online invigilation, and belongs to the technical field of online education equipment. The system comprises a remote control host used by a teacher and an examination terminal used by students. The examination terminal is in communication connection with the remote control host; the examination terminal is arranged on the desktop; a first camera is arranged on the desktop; a telescopic guide rail is also mounted on the table top; the holder is movably mounted on the telescopic guide rail, and a second camera is also erected on the holder; the second camera and the first camera are both in signal connection with the examination terminal; the online invigilation system effectively solves the problems that the information of the cameras in the currently used online invigilation system is not synchronous, the position of the rear-end camera cannot be adjusted, and monitoring dead angles exist.

title: Artificial intelligence K12 education full-automatic question generation system
applicants: SHANGHAI SQUIRREL CLASSROOM ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence online education, in particular to an artificial intelligence K12 education full-automatic question generation system, which can set questions in a full-automatic manner, ensure that the generated questions are unique, and generate analysis steps. A method of the system comprises the following steps: S1, a client sends an instruction for generating knowledge point questions; s2, a server side receives the knowledge point and finds whether a question template corresponding to the knowledge point exists in the server side or not, if yes, a next step is executed, and if not, error information is returned, and a program is ended; s3, a server-side program automatically generates a question according to a pre-input question template rule; and S4, when the content of the picture needing to be generated exists in the topic template, a corresponding picture is generated according to a pre-recorded rule and program, the picture is stored on the current server, then the picture is loaded to the resource server, and returning a unique code of the picture is carried out.

title: DEEP NEURAL NETWORK INTERPRETATION METHOD AND DEVICE, TERMINAL, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: A deep neural network interpretation method and device, a terminal, and a storage medium, relating to the technical field of artificial intelligence. Specifically disclosed are: determining all pieces of target data among multiple input pieces of data according to a result output by a deep neural network, inputting the target data into an interpretation factor prediction model, separately to obtain a group of interpretation factors corresponding to each piece of target data, and then counting and sorting the number of occurrences of each interpretation factor in multiple groups of interpretation factors, and selecting a target number of highest-ranking interpretation factors as target interpretation factors of a preset target category. According to the method, an interpretation factor of a prediction result is obtained by means of a pre-trained interpretation factor prediction model, so as to interpret a dominant factor affecting the prediction result of the deep neural network. The method can be applied to a scene of intelligent government affairs/smart city management/intelligent community/intelligent security/intelligent logistics/intelligent healthcare/intelligent education/intelligent environmental protection/intelligent transport, so as to promote the construction of smart city.

title: METHOD, DEVICE, AND COMPUTER-READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM FOR RECOGNIZING FAKE SPEECH
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: The embodiments of the present application belong to the field of artificial intelligence, and relate to a method for recognizing fake speech, comprising: obtaining speech to be recognized; performing STFT conversion processing on the speech to be recognized, and converting the to-be-recognized speech into a feature map of a to-be-recognized speech signal; inputting the feature map of the to-be-recognized speech signal into a target DenseNet network model, and outputting a binary classification result of the to-be-recognized speech as real speech or fake speech. The present application also provides a fake speech recognition apparatus, computer device, and storage medium. In addition, the present application also relates to blockchain technology; the obtained speech data of a user and a two-class differentiation result can be stored in the blockchain. The present solution uses a target DenseNet network model to perform speech recognition, and, on the basis of a neural network self-learning function, provides a highly accurate method for automatically recognizing fake speech, reducing the security vulnerabilities of ASV or voice print systems. The present application can be applied to fields such as smart medical care, smart government affairs, smart education, and technology and finance.

title: Carrying device of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a carrying device of an artificial intelligence education robot, which comprises a transfer box and a moving device, the moving device is arranged at the top of the transfer box, and the utility model relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. According to the carrying device of the artificial intelligence education robot, after the moving device is arranged to drive the auxiliary device to move, the auxiliary device protects the three peripheries of the education robot, so that the education robot moves on the sliding device, the gravity center of the education robot is perpendicular to the ground all the time, and the moving device is reversely started; the educational robot is moved into the transfer box, the moving stability of the educational robot is kept, the workload of carrying workers is relieved, the educational robot is pushed to make contact with a buffer plate, and then the educational robot is fixed through connection of a first fixing belt and a second fixing belt, so that the integrity of the educational robot is protected; the device is convenient and laborsaving, and the carrying efficiency is improved.

title: AI AI-based interactive feedback bot for clinical training education
abstract_text: Disclosed is an AI-based interactive feedback bot for clinical training education. The AI-based interactive feedback bot for clinical training education comprises: a U-portfolio system having an AI-based interactive chatbot and a feedback bot, providing training opening, training record management of trainees, patient medical record provision, preliminary examination record paper, clinical presentation, clinical skill, self-examination information, training evaluation paper, and test management information, providing questions, answers, and professor feedback information of a professor and a trainee terminal through the AI-based interactive chatbot and the feedback bot, storing and managing a training history of a trainee and evaluation information of a professor, and providing a clinical training education U-portfolio service; and a user terminal transmitting and receiving training location registration, clinical training-related information, and content to and from the U-portfolio system, and receiving questions, answers, professor feedback information, and evaluation information of a professor and a trainee terminal through the AI-based interactive chatbot and the feedback bot.

title: Buddhist music generation method and device, equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a Buddhist music generation method and device, equipment and a storage medium which are applied to the field of intelligent education and are used for generating Buddhist music works more conforming to user expectations according to a preset Buddhist music generation model and Buddhist music fragments, so that the Buddhist music generation efficiency is improved. The Buddhist music generation method comprises the steps of obtaining a to-be-created Buddhist music fragment; calling a preset variational auto-encoder VAE, converting the to-be-created Buddhist music fragment into a potential variable, and decomposing the potential variable into a pitch variable and a rhythm variable; calling a preset melody restorer Inpainter, and obtaining an intermediate Buddhist music fragment; based on a random maskless code, processing the intermediate Buddhist music fragment to generate a target Buddhist music fragment, calling a preset connector, and combining the target Buddhist music fragment with a preset Buddhist music summary sketch to generate a target potential variable; and calling a preset decoder to decode the target potential variable to generate a final Buddhist music work.

title: Novel artificial intelligence education interaction system
applicants: GUANGZHOU ZHIDE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention relates to the technical field of education interaction, and particularly discloses a novel artificial intelligence education interaction systemThe method comprises the steps of, when the time difference between the first interaction information and the second interaction information is greater than a threshold value, judging the semantic relevance between the first interaction information and the second interaction information; if the first interaction information and the second interaction information are associated, integrating the first interaction information and the second interaction information into third interaction information, and calling education program information from an education program database based on the third interaction information; if the association does not exist, selecting one of the first interaction information and the second interaction information to call the education program information according to the selection information. According to the method and the device, the education program information is sent to the output device, so that when the education interaction product performs man-machine interaction and performs semantic recognition on incoherent statements, the interaction statements can be accurately recognized, effective and interesting man-machine interaction is formed, the user experience is improved, and an expected education effect can be achieved.

title: Melody generation method and device based on LISP-like chain data, equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, discloses a melody generation method and device based on LISP-like chain data, equipment and a storage medium, is applied to the field of intelligent education, and is used for improving song melody quality, improving song melody generation efficiency and further improving composition efficiency. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring initial data of a created song input by a user; converting the initial data into a LISP-like chain table structure to obtain initial LISP-like chain data; calling a random matching generation algorithm, and generating an initial song melody based on the initial LISP-like chain data and a preset song library; obtaining a preference instruction input by the user, wherein the preference instruction is used for indicating the style and rhythm favored by the user; matching a target style type and a target rhythm type meeting the user requirements according to the preference instruction; and adjusting the initial song melody according to the target style type and the target rhythm type to generate a target song melody.

title: Education platform course recommendation method and system based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses an education platform course recommendation method and system based on deep learning. The method comprises the steps of obtaining behavior data of a user, basic information of the user and historical watching courses of the user; preprocessing the acquired behavior data of the user, the basic information of the user and the historical watching courses of the user to obtain a behavior sequence of the user; performing feature extraction on historical watching courses of the user to obtain course features; performing feature extraction on the basic information of the user to obtain user features and features of an environment where the user is located; and inputting the behavior sequence of the user, the curriculum features, the user features and the features of the environment where the user is located into a pre-trained neural network model, and outputting a curriculum recommendation result.

title: Head-mounted VR glasses device for safety education based on artificial intelligence
applicants: WUHAN HUYI NEW TECH DEVELOPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a safety education head-mounted VR glasses device based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a VR device body, the right side of the VR device body is provided with a shaft groove, the inner wall of the shaft groove is fixedly provided with a bearing, the inner wall of the bearing is fixedly provided with a shaft rod, and the right end of the shaft rod is fixedly provided with a fixing frame. And meanwhile, a fixing elastic belt is fixedly mounted at one end of the fixing frame. According to the head-mounted VR glasses device for safety education based on artificial intelligence, an annular plate is arranged, a protective shell is fixed to the rear side of the head of a person, and a hollow column in a fixed sleeve is adjusted, so that the annular plate can rise, the head of the person can be sleeved with the annular plate, wearing of the person is facilitated, and the wearing comfort is improved; by means of the technical scheme, hurt to the head due to long-time wearing is effectively reduced, then the wearing comfort of people is improved to a certain degree, the daily use requirements of people can be well met, and convenience is brought to daily wearing of people.

title: Novel artificial intelligence education interaction device
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence interaction, and particularly discloses a novel artificial intelligence education interaction device which comprises a device whole body, a storage mechanism, an intelligent education interaction mechanism and a stationery placing component, the storage mechanism is fixedly connected to the back of the other side of the device whole body, and the stationery placing component is fixedly connected to the bottom of the storage mechanism. The top of one side of the whole device is fixedly connected with an intelligent education interaction mechanism, and the intelligent education interaction mechanism can detect the learning state of a user, can carry out voice interaction learning when the user learns, and can detect the face of the user through an arranged infrared sensor and a camera, so that the learning state and condition of the user are known, and the user experience is improved. According to the intelligent education interaction mechanism, the learning condition is displayed through the touch screen, the user can know the learning condition of the user, the effect of reminding the user is effectively achieved, the user can adjust the learning state of the user, the learning efficiency of the user is effectively improved, and the use practicability of the intelligent education interaction mechanism is improved.

title: Anti-collision assembly of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The utility model provides an anti-collision assembly of an artificial intelligence education robot. The anti-collision assembly of the artificial intelligence education robot comprises a robot; the frame body is arranged on four buffer grooves in the robot in a sleeving mode, and the four buffer grooves are all formed in the frame body; the four sliding blocks are installed on the inner walls of the buffer grooves in a sliding mode correspondingly. And the four first compression springs are arranged in the four buffer grooves correspondingly, one ends of the four first compression springs are fixedly connected with the inner walls of the four buffer grooves correspondingly, and the other ends of the four first compression springs are fixedly connected with the outer walls of one sides of the four sliding blocks correspondingly. The anti-collision assembly of the artificial intelligence education robot has the advantages that the anti-collision effect is good, the anti-collision assembly can be replaced conveniently, and the service life of the robot is prolonged.

title: Artificial intelligence education device
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of education equipment, and discloses an artificial intelligence education device which comprises a storage box, a placing plate is placed at the top end of the storage box, a display screen located at the top end of the storage box is fixedly installed at the top end of the placing plate, a loudspeaker is installed on one side of the display screen in an embedded mode, and the loudspeaker is connected with the storage box. A battery box is fixedly installed at the top end of the loudspeaker, a lighting assembly located at the top end of the storage box is detachably installed on one side of the battery box, a shielding assembly is fixedly installed on one side of the lighting assembly, and a control panel located at the top end of the storage box is fixedly installed at the bottom end of the shielding assembly; supporting legs located at the bottom end of the storage box are fixedly installed at the bottom end of the control panel. The concept that the frequency of cleaning the display screen can be reduced is provided, a side shielding assembly is installed at the top end of a control panel, a user pushes a handle to pull out a baffle in a containing base, and therefore the display screen can be easily shielded.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence education robot. The artificial intelligence education robot comprises an equipment base and a control mainboard, a silica gel protection pad is arranged on the outer wall of the equipment base, a transmission crawler belt is installed at the front end of the equipment base, a driving air cylinder is installed in the equipment base, and an equipment body is installed above the equipment base. A telescopic supporting rod is connected to the lower portion of the driving air cylinder, a supporting base is fixed to the lower portion of the telescopic supporting rod, a butt-joint through hole is formed in the front end of the equipment body, sound receiving equipment is arranged above the butt-joint through hole, a sliding rail is arranged on the right side of the equipment body, and a display screen is installed on the right side of the sliding rail. A control main board is mounted in the equipment body. According to the artificial intelligence education robot, through an arranged infrared lamp, illumination can be provided for a high-definition camera at night or in a place without a light source, and the problem that intelligent response cannot be made due to the fact that the high-definition camera is difficult to capture portraits at night is solved.

title: Chord-based song melody generation method and device, equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, discloses a chord-based song melody generation method and device, equipment and a storage medium, is applied to the field of intelligent education, and improves the audibility of a song melody and the generation efficiency of the song melody. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a target lyric input by a user and a target chord pre-selected by the user; generating a target tone vector according to the target lyric, and generating a target chord vector according to the target chord; combining the target tone vector and the target chord vector to generate a target tone chord vector; inputting the target tone chord vector into a trained Transformer model to obtain an output feature vector, wherein the output feature vector includes a target lyric pitch vector and a target lyric hour vector; and generating a target song melody according to the target lyric pitch vector and the target lyric hour vector.

title: Integrated tuberculosis management system and management method
applicants: SHENZHEN NANSHAN CENTER FOR CHRONIC DISEASE CONTROL
abstract_text: The invention relates to an integrated tuberculosis management system and management method, and belongs to the technical field of medical technology and artificial intelligence. An artificial intelligence housekeeper is used for collecting environment temperature, environment humidity, wind speed and illumination information in a patient home to obtain patient living environment information, basic information of a patient is collected in a mode of talking with the patient, and targeted health education is carried out on the patient according to the basic information of the patient and the patient living environment information. The artificial intelligence housekeeper is also used for shooting the medicine taking process of the patient to obtain a medicine taking video of the patient so as to complete home-entry follow-up visit, monthly follow-up visit, medicine taking video auditing and the like, so that the workload of primary medical personnel for managing the pulmonary tuberculosis patient is greatly reduced, meanwhile, the contact opportunity between the medical personnel and the patient is reduced, and the infection risk is reduced; and household isolation treatment is realized.

title: Livelihood public service platform based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a livelihood public service platform based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a service item module and a livelihood public service module, and is characterized in that the service item module comprises a medical health module, a public health module, an education culture module, a traffic tourism module, a social safety module, a public resource optimization module and a livelihood service capability improvement module; The medical health module comprises a big data analysis propaganda module, a treatment process module and a treatment scheme providing module, and the public health module comprises a medical data structuring module, a medical data standardization module, an intelligent model building module and a practical application module. According to the system, artificial intelligence and the livelihood public service platform are combined, when the livelihood public service platform serves the public, manpower and material resources are greatly saved through combination with artificial intelligence, the public service efficiency is improved, and the problem that traditional service efficiency is low is avoided.

title: Campus education propaganda equipment based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a campus education propaganda device based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a moving device, two adjusting devices and a display device, and is characterized in that the moving device comprises a box body, a top plate, moving wheels and a driving motor, and an infrared receiver is embedded in the upper part of the right side wall of the box body; a storage battery is fixed to the left side wall of an inner cavity of the box body through bolts, and a processor and a signal transceiver are fixed to the right side wall of the inner cavity of the box body through bolts. The installation mechanism structure of the cloud computing server is reasonable in structural design, the display device is installed at the top of the mobile device, and a first display board and a second display board in the display device are networked through a processor, so that publicity materials related to campus education can be obtained and displayed to students; and the mobile device and the display device can be flexibly moved to an optimal display position through mutual cooperative use, so that the number of students watching the device is increased, and the effect of campus education propaganda is improved.

title: AI.
abstract_text: Open source hardware has an advantage of being very good for education. However, there has been a problem of being difficult to make educational materials due to disadvantages of the open source hardware. The open source hardware has various shapes and sizes, so that skeletal frames made of acrylic, MDF, and plastic for making autonomous vehicles, biped walking robots, voice recognition kits, plant cultivation kits, and others cannot be standardized. Thus, when different open source hardware is used, the open source hardware cannot be compatible regardless of the same function. In order to overcome the above problem, the present invention provides an educational robot, physical computing and AI convergence frame which comprises a main frame (100) for fixing a controller PCB having various sizes; a linear auxiliary frame, a 'ㄱ'-shaped auxiliary frame, and an auxiliary frame for fixing, which are connected with the main frame (100) through a connecting bar (160) and fix various sensors, motors, and batteries connected with the controller PCB. According to the above configuration, the present invention has an effect of providing a means for forming educational materials in desired shapes regardless of open source hardware with various sizes and sizes of various sensors, motors, batteries, and others connected to the open source hardware.

title: STEM STEM coding education platform for learning machine learning and artificial intelligence for learners
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a stem coding education platform for learning machine learning and artificial intelligence for learners, wherein a learner creates a basic environment for the machine learning by inputting data sets by themselves or by importing them from the outside, and trains the machine learning with various algorithms. According to the present invention, the stem coding education platform educates users, who are learners, through online machine learning and artificial intelligence. According to the present invention, the learner can train a data set input or imported to learn the machine learning and artificial intelligence with a machine learning algorithm to predict a result, and to learn machine learning and artificial intelligence by executing a coding result.

title: Artificial intelligence sound equipment based on AI education
applicants: TIANJIN GUANGYASHIDAI TECH DEVELOPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of AI education, in particular to artificial intelligence sound equipment based on AI education, which comprises a sound equipment body and a base, the base is provided with a rotating shaft, the sound equipment body is installed on the outer wall of the rotating shaft, the rotating shaft is provided with an angle adjusting mechanism, the base is provided with a second groove, the base is connected with a top plate, the top plate is provided with a U-shaped plate, and the U-shaped plate is provided with a sliding rod. The sound box can rotate in the base through the rotating shaft, the angle adjusting mechanism can adjust the angle of the sound box body, then the angle adjusting of the display screen is achieved, observation of a user is facilitated, and when the sound box is not used, the display screen can be conveniently and quickly adjusted. The sound equipment body can be rotated to the second groove in the base, the clamping block is clamped in the clamping groove in the top of the sound equipment body, the position of the sound equipment body is limited, and the sound equipment body can be carried by lifting the second handle.

title: Intelligent education AIOT AI intelligent brain analysis platform and device
applicants: SHENZHEN CITY AIYUN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an intelligent education AIOT AI intelligent brain analysis platformwhich comprises an intelligent processing center, an emotion calculation module, a voice analysis module, a natural language understanding module, a thermal analysis module, an image enhancement processing module, a concentration analysis module and a behavior recognition module. The AI student classroom emotion function, the AI knowledge point function, the AI student active state function, the AI classroom blackboard writing function, the AI student concentration function and the AI campus security function are integrated on the same platform to be achieved. The invention also provides a device for realizing the intelligent education AIOT AI intelligent brain analysis platform.

title: Video multi-target facial expression recognition method and system
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence, and particularly relates to a video multi-target facial expression recognition method and system, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, extracting an image frame in a video stream, and extracting a face region; S2, performing face tracking on a target in the video stream; S3, performing expression recognition on the tracking target; and S4, performing analysis in combination with a historical expression recognition result. According to the method provided by the invention, multi-target expression recognition in the video is realized by fusing a target tracking technology, the correctness and robustness of a dynamic expression recognition result are improved by weighting front and back frame results, and single-frame jitter generated by a video expression recognition result is prevented; meanwhile, the video expression recognition system has an expression analysis result and original video storage function, and can help to make reasonable analysis and suggestions, such as school education scenes, intelligent driving assistance scenes and the like.

title: Teenager vision prevention and control cloud platform
applicants: CHENGDU AIER EYE HOSPITAL CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of computer software, and particularly relates to a teenager vision prevention and control cloud platform. The platform comprises a cloud platform body, and the cloud platform body comprises a distributed micro-service technology framework, an integrated deep learning algorithm, integrated intelligent hardware and matched software, an iris recognition technology, a two-dimensional code label and an authority distribution system. Through the distributed micro-service technology architecture, a complex large-scale application program is miniaturized and deployed at a cloud end, and refined services are provided for education management departments, education institutions, hospital vision prevention and control working groups, students and parents. A user uses a computer and a mobile phone. According to the platform, intelligence is greatly used for replacing manual work, the data accuracy rate is improved to 100%, a multi-dimensional report based on big data analysis is provided, all participating departments can more accurately control the vision prevention and control method and effect, the working efficiency of hospital vision prevention and control working groups is greatly improved, all the inspection reports can be inquired after being inspected, and waiting is not needed.

title: PRESENTATION GENERATION METHOD, APPARATUS, AND DEVICE, AND MEDIUM
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: A presentation generation method, apparatus, and device, and a medium, wherein a first data processing method comprises: acquiring a file to be processed, the file to be processed comprising a target image (S101); performing text recognition on the target image to obtain text feature information corresponding to the target image (S102); on the basis of the text feature information, removing the text content in the target image to obtain a first sub-image corresponding to the target image (S103); performing image recognition on the first sub-image corresponding to the target image to obtain image feature information corresponding to the first sub-image corresponding to the target image (S104); and, on the basis of the text feature information and the image feature information, generating a target presentation corresponding to the target image (S105). Using the present method, a target presentation corresponding to the target image can be rapidly and accurately generated. The present method, apparatus, device, and medium relate to image recognition technology in artificial intelligence, and are also suitable for fields such as smart government affairs and smart education, being conducive to promoting the construction of smart cities.

title: Carrying device of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The utility model provides a carrying device of an artificial intelligence education robot. The carrying device of the artificial intelligence education robot comprises two mounting plates; the two side boxes are fixedly mounted at the tops of the corresponding mounting plates; the mounting box is fixedly mounted on the outer walls of one sides of the two side boxes; the motor is fixedly mounted on the outer wall of one side of the mounting box; the driving rod is rotationally mounted on the inner walls of the two sides of the mounting box, and one end of the driving rod extends out of the mounting box and is fixedly connected with an output shaft of the motor; the worm is arranged in the mounting box, and the worm is fixedly arranged on the driving rod in a sleeving manner; and the driven rods are rotationally mounted on the inner walls of the two sides of the mounting box. The carrying device of the artificial intelligence education robot has the advantages of being convenient and fast to operate and convenient to carry out carrying work.

title: Artificial intelligence autonomous learning education robot capable of overcoming "dietary bias and picky food"
abstract_text: The artificial intelligence autonomous learning education robot capable of overcoming "dietary bias and picky food" comprises the following steps: establishing a course knowledge graph; establishing a learning knowledge graph; a dietary bias and picky food degree calculation step; and the treatment step of overcoming "dietary bias and picky food". According to the method, the curriculum knowledge graph is constructed to analyze other knowledge points which are ignored due to the fact that students excessively pay attention to part of knowledge points in the learning process, and therefore whether the the students are trapped by a local relevant similar knowledge point set or not can be known according to the similarity between the knowledge points learned by the students and the knowledge points not learned by the students; at present, the problem of the "dietary bias and picky food" during learning is particularly prominent under the influence of artificial intelligence recommendation. By means of the method, teachers and students can know whether the students have the "dietary bias and picky food" problem or not by calculating the dietary bias and picky food degree; therefore, by overcoming the knowledge points recommended by the'dietary bias and picky food 'treatment, the students can be helped to make up review and pay attention to the knowledge points which are ignored and not concerned, so that the problem of learning dietary bias and picky food intensively assisted by artificial intelligence can be effectively solved.

title: Teacher-dominated artificial intelligence education robot overcoming multiple leaders
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teacher-dominated artificial intelligence education robot overcoming multiple leaders. The method comprises the following steps: an instance reporting step; a principle description modification step; an artificial intelligence code modification step; and an artificial intelligence code replacement step. According to the method, the system and the robot, on the basis of deep learning and big data, the learning auxiliary instances of artificial intelligence are subjected to spot check and reported to the teacher, and the main right is returned to the teacher again in a sampling check mode; meanwhile, artificial intelligence has a certain degree of freedom, so that the function and effect of the artificial intelligence can be continuously exerted, and the workload of supervising the artificial intelligence by a teacher is also reduced. Besides, a teacher can directly intervene and improve the learning auxiliary process of artificial intelligence by modifying the principle description of an artificial intelligence algorithm, so that the bad current situation of artificial intelligence education can be greatly changed, and the method has extremely important and profound significance for the healthy development of artificial intelligence education.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR HANDOVER USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED USER EQUIPMENT IN WIRELSS COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication technique that converges a 5G communication system for supporting a higher data rate after a 4G system with IoT technology, and a system thereof. The present disclosure can be applied to intelligent services (e.g., smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car or connected car, healthcare, digital education, retail business, security and safety-related services, etc.) based on 5G communication technology and IoT-related technology. In a method for handover of a terminal in a wireless communication system, the present invention of the present disclosure receives handover control reference information from a base station, determines whether to perform handover based on the handover control reference information and radio signal information obtained through measurement of radio signals, and transmits a handover request message to the base station when it is decided to perform the handover.

title: AI SYSTEM FOR AUTOMATIC TRACKING AND MATCHING OF MUSICAL INSTRUMENT PERFORMANCE FOR EDUCATION BASED ON AI
abstract_text: According an embodiment of the present invention, disclosed is an AI-based automatic tracking and matching system of musical instrument performance for instrumental music education. The system comprises: a digital sheet music generation unit (202); a plurality of first sensors (211) capable of detecting a motion of a player; a plurality of second sensors (209) capable of detecting the movement of a musical instrument by the player's motion; a template image generating unit (204) for generating a template image including a motion performed by a character according to a digital sheet music generated by the digital sheet music generation unit (202); and a character image generation unit (206) for generating a character image by modifying the template image to match the player's motion.

title: personalized and adaptive learning method using artificial intelligence AI tutor interface and system
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a customized learning method employing an artificial intelligence tutor interface and a system therefor. According to one embodiment of the present invention, the customized learning method employing an artificial intelligence tutor interface, using an education server building a network with the web, an external server and a terminal, includes: a first step wherein the education server receives age information of a learner from at least one of the web, the external server and the terminal; a second step wherein the education server determines a first cycle corresponding to the age information, of pre-stored learning life cycles; a third step wherein the education server receives first learning area information related with the first cycle from at least one of the web, the external server and the terminal; a fourth step wherein the education server collects first learner information related with the learner; a fifth step wherein the education server provides first education content determined based on the first learning area information and the first learner information to the learner; and a sixth step wherein the education server accumulates and collects second learner information of the learner related with the first education content. The fifth step can include: step 5-1 wherein the first learner information is classified in accordance with predesignated criteria; step 5-2 wherein an analysis result about the learner is derived based on the classified first learner information; step 5-3 wherein statistical data related with the learner is collected; step 5-4 wherein the first education content is determined based on the analysis result, the first learning area information and the statistical data; and step 5-5 wherein the first education content is provided to the learner.

title: AI image recognition and scoring system of intelligent dustbin
applicants: JIANGSU WONDERFUL PUBLIC FACILITIES TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an AI image identification and scoring system of an intelligent dustbin, which comprises an Android control system 2, the Android control system 2 is installed on the intelligent dustbin, one side of the Android control system 2 is connected with a throw-in door through a throw-in door motor, and the other side of the Android control system 2 is connected with a camera through a USB data line. The throw gate motor is installed on the external connection control panel and is connected with the external connection control panel through a cable, a single-chip microcomputer control mainboard is arranged on one side of the external connection control panel, and the single-chip microcomputer control mainboard is connected with the external connection control panel in a single-duplex 485 communication mode; compared with the prior art, the system has the advantages that the AI intelligent technology is fully utilized, manual work is replaced for garbage type identification supervision, meanwhile, a data statistical report of garbage throwing accuracy of all users can be formed at the management end, help is provided for targeted education guidance work, and the user experience is improved. And evidence supplementation is provided for the establishment of garbage classification laws and regulations, and the construction of the garbage classification throwing career in China is better promoted.

title: Interactive artificial intelligence online education terminal
applicants: ZHEJIANG BEYOND EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an interactive artificial intelligence on-line education terminal, which relates to the technical field of on-line education terminals, and comprises a housing, the left side surface and the right side surface outside the housing are respectively provided with a through groove and a plurality of clamping grooves, and the plurality of clamping grooves are uniformly distributed on the front side and the rear side of the through groove from top to bottom. Storage grooves are formed in the four corners of the outer bottom face of the shell, supporting legs are hinged to the interiors of the storage grooves, sponge is bonded to the inner bottom face of the shell, a movable cross beam is slidably connected to the lower end of the inner portion of the shell, sliding grooves are formed in the left end and the right end of the movable cross beam, and sliding blocks are slidably connected to the interiors of the sliding grooves. Springs are fixedly connected between the inner side faces of the sliding blocks and the inner side faces of the sliding grooves, round rods are rotationally connected to the outer side faces of the sliding blocks, the outer ends of the round rods penetrate out of the movable cross beam, and positioning rods are fixedly connected to the outer end faces of the round rods. And through the cooperative arrangement of the movable cross beam and the shell, the terminal all-in-one machine can be conveniently stored and carried, and the use convenience of the terminal all-in-one machine is greatly improved.

title: Anti-collision assembly of artificial intelligence education robot
applicants: AIGUO EDUCATION TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of anti-collision assemblies, and discloses an anti-collision assembly of an artificial intelligence education robot, which comprises a robot connected with an anti-collision mechanism. The anti-collision mechanism comprises a connecting cavity, two partition plates, two moving grooves, two connecting blocks, two springs, two connecting rods, two liquid leakage holes, two sealing plates, a plurality of channels, a plurality of fixing grooves, a plurality of air bags and two through holes, the connecting cavity is formed in the robot, the two partition plates are symmetrically and fixedly connected into the connecting cavity, and the two partition plates are symmetrically and fixedly connected into the connecting cavity. The position, close to the outer ring, of the connecting cavity is filled with aluminum chloride particles, the position, close to the inner ring, of the connecting cavity is filled with a sodium bicarbonate solution, the two moving grooves are symmetrically formed in the two sides of the robot, the two springs are fixedly connected to the bottoms of the moving grooves correspondingly, and the two connecting blocks are fixedly connected to one ends of the corresponding springs. The anti-collision device can prevent the robot from being collided and damaged easily, economic damage is avoided, and the anti-collision device is small and exquisite in structure and more attractive.

title: Deep neural network cognitive level evaluation model based on Bloom cognitive classification theory
abstract_text: The invention discloses a deep neural network cognitive level evaluation model based on a Bloom cognitive classification theory, belongs to the field of deep learning, and is applied to automatic evaluation of cognitive levels of students in an online education process. The model is based on classroom text interaction data, takes a Bloom cognitive classification theory as a cognitive level analysis framework, and constructs a deep neural network model for cognitive level automatic evaluation of online learning, so as to better carry out process evaluation of online learning. The attention mechanism is used for capturing different contribution degrees of each word in the interactive text to the cognitive level evaluation result, and the words with the large contribution degrees are endowed with higher weights, so that a better model evaluation effect is achieved. The invention has the technical effects that compared with a traditional method, text data generated in the learning process can be fully utilized, and deeper semantic information of the text data can be mined.

title: Anti-collision assembly of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of robot anti-collision, in particular to an anti-collision assembly of an artificial intelligence education robot. The anti-collision assembly comprises a main beam assembly, an impact beam assembly, a sliding buffer assembly and a side surface anti-collision assembly, and can be externally connected to a wheeled robot, and buffer the impact of the wheeled robot. The device not only can protect the front end of the wheeled robot, but also can protect the two sides of the wheeled robot.
