A middle groove rod is fixedly connected to the middle position of the rear end of a main beam, a middle groove is formed in the middle groove rod, the front end of the middle groove penetrates through the middle groove rod, the rear end of the middle groove penetrates through the main beam, a sliding groove is formed in the upper end of the main beam, transverse rod sliding grooves are formed in the left end and the right end of the rear end of the main beam, and blocking edges are fixedly connected to the upper outer edge and the lower outer edge of each transverse rod sliding groove.

title: Artificial intelligence online education mobile terminal
applicants: JINAN YOUCAN EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence online education mobile terminal, and belongs to the technical field of online education. The artificial intelligence online education mobile terminal comprises an education terminal body and a base; supporting rods are vertically welded to the two ends of the bottom of the education terminal body; an electronic display screen, a center control cavity and a blackboard are sequentially arranged in the education terminal body from left to right; a concentric-square-shaped dust extraction pipe is fixed in the side wall of the front face of the blackboard; a blackboard eraser capable of sliding left and right is vertically arranged on the front face of the blackboard; a hydraulic oil cavity and a cooling liquid cavity are formed in the upper portion and the lower portion of the interior of the education terminal body and on the back face of the blackboard; and a first piston plate and a second piston plate are slidably connected inside the hydraulic oil cavity and the cooling liquid cavity respectively. In the blackboard erasing process, blackboard erasing is achieved, electric appliance elements can be cooled, the service life is prolonged, meanwhile, dust generated in the blackboard erasing and writing processes is conveniently collected, pollution to the environment is reduced, and the artificial intelligence online education mobile terminal is convenient to use.

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR CHANNEL QUALITY STATUS PREDICTION IN WIRELESS NETWORK USING MACHINE LEARNING
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. Accordingly, embodiments herein disclose a method for predicting channel quality status (CQS) in a wireless network (510) by a BS (502). The method includes receiving CQI reports, PMI reports, and RI reports of first frequency band of a plurality of frequency bands in the wireless network (510). The method includes storing the CQI reports, the PMI reports, and the RI reports of the first frequency band. The method includes predicting the CQI, the PMI and the RI of a second frequency band of the plurality of frequency bands associated with the UE (502a) based on the CQI reports, the PMI reports, and the RI reports of the first frequency band.

title: EDUCATION SUPPORT SYSTEM, EDUCATION SUPPORT METHOD, AND EDUCATION SUPPORT PROGRAM
abstract_text: To efficiently generate input data used in a programming learning question in AI human resources education.SOLUTION: An education support system that supports programming learning in AI (artificial intelligence) human resources education includes: a shaped data acquisition unit that acquires shaped data that is shaped so that a prediction or classification algorithm can be applied; and an input data generation unit that generates input data included in a question for determining a result of programming learning by processing the shaped data.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Personalized learning system
abstract_text: According to the present invention, provided is a personalized learning system capable of enabling relearning and repetitive learning considering the knowledge concept completion of a user, and leading the user to perform suitable learning by using emotion information as well as the user's knowledge level. The system includes a service providing part analyzing the user through an education unit possessed by the user, and providing content to the education unit. The content includes at least one artificial intelligence tutor service for conducting a question-and-answer section with the user in accordance with the condition of the user and learning information for the learning of the user. Thus, the present invention has an effect of satisfying the learning efficiency of the user and leading the user to perform continuous learning without giving up due to learning considering the emotion and mood of the user by conducting personalized learning based on the knowledge level and emotion information of the user while completing the knowledge concept of the user.

title: Anti-collision assembly of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an anti-collision assembly of an artificial intelligence education robot. The anti-collision assembly comprises a robot body. The groove is formed in the back of the robot body; the protection assembly is arranged in the groove, the protection assembly comprises a first winding roller and a second winding roller, and a protection pad is fixedly connected to the first winding roller; the positioning assembly is fixed to the bottom of the inner wall of the groove, and the positioning assembly comprises a vertical rod and a square groove. According to the anti-collision assembly of the artificial intelligence education robot, the first winding roller and the second winding roller can be clamped in the groove through the positioning assembly and the pressing assembly, the protection pad can also be wound around the outer portion of the robot body through the first winding roller and the second winding roller, and protection of the robot body is improved; and the child is prevented from hurting the robot body.

title: Novel artificial intelligence education interaction device
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a novel artificial intelligence education interaction device which comprises a CPU central processing module, a storage module, a signal transmission module, a display screen, a projector, an operation module, a camera A, a camera B, an infrared sensor A and an infrared sensor B. The storage module and the signal transmission module are respectively connected with the CPU central processing module. The display screen, the projector and the operation module are respectively connected with the CPU central processing module, the camera A and the camera B are connected with the CPU central processing module, the camera A and the camera B are arranged on the front side of a classroom, and the infrared sensor A and the infrared sensor B are respectively connected with the CPU central processing module. The infrared sensor A and the infrared sensor B are respectively arranged at front and rear doorways of the classroom door; the system can monitor the number of students in class, count the number of students in class, monitor the class state of the students, and help teachers to know the class condition.

title: Image description method based on intra-layer and inter-layer joint global representation
abstract_text: The invention discloses an image description method based on intra-layer and inter-layer joint global representation, and relates to artificial intelligence. The method comprises: the step 1, extracting a plurality of candidate areas of a to-be-described image and features corresponding to the candidate areas by adopting a target detector; and the step 2, inputting the features extracted in the step 1 into the trained neural network so as to output a description result of the to-be-described image. By utilizing the characteristics of a Transformer structure and explicitly modeling intra-layer and inter-layer joint global features, the global features of pictures are effectively utilized, object missing and relation bias existing between image description tasks are reduced, and the accuracy and comprehensiveness of generated sentences are improved; the method has very strong mobility and can be suitable for any image description model based on a Transformer structure, and the model performance is improved; and the problems of target missing and relation offset of image description are solved, complex multi-modal reasoning is expanded, description is automatically generated, and the method can be applied to the fields of image retrieval, blind navigation, automatic generation of medical reports and early education.

title: Infant autonomous exploration course auxiliary system
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of infant education. The invention discloses an infant autonomous exploration course auxiliary system, which comprises a background host for terminal processing, a display, a monitoring device, a supervising device, a prompting module and an AI voice conversation module. A main control module and a storage module are arranged in the background host, an anthropomorphic processing system, an analysis system for monitoring and analyzing the plant growth state and an AI voice conversation system for the AI voice conversation module are arranged in the main control module, the anthropomorphic processing system is used for performing anthropomorphic processing on plants to obtain anthropomorphic plants with human expressions, and the anthropomorphic plants with human expressions are display through the display; the analysis system is used for analyzing the current growth state of the plant according to the appearance state and the leaf color of the plants; and the AI voice conversation system is used for obtaining infant voice data and automatically generating conversation voice data. According to the invention, the scope of knowledge of the children can be expanded, and the autonomous exploration ability of the children can be cultivated.

title: Calligraphy copy intelligent evaluation and guidance method based on computer vision
abstract_text: The invention discloses calligraphy copy intelligent evaluation and guidance method based on computer vision. The method comprises the following steps: image preprocessing, font matching overlap ratio scoring, structure matching overlap ratio scoring, projection similarity scoring, calligraphy font key point similarity scoring, comprehensive scoring through a machine learning regression algorithm, etc. Through processing the calligraphy image, a reasonable evaluation of a calligraphy font comparison copybook copying effect can be obtained, and the method has a strong guiding significance for calligraphy learner copy scoring and Chinese calligraphy education.

title: Educational learning system database establishment management method based on artificial intelligence and database cloud platform
applicants: YANCHENG MOYUN ELECTRONIC TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an educational learning system database establishment management method based on artificial intelligence and a database cloud platform, and the method comprises the steps: enabling each teacher to access an educational learning system database, and transmitting the account information of each teacher which is successfully authenticated to a corresponding subject database; extracting each related data of each courseware in each teacher account in each subject database, obtaining chapter themes of each courseware in each teacher account in each subject database, performing classification according to different courseware chapter themes, and sending the courseware chapter themes to a cloud database; screening access data of each courseware in each courseware chapter theme in each discipline database, calculating and arranging favorite degree coefficients of students for each courseware chapter theme in each discipline database, counting the courseware number of each courseware chapter theme uploaded in each teacher account in each discipline database, and calculating the courseware number of each courseware chapter theme in each discipline database; calculating the favorite degree coefficients of the students to the teachers in the databases of the subjects, and arranging the favorite degree coefficients to realize the real-time sharing of the education and learning courseware.

title: Artificial intelligence robot for early education
applicants: JIANGXI TAIDE INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The artificial intelligence robot for early education comprises a base and a machine body, the machine body is arranged at the upper end of the base, a first motor is arranged in a shell, the output end of the first motor is connected with a lead screw, the first motor can drive the lead screw to rotate, and a threaded base is arranged on the outer surface of the lead screw. Threads on the outer surface of the lead screw and threads on the inner side of the threaded seat are of a left-hand thread structure, the threaded seat can drive the connecting rod to move downwards while the lead screw rotates, so that the panel can retract into the shell and can be protected, moving wheels are arranged at the lower end of the base, the base can be moved through the moving wheels, and therefore the panel can be protected. And the buffer column is arranged on one side of the base, the anti-collision plate is arranged on one side of the buffer column, when the moving wheels drive the base to move, the anti-collision plate can make contact with an obstacle firstly, direct collision between the base and the obstacle is avoided, and the base can be effectively protected.

title: AI enabling method and device of hardware, storage medium and equipment
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI enabling method and device of hardware, a storage medium and equipment, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining an operation image of to-be-enabled hardware, and then sending the operation image to a pre-constructed enabling model, so as to predict the operation state of the to-be-enabled hardware at the next moment, wherein the to-be-enabled hardware and the device where the enabling model is located are located in the same local area network, and then the to-be-enabled hardware is controlled to automatically run according to the predicted running state of the next moment. It can be seen that the to-be-enabled hardware and the device where the enabling model is located are located in the same local area network, and when the enabling model is used for conducting self-defined AI enabling on the to-be-enabled hardware, the safety of data transmission can be guaranteed. Therefore, in an application scene of artificial intelligence innovation education, teachers and students can use the pre-trained self-defined enabling model to carry out self-defined AI enabling on open source hardware in the scene, data transmission safety can be guaranteed, and learning experience of students in an AI course is improved.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR TRANSCEIVING SIGNAL USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IN WIRELESS COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication technique that converges a 5G communication system for supporting a higher data rate after a 4G system with IoT technology, and a system thereof. The present disclosure can be applied to an intelligent service (for example, smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car or connected car, healthcare, digital education, retail, security and safety related services, and the like) based on 5G communication technology and IoT-related technology. In addition, the present disclosure relates to a method and device for transmitting and receiving a signal using artificial intelligence in a wireless communication system. Therefore, the present invention is capable of transmitting more accurately the information to be transmitted or received.

title: Method and apparatus for providing education service using satellite imagery based on Artificial Intelligence
abstract_text: Provided is a service providing device using a satellite image. The service providing device comprises: a satellite image information obtaining unit for obtaining a satellite image; an object extracting unit that analyzes a satellite image to extract an object from the satellite image and generates an object image corresponding to the object; a storage unit for storing the satellite image and the object image; and a service processing unit for providing an object extraction-based service and coding data related to the object extraction-based service based on at least one of the satellite image and the object image, thereby providing an identifying and classifying method about different types of objects and buildings located on the ground through image data about the ground.

title: Smart home cloud mirror integrating multiple functions
applicants: QINGDAO YUNSHANG YUYI IOT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a smart home cloud mirror integrating multiple functions, the exterior of the smart home cloud mirror is composed of a frame, a mirror, a mirror surface display screen and microphones, the mirror is located on the inner side of the frame, the mirror surface display screen is located in the middle of the mirror, the microphones are located on the left side and the right side of the mirror surface display screen, and the microphones are located on the frame; and the interior of the smart home cloud mirror is composed of a control box, and the control box is composed of a control circuit board, an RFID reading module, a first single-chip microcomputer, a data storage module, a voice recognition module, a second single-chip microcomputer, a third single-chip microcomputer, a Bluetooth module, a fourth single-chip microcomputer, a WIFI module and a fifth single-chip microcomputer. According to the smart home cloud mirror, the functions of 3D virtual fitting, Ai intelligent fitness, dressing matching recommendation, health management, intelligent home control, parent-child education, motion sensing games, intelligent wardrobe and intelligent household electrical appliance joint control are added on the basis of a traditional mirror, operation is easy, use is convenient, the sense of science and technology is sufficient, and the life of people is greatly enriched.

title: Student text feedback fine-grained analysis device and method fused with deep learning
applicants: NINGBO INSTITUTE OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SHANGHAI JIAOTONG UNIV
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student text feedback fine-grained analysis device and method fused with deep learning, and relates to the field of education, and the device comprises: a data obtaining module which obtains text data; a text embedding module which is connected with the data acquisition module and is used for carrying out word embedding processing on the text data and outputting word vectors; a deep learning module which is connected with the text embedding module, captures the multi-scale features of the word vectors by using a convolutional neural network, transmits the multi-scale features into a weighted bidirectional pyramid network for feature fusion, transmits the fused features into a text category classifier and a text polarity classifier, and respectively outputs the category classification and the sentiment polarity of the text data. According to the method and device, the analysis of category classification is added on the basis of emotion polarity classification, so that the information in the feedback data can be more fully utilized.

title: Waterproof and dustproof device for artificial intelligence early education robot
abstract_text: The utility model relates to a waterproof and dustproof device, in particular to a waterproof and dustproof device of an artificial intelligence early education robot. The device comprises a mounting device, a sealing device and a waterproof zipper, the mounting device comprises a rectangular pasting plate, the corners of the pasting plate are arc-shaped, the top end of the pasting plate is connected with a mounting plate, the interior of the mounting plate is of a cavity structure, a through groove is formed in the center of the pasting plate, and the through groove is communicated with the cavity structure in the mounting plate; the size of the outer wall of the mounting plate is matched with the size of the inner wall of the waterproof bag, the outer wall of the mounting plate is connected with the waterproof bag, through the sealing device and the mounting device, the device can seal a sound production opening of the artificial intelligence early education robot, and dust and liquid are prevented from entering the artificial intelligence early education robot through the sound production opening; therefore, the artificial intelligence early education robot cannot be used normally due to faults, and when the sealing device is damaged or stains are generated, the sealing device can be detached to be replaced and cleaned.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR SUPPORTING MULTIPLE MESSAGE A SIZES AND UPLINK COVERAGE FOR TWO STEP RANDOM ACCESS PROCEDURE
abstract_text: A communication method and system for converging a fifth generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a fourth generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of things (IoT) are provided. The communication method and system may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. A method by a terminal configured with at least one serving cell for performing a random access (RA) procedure is provided. The method includes measuring downlink reference signal received power (DL RSRP) of a serving cell on which the RA procedure is initiated, determining whether the DL RSRP of the serving cell is greater than a threshold, and performing a two-step RA procedure based on the DL RSRP of the serving cell being greater than the threshold.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence education robot which structurally comprises a robot body, a display screen, two or more buttons, a circuit board and impact protection devices. The display screen is installed at the top end of the front face of the robot body, the two or more buttons are installed at the lower end of the front face of the robot body, the impact protection devices are installed on the front inner wall and the back inner wall of the robot body, and the circuit board is installed in the impact protection devices. According to the robot, the impact protection device is arranged, when the robot falls on the ground, vibration generated by direct falling is weakened through deformation of a plane damping structure, then secondary vibration caused by vibration generated by direct falling is reduced to the minimum through a connecting damping mechanism, it is guaranteed that external vibration borne by the circuit board in a containing box is minimum, and the circuit board is protected when the robot falls so that the robot cannot be damaged.

title: Anti-collision assembly of artificial intelligence education robot
applicants: XINHUA COLLEGE OF SUN YAT SEN UNIV
abstract_text: The invention provides an anti-collision assembly of an artificial intelligence education robot. The anti-collision assembly is characterized by comprising a mounting ring, second mounting sheets and first buffer mechanisms, wherein the inner ring of the mounting ring is fixedly connected with the second mounting sheets, the mounting ring is mounted on the robot through the second mounting sheets, and the first buffer mechanisms are fixed on the outer ring of the mounting ring. According to the anti-collision assembly of the artificial intelligence education robot, through the buffer mechanisms arranged on the outer ring of the mounting ring, all-around protection is achieved, and the problems that precise electronic components in the robot are prone to loosening after being heavily hit, and consequently normal operation cannot be achieved are solved.

title: VOICE CHARACTERISTIC MACHINE LEARNING MODELLING
abstract_text: A voice modelling system is described for obtaining labelled data sets of audio vocalizations. Users may be prompted to vocalize known phrases, and features of the users' voices such as accent, vocabulary, pronunciation, and so forth can be extracted. Known characteristics of the users such as their age, gender, race, geographical region, education, and so forth can be captured. The labelled vocalizations along with the known characteristics of the users can be used to train a machine learning algorithm for generating voice models. The voice models may map the features of the users' voices to characteristics of the users. The trained machine learning algorithm can be deployed to predict characteristics of a person based on a vocalization captured from the person or to predict a vocalization with appropriate accent and so forth based on input of characteristics and a textual phrase.

title: Multi-angle artificial intelligence minority language online education terminal
applicants: BEIJING CHUANGXUE TIMES TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a multi-angle artificial intelligence minority language online education terminal which comprises a supporting seat, a first supporting frame, a second supporting frame, a first display terminal, a second display terminal and a driving motor, wherein both the first supporting frame and the second supporting frame are arranged on the supporting seat, a first rotating table is rotatably arranged on the supporting seat, and a second rotating table is rotatably arranged on the second supporting frame; a first gear is arranged on the first rotary table, a second rotary table is rotatably arranged on the supporting base, a second gear is arranged on the second rotary table, the driving motor is arranged on the first supporting frame, a first sliding rail is arranged on the first supporting frame, and a first sliding plate is slidably arranged on the first sliding rail; first sawteeth are arranged on the first sliding plate, and a first transmission shaft is arranged at the output end of the driving motor. The invention relates to the technical field of education equipment, in particular to the multi-angle artificial intelligence minority language online education terminal which can automatically recognize audiences on two sides and automatically adjust the angle and is convenient to use.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence education robot, which relates to the technical field of education robots and comprises a robot shell, and a display screen protection assembly is arranged at the top of the front surface of the robot shell; the display screen protection assembly comprises two L-shaped plates which are arranged in parallel, the two L-shaped plates are fixedly connected with the robot shell, bottom sealing plates are fixedly arranged at the bottom ends of the two L-shaped plates, and a mounting frame is arranged between the two L-shaped plates. A tempered glass protection plate is fixedly arranged on the inner side of the mounting frame, and a rubber sealing ring is arranged on the back face of the mounting frame in a bonded mode. Compared with the prior art, the problem that dust is attached to the display screen and is inconvenient to clean can be avoided while the surface of the display screen is prevented from being knocked or scratched, the tempered glass protection plate can be directly cleaned during subsequent cleaning, and compared with devices of the same type in the prior art, the cleaning difficulty is effectively reduced, and the cleaning efficiency is improved. Practical use is more convenient.

title: AI education learning method for intelligent education campus
abstract_text: The invention provides an AI education learning method for an intelligent education campus. The AI education learning method for the intelligent education campus is completed based on an AI education learning desk for the intelligent education campus, and the AI education learning desk for the intelligent education campus comprises a main body, a baffle plate, a side plate and a bottom piece; the main body is an intelligent education learning desk body and is of an inverted-U-shaped structure; and the baffle is mounted behind the top end of the main body. The bottom pieces are used for being installed at the two ends of the bottom of the main body, so when multiple desks are used, the bottom pieces and the connecting plates can be connected together, the front ends of the connecting plates can be inserted into the fixing grooves to be limited and fixed, then the multiple desks can be stably connected at the same time when used at the same time, and after the desks are assembled, large-amplitude inclination or displacement does not occur after the desk is used for a long time, so the desk can be kept tidy.

title: System and apparatus for controlling of mobile container pool for survival swimming education based on Artificial Intelligence
abstract_text: According to an embodiment of the present invention, a control system of a swimming pool comprises: the swimming pool formed in a movable container; and a control device controlling conditions of the swimming pool related to water stored in an inner space of the swimming pool. The conditions of the swimming pool comprise a water quality, water temperature, and a water level of the water of the swimming pool.

title: Integrated circuit board based on English Viada Jetson-Nano
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an integrated circuit board based on England JetsonNano, which comprises an England JetsonNano expansion board, and is characterized by further comprising a power supply module, an OLED display screen, a motor steering engine driving module, an RGB lighting module, a buzzer, a communication serial port module, an inertial sensor module, an SPI interface and an IO expansion interface which are connected with the England JetsonNano expansion board. The integrated circuit board is rich in interface, concise, integrated, convenient to develop, plug-and-play, capable of accessing various unmanned intelligent system projects, beneficial to rapid deployment of artificial intelligence education and capable of endowing artificial intelligence.

title: Method and device for intelligently identifying pictures and characters, computer equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN PUHUI ENTERPRISE MAN CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence, is applied to the field of intelligent education, and relates to a method and a device for intelligently identifying pictures and characters, computer equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the following steps: generating an initial single-character layer based on a received data single picture; generating a single-font picture library based on the initial single-character layer; extracting a target single-character layer in the single-font picture library based on the received target character string, and generating a training sample based on the target single-character layer and a preset background picture; inputting the training sample into a preset initial character recognition model to obtain a first character recognition result, and calculating a loss value based on the first character recognition result and a loss function until the loss function converges to obtain a target character recognition model; and inputting the received to-be-recognized data single picture into the target character recognition model to obtain a second character recognition result. The target character recognition model can be stored in a block chain. The training efficiency of the model is improved.

title: Central party selection method, storage medium and system
abstract_text: The invention provides a central party selection method and system in a cooperative deep learning task, and a storage medium. The method comprises steps that the initial selection of a central party for the aggregation of a deep learning model is carried out based on the performance score of each cooperative party in an initial period; in task proceeding, central party updating selection is carried out based on performance score values in survival nodes in a current period network, and the updated central party is used for continuing the model aggregation task, so a stable central party is provided for learning methods or model aggregation; the optimal data provider participating in the cooperative learning task is quickly selected as the central party under the abnormal condition of the central party, quick connection can be achieved, so the model training process can continue to run, and the method can be widely applied to the industries of economy, culture, education, medical treatment, public management and the like.

title: Apparatus and Method for Managing Curriculum based on Job Competence which is corresponded to Society Demand based on ontology and deep-learning
applicants: UNIV NAT HANBAT IND ACAD COOP FOUND [KR]
abstract_text: A competency-based education process management device according to one embodiment disclosed herein comprises: a communication circuit which can communicate with a plurality of external electronic devices; a memory; and a processor. The process is configured to: collect National Competency Standards (NCS) data, subject data, and job data from the plurality of external electronic devices through the communication circuit; configure an ontology model related to a job, a task, and a subject based on the NCS data, the subject data, and the job data; calculate the degree of association between the subject and the job or between the subject and the task based on the ontology model, the NCS data, the subject data, and the job data; and match the subject and the job or the subject and the task associated with a numerical value or more specified in the ontology model based on the calculated degree of association. According to the present invention, the competency-based education process management device can guide a user to check required task competency based on machine learning.

title: IMPROVEMENTS IN AND RELATING TO TELECOMMUNICATION NETWORKS
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. Disclosed is a method of configuring a base station, gNB, in a telecommunication network, the base station comprising a central unit, CU, and a distributed unit, DU, wherein the CU is arranged to perform virtualised network functions, VNFs, wherein the CU comprises an artificial intelligence, AI, engine operable to learn from computational metrics and to adjust the configuration of various VNFs, and wherein an F1 interface is used to exchange computational metrics between the CU and the DU.

title: Artificial intelligence player based on AI education
applicants: HEFEI NUOBIDA INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence player based on AI education. The player comprises two groups of support bottom plates, wherein a first support column and a second support column are fixedly mounted on the upper surfaces of the two groups of support bottom plates correspondingly, fixed plug boards are fixedly connected to the upper surfaces of the first support column and the second support column correspondingly, a first supporting sleeve shell is arranged on the upper surface of the first support column, a second supporting sleeve shell is arranged on the upper surface of the second support column, a rotating shaft is connected between the first supporting sleeve shell and the second supporting sleeve shell, and a playing screen is fixedly connected to the outer side face of the rotating shaft. According to the player, a height and an inclination angle of the playing screen can be conveniently adjusted, good flexibility is achieved, operation and use are facilitated, external dust can be prevented from being attached to the surface of the playing screen, a good dustproof effect is achieved, the player can be prevented from collapsing due to external collision, a good stable supporting effect is achieved, and stability of the player is improved.

title: AI education robot unmanned driving method based on multi-sensor fusion
abstract_text: The invention provides an AI education robot unmanned driving method based on multi-sensor fusion. The AI education robot unmanned driving method comprises the following step of S1, arranging a multi-cooperation sensor and a high-sensitivity camera around a vehicle body through a connecting assembly, enabling a connecting plate to be connected with the periphery of the vehicle body, inserting a clamping block provided with the camera into a box body, and extruding two protruding blocks through using an elastic force of extrusion springs, so that the two protruding blocks and two L-shaped blocks arranged in the box body are clamped tightly. According to the AI education robot unmanned driving method based on multi-sensor fusion, a multi-aspect clamping function is achieved, the installation stability of the camera or the sensor is greatly improved, a moving plate can be pulled through the elastic force of a reset spring, so that the moving plate and a rotating handle move towards the interior of a hidden frame, a moving plate and the rotating handle are driven to move towards the interior of the hidden frame, the camera is prevented from being randomly disassembled by external personnel, and a good hiding function is achieved.

title: COMPUTER-BASED SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR INSTRUCTIONAL AND BEHAVIORAL RECOMMENDATIONS
abstract_text: Computer-based systems and methods for instructional and behavioral recommendations, such as educator coaching recommendations and intervention plans, are provided. The system processes disparate education-related data, processes the data using a computationally-efficient, matrix-based recommendation algorithm, and identifies needs and resources by using student related data to determine which students require support, organizes students into groups, and generates a customized intervention plan for a coach. The system can automatically identify and confirm data file types prior to uploading the data, and it can accommodate student data stored in a variety of file formats. Additionally, the system can execute one or more machine learning algorithms which process data relating to educator interventions in order to more rapidly generate recommendations for coaches, and to improve future recommendations by the system.

title: Deep learning sample labeling method and system based on online education big data
abstract_text: The invention is suitable for the technical field of computer vision, and provides a deep learning sample labeling method and system based on online education big data. The method comprises the following steps: S1, randomly extracting M samples from N pieces of data in a database, labeling the M samples, and training a labeling model according to the labeled M samples; S2, dividing the M labeled samples into a plurality of classification libraries of different types of data; S3, labeling and classifying the NM data in the whole database by the labeling model; S4, displaying N pieces of data needing to be labeled through an online labeling module, and correcting and annotating the displayed annotated N pieces of data, wherein the N pieces of data are from annotated random data in a database; S5, judging the corrected and labeled data, and training the annotation model again according to the determined corrected annotation data.

title: Education Improvement System and Method
abstract_text: Abstract A method and system for improving the education of students comprises testing student and storing the results in a database using a data analysis module and a machine learning module to provide recommendations for education resources based on the test results. Sign-In Unit E Testing Unit Monitoring Unit Grading tests and providing negative comments Updating Database and Spreadsheets Passed yes Next Test No Analysis Unit Calculating Rates and Probabilities of Failure Recommending Educational Recommendation Re-education Unit Learning Process using Ed Resources

title: A CLOUD-BASED MACHINE LEARNING EEG SYSTEM TO PROVIDE READILY ACCESSIBLE MENTAL HEALTH DETECTION SOLUTIONS
abstract_text: - 2021100166 This innovation describes asystemtomeasure various mental health issues such as Autism, Neurotic disorder, Schizophrenia, and General Anxiety Disordersuing Electroencephalogram(EEG) and Galvanic Skin Response (GSR). This system has applications for Mental Health, Education and Personal Improvement. The system is based on using a EEG helmet to measure coherence scores (CO), TAR -(Cognitive Load) and frontal asymmetry(FA). Such measures are used to provide robust assessment of a patient mental health situation. Drawings Figure. 1 Schematic of a cloud based Mental Health measurement system ....
