title: Wall-mounted artificial intelligence online education equipment
applicants: GUANGDONG IMAGINATION BRAND MAN CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses wall-mounted artificial intelligence on-line education equipment, which structurally comprises a display screen, a frame plate, an equipment main body, an opening and closing module, a direction control module, a selection module, a battery bin, a support frame and a double hanger. Wherein the support body is provided with a reinforcing rod and a fixed connection block which are combined into a whole, two sides of the support body are respectively provided with a mounting head embedded with a support frame, the hanging groove block is combined with a hanging hole to form a double-wall-hanging structure which is spaced up and down, the hanging groove block is a larger wall-hanging structural part, and the hanging hole is a smaller wall-hanging structural part. And during hanging, the anti-skid supporting performance of the upper part is improved through the rubber pad, so that the anti-falling safety coefficient of equipment installation is improved.

title: personalized and adaptive learning method based on artificial intelligence AI using big data and system
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a personalized learning method based on big data and artificial intelligence (AI) to provide education services with global competitiveness to users and a system thereof. According to one embodiment of the present invention, the personalized learning method based on big data and AI uses an education server forming a network with a web, an external server, and a terminal. The method comprises, by the education server: a first step of receiving a learner′s age information from at least one of the web, the external server, and the terminal; a second step of determining a first period corresponding to the age information among pre-stored learning life cycles; a third step of receiving first learning area information related to the first period from at least one of the web, the external server, and the terminal; a fourth step of collecting first learner information related to the learner; a fifth step of providing the first learning area information and first educational content determined on the basis of the first learner information to the learner; a sixth step of accumulating and collecting second learner information of the learner related to the first educational content; a seventh step of receiving second learning area information related to a second period among the pre-stored learning life cycles when the first period ends; and an eighth step of providing second educational content determined on the basis of the second learning area information and the accumulated second learner information to the learner.

title: personalized learning method based on AIartificial intelligence and system
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an AI-based customized learning method and system. The AI-based learning method using a web, an external server and a terminal and a network for education related to an embodiment of the present invention includes: a first step in which an education server communicates with the web, the external server and the terminal based on a responsive web interface, and communicates with the external server using a learner profile interface and a learning tool interoperability (LTI) service; and a second step in which the education server provides learning contents to a user using a learning analysis component, an AI processing component, a content processing component, and a service processing component. The learning content may include a question bank and knowledge map-based contents, customized automatic question creation contents, social learning and e-portfolio-based contents, and learning analysis and artificial intelligence-based contents.

title: Cloud-based Thinking Action Pattern Assessment System
abstract_text: Disclosed is a smart device-based cloud-based thinking action pattern assessment (TAPAA) system. The cloud-based thinking action pattern assessment (TAPAA) system comprises: a user terminal of an expert for thinking action pattern assessment (TAPAA); and a thinking action pattern assessment (TAPAA) system which is connected to the user terminal in a wired/wireless manner, analyzes morphemes of assessment questions (raw questions) of a question set for thinking action pattern analysis to classify the sentences by a natural language processing algorithm including a sentence classification program and a morpheme analysis program, automatically generates similar duplication questions having a selected word with a high cosine similarity to verify the similar duplication questions by an expert system, assesses reliability indicating whether the similar duplication questions are equivalent to the assessment questions (raw questions) of the question set in accordance with Cronbach α correlation coefficient analysis of the education theory by a reliability assessment program, and stores similar duplication questions with a Cronbach α correlation coefficient of 0.7 or higher or 0.8 or higher as final duplication questions in the question database (question bank). A cloud and smart device-based thinking action pattern assessment (TAPAA) platform is constructed. An artificial-intelligence automatic question generation algorithm and a verification technique optimized for thinking action pattern analysis are developed. A customized learning action type assessment model was provided.

title: User pronunciation accuracy evaluation method and device, and electronic equipment
applicants: ZUOYEBANG EDUCATION TECH BEIJING CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of online education, and provides a user pronunciation accuracy evaluation method and device, electronic equipment and a recording medium. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring audio information and image information when a user makes a sound; screening out at least one frame of image during pronunciation of the user from the image information; extracting mouth shape information of the user from the image during pronunciation; and respectively inputting the audio information and the mouth shape information into different deep learning models, calculating the pronunciation matching degree and the mouth shape matching degree of the user, and judging whether the pronunciation of the user is accurate or not according to the pronunciation matching degree and the mouth shape matching degree. Whether the pronunciation of the user is accurate or not is evaluated through multiple dimensions, so that the evaluation result is more accurate, the evaluation result is fed back to the user in real time, a corresponding correction scheme is given according to the evaluation result, the user can conveniently adjust the pronunciation mouth shape and pronunciation tone of the user, and the user experience is improved.

title: ELECTRONIC DEVICE FOR PROVIDING RECOMMENDED EDUCATION CONTENT USING BIG DATA AND MACHINE LEARNING MODEL AND METHOD FOR OPERATING THEREOF
abstract_text: According to an embodiment of the present application, a server (100) may be a server which provides an interface for diagnosing various types of characteristics of a learner, and provides customized educational content to the learner based on diagnosed various types of characteristics. The server (100) may provide the interface for diagnosing the learners with an electronic device using the server (100), and may accumulate diagnostic information about the learner received from the electronic device based on the provided interface. In addition, the server (100) may acquire information on various types of educational content provided in a market through an external server (300). Accordingly, it is possible to provide more appropriate educational content to the learner by reconfiguring recommended educational content according to earner′s feedback information.

title: Smart city data construction method based on knowledge graph
abstract_text: The invention provides a smart city data construction method based on a knowledge graph. The method comprises the steps of 1 obtaining N associated fields, including education, medical treatment and traffic, of a natural person in city life; 2 aiming at the N fields, respectively constructing field sub-ontology persons in the fields; and 3 performing superposing, disambiguating and de-duplicationon the knowledge maps of N fields, so that a complete field knowledge map can be formed. According to the method, a graph database technology is combined with a semantic web description system, standards and tools, so that the storage and retrieval calculation speed of a computer system for a large-scale knowledge base is increased, and organic combination of artificial intelligence models, especially application in the aspects of intelligent customer service, question answering systems and the like, is facilitated.

title: Speech recognition method and device based on self-attention mechanism and memory network
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a speech recognition method and device based on a self-attention mechanism and a memory network, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and can solve the problems of poor speech recognition effect and low efficiency caused by certain limitations of an existing model in calculation complexity and accuracy during speech recognition at present. The method comprises the following steps: updating an encoder structure and a decoder structure of an RNN-Transducer model according to the self-attention mechanism and the memory network LSTM; extracting voice sequence features and text sequence features of the target voice; and determining a target text label corresponding to the target voice based on the voice sequence features and the text sequence features by using the updated RNN-Transducer model. The method is suitable for online voice recognition, for example, the method can be applied to scenes such as dialogue robots, online education and real-time conference systems.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR BEAM ASSOCIATION BETWEEN DOWNLINK/UPLINK
abstract_text: The disclosure relates to a communication scheme and system for the convergence of a 5G communication system for supporting a higher a data transfer rate after the 4G system with the IoT technology. The disclosure may be applied to intelligence services (e.g., a smart home, a smart building, a smart city, a smart car or connected car, healthcare, digital education, retail business, security and safety-related services) based on the 5G communication technology and IoT-related technology. The disclosure discloses a method and apparatus for a beam association between DL/UL.

title: AI-BASED APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR PROVIDING CUSTOMIZED MATHEMATICS EDUCATION SERVICE
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a device and method for providing a user-customized math education service based on artificial intelligence. According to one embodiment of the present invention, the device includes: a first data analysis unit which selects a verification problem based on prior information set by an external input approved by a user and provides a selected verification problem to a user terminal; a curriculum generator which determines a learning level of a user based on a correct answer to the verification problem, and determines a curriculum suitable for a determined learning level; a second data analysis unit which analyzes the correct answer to the problem provided according to a curriculum, a solution process, and a solution time when the curriculum determined by an external input approved by the user is provided to the user terminal; and a problem type determination unit which determines a type of the next problem based on whether the problem analyzed through the second data analysis unit is correct or not, the solution process, and the solution time.

title: A Cloud Based AI Enabled Security and Safety System for Protecting the Vehicle Drivers and Passengers During the Journey
abstract_text: People lives in a fast-paced world, with fast access to food, education, livelihood, and death. There is an innovative scientific discovery every day. Each new day, there is a new invention adapting to the novel changes in the world. The invention of technology has brought the Globe into the palms of every person. Artificial Intelligence is a boon to the global world. It has facilitated immeasurable advantages to society. Intelligent Auto-Mobile (IAM) is used to record the journey and detect the driver's health condition by inbuilt mechanism without direct human control. It is used to track the vehicle's entire journey, the passengers' actions, and the driver with their identification. The proposed invention is a system comprises electronic parts (such as cameras, sensors, etc.), electro-mechanical, and electromagnetic devices that have silicon micro-machined components operating in combination with computer-controlled devices and radio transceivers to provide care repeated functions, in case of emergency. The in-built system tries to associate smart technology with accessible data to protect the driver and the passenger. The unique feature of image and video in Cloud storage helps in future reference and accessible evidence. This warrants the reduction of fatal accidents and immunes societal harmony. The objective of this invention is to provide the safety and security of the driver, denied access to strangers during the journey, faster communication to the Official in-charge, providing safety to the pro-passenger, and ensuring the Pro-women safety.

title: Fingertip position detection method and device, equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a fingertip position detection method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the fields ofcomputer vision, deep learning and the like. According to the specific implementation scheme, the method comprises the steps that a sample image and annotation features, corresponding to the sample image, under multiple resolutions are obtained, the sample image comprises fingertips, and the annotation features comprise fingertip annotation features; based on a machine learning model, sample features under multiple resolutions are extracted from the sample image, and the sample features include fingertip sample features for fingertip position prediction; and for each resolution, a machine learning model is trained according to the fingertip labeling features and the fingertip sample features under the resolution to generate a fingertip detection model, the fingertip detection model being used for detecting the fingertip position in the to-be-detected image. The technical scheme of the embodiment of the invention can be applied to scenes such as voice explanation, online education, intelligent education and the like, and the fingertip detection precision and efficiency can be improved.

title: Online education teacher-student intelligent matching method and device and storage medium
applicants: SHENZHEN SAIANTE TECH SERVICE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, is applied to the field of smart education of smart cities, and particularly relates to an online education teacher and student intelligent matching method and device and a storage medium. According to the online education teacher-student intelligent matching method and device and the storage medium, label words are extracted based ontext evaluation of teachers by students after class, emotion classification is carried out on the label words to generate first user portraits of the students, existence classification is carried outon the label words to generate second user portraits of the teachers, and finally, according to the first user portrait of the student and the second user portrait of the teacher, a matching value ofthe teacher and the current student is obtained. By means of the mode, teachers and students do not need to conduct self-evaluation respectively, and the labor cost is reduced; after-class text evaluation of students is more real and accurate than subjective self-evaluation, the matching accuracy is improved, along with accumulation of text evaluation data, portraits of teachers and students can be gradually perfected and specified, and the accuracy can also be gradually improved.

title: Machine learning-based trial lecture teacher intelligent distribution method and device and electronic equipment
applicants: ZUOYEBANG EDUCATION TECH BEIJING CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of education, and provides a machine learning-based trial teacher teacher intelligent distribution method, which comprises the steps of establishing a training dataset which comprises behavior data of historical students and trial performance data; constructing a trainee performance prediction model, and training the student performance prediction model by usingthe training data set; using the trained student performance prediction model to calculate a student performance prediction value of the current lesson attending student; and according to a predetermined allocation strategy and the student performance prediction value, allocating a trial lecture teacher to the current lesson trial student. According to the method, effective matching between the trial lecture student and the teacher can be realized, and the transaction rate or conversion rate of the trial lecture student can be improved.

title: Intelligent Bluetooth sound box supporting multiple fixing structures for artificial intelligence education
applicants: SHENZHEN CHAODA ELECTRIC APPLIANCES PRODUCTS CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an intelligent Bluetooth sound box supporting a plurality of fixing structures for artificial intelligence education, comprising a sound box body, four corners of the lowersurface of the sound box body are in threaded connection with supporting legs, the front surface of the sound box body is provided with a sliding groove, the sound box body is in sliding connection with a retaining plate through the sliding groove, and the middle part of the retaining plate is provided with a hinge. Through the sliding groove, the fixing plate, the clamping groove, the rotating handle and the toothed bolt on the sound box body, a worker can fix the device on a wall top or a box top more conveniently, then the device is effectively prevented from falling off, and then the situation that the device falls off to injure the person is effectively avoided; the device can be fixed on a wall surface more conveniently by workers, so that the practicability and the applicability ofthe device are effectively improved, the device can be fixed in different forms, and the situation that the device is damaged due to falling off is avoided.

title: Artificial intelligence education device
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of education devices, and discloses an artificial intelligence education device which comprises an intelligent education machine body, a first supporting seat and a second supporting seat are symmetrically arranged below the intelligent education machine body, and a holding rod is fixedly arranged between the first supporting seat and the second supporting seat. A first supporting rod and a second supporting rod are vertically and fixedly arranged on the upper surface of the first supporting base and the upper surface of the second supporting base correspondingly, and the intelligent education machine body is located between the first supporting rod and the second supporting rod. The two sides of the intelligent education machine body are rotationally connected with the first supporting rod and the second supporting rod through a first rotating shaft and a second rotating shaft correspondingly, and a limiting mechanism is arranged between the first rotating shaft and the first supporting rod. The portable intelligent education machine is convenient for people to carry and use by hands, is convenient for adjusting the angle of the intelligent education machine body, and improves the learning efficiency of people.

title: Automatic question setting method and device based on text and computer equipment
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a text-based automatic question setting method and apparatus, and a computer device, relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and can solve the problems of limited generation result and low accuracy in current question generation. The method comprises the following steps: constructing a problem generation model based on a UniLM model and a potential attribute decoder; training a question generation model by utilizing the sample text marked with the preset question and the corresponding question option, so that a training result of the question generation model meets a preset training standard; inputting a target text segment corresponding to the target text, the first answer option and the second answer option into a question generation model, and obtaininga target question matched with the first answer option; and outputting the target question, and the first answer option and the second answer option corresponding to the target question. The method issuitable for automatically generating the choice questions corresponding to the text content, can be applied to the field of intelligent questions and answers, and can also be applied to education practice, for example, the learning conditions of students are evaluated by generating questions related to texts.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR AN AUTONOMOUS MULTIPURPOSE APPLICATION FOR SCHEDULING, CHECK-IN, AND EDUCATION
abstract_text: A method and system for an autonomous multipurpose application for scheduling, check-in, and education is described herein. The autonomous multipurpose application may provide an improved experience for users that schedule appointments with people having specialties, and that check-in to the scheduled appointments. A cognitive intelligence platform may use artificial intelligence techniques to enable operations of the autonomous multipurpose application. Further, computing resources may be reduced using the described techniques.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR UPLINK TRANSMISSIONS IN FRAME-BASED EQUIPMENT NR UNLICENSED
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. A method performed by a terminal operating in a shared spectrum channel is provided. The method comprises: receiving, from a base station, downlink (DL) transmission in a channel occupancy time (COT); identifying a time gap between the DL transmission and a uplink (UL) transmission; identifying whether to perform a channel sensing before the UL transmission based on the time gap; and transmitting, to the base station, the UL transmission within the COT.

title: A SUBJECT-TAILORED CONTINUOUSLY DEVELOPING RANDOMIZATION BASED METHOD FOR IMPROVING ORGAN FUNCTION
abstract_text: The present disclosure provides systems regimens, devices and methods for improving organ function by challenged-exercise, training, and/or education and/or nutritional regimens, or devices intended for improving organ performance, and for prevention and treatment of loss of an effect to exercise regimens in healthy and chronic subjects, or lack of full responsiveness to exercise, training, nutritional or education regimens in subjects who wish to improve the function of their organs, or with chronic diseases. There are provided herein devices, systems, and methods for real time or delayed altering of the parameters of training regimens and/or time of administration and/or combining different exercise, training, nutrition or education regimens, for improving the long term effect of the regimen. According to some embodiments, any training regimen and/or device-generated maneuver/stimulation, wherein the parameters are updated within the exercise regimen/maneuver period, for personalizing the regimen parameters and increasing the accuracy and efficacy of the regimen for achieving the desired physiological goal, and to prevent long-term adaptation for ensuing prolong effect of the training regimen on the target organ function or physiological pathway. Output parameters are continuously, semi continuously, or conditionally being updated based on measurements and inputs provided to a compute circuitry configured to facilitate closed loop machine learning capabilities.

title: VR safety education device based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model provides a VR safety education device based on artificial intelligence, belongs to the technical field of VR application equipment, and aims to solve the problems that in the existing VR safety education device based on artificial intelligence, when VR glasses are worn by students for a long time, a large amount of sweat can appear at the face wearing positions of the students, adisplay window is easily blurred, and the visual effect is influenced. The pair of VR glasses comprises a VR glasses body, and fixing seats are fixedly mounted at the left end and the right end of the VR glasses body. When the sliding button slides to the front end of the sleeve frame, the sleeve is separated from the position between the two arc-shaped spring pieces, the front ends of the two arc-shaped spring pieces are in an attached state, so that the cooling fan is in an opened state, the baffle is separated from the position above the ventilation window, power is provided by the coolingfan, and the interior of the VR glasses body is cooled and cooled through the ventilation net and the ventilation window. Students are prevented from sweating during use, and the learning quality isimproved.

title: AI intelligent education system
applicants: SHANGHAI ZHIDAO KNOWLEDGE DIGITAL TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI intelligent education system which comprises an education terminal platform, an intermediate analysis platform and a remote server. The education terminal platform comprises a data input module which is used for collecting data related to student learning; an intermediate analysis platform comprises a data processing module which is used for preprocessing student learning-related data acquired by a data input module; the remote server comprises a neural network module, and the neural network module is provided with an artificial neural network to intelligently analyze the data preprocessed by the data processing module. The AI intelligent education system provided by the invention can intelligently analyze student scores according to student data.

title: Carrying device of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The invention discloses a carrying device of an artificial intelligence education robot in the field of carrying devices, which comprises a bottom frame, a side edge fixing group and a top fixing group A. The upper end of the bottom frame is fixedly connected with a supporting frame, a sliding groove is formed in the supporting frame, and a lifting rod and a lifting rod II are slidably connected in the sliding groove of the supporting frame. The upper end of the lifting rod and the lower end of the lifting rod II are connected through a connecting rod; the upper end of the rear side of the bottom frame is connected with a connecting frame, the other end of a hinge is fixedly connected to the upper end of the lifting rod, the upper end of the rear side of the bottom frame is fixedly connected with a hydraulic rod, a piston rod of the hydraulic rod is fixedly connected with a supporting rod, and the two ends of the supporting rod are rotationally connected with chain wheels. The chain wheel is meshed with the hinge and located at the lower end of the hinge, a second sliding groove is formed in the lifting rod and slidably connected with a fork frame, a lead screw is rotatably connected into the lifting rod and is in threaded connection with the fork frame, a motor is fixedly connected to one side of the lifting rod, and an output shaft of the motor is fixedly connected with the lead screw; the robot can be well fixed in the transportation process.

title: Intelligent analysis system for high-order thinking cultivation
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent analysis system for high-order thinking cultivation, and the system comprises an intelligent learning platform, a learning theme pushing platform, and an education evaluation platform, wherein the intelligent learning platform is in signal connection with the learning theme pushing platform through a local area network, and the intelligent learning platform is in signal connection with the education evaluation platform through the Internet. The intelligent learning platform comprises a teacher space module, a manager space module, a parent space module and a student space module. According to the method, a topic content analysis technology, big data and an artificial intelligence technology are applied, suggestions of corresponding learning objectivesand learning strategies are completed according to classification of learning topics, and pushing of corresponding learning resources in the later period is completed.

title: Intelligent family education robot
abstract_text: The intelligent family education robot comprises an upper shell, a lower shell, a rotating shaft, a base, a wireless charging base, a lifting rod, a middle-layer mechanical plate, a lifting rod transmission gear box, a lifting motor, a battery, an AI control panel, a reduction gearbox, a driving motor, a driving wheel and a driven wheel, and the lifting rod is connected with the upper shell, the middle-layer mechanical plate and the base in a supporting mode; the lower shell is fixedly connected to the middle-layer mechanical plate through a rotating shaft; the lifting rod transmission gear box and the lifting motor are mounted on the middle-layer mechanical plate and are connected with the lifting rod; the battery and the AI control panel are mounted on the middle-layer mechanical plate;the driving wheel and the driven wheel are respectively arranged in the lower shell; and the driving motor and the reduction gearbox are mounted on the driving wheel. The intelligent family educationrobot provided by the utility model can realize the functions of remote monitoring, face recognition, intelligent control, automatic charging and the like, and is attractive in appearance, convenientto use and suitable for interaction with children in families.

title: Deep learning sample labeling method and system based on online education big data
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of sample labeling, and discloses a deep learning sample labeling method and system based on online education big data. The deep learning sample labeling system based on the online education big data comprises a data sample acquisition module, a classification processing module, a central control module, an annotation model construction module, a modeltraining module, a model test module, a sample annotation module, a sample annotation auditing module, a data storage module and an updating display module. According to the deep learning sample labeling system based on the online education big data provided by the invention, by labeling an online education big data sample, an individual-independent data entry is provided for the deep learning model, so that the identification accuracy of the online education data is improved, the individual subjectivity is avoided, single repeated labor is less boring, great convenience is brought to all labeled users, and the user experience is improved.

title: ANSWER VALIDATION AND EDUCATION WITHIN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI) SYSTEMS
abstract_text: Systems and methods are disclosed for supplementing computer-generated results with third party feedback and educational information. In embodiments, a method includes: receiving user input from a user during an automated response-generating event; determining whether to present educational information with a result based on user data, wherein the educational information is information automatically generated by the computing device regarding a decision-making process utilized to generate the result; determining whether to present third party feedback with the result based on the user data, wherein the third party feedback includes information obtained from a human participant; and presenting a response to the user including the result, wherein content of the response is based on the determining whether to present the educational information with the result and the determining whether to present the third party feedback with the result.

title: AI SYSTEM OF CUSTOMIZED EDUCATION PROGRAM USING AI EDUCATION PLATFORM BASED ON BIG DATA
abstract_text: Disclosed is a customized education program system, which includes: a big data server for collecting and storing capability modeling learning data in real time from a plurality of network servers; a capability modeling device for learning the capability modeling learning data with a deep learning model and modeling the capability behavior index for each job category; and a program design device for designing a job training program using the capability behavior index for each job category. According to the present invention, it is possible to maximize educational effectiveness as well as reduce cost required for the management of human resources.

title: CREATIVITY COLLABORATION EDUCATION PLATFORM SYSTEM USING COLLABORATION NETWORK AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a creative collaboration education platform system using a collaboration network and artificial intelligence and, more specifically, to a collaboration education platform system which comprises a platform server that provides a shared work environment for common work and a personalized work environment for each student. Therefore, the collaboration education platform system can accurately monitor class attitudes of the students, and systematically manage the students.

title: PLATFORM SYSTEM FOR PROVIDING VIDEO COMMUNICATION BETWEEN NON DISABLED AND HEARING IMPAIRED BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence-based platform system for video communication between a non-disabled person and a hearing-impaired person. An objective of the present invention is to allow prompt communication for all users in the world between a social vulnerable class such as the hearing-impaired and the elderly and non-disabled people regardless of a country or a language, and receive and use content such as a variety of education and games regardless of men and women of all ages. For example, the platform system for video communication comprises: a first communication execution unit which is installed in a first communication terminal, transmits a video signal and a voice signal of a first user generated through the first communication terminal in real time to a server, and outputs a video signal and a voice signal of a second user received in real time from the server; a second communication execution unit which is installed in a second communication terminal, transmits a video signal and text data of the second user generated and inputted through the second communication terminal in real time to the server, and outputs a video signal and a voice signal of the first user received in real time from the server; and an artificial intelligence relay server unit to transceive a video signal in real time between the first communication terminal and the second communication terminal, convert a voice signal received from the first communication terminal into text data to transmit the text data to the second communication terminal, and convert at least one between text data and a sign language gesture of the second user in a video signal received from the second communication terminal into a voice signal to transmit the voice signal to the first communication terminal.

title: Artificial intelligence anti-radiation intelligent projection prenatal education device
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence anti-radiation intelligent projection prenatal education device, and relates to the technical field of pregnant woman and infant monitoring and entertainment devices. The technical defects that an existing pregnant woman and infant monitoring entertainment product is single in function and resources are not fully utilized are overcome, and the infant monitoring entertainment product comprises a central processing module which is connected with a Bluetooth communication module, an audio antenatal training module and a power supply battery. A Doppler fetus-voice meter processing module connected with the central processing module is further arranged; the Doppler fetus-voice meter processing module is connected with a fetus-voice detection probe outside the shell through a plug interface; the central processing module is further connected with a speech recognition module used for speech recognition, a projection module used for image projection, a GPS positioning module, a pedometer module and a heart rate detection module. The intelligent monitoring system is not only suitable for various monitoring and prenatal education, but also can be used as an infant early education or intelligence entertainment product after delivery, one-stop service is achieved, and resources are fully utilized.

title: Artificial intelligence education method and device
applicants: JIANGXI TAIDE INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence education method. The method comprises the steps of collecting education knowledge information and learning information of students; respectively processing the knowledge information and the learning information to obtain a standard value of the knowledge information and an acquisition value of the learning information; associating the acquisitionvalue with student number information in the learning information to obtain associated acquisition information, and combining the standard value, the acquisition value and the associated acquisitioninformation to obtain data processing information; analyzing the standard value and the acquisition value in the data processing information to obtain data analysis information; processing the data analysis information to generate different education signals, and providing education guidance for different students according to the different education signals. The invention further discloses an artificial intelligence education device. Th objective of the invention is to solve the problems that in the existing scheme, the effect after artificial intelligence education cannot be obtained, and targeted guidance cannot be performed on students according to the result of artificial intelligence education.

title: Artificial intelligence online education platform
applicants: BEIJING HUITONG CLOUD TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of education platforms, in particular to an artificial intelligence online education platform which comprises a base, telescopic rods are fixedly connected to the left side and the right side of the top of the outer side wall of the base, the top ends of the two telescopic rods are fixedly connected with a connecting frame, and sliding rails are arranged on the left side and the right side of the rear side wall of the connecting frame. The wiring assembly is arranged on the rear side of the connecting frame, the heat dissipation assembly is arranged in the connecting frame, the height of the connecting frame is changed by adjusting the height of the telescopic rod, operation is easy, stability is high, use by users with different heights isfacilitated, the equipment is convenient to move or rotate through the arrangement of universal wheels, and the equipment is convenient to move and carry. Meanwhile, the elastic buckles which are linearly arranged on the outer side wall of the sliding plate at equal intervals from left to right in a clamped mode can fix the connecting line of the equipment, the clamping grooves formed in the fixing plate at the bottom end of the sliding rail can fix the connecting line for the second time, the wiring flatness of the connecting line is further improved, and the broken line condition is prevented.

title: AI-enabled online education ecological business model
applicants: MANYU MICRO VISION BEIJING MEDIA TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI-enabled online education ecological business model, which comprises software I, software II and software III. The software I comprises photographing intelligent generation virtual images, animation short videos, curriculum communities and exponential growth customer obtaining; photographing intelligent generation virtual images are realized an image recognition technology and an AI algorithm; animation short videos are applied to AI technology face changing, AI technology interaction, intelligent video pushing and commodity link commodity carrying pushing. The curriculum communities introduce contents and self-research contents through big data intelligent matching and intelligent pushing; the exponential growth guest obtaining is realized through profit driving, sharing registration, intelligent algorithm fission, one-key login and a customer number obtaining formula y = (K + 1) * Mn. According to the invention, customers are obtained through sharing, grouping and mining or sharing through reward points, reward free courses and the like, and information in intelligent hardware of registered users is obtained by means of an AI function, so that an online education institution is assisted in quickly obtaining customers.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR ASSIGNING RESOURCES IN WIRELESS COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication technique for converging a 5G communication system for supporting a higher data transfer rate beyond a 4G system with loT technology, and a system therefor. The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services (for example, smart homes, smart buildings, smart cities, smart cars or connected cars, health care, digital education, retail business, security and safety-related services, etc.) on the basis of 5G communication technology and IoT-related technology. The present disclosure relates to a method for assigning transmission resources including an uplink (UL)-dedicated region and a downlink (DL)-dedicated region, the method comprising: a step for identifying a ratio of the DL-dedicated region to the UL-dedicated region; a step for changing the ratio of the DL-dedicated region to the UL-dedicated region by using at least one of a utilization rate and electric field characteristic information of the transmission resources; and a step for assigning the UL-dedicated region and the DL-dedicated region according to the changed ratio of the DL-dedicated region to the UL-dedicated region.

title: AI enabled Assistive Technology Development for Visually Impaired People using Deep Learning
abstract_text: Al enabled Assistive Technology Development for Visually Impaired People using Deep Learning Despite the efforts, there is an increase in the degenerative problems related to eyes/eye sight. Hence, the importance of developing technological tools which can help the visually impaired people adapt to the dynamic environment. Allowing an independent living structure for such people is a great challenge. Here comes the role of rapidly developing technologies which can enable blind or visually impaired people to live an independent and enthusiastic life. The aim of the proposed model is to bring a novel hybridization in the use of assistive technologies for visually impaired people in various domains like independent living, education and livelihood. title: Artificial intelligence (AI) education robot based on cloud computing
applicants: HUNAN ZHONGKAI ZHICHUANG TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence (AI) education robot based on cloud computing. The AI education robot based on cloud computing comprises an intelligent robot, wherein the surface ofthe intelligent robot is provided with eyes; the interior of each eye is provided with a camera; the bottoms of the eyes are provided with a housing; the interior of the housing is provided with a sound box; the bottom of the sound box is provided with a robot neck; a transparent body is arranged at the bottom of the robot neck; a control panel is arranged on the front face of the transparent body; a storage battery is arranged on one side of the control panel; a charging port is formed in one side of the storage battery; a light-emitting diode is arranged at the bottom of the storage battery; a light-emitting diode (LED) advertising board is arranged on the inner layer of the light-emitting diode; a front supporting wheel is arranged at the bottom of the light-emitting diode; a storage box is arranged in the front supporting wheel; a robot bottom table is arranged at the bottom of the front supporting wheel; and sliding wheels are arranged at the bottom of the robot bottom table. Thedevice is simple in structure, children are effectively interested in the device, the manual operation time is shortened, and meanwhile, the robot is more user-friendly due to the arrangement of theInternet.

title: Putting public opinion monitoring method for advertisement putting
applicants: SHANGHAI CHANGTOU NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a putting public opinion monitoring method for advertisement putting, and the method comprises the steps of: extracting text features and enhancement data through three types of deep learning models, i.e. bert, albert and roberta, according to user comment data after advertisement putting, employing a plurality of model fusion, training or pre-training models, generating similar corporammto serve as corpus expansion, and then performing application to a downstream public opinion classification task to solve the problem of little annotation data. The invention provides apublic opinion monitoring algorithm about advertisement putting, and relates to natural language understanding and processing, a deep learning method is used, semantic understanding is deepened, emotion is recognized, online public opinion comments after advertisement putting in financial education, insurance industries and the like can be intelligently monitored, analyzed and judged through a natural language processing technology, the response of advertisement audiences to the advertisement putting behavior is informed, and data support is provided for enterprise advertisement putting and enterprise public relations in real time.

title: Online training evaluation method and device, computer equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to artificial intelligence, is applied to the field of wisdom education, and provides an online training evaluation method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining all eyeball movement images of each audience user in an online training period; inputting the eyeball movement image of each audience user into a preset scoring model to score the eyeball movement image through the scoring model, and outputting a score value in one-to-one correspondence with each eyeball movement image; calculating a mean value of all score values, and marking the mean value as an attention mean value of audience users; acquiring bullet screen data appearing in an online training period; generating a participation score value corresponding to the audience user according to the bullet screen data; generating a training effect score corresponding to the online training according to the attention mean value and the participation score value; and generating a training evaluation reference result corresponding to the online training according to the training effect score. According to the invention, the training evaluation resultof online training can be accurately generated.

title: MACHINE LEARNING BASED NETWORK INTELLIGENTIZATION FOR AUTOMATICALLY- CONFIGURABLE CELLULAR COMMUNICATION SYSTEMS
abstract_text: MACHINE LEARNING BASED NETWORK INTELLIGENTIZATION FOR AUTOMATICALLY- CONFIGURABLE CELLULAR COMMUNICATION SYSTEMS With the growing growth of intelligent interfaces and communications infrastructure, as well as diversification technologies with vibrant criteria, existing networks will not be sufficient to entirely satisfy progressively increasing traffic criteria. As a result, analysis on 6 G networks has also been conducted by all industries and education. Artificial Intelligence has recently been used as a modem model for the architecture and automation of 6 G networks with a high degree of intelligence. A-enabled smart infrastructure for 6 G networks for information discovery, intelligent resource management, automated network adaptation and automated service delivery, where infrastructure is split into four levels: wearable devices layer, data mining and analytics layer, remote communication module and smart device layer. The proposed methodology has been implemented as the ultimate strategy in a variety of highly complicated situations. Network Intelligentization would be a modem development to solve the complexities of an increasingly growing number of distributed devices linked. Even so, relative to the use of machine learning in other areas, such as video gaming, recent development on smart networking also has a significant way to go to achieve to realise automated cellular communication networks. Numerous challenges in spite of communication structures, machine learning technologies and computing performance should be tackled for the best utilization of this approach in 6G. Al methods for 6 G improve network efficiency, reliably and efficiently, namely Al-powered cellular device networking, smart convergence and upload control, and intelligent spectral efficiency. The significant upcoming exploration goals are spotlighted and possible strategies for Al-enabled smart 6 G networks, like computational output, rigorous algorithms, equipment creation and resource management. 1| P a g e MACHINE LEARNING BASED NETWORK INTELLIGENTIZATION FOR AUTOMATICALLY- CONFIGURABLE CELLULAR COMMUNICATION SYSTEMS Drawings: -: -------------- --- M is!SeniccPrvi~mc + I -- ----- ----- ---k t indus mi RC U I kFlIW tIoiII SDN CenIetOdm1oud Edgc Cloud - I M:-d1ih fig ICnniItg ~I C -n'ieg r, euiF ~i DAs taitin Figure 1: The architecture of Al-enabled intelligent 6G networks. 11P ag e

title: personalized automatic questionnaires learning method based on AIartificial intelligence and system
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a method and a system for artificial intelligence-based learning using personalized automatic question generation. An education server that has built a network with the web, an external server, and a terminal is used for the method including: a first step in which the education server receives curriculum and achievement standard information from at least one of the web, the external server, and the terminal; a second step in which the education server generates evaluation standards with which the curriculum achievement standard can be evaluated; a third step in which the education server determines a learning unit to be covered based on the grade of a user provided with the personalized learning method; a fourth step in which the education server derives learning tags related to the progress of learning from the education unit; a fifth step in which the education server determines evaluation standard content set for each evaluation standard using the learning tags; a sixth step in which the education server automatically generates questions related to the progress of learning based on the determined evaluation standard content; and a seventh step in which the education server provides the user with the automatically generated question through at least one of the web, the external server, and the terminal.

title: Clinical medication recommendation method based on multi-source heterogeneous data
abstract_text: The invention discloses a clinical medication recommendation method based on multi-source heterogeneous data. The multi-source heterogeneous data comprises human information data including patient age, gender, ethnic group, education and main diagnosis information, wherein the main diagnosis information is regarded as static information, and the sequential examination result and the therapeutic drug are regarded as heterogeneous sequence data; according to the clinical medication intelligent recommendation method, obtained multi-source heterogeneous data is input into a model fusion network, and comprehensive patient representation information is obtained through learning by means of the deep learning technology.

title: Online course recommendation method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN INT SMART CITY TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of smart cities and can be applied to the technical field of smart education. The invention provides an online course recommendation method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the identity features of a current user, wherein the identity features of the current user comprise but not to be limited tobasic information and feature information; searching a historical user which is the same as or similar to the basic information and/or the feature information of the current user; and searching a prediction course corresponding to the identity characteristics of the historical user through a preset course prediction model, determining the prediction course as a prediction course result, and recommending the prediction course result to the current user. Relational learning of user identity features and predicted courses is achieved through the learning ability of artificial intelligence, and the accuracy of course recommendation is achieved. The problem of cold start of a new user is solved by utilizing the pre-constructed user index tree, and the experience satisfaction of the user is improved according to the analysis of the real-time user behavior data.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING SYSTEM, INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD, AND INFORMATION PROCESSING PROGRAM
abstract_text: To expand online education with expansion to pseudo participation in a competition after the end of a holding period.SOLUTION: An information processing system that processes, via a network, a programming competition in an AI (artificial intelligence) human resources education, and is provided with a first task provision unit configured to provide tasks to a first participant during a period for holding the competition, a second task provision unit configured to provide tasks to a second participant, after the end of the holding period, and a ranking presentation unit configured to evaluate solutions submitted by the first participant for the tasks provided by the first task provision unit and solutions submitted by the second participant for the tasks provided by the second task provision unit and present a ranking list in which evaluation results are arranged in descending order.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the field of automation. The artificial intelligence education robot comprises a base, wheels and a driving rod arranged below the base, the base is provided with a limiting part matched with the wheels, the limiting part is provided with a connecting part matched with the wheels, the wheels stretch out of or contract in the limiting part, a protection plate is arranged above the base, the driving rod is arranged between the base and the protection plate, and the driving rod and the base are integrally formed. The driving rod and the protection plate are integrallyformed; and the buffer piece sleeves the edges of the base and the protection plate. According to the artificial intelligence education robot provided by the utility model, through the cooperation ofthe wheels and the connecting part, the wheels stretch out or retract in the limiting part, so that the education robot is prevented from being collided, the protection plate is arranged above the base, the protection effect is achieved, the internal structure of the education robot is prevented from being collided, and the service life of the education robot is prolonged. And the buffer piece sleeves the edges of the base and the protection plate, so that the safety of the education robot is further improved, and parts are prevented from being damaged by collision.

title: Children's multi-ability scoring method and system for preschool education quality evaluation
abstract_text: The invention discloses a children multi-ability scoring method and system for preschool education quality evaluation. The method comprises steps of directionally dividing a test question set according to five fields of preschool education, and constructing a knowledge base; utilizing an AR or VR technology to scenarize each test question in the test question set; directionally collecting relatedindex data of the tested child in the process of answering the current test question; performing quantitative storage on the index data according to types to serve as original data; extracting featuredata in the original data by using an AI technology; investigation knowledge points matched with the feature data in the knowledge base being called, and a score calculation method being determined according to the investigation knowledge points; obtaining a score value of each investigation knowledge point involved in the current test question by using a score calculation method; and quantitatively calculating and outputting a final score value, and qualitatively outputting an evaluation result and guidance suggestions according to the final score value. According to the method, the preschool education quality can be evaluated objectively, automatically and intelligently.

title: Balance assembly structure of artificial intelligence education robot
applicants: FUJIAN JIUZHOU YUSHENG TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a balance assembly structure of an artificial intelligence education robot. The balance assembly structure comprises a support plate, rollers, a first belt pulley, a belt, a first motor, a buffer moving mechanism and a stretching mechanism. The buffer moving mechanism is arranged at the bottom of the support plate, when the robot moves, rotating wheels drive first telescopic rods and second telescopic rods to contract through fixing blocks, and the second telescopic rods press buffer springs to deform and contract, so that the vibration force in the running process of the robot is absorbed, and the advantage that the robot can stably move is achieved; and by arranging the stretching mechanism at the top of the support plate, a second motor drives a rotating block torotate, moving blocks drive sliding plates to move at the upper end of the support plate through sliding blocks, and therefore the distance between the sliding plates is increased, large placed objects can be placed, and the advantage that the placed objects can be rapidly fixed is achieved.

title: VR safety education device based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a VR safety education device based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a seat frame, a leaning frame is fixedly connected to the edge of the top side of the seat frame, a control box is fixedly connected to the top side of the outer side of the leaning frame, and a first air cylinder is arranged on the bottom side of the outer side wall of the leaning frame. Andthe piston end of the first air cylinder is rotationally connected with the outer side wall of the leaning frame, and the top side of the inner side wall of the leaning frame is fixedly connected with a limiting belt. In the utility model, when a child user slides down, the hip of the child gradually slides away from the leather cushion, so that the pressure borne by the pressure sensor is reduced, and then the control box starts the first cylinder on the base to contract, so that the seat frame is gradually upwarped on the second cylinder and the telescopic support rod; and meanwhile, the second air cylinder gradually ascends to prevent the child from falling, in addition, a user can control the device to ascend, descend and incline through voice of the microphone, intelligence and convenience are achieved, and a good taught environment is provided for the user.

title: Model development method and platform based on cloud modular technology and intelligent terminal
applicants: BEIJING QITONG INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a model development method and platform based on a cloud modularization technology and an intelligent terminal, and the method comprises the following steps: selecting a data set, carrying out the data import, and carrying out the visualization of the imported data, so as to generate a graphical file corresponding to the data; dragging the graphical file so as to generate aTensorFlow code or an MXNET code; carrying out bidirectional association on the generated code and an interface of the graphical file; setting model parameters in a graphical file mode, training is started after hyper-parameters are set, and checking the resource occupancy rate of the intelligent terminal and the training accuracy in real time in the training process; and ending the training, generating a model performance report, and publishing a training result on the intelligent terminal in the form of an installation package. According to the method, the research and development learningprocess of deep learning and machine learning is extremely simplified, learning and understanding of beginners are facilitated, the method can be applied to the field of education, a clear hierarchical structure can also help professionals to quickly locate the bug during code checking, and time saving and high efficiency are achieved.

title: Investment social cooperation business model
abstract_text: The invention provides an investment social cooperation business model, and belongs to business model innovation, deep application cloud computing, big data, AI, BI, blockchain, Internet of Things andother frontier technologies in the field of financial science and technology. Organizations/populations carrying the business model include: organizations/populations that carry the business model; afinancial education institution, a financial supervision institution, a broker, a financial media institution, a financial investment institution, public/private recruitment, a financial field expertgroup, a free broad guest group, a wide shareholder/base citizen group, a financial major college student group, an alpha financial education training platform, a P2Quants community platform, a P2Quants service center, a P2Quants supervision background and P2Quants cooperation ecology.

title: Camellia oleifera after-sales service management system based on artificial intelligence and Internet
applicants: ANHUI LONGCHENGSHAN CAMELLIA SCIENCE AND TECH DEVELOPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a camellia oleifera after-sales service management system based on artificial intelligence and the Internet. The system comprises a member new establishment module, a shoppingmodule, a payment module, a member library, a controller, an order management module, a data analysis module, a storage module, a display, an after-sales management module and a member monitoring module. According to the invention, an after-sales problem proposed by a member is managed through the after-sales management module, and the transaction amount total amount information, the transaction frequency total amount information, the age consumption power, the education background consumption power and the industry consumption power corresponding to the member to be processed are automatically acquired from the order management module and the storage module according to the member information of the member to be processed; the priority value of the order to be processed is obtained by combining an algorithm, and the higher the priority value is, the higher the after-sales service needs to be provided for the corresponding member is; different levels of after-sales services are provided for the corresponding after-sales problems according to the priority values, standardization of the services is embodied, and the working efficiency is improved.

title: Face image verification method and device, computer equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN PENSION INSURANCE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a face image verification method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps that:a camera is started if a face recognition verification request is received, and an initial face image is collected; a face area is cut from the face image, a to-be-verified face image is obtained, anda score value of the face image is obtained according to the integrity and definition of the to-be-verified face image; whether the score value of the to-be-verified face image is greater than a preset score threshold value or not is judged; and if yes, the face image is sent to a preset face recognition server, and is verified by the face recognition server. Therefore, a terminal is prevented from sending the unqualified face image to the face recognition server, the interaction frequency between the terminal and the face recognition server is reduced, and the load of the server is reduced.The method can be applied to a smart government affair/smart city management/smart community/smart security and protection/smart medical treatment/smart education/smart traffic scene, so that the construction of a smart city is promoted.

title: A method and device for recognizing a Chinese name, equipment and a storage medium
applicants: PING AN INT SMART CITY TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and particularly discloses a method and device for recognizing a Chinese name, computer equipment and a computer readable storage medium. The method comprises the steps of intercepting a to-be-processed text based on a preset keyword to obtain at least one short text; obtaining a name probability value of each character string in the short text; determining whether the character string is a Chinese name or not according to the name probability value; if it is determined that the character string is not the Chinese name, obtaining part-of-speech information of each word in the short text; and according to the part-of-speech information of the words, determining that the words are Chinese names, thereby realizing accurate identification of different types of Chinese names in the text through the name probability values and the part-of-speech information, and improving the accuracy and recall ratio of Chinese name identification. Meanwhile, the invention also relates to a blockchain technology, and the method can be applied to the fields of smart government affairs, smart education, smart medical treatment and the like, thereby further promoting the construction of smart cities.

title: Artificial intelligence law education robot system
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence law education robot system which comprises a cloud server, a communication network and a user terminal, and the cloud server is electrically connected with the user terminal through the communication network. A general law character module, a general law recording module, a general law video recording module, a general law picture module and ageneral law audio-video module are arranged in the cloud server, a voice recognition module, a voice playing module and a display module are arranged in the user terminal, and the user terminal is electrically connected with the artificial intelligence system. A user can put forward questions through terminal equipment and send questions to a server, the system can identify the questions, calculate and determine answers most matched with the questions of the user and then push the answers to the user terminal in a text, voice, video, picture, video and audio mode, the system can intelligentlyjudge questions concerned by the user according to the questions of the user, and the user experience is improved. Similar or extended questions and contents are automatically pushed to the user.

title: AI image recognition and scoring system of intelligent garbage can
applicants: JIANGSU WONDERFUL PUBLIC FACILITIES TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI image recognition and scoring system of an intelligent garbage can. The system comprises an Android control system 2, the Android control system 2 is installed on the intelligent garbage can, one side of the Android control system 2 is connected with a throwing port door through a throwing port door motor, the other side of the Android control system 2 is connected with a camera through a USB data line, the throwing port door motor is installed on a peripheral connection control panel and is connected with the control panel through a cable, a single-chip microcomputer control mainboard is arranged on one side of the peripheral connection control panel, and the single-chip microcomputer control mainboard is connected with the peripheral connection control panelin a simplex and duplex 485 communication mode. Compared with the prior art, the method has the advantages that: the AI intelligent technology is fully utilized to replace manual work for garbage type recognition and supervision, meanwhile, a data statistics report of garbage throwing accuracy of all users can be formed at the management end, help is provided for targeted education guidance work,evidence supplementation is provided for establishment of garbage classification laws and regulations, and construction of the garbage classification throwing cause in China is better promoted.

title: Multi-model fusion FAQ matching method and device
applicants: SHANGHAI CHANGTOU NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention is suitable for the technical field of natural language processing, and provides a multi-model fusion FAQ matching method and device, and the method comprises the steps: sequentially obtaining a training text set of a to-be-processed problem, combining Bert-encoder + DBScan clustering for auxiliary extraction, and concluding financial education knowledge points, thereby constructingfinancial education FAQ, and manually marking a small number of similar problems; generating a large number of similar questions according to a small number of labeled similar questions, performing manual auditing, constructing a sentence pair matching data set, training a sentence pair matching model by using an unsupervised model and a supervised deep learning model, and finally, receiving questions input by a user after the sentence pair matching model is trained; according to the method, multiple models are fused, trained or pre-trained, texts are extracted, standard questions are matched,and corresponding answers are replied, so that the problems that FAQ users are troublesome to check and the manual customer service efficiency is low are solved.

title: Student self-adaptive education method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student self-adaptive education method based on artificial intelligence in the technical field of intelligent education, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, theregistration of teachers and students is carried out to obtain a login account for logging in a control platform; S2, students complete personalized learning of knowledge on the control platform; s3,the teacher manages courses, adds learning content on the control platform, and sets automatic response according to specific requirements of various learning activities in the learning module; s4, the students carry out staged evaluation, learning evaluation and learning path customization on the learning conditions. A student self-adaptive education system based on artificial intelligence comprises a teacher terminal, a control platform and a student terminal, the control platform comprises an account management module, a learning module, a teacher management module, an evaluation module, asystem management module and a database. The system is a student online learning system with self-adaptive capability, and can dynamically organize learning contents and test questions according to general characteristics of students, thereby being taught by people.

title: Ubiquitous-based training education portfolio system for managing learning activities and method thereof
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a ubiquitous-based training education portfolio system and a method for the same. The system uses PC, smartphone, and tablet PC and wired/wireless communication to provide training education such as healthcare education theory, training information record, instructor evaluation, learner/trainee-specific learning history management for UBT/SBT test and scoring, messenger-based instructor-learner/trainee P2P communication, training management for individual student on the U-portfolio system, and performance evaluation index and score. According to the present invention, training is opened by training opening at a healthcare site or a training site, notification is performed on a training plan, a training schedule, and training objects, and an instructor in charge of training leaves a free feedback by underlining a site training record sheet created by a learner/trainee or using text, drawing, picture, and voice recording by means of his or her user terminal and in accordance with the training plan and the training schedule. The instructor′s training site feedback content is immediately captured and transmitted to a main server. The immediate instructor feedback (emergency measure and prescription), the instructor evaluation, the UBT/SBT test and scoring, the mutual student-instructor learning on the administration side, the learner/trainee training history, and the instructor evaluation history/guide history immediately transmitted to user terminals are provided and managed systematically. The ubiquitous-based training education portfolio system provides a cloud training education management service (U-Portfolio) using artificial intelligence and big data analysis by using a smart device.

title: Production and processing equipment of programmable artificial intelligence robot for education
applicants: SUZHOU JINTIAN TECH INDUSTRY DEVELOPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of robots, and discloses production processing equipment of a programmable artificial intelligence robot for education, which comprises a base, a supporting table top and a workbench, the upper end of the base is fixedly connected with the supporting table top, a first motor is arranged at the bottom end in the supporting table top, and a second motor is arranged at the bottom end in the workbench. And the upper end of the first motor is fixedly connected with a driving belt pulley, and the driving belt pulley is connected with a first driven belt pulley through a first belt. Through the arrangement of the left lead screw, the right lead screw, the first motor, the driven gear, the driving gear, the driving belt pulley, the ball screw, the left clamp and the right clamp which are matched with one another, a workpiece can be rapidly clamped or disassembled, the working efficiency is improved, then up-down punching can be conveniently andstably carried out, and the punching precision is improved; meanwhile, the height of the supporting suspension beam can be adjusted up and down, so that the flexibility of equipment is enhanced.

title: Answer selection method and device for idiom blank-filling questions and computer equipment
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides an answer selection method and device for idiom blank-filling questions, computer equipment and a storage medium,wherein the method comprises the steps: obtaining a question text of the idiom blank-filling questions, wherein the question text comprises a blank-filling text and n candidate idioms, and the blank-filling text comprises m blanks to be filled with the candidate idioms; obtaining explanation texts of all the candidate idioms; inputting the blank-filling text and the interpretation text into a pre-trained idiom selection blank-filling model to obtain a confidence coefficient of filling each candidate idiom into each blank; selecting m idioms from the n candidate idioms to form multiple groups of answers; calculating the sum of confidence coefficients of filling candidate idioms in each group of answers; and obtaining a group of answers with the highest confidence sum, and outputting the group of answers as answers of the idiom blank-filling questions. An artificial intelligence mode is adopted, and answers of idiom filling are obtained with high efficiency and high accuracy. The methodcan also be applied to the field of wisdom education so as to promote the construction of a wisdom city.

title: Augmented reality image display method and device, equipment and storage medium
applicants: CHINA PING AN PROPERTY INSURANCE CO LTD
