abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of smart education in artificial intelligence, and discloses an augmented reality image display method and device based on a similarity value, equipment and a readable storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a muscle state signal transmitted by wearable equipment; determining whether the muscle state signal is a a relaxed state or not; collecting a current environment picture; calling a plurality of scene pictures from a preset scene picture database, and calculating the similarity between the current environment picture and the scene pictures; acquiring a specified contrast video corresponding to the maximum similarity value; and collecting a real-time video, and integrating the real-time video and the specified contrast video for display; According to the scheme of the invention, the related contrast video can be automatically recommended according to the working environment of the user when the user is not in the working state, and the contrast video is integrated with the real-time video to obtain the augmented reality image, thereby achieving the reuse of fragmented time, avoiding the manual selection of a learning videoby the user, and improving the learning effect.

title: PPT automatic preaching method and device based on natural language recognition and processing technology
applicants: PING AN LIFE INSURANCE CO CHINA LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, is applied to intelligent education, and discloses a PPT automatic preaching method, device and equipment based on a natural language recognition and processing technology, and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: loading an imported PPT file; performing analysis and feature extraction on the PPT file by utilizing a natural language recognition and processing technology; matching a proper announcement model in apreaching model library according to the feature extraction result; performing script training based onthe matching result to generate a preaching script; and calling a preset voice robot to preach thepreaching script. According to the PPT automatic preaching method, device and equipment based on the natural language recognition and processing technology and the storage medium, the preaching script can be generated based on the preset announcement model and the PPT content, the voice robot is called to preach the PPT content automatically, the labor cost is reduced, and the announcement effect can be guaranteed. The invention also relates to a blockchain technology. The preaching model is stored in a blockchain node.

title: Artificial intelligence sound box based on AI education
applicants: SHANDONG LABOR VOCATIONAL AND TECHNICAL COLLEGE
abstract_text: The utility model discloses AI education-based artificial intelligence sound equipment, which comprises a sound equipment body, loudspeakers symmetrically arranged on the outer wall of the sound equipment body, a dustproof cover connected to the bottom of the sound equipment body through a rotating shaft, an inner cavity arranged on the top of the sound equipment body, a lifting mechanism arrangedin the inner cavity, and a motor. The motor is fixedly arranged on one side of the bottom of the inner cavity, the output end of the motor is connected with a first screw rod, one end of the first screw rod is in transmission connection with the output end of the motor, and the other end of the first screw rod is fixed to the inner wall of the top of the sound box body through a bearing; a secondscrew is installed on the other side of the bottom of the inner cavity, the two ends of the second screw are fixed to the bottom and the top of the inner wall of the inner cavity through bearings, and the artificial intelligence sound box based on AI education is convenient to prevent dust and adjustable in angle.

title: TECHNIQUES FOR BIMODAL LEARNING IN A FINANCIAL CONTEXT
abstract_text: Techniques for bi-modal learning in a financial context are described. These techniques are configured to improve a user's financial acumen and bring the user into an optimal financial state. Some of these techniques are embodied in a device that operates financial education lessons specifically configured for the improving the user's current financial state. These techniques may implement rewards/penalties (in tokens) for correct/incorrect user responses to financial decisions being presented in these lessons for user to make. By exploiting the user's desire for rewards and tokens and the desire to improve the user's current financial state, these techniques may leverage machine learning techniques to identify an appropriate financial education lesson that is most likely to have a positive effect on the user. Over time, administrating the financial education lessons builds customer loyalty to the device that implements these techniques. Other embodiments are described and claimed.

title: Talent adaptation method and system based on gene detection and character evaluation and memory
abstract_text: The invention provides a talent adaptation method based on gene detection and character evaluation. The method comprises the following steps: training a service selection tendency adaptation model through machine learning, enabling the input of the model to be gene detection data and character evaluation data, and enabling the output of the model to be at least one service selection direction; andinputting the gene detection data and the character evaluation data of the to-be-tested person into the service selection tendency adaptation model, and obtaining an output result of the service selection tendency adaptation model as a service selection recommendation direction of the to-be-tested person. In the present invention, the service selection tendency adaptation model is combined with acongenital gene quantification result and an collected character evaluation result, so that a scientific basis is provided for people who need to select professional directions or working forms, people can make more reasonable selection, professionals of people are lessened, and time is prevented from being spent on service selection and learning again as much as possible. The method serves reasonable utilization of social education resources, and is beneficial to reasonable distribution of education achievements of colleges and universities by all walks of life.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot with obstacle removing function
applicants: DALIAN UNIV OF TECHNOLOGY JIANGSU RESEARCH INSTITUTE CO LTD JINTAN BRANCH
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence education, and discloses an artificial intelligence education robot with an obstacle removing function. The artificial intelligence education robot comprises a robot body, a mounting block is fixedly connected to the front side wall of the robot body, four movable grooves are formed inside the mounting block, limiting groovesformed inside the mounting block are formed in the left side walls and the right side walls in the movable grooves correspondingly, and a movable rod penetrating through the mounting block and extending out of the mounting block is movably connected into the movable grooves. According to the artificial intelligence education robot with the obstacle removing function, the buffering effect can be achieved when the robot body encounters an obstacle through the movable rod, a buffering spring and a baffle, a shifting block rotates with a fixed shaft as the circle center when being stressed througha torsional spring, and therefore the further buffering effect is achieved; a naccording to the device, through a series of mechanical structures, the robot body can be effectively buffered when encountering an obstacle, and the robot body is prevented from being damaged.

title: Artificial intelligence and robot cloud computing integrated education system
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence and robot cloud computing integrated education system which comprises a main body assembly and a damping assembly which is installed in the mainbody assembly and comprises a third fixing block, a second spring, a second shell, a fixing rod, a scissors fork rod, a supporting rod, a third spring and a third shell. The number of the third fixingblocks, the second springs, the second shell, the fixing rods and the supporting rods is four, and the number of the third springs and the number of the third shell are two. The system mainboard bodywhere the artificial intelligence and robot cloud computing integrated education system is located can be protected, the exterior of the system mainboard body is protected through the main body assembly, the damage to the system mainboard body due to collision and vibration of a robot can be prevented through the damping assembly, and therefore an operating system can operate normally, and the service life of the robot is prolonged. It is ensured that the robot can still work normally after falling down, and the operation stability of the education system is improved.

title: Interaction method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides an interaction method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, which can be suitable for a man-machine interaction scene in the field of artificial intelligence (AI). The interaction method comprises the following steps: collecting an image set of a user; obtaining a user behavior parameter sequence according to the image set of the user; obtaining an interaction willingness value of the user through an interaction willingness value model according to the user behavior parameter sequence; and when it is determined that the user satisfies an active interaction condition according to the interaction willingness value of the user, outputting interaction content according to historical interaction information of the user. In the embodimentof the invention, the interaction content can be output according to the historical interaction information of the user instead of outputting the same content to all users, and different active interaction contents can be output for different users, so that the user experience is improved, and the adhesion degree with the user is improved. The electronic equipment in the embodiment of the invention can be a robot, can realize interaction of adults, children and the like in the aspects of entertainment, education and the like, and realizes anthropomorphic accompanying.

title: presentation file generation method, device, equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a presentation file generation method, device, equipment and a storage medium. The presentation file method comprises the steps of obtaining at least two keywords in a to-be-processed file and feature attribute information of the to-be-processed file, and dividing the to-be-processed file according to the at least two keywords to obtain at least two text fragments; identifying a target demonstration file template matched with the feature attribute information of the to-be-processed file from a demonstration file template library; and importing the at least two text fragments into a target demonstration file template to obtain a target demonstration file. In the scheme, the target presentation file can be generated according to the text informationinput by the user, so that the presentation file generation efficiency is improved. The invention relates to an image recognition technology in artificial intelligence, is suitable for the fields of intelligent government affairs, intelligent education and the like, and facilitates the promotion of the construction of intelligent cities.

title: Counterfeit voice recognition method and device and computer readable storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence, and relates to a counterfeit voice recognition method. The method comprises the steps of: acquiring to-be-recognized voice; performing STFT processing on the to-be-recognized voice, and converting the to-be-recognized voice into a to-be-recognized voice signal feature map; and inputting the to-be-recognized voice signal feature map into a target DenseNet network model, and outputting a dichotomy discrimination result that the to-be-recognized voice is real voice or counterfeit voice. The invention further providesa counterfeit voice recognition device, computer equipment and a storage medium. In addition, the invention also relates to a blockchain technology, and the obtained voice data of the user and the dichotomy discrimination result can be stored in a blockchain. According to the scheme, the target DenseNet network model is used for carrying out voice recognition work, a high-accuracy method for automatically recognizing counterfeit voice is provided on the basis of the self-learning function of the neural network, and generation of ASV or voiceprint system security vulnerabilities is reduced. The method can be applied to the fields of smart medical treatment, smart government affairs, smart education or science and technological finance.

title: Multifunctional master controller for artificial intelligence education
applicants: ZHEJIANG COOGERTECH EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a multifunctional master controller for artificial intelligence education. The multifunctional master controller comprises an ARM master control chip, a USB downloading chip, a WiFi chip, a magnetometer chip and an acceleration chip. The ARM main control chip is in two-way communication with the USB downloading chip; the ARM main control chip and the WiFi chip are in two-way communication through a serial port; the ARM main control chip is connected with the magnetometer chip through an i2c bus; and the ARM main control chip is connected with the acceleration chip through an i2c bus. The beneficial effects of the utility model are that the ARM main control chip is adopted as the main control chip, the function is stronger, the wireless function is provided, andthe wireless connection can be realized.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot walking mechanism
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence education robot walking mechanism which comprises a supporting plate, a robot body and an installation box, the installation box is fixedly connected to the bottom end of the supporting plate, the robot body is fixedly connected to the top end of the supporting plate, and a horizontally-arranged driving rod is rotationally installed at the position, close to the bottom end, in the installation box. A first driving gear is fixedly mounted in the middle of the driving rod, grooves are formed in the two sides of the bottom end of the mountingbox, the two ends of the driving rod extend into the grooves and are fixedly connected with first rolling wheels, and a brake box is fixedly connected to the inner wall of the top end of the mountingbox. The device is ingenious in structure, convenient to use, capable of moving flexibly, free of manual carrying and moving and more convenient to use, the first rolling wheel can be locked when thedevice stops, static friction between the device and the ground is increased, and therefore even if the second rolling wheel is in a movable state, the device can stand on the ground stably, and therobot is more stable.

title: Head rotating mechanism of artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The head rotating mechanism of the artificial intelligence education robot comprises a robot body, an installation cavity is formed in the robot body, an installation hole is formed in the top end ofthe robot body, and a vertically-arranged driving rod is rotationally installed in the installation hole. The top end of the driving rod extends out of the robot body and is fixedly connected with a robot head, the bottom end of the driving rod extends into the mounting cavity and is fixedly connected with a first gear, a vertically-arranged servo air cylinder is fixedly mounted on the inner wallof the top end of the mounting cavity, and an output shaft of the servo air cylinder is fixedly connected with a driving box; and a servo rotating motor is fixedly mounted on the inner wall of the topend of the driving box, and an output shaft of the servo rotating motor is fixedly connected with a second gear. The robot head locking device is ingenious in structure and convenient to use, the effects of adjusting the angle of the robot head and locking the robot head can be achieved only through driving of one servo rotating motor, the structure is compact, and operation is convenient.

title: AI-TEACHER
abstract_text: To solve a problem that, in a constitution of a lesson in a school education, a genus element depending on a teacher is strong, thus causing the generation of a large number of problems by the teachers resulting from a concentration of a right, in particular, a lesson evaluation of "an interest, an intension and an attitude" and "a thinking, a determination and an expression" in the lesson is most liable to be varied depending on the teachers, and unfairness generated at schoolchildren and guardians is also strong because the evaluation is surely executed by human beings, on the other hand, in a conventional education, it is mandatory for the teacher to grasp and evaluate learning activities of the schoolchildren one by one in parallel with the progress of the lesson, however, it is impossible for one teacher to simultaneously perform all the processing in terms of human resources.SOLUTION: Since the work of a teacher is manualized in fact, an evaluation of school children which should be performed by a school teacher is substituted by an AI-teacher using artificial intelligence. A sound collector is introduced into a school lecture room. Voiceprints of the school children and the teachers are registered in advance, and minutes of utterances are created by voice recognition. Feelings which can be estimated from the number of utterances and voices at a voice analysis are recorded, and a distribution to a lecture participation and an argument is digitalized by natural language processing. Score evaluations by the digitalized lessen data of the school children and feelings of the teachers are accumulated as big data, and the big data are used as training data which are necessary for a determination process of the artificial intelligence. The accuracy of the analogical reasoning of the artificial intelligence is enhanced, and made to further approximate an expert determination which is performed by the teacher, and a genus evaluation method depending on a teacher individual is changed to a standardized and equal evaluation method. By automating the evaluation of the school children, human resources of the school teachers are saved.SELECTED DRAWING: None

title: Area-balanced many-to-many nearest admission positioning method
abstract_text: The invention discloses an area-balanced many-to-many nearest admission positioning method, and the method comprises the steps of setting that there are I cells in an area, setting the number of students in a cell i to be Hi, and setting the total number of students in the area to be N; setting J schools in the area, the number of student positions of each school being Sj; sending students in a cell to a plurality of paired schools, wherein for schools in the district, the ideal proportion of the living source of each cell to the number of students entering the school can be represented by anI-dimensional vector A (A1,..., AI), wherein the meaning of Ai is the proportion of students in the community i in each school source; and solving based on a particle swarm optimization algorithm, anddetermining the number of students entering the paired school from each cell. According to the admission positioning method of the invention, each cell has a plurality of paired schools, and the proportion of the cells in the school student pool approaches on the basis of ensuring nearby school admission. Through the method, the difference of school student pool is reduced, so that students havemore equal school-entering opportunities, and the problem that education opportunities obtained in different regions in a traditional nearby school-entering mechanism are unbalanced is solved.

title: Campus safety education propaganda equipment based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model discloses campus safety education propaganda equipment based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence education propaganda. The paperfeeding device comprises a base, a propaganda column is fixedly connected to the top of the base, tempered glass is arranged on the periphery of the propaganda column, a rain shelter is fixedly connected to the top end of the propaganda column, and a conveying rod, a first paper feeding rod and a second paper feeding rod are rotationally connected to the top of the base and located in the propaganda column; a power transmission device and a transmission device are arranged at the bottom of the base. Through the cooperative effect of the base, the transmission device, the power transmission device and the propaganda column, the device adopts a mechanical structure to realize a cyclic playing function, and the propaganda effect cannot be achieved due to interrupted playing, so that eyeballsof students are attracted to improve the popularization degree, the cost is reduced, the waste of electric energy is avoided, and the propaganda effect is improved. Environmental protection is advocated.

title: Damping device of artificial intelligence education robot
applicants: SHANDONG DAWEILAI ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE RES INSTITUTE CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a damping device of an artificial intelligence education robot. The utility model belongs to the technical field of robots, wherein the shock absorption sleeve, the shock absorption column, the shock absorption spring, the connecting beam and the like are arranged on the vehicle body connecting support. The anti-collision device is arranged in front of the vehicle bodyand used for absorbing vibration of the vehicle body, the infrared detection radar arranged in front of the vehicle body is used for detecting obstacles in front of the vehicle body, collision betweenthe vehicle body and the obstacles is buffered through the anti-collision device arranged in front of the vehicle body, and multi-directional and multi-level protection of the robot vehicle body andinternal precision elements is achieved.

title: Artificial intelligence online English education mobile terminal
applicants: TIANJIN GVE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of online education. The utility model further discloses an artificial intelligence online English education mobile terminal. Half-cylindrical shell, adisplay screen is fixedly arranged at the upper end of the front side wall of the semi-cylindrical shell; a control panel is fixedly arranged at the position, located on the lower side of the displayscreen, of the front side wall of the semi-cylindrical shell. A first rotating shaft is longitudinally arranged on the lower side in the semi-cylindrical shell; an anti-falling mechanism is fixedly arranged on the shaft wall of the first rotating shaft, a horizontal circular plate and a movable ring are symmetrically arranged on the upper side and the lower side of the semi-cylindrical shell, a vertical second rotating shaft is rotationally connected to the circle center of the lower side wall of the circular plate through a first rolling bearing, and the lower end of the second rotating shaft is fixedly connected with the circle center of the upper end of the semi-cylindrical shell. The device can be effectively prevented from falling onto the ground and being broken, property loss is reduced, and the display screen and the control panel are insufficiently protected when the device is not used.

title: Attendance rate calculation method and device based on living body recognition, terminal and storage medium
applicants: PING AN LIFE INSURANCE CO CHINA LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, the invention provides an attendance rate calculation method and device based on living body recognition, a terminal and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: extracting a face image in a living body face video, converting a color space, calculating a first LBP feature, extracting a face image in a non-living body face video, converting the color space, and calculating a second LBP feature; calculating a plurality of first LBP features of the same living body to obtain a first face feature and a plurality ofsecond LBP features of the same non-living body to obtain a second face feature; training a living body face recognition model based on a first feature pair constructed based on the first face featureand a second feature pair constructed based on the second face feature; and identifying the student video stream through the living body face identification model to obtain an identification result,and calculating the student attendance rate according to the identification result. The method can be applied to wisdom education, and the attendance rate can be accurately calculated when the celebrity image is attached to the wall of the classroom. In addition, the invention also relates to a blockchain technology, and the living body face recognition model is stored in the blockchain.

title: Question and answer library construction method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a question and answer library construction method. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a customer service dialogue statement; performing statement extraction on the customer service dialogue statement according to a preset keyword to obtain a questioning statement; carrying out vector conversion on the questioning statement to obtain a statement vector; according toa preset mass point vector and the statement vector, carrying out incremental clustering on the questioning statement to determine a category corresponding to the questioning statement; and constructing a customer service question and answer library according to the questioning statement and the category corresponding to the questioning statement. The invention further provides a question and answer library construction device, electronic equipment and a storage medium. The construction speed of the question and answer library can be increased. Moreover, the invention relates to the technicalfield of data processing and artificial intelligence, also relates to a blockchain technology, and the content of the question and answer library can be stored in blockchain nodes, and meanwhile, theinvention can also be used in the fields of smart government affairs, smart medical treatment or smart education, thereby promoting the construction of smart cities.

title: Balance assembly of artificial intelligence education robot
applicants: ANHUI SAFEBETTER INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a balance assembly of an artificial intelligence education robot. The balance assembly comprises a robot body and two bionic feet movably connected with the robot body. The twobionic feet are internally provided with driving walking wheels capable of steering respectively. The driving walking wheels are connected with steering control mechanisms. The steering control mechanisms conduct driving steering after the robot body senses an obstacle. According to the balance assembly of the artificial intelligence education robot, the balance capacity and the obstacle steeringcapacity of the balance assembly are improved, and the problems of toppling and the like of the balance assembly are avoided.

title: Deep neural network interpretation method and device, terminal and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a deep neural network interpretation method and device, a terminal and a storage medium. The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the methodspecifically comprises the following steps: determining all target data from a plurality of input data through a result output by a deep neural network; and respectively inputting the target data intoan interpretation factor prediction model to obtain a group of interpretation factors corresponding to each piece of target data, performing statistics on the occurrence frequency of each interpretation factor in the plurality of groups of interpretation factors, performing sorting, and screening a target number of interpretation factors with the highest rank as target interpretation factors of apreset target category. According to the invention, the explanation factor of the prediction result is obtained through the pre-trained explanation factor prediction model, so main factors influencing the deep neural network prediction result are explained; the invention can be applied to smart government affairs, smart city management, smart communities, smart security and protection, smart logistics, smart medical treatment, smart education, smart environmental protection and smart traffic scenes, so that the construction of smart cities is promoted.

title: Object three-dimensional drawing method based on medical education
applicants: CHENGDU ZHIXUEYI DIGITAL TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an object three-dimensional drawing method based on medical education. The method comprises the steps that high-resolution image blocks and low-resolution image blocks are collected through a medical image scanning device; calculating by a deep learning engine to obtain a plurality of candidate high-resolution pixel sets and reference high-resolution pixel sets; the deep learning engine generates a post-processing residual value; a pixel summation unit performs pixel summation operation on the post-processing residual value and the low-resolution image block to obtain forward and reverse prediction high-resolution image blocks; a bi-directional predictor generates a super-resolution tile for the forward predicted high-resolution tile and the reverse predicted high-resolution tile. According to the object three-dimensional drawing method based on medical education, the three-dimensional image quality and the operation efficiency are effectively improved with low software and hardware cost, and meanwhile the problems of image distortion of an existing reconstruction method and limited bandwidth and limited storage space of an existing remote reconstruction method are solved.

title: Health education evaluation method and device based on deep learning and medium
applicants: ZHUHAI INSTITUTE OF ADVANCED TECH CHINESE ACADEMY OF SCIENCES CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a health education evaluation method and device based on deep learning, and a medium. The health education evaluation method comprises the steps: collecting multiple pieces ofdimension data affecting a health education project through distributed collection equipment and distributed storage equipment; calculating a plurality of statistical indexes related to the health problem according to the plurality of pieces of dimension data; quantizing the multiple pieces of dimension data and constructing panel data; establishing one or more deep learning sequence prediction algorithm models according to the panel; inputting the statistical indexes into a deep learning sequence prediction algorithm model, and calculating a possibility value of influencing the health education project in a future set time period; and setting a threshold value based on the possible value, outputting a time point when the possible value is greater than the threshold value in a future settime period, and taking the time point as an optimal time point for health education. The beneficial effects of the health education evaluation method and device are that the health education evaluation method and device can achieve the collection of related data through distributed big data, can carry out the quantitative processing and learning calculation, and enable a health education projectto be effectively evaluated.

title: Dialogue text generation method and device, computer equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a dialogue text generation method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: receiving question information inputted by a client at a client terminal, and converting the question information into first structural information; matching the second structured informationfor reply; encoding the problem information into a first multi-dimensional vector; converting the second structured information into a sequence matrix, and converting the sequence matrix into a vector through front-back linkage; encoding the vector into a second multi-dimensional vector based on a self-attention mechanism model; replacing the value corresponding to each structural layer in the first multi-dimensional vector with the value corresponding to each structural layer in the second multi-dimensional vector to obtain a third multi-dimensional vector; and finally, decoding the third multi-dimensional vector to obtain an output text, and feeding back the output text to the client terminal. According to the invention, a text is flexibly generated according to the utterance of the client, the flexibility is high, and the preciseness is high. The scheme of the invention can also be applied to the field of wisdom education to promote wisdom city construction.

title: OCR-technology-based text automatic generation method and device, equipment and medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, and discloses an OCR-technology-based text automatic generation method. The method comprises the steps: performing text recognition on ato-be-recognized picture by utilizing a pre-constructed picture text recognition method to obtain text information; performing word segmentation and filtering on the text information to obtain a wordset, and extracting keywords from the word set based on a graph sorting algorithm; matching the keywords with a pre-constructed dictionary to obtain a target keyword, and performing querying in a pre-constructed database according to the target keyword to obtain an initial text set; and generating a target text according to the initial text set. The invention also relates to a blockchain technology, and the to-be-identified picture can be stored in a blockchain. According to the method, storage resources can be saved, and texts such as documents can be automatically generated more intelligently. The invention also relates to a blockchain technology, and the method is also suitable for the fields of smart government affairs, smart education or smart medical treatment, thereby promoting theconstruction of smart cities.

title: Facial expression recognition method and device, equipment and computer readable storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a facial expression recognition method and device, equipment and a computer readable storage medium, and relates to the technologies of computer vision, deep learning, image recognition, image retrieval and the like in image processing. According to the specific implementation scheme, the facial expression recognition method comprises the steps of detecting face key pointsin a to-be-recognized image; according to the face key points, extracting a feature map of a face expression key area; and inputting the feature map into a facial expression recognition model for facial expression recognition to obtain a recognition result, wherein the facial expression recognition model is obtained by training a convolutional neural network, and a compression excitation module isadded behind each convolutional layer of the convolutional neural network. The accuracy of facial expression recognition can be improved, and the method can be applied to the fields of visual interaction, intelligent control, auxiliary driving, remote education, precise advertisement putting and the like.

title: Facial expression recognition and model training methods and devices, equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses facial expression recognition and model training methods and devices, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technologies of computer vision, deep learning, image recognition, image retrieval and the like in image processing. According to the specific implementation scheme, the facial expression recognition method comprises the steps of detecting face key pointsand a face region in a to-be-recognized image; generating a mask image corresponding to the face area according to the face key points in the to-be-recognized image; generating a fused image of the mask image and the face area; and inputting the fused image into a facial expression recognition model to carry out facial expression recognition to obtain a recognition result. The facial expression recognition precision in a complex environment is improved, and the method can be applied to the fields of visual interaction, intelligent control, auxiliary driving, remote education, precise advertisement putting and the like.

title: Wrong question detection and targeted recommendation system and method based on convolutional neural network
abstract_text: The invention provides a wrong question set generation system capable of realizing automatic wrong question detection statistics and targeted recommendation. The wrong question set generation system comprises: 1, an exercise book with a student personal information two-dimensional code; 2, wrong question numbers with the red circles in the marking process; 3, a high-speed photographic device capable of photographing and scanning in real time; 4, a job information processing server with a GPU; 5, a deep learning algorithm based on a convolutional neural network YOLOV4 detection model; 6, a teacher-oriented class wrong question statistical information document; and 7, a student-oriented personal error set document. The system helps students to effectively count, store and feed back data generated in the learning process under the condition of not changing the use mode of traditional test paper writing, and real targeted education is realized.

title: Method and System For Establishing User Preference Patterns Through Machine Learning
abstract_text: There is provided an adaptive incentivise education platform that provides educational content to a user via their mobile device. Usage information relating to how, when and what the user users is collected and analysed by machine learning to establish user preference patterns, which are used to update the user profile, and to predict what content would be most likely to be engaged by the user to achieve predetermined outcomes. The content is then selected and sent to the user.

title: Hyperdata Compression: Accelerating Encoding for Improved Communication, Distribution & Delivery of Personalized Content
abstract_text: A system and method for coding, encrypting, and distributing personalized content with substantial improvements in perceptual quality while reducing coding times, file sizes for storage, bandwidth requirements for distribution and utilization. Incorporating feature selection, extraction, classification, detection, and attribution to facilitate authenticity, feature detection for multi-media communications, providing enhance encrypting and distributing of personalized content in for a myriad of application areas including, but not limited to, medicine, science, robotics. Artificial Intelligence, nanotechnology, quantum computing, biotechnology, the Internet of Things, The Network of Things, fifth-generation wireless technologies (5G), additive manufacturing/3D printing, fully autonomous vehicles, drones, digital education, personalized data, Smart Grids, Smart Cities, and Smart Venues.

title: Artificial intelligence education supervision equipment
applicants: SHANGHAI YOUQIAN INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: Artificial intelligence education supervision equipment comprises a switching power supply, a wireless remote control panel, a counter, a voice module and a loudspeaker. The system is characterized byalso comprising a wireless receiving circuit, a sound detection circuit and a control circuit, the switching power supply, the counter, the voice module, the loudspeaker, the wireless receiving circuit, the sound detection circuit and the control circuit are installed in the element box and are electrically connected. In the application, when students who do not autonomously speak and the like produce loud sounds, the sound detection circuit can control the counter to carry out accumulation counting once every time the students speak, and data support can be provided for promoting good self-study class atmosphere management. According to the utility model, when a student who does not autonomously learn gives out a disharmony sound each time, voice can be played through the voice module togive an alarm, so that other students can learn in a good learning atmosphere as much as possible. Based on the above, the device has a good application prospect.

title: Novel artificial intelligence education interaction device
applicants: SHANGHAI YOUQIAN INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: A novel artificial intelligence education interaction device comprises a plurality of sets of combination modules and a set of receiving module, and each set of combination module comprises an anti-theft probe sub-module, an electric leakage probe sub-module, an old people falling probe sub-module, a fire hazard probe sub-module, a power supply sub-module and a wireless signal emission sub-module;the receiving module comprises a stabilized voltage supply and a wireless receiving circuit sub-module, and the stabilized voltage supply and the wireless receiving circuit sub-module are installed in the element box and are electrically connected. According to the utility model, a teacher can examine each function sub-module assembled by one student, after one or more students assemble each sub-module in sequence, the wireless signal transmitting sub-module can automatically transmit a wireless closing signal, and the wireless receiving module at the teacher can specifically display which student assembles the corresponding module at first. In actual operation, students can visually understand the composition architecture and actual workflow knowledge of each functional module of the equipment as much as possible in the process of forming each functional module, and a better learning effect can be achieved.

title: Online education course management method and system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: GUANGZHOU CHIXING GENERAL TECH RESEARCH CO LTD
inventor_name: THE INVENTOR HAS WAIVED THE RIGHT TO BE CITED
abstract_text: The invention provides an online education course management method and system based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of learning management. The method comprises the steps of inputting the first course plan image information into a training model; obtaining the output information of the training model, wherein the output information comprises first completion degreelevel information and first concentration degree information corresponding to the first course plan image; screening and filtering the first course plan image information according to first completiondegree grade information and first concentration degree information corresponding to the first course plan image to obtain standard course plan image information; obtaining first time planning information of a first user; judging whether the matching degree of the first time planning information and the standard course planning image information meets a first preset condition or not; and when thematching degree of the two meets a first preset condition, taking the standard course plan image information as a first course management standard of the first user.

title: Reading understanding method based on artificial intelligence, and related equipment
abstract_text: A reading understanding method based on artificial intelligence comprises the following steps: acquiring a target document needing to be read and understood and a target problem matched with the target document; judging whether the first total length of the target document and the target problem exceeds the maximum input length of the reading understanding model or not; if so, determining at leastone segment related to the target problem from the target document; respectively combining the target problem and a preset mark with each fragment to obtain at least one problem fragment combination;sequentially inputting the at least one question segment combination into the reading understanding model to obtain a plurality of output positions; and combining the fragment contents pointed by each output position to obtain a final answer. The invention further provides a reading understanding device based on artificial intelligence, electronic equipment and a storage medium. The accuracy of model prediction can be improved. In addition, the invention also relates to a block chain. The block chain can also be applied to the field of wisdom education, thereby promoting the construction of awisdom city.

title: Presentation file generation method and device, equipment and medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a presentation file generation method and device, equipment and a medium. The method comprises the following steps: obtaining a to-be-processed file which comprises a target image, and carrying out text recognition on the target image to obtain text feature information corresponding to the target image; removing text content in the target image according to the text feature information to obtain a first sub-image corresponding to the target image; and performing image recognition on the first sub-image corresponding to the target image to obtain imagefeature information corresponding to the first sub-image corresponding to the target image, and generating a target presentation file corresponding to the target image according to the text feature information and the image feature information. The target presentation file corresponding to the target image can be quickly and accurately generated. The invention relates to an image recognition technology in artificial intelligence. The technology is suitable for the fields of smart government affairs, smart education and the like, and facilitates the promotion of the construction of smart cities.

title: Student psychological state analysis method and device based on audio and video, terminal and medium
applicants: PING AN INT SMART CITY TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a student psychological state analysis method and device based on audio and video, a terminal and a medium, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the transfer learning and training of a student emotion expression recognition model based on an open source emotion expression data set and a private emotion expression data set; carrying out distortion correction and grid mapping on the student panoramic video to obtain a student target video of each student; recognizing the student target video througha student emotional expression recognition model to obtain an activation degree and a pleasure degree; calculating a student target video to obtain activeness; calculating negative emotion accordingto the audios of the students; and analyzing the psychological state of the student according to the activation degree, the pleasure degree, the activity degree and the negative emotion. The method can be applied to wisdom education, the psychological states of students can be comprehensively analyzed in multiple modes, and the accuracy is high. In addition, the invention also relates to the technical field of the block chain, and the psychological state can be stored in the block chain.

title: Response method in man-machine conversation, conversation system and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention provides a response method in man-machine conversation, a conversation system and a storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method can be applied to a dialogue robot, such as a child accompanying education robot. In the conversation process of the user and the machine, the intention of the user in the conversation is determined according tothe expected user intention associated with the statement of the user answered by the machine in the previous conversation, and then response is carried out. Because the processing logic of the expected user intention is introduced, the accuracy of the generated response statement is improved.

title: PROVIDING EDUCATIONAL MEDIA CONTENT ITEMS BASED ON A DETERMINED CONTEXT OF A VEHICLE OR DRIVER OF THE VEHICLE
abstract_text: Techniques are described for providing educational media content. According to an embodiment, a system for providing, by a processor, educational media content items based on a determined context of a vehicle or driver of the vehicle is described. The system can comprise a context component that can determine a context of a vehicle or a driver of the vehicle, with the context component employing at least one of artificial intelligence or machine learning to facilitate inferring intent of the driver. The system can comprise a vehicle education component that can perform a utility-based analysis in connection with selecting a media content item relating to a feature of the vehicle based on the determined context, the inferred driver intent and the utility-based analysis. Further, the system can comprise a media component that can output the selected media content item.

title: Intelligent learning chain system based on block chain and working method
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent learning chain system based on a block chain and a working method. The system is composed of a block chain system, a cloud service center and a deep learning system. The working method comprises the following specific steps: firstly, constructing a block chain system, allocating a private key to each user in a block chain, calculating a public key, and sending a public key Ki to a cloud service center by a user Ri for other users to access; enabling the user Ri to sign the resource information and the comment by using a private key, and store the signed resource information and comment in a cloud server for other users to access and verify; verifying the identity and resource information of the user Ri by other users in the blockchain system by usingthe public key and signature of the Ri, updating the blockchain system by each user if the verification is successful, and feeding back to the cloud service center if the verification is unsuccessful;and enabling the deep learning system to analyze comments stored in the cloud service center and feed back non-compliant comments and resources with low comments to the cloud service center for processing. Compared with the prior art, the high-quality education resource service is realized by utilizing the block chain system and the deep learning system, and the reliability, the safety and the non-repudiation of education resources are ensured.

title: Floor type artificial intelligence online education terminal
applicants: NANJING ZHANGXUE ONLINE INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a floor type artificial intelligence online education terminal, and belongs to the field of online education terminals. The floor type artificial intelligence online educationterminal comprises a bottom plate, an outer frame and a terminal body; the middle position of the bottom plate is connected with one end of a first connecting shaft; a sleeve plate is arranged at theother end of the first connecting shaft; a sliding rod is fixed at the bottom of the sleeve plate; a first sliding plate is arranged on the outer side of the sliding rod; a first sliding groove is formed in the inner wall of the first sliding plate, the outer frame is installed in the sleeve plate, a servo motor is arranged at the bottom of the outer frame, a lead screw is connected to the middleof the servo motor, a sleeve ring is installed on the lead screw, a first rotating shaft is connected to the outer side of the sleeve ring, and one end of a supporting rod is connected to the top of the first rotating shaft; when the floor type artificial intelligence online education terminal is used, the angle and the height can be adjusted, components in the device can be cooled, and the use practicability of the device is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence modular robot trolley
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence modular robot trolley, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence and unmanned technology child AI robot education equipment,in particular to a modular reconfigurable AI trolley which is diverse in combination mode and driving mode. The AI trolley adopts a modular design principle; the modular vehicle comprises a chassis, an appearance, a controller, a sensor, an actuator and the like, a user can quickly complete assembling and building of the whole vehicle within 8-12 steps, and based on the modular function, recombinability of vehicles of different functional types can be achieved, including chassis driving and steering, the appearance, tires, shock absorbers, various sensors and the like. By the adoption of the modular reconfigurable structure, rapid assembly and disassembly can be achieved, and rapid modification and after-sales maintenance are facilitated; different types of vehicle body structures can be recombined, the vehicle body structures are not limited to cars, off-road vehicles and the like, and the driving structure is not limited to two-wheel driving.

title: Intelligent curling robot competition motion control system
applicants: HEILONGJIANG JUXIN WISDOM TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an intelligent curling robot competition motion control system, relates to the field of artificial intelligence education robot competitions in middle and primary schools,and aims to solve the problem that no intelligent curling robot competition motion control system exists at present. The control system provided by the utility model conforms to the local characteristics of northern robot education; crawler as base body, a control system is designed on the device; four infrared distance detection elements are uniformly distributed on the outer edge of the curlingstone; whether an opposite curling stone impacts around or not can be detected in real time, an avoidance strategy can be made in advance when an impact signal is detected, a color recognition sensoris designed at the bottom of the curling stone, and the motion state can be controlled through a double-motor driving system by recognizing different colors of different score areas of a match map. Therefore, motion control of the curling stone in a match is realized. The robot is applied to the field of artificial intelligence education robot competitions in middle and primary schools.

title: Image document processing method and device and computer readable storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of image processing in artificial intelligence, and discloses an image document processing method. The method comprises the following steps: generating a first region image according to the position of a preset classification field in a template image, extracting SIFT feature points to generate a first feature descriptor of the first region image and a second feature descriptor of the to-be-processed image, and generating a matching point pair; and generating a transformation matrix according to the matching point pairs, generating a second region image according to the to-be-processed image by using the transformation matrix, processing the second region image to generate an output image, and identifying text content in a required output field position in the output image according to the template image. The invention further provides an electronic device and a computer readable storage medium. According to the method, errors of global template structured positioning and image document structured recognition caused by non-rigid deformation of the image are reduced. In addition, the invention also relates to a blockchain technology, and the methodcan also be applied to the fields of smart government affairs, smart education and the like, thereby promoting the construction of smart cities.

title: Image structured data extraction method, electronic device and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a data processing technology, and provides an image structured data extraction method, an electronic device and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: inputting an image of to-be-extracted structural data into a position detection model; obtaining coordinates of all to-be-identified areas in the image; cutting the to-be-identified area and then executing transformation processing; inputting the to-be-identified areas before and after transformation into an identification model; obtaining an initial recognition result, screening a target recognitionresult of each to-be-recognized area from the initial recognition result, selecting a category result according to the similarity between the character of each target recognition result and each category of characters in the word bank, and generating a structured data file according to each category result and the target recognition result. According to the invention, the structured data in the image recognition result can be accurately extracted. Moreover, the invention also relates to an image recognition technology and a block chain technology in artificial intelligence, and the method canbe applied to the fields of smart government affairs, smart education and the like, thereby promoting the construction of smart cities.

title: Intelligent driving education method based on laser radar and end-to-end control algorithm
abstract_text: The invention relates to an intelligent driving education method based on a laser radar and an end-to-end control algorithm, and the method comprises the steps: S1, controlling a miniature intelligentvehicle to drive on a sand table runway through a control terminal, starting the laser radar to scan a sand table runway environment where the miniature intelligent vehicle is located, and obtainingthe operation instruction data of the control terminal and radar point cloud data; S2, according to the timestamps of the control terminal operation instruction data and the radar point cloud data, using MATLAB for data processing, obtaining mapping of keyboard instruction data and point cloud data corresponding to the timestamps, and the keyboard instruction data and the point cloud data servingas training data; S3, inputting the training data into a pre-constructed end-to-end control neural network model for training to obtain an end-to-end control model. According to the invention, an end-to-end control method is adopted to simplify deep learning knowledge, and intelligent driving on the sand table is realized through a simple laser radar and a miniature intelligent vehicle with high cost performance.

title: Talent resume matching method based on artificial intelligence big data
applicants: JIANGSU ZHIMENG INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a talent resume matching method based on artificial intelligence big data, and belongs to the technical field of data processing. The talent resume matching method based on artificial intelligence big data comprises the following steps: S1, resume data collection: collecting personal resume information of registered users through a plurality of talent software; S2, recruitment information collection: collecting recruitment information of registered enterprises through the plurality of talent software; and S3, establishing a database, and storing the personal resume information data collected in the step S1 and the enterprise recruitment information data collected in the step S2 in a cloud server; comparing the personal resume information with the enterprise recruitment information, scoring, screening and matching the resume. The comparison scoring item comprises five aspects of resume completeness, occupational experience, education background, business skills and personal quality, the personal resume information is deeply analyzed and scored, the final scoring value reflects the actual situation of talents, and the recruitment efficiency is greatly improved.

title: Propaganda and education robot for hospitals
applicants: SHENZHEN HANWEI INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to a propaganda and education robot for hospitals, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence equipment. The machine comprises a machine body, a machine head and a controller; a rotatable machine head is arranged at the top of the machine body, an LED expression lamp set is arranged on the front face of the machine head, and a loudspeaker box and an infrared sensor are arranged in the machine head. A storage hole is formed in the middle of the machine body, a storage box is arranged in the storage hole, the bottom of the storage box is hinged to themounting base, a gravity sensor is arranged at the bottom of the mounting base, an electric telescopic rod is arranged on the side of the storage box, a touch display screen is arranged above the storage hole, and an environment sensing module is arranged on the machine body; two groups of triangular crawler wheels are matched at the bottom of the body. The medicine conveying device can help medical staff to convey medicine to a patient, inform the patient of the use condition and matters needing attention of the medicine, correctly guide the patient to take medicine, and reduce the labor intensity of the medical staff. Meanwhile, the robot can propagandize and teach the patient from the aspects of disease prevention, life work and rest matters needing attention and the like, help the patient to form good living habits and recover early.

title: Artificial intelligence online education terminal convenient to store
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence online education terminal convenient to store. Terminal housing, pulleys are respectively arranged around the bottom of the terminal shell. The inner wall of the terminal shell is provided with a storage cavity. A mounting plate is horizontally arranged in the storage cavity; a reciprocating screw rod is vertically inserted into the center ofthe inner wall of the mounting plate; a coupler is arranged at the downward extending end, penetrating through the mounting plate, of the reciprocating screw rod; a rotating shaft is vertically connected to the bottom of the coupler, a forward and reverse driving motor is arranged at the downward extending end, penetrating through the bottom wall of the terminal shell, of the rotating shaft, supporting columns are symmetrically and vertically fixed to the two sides of the upper end of the mounting plate, a display screen is arranged at the upper ends of the supporting columns, and extending flat plates are symmetrically and rotationally connected to the two sides of the outer wall of the upper end of the terminal shell. According to the utility model, the defects in the prior art are overcome, the design is reasonable, the storage is convenient, the protection effect is improved, the service life is prolonged, the practicability is stronger, and the social use value and the applicationprospect are higher.

title: Answer determination method and device based on AI recognition, electronic equipment and medium
applicants: PING AN INT SMART CITY TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to artificial intelligence, is applied to the field of wisdom education, and discloses an answer determination method based on AI recognition. The method includes obtaining testquestions and determining test question types; when the test question type is a synonym test question type, determining the phrase number and determining the vocabulary type; when the vocabulary typeis a first type, inputting the question stem and the plurality of options into a pre-trained Bert model, and obtaining the similarity between the question stem and each option; when the vocabulary type is a second type, converting the question stem and the plurality of options into GloVe word vectors and converting the GloVe word vectors into FastText word vectors; calculating the similarity between the question stem and each option based on the GloVe word vector and the FastText word vector; when the vocabulary type is a third type, determining a target language and a first word vector, translating the test questions into other languages, determining a second word vector, calculating the similarity between the question stem and each option by utilizing the first word vector and the secondword vector, and determining the option with the highest similarity as an answer. The invention further relates to a blockchain technology, and the answer can be stored in the blockchain.

title: Text processing method and related device
applicants: SHENZHEN PING AN COMMUNICATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and provides a text processing method and a related device, and the text processing method comprises the steps: obtaining a to-be-detected text; obtaining a title text and a body text from the to-be-detected text; determining a target feature vector of the to-be-detected text according to the title text and the text; and inputting thetarget feature vector into a neural network obtained by pre-training to obtain a detection result, the detection result comprising the probability that the text to be detected deviates or the probability that the text to be detected does not deviate. According to the technical scheme provided by the embodiment of the invention, the efficiency and the accuracy of performing biased question detection on the text can be improved. The invention can be used in the field of wisdom education, thereby promoting the construction of a wisdom city.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR AIDING HIGHER EDUCATION ADMINISTRATION USING MACHINE LEARNING MODELS
SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR AIDING HIGHER EDUCATION ADMINISTRATION USING MACHINE LEARNING MODELS
abstract_text: Systems and methods applicable, for instance, to using machine learning models to aid higher education administration. Various machine learning model-based tools can be provided. Further provided can be various infrastructure software modules.

title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TOOL FOR EMPLOYMENT RELATED DOCUMENTATION
abstract_text: This patent is regarding the usage of Artificial Intelligence techniques to support job seekers, applicants, candidates for employment or education. The product or tool created using this Artificial Intelligence patent enables individual or group to easily develop profiles, resume, cover letters, application, or any document used for the employment or education purpose. It is the first patent to support candidates or applicant for the job search and application process. This Artificial Intelligence tool patent also includes audio, visual function, the user can command by using audio or visual sensory/command or type the command to the device/ system/ platform. The user can communicate with this tool/ device/ system verbally or written This Artificial Intelligence tool can be accessed and used in many languages (all existing human languages as of today, English, French, Korean, Japanese, Chinese, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, Hindi, Urdu, and many more). The language can be transferable or interchangeable such as that the user (candidates) can verbally communicate the Artificial Intelligence tool in English to create an English resume or Chinese resume. Also, this Artificial Intelligence tool check grammar, format, etc. Thus, this patent tool can be used for global recruitment and work in a foreign country as well as an individual to efficiently create an application profile, resume, cover letters, etc. This Artificial Intelligence tool matches the required skills from the job posting and creates the user's profile based on the information provided by the user. This tool also recommends keywords, phrases, sentences for users (applicants, candidates, job seekers) and the user can review and modify according to the suggestion or the user can permit the Artificial Intelligence to apply for positions behalf of the user. This Artificial Intelligence tool can suggest job postings to the user and track application statues of the user, and the user can apply easily by simple steps, and the user can also permit this artificial intelligence tool to apply behalf of the user if there are relevant positions or pre-selected positions advertised. The user of this tool can search, maintain, schedule their job search applications, progresses, etc. This Artificial Intelligence tool can analyze any data relevant to this tool/ device/ system, etc. Employers or hiring managers would enable to search candidates if all system required conditions met.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR AIDING HIGHER EDUCATION ADMINISTRATION USING MACHINE LEARNING MODELS
abstract_text: Systems and methods applicable, for instance, to using machine learning models to aid higher education administration. Various machine learning model-based tools can be provided. Further provided can be various infrastructure software modules.

title: Experimental platform for AI intelligent education
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an experiment platform for AI intelligent education. An operation table is arranged above the bracket; clamping blocks are fixed to the two sides of the operation table. A turntable is arranged on the left side of the top end of the console; and an electric telescopic rod is connected to the upper portion of the rotary disc, the touch screen is arranged on the outer wall of the top end of the electric telescopic rod, the water filtering opening is embedded in the right side ofthe upper portion of the operation table, a filtering net is arranged on the inner wall of the water filtering opening, a water pipe is arranged below the water filtering opening, and a collecting box is movably arranged on the outer wall of the water pipe. The experiment platform for AI intelligent education is provided with the support, the support provides a supporting force for the operationtable, and the included angle between the support and the supporting column is 30 degrees, so that the support, the supporting column and the operation table form a triangle, and the device is more stable and firmer to place.

title: Online education resource recommendation processing method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHENZHEN HONGTU EDUCATION NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: An online education resource recommendation processing method based on artificial intelligence relates to the technical field of online education application, and comprises the following steps: step 1, data uploading: an operator needs to upload the data to a resource storage module of a cloud platform; step 2, classification processing: processing and classifying the data in the resource storagemodule through a resource processing module; step 3, software installation: installing a software module in a hardware module in the mobile terminal; step 3, account registration: a user logs in the cloud platform through the mobile terminal, and performs account registration on the cloud platform through a login module. Through close cooperation of the cloud platform and the mobile terminal, online watching and audiovisual viewing of online education resources can be achieved, and through cooperation of the hardware module, the learning effect can be enhanced, eyes can be protected, a comfortable learning environment is provided for people, and convenience is brought to life.

title: Table restoration method and device
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of image processing in artificial intelligence. The embodiment of the invention discloses a table restoration method and device applied to electronic equipment. Themethod comprises the steps: obtaining a to-be-restored image, carrying out the preprocessing of the to-be-restored image, obtaining a target image, carrying out the morphological operation of a plurality of pixel points contained in the target image, and obtaining a structural frame corresponding to a to-be-restored table; then, carrying out contour recognition on the structure framework to obtaina plurality of intersection areas corresponding to each transverse line in the plurality of transverse lines and each vertical line in the plurality of vertical lines; determining table cell typesetting information corresponding to the to-be-restored table based on the plurality of intersection areas, finally identifying target text information contained in the target image, and generating a target table based on the table cell typesetting information and the target text information; therefore, the stability of table recognition is improved. In addition, the invention also relates to a blockchain technology, and can be applied to the field of wisdom education, thereby promoting the construction of a wisdom city.

title: Course recommendation method based on text similarity, and related equipment
applicants: CHINA PING AN PROPERTY INSURANCE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a course recommendation method based on text similarity. The method comprises the steps of obtaining content features of courses in a preset database and constructing a course content corpus; respectively calling a TF-IDF model, a topic model and a Word2vec model to train the course content corpus to obtain a first vector, a second vector and a third vector of the course content; determining corresponding first, second and third optimal weights, and constructing a final vector of the course according to the optimal weights; calculating the similarity of any two courses according to the final vectors of the courses to obtain a similarity matrix of the courses; and acquiring historical watching courses and calling the similarity matrix to obtain a list of courses to berecommended. The invention further provides a course recommendation device based on the text similarity, a computer device and a storage medium. According to the method, course recommendation efficiency can be improved. Moreover, the invention also relates to a blockchain technology and an artificial intelligence technology, and the method can be applied to the field of wisdom education, therebypromoting the construction of a wisdom city.

title: Holographic computer
abstract_text: The utility model provides a holographic computer. The holographic computer comprises a host, a screen curtain and a mouse and keyboard pad curtain, wherein the face recognizer, the keyboard projector, the mouse projector, the fingerprint recognizer, the volume control panel, the indicating lamp and the peripheral interface are all mounted on the front surface of the host; and the two host heat dissipation holes and the two sound boxes are respectively mounted on the left side surface and the right side surface of the host. According to the holographic computer provided by the utility model, the artificial intelligence elite projector is arranged; according to the technical scheme, the artificial intelligence refinement can be projected through the projection screen, multiple functions ofthe host can be achieved through voice control of the artificial intelligence refinement, the artificial intelligence refinement can be used as a refinement to achieve real-time positioning, various public information such as local weather, tourist attractions and education can be obtained through positioning, and certain man-machine communication can be carried out.
