According to the utility model, the positive and negative motors, the bevel gear I and the bevel gear II are arranged; the bevel gear I is meshed with the bevel gear II; the front wheels are driven by the driving wheels, the robot body can move forwards or backwards, the placement groove, the spring, the sliding rod, the positioning block and the positioning groove are arranged, educational supplies can be stored and stored conveniently,deformation of the educational supplies can be recovered elastically, and the positioning block can enter the positioning groove and can fix the cover plate.

title: Deep learning sample labeling method based on online education big data
inventor_name: 其他发明人请求不公开姓名
abstract_text: The invention provides a deep learning sample labeling method based on online education big data. The method comprises the following steps: receiving user labeling input related to a first group of sample objects in a sample library; training a preference prediction model comprising a weight vector, with the weight vector comprising a weighted value of each of a plurality of features associated with a sample library, the sample library comprising a first set of sample objects presented to the user, training the weighted value of each feature with the received user annotation input; selecting asecond set of sample objects to be provided to the user, the second set of sample objects providing more priori knowledge obtained from the user annotation input relative to other unidentified sampleobjects in the sample library; and according to the trained preference prediction model, pushing a preset number of preference objects to be provided for the user. According to the deep learning sample annotation method based on the online education big data, the interest and preference information of the user is mined based on the inherent interaction operation of the user, the sample annotationefficiency and the deep learning effect are improved, and therefore accurate content recommendation can be better achieved.

title: Examination cheating behavior identification method, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN INT SMART CITY TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, is applied to the field of wisdom education, and discloses an examination cheating behavior identification method. The method comprisesthe following steps: receiving and responding to an examination request which is sent by a user and carries user identity information; acquiring a real-time image of the user; performing identity recognition on the real-time image; and when the user passes the identity recognition, starting an examination, collecting a video file of the user in the examination process, recognizing a sight deviation behavior, a head deviation behavior and a voice communication behavior of the user, and finally comprehensively judging whether the user cheating or not according to the sight deviation behavior, the head deviation behavior and the voice communication behavior. The invention further discloses electronic equipment and a computer storage medium. According to the invention, the accuracy and efficiency of cheating behavior identification can be improved. In addition, the invention also relates to a blockchain technology, and the user identity information can be stored in the blockchain.

title: Online education IP ecological business model

abstract_text: The invention discloses a visual programming platform based on a mobile terminal through AI imaging and 3D animation movie and television drama. title: Anti-collision assembly of artificial intelligence education robot

Obstacles are preliminarily detected through the infrared detection radar,and when a vehicle body collides with the obstacles due to a detection blind area, impact force is buffered through the anti-collision device, so that the robot is effectively protected.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot with obstacle avoidance function

abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence education robot with an obstacle avoidance function. The beneficial effects of theutility model are that: the utility model discloses: the beneficial effect is: a third stepping motor is mounted in the robot body; the robot body is moved through the circuit board, and meanwhile, when the robot body encounters an obstacle, the radar at the front end of the robot body transmits data to the circuit board, so that the robot body is prevented from being impacted and damaged, the obstacle is rotated and moved, the robot body can continue to move forwards, and the robot body can keep normal work in different area environments.

abstract_text: The utility model discloses a carrying device of an artificial intelligence education robot. The first clamping plate drives the second clamping plate to deviate towards the other side; and when the first stepping motor rotates in the reverse direction, the first clamping plate and the second clamping plate get close to each other, so that the object is clamped, and the object can be well moved and carried.

The sliding blocks are arranged at the two ends of one end of the blackboard, the sliding rails are arranged at the ends, at the two ends of the controller, of the device body on the outer sides of the sliding blocks, the function that the blackboard moves leftwards and rightwards and has a protective door on the controller after being closed is achieved, and application and popularization are easy.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR COATCHING READING USING BIG DATA BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a reading coaching system and a method thereof and, more specifically, to a reading coaching system using big data analysis based on artificial intelligence and a method thereof which can suggest a customized reading program suitable for the reading ability of, specifically, students based on objectively analyzed data in a time such as childhood and adolescence in which the highest intellectual growth can be promoted by reading, and allow proper reading habits, writing ability improvement, and acquisition of a variety of background knowledge through a coaching process of an expert reading coach. According to the present invention, the reading coaching system using big data analysis based on artificial intelligence comprises: a reading coaching management server to automatically generate a recommendation book portfolio of an individual and reading scheduling information of the corresponding recommendation book portfolio based on coaching target information of at least one among the nationality, age, sex, education, hobby, residence, and reading level of a reading coaching target; a regional member store terminal to transmit the coaching target information to the reading coaching management server to receive the reading scheduling information; and a coach terminal approved as a reading coach in the member store terminal to educate the reading coaching target in accordance with the reading scheduling information.

title: Platform with block chain for new middle age getting again a job
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a blockchain-applied platform for reemployment of new middle age people. A reemployment-seeking person, who is a supply worker, registers information and the registered information is stored by using a blockchain technique. A company or a general entity which is a consumer selects and stores information of a desired worker. The information selected by the company or the general entity which is a consumer and information stored in a blockchain by supply workers are matched by using artificial intelligence. An interview with a desired worker in a supply worker candidate group matched by artificial intelligence is conducted. An employment contract with a supply worker to be hired by the company or the general entity which is a consumer is concluded on the platform after conducting the interview. An interviewee who has the interview with the company or the general entity which is a consumer evaluates an interview attitude associated with the company or the general entity which is a consumer. Evaluated information is recorded in the blockchain. The supply worker is provided with additional functions such as providing annual salary information of a reemployed person having a history similar to the supply worker in the platform or providing expertise improvement education for a business type of interest and education on interview technique improvement.

title: Novel hand-held artificial intelligence early education machine

abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. A clamping plate, a fixing buckle and a clamping fixing seat on the keyboard clamp are matched with one another for use; composition replacing mechanism, most keyboards cannot be disassembled and replaced by themselves; the replacement can be carried out only when a user gets to a corresponding repair shop; the utility model discloses an early education machine for babies. How to use the keyboard and the display screen in a matched mode is not known due to young age. When the keyboard is damaged due to disordered pressingand knocking, parents can replace the keyboard through the replacement mechanism, clamp the clamping plate on the fixing base through the pinching column, rotate the clamping plate to the optimal position through the fixing buckle and then take out the keyboard for replacement, and manpower, material resources and financial resources are greatly reduced through the replacement mechanism.

title: A SUBJECT-TAILORED CONTINUOUSLY DEVELOPING RANDOMIZATION BASED METHOD FOR IMPROVING ORGAN FUNCTION
abstract_text: The present disclosure provides systems regimens, devices and methods for improving organ function by challenged-exercise, training, and/or education and/or nutritional regimens, or devices intended for improving organ performance, and for prevention and treatment of loss of an effect to exercise regimens in healthy and chronic subjects, or lack of full responsiveness to exercise, training, nutritional or education regimens in subjects who wish to improve the function of their organs, or with chronic diseases. There are provided herein devices, systems, and methods for real time or delayed altering of the parameters of training regimens and/or time of administration and/or combining different exercise, training, nutrition or education regimens, for improving the long term effect of the regimen. According to some embodiments, any training regimen and/or device-generated maneuver/stimulation, wherein the parameters are updated within the exercise regimen/maneuver period, for personalizing the regimen parameters and increasing the accuracy and efficacy of the regimen for achieving the desired physiological goal, and to prevent long-term adaptation for ensuing prolong effect of the training regimen on the target organ function or physiological pathway. Output parameters are continuously, semi continuously, or conditionally being updated based on measurements and inputs provided toa compute circuitry configured to facilitate closed loop machine learning capabilities.

title: STUDENT’S PHYSIOLOGICAL HEALTH BEHAVIOURAL PREDICTION MODEL USING SVM BASED MACHINE LEARNING ALGORITHM
abstract_text: STUDENT'S PHYSIOLOGICAL HEALTH BEHAVIOURAL PREDICTION MODEL USING SVM BASED MACHINE LEARNING ALGORITHM Students behavior is especially important for educator in the education field. The faculties are responsible for smooth running of the class and at the same time, they should monitor the student's activities, etc. In recent trends, machine learning and computer vision technologies has become important role in education field. Machine learning is the concept of learning from the past and based on that improves the future performance. Machine learning algorithms are used to identify the student's behavior. Many challenges are there to face in students' performance. The aim is to find the students physiological health behavior that will help to improve their behavior and provides feedback to the teacher. The teachers can also capture the student's behavior in the classroom for the decision-making process and it is taken as a data-acquisition part. title: Cloud-based medicine service management system
applicants: ACCUHIT AI TECHNOLOGY TAIWAN CO LTD [TW]
abstract_text: The invention discloses a cloud-based medicine service management system, which comprises: a member communication management module, a drugging management module, a medication reminding module, a data storing module, a medical information providing module, a health education resource acquisition module, a medical resource acquisition module and a machine learning module. The system uses the drugging management module to obtain medication information on the drug list and reminds the individual or group of drugging time and drugging amount through the medication reminding module. In addition, the system can also provide medical-related information through the medical information providing module, the health education resource acquisition module and the medical resource acquisition module.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR PROVIDING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EDUCATION SERVICE FOR IMPROVING BRAIN DEVELOPMENT EFFECT AND LEARNING EFFECT BASED ON BRAIN TENDENCY OF USER
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a method for providing an artificial intelligence education service for increasing a brain development effect and a learning effect based on a brain tendency of a user and an apparatus therefor. According to an embodiment of the present invention, the method for providing an artificial intelligence education service based on a brain tendency of a user comprises: a step of providing a user with learning information, and measuring a learning result and a learning pattern of the user arising from carrying out the learning information to determine a brain tendency of the user; a step of providing the user with additional learning information extracted from a previously linked database based on the brain tendency of the user; and a step of measuring a learning result and a learning pattern of the user arising from carrying out the additional learning information to update the brain tendency of the user based on the learning result and the learning pattern of the user.

title: Artificial intelligence education device
applicants: SICHUAN JOYSONT YOUNG TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to an artificial intelligence education device. The device comprises a workbench and a fixed sliding rod, a rectangular sleeve seat I, a rectangular sleeve seat II and a rectangular sleeve seat III are sequentially arranged on the fixed sliding rods from left to right in a sleeving manner through sleeves; the sleeve is provided with a locking piece used for abutting against the fixed sliding rod. The locking piece comprises a pressing rod, a spring and an abutting block. The abutting block is arranged in the sleeve in a penetrating mode, slidably connected with the sleeve and arranged outside the fixed sliding rod in a sleeving mode. The pressing rod penetrates through the sleeve and is connected with the abutting block, the spring is arranged on the pressing rodin a sleeving mode, the two ends of the spring abut against the sleeve and the end, away from the sleeve, of the pressing rod respectively, and when the pressing rod is pressed towards the sleeve, theabutting block does not abut against the fixed sliding rod, and when the pressing rod is not pressed, the abutting block abuts against the fixed sliding rod. The device has the effect that the positions of the first rectangular sleeve seat, the second rectangular sleeve seat and the third rectangular sleeve seat can be adjusted conveniently.

title: TECHNIQUES FOR BIMODAL LEARNING IN A FINANCIAL CONTEXT
abstract_text: Techniques for bi-modal learning in a financial context are described. These techniques are configured to improve a user's financial acumen and bring the user into an optimal financial state. Some of these techniques are embodied in a device that operates financial education lessons specifically configured for the improving the user's current financial state. These techniques may implement rewards/penalties (in tokens) for correct/incorrect user responses to financial decisions being presented in these lessons for user to make. By exploiting the user's desire for rewards and tokens and the desire to improve the user's current financial state, these techniques may leverage machine learning techniques to identify an appropriate financial education lesson that is most likely to have a positive effect on the user. Over time, administrating the financial education lessons builds customer loyalty to the device that implements these techniques. Other embodiments are described and claimed.

title: METHOD, SYSTEM, AND PLATFORM FOR DELIVERY OF EDUCATIONAL INFORMATION AND PELVIC HEALTH MANAGEMENT
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to effective, efficient, and economical methods and systems for improving patient engagement, education, and treatment management. In particular, the present disclosure relates to a unique configuration of technology wherein analysis by artificial intelligence may determine improvement to treatment plans and may adjust such treatment plans to improve patient care or reduce cost.

title: Vocational skill competition training education platform based on artificial intelligence
applicants: JIANGSU YIDAOYUN TECH DEVELOPMENT CO LTD

The platform comprises a user unit, a competition training unit, a detection unit,a data service unit, an artificial intelligence service unit and a cloud service platform unit. The invention aims at providing practical training content for IT competition through a task game type breakthrough mode and artificial intelligence analysis, providing a set of method for learner ability tracking and path intelligent planning, establishing a set of software system, and solving the problem that competitors and instructors participating in the competition do not have a unified training mode and training system.

title: Artificial intelligence education device

The device comprises an intelligent learning structure, a supporting plate, a first baffle, a second baffle and four sets of supporting plates; the device further comprises a bottom plate, four sets of threaded rods, four sets of threaded pipes, four sets of limiting discs, four sets of first ball bearings and a baffle. Cross-shaped limiting holes are formed in the left front side, the left rear side, the right front side and the right rear side of the bottom plate in a communicating manner; the four groups of first ball bearings are respectivelyplaced in the middle parts in the four groups of cross-shaped limiting holes; and the four sets of limiting discs are installed in the four sets of first ball bearings correspondingly, a containing cavity is formed in the middle of the front end of the bottom plate, the alternating-current motor is placed in the containing cavity, and buffer springs are arranged at the left end and the right endof the alternating-current motor correspondingly.

title: Community correction self-service system based on Internet of Things
applicants: NANJING HUIZHILINGJIE INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a community correction self-service system based on the Internet of Things, and belongs to the technical field of logistics network and communication. The system comprises a self-service platform, a self-service learning platform, a personal center platform and a self-service correction terminal; the self-service platform comprises a self-service registration module function, a voice report module function, a self-service leave module function, a daily report module function, a correction condition module function, a personal file module function, a centralized education module function, a psychological assessment module function, an employment and entrepreneurship module function, a recruitment information module function, a legal service module function and an assistance application module function. By combining artificial intelligence technologies such as biological feature recognition, human-certificate comparison and voice, a standardized self-service handling process and a service query and education learning system are established, and the functions of community correction object self-service service handling, self-service learning, psychological assessment, daily self-service registration, self-service query, online assistance and the like are achieved.

title: AI intelligent education system
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of information management, in particular to an AI intelligent education system. A monitoring center module is used for displaying pictures shot by monitoring equipment in the classroom and displaying names of all classrooms and corresponding information of the classrooms; an educational administration center module is used for recording teacher names, classroom information, login account information, login time and behavior records, searching through the teacher names and the set starting time and ending time, adding, modifying and checking timetable content, and carrying out reservation of a classroom by searching classrooms through the classroom names; a statistical report module is used for displaying the classroom utilization rate in a certain period, counting and displaying the attendance rate of teachers and the accumulated class hour ranking of teachers in a certain period; and an equipment management module is used for quick search of classrooms, realizes remote centralized management control of the classrooms, reduces the management and maintenance workload of the classrooms and improves the management and maintenance efficiency.

title: Online education resource management system based on artificial intelligence and recommendation method thereof
applicants: SHENZHEN HONGTU EDUCATION NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online education resource management system based on artificial intelligence. The invention relates to the technical field of online education application. The system comprises a grabbing module, a comparison module and a recommendation module, the grabbing module is connected with the comparison module; the comparison module is connected with the recommendation module;a user side and a resource side in the recommendation module are analyzed and integrated, so that the interest of the user and the use habits of friends around the user can be collected, and the relevance can be further collected; and then the collected data is fused through the comparison module and the fusion module in the comparison module, and the habit interface and the habit mode of the usercan be formulated, so that the client is truly helped, and the use problem is solved for the user.

title: Method for constructing educational concept map with multiple relations from multi-source data
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method for constructing an education concept map with multiple relations from multi-source data, which comprises the following steps of: crawling the multi-source data, and extracting a concept text by using a data mining method to form a training data set; obtaining a labeling result of an expert on the training data set, and extracting concepts and related characteristics among the concepts according to sources of the concepts and labels of the concepts; the labeled training data set is combined with a traditional machine learning method; training a support vector machine used for predicting education key concepts; training a hybrid model used for predicting the prerequisite relationship and the common learning relationship of the education key concept pairs based on the prerequisite relationship and the common learning relationship between the education key concept pairs marked in the training data set in combination with a traditional machine learning method; and utilizing the trained support vector machine and the hybrid model to construct an education concept map for the new data set. According to the method, the educational concept map with multiplerelations can be accurately constructed.

title: Online course recommendation method based on micro-expression recognition and related equipment
applicants: PING AN LIFE INSURANCE CO CHINA LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an online course recommendation method based on micro-expression recognition and related equipment. The micro-expression recognition-based online course recommendation method comprises the steps of collecting a face image of a target student from an online video; extracting micro-expression features from the face image through a preset convolutional network model, and determining a to-be-recommended course according to the micro-expression features; determining corresponding text content according to the course to berecommended; processing the text content through a preset lip shape recognition model and a preset expression generation model to obtain a lip shape feature value and an expression feature value; generating a target recommended course according to the lip shape feature value, the expression feature value and the text content and a preset text sequence; and pushing the target recommended course tothe target student. According to the invention, course recommendation is carried out by collecting the online learning micro-expression of the target student, and the recommended course is explained by the generated artificial intelligence lecturer, so that the learning enthusiasm of the student and the authenticity of online education are improved.

title: Intelligent terminal enhanced programming education robot
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent terminal enhanced programming education robot. The intelligent terminal enhanced programming education robot comprises an intelligent terminal enhancement module, a control unit and a robot body. According to the intelligent terminal enhanced programming education robot, an intelligent terminal sensor and interaction equipment are encapsulated and called, andvisual and auditory sensors are virtualized and encapsulated through the intelligent terminal enhancement module and the control unit, and meanwhile the intelligent terminal enhancement module movesalong with the robot body, so that the robot is able to comprehensively sense the world and interact with a user from a first personal perspective; by means of high computing capacity and rich storageresources of an intelligent terminal, complex computer vision algorithms, voice processing and other algorithms can be operated; the perception, interaction and computing capabilities of the programming education robot are improved through the intelligent terminal enhancement module without cost increase; and by encapsulating programming assemblies, the user can achieve complex and frontier artificial intelligence programming of computer vision, speech recognition and the like by building blocks, so that an original robot with a low function and low performance becomes intelligent.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot for preschool education
applicants: SUZHOU LEKE ROBOT TRAINING CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence education robot for preschool education. The robot comprises a robot body, a mounting strip, a first mechanical arm and a second mechanical arm,a display screen is mounted in the middle of the front wall of the robot body; horn loudspeakers are mounted on the left outer side and the right outer side of the display screen; a connecting rod iswelded to the top end of the robot body. A hollow column is mounted on the outer wall of the rotating rod in a sleeving manner; the first mechanical arm and the second mechanical arm are welded to theleft side wall and the right side wall of the robot body correspondingly, the top end of the first mechanical arm and the top end of the second mechanical arm are connected with a first connecting rope and a second connecting rope correspondingly in a bolted mode, and the top end of the first connecting rope and the top end of the second connecting rope are connected with a fixing strip and a hoop frame correspondingly in a bolted mode. According to the utility model, under the action of mutual cooperation between the mounting holes and the screws, the pull-out length of the movable rod can be regulated and controlled, so that a certain distance can be kept between an infant and the robot, and eyes of the infant can be protected.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR WASTE ITEM DETECTION AND RECOGNITION
abstract_text: Embodiments described herein relate to hardware and software for waste item detection and recognition, along with an education or feedback system. Embodiments described herein use artificial intelligence, which embodies machine learning and computer vision, to detect waste items and generate feedback to nudge the user to dispose the waste items into appropriate receptacles while generating smart operational insights of a designated premise.

title: Intelligent display stand for AI education
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an intelligent display stand for AI education. The exhibition stand comprises a propaganda frame, an exhibition stand body, a propaganda screen, a first standing plate anda second standing plate. A first display screen is fixed to one side of the upper portion of the exhibition stand body. A second display screen is fixed on the other side of the upper part of the exhibition stand body; a first platform is fixed to the bottom of one side of the exhibition stand body. A second platform is fixed at the bottom of the other side of the exhibition stand body; the tops of the first platform and the second platform are movably connected with a first standing plate and a second standing plate, a second motor is fixed to the top of the inner side of the exhibition standbody, a propaganda frame is fixed to the output end of the second motor through a rotating shaft, a propaganda screen is fixed to the side face of the propaganda frame, and the exhibition stand bodyis fixed to the base. By arranging the propaganda frame, the propaganda screen, the first standing plate and the second standing plate, the AI education intelligent display cabinet solves the problemsthat an AI education intelligent display cabinet cannot propagandize AI education to the outside, AI education popularization is not facilitated, and an AI education display table cannot effectivelyadapt to AI education experience of students with different heights.

title: Intelligent garbage classification education device based on deep learning
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an intelligent garbage classification education device based on deep learning. The utility model belongs to the technical field of garbage recycling devices. The intelligent garbage can comprises a base, a rain baffle, an intelligent control device, an image acquisition device, a voice playing device and a plurality of garbage boxes with fan-shaped structures, the intelligent control device, the image acquisition device and the voice playing device are fixedly connected with the lower end of the rain baffle; a vertical pipe is arranged among the garbage boxes, the lower end of the rain baffle is fixedly connected with a transverse rod, the upper end of the vertical pipe is fixedly connected with the rod wall of the transverse rod through a connecting rod, the lower end of the vertical pipe is fixedly connected with the upper end of the base, and the pipe wall of the vertical pipe is rotationally connected with an annular plate through a rolling bearing. According to the garbage can, people can correctly classify and place garbage in the garbage can, the cognition degree of people for garbage classification and recycling can be improved, the garbage classification and recycling effect is improved from the source, and meanwhile workers can conveniently clean the garbage in the garbage can.

title: Observation ability testing and evaluating method and device
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses an observation ability testing and evaluating method and device. The method comprises the following steps of: through preset audio and video playing equipment, displaying basic testing information including a preset audio, video and animation to a target object; receiving a voice signal generated by the target object by aiming at the basic testing information; utilizing a preset AI (Artificial Intelligence) analysis system to carry out analysis and scoring on the observation ability of the target object on the basis of the voice signal; and outputtinga testing evaluation result corresponding to the observation ability of the target object. By use of the observation ability testing and evaluating method, on the basis of the voice signal recorded inan interactive asking and answering process in which the target object participates in short time, the observation ability of the target object can be tested and evaluated, observation ability testing and evaluating convenience and accuracy can be improved, and therefore, an effective reference opinion can be provided for school, family and social guidance education.

title: METHOD AND SERVER FOR PROVIDING JOB SEARCH INFORMATION
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a method for providing a job search preparation guide by using artificial intelligence and job competence standardization by occupation based on deep learning and a server thereof. According to the present invention, the server includes: an employee information management part obtaining employee information and creating necessary job competence information by occupation and standard job competence information by occupation based on the employee information; a job seeker information management part obtaining job seeker information and classifying the information into sections of personal information, education, qualification, job career and experience, and creating current job competence information of the job seeker based on the classified job seeker information; and a job search information providing part selecting a suitable occupation for the job seeker based on the current job competence information of the job seeker, the necessary job competence information by occupation and the standard job competence information by occupation, and calculating a gap value indicating the difference between the current job competence information of the job seeker and the necessary job competence corresponding to the selected occupation.

title: Ubiquitous-based training education portfolio system to provide user with UBT test and SBT test for managing learning activities and method thereof
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a ubiquitous-based training education portfolio system to provide UBT and SBT tests and a method thereof. The system uses a PC, a smartphone, a tablet PC, and wired/wireless communication to provide during training education health and medical education theories, training information recording, instructor evaluation, learning history management by learner/trainee for UBT/SBT tests and scoring, messenger-based P2P communication between the instructor and the learner/trainee, individual student training management on the U-portfolio system, performance evaluation score, and index and notifies training opening at the site of health and medical education or training, training plan and training schedule, and training targets. In accordance with the training plan and schedule, the instructor in charge of training leaves feedback by underlining an on-site training record sheet drawn by the learner/trainee by using a user terminal or by text, picture, photo, voice recording, and image recording. The training site feedback content is immediately captured and transmitted to a main server and user terminals. Provided as a result are instantaneous instructor feedback (emergency measure and countermeasure), instructor evaluation, UBT/SBT tests and scoring of the U-portfolio system interworking with a learning management system (uLMS) using sequential probability ratio testing (SPRT), mutual learning between the student and the instructor, learner/trainee training history, and instructor evaluation history/instruction history. A cloud training education management service (U-Portfolio) using artificial intelligence and big data analysis is provided by means of a smart device.

title: Modular System for Coding Education Using Artificial Intelligence
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a modular artificial intelligence coding education system to form a coding robot for coding education based on artificial intelligence and a robot. According to the present invention, the coding education system comprises: an embedded system including an OS capable of providing the coding education on a platform of the robot and, at the same time, operating the robot; hardware including a robot driving unit, a lift unit, an arm unit, a hand unit, a camera unit, a sensor unit, and the like participating in operation of the robot; a method integrating and providing a block type graphic programming method and a method using a programming language for the coding education; modules to add hardware and software related to the robot to a basic module if necessary; software modules for an artificial intelligence function such as vision and recognition of the robot and the like; a cloud server for high speed and large capacity of an intelligent function inside a robot system; a smartphone and a tablet computer for software development and remote monitoring; and a coding robot service server for supporting and managing software resources of the coding robot.

title: LLVM VR/AR Method and system for deep-learning application of virtual reality/augmented reality education platform using low level virtual machine intermediate representation
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a deep-learning application technology of a virtual reality/augmented reality (VR/AR) education platform using low level virtual machine-intermediate representation (LLVM-IR). An implementation system of the VR/AR education platform comprises: a connection means which can be connected with a deep-learning platform; a platform generating an asm.js code which can be used by a user through LLVM-IR connection to use the connected code for AR/VR content production; and a user interface analyzing a pattern drawn by the user to automatically extract and express the pattern.

title: Artificial intelligence online education terminal with sitting posture correction function
applicants: GANSU PUGONGYING INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence online education terminal with a sitting posture correction function. The terminal comprises a machine box, a terminal body, a base and an instrument box, a machine box is arranged at the top end of the terminal body, a micro motor is arranged on one side in the machine box, a wireless receiving and transmitting module is arranged on the otherside in the machine box, a camera is arranged in the middle of the top end of the machine box, and the camera is connected with a rotating shaft of the micro motor through a gear set. According to the utility model, the sitting posture correction tracking module and the camera are arranged; the sitting posture state of the user is accurately captured by the camera; meanwhile, the sitting posturecorrecting and tracking module identifies the sitting posture of the user, if the sitting posture of the user is incorrect, the sitting posture correcting and tracking module sends information to thesingle-chip microcomputer, the single-chip microcomputer prompts the user to correct the sitting posture in a voice mode through the loudspeaker, and the situation that the user is in an improper sitting posture learning state for a long time is avoided.

title: Artificial intelligence online education terminal convenient to store
applicants: GANSU PUGONGYING INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence online education terminal convenient to store. The device comprises a bearing platform, a terminal plate, a liquid crystal display screen, an operation table and a control panel, a terminal plate block is arranged above the bearing platform; a liquid crystal display screen is arranged at one end of the surface of the terminal plate; a base isarranged in the center of the bottom end of the terminal plate; a bearing is hinged to the center of the bottom end of the base. An operation table is arranged at the top end of the bearing platform on one side of the terminal plate, a control panel is arranged on the outer wall of one side of the operation table, storage cabinets are arranged on the two sides of the bottom end of the bearing platform, storage chambers are arranged in the storage cabinets, rubber gaskets are arranged at the bottom ends of the storage cabinets, and wireless transmitters are arranged on the outer walls of one sides of the storage cabinets. According to the utility model, the convenience of the education terminal in use is improved, the practicability of the education terminal is improved, and the applicationrange of the education terminal is widened.

title: Web vulnerability verification method based on crowdsourcing and machine learning
applicants: NANJING MOOCTEST INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: A web vulnerability verification method based on crowdsourcing and machine learning is characterized in that a natural language processing technology is used, text description in a crowdsourcing vulnerability verification report is subjected to word segmentation and synonym replacement, and clustering analysis based on DBSCAN and other technologies are adopted. The invention provides a brand-new web vulnerability verification technology based on crowdsourcing and machine learning, and is mainly used for solving the problems that the false alarm rate of web security vulnerabilities is relatively high and the secondary manual verification result of security expert team personnel is too high. The method has the beneficial effects that 1, vulnerability verification participants are increased through a crowdsourcing distribution mode, and the accuracy of a vulnerability scanning report is improved by combining a crowdsourcing report result with machine learning analysis; 2, compared with professional security expert team verification, the crowdsourcing verification scheme is beneficial to saving the cost of secondary manual verification; and 3, the invention can be used for popularization of 'deliveryand education combination ', and the practical ability of students in safety major is improved.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR TRANSMITTING CONTROL AND DATA SIGNALS BASED ON A SHORT TTI IN A WIRELESS CELLULAR COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: A communication method and system for converging a 5th-generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of things (IoT) are provided. The disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security, and safety services. A shortened transmission time interval (TTI)-based downlink (DL) and uplink (UL) transmission method and apparatus for use in a wireless communication system.

title: Student score prediction method based on campus big data
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of education data mining, and provides a student score prediction method based on campus big data, which comprises the following steps: (1) data fusion; in a smart campus environment, dynamic and non-invasive data acquisition is carried out by taking learners as centers, so that convergence and fusion of online and offline and in-class and out-of-class multi-dimensional behavior data of students are realized; (2) feature calculation; by comprehensively utilizing linear analysis, deep learning and nonlinear analysis technologies, a student multi-dimensional behavior characteristic system is systematically constructed from three aspects of behavior change, diligence and behavior nonlinearity, and a student behavior mode and dynamic change thereof are deeplymined; and (3) score prediction; based on a machine learning algorithm, a high-precision score prediction model is constructed, and feedback and early warning are provided for high-risk student groups. According to the method, student scores can be scientifically and comprehensively predicted, and early warning is provided for students with high hanging risk.

title: Artificial intelligence online education mobile terminal
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence online education mobile terminal, which comprises a base and a terminal body shell. The terminal body shell is fixed at the upper end of the base; adisplay screen is arranged on one side of the outer wall of the terminal body shell; a blackboard is arranged below the display screen; a cleaning plate is arranged on one side of the outer wall of the blackboard; a cleaning brush is arranged on one side, close to the blackboard, of the cleaning plate; fixing clamping blocks are arranged at the two ends of the cleaning plate correspondingly; telescopic components are fixedly connected to the ends, away from the cleaning plate, of the fixing clamping blocks; limiting grooves corresponding to limited blocks are formed in the inner wall of the blackboard; supporting rods are fixedly connected to the periphery of the bottom of the base correspondingly; and brake blocks are rotatably connected to the outer walls of the supporting rods. The defects in the prior art are overcome, the design is reasonable, movement and fixation of the terminal are achieved, synchronous use of the display screen and the blackboard is achieved, cleaning and wiping are convenient, and high social use value and application prospects are achieved.

title: Children oral health care and education system
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a child oral health management and education system capable of promoting oral management and cavity prevention for children by photographing and uploading an actual tooth image of a child and providing an oral condition report, which is formed by analyzing a tooth condition through deep learning when medical examination paper is filled, and also, enabling the establishment of dentist visit education or anticavity toothbrushing habit guidelines by providing an oral management education animation. The child oral health management and education system includes: a tooth image acquisition means acquiring a tooth image by photographing the anterior tooth part of a child; a user terminal obtaining the tooth image through communication with the tooth image acquisition means, providing personal information and medical examination data of the child and the obtained tooth image, and requesting an oral health condition report; and an oral health management server creating and transmitting an oral health condition report to the user terminal by analyzing the tooth image provided from the user terminal through deep learning, and prompting a toothbrushing instruction and a dentist visit instruction by providing a toothbrushing instruction animation.

title: Artificial intelligence education system based on big data and data processing method
applicants: ZHEJIANG CHUANGKE NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an artificial intelligence education system based on big data and a data processing method. According to the artificial intelligence education system based on big data and the data processing method, the big data analysis technology is fully utilized to carry out targeted data analysis on online and offline education application scenes, student objects and teacher objects; education requirements of different application scenes and objects are represented from multiple dimensions according to a data analysis processing result, and finally, a corresponding education sceneadjustment mode is formulated to carry out adaptive transformation on a current specific education scene, so that the operation accuracy and high efficiency of the education system are improved.

title: Method for judging and identifying identity of person throwing garbage randomly based on edge AI
applicants: XIAMEN BO HAI ZHONG TIAN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of judging littered garbage and identifying the identity of an illegal person, and particularly relates to a method for judging and identifying the identity of a litter based on an edge AI. According to the method for judging and identifying the identity of a person throwing garbage randomly based on an edge AI, an edge AI calculation method is used, computing resources and storage resources for accelerated recognition are realized; whether a behavior of throwing garbage around exists or not can be identified more quickly; the face recognition technology is adopted while the behavior of littering is judged through edge AI calculation, the identity of a littering person is recognized, tracing of the identity of the person is helped, the person istraced back from illegal behaviors to illegal persons, and education and responsibility system establishment of individuals littering litter are facilitated.

title: Novel artificial intelligence education interaction device
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a novel artificial intelligence education interaction device. Including a body, the device further comprises a limiting mechanism and a rotary connecting mechanism. Whereinthe main body comprises an outer protective shell and a connecting rod; the limiting mechanism comprises fixing parts located on the bottom surfaces of the two sides of the outer protection shell. Alimiting outer pipe sleeve is installed on the inner side of each fixing part, a limiting inner pipe sleeve is installed at the longitudinal axis of the inner side of each limiting outer pipe sleeve,an expansion spring is installed at the top of each limiting inner pipe sleeve, and a limiting groove is formed in the surface of the side, away from the outer protective shell, of each limiting outerpipe sleeve; fixing parts and the like located on the two sides of the outer protective shell are designed and installed. The limiting outer pipe sleeve can move downwards by stepping on the limitingouter pipe sleeve, the device can be conveniently limited, when the device needs to be moved, the limiting clamping bolt is pulled outwards, the limiting outer pipe sleeve is lifted upwards, the device can be conveniently and rapidly limited, and pulleys do not need to be locked one by one.

title: Multifunctional AI education table lamp
applicants: SHENZHEN CITY ANXIN XIANGHE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a multifunctional AI education table lamp. The table lamp comprises a table lamp base, and a table lamp arm is mounted at the top end of the table lamp base; and a movable plate is mounted at the top end of the table lamp arm. According to the invention, the table lamp is scientific and reasonable in structure, and is safe and convenient to use; the table lamp is provided with a movable plate; through the effects of a camera and a broadcasting hole, the books below the lamp panel can be conveniently scanned; therefore, the characters on the book are identified, and thecharacters are broadcasted through the broadcasting hole; therefore, the knowledge memory effect of the user is enhanced; through the arrangement of the dustproof assembly, the effects of a shieldingplate and a dustproof net; the broadcast hole can be shielded conveniently; the external dust is prevented from entering the broadcasting hole to cause blockage; through the effects of fixing springs,limiting blocks and limiting grooves, the dustproof net can be conveniently fixed through the elastic effect of the fixing springs, the situation that the sealing effect is affected due to the fact that the dustproof net shakes back and forth when the device works is avoided; meanwhile, the dustproof net can be conveniently disassembled, and therefore cleaning work can be conducted, and the use is more convenient.

title: Learning Support System And Method Using Augmented Reality And Virtual reality based on Artificial Intelligence
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a learning support system using artificial intelligence-based augmented reality and virtual reality and a method thereof. According to the present invention, the system comprises: a teacher terminal unit which generates and transmits voice information of a teacher, teacher motion information according to the movement of the teacher, and a teacher viewpoint image captured from the viewpoint of the teacher; a student terminal unit which generates and transmits voice information of a student, student motion information according to the movement of the student, and a student viewpoint image captured from the viewpoint of the student; and an education server which synthesizes a virtual reality-based learning image generated based on the voice information of the teacher and the motion information according to the movement of the teacher with the student viewpoint image, and provides the synthesized image to the student terminal. The education server can include an artificial intelligence learning assistant unit which selects and provides supplementary learning content based on artificial intelligence according to the student′s learning state. According to the present invention, the secondary learning content can be selected and provided based on the artificial intelligence in accordance with the learning state of the students participating in the learning, thereby supporting classes to be performed more efficiently.

title: Novel artificial intelligence education interaction system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a novel artificial intelligence education interaction system. The system comprises a controller module, the controller module is connected with a cloud AI processor through a wif network module, the output end of the controller module is connected with a display module and an image recognition automatic obstacle avoidance module, and the output end of the image recognitionautomatic obstacle avoidance module is connected with a mobile module through a signal transmission module. According to the invention, when the system is used, parents can select two control modes ofmobile phone APP remote control and control panel close-range wireless control; the display can be automatically aligned with the eyes of the child, so the eyes of the child are prevented from beinginjured due to incorrect learning postures; the backlight adjusting module can be automatically controlled to adjust the backlight of the display module, the eyes of the child can be effectively protected, and the mobile module can respond in real time according to emergencies, so that the child can not collide with obstacles in the moving process, and the use of the system by the child is safer.

title: Self-adaptive education system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: ZHEJIANG CHUANGKE NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a self-adaptive education system based on artificial intelligence. According to the self-adaptive education system based on artificial intelligence, a teacher application terminal, a student application terminal, an online knowledge management terminal and an education test terminal are arranged to carry out corresponding artificial intelligence association adjustment on theeducation system at a teacher level, a student level, a knowledge data level and a test practice level; therefore, the self-adaptive education system can perform adaptive education data and/or education scene change according to different teacher objects and/or different student objects, thereby improving education quality, education efficiency and education intelligence level of the adaptive education system.

title: Novel artificial intelligence education interaction device
abstract_text: The invention discloses a novel artificial intelligence education interaction device. The device comprises a cover plate and a base. The cover plate is hinged to one side of the upper end of the basethrough a hinge. Universal wheels are arranged at the four corners of the bottom of the base. A controller and a power supply are arranged in the base. The left wall surface of the cover plate is provided with a display screen, a control keyboard, a microphone, indicating lamps and a USB jack from top to bottom. The cover plate is of a hollow structure, a connecting rotating rod is arranged at thetop of the cover plate, an infrared sensor is arranged on the side wall of a longitudinal rod body of the connecting rotating rod, a camera is installed at the tail end of a transverse rod body of the connecting rotating rod, and a motor is installed on the portion, stretching into the cover plate, of the connecting rotating rod in a transmission mode. The controller is electrically connected with the power supply, the display screen, the control keyboard, the motor, the microphone, the indicating lamps, the USB socket, the infrared sensor and the camera. The device is reasonable in structure, convenient to operate, convenient to move, capable of autonomously judging the learning state of a user and more user-friendly.

title: VR safety education device based on artificial intelligence
applicants: AIBANG ZHIHUI CHENGDU TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: A VR safety education device based on artificial intelligence comprises a VR device body, a teacher end video display, a timer, an operation handle and a receiving device. The operating handle is matched with a first rechargeable battery, a first charging socket, a first power switch and a wireless transmitting circuit which are connected through wires. The receiving device comprises a second rechargeable battery, a second charging socket, a second power switch, a buzzer, two wireless receiving circuits and eight display circuits which are connected through wires, the eight display circuits and the timer are installed in an element box, and the teacher end video displayer and the element box are located on the desk. According to the utility model, the immersive display effect of the VR equipment body is utilized; a better carrier can be provided for educating and testing students to strain natural disasters and various accidents, and under the action of related mechanisms, whether options for testing students to select corresponding natural disasters or various accidents are correct or not and the result of reaction time can be visually obtained, so that the students can obtain a better and more visual safety education effect.

title: Artificial intelligence sound box based on AI education
applicants: IFLYTEK SOUTH CHINA ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE RES INSTITUTE GUANGZHOU CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence sound box based on AI education. The intelligent sound equipment comprises an intelligent sound equipment body, a rubber sheath and a turnover cover plate, a rectangular groove is formed in the center of the front side of the intelligent sound box body, sound box loudspeakers are symmetrically arranged on the portions, located on the two sidesof the rectangular groove, of the front side of the intelligent sound box body, the number of the rubber sheaths is four, and the four rubber sheaths are fixedly arranged at the four corners of the intelligent sound box body respectively. According to the utility model, the display screen on the intelligent sound box body is arranged on the inner side of the turnover cover plate, and when the intelligent sound box is not used, the turnover cover plate can be turned over and folded through the connecting hinge, so that the turnover cover plate is embedded into the inner side of the rectangulargroove, the display screen on the turnover cover plate is protected, and accidental damage is prevented.

title: Education evaluation method and system based on cloud computing, Internet of Things and AI
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of computers, in particular to an education evaluation method and system based on cloud computing, the Internet of Things and AI, and the method comprisesthe steps: formulating evaluation rules, and issuing the evaluation rules to a system terminal; inputting a correct user name and a correct password to log in the system terminal; a user can execute corresponding service functions according to actual service requirements; and synchronizing the service data to the mobile terminal. The system comprises an education evaluation subsystem, a network operation subsystem and a reflection service subsystem. According to the homework system based on cloud computing, the Internet of Things and the AI technology, the cloud computing technology, the Internet of Things technology and the AI technology are adopted, the homework correction method close to reality is achieved, rich question types and various question forms are provided, timely and effective notification feedback is achieved, and therefore high-quality network homework service is provided. Big data analysis and mining can be performed based on the score data, so that education evaluation is more objective, fair and accurate.

title: Online education course distribution platform based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to an online education curriculum distribution platform based on artificial intelligence. The online education curriculum distribution platform comprises an application server, an analysis server and a user terminal. The application server receives user feature information and course request information sent by a user, and a course retrieval engine retrieves course plan information according to the course request information; and the analysis server acquires basic information and professional evaluation information of the retrieved course, and compares the user feature information with the basic information of the course. And if the course condition is satisfied, sending the professional evaluation information of the course to the user terminal, and providing a professional reply data stream by the user within a preset time and sending the professional reply data stream to the analysis server. The analysis server processes the professional reply data stream, sendsthe professional reply data stream as input data to a deep neural network model for professional standard evaluation, and judges whether the professional level of the user meets the professional standard of the course according to the output value of the model; and the application server reserves courses for the users meeting the professional standards of the courses.

title: Control method of early education robot
abstract_text: The invention provides a control method of an early education robot, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. Whether object recognition is executed or not is confirmed firstly;if yes, a target image is acquired, a standard image is obtained after preprocessing, an object recognition model is established according to the convolutional neural network, the standard image is input into the object recognition network to obtain a recognition result, and an action console of the robot is called to command the robot to make corresponding actions, sounds and 3D display by adopting a method of simulating mouse click actions; If not, obtaining a gesture image, establishing a gesture recognition model, inputting the gesture image into the gesture recognition model to obtain a recognition result, and calling an action console of the robot to command the robot to perform corresponding actions by adopting a method of simulating mouse click actions. According to the method, based on the cnn convolutional network and the cpms gesture recognition network, pictures or gestures can be quickly recognized, and a lower computer is controlled to make actions corresponding to recognition results.

title: Method for constructing K12 education knowledge graph based on DeepDive technology
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method for constructing a K12 education knowledge graph based on a DepDive technology, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, inputting an article, and inputting the article into a DepDive deep learning framework; S2, mining knowledge points, and the knowledge points obtained through DepDive decomposition are stored in a csv file; S3, performing relationship and feature extraction: extracting features and relationships of the csv files from the csv files; S4, calculating knowledge correlation, and then calculating correlation between knowledge points through a method of calculating correlation of knowledge points of different levels and a method of calculating correlation of knowledge points of the same level; and S5, drawing a knowledge graph, and inputting the correlation between the knowledge points into an NEO4J tool to construct the knowledge graph; according to the method, the efficiency of obtaining the structured data can be improved by using the DeepDive technology; the relationship between knowledge points is calculated by using the quantified data, so that the accuracy of the knowledge graph can be improved; and knowledge points in the article are extracted by comparing the existing knowledge points in the database.

title: METHOD APPARATUS AND COMPUTER PROGRAM FOR OPERATING A MACHINE LEARNING FRAMEWORK FOR REAL TIME MODELING
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a system for providing learning content, which is implemented in a virtualized distributed computing environment. An objective of the present invention is to provide a method of efficiently operating an education content providing system to which machine learning is applied. The system for providing learning content comprises: a first layer to receive data from a user device; a second layer to receive a notice message about occurrence of an event when the event occurs in a different layer, and support a different layer which specifies and registers the event to subscribe to the message; a third layer including a plurality of applications to perform respective functions, allowing the applications to operate independently, and subscribing to a notice message for a specific event required for the operation of the applications from the second layer; and a fourth layer including at least one database, providing a different layer with access to the database, and generating a notice message for any event. The first layer, the second layer, the third layer, and the fourth layer prevent the operation of one layer at any point of time from affecting the operation of other layers, and share data generated by other layers by subscribing to a message for any event.

title: Programmable artificial intelligence robot for education

The robot has the characteristics of multiple purposes, simplicity in entry and easiness in learning and popularization, can realize autonomous programming, and is diversified in simulationaction and flexible to use.

title: Trolley device based on modularization AI
abstract_text: The invention, which relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence and unmanned technology child AI robot education equipment, discloses a trolley device based on modularization AI and especially provides a modular reconfigurable AI trolley with diversified combination modes and diversified driving modes. The AI trolley adopts a modular design principle and comprises a chassis, an appearance, a controller, a sensor, an actuator and the like. A user can quickly complete assembly and construction of the whole vehicle within 8-12 steps; on the basis of the modular function, the recombinability, including chassis driving and steering, appearances, tires, shock absorbers, various sensors and the like, of vehicles of different function types can be realized; with the modular recombinable structure, rapid assembling and disassembling can be realized, and rapid refitting and after-sales maintenance are facilitated; different types of vehicle body structures can be recombined, the vehicle body structures are not limited to cars, off-road vehicles and the like, and the driving structure is not limited to two-wheel driving.

title: Apparatus and method of system information transmission and reception on carrier supporting multiple bandwidth parts
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system witha technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. The method for transmitting system information by a base station in a wireless communication system, the method comprising identifying whether an active downlink (DL) bandwidth part (BWP) of a user equipment (UE) is configured with common search space, and transmitting, to the UE, an updated system information in a dedicated signalling when the active DL BWP of the UE is not configured with the common search space.

title: Method for retrieving personnel in video based on face recognition in K12 education stage
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method for retrieving personnel in a video based on face recognition in a K12 education stage. According to the method, a video shooting device is adopted, the method comprises the steps: obtaining video streaming data, transmitting the video data to an original data storage module; segmenting original video stream data through a distributed file system; storing the original video stream data after segmentation processing into a distributed database, mapping the frame of each piece of original video stream data into a MapReduce model, then respectively extracting facial features and action features of a video object, and finally extracting a moving object in the video; screening out a moving object as a video of a person through a deep learning method, repeatedlycomparing through a CNN convolutional neural network deep learning method, and extracting the appearance features of the person; and storing the identified physical feature information into a cloud service database, sorting according to the similarity, performing one-to-one correspondence on the to-be-searched video and the personnel information required to be searched, and finally identifying andretrieving the corresponding personnel from the video.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot with obstacle removing function
applicants: SHANDONG BIG FUTURE AI INST CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence education, in particular to an artificial intelligence education robot with an obstacle removing function. The robot comprises a robot body, a control mechanism, a walking mechanism, a transmission mechanism, a rotating mechanism, an obstacle removing mechanism, a clamping mechanism and a detection mechanism; the transmission mechanismat the bottom of the robot body drives the walking mechanism through electric energy supply and data instruction transmission of the control mechanism, so that the robot can walk, and the robot body is helped to complete various task instructions; when the robot body encounters an obstacle, the detection mechanism mounted on the side wall of one end of the robot body can transmit an instruction tothe control mechanism in time, and position of the robot body relative to the obstacle is controlled and the robot body is avoided from damage caused by collision with the obstacle; and the control mechanism controls the obstacle removing mechanism and the clamping mechanism to clamp and grab the obstacle, so that the obstacles is removed, and the robot body continues to work normally.

title: 2 AMSGA UL METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR SUPPORTING MULTIPLE MESSAGE A SIZES AND UPLINK COVERAGE FOR TWO STEP RANDOM ACCESS PROCEDURE
abstract_text: The present invention provides a communication method and a system for integrating a 5^th generation (5G) communication system which supports a higher data transmission rate than a 4^th generation (4G) system by using Internet of things (IoT) technology. The communication method and the system of the present invention can be applied to intelligent services based on 5G communication technology and IoT-related technology, such as a smart home, a smart building, a smart city, a smart car, a connected car, health care, digital education, smart retailing, security and safety services, and the like. Provided is a method of a terminal having at least one pre-set serving cell performing a random access (RA) procedure. The method comprises the steps of: measuring downlink reference signal reception power (DL RSRP) of the serving cell where a random access is initiated; determining whether the DL RSRP of the serving cell is higher than a threshold value; and performing a two-step RA procedure based on a fact that the DL RSRP of the serving cell is higher than the threshold value.

According to the balancing assembly, the balance pieces are distributed in the eight directions of the outer side of the central column at euqal included angles, the eight directions of the lower side of the robot can be balanced, the balance effect is good, and it is conducive to improving the stability of the lower part of the intelligent education robot in use.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR WASTE ITEM DETECTION AND RECOGNITION
abstract_text: Embodiments described herein relate to hardware and software for waste item detection and recognition, along with an education or feedback system. Embodiments described herein use artificial intelligence, which embodies machine learning and computer vision, to detect waste items and generate feedback to nudge the user to dispose the waste items into appropriate receptacles while generating smart operational insights of a designated premise.

title: Big data analysis, prediction, and data visualization system for legal documents
abstract_text: Legal language is difficult for the general public to understand and make popular education unreachable. When legal disputes occur, the judges and attorneys need to search the database of legal judgments to obtain the experience of dispute decision. However, human beings cannot read a large number of judgments within a limited period of time. It is also impossible for the general public to use limited keywords to do legal research. Since the search of verdicts and keywords requires professional skills and experience. This invention proposes a big data analysis, prediction, and graph display system for legal documents. We use artificial intelligence to search and study a large number of laws, regulations, orders, and even more than ten million judgments, and etc. When the general public users input information, the invention will statistically analyze all relevant laws, regulations and related judgments. This invention will show the result in a simple image table. This invention is not to replace the work of the legal profession, but to help the general public to know more about the laws, regulations and legal practice in Taiwan or Mainland China. The general public can save time and money through predicting possible litigation directions and results. People can decide whether to initiate litigation more easily. This invention can be used by law firms, courts, and even all citizens. Visualization of the legal data makes laws easy to understand and accelerates the proliferation of legal knowledge. This invention also provides the corresponding application platform in modern mobile device.
