title: A deep-learning eduacation system using arrow images
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a deep learning education system based on arrow images using a neural network model, wherein the neural network model receives the input of arrow images and outputs the direction indicated by the arrow images. The deep learning education system based on arrow images comprises: an arrow managing unit storing the reference image of arrow images; a network model setting unit setting direction categories of the output of the neural network model and direction ranges of each direction category; a population setting unit setting a population for learning data and selecting form variables for generating arrow images for the learning data; a neural network learning unit setting the size of the learning data, sampling the set size of the learning data from the population to learn the neural network model, and randomly setting variable values of the selected form variables in order to generate the arrow images for sampling of the learning data; and a model evaluating unit sampling test data from the population in order to evaluate the neural network model with the test data. Therefore, the deep learning education system based on arrow images can directly select population of learning data, the size of the learning data, etc. and can experiment the accuracy of deep learning accordingly, thereby allowing a learner to understand the structure of deep learning and the learning characteristics of a neural network.

title: 5 Apparatus for auto generating code literacy curriculum and system for code objective similarity examination
abstract_text: According to an embodiment of the present invention, an active online education method by autonomous judgement for learning achievements of a learner comprises the steps of: completing a goal presented by a primary education slide by a learner; transmitting a time to reach the goal and a level of completion of achievement of the presented goal in a corresponding stage to artificial intelligence; determining, by the artificial intelligence, a learning achievement rate of the learner to select and transmit a secondary education slide; repeating the above step up to a predetermined number of times to analyze to figure out difficulty of education slides and the number of repetitions most suitable for the learner according to the learning achievement rate of the learner; digitalizing an increase rate of the learning achievement of the learner up to an n^th repetition to store the same into a storage device; and advancing machine learning of the artificial intelligence by using big data (learning achievements of all learners).

title: AR AI Apparatus for presenting interactive education contents based on augmented reality and artificial intelligence of voice recognition
abstract_text: An apparatus for providing interactive education content comprises: an IR emitter to emit an infrared ray; a diffractive optical element (DOE) to optically diffract an infrared ray emitted by the IR emitter; an IR camera to photograph an infrared image; an RGB camera to sense a color; a microphone to receive a sound wave to convert the sound wave into an electrical signal; a speaker to convert an electrical signal into a sound wave to output the sound wave; a beam projection unit to emit an augmented reality (AR) screen to a bottom surface; a storage unit to store data including content for education; and a control unit to allow the AR screen to be emitted to the bottom surface by the beam projection unit based on the content for education stored in the storage unit, detect a touch position of a finger on the AR screen emitted to the bottom surface by using the DOE and the IR camera, execute an event corresponding to the detected touch position, detect an image by the RGB camera, recognize a voice inputted through the microphone, execute an event corresponding to the voice, and output an event as a voice through the speaker or output an event as an AR screen by the beam projection unit. According to the present invention, students get interested and learning capabilities can be increased.

title: EDUCATION REWARD SYSTEM AND METHOD
abstract_text: A reward learning system includes a user interface configured to receive modes of user information related to a state of the user. A cognitive computing system includes a reward system. The reward system includes a dynamically upgraded profile model of the user which is updated in accordance with the user information related to the state. The reward system is updated by machine learning employing feedback from user responses measured by the user interface and searched information by the cognitive computing system. The reward system includes an increasing reward protocol based on learned user preferences and responses and rewarded in accordance with user achievements.

title: Method and device for providing artificial intelligence education, and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method and a device for providing artificial intelligence education, and a storage medium. The method for providing the artificial intelligence education comprises the stepsthat an artificial intelligence device obtains user identification information corresponding to a user, and the artificial intelligence device is provided with a first program assembly used for artificial intelligence learning; the artificial intelligence device sends an association request associated with the user to a remote server in response to the obtained user identification information; theartificial intelligence device receives a first operation instruction related to artificial intelligence learning sent by the terminal device of the user from the server when the server authenticatesthat the association request is passed; and the artificial intelligence device executes an operation related to artificial intelligence learning by using the first program component according to thefirst operation instruction.

title: Ubiquitous-based training education portfolio system for managing learning activities and method thereof
abstract_text: Disclosed are a ubiquitous-based training education portfolio system and a method thereof. The ubiquitous-based training education portfolio system provides a theory, training information record, professor appraisal, learning history management for each learner/trainee of a UBT/SBT test and grading, P2P communication using a messenger between a professor and the learner/trainee, training management on an individual student on a U-portfolio system, a performance assessment score, and an index, in training education, for example, in health care education via wired and wireless communications using a PC, smartphone, and tablet PC. The ubiquitous-based training education portfolio system opens training by training opening in a training field or a health care field and announces a training plan, a training schedule, and trainees. A professor who is in charge of the training freely offers feedback on field training recording paper written by the learner/trainee, using a user terminal of the professor by underlining the field training recording paper or by using a text, picture, image, and voice recording in accordance with the training plan and the training schedule. Training field feedback content of the professor is immediately captured and transmitted to a main server. The ubiquitous-based training education portfolio system provides interaction learning of each student and the professor, a training history of the learner/trainee, and an appraisal history/guidance history of the professor in terms of immediate feedback (emergency measures, prescription) of the professor immediately transmitted to the user terminal, appraisal of the processor, UBT/SBT test and marking, and administrative control and, also, systemically manages the same. The ubiquitous-based training education portfolio system provides a cloud training education management service (U-portfolio) using artificial intelligence and a big data analysis technique nu using a smart device.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The utility model provides an artificial intelligence education robot. The system comprises a PC, a main control unit and a driving unit. PC machine connection main control unit, master control unit is connected with driving unit, the main control unit comprises a wireless network card, an infrared sensor circuit, a temperature measuring sensor, a CMOS camera and a main controller. The wireless network card, the infrared sensor circuit, the temperature measuring sensor and the CMOS camera are respectively connected with the main controller; the driving unit comprises an AVR single-chip microcomputer, a driving circuit, a left wheel motor, a right wheel motor and an encoder. The system is reasonable in design, convenient to use, capable of running in a tracing mode, stable in operation, capable of measuring the temperature, the distance and the light frequency of different landform markers when the landform markers are reached, and capable of sending data or images to the PC through thewireless network, and the temperature and distance data displayed on the upper computer of the PC are accurate.

applicants: IFLYTEK SOUTH CHINA ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE RES INSTITUTE GUANGZHOU CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a multimedia intelligent sound box for AI education. The utility model relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence education, in particular to an intelligentsound box which comprises a sound box body, a base is installed below the sound box body, an adjusting mechanism is installed at the joint of the sound box body and the base, a loudspeaker is arrangedon the front side of the sound box body, and a microphone is arranged on the front side of the sound box body and located below the loudspeaker. The device is scientific and reasonable in structure;convenient operation, adjusting mechanism, working with a micro-motor, the rotating shaft drives the sound box body to rotate; the angle adjustment of the sound box body is realized; accordingly, angle adjustment of the display screen is achieved, observation of a user is facilitated, the automation degree is high, practicability is high, the arranged telescopic air cylinder acts to drive the sliding frame to slide up and down along the sliding rail, stretching and retracting work of the display screen is achieved, the service life of the display screen is prolonged, meanwhile, the space occupancy rate of the display screen is reduced, and the display screen is convenient to carry by the user.

title: Online mathematics education resource classification method based on visual features
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online mathematical education resource classification method based on visual features. The method comprises the following steps: determining resource classification categories according to mathematical education resource data, analyzing the data, and extracting text features and graphic features; vectorizing the text features and the graphic features, inputting the vectorized text features and graphic features into a random forest model for training to obtain a trained model, and classifying unclassified mathematical education resources. According to the method, a machine learning method is utilized to classify a large number of online mathematical education resources, so that the labor and time costs can be effectively reduced, and the resources uploaded by theuser can be classified in real time. By means of the method, a user does not need to perform classification work on uploaded resources, a resource management system does not need to employ additionalpersonnel to perform resource classification work, and meanwhile, when more training data are obtained, the accuracy of performing classification by utilizing machine learning is higher, and the timecost is lower compared with manual classification.

title: Remote education platform based on cloud service
applicants: GUANGXI ZHONGJIAO EDUCATION INVEST GROUP CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a remote education platform based on cloud service, relates to the technical field of remote education, and solves the problem that a remote education platform aiming at Chinese farmers with a generally low education degree does not exist in the prior art. The remote education platform based on cloud service is characterized by comprising user ends, a cloud server, an education management platform and a database, wherein the user ends comprise student ends, a teacher end and a manager end; the education management platform comprises a presentation layer, an applicationlayer and a data access layer; the presentation layer comprises webpages, WeChat official accounts and mobile APP; the application layer comprises an expert interaction module, a sharing module, a study module, an exam module and a notification module; and the database comprises a teacher base, a student base, a lesson base and a question base. Based on new generation information technologies suchas big data and artificial intelligence, an intelligent rural education platform realizing interconnection, multi-stage distribution, whole region covering and cooperated service is built; an education chain, a talent chain and an industry chain are organically connected; and the local economic and society development is promoted.

title: Children personalized growth map analysis method and system
applicants: NANJING ZHILAN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECH RESEARCH INSTITUTE CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides a children personalized growth map analysis method and system, being characterized in that educational professionals compile children growth voice interactionscripts suitable for intelligent voice or image interaction equipment according to a children growth index system; by means of the artificial intelligence technology, children growth knowledge information is output in a structured manner; semantic understanding and interaction are carried out based on child voice input, so as to obtain voice interaction data of children in real time; a personalized growth and development model and a staged growth and development report are established with children individuals as units and output to parents or educators, and the cognitive development conditionof children is helped to be checked, and help is provided for family education and preschool education research; and meanwhile, a personalized customization channel is provided for parents, and the parents can set a report generation time interval and a map display form to obtain a staged child growth report.

title: Self-adaptive preschool education system and method for children
applicants: NANJING ZHILAN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECH RESEARCH INSTITUTE CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides a self-adaptive preschool education system and method for children, being characterized in that education professionals compile education content scripts suitable for intelligent voice or image interaction according to a child growth index system, and the education content scripts are displayed to a user through intelligent equipment; voice data of childrenare obtained in real time; interaction with users is carried out by utilizing age calculation, natural language understanding, children emotion analysis, children intention recognition and other artificial intelligence technologies; and an education model is established for each user by utilizing big data analysis, and self-adaptive education pushing is provided for the users in combination withuser models and current interaction data. Meanwhile, help is provided for users. A personalized customization channel is provided for a parent control terminal, and parents can adjust the education push model of children, the report generation frequency and the report display form.

title: Education system and method based on virtual reality technology and artificial intelligence technology
applicants: HUACHUANG YUNKE SHENZHEN EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an education system and method based on a virtual reality technology and an artificial intelligence technology. The education system includes a student application terminal, ateacher and student application terminal and a teacher and administrator application terminal; the student application terminal uses a VR all-in-one machine, the VR all-in-one machine is provided witha VR application client, and students learn through the VR application client; and the teacher and student application terminal is an external device, and a mobile application client is installed onthe external device, so that teachers or students can check learning situation through the APP client at any time and place, check system intelligence study suggestions or complete a preview or reviewof partial knowledge, exchange learning with other students and interact with the teachers. The virtual reality technology and the artificial intelligence technology are combined with advanced education concepts and education methods; English learning can be carried out in scenes, learning data are transparent and orderly, and learning is carried out in games; and the learning threshold is strived to be lowered, and all the students are benefited.

title: OVERHEAD REDUCTION AND RELIABILITY ENHANCEMENTS FOR DL CONTROL SIGNALING
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. The present disclosure also relates to overhead reduction and reliabilty enhancements for DL control signaling.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR GRAPHICAL VECTOR REPRESENTATION OF A RESUME
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a system, data science method and visualization for generating a graphical representation of a resume. The system may generate different graphical elements to form a holistic graphical representation of a resume in vector graphic form, and may, by using a class of machine learning algorithms, cluster related skills into skill groups and visualize the resulting skill groups as a word cloud. The system also uses a stacked bar chart to visualize education, professional experiences, and accomplishments. The system may also use a context word cloud to visualize the context and responsibilities covered by education and professional experiences. A pie and donuts chart may be used to visualize the job titles and industry sectors. Finally, skill group badges may be generated to quickly identify the top skills of a candidate thus enabling resume readers to identify a candidate match instantly.

title: Intelligent unlocking device and storage box comprising same
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent unlocking device and a storage box comprising the same. The intelligent unlocking device comprises a center control device and one or more box bodies. The centercontrol device is provided with one or more electric locks for controlling the one or more box bodies to be opened and closed. Each electric lock is provided with a first keyword tag. The center control device is further provides an AI chip, a central processing unit, a display screen, a speed recognition device, a loudspeaker, a microphone, a proximity switch, a lock control panel, a communication module and a power supply module. The AI chip transmits data to the central processing unit. The central processing unit controls the lock control panel. The lock control panel controls the electric locks to be opened and closed. The microphone is used for collecting sounds. The proximity switch can arouse the central processing unit, the AI chip and the display screen through the sounds to conduct interaction. The speed recognition device recognizes speeches collected by the microphone and stores second keyword tags in the speeches. The second keyword tags are transmitted to the central processing unit. The central processing unit matches the second keyword tags with the first keyword tags on the electric locks. The intelligent unlocking device has the advantages of being low in cost,capable of reducing the publicity cost and education cost and also capable of reducing energy consumption of an intelligent garbage can and prolonging the service life of the intelligent garbage can.

title: Feature discrimination and information recommendation system for unstructured information
applicants: SHANGHAI FUDIAN INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an algorithm framework based on a machine learning technology. The algorithm framework is realized in a software form. Aiming at extraction, integration, discrimination and association of unstructured data, a machine learning modeling technology is taken as a technical basis, and the method is constructed in a unique innovative form in the aspect of model design and can be used for carrying out association degree analysis on unstructured data entities to realize feature discrimination and information recommendation functions. The technology can be widely applied to various complex information recommendation scenes in an intelligent commercial application environment and academic information recommendation scenes in cultural education application. Particularly, feature discrimination is carried out on massive information which has a high-dimensional data feature set and takes unstructured data features as a main feature, and information association is formed.

title: MACHINE LEARNING BASED PACKET SERVICE CLASSIFICATION METHODS FOR EXPERIENCE-CENTRIC CELLULAR SCHEDULING
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. And methods and apparatus for classifying a traffic packet service of a traffic flow to a client device, a state and/or video resolution of a streaming video player in a client device. The apparatus includes a memory, and a communication interface configured to obtain TCP/IP or UDP /IP headers of packets to a client device, at least one processor operably connected to the memory, the at least one processor configured to detect a start of a traffic flow, and buffer a first number of packets for the traffic flow, extract features from UDP/IP or TCP/IP headers of a second number of packets belonging to the detected traffic flow, and obtain a flow service classifier for classifying a service type of the traffic flow, and classify the service type of the traffic flow by applying the extracted features to the flow service classifier.

title: Owl face recognition early warning system
applicants: NANJING FABLE SMART TRANSP TECHNOLOGY CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an owl face recognition early warning system. The owl face recognition early warning system comprises an owl face recognition early warning system micro host. Wherein the face image acquisition module, the power supply module, the owl face recognition early warning system micro-host, the communication bus, the liquid crystal display screen, the control module, the earlywarning module and the voice broadcast module are connected with the owl face recognition early warning system micro-host. The system is simple in structure, and based on perfect construction personnel identity information, real-time personnel face image data acquisition and identification are carried out on a construction site through a special image acquisition terminal to detect whether personnel in the site carry out entry registration and entry education according to requirements or not; when the suspicious personnel, the unregistered personnel and the uneducated personnel enter the site, the construction site can be pre-awakened through voice broadcast, and early warning information is pushed to the safety personnel; when construction site personnel need to be searched, the personnel AI search automatically searches and positions the personnel, and the condition of the personnel on site is mastered in an omnibearing manner.

title: Video acquisition and analysis system and method for realizing cognitive dysfunction screening function by simulating facial expressions through videos
applicants: SHANGHAI MENTAL HEALTH CENTER SHANGHAI PSYCHOLOGICAL COUNSELING AND TRAINING CENTER
abstract_text: The invention relates to a video acquisition and analysis system for realizing a cognitive dysfunction screening function by simulating facial expressions through videos. The system includes a self-evaluation screening module for setting a stimulus source for testing through images or videos, and encrypting and transmitting data; and a cloud analysis and evaluation module for transmitting the acquired image data to a trained deep learning model for analysis and diagnosis, and feeding back a diagnosis result in real time. The invention also relates to a video acquisition and analysis method forrealizing a cognitive dysfunction screening function by simulating facial expressions through videos. The video acquisition and analysis system and method for realizing the cognitive dysfunction screening function by simulating facial expressions through video scan perform objective assessment before professional diagnosis and treatment, are intelligent and efficient, save the medical treatment time of a patient, provide convenience for those who cannot go to a medical organization for various reasons, reduce the burden of medical care, the burden of caregivers and socioeconomic costs, overcome the limitations of illiteracy and low education levels, and can more accurately screen the cognitive dysfunction in the future.

title: Sensor module
applicants: NANJING I CREATE INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a sensor module, and belongs to the field of sensors. The sensor module comprises a sensor body; a single chip is accessed behind the sensor body; the sensor module is designedinto an integrated sensor module; and measurement information of the sensor is converted into corresponding PWM information for output through the single chip. The output uniformity of the sensor module is realized, so that the children doe not need to write specific programs in the learning process and the popularization of the artificial intelligence education in the junior grade stage is facilitated.

title: Machine system for identifying infectious diseases based on artificial intelligence
applicants: JINAN MUNICIPAL CENTER FOR DISEASE CONTROL & PREVENTION
abstract_text: The invention discloses a machine system for identifying infectious diseases based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises: a preliminary diagnosis module which is configured to output a preliminary judgment result of whether a testee is infected with an infectious disease or not based on a first convolutional neural network and an image acquisition result; and an accurate diagnosis module which is configured to output a final judgment result of whether the testee is infected with the infectious disease or not based on a second convolutional neural network, body temperature detectionresult, voice recognition result and the character recognition result. The system liberates the dependence of the infectious disease discovery and diagnosis process on professional medical institutions and clinicians, does not need the software and hardware construction cost of the medical institutions and the education and training cost of the clinicians, can achieve the target only through one artificial intelligence machine, achieves the one-time investment, and greatly reduces the resource requirements and execution cost of infectious disease recognition.

title: Intelligent first-aid kit management system and method based on Internet of Things
abstract_text: The invention relates to an intelligent first-aid kit management system and method based on the Internet of Things. The system is composed of a local intelligent first-aid kit entity, a local system control module, a cloud platform maintenance terminal and a user terminal. Data is detected through a local system control module configured for the local intelligent first-aid kit and sent to the cloud platform maintenance terminal. An artificial intelligence algorithm is used to realize an optimal drug scheduling path and planning, and daily demands of various drugs and optimal geographical position deployment of the intelligent first-aid case in the area are predicted. The user side provides the functions of remotely checking the real-time medicine remaining amount, the medicine taking two-dimensional code, the video and the suit specification of the intelligent first-aid kit for the user so as to assist and popularize medical knowledge, and meanwhile the user can obtain medicine throughthe IC card and the medicine taking two-dimensional code. The whole set of system can enable background maintenance personnel to perform remote monitoring more conveniently and quickly and provide maintenance directivity, so that maintenance work becomes simpler and more efficient, and users can use the system more conveniently. The system has high popularization and education significance and can be widely applied.

title: METHOD FOR PROVIDING AI BASED REWARDSTYLE EDUCATION SERVICE PLAYING ON LOCKED SCREEN
abstract_text: Provided is a method of providing a reward type learning service driven by an artificial intelligence (AI)-based lock screen. According to the present invention, the method comprises the steps of: selecting one of at least one educational content provided by a learning service providing server; setting the selected educational content to be output on a lock screen of a user terminal; outputting a page of the one of the at least one of educational content when a screen release event occurs after screen lock of the user terminal is executed; receiving and outputting an advertisement received from the learning service providing server until a response to the output page is inputted; and unlocking the lock screen when the response is inputted.

title: Multi-dimensional visual multi-source heterogeneous data multi-layer DRNN deep fusion method
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence education, and particularly relates to a multi-dimensional visual multi-source heterogeneous data multi-layer DRNN deep fusion method. Themethod comprises the following steps: 1, establishing a DRNN neural network; inputting the multi-source heterogeneous data into a DRNN neural network to form a DRNN training template; 3, establishingforward output of a single-layer neuron individual of the DRNN network; wherein the single-layer network is used as an activated fusion function; 4, establishing weight reconstruction and correctionof the DRNN network; wherein the correction exists as a fusion function; and step 5, obtaining feature output through data feature fusion in a data fusion layer of the DRNN. The invention provides a fusion architecture, which can perform feature level fusion for different multi-source heterogeneous data.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR CHANNEL STATE INFORMATION (CSI) ACQUISITION WITH DL AND UL REFERENCE SIGNALS
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system witha technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. Methods and apparatuses for channel state information (CSI) acquisitionwith downlink (DL) and uplink (UL) reference signals (RSs). A UE apparatus includes a transceiver and a processor operably connected to the transceiver. The transceiver is configured to receive (i) configuration information for a CSI-RS and a sounding reference signal (SRS) and (ii) downlink control information (DCI) that includes a DCI field for an aperiodic SRS transmission request. The processor is configured to decode the configuration information and the DCI with the aperiodic SRS transmission request. The transceiver is further configured to receive the CSI-RS and transmit the SRS. The SRS corresponds to a higher-layer configured SRS resource and a number of configured SRS resources is more than one.

title: School-based training quality evaluation platform, system and method based on data deep analysis
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a school-based training quality evaluation platform, system and method based on data deep analysis, and relates to the technical field of education systems. The platform comprises a data management unit, a data processing unit and a data evaluation unit. The system comprises a school terminal, a regional administrator terminal and the above platform, and the method comprises the following steps: obtaining school-based training process data; storing the school-based training process data; screening field data of the school-based training process data; performing analysis and deep learning on the field data to generate analysis data and simulation data respectively; and integrating the analysis data and the simulation data to generate an evaluation report. The beneficial effects of the method are that training target of school-based training is clearer, and the method can further explore the excellent school-based training content and mode through the evaluation report, and improves the training efficiency of school-based training.

title: Examination paper grading device based on artificial intelligence for education industry
applicants: SHENZHEN JUNDATONG OFFICE INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an examination paper grading device based on the artificial intelligence for the education industry. The examination paper grading device based on the artificial intelligencefor the education industry comprises a base, a support plate, a top plate, a conveyor belt, a host, a display screen, an adjusting mechanism, a flat plate and a grading mechanism, wherein the adjusting mechanism comprises a horizontal moving plate, a lifting assembly, a lifting plate and a first motor; the grading mechanism comprises a camera, a grading assembly and two control assembly; each control assembly comprises a moving plate, a tiling unit, two moving units and two adsorption units; and each tiling unit comprises a roller, a rolling shaft and two first air cylinders. According to theexamination paper grading device based on the artificial intelligence for the education industry, through the grading mechanism, after examination paper is tiled and folds are eliminated, an image isacquired, so that the accuracy in grading the examination paper is improved; and in addition, through the conveyor belt and the adjusting mechanism, after the examination paper on the top part of an examination paper stack is conveniently graded one by one by the device, the graded examination paper and the examination paper to be graded are separated, so that an automatic batch grading function is realized, the workloads of teachers are relieved, and the practicability of the device is improved.

title: Real-time anti-cheating detection and early warning method for online education
applicants: SHENZHEN UOOC ONLINE EDUCATION CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a real-time anti-cheating detection and early warning method for online education, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, starting an anti-cheating system, and setting parameters; S2, obtaining decoded real-time feature data and offline feature data; S3, establishing a knowledge base and a machine learning model; S4, carrying out comprehensive estimation and anomaly detection, and acquiring and storing cheating data; S5, judging whether the cheating data exceeds a preset cheating data threshold value or not; S6, judging whether the number of the early warning reminding information of the current abnormal examinee terminal reaches a preset number threshold value or not; and S7, carrying out periodic analysis to obtain an analysis result. The problems that in the prior art, manual processing is relied on, the influence range and number of cheating cannot be directly given, and immobilizationof an anti-cheating system cannot be achieved are solved.

title: Method and apparatus for evaluating spoken language levels, storage medium, and electronic device
applicants: BEIJING DA MI TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a method and an apparatus for evaluating spoken language levels, a storage medium, and an electronic device, and belongs to the field of online education. Onone hand, the spoken language levels of voice data to be evaluated are evaluated by using a machine learning model in the method and apparatus provided by the invention, thereby avoiding inaccurate situations caused by manual evaluation of the spoken language levels; and on the other hand, the spoken language levels of users are evaluated by using a unified test text in the method and apparatus provided by the embodiment of the invention, thereby avoiding the problem of inaccurate evaluation results caused by differences in the test texts.

title: Method for providing advertisement using video-type avatar and computer-readable recording medium with providing program of the same
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a system for providing content for infant phoenix-based education and a method thereof which increase a learning effect of infants and a computer-readable recording medium for recording a content providing program for infant phoenix-based education. According to the present invention, the system comprises an infant smart device (100), a network (200), a phoenix-based educational content providing server (300), a big data server (400), and an AI server (500).

title: INTERACTIVE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CONTROLLED EDUCATION SYSTEM
Artificial intelligence education device
abstract_text: The utility model provides an artificial intelligence education device. The device comprises a workbench and a fixed sliding rod, fixed seats are fixedly arranged at the bottoms of the two ends of thefixed sliding rod; the two ends of the fixed sliding rod are fixedly installed at the top of the workbench through fixing bases. Sliding grooves are formed in the top and the bottom of the fixed sliding rod. A rectangular sleeve seat I, a rectangular sleeve seat II and a rectangular sleeve seat III are sequentially arranged on the fixed sliding rod from left to right in a sleeving manner; spherical grooves are formed in the inner side walls of the tops and the bottoms of the rectangular sleeve seat I, the rectangular sleeve seat II and the rectangular sleeve seat III; balls are installed in the spherical grooves. The part, located outside the spherical groove, of the ball is located in the sliding groove, a projection plate is fixedly installed at the top of the first rectangular sleeve base, a containing base is fixedly installed at the top of the second rectangular sleeve base, a containing groove is formed in the containing base, and the artificial intelligence education device isreasonable in design, diversified in function, convenient to use and high in stability.

title: Ubiquitous-based training education portfolio system to provide user with UBT test and SBT test for managing learning activities and method thereof
abstract_text: Disclosed are a ubiquitous-based training education portfolio system for providing a UBT/SBT test and a method thereof. The system provides a healthcare education theory, a practice information record, an instructor assessment, a learning history management for each learner/trainee of UBT/SBT test and grading, a P2P communication using a messenger between an instructor and a learner/trainee, and practice management, performance evaluation scores, and indexes of individual students on a U-portfolio system during a training education through wired/wireless communication using a PC, a smartphone, and a tablet PC, opens training sessions at a healthcare site or a training site, announces a training schedule and training participants, allows the instructor in charge of training to underline a field training record created by the learner/trainee or leave feedback through text, picture, photo, audio recording, and video recording by using the user terminal in accordance with the training schedule, allows field training feedback to be immediately captured and transmitted to a main server, and provides instructor′s immediate feedback (first aid, prescription) transmitted immediately to the user terminal, evaluation of the instructor, UBT/SBT test and grading of the U-portfolio system linked to a learning management system (uLMS) using a sequential probability ratio verification method (SPRT), interactional learning between students and instructors, training history of the learner/trainee, and instructor′s evaluation history and guidance history. The present invention provides a cloud training education management service (U-Portfolio) using artificial intelligence and big data analysis technology using a smart device.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR RESOUCE ALLOCATION IN WIRELESS COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a communication method for fusing a 5G communication system for supporting a higher data transmission rate than a 4G system with a technology for the internet of things (IoT), and a system thereof. The present invention may be applied to intelligent services (for example, smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car or connected car, health care, digital education, retail, security- and safety- related services, etc.) based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology. According to the present invention, a method for allocating transmission resources including a region for an uplink (IL) and a region for a downlink (DL) comprises: a process of identifying a ratio of the region for a downlink to the region for an uplink; a process of using at least one among a usage rate of the transmission resources and electric field property information to change the ratio of the region for a downlink to the region for an uplink; and a process of allocating the region for an uplink and the region for a downlink in accordance with the changed ratio of the region for a downlink to the region for an uplink.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR RESOUCE ALLOCATION IN WIRELESS COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communications technique for converging a 5G communications system for supporting a higher data transmission rate after a 4G system with IoT technology, and to a system thereof. The present disclosure can be applied to intelligent services (for example, smart home, a smart building, a smart city, a smart car or a connected car, health care, digital education, retail business, security and safety related service, etc.) based on 5G communications technology and IoT related technology. A method for allocating a time resource of a downlink (DL) physical control channel comprises the following steps of: scheduling transmission of DL data in a first time resource; and scheduling transmission of uplink (UL) data in a second time resource starting after the end of the first time resource, wherein the end point of the first time resource is changed based on an amount of the DL data and can be equal to or less than a first maximum value.

title: INTERACTIVE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CONTROLLED EDUCATION SYSTEM.
abstract_text: An interactive artificial intelligence controlled education system, characterized in that it consists of a cartoon character (1), a skeleton (2), a model (3), a child (4), an artificial intelligence (5), a scenario (6), a speech detection (7), a movement detection (8) and a device (9) such as computer, tablet, telephone, etc. providing education fitted with microphone, camera and loudspeaker allowing acting of cartoon characters according to scenarios provided to them depending on detection of speeches and movements of children with artificial intelligence as a support for children with autism, attention deficit, hyperactivity disorder, development retardation or psychological and neurological problems requiring special support for normal development.

title: AI artificial intelligence auxiliary communication technology
abstract_text: The invention relates to an AI artificial intelligence auxiliary communication technology. The invention aims to overcome the defects of the existing instant messaging and network social application,help the user to improve the communication skill and quality, and communicate by using proper language and attitude. According to the invention, software and hardware systems of existing electronic computing and intelligent mobile equipment are fully utilized, background data and language voice data of a user are collected, and natural language processing, AI artificial intelligence and big data technologies are utilized for analysis to obtain emotional emotion data of the user. According to theories and copywriting of language experts, psychology experts, education experts and interpersonal relationship experts, automatic compiling and manual arrangement are carried out, a reply database is constructed, and one or more reply schemes are provided for users for selection according to different communication themes and emotions. The communication database is an open database, and can be continuously perfected according to the self-reply of the user in the use process.

title: Artificial intelligence online education mobile terminal
applicants: GANSU PUGONGYING INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an online education mobile terminal based on artificial intelligence. The device comprises a machine body, a supporting plate, a cooling liquid tank and an inner shell; a supporting plate is hinged to the top end of the machine body through a rotating shaft; a display screen is mounted on the upper surface of the supporting plate; limiting blocks are evenly arranged atthe top end of the back face of the supporting plate. A groove is formed in the machine body on one side of the supporting plate; a supporting rod is hinged to the interior of the groove; an inner shell is arranged in the machine body, a heat dissipation air cavity is formed between the inner shell and the inner wall of the machine body, heat dissipation fins are welded to the outer side wall of the inner shell at equal intervals, through holes are formed in the heat dissipation fins, meanwhile, flow guide plates are evenly arranged on the inner side wall of the machine body, and the heat dissipation fins and the flow guide plates are arranged alternately. Through double cooling of water cooling and air cooling, the cooling effect of the equipment is greatly improved, accumulation of heatused for a long time is avoided, the service life of the equipment is prolonged, and the safety of the equipment is improved.

title: APPARATUS AND METHOD OF TRANSMITTING AND RECEIVING MESSAGE 3 PROTOCOL DATA UNIT
abstract_text: A communication method and system for converging a fifth generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a fourth generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of things (IoT) are provided. The communication method and system may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. A method of a terminal for performing a random access procedure in a wireless communication system is provided. A method includes identifying whether physical random access channel (PRACH) occasions are configured for an active uplink (UL) bandwidth part (BWP) of a serving cell; based on the PRACH occasions not being configured for the active UL BWP and the serving cell being a special cell (SpCell), switching an active downlink (DL) BWP of the SpCell; and performing the random access procedure on the active DL BWP of the SpCell and the active UL BWP of the serving cell. A method by a terminal for transmitting a message 3 (Msg3) in a random access procedure is provided. In addition, a method by a terminal for system information (SI) request is provided.

title: Artificial intelligence model whole process automation system
applicants: SHANGHAI TULING NEW ENERGY TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence model whole-process automation system which is used for artificial intelligence image identification, aims at an instrument dial and has the function of automatically generating a data set so as to realize intelligent identification of dial data. The system comprises a scale module, a transmission module, a scale feedback module and an image acquisition module, wherein the transmission module is connected with the scale module and the scale feedback module, values indicated by the scale module and values detected by the scale feedback modulecan establish a one-to-one correspondence relationship, the image acquisition module is used for obtaining images of the scale module, and values detected by the scale feedback module are used for marking the images of the scale module. The system is used for whole-process training education of artificial intelligence, identification of multiple instrument and meter dials of safety production enterprises and automatic integrated management of monitoring data.

title: Method for recommending a customized curriculum and software education system by using the method
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a user-customized SW educational system. A server of the user-customized SW educational system includes a curriculum recommendation unit including a curriculum list pre-stored in a database and detecting and recommending a curriculum most suitable for a user by using machine learning on the basis of user collection information collected for a user and the curriculum list. The curriculum recommendation unit includes: an attribute data extraction module for extracting text and word attribute data from collected information on a user provided by a user information collection unit; a user interest tendency analysis module for extracting a tendency set distribution and a keyword distribution for the user using the text and word attribute data; a user curriculum matching module for detecting a correlation distribution of three factors of a user tendency set, a keyword, and a curriculum for the user; a curriculum recommendation module for extracting user characteristics and curriculum cluster data by performing learning on the basis of reliability data and the curriculum list; and a post-processing module for selecting and recommending a curriculum the most suitable for the user by performing learning by using the user characteristics and the curriculum cluster data. Therefore, a curriculum for a software education, which is the most suitable for a user, is recommended to be provided.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR ASSIGNING RESOURCES IN WIRELESS COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication technique for converging a 5G communication system for supporting a higher data transfer rate beyond a 4G system with IoT technology, and a system therefor. The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services (for example, smart homes, smart buildings, smart cities, smart cars or connected cars, health care, digital education, retail business, security and safety-related services, etc.) on the basis of 5G communication technology and IoT-related technology. The present disclosure relates to a method for assigning transmission resources including an uplink (UL)-dedicated region and a downlink (DL)-dedicated region, the method comprising: a step for identifying a ratio of the DL-dedicated region to the UL-dedicated region; a step for changing the ratio of the DL-dedicated region to the UL-dedicated region by using at least one of a utilization rate and electric field characteristic information of the transmission resources; and a step for assigning the UL-dedicated region and the DL-dedicated region according to the changed ratio of the DL-dedicated region to the UL-dedicated region.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR ASSIGNING RESOURCES IN WIRELESS COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication technique for converging a 5G communication system for supporting a higher data transfer rate beyond a 4G system with IoT technology, and a system therefor. The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services (for example, smart homes, smart buildings, smart cities, smart cars or connected cars, health care, digital education, retail business, security and safety-related services, etc.) on the basis of 5G communication technology and IoT-related technology. The present disclosure relates to a method for assigning transmission resources including an uplink (UL)-dedicated region and a downlink (DL)-dedicated region, the method comprising: a step for identifying a ratio of the DL-dedicated region to the UL-dedicated region; a step for changing the ratio of the DL-dedicated region to the UL-dedicated region by using at least one of a utilization rate and electric field characteristic information of the transmission resources; and a step for assigning the UL-dedicated region and the DL-dedicated region according to the changed ratio of the DL-dedicated region to the UL-dedicated region.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot
applicants: HEILONGJIANG ZHONGKE NUOSHENG AUTOMATION EQUIPMENT DEV CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of intelligent education robots, in particular to an artificial intelligence education robot. The artificial intelligence education robot comprises a head, a camera,a light-supplement lamp, an array microphone, loudspeakers, a high-resolution touch screen, a human body pyroelectric sensor, an infrared receiving sensor, an obstacle avoidance sensor, mechanical arms and a machine base; the camera, the light-supplement lamp and the high-resolution touch screen are mounted on the front face of the head in an embedded mode; the array microphone is mounted over the head in an embedded mode; the loudspeakers are mounted on the left side and the right side of the head in an embedded mode; and the human body pyroelectric sensor, the infrared receiving sensor andthe obstacle avoidance sensor are embedded into a body, and the mechanical arms are mounted on the left side and the right side of the body. The artificial intelligence education robot has functions in intelligent voice interaction, the functions are rich and diversified, and include educational curriculum resources, entertainment interaction, voice chat for encyclopedia ask, remote video call andthe like, and a user can select corresponding function items through voice or interface operation.

title: Artificial intelligence education supervision equipment
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence education supervision device. Wall surface body, the bottom of the wall body is fixedly connected with a U-shaped frame. The back surface of the inner wall of the U-shaped frame is fixedly connected with a motor through a connecting block; one end of an output shaft of the motor is fixedly connected with a first belt wheel; a rotating rod is rotationally connected between the two sides of the inner wall of the U-shaped frame through a bearing; the surface of the rotating rod is fixedly connected with a second belt wheel, the surface of the second belt wheel is in transmission connection with the surface of the first belt wheel through a belt, and worm sleeves are fixedly connected to the two sides of the surface of the rotating rod. According to the artificial intelligence education supervision equipment, dust removal work can be carried out on the surface of the camera body, the problems that a monitoring image is not clear and subsequent use is influenced due to dust accumulation are avoided, time and labor are saved, manual dust removal work is not needed, and labor force is reduced.

title: Deep learning autonomous operation method
applicants: HEFEI ALATIN INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a deep learning autonomous operation method. The method comprises the following steps: obtaining an original corpus text; basic semantic segmentation; named entity identification and entity relationship extraction; establishing a basic knowledge graph; establishing an extended knowledge graph; designing a training model and generating training data and a test data set; generating a prediction model. According to the method, the long text information can be automatically stored. Meanwhile, due to the fact that the long text learning and the application program are of anasynchronous structure, the learning process does not affect operation of the application program, independent industry knowledge bases can be formed for different industries, and the related industries comprise the financial industry, the insurance industry, the education industry, the medical industry, the legal industry, the tourism industry, the security industry and the customer service industry.

title: Artificial intelligence autonomous building system
abstract_text: The present invention describes an autonomous building system capable of operating based on processing and analysis of collected data by means of Artificial Intelligence algorithms. The data can be gathered from within the system and/or from external networks. The autonomous building system will assist its users in every tasks from enhanced security to energy savings, from health monitoring and data collection to education, from financial assistance to social activities. In particular the described autonomous building is capable of making autonomous decisions and online purchases getting funds out of a dedicated financial account. The autonomous building may become the target of contextual advertising to promote products and/or services.

title: AI education projection equipment for smart campus
abstract_text: The utility model discloses AI education projection equipment for a smart campus. The device comprises a fixed shell, a fixed base and a transparent protective cover, an electric push rod is arrangedabove the fixed base; the fixed shell is arranged above the electric push rods, an angle sensor is arranged between the electric push rods, a distance sensor is arranged on the side face of the anglesensor, a power line is arranged on the side face of the fixed shell, a circuit board is arranged in the fixed shell, and a control chip is arranged above the circuit board.

title: Programmable artificial intelligence robot for education
applicants: JIAXING MUXING ROBOT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a programmable artificial intelligence robot for education. The robot comprises a motion module, a navigation module, a voice module, a vision module, a manipulator module anda main control unit for providing programs to the modules. The main control unit is electrically connected with the motion module, the navigation module, the voice module, the vision module and the manipulator module, the main control unit comprises a multi-point touch screen and a wireless keyboard mouse, the motion module comprises a chassis, a roller is rotatably connected to the chassis, the roller is provided with a direct current motor, and the direct current motor is provided with a first encoder. The robot further comprises a first power source. The motion module further includes a first infrared sensor, a touch sensor, an anti-drop sensor and a gyroscope. The navigation module includes a second infrared sensor, an infrared emitter, a color sensor, a first central processing moduleand a second power source. The robot has the characteristics of being multipurpose, easy to master and easy to learn and popularize, can realize independent programming, various in simulation actionsand flexible to use.

title: Artificial intelligence education programming robot
applicants: JIANGSU KEDOU EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence education programming robot. The artificial intelligence education programming robot is of a sitting human-shaped structure, and comprises a robot body as a human-shaped structure body part, a display part serving as a human-shaped structure head, and a bottom supporting part serving as a human-shaped structure leg part; and a display screen serving as a human-shaped structure face part is arranged on the display part, and a horizontally-arranged operation part is mounted on the robot body. The artificial intelligence education programming robot has the beneficial effects that the display screen cooperates with the visual operation part, thus students can carry out learning and operation practices of robot introduction, robot programming,graphical programming, code programming and artificial intelligence courses conveniently, and the students at different age grades can learn programming skills and artificial intelligence knowledge onthe zero basis conveniently; and through combination of programming learning and practical operation, practical programming operation practices can be carried out directly on the robot while programming learning is carried out, and thus learning can be more efficient.

title: SMART EDUCATION SYSTEM FOR SOFTWARE EXPERT PRACTICAL AFFAIRS EDUCATION AND ESTIMATION AND METHOD THEREOF
abstract_text: Disclosed are a smart education system and method for software expert job training and evaluation. When a software education service is provided, authoring tools for the creation and authoring of educational content including video, voice, image, and text content are developed based on a national competency standard (NCS)-based learning model, and source codes are provided. E-books (digital textbooks) including multimedia video lectures for various types of theoretical lectures from basic to advanced learning and expert levels, ICT information technology and the syntax of programming languages, and source codes and correct answers for each level (beginner/intermediate/advanced/expert levels) are provided to user terminals of trainees. Software source code coding and compile errors or linked errors for individual trainees are corrected and checked. By using machine learning engines and learning model algorithms of machine learning, different customized repetitive learning services are provided according to individual learning states. UX content browsers displaying educational content by learner levels are provided. Interactive e-learning services for sending and receiving messages, sending and receiving source code files and providing video chat between instructors and the trainees are provided. The E-books (digital textbooks) and educational content are registered in a smart education server in advance through the Internet. PCs and tablet PCs provide software expert job training and evaluation services. The present invention can effectively train and evaluate a software expert.

title: Formability optimization system and method for cloud data education and training process
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of big data, and relates to a formability optimization system and method for a cloud data education and training process. The formability optimization system for the cloud data education and training process comprises a student feedback information acquisition module, a learning intention judgment module, a learning effect judgment module, a learning condition judgment module, an intelligent gateway A, a data processor, a learning score input module, an intelligent gateway B, a database and a machine learning module. Through the mutual communicationbetween the education terminal and the cloud server, the system can quickly reach the optimal state by utilizing the big data technology and machine learning, and the learning states of students aredivided into willingness, conditions and effects, and the hierarchical analysis enables the system evaluation to be more objective. During the course improvement process of the machine learning module, the improved partitioning feature matching algorithm is adopted to match the willingness degrees of the students with the courses, so that the correct matching of feature points can be well achieved, the use value is very high, and the matching precision and the calculation speed are improved.

title: Portable AI voice interaction control system
applicants: NANJING YATAI JIAYUAN SMART SPACE CONSTRUCTION CO LTD
abstract_text: A portable AI voice interaction control system is mainly composed of an AI controller, an AI control host, an AI cloud end and display end equipment (a projector, a display screen, a splicing screen,an LED screen, VR glasses and the like). The AI controller mainly realizes voice command recognition and voice broadcast functions, is connected with a WIFI hotspot through a WIFI function, and is connected with an AI cloud through the WIFI hotspot. According to the utility model, a wireless voice intelligent interaction function is realized; real-time control of voice and real-time broadcasting of voice content can be realized. The system can be applied to the fields of public entertainment venues, science and technology exhibition halls, education, medical treatment, smart cities, smart automobiles and the like. A user can control display end equipment such as a projector, a display screen, a splicing screen, an LED screen and VR glasses to play content through a voice command, the interaction feeling and experience feeling are enhanced through voice interaction control, and the system can be transformed into different scenes according to actual application.

title: Artificial intelligence online education mobile terminal
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence online education mobile terminal. The artificial intelligence online education mobile terminal comprises a machine body, a supporting plate, a cooling liquid tank and an inner shell; a supporting plate is hinged to the top end of the machine body through a rotating shaft; a display screen is mounted on the upper surface of the supporting plate; limiting blocks are uniformly arranged at the top end of the back surface of the supporting plate; a groove is formed in the machine body on one side of the supporting plate; a supporting rod is hingedto the interior of the groove; an inner shell is arranged in the machine body, a heat dissipation air cavity is formed between the inner shell and the inner wall of the machine body, heat dissipationfins are welded to the outer side wall of the inner shell at equal intervals, through holes are formed in the heat dissipation fins, flow guide plates are evenly arranged on the inner side wall of themachine body, and the heat dissipation fins and the flow guide plates are arranged alternately. Through double cooling of water cooling and air cooling, the cooling effect of the equipment is greatlyimproved, accumulation of heat used for a long time is avoided, the service life of the equipment is prolonged, and the safety of the equipment is improved.

title: Intelligent gymnastics training system
applicants: ZHEJIANG JINGQUAN INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent gymnastics training system. The intelligent gymnastics training system includes gymnastics training apparatus, a terminal and a server connected by communication, and the terminal includes a sensor, somatosensory collection equipment, a movement camera, an intelligent decision module, and a communication module; the senior s used for collecting user movementdata; the somatosensory collection device senses physical sign data of a user, and the terminal is used for sending the physical sign data to the server; the movement camera is used for recording or taking pictures of user training image information during training, and the terminal sends the training image information to the server; the intelligent decision module is used for performing aggregation of the user movement data and physical sign data and calculating the amount of exercise and the body index of the user through an algorithm, and through an artificial intelligence algorithm, the health index and a health advice of the user are calculated; and the communication module is used for communicating with a cloud end server in a data mode and uploading the collected user data. Basic gymnastics education of children achieves digitization, informatization, and intelligence, and management of student information and grades of a school is convenient.

title: Multi-terminal long-distance education and training system based on AI video analysis
applicants: NANJING MUZE INFORMATION SCIENCE & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a multi-terminal long-distance education and training system based on AI video analysis. The multi-terminal long-distance education and training system includes three or more terminals, clients, cloud servers, teacher ends and management ends, the clients are installed on intelligent terminals with camera functions, so that the clients can monitor the state of customers inthe whole process of watching video through an artificial intelligence video analysis method, objective analysis is realized, and thus personalized learning advice is provided for the customers.

title: Efficient-heat-dissipating artificial intelligence online education terminal
applicants: GANSU PUGONGYING INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an efficient-heat-dissipating artificial intelligence online education terminal. The terminal comprises a placement platform, lateral baffles, a top cover, a liquid crystal display screen and control panels, the top cover is arranged above the placement platform, the lateral baffles are arranged on the two sides of the bottom of the top cover, and a back baffle is arrangedat one end of the bottom of the top cover; the bottom of the back baffle is fixedly connected with the top of the placement platform, the liquid crystal display screen is arranged below the top cover,and control panels are arranged on the outer walls of one sides of the lateral baffles; the output ends of PLCs in the control panels are electrically connected with the input end of the liquid crystal display screen, wireless transmitters are arranged on the portions, above the control panels, of the outer side walls of the lateral baffles, and the input ends of the wireless transmitters are electrically connected with the output ends of the PLCs in the control panels. According to the efficient-heat-dissipating artificial intelligence online education terminal, the service life of the education terminal is prolonged, the function of protecting the eyesight of the eyes is achieved during use of the education terminal, and the use convenience of the education terminal is improved.

title: AI algorithm-based language structure reading method in adaptive learning
applicants: SHANGHAI YIXUE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI algorithm-based language structure reading method in adaptive learning. The structure reading method of the invention can guide students to grasp the overall framework ofa text and facilitates to promote the whole cognition of the text for students. The method is applied to an adaptive system. Through a ''testing-learning-training'' learning process, a personalized question push route is formed to effectively help students to promote their reading ability and learning efficiency. In each stage of process, test questions which best fit with learning ability and knowledge point mastery level of a student are pushed to achieve the learning effects of consolidation and improvement and leak filling. From the examination-oriented perspective, by applying the structure reading method to the adaptive system and through the personalized learning, students' mastery degree of test questions about paragraph function and the main idea of a text (writing intention) canbe promoted. From the perspective of learning habit formation, the structure reading method is applicable to various literary forms including practical style and literary style, and the education ofreading method benefits students all their life.

title: Industrial site safety management system based on artificial intelligence using real-time location tracking and Geographic Information System and method thereof
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an industrial site safety management system based on an artificial intelligence using real-time location tracking and GIS, and an industrial site safety management method thereof, which are to establish an autonomous environment and a safety health administration through a comprehensive work management and automation for integrally managing information on environment, health and safety fields distributed in an industrial site, in a computing information system, and to build an advanced environment safety management system therethrough. Therefore, an accident management system is established by integrated management of a safety management DB, thereby providing effects of standardizing the sharing of safety information and accident cases and performing integrated safety education. In addition, the safety management level for working of collaborators and external accessors is improved by utilizing safety management and safety education history management. Also, an effect of performing systematic management is provided by sharing plan establishment for a facility safety inspection and facility information through history management such as licensing facility, safety protection gear inventory management, and provision history management for each individual.

title: Online education terminal for floor-standing artificial intelligence
applicants: GANSU PUGONGYING INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online education terminal for floor-standing artificial intelligence. The terminal comprises a hinge member, a bottom plate and a device body, four corners of the top end ofthe bottom plate are provided with second connecting rods, the top ends of the second connecting rods are fixedly connected with first connecting rods through the hinge member, both sides of a movingrod are provided with spiral blocks, both ends of the end of a blackboard are provided with sliding blocks, one end of the device body and both ends of a controller outside the sliding blocks are provided with sliding rails, and the two ends of a liquid cooling block are fixedly connected with electrohydraulic micropumps through a second connecting pipe. The sliding blocks are arranged at both ends of one end of the blackboard, the sliding rails are arranged at one end of the device body and the both ends of the controller outside the sliding blocks, the blackboard is moved to the left and right and has a protection door function on the controller after closed, and the terminal is easy to use and promote.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR MULTIPLEXING CHANNEL STATE INFORMATION
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th- Generation (4G) system witha technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. Methods and apparatuses for multiplexing channel state information (CSI). A user equipment (UE) includes a transceiver configured to receive configuration information for CSI reporting. The UE further includes a processor configured to decode the configuration information and calculate a CSI according to the configuration information. The transceiver is further configured to transmit the calculated CSI on an uplink (UL) channel. The CSI includes N segments and is transmitted in one slot, where N>1. A first of the N segments includes a rank indicator (RI) and at least one other CSI parameter. A base station (BS) includes a processor configured to generate configuration information for CSI reporting. The BS further includes a transceiver configured to transmit, to a UE, the configuration information via a downlink (DL) channel; and receive, from the UE, a CSI report calculated in accordance with the configuration information on an uplink UL channel.

title: GLOBAL DIGITAL FRAMEWORK INTEGRATED TO DEVELOP ECONOMICALLY COMPETITIVE MUNICIPALITIES
abstract_text: A global digital framework integrated by methods, systems, processes, and new thinking technologies focused on the development of secure, sustainable, collaborative, intelligent, resilient, and economically competitive municipalities. The frameworks intends to provide high quality knowledge, multimedia information, and municipal/city strategies in sectors such as education, security, energy, water, health, information technologies (IT), transportation, construction, food, environment, waste, and fmance; through the use of virtual reality technologies, algorithms, personal computer technology, big-data technologies, smart-phone technology, GPS technology, artificial intelligence systems, digital videos, behavioral change technologies, augmented reality systems, and digital advisory systems among other technologies.

title: Ubiquitous-based training education portfolio system to provide users with UBT test and SBT test for managing learning activities and method thereof
abstract_text: Disclosed are a ubiquitous-based training education portfolio system providing a UBT/SBT test and a method for the same.
