The ubiquitous-based training education portfolio system providing the UBT/SBT test provides a theory, training information record, professor appraisal, learning history management by a learner/trainee of a UBT/SBT test and grading, P2P communications using a messenger between a professor and the learner/trainee, training management on an individual student on a U-portfolio system, a performance assessment score, and an index, in training education (health care education) via wired and wireless communications using a PC, a smartphone, and a tablet PC. The ubiquitous-based training education portfolio system providing the UBT/SBT test opens training by training opening in a training field or a health care field and announces a training schedule, a training plan, and the trainees. The professor who is in charge with the training freely offers feedback on field training recording paper written by the learner/trainee, using a user terminal of the professor by underlining the field training recording paper or by using a text, a picture, an image, voice recording, and video recording. Training field feedback content of the professor is immediately captured and is transmitted to a main server. A U-portfolio system is linked to a learning management system (uLMS) using immediate feedback (emergency measures, prescription) of the professor immediately transmitted to the user terminals, appraisal of the processor, and a sequential probability ratio test (SPRT). The UBT/SBT test of the U-portfolio system, interaction learning of the student and the professor, a training history of the learner/trainee, and an appraisal history/guidance history of the professor are provided. The U-portfolio uses artificial intelligence and a big data analysis technique using a smart device.

title: Ubiquitous-based training education portfolio system for managing learning activities and method thereof
abstract_text: Disclosed are a ubiquitous-based training education portfolio system and a method for the same. The ubiquitous-based training education portfolio system provides a theory, training information record, professor appraisal, learning history management by a learner/trainee of a UBT/SBT test and grading, P2P communications using a messenger between a professor and the learner/trainee, training management on an individual student on a U-portfolio system, a performance assessment score, and an index, in training education, for example, in health care education via wired and wireless communications using a PC, smartphone, and tablet PC. The ubiquitous-based training education portfolio system opens training by training opening in a training field or a health care field and announces a training schedule, a training plan, and the trainees. The professor who is in charge with the training freely offers feedback on field training recording paper written by the learner/trainee, using a user terminal of the professor by underlining the field training recording paper or by using a text, picture, image, and voice recording in accordance with the training schedule and training plan. Training field feedback content of the professor is immediately captured and transmitted to a main server. The ubiquitous-based training education portfolio system provides interaction learning of each student and the professor, a training history of the learner/trainee, and an appraisal history/guidance history of the professor in terms of immediate feedback (emergency measures, prescription) of the professor immediately transmitted to the user terminals, appraisal of the processor, UBT/SBT test and marking, and administrative control and, also, systemically manages the same. The ubiquitous-based training education portfolio system provides a U-portfolio using artificial intelligence and a big data analysis technique using a smart device.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The utility model provides an artificial intelligence education robot. The artificial intelligence education robot comprises an education robot body; the education robot body comprises a robot body and a head. Travelling wheels are arranged at the bottom of the machine body. The machine body and the head part are of an integrated structure; the robot further comprises an auxiliary obstacle crossing device. The auxiliary obstacle crossing device comprises containing cavities formed in the two sides of the machine body and the front side of the machine body, obstacle crossing wheels arranged inthe containing cavities and extending devices. The beneficial effects of the utility model are that through the arrangement of the education robot body, the purpose of artificial intelligence education can be achieved; through the arrangement of the walking wheels, the purpose of facilitating walking of the education robot body can be achieved; and through the arrangement of the auxiliary obstaclecrossing device, the purpose of assisting the education robot body in walking when the ground is uneven can be achieved.

title: Novel artificial intelligence education interaction device
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a novel artificial intelligence education interaction device. The device comprises a base, a bearing plate and supporting plates, wheel seats are arranged at the four corners of the lower end of the base. Universal wheels are arranged at the lower ends of the wheel bases, wheel locks are arranged on one sides of the universal wheels, heat dissipation windows are arranged on the two side walls of the base, filter screens are arranged in the heat dissipation windows, a power supply base is arranged on one side of the inner bottom end of the base, a storage battery isarranged at the upper end of the power supply base, and a fixing plate is arranged on one side of the power supply base. Beneficial effects are that: the method is suitable for large-scale production;through the arrangement of the universal wheels and the wheel locks, the device can be moved conveniently, the use convenience of the device is improved, through the arrangement of the camera, the infrared sensor, the servo motor and the processor, the device can capture facial expressions of a user all the time, the learning state of the user is judged according to the facial expressions, corresponding responses are made, and the device is more user-friendly.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR MULTIPLEXING CHANNEL STATE INFORMATION
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th- Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. Methods and apparatuses for multiplexing channel state information (CSI). A user equipment (UE) includes a transceiver configured to receive configuration information for CSI reporting. The UE further includes a processor configured to decode the configuration information and calculate a CSI according to the configuration information. The transceiver is further configured to transmit the calculated CSI on an uplink (UL) channel. The CSI includes N segments and is transmitted in one slot, where N>1. A first of the N segments includes a rank indicator (RI) and at least one other CSI parameter. A base station (BS) includes a processor configured to generate configuration information for CSI reporting. The BS further includes a transceiver configured to transmit, to a UE, the configuration information via a downlink (DL) channel; and receive, from the UE, a CSI report calculated in accordance with the configuration information on an uplink UL channel.

title: Personal safety VR education system
applicants: SHIJIAZHUANG DEPOT CHINA RAILWAY BEIJING GROUP CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a personal safety VR education system, and relates to the technical field of virtual reality. The system comprises a server and a VR head-arranged display. The server is connected with the VR head-arranged display through the Internet. A server side on the server is in two-way communication with a client side on the VR head-arranged display. The client side sends the clientside information of the VR head-arranged display to the server side. The server side sends the operation information for simulating the actual operation behavior of a real person to the client side according to the client side information of the VR head-arranged display. The client side plays the operation information through the VR head-arranged display according to the operation information. Through combination of AI and VR technologies, the user operation is simplified. The unified management of users is realized through one-to-many means. The virtual reality experience is enhanced.

title: Artificial intelligence online education terminal with sitting posture correction function
applicants: GANSU DANDELION INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence online education terminal with a sitting posture correction function. The artificial intelligence online education terminal comprises a machine box,a terminal main body, a base and an instrument box, wherein the machine box is arranged at the top end of the terminal main body; a miniature motor is arranged at one side inside the machine box; meanwhile, a wireless receiving and sending module is arranged at the other side inside the machine box; a camera is arranged in the middle position of the top end of the machine box; and the camera is connected with a rotating shaft of the miniature motor through a gear set. Through the arrangement of a sitting posture correction tracing module and the camera; the camera is used for precisely capturing the sitting posture state of a user; meanwhile, the sitting posture correction tracing module recognizes the sitting posture of the user; if the sitting posture of the user is incorrect, the sitting posture correction tracing module sends information to a single chip microcomputer; the single chip microcomputer reminds the user of correcting the sitting posture in a voice mode by using a loudspeaker; and the condition that the user is in a study state at the improper sitting posture for a long time is avoided.

title: NEGATIVE LEARNING BEHAVIOR ALERT SYSTEM
applicants: MCGRAW HILL GLOBAL EDUCATION HOLDINGS LLC [US]
abstract_text: A method and system for detecting negative learning behaviors associated with a student system in an education program environment. Activity information is collected that corresponds to the performance of learning events of the education program. Based on the activity information, a student profile corresponding to the student is generated. One or more features are extracted from the student profile and used by a machine learning model to classify the student profile as a negative learning indicator associated with the student. An alarm notification is generated that correspond to the negative learning behavior indicator.

title: Campus health management APP based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of an artificial intelligence health management system, and particularly to a campus health management APP based on artificial intelligence. The campus health management APP comprises an account number registering module, a data acquisition module, an APP background database module, an APP customized health management AI, an AI reminding module, a friend information searching module and an authority module. According to the campus health management APP based on artificial intelligence, a campus health manager, a teacher and parents can check the health conditions of the student and the child through registering in the APP. Furthermore the campus health management APP system based on the artificial intelligence can actively remind the teacher orthe parents of various health conditions on a mobile phone or a computer-end APP, thereby facilitating guidance of a teacher to student health education and improving health level of the student, closely connecting a school, the teacher, the student and the parents, and further improving user enthusiasm.

title: Artificial intelligence online education terminal with projection mechanism
applicants: GANSU PUGONGYING INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence online education terminal with a projection mechanism. The artificial intelligence online education terminal comprises a base body, a single chip, abrightness sensor, an anti-wear pad and a groove body, wherein the brightness sensor is arranged in the base body; speakers with equal intervals are further fixed in the base body at two sides of a display screen; lamp plates with equal intervals are arranged on two outer side walls of the base body. The central axis hinged finite position plate is used on the outer wall of the matrix away from the lamp plate side; the limit plate is mounted on the inner wall of the substrate side close to the substrate side with a rubber clip; both sides of the rubber clip are provided with internal grooves on the substrate surface; the internal grooves are hinged with brackets through the hinged shaft; a projector is arranged on one side of the matrix above the inner groove. The invention not only enhances convenience when the education terminal is used but also improves the eye protection effect.

title: Artificial intelligence online education terminal convenient to store
applicants: GANSU PUGONGYING INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence on-line education terminal convenient to store, which comprises a bearing platform, a terminal plate, a liquid crystal display screen, an operating platform and a control panel, wherein the terminal plate is arranged above the bearing platform; one end of a surface of the terminal plate is provided with the liquid crystal display screen; a base isarranged at a center of the bottom of the terminal plate; a bearing is hinged at the center of the bottom of the base; the operating platform is arranged at a top end of the bearing platform at one side of the terminal plate; the control panel is arranged on an outer wall at the one side of the operating platform; a storage cabinet is arranged at both sides of the bottom of the bearing platform;a storage chamber is arranged in the storage cabinet; a rubber gasket is arranged at the bottom of the storage cabinet; and a wireless transmitter is arranged on the outer wall at the one side of thestorage cabinet. By the adoption of the artificial intelligence on-line education terminal convenient to store, not only convenience when using the education terminal is improved, and practicability of the education terminal is improved, but also an application range of the education terminal is improved.

title: Portable on-line education terminal of artificial intelligence
applicants: GANSU PUGONGYING INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a portable on-line education terminal for artificial intelligence, which comprises a protective shell, a base, a fixing plate and a heat absorption fan, wherein the fixing plate is provided with fixing holes close to four corners, two ends of the bottom of the fixing plate are provided with sliding chutes, a limiting bolt is arranged on an outer side wall of the sliding chutes, and the top of the fixing plate is provided with the protective shell. By the adoption of the portable on-line education terminal for artificial intelligence, convex blocks are arranged at outersides of the bottom of the fixing plate close to the fixing holes; the convex blocks are provided with limiting holes; positions of the bottom of the protective shell close to the fixing holes are provided with limiting blocks; one end of the limiting block far away from the protective shell penetrates through the fixing holes and is provided with a fixing block; one end of the fixing block far away from a hinge shaft is provided with a second through hole; fixing cavities are internally provided with springs; and one end of the springs is provided with bulges matched with the limiting holes through limiting plates, so that the terminal is conveniently disassembled and assembled when the terminal is required to be maintained, thereby saving time, improving the assembling efficiency and reducing the labor intensity of maintenance workers.

title: Intelligent child rearing cloud service system
applicants: CHONGQING ZHONGXIONG GONGCHUANG TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent child rearing cloud service system. The intelligent child rearing cloud service system records and analyzes the growth and changes of an infant by continuously tracking and monitoring the mental state and the physical health state of a user, and development, nutrition and education of a fetus and an infant in an all-around way, and establishes a portrait of the user on the basis of the identity information of the user, the attribute information of the user, developmental models of the fetus and infant, the service content used by the user and feedback. And then the intelligent child rearing cloud service system is based on the developmental rules of different stages and its service requirements, development evaluation results and developmental guidance of different stages, combined with the persistence and extension of user service requirements and big data prediction based on similar user services and feedback. Moreover, based on big data and artificial intelligence, the intelligent child rearing cloud service system provides personalized, targeted, continuous and high-efficiency nutrition advice, health guidance, development assessment and guidance, psychological evaluation and intervention, family doctors, education for children, and other services during the childcare process.

title: Method and system for realizing face completion
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method and a system for realizing face completion, and the method comprises the steps: extracting face features in portrait data stored in a database, and carrying out the machine learning, so as to build a face completion model; acquiring a face image acquired by the image acquisition device according to a preset image acquisition rule; when the face image is a real person image, judging whether the key feature points and the image integrity of the face image meet a preset face completion condition or not; and when the key feature points of the face image and the image integrity meet a preset face completion condition, using the face completion model to complete the face image. According to the invention, basic elements of face image distribution are searched from statistical viewpoints. According to the face recognition method based on the covariance matrix of the face image sample set, the feature vector of the covariance matrix of the face image sample setis obtained, face complementing is conducted on the collected face image by establishing the face complementing model to conduct face recognition, convenience is provided for various industries suchas finance, public security, education and medical treatment, and important significance is achieved.

title: An education data analysis system and method taking an active expression type as a main body
abstract_text: The invention provides an education data analysis system and method for constructing an active expression type by taking the active expression type as a main body, and the system comprises a data acquisition module and a display module, and further comprises the following modules: a data cleaning module for arranging data as required; a data mining and analysis module which is used for mining andanalyzing the data through a machine learning or statistical analysis technology; And a classification module which is used for classifying the abilities of the learners according to the mining and analysis results. The invention provides an education data analysis system and method for constructing an active expression type by taking the active expression type as a main body. The system can integrate active expression data, encourages learners to not only have professional knowledge and application capability, but also improve and convert knowledge into innovative and inventive capabilities,and provides an important basis for academic examination basis.

title: Machine learning-based academic position regulation and control method and apparatus, and computer device
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a machine learning-based academic position regulation and control method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining thenumber of right-age children in each school area in the current year, and collecting academic position public opinion information, so as to obtain the number of academic position demand of each schoolarea in the last year and the attention of each school area in the last year; inputting the number of right-age children in each school area in the current year, the number of academic position requirements of each school area in the last year and the number of attention of each school area in the last year into a preset academic position requirement prediction model based on machine learning foroperation, and predicting the number of academic position requirements of each school area in the current year; calculating a school area with insufficient predicted school positions and a school area with surplus predicted school positions; and allocating the predicted redundant life sources of the schools with insufficient academic potential quantity to the predicted schools with surplus academic potential quantity. Therefore, education resources are fully utilized to carry out academic position regulation and control.

title: Senior citizen health management system based on family affection audio and video
abstract_text: The invention relates to health management of senior citizens, and specifically relates to a senior citizen health management system based on family affection audio and video. The senior citizen health management system based on family affection audio and video includes a service end, a client and a cloud platform, wherein the service end converts audio/video materials recorded by relatives into relative health audio/video, and then transmits the relative health audio/video to the cloud platform; and the cloud platform sends the relative health audio/video to the client, and a senior citizen can use the client to play the relative health audio/video. By means of the mobile Internet technology, the audio synthesis and voice replacement technology, and the cloud storage technology, combinedwith artificial intelligence and wearable smart mobile devices, the senior citizen health management system based on family affection audio and video can provide chronic disease management services for the elderly, can build a 360-degree one-stop service platform for Internet + senior citizen health management, including health education, chatting, follow-up visit, appointment for seeing doctors,etc., and can provide comprehensive, timely and high-quality services for health management of the elderly.

title: Laboratory safety and experiment safety operation intelligent auxiliary system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a laboratory safety and experiment operation intelligent auxiliary system. The system combines electronic information technologies such as automatic control, sensors and multimedia with artificial intelligence such as voice recognition, image recognition and expert systems. The system can achieve the 24-hour monitoring of laboratory safety, achieves the interactive safety education on laboratory users, can take relevant safety measures in time according to real-time conditions, achieves the demonstration in a multimedia mode, achieves the rapid emergency treatment on laboratory safety, and guides the laboratory users to take corresponding countermeasures to carry out relevant safety disposal measures and experiment operation. The safety construction of a laboratoryis effectively improved from the aspect of software.

title: STEM Custom STEM e-learning platform based on big data and machine learning
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a student-tailored AI STEM education platform based on big data and machine learning and, more specifically, to a student-tailored AI STEM education platform based on big data and machine learning capable of processing mass data mart, which processes correlated data, with high speed using a knowledge system map based on evaluation result data of students, a student profile, and unit knowledge and question bank DB for evaluation.

title: Method and apparatus for multiplexing channel state information
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th- Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. Methods and apparatuses for multiplexing channel state information (CSI). A user equipment (UE) includes a transceiver configured to receive configuration information for CSI reporting. The UE further includes a processor configured to decode the configuration information and calculate a CSI according to the configuration information. The transceiver is further configured to transmit the calculated CSI on an uplink (UL) channel. The CSI includes N segments and is transmitted in one slot, where N>1. A first of the N segments includes a rank indicator (RI) and at least one other CSI parameter. A base station (BS) includes a processor configured to generate configuration information for CSI reporting. The BS further includes a transceiver configured to transmit, to a UE, the configuration information via a downlink (DL) channel; and receive, from the UE, a CSI report calculated in accordance with the configuration information on an uplink UL channel.

title: Psychological state prediction method and device and electronic device
abstract_text: The invention provides a psychological state prediction method and device and an electronic device, and relates to the technical field of online education. The method comprises the steps of obtainingthe interaction event information of a learner and an online education system; generating a learning interaction situation according to the timestamp corresponding to the interaction event information; inputting the learning interaction situation into a pre-trained deep learning network model; and predicting the psychological state corresponding to the learning interaction situation, so that the relationship between the interaction behavior of the learner and the psychological state of the learner can be well embodied through the method, and accordingly the psychological state prediction of the learner becomes more accurate and efficient, and an instructor is helped to better understand the psychological state of the learner.

title: A classroom student state analysis method and device based on face monitoring
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent classes. The embodiment of the invention provides a classroom student state analysis method and device based on face monitoring, and the method comprises the steps: collecting a classroom image about a classroom, and recognizing the identity information of a plurality of students in the classroom image; detecting a face action of a face of each student in the classroom image; obtaining a facial expression corresponding to the detected facial action based on a micro-expression recognition neural network model, the micro-expression recognition neural network model being trained according to the training facial action and the corresponding training facial expression; And storing the classroom state of each student to an education analysis report corresponding to the identity information of each student, wherein the classroom state comprises a facial expression. Therefore, an artificial intelligence technology is applied to identify and monitor the class state of the student from the classroom image and provide reference for teachers and parents in the later period through an education analysis report, so that closed-loop intelligent education is realized.

title: Full-interaction intelligent education machine supporting multiple network accesses
applicants: BEIJING LINGYOU ZHIXUE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a full-interaction intelligent education machine supporting multiple network accesses. A front foot stand is arranged at the bottom of an education machine main body, a rotatable supporting foot stand is arranged on the back surface of the education machine main body, and the setting angle of the education machine main body is adjusted through the rotatable supporting foot stand. A touch screen is arranged on the front surface of the education machine body. A double-camera mechanism is mounted at the top of the education machine main body. The double-camera mechanism comprises a master camera used for video communication and a slave camera used for AI object identification. The education machine main body is also provided with a photosensitive sensor, a distance sensor, a microphone, a loudspeaker and a key. A terminal cover is arranged on the back of the education machine body. After the terminal cover is opened, various network access interfaces are presented.The utility model has the advantages that: (1) the design of the adjustable display angle bracket is suitable for children with different heights; (2) ambient light induction automatic backlight adjustment and user use distance monitoring are carried out; And (3) the double-camera design supports video and real object multi-dimensional education scenes at the same time, so that the use experienceof students is improved.

title: A deep learning sample labeling method based on online education big data
applicants: ANHUI EDUCATION NETWORK PUBLISHING CO LTD
TIME NEW MEDIA PUBLISHING CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an internet online education system, in particular to a deep learning sample labeling method based on online education big data, which comprises the following preparation steps: (1) importing data, (2) performing preliminarily labeling, (3) grouping the data, (4) displaying the data, (5) sorting the data, (6) re-grouping the data which do not conform to each other, and (7)obtaining different types of databases. According to the invention, a deep learning sample labeling method based on online education big data is designed; the defects in the prior art are overcome; Manual labor is not needed, personal subjective judgment is avoided; preliminary annotation and grouping annotation of the data are carried out, the data accuracy is high, a large number of personnel on the Internet can be started to assist in labeling massive data, the whole idea of the online education big data labeling system is clear and clear, the labeling precision of the big data can be effectively improved, meanwhile, the labeling time is shortened, the process is simple, and the practicability is high.

title: Artificial intelligence education supervision equipment
abstract_text: The invention discloses artificial intelligence education supervision equipment. The wall surface comprises a wall surface body, the bottom of the wall surface body is fixedly connected with a U-shaped frame; the back surface of the inner wall of the U-shaped frame is fixedly connected with a motor through a connecting block; one end of an output shaft of the motor is fixedly connected with a first belt pulley; a rotating rod is rotationally connected between the two sides of the inner wall of the U-shaped frame through a bearing; The surface of the rotating rod is fixedly connected with a second belt pulley, the surface of the second belt pulley is in transmission connection with the surface of the first belt pulley through a belt, and the two sides of the surface of the rotating rod arefixedly connected with worm sleeves. According to the artificial intelligence education supervision equipment, dust cleaning work can be conducted on the surface of the camera body, the problems thatdue to dust accumulation, a monitoring picture is not clear, and subsequent use is affected are avoided, time and labor are saved, manual dust removal work is not needed, and labor is reduced.

title: A classroom student behavior analysis method and device
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The embodiment of the invention provides a classroom student behavior analysis method and device, and the method comprises thesteps: collecting classroom images in a classroom in a preset time interval, and extracting a human body contour image; determining a human body contour image corresponding to each student; identifying human body key points in the human body contour image corresponding to each student in the classroom image; and determining the student behavior type of each student based on a classification neuralnetwork, wherein the classification neural network takes the human body key points and the corresponding student behavior types as input for training. Therefore, the image human body recognition technology and the neural network technology are combined, the student behavior types of students in the classroom can be quickly and accurately recognized, and effective data support can be provided forsubsequent education analysis or concentration analysis and the like.

title: A SUBJECT-TAILORED CONTINUOUSLY DEVELOPING RANDOMIZATION BASED METHOD FOR IMPROVING ORGAN FUNCTION
abstract_text: The present disclosure provides systems regimens, devices and methods for improving organ function by challenged-exercise, training, and/or education and/or nutritional regimens, or devices intended for improving organ performance, and for prevention and treatment of loss of an effect to exercise regimens in healthy and chronic subjects, or lack of full responsiveness to exercise, training, nutritional or education regimens in subjects who wish to improve the function of their organs, or with chronic diseases. There are provided herein devices, systems, and methods for real time or delayed altering of the parameters of training regimens and/or time of administration and/or combining different exercise, training, nutrition or education regimens, for improving the long term effect of the regimen. According to some embodiments, any training regimen and/or device-generated maneuver/stimulation, wherein the parameters are updated within the exercise regimen/maneuver period, for personalizing the regimen parameters and increasing the accuracy and efficacy of the regimen for achieving the desired physiological goal, and to prevent long-term adaptation for ensuing prolong effect of the training regimen on the target organ function or physiological pathway. Output parameters are continuously, semi continuously, or conditionally being updated based on measurements and inputs provided to a compute circuitry configured to facilitate closed loop machine learning capabilities.

title: An online education man-machine interaction method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online education man-machine interaction method and system based on artificial intelligence. Including a processor, Face recognition assembly, Hardware device, Cloud platform and teacher platform, The processor is in bidirectional connection with the hardware device and the cloud platform. The hardware equipment comprises a high-definition camera, a projector, a sound box and a microphone, the output end of the high-definition camera is connected with the input end of the face recognition assembly, and the output end of the face recognition assembly is connected withthe input end of the behavior feature analysis unit and the input end of the expression recognition analysis unit. The invention discloses an online education man-machine interaction method and system based on artificial intelligence. The system can analyze the class state, including expressions and actions, of the on-site students, judge the learning state of the students, judge the atmosphere and management degree of the teacher in class, and timely remind the teacher, so that the teacher can quickly adjust the state, the classroom atmosphere is convenient to activate, and the learning interest of the students is improved.

title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE-BASED ONLINE SELF-LEARNING DEVICE AND METHOD
abstract_text: A device for providing an education service to a learner's terminal, in which an education service application is installed, according to an embodiment of the present invention may comprise: a database; a data transmission unit for transmitting basic lecture data and question data; a data reception unit for receiving response data corresponding to the question data from the terminal; and a control unit for performing control to verify, on the basis of the response data, solution procedure data and whether there is a correct answer to the question data, determine a configuration of self-learning data according to a result of verifying the solution procedure data and whether there is a correct answer, and transmit the determined configuration to the terminal.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot with automatic tracking function and control method thereof
applicants: SHANDONG YUANMAI ELECTRONIC TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence education, and relates to a robot, in particular to an artificial intelligence educational robot with an automatic tracking function and acontrol method of the artificial intelligence educational robot. The artificial intelligence educational robot comprises a robot body and a display screen arranged above the robot body, and is characterized in that the display screen is arranged above the robot body through an angle adjustment platform, the angle adjustment platform comprises a rotary table arranged on the top of the robot body and an up-down adjusting base arranged on the rotary table, the up-down adjusting base is in a U shape, the displace screen is sleeved with the up-down adjusting base in a rotatable mode, the top of the display screen is provided with an image collection camera, and the robot body is internally provided with an automatic tracking system for driving the angle adjustment platform to work. The artificial intelligence educational robot has the advantages of being ingenious in design, reasonable in structure and suitable for large-scale use and popularization.

title: Method for assisting an enterprise human resource department in recruiting job seekers
applicants: HENAN DARUI INTERNET OF THINGS TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a method for assisting an enterprise human resource department in recruiting job seekers, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the following specific steps: (1) resume collection: collecting information of the job seekers of a registered user through job seeker software; (2) keyword extraction: the cloud server stores and matches thedata; (3) automatic grading of job seekers: extracting sample data from a cloud server, classifying and grading according to industry types, and extracting grading vectors of multiple types of information in the resume; and (4) classification of hierarchical vectors: the hierarchical vectors are divided into occupational experience hierarchical vectors, education background hierarchical vectors, business skill hierarchical vectors and personal quality hierarchical vectors. According to the method for assisting the enterprise human resource department in recruiting the job seeker, information of various aspects such as vocational experiences, education backgrounds, business skills and personal quality is integrated, the final grading value reflects the actual situation of the job seeker, the recruiting efficiency and quality are greatly improved, and long-term development of enterprises is facilitated.

title: METHOD FOR ORGANIZING KNOWLEDGE SYSTEM DIAGRAM OF CURRICULUM FOR EDUCATIONAL PLATFORM AND DEVICE FOR PROVIDING SAME
abstract_text: Disclosed are a method for organizing a knowledge system diagram of curriculum for an educational platform, which is educational content that can be recommended for learning through a knowledge system diagram of curriculum in the field of education, and an apparatus for providing the same. The present invention enables an integrated analysis of learning data, and makes it possible to provide a recommendation of a customized learning roadmap and content by means of artificial intelligence technology. Accordingly, the present invention can provide a customized artificial intelligence standard educational platform capable of an integrated analysis of existing content.

title: SYSTEM FOR LEARNING AND EDUCATION IN THE VIRTUAL ENVIRONMMENT BASED ON THE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR WASTE ITEM DETECTION AND RECOGNITION
abstract_text: Embodiments described herein relate to hardware and software for waste item detection and recognition, along with an education or feedback system. Embodiments described herein use artificial intelligence, which embodies machine learning and computer vision, to detect waste items and generate feedback to nudge the user to dispose the waste items into appropriate receptacles while generating smart operational insights of a designated premise.

title: Artificial intelligence study table lamp
applicants: SHANGHAI LING TENG INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence study table lamp comprising a table lamp body, a first shooting device, a second shooting device, a voice input device, a voice output device and a display device. The first shooting device is arranged at the upper end of the table lamp body. The field angle of the first shooting device covers the working face below the table lamp body. The secondshooting device is arranged in the middle of the table lamp body, and the field angle of the second shooting device is the area in front of the table lamp. The voice input device, the voice output device and the display device are all arranged on the table lamp body. The artificial intelligence study table lamp can be suitable for man-machine interaction and distance education simultaneously andhas a more reasonable structural layout.

title: Intelligence glasses and because artificial intelligence interaction system of these intelligence glasses
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of glasses manufacturing, aim at providing an intelligence glasses and because artificial intelligence interaction system of these intelligence glasses, these intelligence glasses include mirror holder subassembly and frame, and the mirror holder subassembly includes two lenses, and the frame is provided with the last eyebrow frame of mirror holdersubassembly and connects two intelligent glasses legs at last eyebrow frame both ends respectively including the cooperation. These intelligence glasses are through the give -out order that combines together of play audio module or play audio module and camera device, should the instruction after the treater is handled, transmit the mutual equipment for artificial intelligence through wireless communication module to this can remotely control the mutual equipment of artificial intelligence, need not to be close to equipment, in addition because of people can wear glasses usually at any time, therefore, realized that a thing of glasses is multi -purpose, moreover, when these intelligence glasses link to each other with third party's information platform, still can realize consultation or solution, or send help informations such as speech translation, online education and training etc.. The event, this intelligence glasses application is wide, and user experience feels good.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR TRANSMITTING AND RECEIVING SYSTEM INFORMATION ON A CARRIER SUPPORTING MULTI-BANDWIDTH PART
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a communication method for fusing a 5G communication system to support a higher data transmission rate than a 4G system with a technology for the Internet of things (IoT), and a system thereof. The present invention may be applied to intelligent services (for example, smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car or connected car, health care, digital education, retail business, security- and safety-related services, etc.) based on a 5G communication technology and an IoT-related technology. According to embodiments of the present invention, a method for transmitting system information by a base station comprises: a step of checking whether an active downlink (DL) bandwidth part (BWP) of user equipment (UE) is constructed by a common search space; and a step of transmitting updated system information in dedicated signaling to the UE if the active DL BWP of the UE is not constructed by the common search space.

title: A learning material intelligent pushing method and device
applicants: SICHUAN SHENGXUE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a learning material intelligent pushing method and device. The method comprises the following steps of using an education server to associate the learning data and the examination data sent by a learning terminal every time and store them in a database of a machine learning model created in advance respectively; in the machine learning model, continuously analyzing the learning data and the examination data corresponding to the learning terminal by using a big data technology, and combining the updated educational rhythm and social current events in the database of themachine learning model to construct a current learning state image of the student bound to the learning terminal and obtain a current learning state analysis result; according to the analysis result of the current learning state, searching the matching learning data in a pre-stored learning database, calculating the matching coefficient of the learning material, and pushing the learning material and the corresponding matching coefficient to the learning terminal together, so that the efficiency and accuracy of selecting the matching learning material among the massive learning materials can beimproved.

title: Intelligent desk capable of achieving projection touch control
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent desk capable of achieving projection touch control. The intelligent desk comprises a desk body, a projection assembly, a camera, a touch control processing device, a computer system and a cloud server; the projection assembly and the camera are arranged on the desk body, and the projection assembly, the camera and the touch control processing device are connected with the computer system; the computer system is connected with the cloud server. The AR augmented reality technology, the projection technology, the touch control technology and the artificial intelligence technology are applied to the desk, comprehensive intelligent improvement for students with no schoolbag or book, sitting gesture correction, safety eye protection, intelligent learning assistance, AR three-dimensional book content display can be achieved, and education intelligence is achieved.

title: Artificial intelligence learning terminal system and method under cloud-network-end architecture
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical fields of cloud computing, network transmission, and terminal interaction and the like, more particularly, to an artificial intelligence learning terminal systemand method under cloud-network-end architecture. The system comprises four modules: a terminal interaction module, a cloud computing platform module, a cloud storage platform module, and a network communication module. According to the invention, with the techniques of cloud computing, network transmission and terminal interaction, learning, education and artificial intelligence are learned comprehensively and a cloud-network-end integrated artificial intelligence learning terminal is constructed, so that the convenience and vividness of learning and education content display are improved; the man-machine two-way information communication and exchange are realized by intelligent interaction; the learner's learning trajectory is analyzed by cloud computing data and further learning feedback is provided; the friendly interaction between learners and terminals is realized based on the powerful computing power and storage capacity, so that the effectiveness, motility, and interactivity ofthe learning and education are improved substantially.

title: Educational optimization development method, device and system based on artificial intelligence and big data
abstract_text: The present application relates to an educational optimization development method, device and system based on artificial intelligence and big data, including collecting the teacher professional ability data through a teacher professional ability evaluation system; collecting the data of students' learning ability through the student learning ability evaluation system; according to the data of teachers' professional ability, obtaining the data of teachers' differentiation; according to the data of students' learning ability, obtaiing the data of students' differentiation classification; according to the teacher differentiation classification data and the student differentiation classification data, matching teachers and teachers complementary combination, teachers and students complementarycombination, students and students complementary combination. The method, the device and the system can match the educational resources according to the data of teachers' differentiation classification and students' differentiation classification, the combination of teachers with strong professional ability and teachers with poor professional ability can improve the professional ability of teachers with poor professional ability pertinently, and so on, the distribution of educational resources is more pertinent and the optimized development of education is promoted.

title: ACTIVE INTEGRATED HUMAN BALANCE STABILISING SYSTEM PLATFORM AND METHODS
abstract_text: An Active Integrated Human Balance Stabilising System Platform Means and Methods thereto (henceforth AIHSSP for brevity). A method and means for enhancing and integrating human balance via tightly coupled, synchronised multi-sensory signals, tailored to the individual user's nervous system via an AI learning system. Employing a form of haptically induced synaesthesia, the platform system enables the user to experience micro-motion as macro-motion, smoothly integrating virtual reality with virtual motion. Applications and effects include: measurement, training, diagnosis, improvement and remediation of human balance; entertainment, simulation and education.

title: APPARATUS AND METHOD OF SYSTEM INFORMATION TRANSMISSION AND RECEPTION ON A CARRIER SUPPORTING MULTIPLE BANDWIDTH PARTS
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. The method for transmitting system information by a base station in a wireless communication system, the method comprising identifying whether an active downlink (DL) bandwidth part (BWP) of a user equipment (UE) is configured with common search space, and transmitting, to the UE, an updated system information in a dedicated signaling when the active DL BWP of the UE is not configured with the common search space

title: APPARATUS AND METHOD OF SYSTEM INFORMATION TRANSMISSION AND RECEPTION ON A CARRIER SUPPORTING MULTIPLE BANDWIDTH PARTS
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. title: Sum education trend prediction method based on Hadoop and ARlMA
applicants: NANJING LINKAGE INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a sum education trend prediction method based on Hadoop and ARlMA. The method comprises the steps of through a data interface and a big data platform, storing massive sum educational data, and using an ARIMA algorithm to predict the number of users, user behavior data and revenue to achieve the combination of big data and machine learning to a certain extent. The method ofthe invention fully utilizes the distributed computing ability of the big data platform, improves the steps in the ARIMA algorithm from the original single-machine model to the map/reduce distributedmode, and solves the problem that the single-machine can not process under the condition of huge data quantity.

title: Artificial intelligence interactive learning system and education method
applicants: BEIJING SCIENCE AND EDUCATION RES INSTITUTE
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence interactive learning system and an education method, wherein, the system comprises a student identification module, which is used for identifying a student ID of the student; a student obtaining module used for obtaining the student training information of the preset database according to the student ID; a man-machine interaction moduleused for displaying the student training information, receiving the student interaction information generated by the student according to the student training information of the student, and obtaining the student training data according to the student training information and the student interaction information. The system can meet the learning requirements of different students through the training of students' interactive information at any time and anywhere, so as to effectively improve the applicability and practicability of the training, the training efficiency is high, simple and easy to achieve.

title: Achievement analysis, diagnostic prediction and learning resource pushing method and platform
applicants: SICHUAN BORN TO LEARN EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method and a platform for grade analysis, diagnosis prediction and learning resource pushing. The method and the platform comprise the following steps: an education server receives the answering subject information and the answering answer information sent by a student terminal; according to the answering subject information, the pre-stored reference answer information base is called to calculate the error information; Matching the pre-stored subject knowledge point database according to the answering subject information, analyzing the incorrect question information in the subject knowledge point database, and finding the knowledge point set corresponding to the incorrect question information; According to the set of knowledge points, obtaining the mastery degreeof the knowledge points in the subject by the student through machine learning, and setting pushing priority coefficient of the knowledge point, and pushing the course material of the pre-stored learning resource database to the student terminal according to the pushing priority coefficient, so that the effective information in the score can be fully obtained, the correctness of diagnosing and predicting the learning quality can be improved, and matching learning resources can be pushed pertinently.

title: A request processing method of online education course based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to an online education course request processing method based on artificial intelligence, which comprises the following steps: receiving user characteristic information and course request information sent by a user through an application server, and then retrieving SPOC course plan information according to the course request information; Obtain the basic information and professional evaluation information of the qualified courses, and then compare the user characteristics information with the basic information of the courses; If the basic information condition of the course is satisfied, the professional evaluation information of the course is sent to the user terminal, and the user provides the professional reply data stream in the preset time and sends it to the analysis server; The analysis server processes the professional response data stream and sends it as input data to the deep neural network model for professional standard evaluation, and then judges whether the professional level of the user meets the professional standard of the course according to the output value of the deep neural network model. The application server makes course reservations for users who meet the course professional standards.

title: METHOD FOR THE EDUCATION OF ANTHROPOID ROBOTS
applicants: TECHNOLOGIKO EKPAIDEFTIKO IDRYMA ANATOLIKIS MAKEDONIAS KAI THRAKIS [GR]
abstract_text: Novelty: method for the electronic programming of anthropoid robots via auto-visual paradigms established by specialized operators having no special knowledge in robot programming is disclosed. Constitution: the invented anthropoid robot is furnished with integral camera sensor, microphone and light sensors. For learning to support industrial processes, it is able to receive voice commands and movement paradigms by the trainer. Module-by-module learning of the industrial process is carried out in real time with use of specific machine learning and computational intelligence algorithms including lattice computing algorithms and reinforcement learning algorithms. Additionally, with the aim to address a new industrial process in the future, the robot s training comprises the accumulation of experience via the machine learning of pairs (D1, DT2) where D1 is the cause and D2 the result thereof. Embodiments: the invention finds application to anthropoid robots used -instead of humans- in automated industrial processes, industrial constructions, production lines and provision of services (e.g. health care services etc).

title: A METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR TRANSMITTING CONTROL AND DATA SIGNALS BASED ON A SHORT TTI IN A WIRELESS CELLULAR COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: A communication method and system for converging a 5th-generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of things (IoT) are provided. The disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security, and safety services. A shortened transmission time interval (TTI)-based downlink (DL) and uplink (UL) transmission method and apparatus for use in a wireless communication system.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR TRANSMITTING CONTROL AND DATA SIGNALS BASED ON A SHORT TTI IN A WIRELESS CELLULAR COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: A communication method and system for converging a 5th-generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of things (IoT) are provided. The disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security, and safety services. A shortened transmission time interval (TTI)-based downlink (DL) and uplink (UL) transmission method and apparatus for use in a wireless communication system.
