title: Submersible manta ray toy specially used for teenager artificial intelligence education
applicants: FOSHAN CITY SANSHUI DISTRICT XIWANG TORCH EDUCATION SCIENCE & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a submersible manta ray toy specially used for teenager artificial intelligence education. The toy includes a fish body, a head, lips, a left eye, a right eye, a left gill, aright gill, a left fin, a right fin, a left tail pin, a right tail pin and a tail vane pin. The toy is characterize in that by means of a micro motor drive mechanism, an electronic chi, an LED lamp, abroadcaster, an electronic voice chip and a lithium battery arranged in the body of the submersible manta ray toy, a vivid illustration of the bionics, mechanical dynamics, electronic induction, electronic chip and LED lamp technology involved in imitation of free swimming of a manta ray by the manta ray toy in water is given. The toy is made of environment-friendly soft silica gel so as to protect the tender skin of children from being scratched when playing. The toy can teach the children that the manta ray is not only a master of swimming and sports, but also an endangered species of endangered wildlife under protection of international convention so as to cultivate the awareness of protecting and refusing to eat manta rays from childhood. Therefore, the toy has far-reaching significance for the development of popular science education for teenagers.

title: Modular Robot System for Coding Education Using Artificial Intelligence
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a coding robot for coding education through artificial intelligence and a robot, which comprises: an embedded system having an OS for coding education on a platform of a robot and operating the robot; hardware having a robot operating unit, a lift unit, an arm unit, a hand unit, a camera unit, and a sensor unit with respect to the operation of the robot; a method of integrally providing a block graphic programming method and a programming language using method for coding education; modules which can add the hardware and software associated with the robot in the base module as needed; software modules for artificial intelligence functions such as robot vision and recognition; cloud server for high-speed and massive intelligent function of internal robot system; smartphone tablet computer for software development and remote monitoring; and a coding robot service server for supporting and managing software resources of the coding robot.

title: Early education story platform based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses an early education story platform based on artificial intelligence. The early education story platform comprises a resource management center. The resource management center comprises a story management system, a user management system, an interactive system, an input-output system and a language selection system. The story management system comprises a story retrieval module, a classification and grading module, a story storage module and a filtering module. The user management system comprises a user information input module, a user information analysis module and a user information storage module. The interactive system comprises a detection module, an encouragement module and a reward module. The input-output system comprises an information input module and a story output module. The language selection system comprises a language input module and a language output module. The children are encouraged to participate in the story so as to enhance the children'sinterest in the story and enable the children to really learn in pleasure.

title: Manipulator with Machine Learning and Controller for Education
abstract_text: The present invention can provide a robot algorithm and easily can operate a learning program using a robot. A manipulator for education includes machine learning algorithm dynamic movement primitives (DMP) and a controller.

title: Sniffer dog robot special for searching and rescuing lost climbers
applicants: FOSHAN CITY SANSHUI DISTRICT XIWANG TORCH EDUCATION SCIENCE & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: A sniffer dog robot special for searching and rescuing lost climbers comprises a dog body, a head, a pair of infrared bionic eyes, a bionic nose smell sensor, a bionic mouth voice player, a pulse signal positioner, a search-rescue backpack, a colorful smoke bomb, a solar rechargeable intercom, a front left leg, a front right leg, a back left leg and a back right leg, and is used for searching andrescuing the lost climber, by the aid of a rescue helicopter in a primitive mountain forest. By application of the sniffer dog robot, the difficult problems of difficulty in dog training, long training period, and high death rate of sniffer dogs for carrying out searching rescuing tasks in urgent, difficult and dangerous major disasters in our country are solved, and the infrared bionic eyes, thebionic nose smell sensor, the bionic mouth voice player and the pulse signal positioner on the sniffer dog robot can replace functions of the real sniffer dog to realize search and rescue of the lostclimbers accurately effectively. Besides, teenagers' interests in scientific research on the smart sniffer dog robot in the field of disaster relief can be developed and a new way of developing artificial intelligence education suitable for the teenagers is provided.

title: High-building air-jet fire-fighting robot
applicants: FOSHAN CITY SANSHUI DISTRICT XIWANG TORCH EDUCATION SCIENCE & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a high-building air-jet fire-fighting robot. The high-building air-jet fire-fighting robot comprises a robot body, a monitor, spare fire-fighting bullets, a left emitter, a right emitter, a left ejector, a right ejector, a left leg grounder, a right leg grounder, a high building and a fire fighting truck. The high-building air-jet fire-fighting robot has the advantages andcharacteristics that in case of fire in an urban building, the fire-fighting robot can rise to a fire window of the high building through the left ejector and the right ejector, and the left emitter and the right emitter are launched for emitting fire-fighting bullets to the fire window; after the fire is extinguished, the fire-fighting robot descends to the ground, and the left leg grounder and the right leg grounder at the lower end of the fire-fighting robot slide to the fire-fighting truck to stand by or reload the fire-fighting bullets to execute a second rising and fire-fighting task. Byadopting the high-building air-jet fire-fighting robot, specific to the scientific-technological equipment vision and exception on artificial intelligence education carried in the National middle andprimary schools and research on high-building fire-fighting robot by the teenage, an actual, reliable and simulated actual model is provided, and learning and comprehending of the teenagers about national fire-fighting intelligence equipment are enhanced.

title: Online education human-computer interaction method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention, which belongs to the technical field of communication and computer, discloses an online education human-computer interaction method and system based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises a teacher terminal, a cloud memory, a student terminal, a learning evaluation device and a personalized customization device. The student terminal is provided with a computer and a seat;computer is connected with a microphone and a camera; and the seat is connected with a pressure sensor for monitoring a changing situation of a seat pressure by a student. The learning evaluation device is used for evaluating the self-discipline performance and academic records of a student and performing reward and punishment measures. The personalized customization device is used for customizinga learning course and selecting an online learning teammate. According to the invention, a course under personalized customization can be provided for a student, the learning of the student can be supervised and reward and punishment processing can be carried out on the learning of the student, so that the learning of the student is supervised comprehensively; the adhesiveness of user is enhanced; the utilization rate of the online educational resources is increased; and wasting of the educational resources and funds is avoided.

title: Dynamic TDD POWER CONTROL METHOD FOR DYNAMIC TDD SYSTEM
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication technique which fuses a 5G communication system with an IoT technology to support a higher data rate than that of a 4G system, and a system thereof. The present disclosure can be applied to an intelligent service (e.g. smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car or connected car, health care, digital education, retail business, security- and safety-related services, etc.) based on a 5G communication technology and an IoT related technology. Furthermore, according to the present invention, disclosed are a method and an apparatus for controlling power which can solve a DL-to-UL interference problem by applying a dynamic time division duplex (TDD) in a wireless communication system. To this end, a control signal processing method in the wireless communication system comprises the steps of: receiving a first control signal transmitted from a base station; processing the received first control signal; and transmitting a second control signal generated based on the processing, to the base station.

title: Artificial intelligence education system for classrooms and based on action interaction
applicants: SUZHOU CHENGRU INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence education system for classrooms and based on action interaction. The artificial intelligence education system comprises an obtaining module, an analysis module, an action module, an adjusting module, a projection module, a playing module and a storing module. The obtaining module is used for obtaining action information in the classrooms, and theanalysis module records and compares the information sent by the obtaining module. The action module is used for identifying command instructions, and sending command instructions to the adjusting module and the projection module. The adjusting module comprises a temperature control module, a brightness adjusting module, a permeability module and a vibration module. The projection module comprisesa mapping module and a receiving module. The mapping module is used for controlling sequence and form of indoor object projection. The receiving module is used for receiving and identifying action instructions. The playing module comprises a task module, an alarm module and a regulation module. The task module is used for broadcasting commands. The alarm module is used for broadcasting emergent affairs. The regulation module is used for adjusting different voice systems. The storing module is used for storing information of the analysis module.

title: Programming method of promise control asynchronous function sequence based on AI and children education
abstract_text: The invention provides a programming method of a promise control asynchronous function sequence based on AI and children education. The method comprises the following steps: deploying a promise sequence in a controller of a server to control the process; deploying the promise sequence in the controller to control the execution order of multiple processes, wherein the promise sequence comprises a start module, a then module, a next module, a resolve module, a reject module, and a cancel module. The promise is deployed in the controller of the server to control the process; the process control means that the execution is cancelled once an instruction for cancelling the execution is acquired in the procedure of waiting for executing in queue by multiple processes. By adopting the above scheme, the promise in the processor in the server can guarantee that each process can be executed in order when multiple processes need to be executed, the execution efficiency of the single process is improved, and the management efficiency of the server is improved.

title: /DL/UL METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR BEAM ASSOCIATION BETWEEN DOWNLINK AND UPLINK
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication technique which fuses a 5G communication system with an IoT technology to support a higher data rate than that of a 4G system, and a system thereof. The present disclosure can be applied to an intelligent service (e.g. smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car or connected car, health care, digital education, retail business, security- and safety-related services, etc.) based on a 5G communication technology and an IoT related technology. Furthermore, according to the present invention, a method and an apparatus for beam association between downlink (DL) and uplink (UL) are disclosed. To this end, an operation method of a terminal comprises the steps of: receiving first information indicating a resource type related to uplink transmission and second information indicating a resource of the resource type from a base station; selecting a beam for the uplink transmission based on the first information and the second information; and transmitting an uplink signal based on the selected beam.

title: Method for identifying named entities in Chinese international education field
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method for identifying named entities in the Chinese international education field. The method for identifying the named entities in the Chinese international education fieldcomprises the following steps that S1, named entity labels are designed and used for identifying the named entities in a text; S2, according to a labeled Chinese international education field named entity data set, a named entity identification model is trained; S3, named entity identification testing is carried out on a non-labeled Chinese international education field text. Compared with a method based on a rule, the method avoids the problem that domain experts manually design a large quantity of rule templates by using the trained model. Named entity identification is carried out on the basis of two-way long-term and short-term memory networks and a conditional random field deep learning method. According to the method, features do not need to be manually designed according to a task,and a good effect can be achieved just by using the automatic characteristics like word embedding vectors, character embedding vectors and part-of-speech embedding vectors.

title: Simulation devices for structural dynamics experiment easing to wire and wireless connection
applicants: COLLEGE OF KOREA POLYTECHNIC VI FOUNDATION OF IND [KR]
abstract_text: The present invention provides a simulation device for a structural dynamics experiment with respect to a beam (10) or the like, comprising: a main body (20) which supports the beam (10) or the like; an input unit (30) in which readers (32) are positioned at a plurality of areas on the beam (10) to sense load information of tags (31); and a control unit (40) which calculates and outputs a stress state of the beam (10) according to load distribution sensed by the readers (32). The present invention enables a general learner, who learns an architecture and construction technology for a structural dynamics design or the like, to graphically check beam principles and concepts to a loading experiment result; is configured to perform free wired and wireless connection and actuation based on a simulation device, a notebook, a tablet PC, a net book, a smartphone, etc. to minimize a size and an overall scale of the simulation device; enhances usability of an experimental laboratory and a learning space and at the same time, easily causes an interest of the learner of each education institute for the structural dynamics to enhance understandability of the learner; and, moreover, eases deep learning and information exchange, linked with related industrial companies and research institutes, to enhance education quality.

title: Safety online education cloud platform system
applicants: HANGZHOU JINRI YUNAN TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a safety online education cloud platform system which comprises a big data platform subsystem, a cloud MongoDB storage clustering subsystem, a cloud video-on-demand service subsystem and a plurality of clients, wherein the big data platform subsystem is used for automatically tracking news announcement, social network, media and/or industry data information sources on the basis of crawler, big data and artificial intelligence technologies, and efficiently identifying and accurately capturing target contents from massive unstructured data; the cloud MongoDB storage clustering subsystem is used for storing courses and question banks of N industry categories of safety education; the cloud video-on-demand service subsystem is used for acquiring a video and/or an audio, carrying out editing and uploading and providing automatic transcoding processing and media resource management of the video and/or the audio; and the plurality of clients are connected with the plurality of subsystems by a load balance server. The system is safe, reliable and high in adaptability, is provided with enterprise and government interfaces, is convenient for the government to manage enterprises, is convenient for the enterprises to organize safety training, combines electronic commerce with safety education and serves for three parties of the enterprises, the government and personnel.

title: Review recommendation method based on big data and artificial intelligence and education robot system
applicants: DAGUO INNOVATION INTELLIGENT TECH DONGGUAN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a review recommendation method based on big data and artificial intelligence and an education robot system. The review recommendation method comprises the following steps: basedon a learning portrait, recommending knowledge points that need to be reviewed and review time weight that needs to be spent by each knowledge point in all the knowledge points that need to be reviewed. The method and the system provided by the invention have the advantages that different review strengths are adopted for different students and different knowledge points, so that accurate review is achieved, the review pertinence and efficiency are improved, and the review is more efficient.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR BEAM ASSOCIATION BETWEEN DOWNLINK/UPLINK
abstract_text: The disclosure relates to a communication scheme and system for the convergence of a 5G communication system for supporting a higher a data transfer rate after the 4G system with the IoT technology. The disclosure may be applied to intelligence services (e.g., a smart home, a smart building, a smart city, a smart car or connected car, healthcare, digital education, retail business, security and safety-related services) based on the 5G communication technology and IoT-related technology. abstract_text: The disclosure relates to a communication scheme and system for the convergence of a 5G communication system for supporting a higher a data transfer rate after the 4G system with the IoT technology. title: UNICELLULAR ALGAE STRAIN MALLOMONAS KALINAE - A PRODUCER OF THE CAROTINOID FUCOXANTHIN
abstract_text: The invention relates to microbiology and biotechnology. The unicellular algae strain Mallomonas kalinae SX-1 VKPM AI-23, a producer of fucoxanthin, a carotenoid having antioxidant activity, has been deposited at the Federally Funded Institution GosNIIgenetica, the National Bioresource Center of the Russian National Collection of Industrial Microorganisms, of the Russian Federation Ministry of Education and Science under registration number VKPM AI-23. The strain Mallomonas kalinae SX-1 VKPM AI-23 enables the production of high concentrations of fucoxanthin; the strain is not finicky in respect of cultivation conditions and is capable of growing in media having low salt concentrations.

title: EDUCATION REWARD SYSTEM AND METHOD
abstract_text: A reward learning system includes a user interface configured to receive modes of user information related to a state of the user. A cognitive computing system includes a reward system. The reward system includes a dynamically upgraded profile model of the user which is updated in accordance with the user information related to the state. The reward system is updated by machine learning employing feedback from user responses measured by the user interface and searched information by the cognitive computing system. The reward system includes an increasing reward protocol based on learned user preferences and responses and rewarded in accordance with user achievements.

title: EDUCATION REWARD SYSTEM AND METHOD
abstract_text: A reward learning system includes a user interface configured to receive modes of user information related to a state of the user. A cognitive computing system includes a reward system. The reward system includes a dynamically upgraded profile model of the user which is updated in accordance with the user information related to the state. The reward system is updated by machine learning employing feedback from user responses measured by the user interface and searched information by the cognitive computing system. The reward system includes an increasing reward protocol based on learned user preferences and responses and rewarded in accordance with user achievements.

title: EDUCATION SUPPORT SYSTEM AND EDUCATION SUPPORT METHOD
abstract_text: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To alleviate burden of an educator relative to a plurality of groups.SOLUTION: An education support system includes: a plurality of robots in charge of respective plurality of groups to which each educator belongs; a controller for controlling the plurality of robots; and a database accessible from the controller. The plurality of robots can move by control from the controller, acquire status information including at least one of a video or sound of the group to transmit it to the controller, and output information received from the controller by control from the controller. The controller associates status information of each group with an educator belonging to the group to accumulate it in the database, acquires results of output of information on an agenda from a specific robot and the status information on discussion of a specific group from the specific robot, and determines action of the specific robot from machine learning based on the status information accumulated in the database, and controls the specific robot.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Big data and artificial intelligence based accurate review method and education robot system
applicants: DAGUO INNOVATION INTELLIGENT TECH DONGGUAN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a big data and artificial intelligence based accurate review method and an education robot system. The method includes creating a study portrait for each student according to homework big data, acquiring to-be-reviewed knowledge point mastering level of a student from a study portrait of a to-be-inquired student and recommending to-be-reviewed knowledge points. According tothe above method and system, study portraits are created for students through homework big data and then to-be-reviewed knowledge points and weight of review time required from each knowledge point among all the to-be-reviewed knowledge points can be recommended according to the study portrait, so that different review strength can be adopted according to different students and different knowledgepoints. Therefore, accurate review is realized, and the review pertinence and efficiency are improved and high efficiency of review is realized.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR CHANNEL STATE INFORMATION (CSI) ACQUISITION WITH DL AND UL REFERENCE SIGNALS
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. Methods and apparatuses for channel state information (CSI) acquisition with downlink (DL) and uplink (UL) reference signals (RSs). A UE apparatus includes a transceiver and a processor operably connected to the transceiver. The transceiver is configured to receive (i) configuration information for a CSI-RS and a sounding reference signal (SRS) and (ii) downlink control information (DCI) that includes a DCI field for an aperiodic SRS transmission request. The processor is configured to decode the configuration information and the DCI with the aperiodic SRS transmission request. The transceiver is further configured to receive the CSI-RS and transmit the SRS. The SRS corresponds to a higher-layer configured SRS resource and a number of configured SRS resources is more than one.

title: Children's artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The invention discloses a children's artificial intelligence education robot, comprising a case. A partition is fixedly connected between the two sides of the inner wall of the case; a toothed plate is movably connected to the top of the partition; a motor is fixedly connected to one side of the top of the partition; one end of an output shaft of the motor is fixedly connected with a gear that meshes with the toothed plate; the bottom of the toothed plate runs through the partition and the case and is extended to the bottom of the case. The invention relates to the technical field of educationrobots. The children's artificial intelligence education robot has the advantages that the partition fixedly connected between the two sides of the inner wall of the case enables a child to adjust the height of the robot during watching, cervical healthy growth is benefited for the child, and using is facilitated; the output end of a height sensor is connected with the input end of a data comparator, the height of a display screen may be adjusted according to the horizontal level of the child's eyes such that the child's eyes are horizontal to the display screen.

title: AI-based big data recommendation learning system and recommendation method
applicants: SHANGHAI UKIN INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI-based big data recommendation learning system and a recommendation method. The system comprises an information collection module, an information storage module, a classification module and a prediction module, wherein the information collection module collects learning behavior data of learners and stores the data into the storage module; the storage module is communicated with a cloud server; and the prediction module is used for analyzing the behavior data of the learners and predicting future learning behaviors and learning results of the learners. Through thesystem and the method, mined education resource data can be fit for the learners, and high resource collection accuracy is achieved.

title: SYSTEM AND METHODS THAT FACILITATE COMPETENCY ASSESSMENT AND AFFINITY MATCHING
abstract_text: Various embodiments disclosed herein provide for a competency identification and analysis system and method. An individual's actions, interactions, and other data can be analysed to determine one or more competencies associated with the individual. The competencies can be identified using artificial intelligence, deep learning, and other techniques in order to identify skills, resources, strengths, and other advantages that an individual possesses. The system can then match the competencies to one or more tasks, jobs, mentors, and make recommendations related to these competencies. In an embodiment, the system can retrieve the contextual data from communications and interactions with other individuals, from education markers, job performance reviews, wearable devices. The system can also provide feedback to the individual, to have the user assess the competencies and rank the competencies or assessors who have provided the assessments. The feedback can be delivered in real-time, and in some embodiments via augmented reality devices.

title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE BASED JOB AND INSTITUTION MATCHING SYSTEM
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence-based job and education institution matching system which matches a job seeker to a job offer company or provides job education information. The artificial intelligence-based job and education institution matching system comprises: a personal information inputting module which receives input of user′s personal information; a career gene generating module which generates a first career gene based on the user′s personal information input into the personal information inputting module; a target career gene generating module which additionally receives user′s personal information and generates a second career gene or a third career gene based on the first career gene and career big-data; a job matching module which matches the second career gene to a job; and an education institution matching module which matches the third career gene to the education institution. The target career gene generating module checks whether the first career gene satisfies predetermined qualifications based on the career big-data. When the first career gene satisfies the qualifications, the target career gene generating module generates the second career gene, which is generated by adding job preference score information to the first career gene. When the first career gene does not satisfy the qualifications, the target career gene generating module generates the third career gene, which is generated by adding needed education information to the first career gene.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR MULTIPLEXING CHANNEL STATE INFORMATION
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th- Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. Methods and apparatuses for multiplexing channel state information (CSI). A user equipment (UE) includes a transceiver configured to receive configuration information for CSI reporting. The UE further includes a processor configured to decode the configuration information and calculate a CSI according to the configuration information. The transceiver is further configured to transmit the calculated CSI on an uplink (UL) channel. The CSI includes N segments and is transmitted in one slot, where N>1. A first of the N segments includes a rank indicator (RI) and at least one other CSI parameter. A base station (BS) includes a processor configured to generate configuration information for CSI reporting. The BS further includes a transceiver configured to transmit, to a UE, the configuration information via a downlink (DL) channel; and receive, from the UE, a CSI report calculated in accordance with the configuration information on an uplink UL channel.

title: Deep learning sample annotation method based on online education big data
applicants: BEIJING DASHENG ONLINE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a deep learning sample annotation method based on online education big data. The method comprises: inputting M to-be-annotated online education data, displaying the Ndata, and annotating the displayed N data; when M is greater than N* displaying times, selecting N data randomly from the remaining M-N* displaying times, and when M is less than N* displaying times,re-selecting N data randomly from the M data, and setting the displaying number as 1; after the sum of all annotated data is greater than the J multiple of M, taking the number of times of the annotated data greater than K as the valid data conforming to the classification; and obtaining a classification library of different types of data. According to the deep learning sample annotation method based on online education big data disclosed by the present invention, the identification of online education data is improved, the user satisfaction is improved, the user experience is improved, subjectivity of the individual is avoided, the dullness of a single repetitive labor is released, and all annotated users are greatly facilitated.

title: SYSTEM FOR INSTRUCTIONAL VIDEO LEARNING AND EVALUATION USING DEEP LEARNING
abstract_text: The present invention provides a method for learning a video for education by using a deep learning algorithm and evaluating an educatee video and a system thereof. According to an embodiment of the present invention, the method for learning and evaluating a deep learning-based video comprises the following steps of: allowing a deep learning algorithm-based deep network video education engine to learn by using the video for education; and evaluating the educatee video by using the learned deep network video education engine.

title: Title: DroneALERT. description: a world first, global rapid drone reporting online application that can be completed in 4 easy steps using just a mobile device. It encourages ‘drone detectives’ (anyone!) to report bad or dangerous drone activity simply by using photos, videos and geo-locations. The system then turns gathered information into a valuable report, which can be given to authorities via to help them investigate drone incidents. DroneALERT that has potential to self-regulate the drone industry while contributing to improving drone, aviation and public safety and education.
abstract_text: A method, mobile application and business scheme for creating a drone incident report (DIR) on a mobile device. The method allows users to capture evidence of illegal drone or unmanned aerial vehicles usage with the users mobile device as the incident is occurring to create and send an online drone incident report, the report is emailed to the user and the application custodians. The incident report can be used to aid authorities in their investigations or take emergency actions. The DIR contains details such as images and videos, location, time, date of the incident, drone identification, distance and height. The application includes maps using machine learning technology, the maps reveal no fly zones, such as aerodromes, utilities, prisons, sporting stadiums or the like.

title: DEEP LEARNING-BASED EDUCATIONAL VIDEO TRAINING AND EVALUATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: A deep learning-based video training and evaluation method according to one embodiment comprises the steps of: training a deep learning algorithm-based deep network video education engine by means of an educational video; and evaluating the video of a user by means of the trained deep network video education engine.

title: Diagnosis and management system based on traditional card game
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a system for diagnosing and managing a cognitive disorder based on a traditional card game. More particularly, according to the present invention, a cognitive ability enhancement education is performed based on a fun game in a daily life for a dementia risk group such as the aged and the like, and a mild cognitive disorder object group is extracted by applying a diagnosis algorithm of an artificial intelligence for the winning of a game, possibility of scoring, and a trend by a selection and a play of a card disturbing a scoring condition of an opponent, and a selection for maximizing the winning and scoring for a user in such condition by progressively monitoring a game progress for proceeding a traditional card game and a winning rate of a game result based on a cognitive disorder evaluation and algorithm on the basis of machine learning through natural participation in the traditional card game for preventing dementia, which is a main element of a content service. In addition, a continuous monitoring for a management object group can be performed to recognize a cognitive disorder or dementia of the aged in advance, an active pre-treatment is supported, and a cognitive ability for the mild cognitive disorder object group is automatically monitored in a daily life to diagnose the risk of worsening the cognitive ability in advance, and a professional medical service can be provided. The system for diagnosing and managing a cognitive disorder based on a traditional card game comprises: a smart device including an application, a data collecting device, a data storage unit, and a first transceiving device; and a main server including a database, a data analysis device, a group selecting device, and a second transceiving device.

title: Method for enabling student receiving K12 education to surf the internet in green way
applicants: DONGGUAN YOUSHAN ELECTRONIC TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method for enabling a student receiving K12 education to surf the internet in a green way. Under the informationized educational reform background, the student cannot be adversely affected by the social entertainment and games while really enjoying the convenience of the informationized education; the student can focus on the classroom while in school, and the teacher canunderstand and master the internet usage state of the student at any time, and can open the network as award during a certain period of time, thereby enabling the student to learn in the fun; the parents can trust the child to learn by using the electronic equipment; the green internet surfing function is realized in a way of combining the artificial management and control, the big data collection and the artificial intelligence, and the defects that the existing scheme is inflexible, universal in application and cannot really realize the green internet surfing are offset.

title: RESOURCE ALLOCATION FOR REPETITIONS OF TRANSMISSIONS IN A COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a sensor network, Machine Type Communication (MTC), Machine-to-Machine (M2M) communication, and technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the above technologies, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. Methods and apparatus are provided to define sub-bands within a downlink (DL) system bandwidth or within an uplink (UL) system bandwidth, to configure sub-bands for DL signaling or for UL signaling, and to transmit or receive DL signaling or UL signaling with repetitions in the configured sub-bands.

title: GLOBAL DIGITAL FRAMEWORK INTEGRATED TO DEVELOP ECONOMICALLY COMPETITIVE MUNICIPALITIES
abstract_text: A global digital framework integrated by methods, systems, processes, and new thinking technologies focused on the development of secure, sustainable, collaborative, intelligent, resilient, and economically competitive municipalities. The frameworks intends to provide high quality knowledge, multimedia information, and municipal/city strategies in sectors such as education, security, energy, water, health, information technologies (IT), transportation, construction, food, environment, waste, and finance; through the use of virtual reality technologies, algorithms, personal computer technology, big-data technologies, smart-phone technology, GPS technology, artificial intelligence systems, digital videos, behavioral change technologies, augmented reality systems, and digital advisory systems among other technologies.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR MANAGING DOWNLINK TO UPLINK INTERFERENCE IN WIRELESS COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car or connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. The present disclosure discloses a method capable of solving a problem of downlink-to-uplink interference (DL-to-UL interference) occurring as dynamic time division duplex (TDD) is applied in a wireless communication system.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR MANAGING DOWNLINK TO UPLINK INTERFERENCE IN WIRELESS COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car or connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. title: Method and system for acquiring child education resource content
applicants: BEIJING GUANGNIAN WUXIAN SCIENCE & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method and a system for acquiring child education resource content. The method comprises the steps that original content data uploaded by a user is acquired, wherein the original content data carries identity information of the user; the original content data is sorted and saved as child education resource content data containing an author identifier; and/or, artificial intelligence is utilized to automatically generate the child education resource content data. According to the method, the child education resource content can be acquired easily and conveniently, andtherefore the situation that only old child education resource content can be output repeatedly when child education resource content needs to be output is avoided.

title: Internet-of-Things-based family education machine system
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of family education machines and specifically relates to an Internet-of-Things-based family education machine system. After the Internet-of-Things-based family education machine system is connected to a network, course data is sent to a monitoring machine via a processing unit of a family education machine device when a course starts; a video collectionunit and a audio collection unit are arranged on the family education machine device, video information and audio information of a study site can be collected via the video collection unit and the audio collection unit after a kid starts learning, the video information and the audio information are sent to the monitoring machine after the course ends, data information is output to the outside viaan output device of the monitoring machine, learning effects of the kid in learning processes can be grasped by parents via the monitoring machine, and learning conditions of the kid can be monitoredand grasped.

title: LINEAR COMBINATION CODEBOOK FOR CSI REPORTING IN ADVANCED WIRELESS COMMUNICATION SYSTEMS
abstract_text: The present disclosure relates to a communication method and system for converging a 5th-Generation (5G) communication system for supporting higher data rates beyond a 4th-Generation (4G) system with a technology for Internet of Things (IoT). The present disclosure may be applied to intelligent services based on the 5G communication technology and the IoT-related technology, such as smart home, smart building, smart city, smart car, connected car, health care, digital education, smart retail, security and safety services. A method of a user equipment (UE) for a channel state information (CSI) feedback in an advanced communication system. The method comprises receiving, from a base station (BS), CSI feedback configuration information for a pre-coding matrix indicator (PMI) feedback based on a linear combination (LC) codebook, wherein the PMI comprises a first PMI (i1) and a second PMI (i2), determining the first PMI (i1) and the second PMI (i2) indicating an LC pre-coder that corresponds to a weighted linear combination of a first beam and a second beam, wherein the first PMI (il) includes a first beam indicator (i1,1, i1,2) and a second beam indicator (i1,3) that indicate the first beam and a distance (dl, d2) of the second beam in accordance with the first beam, respectively; and the second PMI (i2) indicates weights assigned to the first beam and the second beam. The method further comprises transmitting, to the BS, the CSI feedback over an uplink channel including the determined first PMI (i1) and the second PMI (i2).

title: Artificial intelligence-based machine learning application type online game
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence-based machine learning application type online game and belongs to the technical field of online games. A host server system for the game comprises an artificial intelligence finished product, a management system therefor and a general system for the online game. A game player applies for a type of artificial intelligence system with the system via a terminal, and the artificial intelligence system is named and registered as a personal intelligent system for the game player. Machine learning knowledge is transferred by the game player to the personal intelligent system for the game player, an intelligence level of the personal intelligent system for the game player is incessantly improved, intelligence knowledge is uploaded, and machine learning and upgrading operation is performed on the artificial intelligence finished product of the host server system. Intelligence of the personal intelligent system can be used (or other types and grades of artificial intelligence finished products can be applied with the host system) for consultation, education, planning, designing, interactive entertainment and the like for the game player and for completing all kinds of intelligent activities according to requirements of the game player.

title: Online education video exquisite image interception method based on deep learning
applicants: BEIJING DASHENG ONLINE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an online education video exquisite image interception method based on deep learning; the method comprises the following steps: inputting an online education video, and inputting a to-be-intercepted image number N; intercepting one image according to the time sequence; sending an intercepted image into a deep learning system; using the deep learning system to score the image; determining whether the image belongs to top N or not according to the image score. The method uses a deep learning mode to intercept exquisite images existing in the online education video, thus improving the exquisite image checking and screening efficiency; users can more easily obtain the exquisite images in the online education video, thus capturing user online education most exquisite moments, improving user satisfactions, improving user experiences, improving product propagation rate, and allowing users to conveniently propagate and check.

title: Story platform based on internet of things and artificial intelligence technology
applicants: GUANGZHOU WANGJIA TOY TECH DEVELOPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of early childhood education toys, in particular to a story platform based on the internet of things and artificial intelligence technology. The platform comprises a story resource management system, an input/output system, an interaction system, a user management system and a story management system. The story management system comprises a story playing module, a hierarchical classification module and a filtering module; the story playing module comprises a branch control unit, story branches can be controlled according to an interaction result, the hierarchical classification module is used for performing classification and classification on story resources, interaction resources and story branches, and the filtering module screens and filters the story resources, the interaction resources and the story branches according to user information. According to the story platform based on the internet of things and artificial intelligence technology, the problem that an existing story platform lacks interaction, interestingness and pertinence can be solved, different stories and interactive contents can be provided according to the individualities of children so that the children can participate in stories to become the leading actors, and therefore the learning interests of the children are added.

title: AN ADAPTIVE INCENTIVISED EDUCATION PLATFORM
abstract_text: There is provided an adaptive incentivise education platform that provides educational content to a user via their mobile device. Usage information relating to how, when and what the user users is collected and analysed by machine learning to establish user preference patterns, which are used to update the user profile, and to predict what content would be most likely to be engaged by the user to achieve predetermined outcomes. The content is then selected and sent to the user.

title: Intelligent tutoring system on basis of scenario perception and method for implementing intelligent tutoring system
applicants: GUANGDONG SCI TECH BASIC CONDITION PLATFORM CENTER
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent tutoring system on the basis of scenario perception. The intelligent tutoring system comprises a tutoring scenario information acquisition module, a tutoring scenario semantic model building module, a scenario tutoring rule generation module, a tutoring scenario semantic data fusion module, a scenario tutoring resource recommendation module and a scenario tutoring execution module. Tutoring scenario native data can be acquired by the tutoring scenario information acquisition module, tutoring scenario semantic modules can be built, scenario tutoring rules can be generated by means of machine learning, tutoring scenario semantic related data can be fused, the optimal scenario tutoring resources can be pushed, semantic service matching selection and recommendation service can be received, intelligent tutoring engines can be operated, and accordingly intelligent tutoring service can be provided. The invention further discloses a method for implementing the intelligent tutoring system on the basis of scenario perception. The intelligent tutoring system and the method have the advantage that tutoring service with personalized autonomic learning functions can be provided for MOOC (massive open online courses) education resource platforms.

title: Method, apparatus and system for protecting website through machine learning
abstract_text: The invention relates to a method for protecting a website through machine learning. A website security model protection website is established through the machine learning. The method comprises the following steps: establishing a reverse proxy connection with the website by a website protection apparatus to receive an access request of the website, and sending alarm information of the access request; judging whether the alarm information corresponding to the access request is released, and if so, adding a release rule; and establishing a website security model of the specific website according to the release rule, and intercepting access with threats by the website protection apparatus according to the website security model. The technical scheme provided by the invention can securely protect website, education, e-commerce, bank and other information systems based on Web. The unknown attacks can be effectively prevented, thereby reducing the maintenance personnel and the maintenance cost and reducing the enterprise cost.

title: Preschool education toy of artificial intelligence protection
applicants: HUNAN U CROWN SPORTS MAT CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a preschool education toy of artificial intelligence protection, including bottom plate and model, the bottom plate is equipped with the lateral wall all around, the lateral wall is equipped with infrared sensor, the bottom plate upper surface is equipped with road model, bridge model, red green lamp module type, traffic sign model and communal facility model, road model, bridge model, red green lamp module type, traffic sign model and communal facility model lower part all are equipped with weighing transducer, the bottom plate side surface is equipped with switch, speaker and alarm. Compared with the prior art,

title: Intelligent classroom roll-call system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent classroom roll-call system based on artificial intelligence. The intelligent classroom roll-call system comprises a classroom picture entering system, a large data processing module and an output module, wherein the large data processing module comprises a server, a GPU accelerating artificial intelligence computing module, an attendance check situation-seat information-interpersonal relation module, a student work related system-education system, and a student learning quality evaluation-student mental health evaluation-teacher classroom evaluation system. Compared to the intelligent classroom roll-call system in the prior art, the intelligent classroom roll-call system of the present invention has the following advantages that by using the artificial intelligence deep study method, the individuality and process development of the student is respected, the attendance check situation, the seat information, the interpersonal relation and other comprehensive information are real-timely and dynamically captured through the real-time classroom picture, the student classroom effect, the student cognition and psychological state, the student personal preference, emotional and health, the interpersonal relationship and the like are reflected through the large data processing by performing butt joint on the educational information, the student work related information, the mental health center and other databases, such that the important scientific analysis and decision-making basis can be provided for teachers, educational administration, student work related management department, parents and the like.

title: Interactive system between artificial intelligence robot and intelligent display terminal
applicants: HANGZHOU DEBAOWEI INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The present invention relates to the field of the MR and the artificial intelligence, and specifically provides an interactive system between an artificial intelligence robot and an intelligent display terminal. The interactive system comprises an artificial intelligence robot and an intelligent display terminal; the artificial intelligence robot comprises a main robot or a main robot and a slave robot thereof; each main robot or the slave robot is provided with a robot master module, and a robot wireless transceiver module, a speech recognition module, an audio analysis and response module and a servo motor module that are connected therewith; and the intelligent display terminal is provided with a terminal master control module, and a terminal wireless transceiver module, and a video analysis and response module that are connected therewith. The interactive system between the artificial intelligence robot and the intelligent display terminal provided by the present invention can be widely applied to more scenes such as the family living room, the cinema, the conference room, the public place and the like, also can be applied to entertainment, education, public services and other hot areas, and provides the avant-garde MR enjoy for the majority of customer groups.

title: Visual data processing method facing intelligent robot and apparatus thereof
applicants: BEIJING GUANGNIAN WUXIAN SCIENCE & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a visual data processing method facing an intelligent robot. The method comprises the following steps of acquiring an original picture to be learnt of a current child user; through deep learning, carrying out contour detection and extraction on the original picture so as to acquire a stick figure picture; outputting the stick figure picture to a display screen; and receiving a stick figure picture color filling instruction input by the child user, according to the instruction, carrying out color filling on the stick figure picture and outputting the color-filled picture to the display screen. By using the visual data processing method provided in the invention, children of each age can use the intelligent robot to carry out painting; and during an auxiliary science and education painting process, artistic appreciation and creation capabilities can be imperceptibly increased. The picture whose contour can be extracted can be acquired from a current scene in an on-site mode so that interests for the children to learn painting graffiti can be greatly increased. In addition, because cloud processing is used, picture contour detection and extraction speeds and accuracy are greatly increased.

title: TREATMENT INTELLIGENCE AND INTERACTIVE PRESENCE PORTAL FOR TELEHEALTH
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a computerized system for and method of providing precision healthcare services such as consultation, education, assessment, diagnosis, intervention, or treatment at a distance via encrypted real-time image and audio presence where the healthcare professional's assessment, diagnosis, and intervention activities are informed by patient feedback, smart objects, and artificial intelligence and patient outcomes are optimized through recursive system feedback. The present invention is unlimited with regard to the type of patient entity or healthcare professional entity.

title: On-line oral English evaluating system
applicants: BEIJING INNOBUDDY EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of education automation, and in particular relates to an on-line oral English evaluating system. The on-line oral English evaluating system comprises a voice preprocessing module, a convolution neural network analyzing module, and an assessment and feedback module, wherein the voice preprocessing module is used for randomly segmenting an oral English audio file to be evaluated into slices with equal length; the convolution neural network analyzing module is used for carrying out the short-time Fourier transform on the obtained audio slices so that corresponding two-dimensional time-frequency graphs are generated, and then carrying out high-level abstraction on the two-dimensional time-frequency graphs one by one so that the high-level abstraction characteristics of the audio slices are obtained; the assessment and feedback module is used for analyzing the high-level abstraction characteristics of the audio slices one by one through a machine learning model so that the score of each audio slice is obtained, and then averaging all the scores so that the final oral English evaluating score is obtained.

title: Elderly cognitive function classification method based on random forest
abstract_text: The invention relates to an elderly cognitive function classification method based on a random forest and belongs to the technical field of biomedicine. The method disclosed by the invention comprises the following steps: dividing the elderly cognitive function into three types by adopting MMSE scale scores and education levels; extracting a key cognitive domain influencing elderly cognitive function category classification by utilizing a cognitive function score relative ratio calculation method and a Pearson linearly dependent coefficient calculation method; establishing a random forest regression model, calculating attribute significance scores of non-scale attributes, and extracting external related attributes influencing the elderly cognitive function category classification; finally, equalizing the sample set based on the extracted key cognitive domain and external related attributes by adopting an SMOTE up-sampling method, and establishing an elderly cognitive function classification model by utilizing the random forest method. Compared with a scale classification method, the method provided by the invention has the advantages that the adopted attributes are few and easy to collect, and the method has high convenience; compared with other machine learning algorithms, subdivision of the elderly cognitive function types is realized, and research of a method for performing targeted intervention on the elderly cognitive functions is facilitated.

title: Multi-functional wearable-implemented method to provide fetus's life advancement and enhancements for pregnant mothers
abstract_text: The invention works using various items such as a scalable controller board, Ai processing chip, Ai software, firmware, programming language, web spider bots, pCell wireless chip, health sensors, lateral belt support and a casing to house the items creating an extension of the human mind and body interconnecting the human physiology with artificial intelligence and Neuro-synaptic and cognitive computing furthering our health, education and advancement of our civilization.

title: Behavior analysis method and system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHANGHAI XINLAI ELECTRONIC TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a behavior analysis method and system based on artificial intelligence, and is applied to developing good habits of children. The system comprises an information acquisition module used for acquiring real-time state information of a user to be analyzed; and a behavior processing analysis module used for performing analysis processing on the real-time state information so as to determine a fatigue degree and a focus degree of the user to be analyze. The real-time state information comprises behavior information and environment information. The processing analysis module comprises a preprocessing submodule used for performing detection and extraction processing on the behavior information to obtain feature behavior information and a determining analysis submodule used for performing comparison analysis with a standard behavior model according to the feature behavior information so as to determine the fatigue degree and the concentration degree of the user to be analyzed. According to the invention, based on the artificial intelligence and big data analysis, behavior information of bad learning habits of children is analyzed, the bad habits are rectified through guiding education of parents, the learning concentration power and automatic learning capability of the children are improved, and finally, the children can develop goods habits.

title: Intelligent learning guidance learning and training system and method achieving adaptive learning
applicants: CHENGDU AIYIBAI NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent learning guidance learning and training system and method achieving adaptive learning. The system comprises the basic process of learning (knowledge points), examples, an optimal learning path and testing in sequence. The system is not limited to the sequence, and a learner can start from any step. The artificial intelligence technology and the education technology are combined, most proper learning data is provided for the learner, time is saved, and efficiency is improved. The learning starting point and learning path of the learner can be fast located, most proper exercises are provided for the learner, the testing training effect reaches the optimal, and the efficiency reaches the highest.

title: Self-adaptive capacity testing system based on forgetting curve
applicants: WUHAN WISEMEN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a self-adaptive capacity testing system based on a forgetting curve, belonging to the technical field of test and evaluation of artificial intelligence and education. The system comprises a question bank classification module, a capacity testing module, a statistical analysis module and a feedback execution module. A method comprises the following four steps: (1), creating and classifying a question bank; (2), setting a check and evaluation rule for a user capacity test; (3), counting and analysing ring and wrong answer records in a user testing process; and (4), feeding back the real capacity level of users. The system disclosed by the invention is a highly intelligent capacity testing system; a topic cluster (family) is defined and used for classifying topics in the question bank; the topic assignment redundancy is reduced; the real capacity level of users can be accurately tested; and the self-adaptive capacity testing system provided by the invention can test the real capacity level of users and particularly can provide an effective analysis tool for researching an intelligent learning method through a memory curve on the topic cluster.

title: TOEIC-NAVIGATION
abstract_text: According to the present invention, a policy determining database server has a central information processing unit and an artificial intelligence database server (CRE engine). The central information processing unit provides information by analyzing data a meaningful learner back-tracking database and a process-based learning material and evaluation database according to a learning goal of a learner. The meaningful learner back-tracking database provides education content, education time and education period of the learner by back-tracking a symbolized meaningful learner group which has achieved a success by starting diagnosis and analysis of the same level as the learner according as the learner requests the learning goal by analyzing a weak type and a level of the learner through diagnosis and analysis of the learner provided in a cyber space. The process-based learning material and evaluation database symbolizes a diagnosis test and the education content provided to the learner with a level of difficulty, discrimination and reliability constructed by the item response theory. The artificial intelligence database server (CRE engine) follows structuralism theory facilitating to arrive at the goal desired by the learner. According to the present invention, a cutting-edge intelligent cyber learning enables anyone to use a desired customized knowledge education service freely at anytime and anywhere through learning which is generated automatically according to education information analysis of the cyber content server learner, where a 1:1 customized content is symbolized to each learner according to the analysis of the education content of the learner. The cutting-edge intelligent cyber learning facilitates 1:1 customizing most appropriate for a smart phone capable of wireless internet access.

title: DATA-ADAPTIVE INSIGHT AND ACTION PLATFORM FOR HIGHER EDUCATION
abstract_text: An automation analytics system and method for building analytical models for an education application uses data- availability segments of students, which are clustered into segment clusters, to create the analytical models for the segment clusters using a machine learning process. The analytical models can be used to identify at least at least actionable insights.

title: DATA-ADAPTIVE INSIGHT AND ACTION PLATFORM FOR HIGHER EDUCATION
abstract_text: An automation analytics system and method for building analytical models for an education application uses data-availability segments of students, which are clustered into segment clusters, to create the analytical models for the segment clusters using a machine learning process. The analytical models can be used to identify at least at least actionable insights.

title: THE ENDLESS BOOK
abstract_text: The Endless Book is a complete electronic platform using artificial intelligence to gather user interests and opinions about the context which is written by the first writer through votes and suggested context. This platform includes any electronic system such as website, application for smartphones, etc. The output of this platform will be a written document such as a book or paper that can be used in different fields of entertainment or education like novels, scientific books and papers, screenplay, eBooks, audio books, comic books, etc.

title: Self Organizing Maps (SOMS) for Organizing, Categorizing, Browsing and/or Grading Large Collections of Assignments for Massive Online Education Systems
abstract_text: For courses that deal with media content, such as sound, music, photographic images, hand sketches, video, conventional techniques for automatically evaluating and grading assignments are generally ill-suited to direct evaluation of coursework submitted in media-rich form. Likewise, for courses whose subject includes programming, signal processing or other functionally-expressed designs that operate on, or are used to produce media content, conventional techniques are also ill-suited. Instead, it has been discovered that media-rich, indeed even expressive, content can be accommodated as, or as derivatives of, submissions using feature extraction and machine learning techniques. In this way, e.g., in on-line course offerings, even large numbers of students and student submissions may be accommodated in a scalable and uniform grading or scoring scheme. Likewise, large collections of coursework submissions (whether or not graded or scored) or media content more generally, may be efficiently browsed and grouped using techniques described herein.

title: Environment renovation and education and learning system
abstract_text: The invention discloses an environment renovation and education and learning system, and belongs to the fields of smart cities, environment protection, the internet of things, artificial intelligence and education. The environment renovation and education and leaning system is mainly composed of an environment monitoring and renovating module, a voice and video module, a communication module and a cloud server. Nowadays, parents pay more attention to early education and preschool education for fetus and newborns, the education for teenagers or all human beings never ends, but the self condition and the environment condition are usually ignored during education, such as the condition that the respiratory disease is caused to the newborns due to the fact that polyester fiber and fine hair in the air can be easily inhaled by the newborns who have no nose hair. By means of the system, environment renovation is integrated with education and leaning, for example, the education resources of the newborns are renewed through a network, space is purified in real time or the states of the newborns are monitored in real time; accordingly, the newborns get early education in a safe and comfortable environment. By means of the system, user space resources are saved, object management is facilitated, convenience is brought to life of people, an education and learning interaction platform is provided for people, and the safe and comfortable education and leaning environment is further provided for people.

title: Intelligent configurable programming toy of Internet of Things
abstract_text: The utility model provides an intelligent configurable programming toy of the Internet of Things and belongs to the field of the Internet of Things, artificial intelligence, education and toys. The intelligent configurable programming toy mainly comprises a configuration programmer, a central processer, a memory, a data communication module, a multifunctional sensor and a multi-point actuating mechanism. An open platform is applied, so that devices of the Internet of Things are integrated, entertainment properties of different toys are configured into a whole, a user performs configuration by choosing hardware manually and even performs programming manually, and the toy is arranged into an expected action, form and interaction manner. The operational ability, the learning ability, the cognitive ability, the imaginative ability and the like of the user can be improved. By the aid of the Internet of Things, storage data of the intelligent toy can be shared, users can exchange arrangement methods and contents of the intelligent toy and learn from each other, the forms and actions of the toy are ever-changing, the contents are rich and colorful, other devices of the Internet of Things can be controlled, an interaction function of the toy and the Internet of Things is realized, and the intelligent toy is integrated into people's life, so that the people's life is improved.

title: METHOD FOR PREDICTION OF RISK OF DEVELOPMENT OF ARTERIAL HYPERTENSION IN TUBALARS, ETHNIC GROUP NATIVE TO ALTAI REPUBLIC
applicants: G BJUDZHETNOE OBRAZOVATEL NOE UCHREZHDENIE DOPOLNITEL NOGO PROFESSIONAL NOGO OBRAZOVANIJA NOVOKUZNET [RU]
abstract_text: FIELD: medicine.SUBSTANCE: method provides considering the age, education, smoking, obesity (OB), hypercholesteremia (HCS), salt abuse, Quetelet body weight index: normal (NBW), overweight (OWT), waist circumference (WC), waist-to-hip ratio (WHR), low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (LDL cholesterol) and atherogenicity index (AI), hypertriglyceridemia (HTG), hyperuricemia, social factors: marital status, income and genetic markers: blood group, Rh rhesus and MN. A prognostic coefficient (PC) is scored for each factor. If the PC value is (+6) points and more, a predisposition to the development of arterial hypertension in Tubalars, an ethnic group native to the Altai region is predicted.EFFECT: using the declared method enables detecting the risk of the development of AH earlier before the target organs are involved, and persistent hypertensive disease is formed.3 tbl, 2 ex

title: Web-Based Education System
abstract_text: A web-based education system enables instructors to prepare and present online education courses and enables students to locate and participate in available courses. A machine learning algorithm generates a topic-based representation of courses and generates a topic-based representation of user interests. The web-education system then enables users to find relevant courses using the topic-based representations. Recommended courses are ranked according to factors such as relevance to the user, popularity, and course rating.
