title: Computer based education for use with multiuser software
abstract_text: Methods and systems for performing computer based education are described herein. According to various aspects, a user is presented with computer-based education regarding completion of an objective within an interactive computing environment. When the user is ready to perform (or attempt to perform) the objective in a real-world or "live" situation, the software may place the user in a training session where other users are actually computer-controlled participants, or bots, having a prescribed level of artificial intelligence. If the user successfully completes the objective, the software may increment the level of AI until the user completes the objective while interacting with bots having a required level of AI. The user may thereafter be allowed to participate in dynamic sessions with other human users. During training sessions the user may be affirmatively led to believe that other participants are human, rather than bots.

title: METHOD OF DETERMINING TOTAL CARDIOVASCULAR RISK OF DEATH IN MEN
applicants: FEDERAL NOE G BJUDZHETNOE UCHREZHDENIE NII KARDIOLOGII SIB OTDEL ROSSIJSKOJ AKADEMII MED NAUK [RU]
abstract_text: FIELD: medicine.SUBSTANCE: invention relates to field of medicine, namely to cardiology, public health and health care. Examination of men is performed in accordance with the programme of standardised cardiologic screening with determination of index of total risk of death, age, level of education, professional affiliation, marital status, attitude to smoking, value of diastolic arterial pressure, value of total blood cholesterol, total risk of death from cardiovascular diseases (CVD) is determined by formula: ?x?=x?+x?+x?+x?+x?+x?+x?, where ?x?is index of total risk of death from CVD, xis age: number of years for the moment of examination, xis education level: 0 is the higher or middle level of education, 1 is primary level of education, xis occupation in professional group of hard physical labour: 0 is no, 1 is yes, xis marital status: 0 stands for "married", 1 means "divorced, widowed, single", xstands for attitude to smoking: 0 means "do not smoke", 1 means "smoke regularly or irregularly", xstands for diastolic arterial pressure in mm Hg, xstands for total cholesterol in mg/dl, ?, ?,?, ?, ?, ?, ?stand for regression coefficients of variables x, x, x, x, x, xand x, and having the following values: ?=0.051; ?=0.634; ?=0.953; ?=1.266; ?=0.068; ?=0.035; ?=0.005. If index of total risk of death from cardiovascular diseases is lower than 6.19, men are referred to category of low risk. If values of index of total risk of death is 6.20-7.87, men are referred to category of middle risk, and if values of index of total risk of death is equal or higher than 7.88, men are referred to category of high risk of death from cardio-vascular diseases.EFFECT: method makes it possible to reduce morbidity caused by cardiovascular pathology, as well as to avoid further progress of cardiovascular diseases and development of their complications.2 tbl, 2 ex

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR DETECTING OVERLOAD AND UNLAWFUL MEASUREMENT OF VEHICLE
abstract_text: PURPOSE: An incorrect measurement detection method and a system using the same are provided to an artificial intelligence algorithm, thereby accurately determining an illegal loading state in any situation. CONSTITUTION: A vehicle measurement part(210) measures vehicle information. An artificial intelligence processor(220) detects an incorrect measurement state. An input part(230) inputs data to the artificial intelligence processor. A display part(240) externally displays the incorrect measurement state. A learning part(250) educates the artificial intelligence education. A vehicle information database(260) stores measurement result information.

title: INTERACTIVE VIRTUAL CLASSROOM PROVIDING MULTIDIRECTIONAL AND SELF-DIRECTED SCRIPTED LEARNING
abstract_text: The present invention discloses an interactive virtual classroom for scripted self-directed learning and education. While self-directed learning is often unidirectional or bidirectional, this application features a multi-directional learning approach. The multidirectional approach involves interaction with virtual classmates that are programmed with artificial intelligence (AI). Interaction can be between the instructor and the user student, the user student and the AI students, the instructor and the AI students, between the AI students. The content provided within the classroom is scripted and customized depending on what is being taught. An interactive virtual classroom allowing for self-directed scripted learning is disclosed. While self-directed learning is often unidirectional or bidirectional, this application features a multidirectional learning approach. The multidirectional approach involves interaction with virtual classmates that are programmed with artificial intelligence (AI). Interaction can be between the instructor and the student user, the student user and the AI students, the instructor and the AI students, and between the AI students. The content provided within the classroom is scripted and customized depending on what is being taught.

title: Interaction type sudoku game method and system thereof
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an interaction type sudoku game method and system thereof, and particularly to an interaction type sudoku game method and a system thereof with related interaction game checks. By utilizing the present invention, related cognitive representation of users can be improved. The system disclosed in the present invention comprises a core artificial intelligence control module, an input module, a display module, a subject-producing module, a memory module, an execution module, an on-line connection module, an analysis and comparison module, a score module, and a data base system. And by way of starting, choosing game mode, system calculating to produce subjects, inputting answers, giving logical suggestion, and executing scoring and evaluating, through the design mentioned above, users can unravel the blank game checks composed of symbols and colors by utilizing the interaction relationship between symbols and colors suggested by the system. By way of the present invention, not only the interest and interaction of the cross-ward puzzle can be increased but also the logical reasoning and symbol differentiation and coordination capability of color recognition of users can be trained. It can achieve the purpose of education and play at the same time.

title: METHOD FOR PREDICTION OF VERTEBRAL FRACTURES IN WOMEN OF 60 YEARS AND OLDER
abstract_text: FIELD: medicine. ^ SUBSTANCE: invention refers to medicine, namely to therapy and rheumatology. The following risk factors are observed: body weight index (BWI) less than 20 kg/m2 in 25 years and at the present time; low motion activity - hiking less than half an hour a day after 50 years and at the present time; early menopause before 45 years, previous fractures of forearm, shin and ribs; elementary education; stroke after 50 years; physical inability observed; insufficient dietary intake of calcium; climax before 45 years; number of deliveries; enteritis; gastritis. They are graded and evaluated, then predicting factors F1 and F2 define under formulae: F1= - 3.86 - 1.15*a1 - 0.54*a2 - 0.67a3 + 0.60*a4 -0.54*a5 - 0.55*a6 - 0.53*a7 - 0.60*a8 - 0.67*a9 - 0.56*a10 - 0.54*a11 - 0.71*a12 -0.57*a13 + 0.48*a14 - 0.37*a15; F2= 0.70 + 0.44*a1 + 0.21*a2 + 0.25*a3 - 0.22*a4 + 0.20*a5 + 0.21*a6 + 0.22*a7 + 0.23*a8 + 0.26* a9 + 0.20*a10 + 0.20*a11, + 0.28*a12 + 0.22*a13 - 0.19*a14 + 0.13*a15, respectively, where a1-5 are gradation and numerical values of the risk factors: ai is a body weight index less then 20 kg/m2 at the present time: 0 - not observed, 1 - observed; a2 - hiking less than half an hour a day at the present time: 0 - not observed, 1 - observed; a3 - previous fractures of forearm: 0 - not observed, 1 - observed; a4 - insufficient dietary intake of calcium: 0 - not observed, 1 - observed; a5 - body weight index at 25 years less than 20 kg/m2: 0 - not observed, 1 - observed; a6 - previous fractures of ribs: 0 - not observed, 1 - observed; a7 - enteritis: 0 - not observed, 1 - observed; a8 - gastritis: 0 - not observed, 1 - observed; a9 - previous fractures of shin: 0 - not observed, 1 - observed; a10 - elementary education: 0 - not observed, 1 - observed; a11 - stroke after 50 years: 0 - not observed, 1 - observed; a12 - hiking less than half an hour a day after 50 years: 0 - not observed, 1 - observed; a13 - early menopause: 0 - not observed, 1 - observed; a14 - three and more deliveries: 0 - not observed, 1 - observed; a15 - physical inability: 0 - not observed, 1 - observed. If F1 is more than F2, high risk is predicted, and is F1 it less than F2, low risk of potential vertebral fractures in the patient is predicted. ^ EFFECT: method provides possibility to estimate risk of development osteoporotic vertebral fractures with accuracy 94,4% and thereby allows improving effectiveness and commitment of the preventive and therapeutic actions in groups of the patients with high risk of potential fractures. ^ 2 tbl, 2 ex

title: Concept mapping based knowledge acquisition system and methods
abstract_text: An interlocking artificial intelligence system and methods including the present invention comprises a system and methods including, but not limited to: a) a presentation layer which attempts to contextualise the use of a database for a specific seeker of information and related to a specific activity, decision, context or situation, b) a mapping engine which carries out the primary tasks of linking up the seeker-context to the appropriate documents and search results from the database, and c) a database which comprises of numerous documents which include, but are not limited to all types of media such as paper or film and/or from numerous sources. The frameworks of concepts or objects can be updated routinely and the programs adapted to provide a knowledge-based system to build competency in diverse specialties including education, commerce, financing, e-commerce, health care, agriculture, real estate, navigation, traveling or industry operations in general.

title: System, method and article of manufacture for a simulation system for goal based education of a plurality of students
abstract_text: A system is disclosed that provides a goal based learning system utilizing a rule based expert training system to provide a cognitive educational experience. The system provides the user with a simulated environment that presents a business opportunity to understand and solve optimally. Mistakes are noted and remedial educational material presented dynamically to build the necessary skills that a user requires for success in the business endeavor. The system utilizes an artificial intelligence engine driving individualized and dynamic feedback with synchronized video and graphics used to simulate real-world environment and interactions. Multiple "correct" answers are integrated into the learning system to allow individualized learning experiences in which navigation through the system is at a pace controlled by the learner. A robust business model provides support for realistic activities and allows one or more users to experience real world consequences for their actions in one or more simulated environments and make decisions that entail realtime decision-making and synthesis of the educational material.

title: Effective and efficient learning (EEL) system
abstract_text: This invention relates to a system and method for effective and efficient learning (EEL), with interactive, adaptive, and individualized computer-assisted instruction to students, which can be implemented on the Internet, network connected computers, single computer or other devices including designated device. More particularly the system and method includes for each student a student dynamic record adapted to the student which contains the student's personal profile that includes learning style, ability (analysis, understanding, memory, reasoning, deduction, generalizing, applying, and speed), personality, interest, and background knowledge. The student dynamic record reflects its student's behavior in responding to instruction. The EEL system also includes an AI engine consists of a self-improved dynamic rule base, which selects the materials in a knowledge base to control the instructional progress, and guides its student according to educational and psychological theories. The student dynamic record also contains information to direct the AI engine to provide review session. Preferably, a multimedia user interface is included with customizable multimedia presentation personae, which constitute a further aspect of the effective learning experience. The learner-centric education is what intended to achieve.

title: A SYSTEM, METHOD AND ARTICLE OF MANUFACTURE FOR A SIMULATION SYSTEM FOR GOAL BASED EDUCATION
abstract_text: A system is disclosed that provides a goal based learning system utilizing a rule based expert training system to provide a cognitive educational experience. The system provides the user with a simulated environment that presents a business opportunity to understand and solve optimally. Mistakes are noted and remedial educational material presented dynamically to build the necessary skills that a user requires for success in the business endeavor. The system utilizes an artificial intelligence engine driving individualized and dynamic feedback with synchronized video and graphics used to simulate real-world environment and interactions. Multiple "correct" answers are integrated into the learning system to allow individualized learning experiences in which navigation through the system is at a pace controlled by the learner. A robust business model provides support for realistic activities and allows a user to experience real world consequences for their actions in a simulated environment and make decisions that entail realtime decision-making and synthesis of the educational material.

title: CONCEPT MAPPING BASED KNOWLEDGE ACQUISITION SYSTEM AND METHODS
abstract_text: An interlocking artificial intelligence system and methods including the present invention comprises a system and methods including, but not limited to: a) a presentation layer which attempts to contextualise the use of a database for a specific seeker of information and related to a specific activity, decision, context or situation, b) a mapping engine which carries out the primary tasks of linking up the seeker-context to the appropriate documents and search results from the database, and c) a database which comprises numerous documents which include, but are not limited to all types of media such as paper or film and/or from numerous sources. The frameworks of concepts or objects can be updated routinely and the programs adpated to provide a knowledge-based system to build competency in diverse specialties including education, commerce, financing, e-commerce, health care, agriculture, real estate, navigation, travelling or industry operations in general.;An artificial intelligent system for building and processing a knowledge base comprising a presentation layer for providing desired contexts, a mapping engine for linking the contexts to databases that store numerous documents from various sources (Figure 2). The intelligent system also provides a framework for using the knowledge base build competency in diverse specialities (Figure 7).

Mistakes are noted and remedial educational material presented dynamically to build the necessary skills that a user requires for success in the business endeavor. A dynamic feedback system is utilized to provide a report on one or more students' progress to assist in defining the educational goal.

title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR PROVIDING VIDEO CONFERENCE SERVICE IN VIRTUAL SPACE
abstract_text: A device and a method for providing a video conference service in virtual space are provided to offer an education service in a video conference style by transmitting real-time image/speech in the online virtual space of a scenario type and enable a user to perform communication while a virtual character is present in the virtual space by adopting the video conference type to the virtual space. A virtual space server(210) includes a plurality of scenario maps and provides a user terminal with the scenario type virtual space in which a virtual character of the user is played. An AI(Artificial Intelligence) server(220) performs the virtual character of the user and a dialog scenario by providing an NPC(Non Player Character) to the virtual space. A speech server(230) recognizes whether the user gives a right answer by receiving a speech or text from the user terminal, and transmits a result to the user terminal in the speech. A video conference server(240) enables the users to talk with each other in real-time through the video conference type by arranging an interface around the virtual character of the user and providing an image of the user to the corresponding interface.

title: SYSTEM FOR EDUCATING AND TRAINING PIPELINE NETWORK ANALYSIS USING INTERNET AND AI TECHNIQUE
abstract_text: PURPOSE: A system for educating and training pipeline network analysis using the Internet and an AI(Artificial Intelligence) technique is provided to enable a field worker of diverse levels to carry out the education and the training regardless of time and space by configuring the system grading a knowledge level of a user and carrying out the proper education through plain question/answer. CONSTITUTION: The system comprises a client computer(100), an Internet network(200), an expert system(300) and a pipeline network analysis education/training system(400). A question/answer user interface(331) in the expert system(300) grades an expert knowledge level in order to make the user decide the education level through the plain question/answer stored in a knowledge-base(333), and transfers the information to an inference engine(332). The inference engine(332) in the expert system(300) selects a proper rule by analyzing the question/answer contents, and gets the data necessary for the pipeline network analysis education/training system(400) and the proper answer for the question inputted from the user from the knowledge-base.

title: Next Generation Multimedia Education System
abstract_text: PURPOSE: An advanced multimedia education system is provided for more progressive education environment by using Genetic Education Artificial Intelligence System introducing a study program into an expert system. CONSTITUTION: The advanced multimedia education system uses the 3-layer model and bases a multimedia learning system. The advanced multimedia education system includes a learning method through a learning game and supplementary learning. The advanced multimedia education system processes questions and incorrect answers, and searches learning data through a homepage. The advanced multimedia education system analyzes users, selects questions, and manages score.

title: Internet education system using artificial intelligence program
abstract_text: PURPOSE: An education method using an artificial intelligence program on the internet is provided to improve the grades of a user, and to manage the degrees of difficulty, importance and suitableness in the education correctly and efficiently, by dealing with the problem that is optimized for each user. CONSTITUTION: After the login of the user, the rates of correct and incorrect answers are extracted from result storing data and thereby analyzed. If the average rate of the correct answer is more than 70% for a certain period, the problem in an increased level is selected and otherwise the problem in a decreased level is supplied. The rates thereof is calculated again for the certain period. The time for controlling the level may be decided considering a period and a subjected answer. The information on the controlled level and problem is put together, and thereby the problem which is the most suitable to the user. The selected problem is offered to the user, and the answer to the problem is stored in a database repeatedly.

title: Realtime interactive multimedia education system and method in online environment
abstract_text: PURPOSE: An online interactive remote education system and method using a multimedia in real time are provided to store the questions from students in a database server, and offer an automatic answer in a natural language searching engine of an artificial intelligence type, and an open picture discussion about a selected answer under the control of an intermediate control system of an intelligence type. CONSTITUTION: A trainee system(30) and a lecturer system(20) include voice input and output devices(21),(31) and picture input and output devices(22),(32). The systems(20),(30) are connected to a lecture-dedicated server(10). An intermediate control system(40) controls the server(10) and the systems(20),(30). A multimedia server(80) stores the contents of a lecture. A database server(70) accumulates the questions of trainees and the answers of lecturers. A natural language searching system(50) searches the contents of the questions in the database server(70). An individual picture server(60) processes the picture information inputted from the trainees. The lecturer system(20) further includes an electronic board(23) and a lecture program(24).

title: Review system of Scholarship using Bringing-up game
abstract_text: PURPOSE: A reviewing system of learning from breeding game is provided to have an imaginary person in the user's workstation and have the imaginary person teach the contents what the user has learned. CONSTITUTION: The system consists of Artificial Intelligence module(110) which is to have the imaginary person and the user speak to each other. With the Artificial Intelligence Module(110) being in control, the conversation or the education between the user and the imaginary person is controlled by the Learning Conversation Module(120). The Learning Sample Data Storage(130) holds the sample of normal learning process or the standard data. With these data stored in the database, the user by the Learning Conversation Module, learns the contents and is stored into the Learning Module(140). The Learning Data Storage(150) is to let the data be altered and deleted. There is a timer(160) to check the term of forgetfulness and if some time has passed, the Random Processor Module(170) will be activated to search the data from the Learning Data Storage not to let the user forget what the user has learned. At the end, there is a Review Request Module(180) to request the user to teach the user.

title: A Training System of One-Line with Game
abstract_text: PURPOSE: An online education system is provided to simultaneously implement enjoyment of entertainment and study effect, and combine a game system capable of giving pleasure of study and online search system which by parents can inquiry condition of students online. CONSTITUTION: An online education system provides problems of various levels through a set study program adapted to individual levle by individual estimation basis analyzing through an AIS(Artificial Intelligence Study Ability Program) to students and combines a character nursery program and education program by character automatically changing according to personal study ability and point marks in connecting to the education system. Besides, parents can always check marks, condition studying time of student to online.

title: JAPANESE SENTENCE INPUTTING SYSTEM
abstract_text: PURPOSE:To raise a learning effect by constituting so that an input cannot be executed until a storage code of a displayed character is confirmed and keying is executed, when a device having jointly a display selection inputting system and a storage code inputting system is set to an education mode. CONSTITUTION:When a device is set to an education mode, and reading 304 (for instance, ''AI'') of a desired Chinese character is inputted from a key-board, a Chinese character having the same vocal sound is displayed on an area 305 of 3X3 in the lower right of a picture. In case when there are >=9 Chinese characters having the same vocal sound, and a desired character does not appear in the first time, the page is turned by keys 302, 303. This area 305 corresponds to a numerical key 301, and for instance, when a numerical key 7 is depressed, a storage code ''RAFU'' is displayed on a position 308 of a cursor 306. When it is confirmed and two keys ''RA'' and ''FU'' are tapped, ''AI (love)'' is inputted at the same position. In this way, the storage code is confirmed forcibly, and an educational effect is raised.

title: EXPERT SYSTEM FOR DEVELOPMENT OF LISP EDUCATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: PURPOSE:To improve the debugging efficiency for development of a LISP education system by transforming the knowledge necessary for a LISP language and the construction of an expert system using the LISP language into a base and applying an artificial intelligence method. CONSTITUTION:A storage means 1 stores the knowledge described in a frame necessary for the education of a LISP language and the construction of an expert system using the LISP language into a knowledge base 2. The base 2 stores stores the knowledge concerning the LISP languages via the means 1. An input means 3 inputs the functions having the ambiguous meanings and the name of a function desiring the display of an executing tree structure. An inference means 4 performs the detailed inference of the subject function inputted by the means 3. Then an output means 6 outputs the detailed explanation of the function which is generated with conversion of a format by a generating means 5 together with the executing tree structure. Thus the debugging efficiency is improved for development of a LISP education system.

title: Dual-purpose dado
abstract_text: The utility model is a double-duty platform comprising platform (1) and characterizes by the arrangement of a pen container (2) on one or two sides of the platform. A plug hole (3) which is arranged with an elastic clamp (4) on two sides is equipped on the upper of the platform (1). The base of the flagpole gets through of the plug hole (3) and bites by the clamps (3); A color lamp (6) which is connected with the switch on the platform (1) can be positioned on the bottom of the platform (1) wherein a pool (8) can be installed in addition to breed fish. A embossment of a China map and /or 'RE AI ZU GUO' typeface are equipped on the front side of the platform (1).The overall appearance of the platform (1) can be designed as a China map and has simply structure ,convenient facility, characterizing in the integrity of seeing and education.
